Brands in todays date are so much concern on after sale service as am using other diffrnt..So pls dnt go fr this brand...i would suggest go for any branded company which is more committed.

title: Heard up while charging and damaged the headset
body: Good for a few weeks. After that the battery heated up drastically, and melted the rubber buttons. I luckily stopped charging in time, else may have even caught fire. Now the buttons are fused and the product can't be used.Hope Amazon will promptly replace the defective product.

title: MADE IN CHINA - Please Avoid
body: The headphone is ok..but it is running our country out of business...Go for local or Go for Sony ;-)

title: Best in the budget
body: I'm always a boat fan. Rockerz 255 Pro Plus is an upgraded version of Rockerz 255 and 255 Pro. Sound quality is good. Bass is pretty well more than 40% volume, below 40% isn't that encouraging. Battery life is an exceptional feature. I can say it's amazing in this segment. This is the 10th day of mine and the battery is standing at 60% after a everyday usage of 8 to 9 hours continously with a volume level of 30 - 40 percent (I won't hear more than this level and I advice others also not to exceed with 50% as it may have a long term consequences on your ears). Best in the budget and teal green colour is bright and attractive. Overall, a good steal at this price range. Deducting one star for bad packaging.

title: very good product
body: I tried 3 bluetooth headsets (Samsung Level U which is not so durable, 2 of JBL) and boat rockerz255 is the best pick i must say considering the pricing (bought is for 999, i know you can get it at even better price sometimes). Steady, Durable and Decent Quality of music. Recommended for Bikers, Cyclists, who want decent music and wireless headsets. Someone like music geek or who is looking for bass, amazing music this may not be good pick though. "Thank You Boat", you are one among few Indian companies which has flourished in recent past, please continue making good products and make us feel proud.

title: Best for the price, can't expect more.
body: I purchased this product for 999/- and received it one day (Thanks to Amazon). I am going to split the review about this product into PROS and CONS.PROS:1). Sound quality - As i am a bass lover, I have satisfied with the sound stage of this device. Lows and mids are clear with an adequate amount of bass.2). Build quality - Build quality of the product is exceptionally great for this price and it has two magnets which holds the ear pieces in place.3). Sweat proof - Suitable for gym freaks. It can easily withstand the splashes and sweat since it has IP rating.4). Battery life - This product can last for 6 to 8 hours depending on your usage. Charging time takes around 45 minutes to reach 100%CONS:1). Connectivity - Bluetooth range is not that great. After moving 5 meters away from the device, the connectivity gets lost. So, mostly make sure that you carry your mobile along with you and the battery information about the device is not appropriate. Some times it shows 80% in my device and all of a sudden it indicates 20% battery remaining.2). Tactility - Buttons on this headphones are not that easy to press. It needs some hard presses which sometimes feel irritated.So, if you are a good bass lover and looking for a good wireless earphones at an affordable price then this should be your choice probably.

title: Just Buy don't Think so Much Because It's BoAt.
body: Superb sound quality... Nice build ... I was using Rockerz 255f, Rockerz 235v2, Rockerz 400 and a Bluetooth Speaker Stone 1000 previously they all were superb and amazing Bass now this time I bought Rockerz 255pro+  only for Battery life ... It's 40 hours guys can you imagine... Superb Work BoAt. Love you.. Thanks Amazon for giving some discount I want to it at 1000 rupees in offer day but bought it for 1299 rupees... No Regrets at all... Don't see Negative comments go for it.. later you will Thank Me. Have A Good Day Stay Home andStay Safe.@ Athar

title: Mike dead within a month
body: Edit: Mike stopped working after 20 days, so cannot use it for calls anymore. The return window has also closed. DO NOT BUY.Since I don't use it for music, this review is about all the OTHER aspects of it. Overall, not a bad purchase if you're a non-fussy buyer who just wants a bluetooth headset that works, needs it for clocking less than 6 hours of use per day and doesn't care about how it looks.What I liked:1. It's light and comfortable to wear.2. Sounds are clear while on call or playing videos.3. Can stay connected and alternate between two devices at a time, so I don't have to repeat the pairing process between my laptop and phone.What I did not like:1. I got the ocean blue one which looked shiny and bright in the product ad, but the colour is actually a dull matte light blue.2. Bluetooth range is less than 10 metres3. Active playback time is only 6 hours after 1.5 hours of charging.4. The ear guide is not comfortable for long periods, but the earphones also keep falling out of the ear when guides are removed.5. Looks cheap. Plastic buttons have rough edges and wires are not smooth.6. Wires are too long, hanging all the way to the tummy when not in use. There is no provision to adjust cord length.

title: Value for money
body: after using it for 4 weeks it has stopped working very disappointed. After service of this product is also horrible i will defiantly not recommend this product horrible horrible experience all the money gone into waste:(never recommending your company to any one you guys are worst for sure

title: Bang for the buck.
body: This is my 2 set of boat rockers 255 . It's one of the best Bluetooth earphones you can buy for 1000 bucks . The sound quality is Great . Battery back up is ok works for 6 hours only on a single change . The Bluetooth connectvity is strong , does face some issues at time it happens once in 20 days may be but works fine . The battery indicator on the phone shows incorrect battery life it's drains  perfectly from 100% to 50 % after which the battery goes dead . However I don't feel that's any issue . Coz it's works exactly 6 hours as advertised on the box . Noice cancelation is okok  you are still able to hear outside sounds. overall Great product .

title: Bass+sound+noice cancellation is perfect.
body: Overall ratings iv given 4 as i dnt liked the design. Too lengthy i feel(boat should givr wire length adjuster as in other models it has provided). Though bass noice cancellation and sound clearity is perfect. I am comparing this product with lenovo he05. Bass and noice cancellation is best than lenovo he05. I ride bike with mic being near neck i wore 2masks with helmet still person can hear my voice. For this and bass its perfect only design i dnt liked so i Returned the product. Remember that i hav compared it to lower cost product if u compare it with jbl n others the response might be different. If you are confused refer the ratings for the products and your should not be dissatisfied.Thanks.

title: Too good in this price... Am so happy,üòÉüòä
body: ** the product was a perfect purchase... but it is not charging, requested for replacement..Replacement is quick and so prominent... Thank You boAt team...Pros:‚Ä¢Soft feeling wearing this "boAT Rockerze" and look also good..‚Ä¢The sound quality is excellent, it's like a premium brands...‚Ä¢I am using just after receiving the product without charging and it is going on and on. The battery lasts for full 2days. Am so happy.‚Ä¢Value for money.Cons:-Not find still now...

title: NOT GREAT but GOOD !
body: I ‚Äòm reviewing this product after a week of rigorous use. And oh boy! I am impressed.NOTE ‚Äì I purchased this BT Neckband at Rs.1099/- during SALE !>> DON‚ÄôT EXPECT SONY/BOSE LEVEL OF PERFORMANCE + QUALITY FROM THIS CHEAP BT NECKBAND, BUT IT IS GOOD, LET ME ASSURE YOU THAT.(1) Battery backup is good. I got almost 6 hrs backup on constant use.(2) BT 5.0 is awesome. Connectivity with Mobile is smooth & constant even at 25 ft (Tested). 3) It‚Äôs absolutely Featherweight & offers NO RESISTANCE in the neck region. Comfortable to use.(4) 1 YEAR WARRANTY on an under 1500 rupees electronic item is a novelty!(5)  It ain't a Ferrari but a Jaguar. You can live with it.Happy Shopping Amazonians

title: Excellent product must buy
body: 40 hours of unreal battery backup at 50% volume.I charge once in 5 days. I hear songs, receive calls no complaints from receiver on surrounding noise or wind gushing.If you are about to buy this, note to you:If I use it for 2-3 hours per day in full volume it gives 3 days of battery backup. You can't expect 40 hours of backup.It needs to be turned off by holding pause/play button for 3-5 secs.If you forget to turn off the device, then you can't enjoy the battery backup.Charge with a 5V adapter for better charging experience. If you use turbo charger or fast charge adaptor, it may drain your device's lifetime (check with well-known sources, I may be wrong).

title: Sound quality decent but connectivity issues
body: I have further reduced it to 2 stars as there is connectivity issues. While listening to music it suddenly disconnects and connects .... Sometimes it does not connect at all ...  then i have to re-pair the device as a new deviceThe first product i received did not have the mic wokring and the sound quality was very bad especially in one year the sound was higher than the other one. The replacement i got is working fine. The only problem i notice is when i am walking the connectivity seems to be patchy. The song starts breaking up but after sometime it's ok. I notice this when i go for more than an hour of walking. I have both the boat and realme earphone both have their advantages, personally i like the realme slightly more than boat

title: Very Good Sound Quality with unreliable performance and poor built quality.
body: I bought this Bluetooth earphones in August 2020 for my wife. I already have Boat Rockerz 255 (Old Model) which I have been using since 2019. My observations are as below. Rockerz 255 Pro are not as reliable as Rockerz 255. It's Battery life is pathetic and most of the time, if the battery percentage is around 40 %, earphones may start also.Many a times, We have to put them for charging to start the earphones.Last but not the least, built quality of these earphones is not as sturdy as older model. I am not sure whether battery of my earphones has got swollen within one year itself but my battery compartment has become so loose now that upper cover falls down and battery gets exposed with a slight jerk while jogging. Thinking of using my Warranty to get them replaced for Manufacturing issues with Battery and design.

title: Best quality for the price
body: Really like the base and sound quality for this price. It's good to listen to music. I have a Bose 300 QC but I'm using this on a day to day basis as carrying QC wherever I go is not practical. I going this headphone is  quite enough for my music need . The microphone is working as expected.The only issue is that the headphone doesnt announce the battery percentage. However my OnePlus 6t shows headphone battery when connected. The headphone give the annoying message "battery is low" from 20% onwards.

title: Not an attractive product. usage tells the truth.
body: sound is good. But!-long wire hanging in the neck which is disturbing-ear getting pain for long use. just more than an 1hr- multi-function is waste - it is not moving to next song - very irritation when driving. need to take phone out to move next song!- when I double click on the center button. it is initiating a call to the last dialer from my android phone, not sure this is only to me. but works good in iphone.Anyway returning the items!

title: Bass lovers will enjoy.
body: I have been using the product for over 15 days. Below mentioned are the Pros and Cons:PROS:1) Satisfying bass quality.2) Sound is loud. I feel 70% volume is the sweetspot where you get the best of both worlds (Bass & Treble)3) Enormous battery life. Easily get 35+ hours of music on single charge.4) Distortion free music at high loudness.5) Superb connectivity.6) No lag or latency in watching YouTube videos.CONS:1) Vocals sometimes seems muddled and the crispiness is missing.2) Neckband is ok, but the wires could have been more sturdier. Although the wires are flat.3) Visible lag/latency while playing PUBG.

title: Detailed Review
body: Pros:charge time 2 hrs and backup is very good full day use (6 hr continuous)two led colors red and blue . while using blue light blinks after every few secs,in-build ringtone (trrrin trrrin type).using in honor 6x show battery icon in 100-80-50-25-0 stages.Gives warning on low battery and when connected or disconnected (human voice).Lightwight,good build quality.i replaced rubber earplugs with piston earphone plugs, the 3 pairs comes with package are not too soft but are fine.you can control volume of pc and mobile depends on which device is currently playing.i am using piston onemore ,music quality is not to that level but is pretty decent. bass is balancedcons:Range is 10m in real world plays well if u are in room , the moment you walk out of room then distortion occurs.mic is very sensitive and works fine so far no complains from other end. i have not used outside the room.when it keep it for charging it gets switch off on it own then have to reconnect it again (not a big issue) ....first i had doubt on it battery,sound quality,mic quality but after using it i am happy even though i have used one more ,boat 255,mi earphone 399 , Samsung earphone, Phillips 249 etc.

title: üëéüëé Disappointed! Stopped working in 4 months!
body: I'm writing this review after using these earphones for quite sometime. I don't use earphones regularly and I keep them very safe. First of all, it stopped working all of a sudden in like 4 months, it neither started on clicking the power button nor charged up. Secondly, the battery time was horrible, even after full charge it barely worked for 3 hours. Regarding the sound, it was average just like any other earphone so I was sort of okay with it, though noise cancellation did not work. (Bass was a bit better) Even the customer service is quite frustrating and I couldn't get my replace till now even after so many days of complaint.Overall I would say it's an overhyped product, price wise okay but then it's better to invest in a quality product than just changing it often.

title: A decent set of Bluetooth headphones
body: I wanted a set of Bluetooth headphones that I can use at work, as well as while exercising. I have found it to be quite decent.Pros:* Can connect to 2 devices at the same time.* The ear bud provide good sound isolation, and reduce background noise to a large extent.* The microphone is quite good, and none of the people I spoke on the phone with, could recognize that I was on a heaset.* The earbuds don't come out, no matter how much I shake my head, or move around. (Important while exercising)* They are light and comfortable enough to wear while sleeping, and having your head on the side.Cons:* If you wear it while running/jogging, the neckband keeps jumping. Would have loved some magnetic clasp on the neck which would prevent it from jumping out.* When the battery is down, it just gives a warning and shuts down; Would have loved it, if it could have a warning at say 20%, so that you can decide what to do after that.

title: Disappointed - right side headphone has lost its sound after a few months
body: The battery lasts approximately 4 hours if continuously used. The sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is okie. The neck band is flexible which is exactly what I wanted. I roll the headphones easily to put them in a case. The wire is very flexible and good quality.Overall a good product. BUT.....16/10/2019 Dowgraded the rating after few months of use...the right side headphone volume has automatically reduced. Can hardly hear anything in right side unless volume is turned on full. Disappointed with this defect.

title: Amazing Bluetooth earphones.
body: One of best earphones at this price. Got it for only 1074 rs. Bass is amazing, vocals are nice. Loudness is excellent. Build quality is below average, sometimes feel very cheap, but acceptable at this price. Mic quality is not very good, sounds pretty low on mic. Battery life is outstanding no doubt. there's no aptX support on this earphones, only 2 codec support on this earphones, SBC & AAC. so don't be fool, but AAC works fine. Overall great wireless neckband in this budget range. Thank you #boAt & #AmazonEdit- my first unit has some problems, now they replaced with new earphones, for as of now there's no problem in this unit. thank you Amazon for super fast delivery with great packaging. really appreciate for that. ü•∞

title: Not suitable for office calls or work
body: It could be good for only listening the songs but not for office calls.It has many draw back, continuous big sound inbuild sound for connected , disconnected rocker information irritated.Batter is okay okay, could not expect for whole day if have daily uses.Bad big not controlable system inbuild voice is the main reason I hate this product, It disturb while in the call or anytime when you are in inportant discussion.

title: Please buy at your own risk
body: I received this item on 16 February 2021 and this review was written on 17 February 2021. If you are shopping for sports activities, please do not shop. It often comes out of your ears, although on the first day of its testing some hoarse sound starts coming from the left side and it is very annoying so I have processed the return but customer care is saying that this item only comes in Replacement. Now I don't know what to do.

title: Pains in the ear, and always a damaged box
body: Bought this for gifting purpose for a friend. Came ultra damaged first time. The Box was fully crushed. Returned.Got the replacement item, it was again all crushed. Looked like someone has thrown this a 100 times. Thought to give it a try, but the structure of the ear plugs is not good. Specially the extra rubber which is there to hold in place. Within 10 mins, your mind goes from music to 'whats pocking in my ears'.Overall, a bad experience.Built quality : 8/10Sound quality : 7/10 (if you are a Sennheiser user)Battery life : 9/10overall for the price : 8.5/10Edit: Had gifted one to a friend just 2 months back, and its not working on one side now. Raised a warranty claim with BOAT, and they said would replace it with a new one at no extra cost. But, this may take 20-30 days.

title: Good option for higher battery backup requirements only
body: I got this 255 pro + for its excellent battery backup. I had read the reviews saying excellent sound quality and deep base, but to my surprise it was not that good for sound quality.  Bass is just so so and feels like a normal speaker feeling rather than very deep , low end bass and somehow I felt these to be treble heavy tuning. I also have Infinity Glide 120 which gives way better bass and sound quality for same price but battery backup is much lesser than 255 pro +. Wish it also had some kind of dual sound profile like Infinity ones.voice quality is good and decent amount of noise cancellation but its not active noise cancellation at all. This thing got only one mic, so hard to believe that it supports any form of ANC. But suitable for day to day usage. Didn‚Äôt get that hissing sound that others reported.Quality of material is OK but not much flexible so we have to keep them around neck all the time and can‚Äôt really put them in pocket. The main connection band is kind of hard flexible plastic rather than soft silicone material like other brands.One of the good point I like about this model is that the remote and mic part is separate and hangs near to our mouth so handling the controls and voice reception is much better as others can hear us clearly what we are saying and don't have to raise our voice.Also the teal green color looks cool.Verdict: If you want BT neckband for daily calls and travel most time so need better battery backup, then you can consider itBut if you also need decently good sound quality, then there are better options available.In my personal use, I liked Infinity Glide 120 with 12 mm drivers and dual equaliser profile to be way better than these.

title: Good at it's price.
body: I bought these earphones on 23 March. My experience with these headphones is quite great. I got delivery on time, packing was great and sealed. So talking about functioning- it comes with the sound quality you will love. Bass is good enough to make your toes move. Mic is of good quality, Noise cancellation could have been even better but I think thats great for this price range. Works with dual phone and for for about 7-8m radius. Battery backup is good. Though it has 10 min charge system, full battery charging takes time. Buttons are working well. Build quality is superb. In short you can go for it if you are thinking to buy it.

title: Garbage product
body: As the headline tells, its garbage and it ends up where it belongs; the bin. It is just beyond understanding how product like these keep on selling and end up as recommended ones for a buyer.The first ones I received stopped working withing two weeks of usage. So, returned them and received a new one and they stopped working as well within its first month. Sound quality was just average, the effort for the brand it seems is just to make profits and nothing else.Any advice I can give is start making products after trying and proper testing. If you have the numbers for selling to why not make products exciting. I first got boat made products around 2017 and it feels like they have just made their way only down the road over this time.

title: Serves the purpose
body: This is an average bluetooth headset and serves the purpose. And justifies the cost. Many of the music components are unvalued and heigher frequency sounds quality are suffering. Most focus on 20 HZ to 500HZ I guess.But if you are music lover and and can't compromise with the quality the spend bit extra please better do it or go for. I used Sennheiser for five years and dropping to this headset is kind of shocking and learning to adjust.

title: Good purchase for 850rs
body: The product is really good, very much durable, 1500rs price will be best buy, but bit overpriced because of high demand...i have got it for 850rs via sale.Pros: more than good sound quality, not excellent, voice is crisp and clearExecellent build qualityLooks stylishEarphone fits very properly and do not hurt ears during long usageHave magnetic lockCan use for calls, as it provides good sound receptionBattery life is 6hrs as describedCharging time is 45min to 1hr to full charge on normal charger(not with charger give in packet)Good bassCons:Charging percentage is not seen, can be visible kf connected only in bars(percentage not seen)Sound could have been excellentOther person can listen the background noise as noise cancellation does not work properlyNo charger provided, with usb it is slow to chargeOverall a good buy, satisfied with outcomeThanks to Amazon for faster delivery and flash sale of diwali

title: Below average
body: Although I like the sound quality and noise cancelling, I'm one the mix between the bass quality, sometimes it can be a bit too much.. this is coming from someone who likes a lot of bass; but I like it noneless while some might not. My main gibe is the quality and the price of the profit. The product breaks down barely 1 and a half month of usage - The right side is the first to go out and gradually it all went on a downward spiral from there. Considering the price, I wouldn't recommend anyone to pay for an earphone that breaks down within 2 month for that price tag. I'd recommend something from Sennheiser, JBL, Sony or Samsung etc. or if you're looking for a morr appropriate and withing the same same price range, I'd recommend pTron, Realme or amazon essentials. All in all, go for another earphones cuz in a month, you might eventually have to buy another if you bought this one.

title: Decently performing short term purchase
body: First of all this is a cheap, plastic Chinese mass manufactured device. IT WILL NOT HAVE A LONG LIFE. The price reflects the quality exactly. Expect it to stop functioning after a year or less.PROS:Good sound. Had a blast listening to videos on youtube, music and works well with gaming too.Passive noise cancellation is good. Filters out a good degree of ambient noise.Charging port compatible with standard Android USB mini smartphone charger cablesCONS:Not very comfortable to wear. The band is hard and hangs down putting strain on your ears. Will be especially painful to wear during exercise. Not sure why they couldn't design this section as ordinary wire.Poor battery life. This is advertised as 6 hrs but it was only 4-5 hours for me.Not waterproof as advertised. There are manufacturing defects with tiny holes in the buds at least in my purchase which will let in sweat and water.

title: Warrenrt service and customer service is fake and cheap and frustrating really uneducated staff.
body: The product is not good it  it's not even worked for 7 months and when I tried to go to service center they doesnt have that product available on there end it's been 2 months I have visited them 5 times but they don't have product available. Boat service is very cheap and the staff which works in service center are uneducated they say come next week come next week and it's almost 2 mobths I am visiting them for my product warranty and complaint. Also there online option for registeribg complaint it's even not working. Boat is really cheap in customer support. Don't go for any boat products in life if you need good customer service

title: Boat always make things superb for Mid rangersüòä
body: Purchased in sale worth Rs 999 so it was Great deal and all things like battery backup to sound quality is Great and superb in this price range.Best waepon for gym warriors.Just charge for half an hour and play upto 6 hours.Sometime when have a call its lagging like breaking voice but overall nice noice cancellation.Apart from all great deal in  Rs 999 earphones with Bluetooth and the button controls.

title: Crap product from a nice brand - Don't waste money
body: I have been using different boat 255 headsets over an year now without any issues. But, this headset - Boat Rockerz 255 Pro+ is a crap. I have ordered this headset on Feb 12th 2021. First week itself I noticed it keep disconnecting from the phone.  Next week it is not powering on itself. Claimed warranty and after waiting for 10 days, replacement product came. One week it worked well then it is not powering on !!! Again I submitted complaint on April 29. They picked the product and updated that it got delivered to service center on May 7th. Then no further update. Please do not waste your time and money on this headset as it is not worth it.

title: Delivers deep and clear beats!
body: October 5, 2020: First impressions‚ñ∫ The device did not power on; made me think it might have been shipped without any charge in its battery. I charged it for ten minutes and was then able to power it on. Once connected to my phone, it said the battery was at 80%. That was a bit confusing.‚ñ∫ I played‚Üí soft piano music‚Üí ghazals‚Üí old and recent Bollywood songs‚Üí techno, pop, and jazz‚Üí debates and mushaira.The device performs quite well. The bass is good as advertised, music and voice are clear. I am satisfied.‚ñ∫ I have not yet tried voice calls with the device. I don't spend much time on phone calls, so the call quality does not matter to me much.‚ñ∫Looks and build are OK.‚ñ∫ Earbuds are soft and well-fitting. However, that does not mean they will feel comfortable for everyone. The same is true with all wearable devices.‚ñ∫THE ONLY THING I HATE SO FAR: The annoying pre-recorded message you hear in a loud male voice upon powering on, connecting and power off the device. Quite annoying. Check out what it says:When you power on the earphones: "Power on! You have plugged into Nirvana. Your device is ready to pair."When you connect to a phone or laptop: "You're now connected to Rocerz 255 Pro!When you post off: "Adios, amigo! Powering off."Trust me, you will feel irritated listening to all that every time.Before buying BoAt Rockerz 255 Pro, I considered One Plus Bullets Z, Realme Buds, Lenovo HE15, and Boult Audio ProBass. I verified the accuracy of reviews for all these devices and checked for the possible deception involved. I found that the reviews for BoAt Rockerz 255 Pro were much more reliable. (You can use FakeSpot for verifying the authenticity of the reviews)

title: Quality of the sound is really awesome. But the company also must look at it's build quality.
body: Nice product. I love it's sound and bass. I purchased for me and another two for my family members after I make sure for it's sound quality. But one thing I really concerned here about it build quality. Mine replaced for two times till now for it's power button issue. It will take 20 days to replace the product. First time after 20 days of purchaseing and then after three months. Now they clame this new replacement is a good one. Let's see how many days it will again goes.

title: Go fot it
body: Great product earlier I have been using tws but after having used many brand even oneplus there is many bad things on tws if compared to these neck twsfirstly there fit may not be for every one and they will keep falling from your ears as I have experienced on oneplus secondly there battery backup is not even comparable to these ones andAnd lastly there microphone is not great for callingThese I have bought roughly one month ago and have been haapy with my puschase I had a bike road trip for one week stay and 190 km I have used these for all 7 days and these came back with 70 %battery left and sound is also good check some YouTube videos on thisAnd buy it you will lovw these

title: Phenomenal battery life
body: I can vouch for this headphone‚Äôs phenomenal battery life. It easily last 35-40 hours which is industry leading. Blindly go for this headphone and don‚Äôt even look elsewhere.Only I minor designing flaw which the Boat team has surely failed to notice is when you wear the headphone the volume up (+) button is placed down while the volume down (-) button comes up. It should be vice-versa. But you get used to it. Not a deal breaker.

title: Mediocre quality, overpriced
body: Pros:1. Magnificient battery life2. Latency while gaming is lower than other earphones at a similar price bracket.Cons:1. Hissing noise in the background.2. Does NOT support Qualcomm aptX. Defaults to AAC codec in my oneplus device.3. Call quality is not very good.4. Should not be priced more than Rs. 900.Verdict: If you want a good Bluetooth headphone, spend some more money and get a better one. Or stick to wired earphones in this price bracket. To get a decent quality wireless earphones, you have to spend Rs 4k-5k at least. The problem is not with Boat but every companies who sells Bluetooth earphones at this price point. I have tried oppo enco, realme buds, oneplus z, even sony and jbl. But each and every wireless  earphones sold in Rs 1k-2.5k price bracket is total crap.

title: Pretty good üëç
body: Value for money service is what I'd say first. I bought this for my husband for ease of attending calls while driving etc. Along with a smart watch so the only qualities I was looking for were if it could capture voice clearly, is comfortable for long time wearing, battery backup and sound quality. I'd say I'm happy with all those. With the magnet, it's easy to just pick the right side up and use it only when there is a call and take it off and leave it and it'll stick automatically once done with the call. Earbuds are comfortable. It captures his sound way better than any Bluetooth earpod or earphone he has had yet. The sound quality coming in is also excellent and battery backup is AMAZING so I'm happy with it üëç go for it if you are also looking for these qualities. Also the colours are pretty fun too üòâ

title: Good for me...
body: Hello There,I have got it for 1500/- INR, Honestly sharing, this is really good for me. I am sharing my personal experience of using them. I have used it at Home (Movies, songs), Gym (Rap, Gym music), Car Driving (Nusrat Khan).Pros:Good sound and good base (I don't use Sony so please don't judge)Loud sound, I used only at 80% sound volume and that is enoughClear soundLatency- almost no latency while movies, I like it!easy to pair,good connectivity with laptop and mobilestays in neck while joggingDuring gym - workout it good and don't come out off ears, but yes during bench press you may hear low baseCons: hard to find any so far my experience is concernfor the money i have invested and got this for 40 hrs playback time, the battery never goes out.Recommendation: You must have this in your neck, worth spending on this..I will come here again to share my long term review.

title: Just go for it
body: Awesome best budget wireless earphones

title: Value for Money, for Bass lovers. Good connectivity.
body: I love these Earphones.My battery lasted from morning 6:40 am to 11pm where it was continuously connected to my smartphone. I used it for calls and for1 hour for music in this time period.There's a lot of Bass. This can be levelled with your smart phone's inbuilt equalizer, but it will be a pain if you are using multiple music players or video players.The build quality is good w.r.t. the price. I bought it for Rs. 1399/-.Bluetooth pairing is very fast. No hazzles.It can be used for all activities but not voice recording. So if anyone is looking out for recording audio with this device then this is not at all what you are looking for.

title: Poor Product
body: I bought this product on March 7.  I am not very satisfied with this product.The sound quality is ok not great. but at this price, I cannot complain.It is comfortable to wear for a long period of time.It also has auto power off functionality.  So, battery drain isn't a lot.So, overall when it works it works decently and is good buy for the priceHowever, after about a month of use, it has stopped working properly.  When I power off the headset, the indicator light doesn't switch off.  Hence, the battery drains slowly and in a few hours even if it is switched off the piece is dead.  The dissappoiting aspect is that this has broken in just about a month.  So, really cheap.And getting it serviced is tough because I need walk into the service center to get it done.  No replacement policy. Overall, really unhappy with the purchase. Unlikely to buy boAt again.

title: A short term review.
body: Well itz a very good bluetooth earphone for the price u pay. Sound quality is very good but after using the earphone for prolonged period i.e. an hour or so, your ears begin to ache a little bit. The buds are not ergonomically designed like other boat wired earphones. These are straight tip earbuds no angle to given to them and also the metallic part of the buds is a bit bigger in diameter which is the source of aches i guess. Overall a very good set of bluetooth earphones.

title: Good One, right choice
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†I received it Today, Boat 255 pro +, Boat is a reliable brand, I do hv other Boat products n they r working fine no complaints so far, it's been good 3 years I hv been using them. I expect same from dis neck band, used it a while ago, sound quality loud enough, enhanced bass, comfortable in ear. Alexa, Google Asst works well. It's basically easy to operate, quick bluetooth connectivity. No issues so far. I think I hv already adapted myself to dis New, neck band wear. Thnx Amazon.

title: Superb earphones, must buy this.
body: I am writing this review after using it for 1 week.1) Battery Backup: For battery backup I would say it is the best earphone in its class. I charged it only once on the day of received and didn't charge. I am using it more than 1 week continuesoly, 5-6 hours daily in music and phone conversation and it has still 60% battery. I would highly recommend it for long lasting battery backup.2) Charging Time: It took 1 hour to get complete charge and as per my usage experience, it seems true that if you charge it for 10 monutes it would give 10 hours battery backup. It has type C charging port and type C cable in the box.3) Call clarity: It is giving optimum performance while talking. It supress almost 70-80% background noice while you talking means the other person can hear your voice very clearly and you can hear him/her very clear.4) Cotrols and Mic position: It has 3 control buttons. Its Mic is built in within the the wire in cotrol panel which makes it more near to your mouth. Which grasp very clear voice while talking.5) Comfort: It is very light weight and very comfortable to wear within ears and around your neck. You can easily wear it while running or in work out or commuting.6) Water resistant: It has IPX7 certificate which means you do not need to worry about water splash or sweat.7) Sound quality: It has 10 mm sound driver. It is modified to give optimum bass quality for music. I am loving while listening songs or waching movies. Superb sound and bass quality.Conclusion: But it and stay tension free. You will love this product.

title: Decent sound quality, heavy bass
body: I've used these for about 1.5 years without any issues. And after that they stopped working due to internal wire breakage. Here's what my experience was:Battery backup is ok, it could have been better. Lasts for about 6hrs on heavy usage. You need to charge atleast for 15 mins before your day is over as the battery may drain when you are on an important call at the end of the day, which is frustrating. Sound quality is good I should say. Bass is heavy, but lacks quality. It even boosts bass even when not necessary. Build quality is good. I hate the microphone quality on these. People often complain me about my voice being very low during calls while using these earphones. Well balanced earphones in the price range.

title: FAKE PRODUCT ALERT ‚ò†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è
body: Fake product given by Appario retail private limited, i have ordered "BOAT" rockerz 255pro plus but i received the 1st copy of the product because the main USP of the product is Qualcomm aptx codec and cVc noise cancellation, which also have written on the back side of the box , but in my case boat surrounding signature sound and passive noise cancellation written which is similar to 'BOAT' rockerz 255, AND I PAID 1499 FOR FAKE PRODUCT.. AMAZON AND BOAT SHOULD LOOK INTO THIS.. But for sure i am never ever gonna buy Boat product, and will never recommend Boat to other...

title: Too much bass, though adjustable with equalizer. Good calling & excellent battery.
body: I purchased it at Rs. 1299, for the purpose of daily office meetings and some music.I like balanced sound, but it has boosted bass suitable for bass-music lovers.For the first 3 days, I felt the audio was disgusting with too much bass. Later I installed equalizer APO in my PC and attenuated the frequencies lower than 400 Hz (which carry bass). Now, the sound is balanced with a good treble. In fact, awesome!Regarding call quality: It has no issues with that. Good noice cancellation.Battery backup is gigantic. If I start it on Monday, I need to charge it on the weekend only. Easily lasts 35 hours. So, need to care to turn off repeatedly throughout the day.Go for it without any doubt.

title: Good headset
body: I received the headset in good condition.  No breakage was noticed by me after the shipment arrived. Its sound quality is good. It work whole day with normal.usage which include day long connectivity with phone for calls and 1-2 hours of music listening.But, its not suitable for running, as the stopper of the ear bud are not ergonomically suited for running. Its good for walk amd normal usage.Another problem which i noticed was very seldom bluetooth connectivity issue.

title: Look elsewhere if you want to use it primarily for calls
body: I don‚Äôt hate these earphones but I don‚Äôt love them either.Pros:Audio quality is decentnoise cancellation is pretty good considering it‚Äôs not ANC.Cons: mic‚ÄîI still can‚Äôt figure out where it‚Äôs placed so calls become very frustrating as the person on the other end can‚Äôt hear me very well. My primary use for this is for long calls/video calls on the phone so this is very annoying.Auto shut down‚Äîas long as you‚Äôre paired with a device, it won‚Äôt shut down after a time of inactivity. So I regularly fall asleep with it still paired (but not playing music) and will have just 20% battery in the morning.

title: Affordable but lots of technical issues
body: Changing my review after 2 months usage.This is an affordable wireless headset but it's only good for listening to music/video/books, etc.Issues:1. Sometimes you can't hear the other person on a phone call.2. While playing a game with mic, the game audio will be quieter and very low quality and also the voice quality will be very low. I never faced this issue with wired headsets.3. It will disconnect on it's own sometimes even though battery is still there.All in all, if you want somethint which you can use while you're doing some physical activity this is good but for anything else you want to do at a leisurely pace, this is not good.

title: What's not there to like?
body: Ok I've been using these magnificent neckbands from 2 days.And what's there not to be liked ..All pros1.battery back up just excellent2.sound quality best under 2000rs3.comfortable as hell4.bass is sufficient, you need more bass than these have then you got a serious problem üòÇSeen people complaint about bass (tip: just change the buds according to your ears)5.highs, lows, middles are upto the mark6.treble is also goodYou can totally enjoy every bit of your music on those 255 pro plus.And the best part it's just 1500rs you won't get any such thing In such a low price .So, if you are thinking of buying it just go for it.‚òÆÔ∏è peace

title: Excellent battery life, great sound quality
body: I've been using the headset for more than a week now, and haven't had to recharge them even once. They came fully charged and are still at 50% battery. These are in-ear headphones, so sound isolation is quite high once the ear buds are inserted properly. So far, I haven't heard a single complaint from anyone on the other side about any noise or unclear voice, even when I am sitting in a moderately noisy work environment. Sound quality is good, along with bass. If you find a sync issue with video, pause or rewind the video for a couple of seconds and it will sync fine.

title: Good sound quality, instant connectivity,  battery life and charging speed.
body: Boats rockers 255 pro+ is a good product with excellent connectivity, sound quality and battery life. Charging via laptop using the c type cable provided took around 2hrs from 10% to 100%. The noise cancellation is about 80 to 90% but with higher sound volume it's to 100% cancellation. This is also lite on the weight. I am using it with sumsung Note10 lite.  I will recommend this product for people used to with neck band or looking newly for a Bluetooth earphone.

title: No match for Apple Earpods
body: Review from Apple fan boy recently switched to Samsung Android phone.This is for the second time I bought a earphones , all these years (may be 10+) I used to have earphone which was supplied with IPhone. Last year I bought BOSE 700 headphone so technically boat rockers is my first pair of earphones. Seeing at 4 stars average reviews by124k customers I thought 124k couldn't be wrong but the sound quality is not upto the mark. Feels like cheap plastic and average sound quality may be half of Apple Earpods. Time will answer the quality of cables .

title: Good built with Excellent sound
body: Just received this item in semi sealed condition, means item wasn't factory sealed, it's opened earlier though Amazon India's largest online retailer, Appario sold it. Inside the package, it's not apparently disturbed rather.On connectivity, it's blazing fast.Calling quality, Good.Sound quality, better than others of same price bracket.Bass, it's just great.Hardware and cables, better finish, better material, aluminium finish.Charging cable and additional ear pads of 2 extra different sizes provided with 1 year warranty.Recommended for daily use and you can always go for it.

title: Nice sound & battery backup for the price range | Dont expect wonders here | Review after 4 months
body: Boat makes good quality Audio products and this wireless set is no exception. With good quality sound at the optimum price its a nice thing to add to your audio collection.‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢üéÅ INSIDE BOX‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Üí Headset‚Üí Micro USB charging cable‚Üí Manual‚Üí Eartips (2 size set, 1 set is already installed )‚Üí Few leaflets‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚ûï PROS‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢1. Nice audio output which sounds good even at full volumes.2. Bass lovers will like its output. It is heavy.3. Quality is good with IP5X rating which covers dust protection.4. Good ergonomics and doesn't hurt ears much.5. It's lightweight to carry on the neck.6. Magnetic ear tips help secure the loop around the neck.7. Voice assistant support via smartphone.8. Battery backup at 4-5 hours is ok at 110mAH rating. Nothing much can be expected at such a compact form factor.9. Houses several controls like volume, skip tracks, attend calls, activate voice assistant, etc‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚ûñ CONS‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢1. Mic quality is not up to mark.2. Noise cancellation is not up to mark and there is a lot of background noise.‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚úî COMPARISON‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢I already have Nokia BH 505, Sennheiser HD 4.40, & Byte Corseca DM5710 in the wireless category and Sennheiser CX 180, JBL C150si & MI basic earphones. To be honest, wrt sound quality, this Boat one is far behind all of them except MI basic & Byte Corseca where it's equivalent.The reason being, you can't get everything at such a low price point. If you want good quality in-ear wireless experience to be ready to shell out more.Every product category has a minimum price value required for impressive performance. Below that value, compromises need to be made.P.S. Battery backup is not an issue owing to the form factor. It's comparable to BH 505 and ranges around 5-6 hours. It even cant be compared to over the ear HD 4.40 as it has a hefty battery inside.‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢üìÖ CHECK THOROUGHLY WITHIN 10 DAYS WINDOW‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢Initially had connectivity & mic issues, so ordered a replacement that resolved those issues.In the returned product, the mic was not working properly and had sound quality issues while in case of connectivity, it had frequent disconnection issues.So make it a habit to thoroughly check the product within its replacement window of 10 days, and in case of any issue contact Amazon asap instead of complaining later on and providing a low rating.‚ñ∂ Nothing is perfect and that's why they have a return/replacement window to provide the best possible service for online shopping.‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢üèÜ VERDICT‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚ñ∂ For the price point, this earphone is a good buy with nice sound output, heavy bass, and good backup. I have been using it for 4-5 months and so far didn't face any issue.‚ñ∂ If you can increase your budget go for JBL -> Sony -> Senheisser (increasing order of price and sound quality)‚ñ∂ BUT if you are not obsessed with wireless functionality or you can avoid this wireless part, better invest that amount in wired in-ear earphones (over the ear will require further investment) as for the same amount you will get astounding sound quality.

title: honest review boAt rockerz 255 pro üéßüëå
body: boAt Rockerz 255 Pro üéß ‚û°Ô∏è ‚ûï & ‚ûñ‚ûïsupport quick charging ‚ö°üîã(1 hour)üëçlatest bluetooth version 5.0 ‚ôæ üëçmagnetic eartips üß≤üëçlatest qualcomm chipset ‚öôÔ∏èüëçhd sound and super extra bass üîä üëçdual pairing phone üì±+üì±üëçmic is fine üé§üëç‚ûñno play/pause feature with magnetic lock ‚ñ∂Ô∏è/‚è∏ üëéconclusion...which should i buy for myself?you can buy the BoAt Rockerz 255 Pro üéß without any doubt.the boAt Pro bluetooth headset is a total value for money.because boAt Rockerz 255 Pro üéß offers better battery life, decent sound output, fast charging, advanced QCC3003 chipset, new color variants and the latest bluetooth connectivity.boAt Rockers 255 Pro gives us very good features with a little more money than boAt Rockers 255 wireless headphones.

title: The Best Bluetooth earphone under 1k range
body: I purchased this bluetooth earphone for Rs 899 and its worth it.Pros:1. Best Sound Quality2. Best Battery Backup.3. Fast Charge4. Compatible with phone, iphone, laptop and smart TVCons:1. Bluetooth's range is not that good. It supports range upto 6-7m2. Pain in ear due the conical buds(can be removed)3. Wires are a bit long which makes it look odd in front.

title: Fake product
body: Received FAKE product from Amazon,Extremely disappointed, not expected this.. poor bad quality n service, totally unfaithful act.. SELLER NAME - Techfire OfficialI received this product in 7 days which is very delay

title: Excellent Product - Affordable pricing.
body: I bought this from Amazon on Sep 8th 2021. I must say the sound quality is uncompromising and the best part is its battery back up. Trust me I have not charged it even once since the time I purchased it. I admit I have to not used it extensively because I use it mostly for calls and light music hearing maybe an hour or two but the rest of the time it is on standby. Even till now by the time I am writing this review it still has 30% battery.I think someone who uses it a lot can give the best suggestion on battery but for me this is amazing.The noise cancellation is okay not too bad and the mic quality is also good, never till now has anyone said to me that they cant hear me clearly or there is a lot of background noise. I am satisfied with this product and would recommend it to anyone who is reading this.

title: Simply superb!!!
body: This has to be the best neckband BT earphones from Boat,Superb sound output with damn good bass, trebles ,volcals, mid-lows..even though boat has mentioned it has range around 10 mtrs I doubt it works even without any distortions with more distance than that.I own a 255 for more than a year and JBL Endurance peak as well but sound quality this one produces is definitely way better than both of these BTs.This one has improved in both mic quality as well as noice reductions and I didn't face any issues in calling.No latency whatsoever. Cant comment on battery backup as its only the first day.All the controls working as advertised.I got it for 1250 with Amazon pay later's 250 cash back, at this price there is no competititor for this for sure.Lastly thanks Amazon for 1 day delivery and BOAT for this amazing BT.

title: Just telling truth It's on you all to believe it or Not‚ò∫Ô∏è
body: Giving three stars bcuz build quality is not worthy and I regret to buy it rather I would prefer oppo enco m31. If I talk about boat then build quality is just ok it's not build for rough use speakers have unbalanced sound bass is not that much good and mid , lows just get fade away when a high bass comesyou have to work hard boatI've used many earphones and headphones in my life like JBL, Sennheiser, sony, ptron, Skullcandy, oppo, samsung, Apple, Moto and many more but experience with boat among all I really got disappointed by boatAnd for you people who loves boat blindly you have to get a better taste please I'm requesting you all as you trust boat just try other brands too bcuz boat is cheaper but it doesn't get that quality and if you are spending some money for a good earphone just add few bucks more and go get better one

title: Budget buy with a compromise under 1000
body: This is an Average product with decent bass and acceptable noise cancellationPros1.Its was on sale for 800 , so price is definitely leaning towards the buy factor2.Noise cancellation is decent3.charge holds good for about 6 hours for continuous usageCons the product has a qualcomm chip which is supposed to give these headphones the much needed bass and treble however at slightly higher volume its all garbled up.Next, the biggest issue which i saw was the headphone switching on off leaving a hum when no music was playing. This was really annoying as its noise cancellation headphones.If you have the budget the go for the JBL earphones as they are much better.

title: Average
body: So after months I am reviewing this product.. Its good if u want to watch Web series or movie or music.. But sometimes it irrites in ear after an hour.. Build is good.. Design is nice good for gaming too but u need to speak loud while talking... Magnetic feature is very light it not attached itself need to fix them plus it unfix in movement magnet is not good.. N everytime it need to connect to the phone that's very bad feature, no vibration on call another drawback... It took around 1min to connect again so cnt connect it if suddenly someone calls if it was disconnected that time. Overall its average n yeah no on off on magnets connect or disconnect.. Thats very very poor

title: Great connectivity range and sound quality
body: First time Boat user.Liked:Sounds similar or as good as JBL, Sony, Sennhieser, OnePlus buds and Samsung AKGI was skeptical of Boat, but now i like themSturdy buildFast charge, looong battery life. I am a long distance motorcycle tourist, these earbuds play music non-stop for 12-14 hours and i end my day with 80% battery leftVery waterproof. I have used these in a day full of rain and operated with wet hands many timesDisliked:The ear hooks slip out of my ear. I have tried all their sizes.JBL and Boult Audio fit my ears perfectly.Earbuds slide out of my sweaty ears

title: Very nice product with good value for money.
body: It's very nice product in this price segment. It's been delivered today's morning. Battery life is extraordinary. I have been using it continuously and still it's showing 100% battery. Calls experience is very great and voice is very clearly audible to the call receiver. Sound quality is also very good. Bass is also good but it is not so great as my Airdopes 441, hence, little bit disappointed. Build quality and appearance are average. Aptx is not there only AAC and SBC are working. Pairing is so good and new edition is provided with v5.2 bluetooth version. Over all, it's very great product and gives perfect value for money.

title: Good earphones. Good enough. Value for money.
body: Despite looking thin, the wires hold up good against wear and tear. The ear hooks made out of rubber are detachable, hence it is pretty easy to lose them.The battery life is not as great as promised. 8 hours when idle, maybe. Under constant use the battery life will be enough for you to watch two to three movies or approximately 5 hours.The port for charging is covered with a rubber based plug, which is surprisingly durable despite not looking as much.Sound quality is good, Bass is okay. Noise cancellation pretty much the same as most other in-ear models.It is a good buy, value for your money.

title: Worth buying... And I liked it..
body: Worth buying this product if you have a limitted budget of 1.5 KJust to note this earphone comes with bluetooth v 4.1 and CSR 8635 chipset, but there is a confusion with amazon itself... in desc its mentioned 4.1 however in pictures its shown as 4.2.. The seller is selling us version 4.1. Please amazon correct it!! Customers would face the loss in case of any mis communication.Talking about build quality, sound clarity and looksI personally liked it.. Bass is really good no noise while hearing. If you are listening into a good melody songs you would dive into the music. Look wise as depicted in pictures it looks different from the black and red..I use for jogging and excersise and the fit is good.. it won't get dropped off.Battery is ok I am getting around 6 hrs in a one full charge. Battery capacity could have been increased at least to 10 hrs by Boat. But no worries...

title: Boat....A audio brand to be Trusted
body: In previous year 8th may,2020 I have ordered the same earpiece....bt in a year the battery lyf of the earphone degraded.Though I have also used the earphone in a rugged manner.18hrs always on....weared it in rainy season too.Apply sanitizer due to covid when coming to home.But the quality of the audio didnt degraded at all,neither the wire got torn after so bad use.Only the battery lyf degraded.But still in a very less hope,I lodged a complain in boat in 5th may,2021 about the battery lyf.The very nxt day a pickup was arranged via bluedart for checking the earphone issue.They took it....still i was not sure what boat is about to do bcz within 3 days the warranty period is over.Bt a msg came they have replaced my earphn & sending a new one.I was literally shocked about the customer service they has provided me.No cl nd nothing,only a mere mail...nd this much response from their side.They have gained my trust.Only when i bought it I used to recommnd boat to all of my known ones & to my surprise my office coordinates,family member now owns a audio gadget of boat.I myself has given business of approx 50 items to boat alone in a single year only by recommnding....üòÖ...nd i will continue.Also a request to boat,that we know itz an Indian brand,by also plz try to produce the earphn in India lyk mivi,if possible.I knw their may be some facts,bt itz still a request.

title: I'm a BoAtHead ‚ù§Ô∏è from Now On!
body: Super Bass is like "Baby Ko Base Pasand Hai". Good sound quality. Noice cancellation is Okay. Fits perfectly with in-ear buds and ear lock holds firm while sports activities. You can remove those ear lock silicon holders if not running or sports activities. It's optional, it depends upon one's usage For a cool nifty tip use a paper clip to hold the plug wires firmly togather while excercises like pushups, crunches. It is likely to fall off your neck if you do these exercises. I hope in next version of this ear heads the company will notice it for it's boAtHeads fans. View my uploaded pics for details.

title: Good Quality Sound but observed other problems
body: Boat rockerz BT headphone.1. Product quality is decent. Sound quality is good. Works perfectly as an in-ear headphone, as you won't hear much outside noise or even outside sounds once you're plugged in.2. You will hear audio assists when you switch it on, pair it to Bluetooth, switch off etc. That is a good feature.3. Placement of the earpiece is problematic. I found it difficult to place it initially, but I figured it out later. Now, after 3-4 days of use, my ear hurts because I have been placing them in ear. So that's a bad thing.4. I noticed that the headset attracts a lot of dust when used. So on the black headset, you can see dust particles sticking on.

title: JUST BUY IT!!
body: This is the first product ever where I have given a full 5 star rating. To start with, I read a lot of pro's & con's for this product & understand that most people rate products more as per their expectations than actually the quality of the product. This product covers all areas, i.e. Looks, Performance & Sound Quality. I know 4 hours of battery life (listening to music) on full charging lowers people's expectations but it's still worth the quality of sound this product delivers. If you are a EDM fan, then this product gives you a live discotheque feeling around. I am completely satisfied purchasing this product & I can suggest anyone buying this product 100%. JUST BUY IT Specially when there is a PRIME USER Discount Sale On!!!!

title: Simply good,  definitely you can go for it........
body: Good at this price range,Sound quality is good,Build quality is also good,Fast charging feature makes it more worth (20minutes charge = 4 hours backup) ,Very light weight, it doesn't let you feel that you wear something on your neck.It's range is 10m. which is also good.Specially made for base lovers.Cons:-It  irritates when you listening music on full volume, sound doesn't get distorted but it irritates on full volume,so it will be better if you keep its volume below  80%.Battery backup could be better but it's fast charging feature minimizes this con.Definitely you can go for it.......

title: Defective
body: Appario Retail (aka amazon warehouse) Cheats people again. The item came with left earpiece having sound problems out of the box. Sound would keep going in and out in left earbud. However the most ridiculous thing is that the set stopped charging or turning on after only one day of use. I have never seen such bad quality and I am sure it is because Apparico is selling defective products as always. This seller should be raided and banned permanently. Already flouting laves and then cheating customers too

title: Best Bluetooth earphones
body: I brougth this product based on reviews and now i am not regreting.i got it delivered on next day as i live in same city as of seller.sound quality is very goodits a little heavy than wired earphones but still they are very much comfortable.(I WEAR THEM WHOLE DAY)i get used to it  within 30 min and battery life is also very good.if u have budget of maximum 2000 rupees even then they are the best earphonesonly i prob i faced is of rangewhen connected to my phone(which is really old now, its micromax canvas) the voice cracks when i go upstairs but no such prob when connected to laptopone more prob is that this is made in china but still quality is very good

title: Must buy product
body: Fantastic bluetooth Earphones so far. Battery bakcup is just bad**süëåüèªüëåüèª. You can use 30 hour continuously at 50% volume or below. And stand by mode has long lasting battery backup. Sound & bass quality is also nice. But not like boat 225 wired model. Model 225 has some another level of sound quality. But though you can use this while long traveling, or doing some work. One drawback is after connecting when you receive a call while you laying down, another person cannot hear your voice. Rest things are good.

title: Review after a month of usage
body: The best part about these is the battery backup. I am a heavy user, and these easily last me almost 3 days with an average of 10 hrs usage every day at medium volume.Works perfectly with android and apple devices. I use this with a MacBook for taking zoom calls and never experienced any problem and the other person never complained as well, so the audio is also good.The sound quality is not the best. You might find some other brands to have better sound quality, but you can still live with it.My main reason for buying these was the highest battery backup and they don't disappoint.There used to be a slight hissing sound in the beginning when these were new, but I don't notice it anymore. Maybe I got used to it or the headphones are burned in by now.Good choice for taking calls and long battery backup.

title: Good but not great
body: writing this review after a month's sporadic use. I bought the ear phones mainly coz I had to take my evening walks on my terrace due to covid and hence, i wanted wireless earphones tht work while moving within a given radius which is far less than the stipulated 10m distance. on tht count, I found the earphones disappointing. When u r on the move, the sound quality suffers even if u were kind of close to ur phone. Not totally bad but I wouldn't recommend it. Otherwise when idle and sitting at one place, sound quality is quite good. Battery n other functionalities work just fine. Fits well.

title: Terrible headsets
body: I bought one recently and below was my experience :1) the wireless range is very low.2) battery life isn't good either.3) boat is known for it's bass, but this one's bass was terribly unpleasant.Final verdict : Don't buy it. Better go for Mi sports basic headsets that 's much better and has a balanced sound. Or if you have a good budget, go with the Jays t-Four or RHA, they are just WOW!!

title: Honest review after using for a month
body: I have been using this for more than a month now, especially bought for my work from home operation for many calls and meetings but that's where it's a big mistake I have done by purchasing this. This is too worst at noise cancellation. Examples : teammates told many times about too much disturbance from fan sound, even to worst they enquired whether I'm bringing up any CROW as a pet(crownsound is way too far at outside) and it is not showing correct battery level. It showed 80% and trusting this I went to meeting but it got disconnected due to no power. When it comes to music listening, that's in a exact opposite. Perfect bass and clarity even with less volume level also easy to fit and good ergonomics.Pros :1) Sound clarity2) Bass effect3) Easy to connect and well fit4) Design and look wise goodCons :1) Worst at noise cancellation2) Battery percentage not showing correctly3) Too long time to hold for on/off

title: Used them for 2 years. Decent for price. Highly durable, Average Sound.
body: I am writing this review after using these earphones for 2 years.-Sound quality is decent looking at the price-Noise cancellation is average, Ofcourse you won‚Äôt get active noise cancelling earphones at this price point.-They are really durable, I have used them daily for 2 years for Gym and during commute to my college. Earphones got little wet on several occasions and still worked absolutely  fine.-Battery life is also really good. I had to charge them once in 2-3 days because i used them a lot on daily basis. If you dont use them a lot on daily, I would say they will easily last you for 3-4 days or maybe more.-Overall I would say ‚ÄúPaisa Wasool‚Äù, The left earphone has stopped working after 2 years but I am satisfied with the product as I really put it through some serious usage.

title: Good and Bad
body: Sound good but build quality poor.I have been using this product for more than 1 year continuously for both phonecalls and movies.Sound quality bis very good. But issue is, it's build quality is very poorBoth the left and right ear dongles have got loosened. I have to use devi quick to join them. But still they come off and the wires dangle out precariously.Due to this sound in one of the ear pod has reduced drastically. Now I am thinking of buiying a new one but not boat rockers as I feel they are charging premium for a ordinary product.

title: The notification noise is damn annoying
body: The "you've plugged into nirvana" everytime you put it on gets progressively annoying but the every 2 minutes notification of "oops battery low" for 5 straight times makes me levitate with anger. The battery life is mediocre at best and most definitely doesn't last for 8 hrs. Instead of charging it, I sometimes leave it for 2 days after the battery has died just so I don't have to hear those god awful notifications. Going back to OnePlus bullet Z for wireless earphones. Boats wired earphones are pretty good though, that's why I got this. The reviews looked good, big mistake.

title: Great value for money product
body: I bought this product to replace my wired headphones which was preventing me from getting up during work from home. This perfectly serves my purpose. I now walk around and stretch while attending meetings.Pairing is fast with both Laptop and Mobile.Now the best part of this product is the battery backup. I get a whole week (5 days meetings and music) of usage on a single charge.  The ones I had used before hardly gave me 8 -10 hrsSound quality is very good for the price you pay and so is the mic. Its too early to mention anything about long term reliability. I hope it lives up to that.

title: IP 6 headphone having fast charging.
body: By using for a month here detail review:1: Sound quality good but not as Boss or other premium brand. As you add sugar the sweetness increase.2: Battery life for continuous call about 4 hour,for music 5 hour. Stand by time 1 day to 3 days. If you are using extremely than its depend upon appliances use.3: Range of device is about 15 meters after that it get disconnected.4: The good things is it's fast charging features by which it charged upto 40 min to full.

title: Worst product false publicity
body: Guys, don't at all buy this. I was actually looking for 0 or -1 rating star otherwise I could have selected it. The product quality is pathetic and the sound quality is worst than the Nokia wired headsets we used to get in olden days which are far better. All these brands just engaging the celebrities to see their worst quality products and as you know all no celebrity use these kind of cheap product and they are just for publicity promoting the product. Instead of wasting money on big big celebrities and they should put that in manufacturing good quality which is enough for customers to buy.  Trust me on this guys, I am a good researcher on the headsets and used lot of them so i can easily identify the quality and sound of the product. Don't waste money on this as there is no return refund available on this product if you already ordered it.

title: Worst for #WorkFromHome
body: Pros:Best neckband under 1kSound quality and Noise cancellation is 10/10Bass quality 9/10Metallic finishCons:Comfort 0/10We can't use for Webinar or any online meetings bcoz it gives distorted sound and whenever there is a little net fluctuations will face even worst situation..We can't use it for more than 1hr..we will be facing health issues.. headache and pain in ear due to weight of earbuds..it's metallic but it's not preferred for even a normal use..we will be dwarf within 3 month..don't buy it..if you still want to take risk..your welcome..

title: Boat Rockerz - Top Notch
body: I bought Boat Rockerz 255 sportz neckband in August 2020. This is an excellent neck band. I am a bass lover. This has remarkable bass and no words to explain more. And boat's customer service is also equivalently excellent. One side speaker on my neckband stopped working a month back. As it's still under warranty period, I submitted a complaint on this in boat's website and requested for a home pickup. They did so and within 5 days from the pickup date they delivered me a new neckband with the same colour. I never expected. Hats off to the product, boat's customer service and Amazon for partnering with such an amazing company. More than happy with the experience.I generally don't write reviews, but this experience made me to write. Hope this would help someone.

title: Battery issue üò§
body: The bass and sound clearity is just awesome..very comfortable...call quality is also awesome...but the battery seems not ok.I got the product delivered yesterday after unboxing the product I noticed that the battery was 100% I have continuously used it for like 2-3 hours and the battery % came down to 80% again I have used it for like 2hours and the battery was still 80%.Day 2,In the morning I used it again for like 30 minutes suprisingly the battery was still 80% I was just amazed.Later I dint use it till the evening.Later on at 7 I used it continuously till 9 pm and yes the battery was still 80%.Here the real problem occurs after the my dinner I was relaxing in the balcony and was on a phone call suddenly I started getting beep sounds from my new boat 255 earphones and the I checked the battery% it was 20% I was like whaaattttt!! seriously!! Like 5mins before it was still 80% and out of nowhere suddenly it went down to 20% this really pissed me off and within 30 seconds battery down totally dead...horrible.I'll check it again tomorrow if I still the same problem persist I'll have to replace the item between the build quality, sound, call quality is really good.That's all for now amigos.

title: Never buy this Earphone from Amazon
body: I have used boat Rockers earphone since 1-2 yrs but i have always experience that  whenever i buy it from Amazon its a defected pieces or a duplicate one as it doesn't works properly for a long time. I buyed this earphone on 6 th may 2021 and it isn't properly working today . It didn't worked properly for even a month just wasted my money. The earphone disconnects automatically even if i haven't disconnect it . While watching and video some the words in a video are cut . First i thought the video must be like but when i disconnected the video and listen the video again i was able to hear everything.

title: Not worthable for 1250 rs, average product, worst looking, very long earphones
body: After10 days of usage I am  reviewing this1) charging and battery backup awesome if u charge 30 mini can use continuesly 2 days charge and backup 5/52) sound quality , I didn't find any difference between boat and others average quality of music and sound 2.5/53) looking is very worst wire qaulity not. Good, very very. Long earphones , uncomfortable to carry , button system for on/off is also. Average. 3/54) while keeping in the ear after some time itching sensation comming 2/55) price 1250 rs , not worthable  don't buy if this much cost 1/56) while buying there is replacement option, once product delivered there is no replacement option only it's showing return option ,if u ask them for replacement for any defect waht they told no stock available pls return if u don't want, for Amazon service 1/5Overall review 2/5

title: The humongous battery
body: As said the battery backup is humongous. 40 hours backup really works great. I received the product on 26th September. I did not charge it. The battery was 100%. I used it for 6-7 hours daily for music l, calls, video calls, youtube watch, movie watch(volume 60% approx). it lasted 4 days, on 30th September. Charging took about an hour wich 33watt charger.As I am a JBL lover so soundwise I am not impressed. Above 60% it's screeching sound. I don't observe any bass only treble. Those who haven't experienced anything like JBL, Senheiser, Skull Candy won't find any difference. For them the sound is awesome. The mic is near mouth making it easy to talk on calls just through whispering (good for love birds). You won't be able to listen anything around you while listening to it on more than 45% volume.Call wise it was fantastic. Voice cancellation works fantastic even in outdoors. Voice clarity is awesome.It is not easy to break or delicate. You can use it rough.Type C charging gives it an edge as most of the phones now comes with type c charger. The charging cable comes with a bit longer than usual lenght(as given with earphones).

title: Battery Life is Great, Vocals could be better
body: I bought them in December 2021(Boat rockerz 255 pro plus). Got them for 1069INR. So i think they are worth the money but for 1499 i doubt it.Still you get these though-40hrs of battery life-i only charged them every 10 days and only for 10min-sound: bass is loud but the 500rs boat wired are much louder than these-vocals:i felt like they prioritize bass over vocals so expect low vocals for calm music-magnets are superweak-dual connectivity is there-light weightI don't know what else you want to read.Go for it if you can manage to get them for less than 1300(boat rockerz 255 pro+)I hope this helps.(As of December 2021)

title: Value for money ,battery boss
body: Purpose : had taken it for cycling purpose and office teams call purposePros1) battery backup is insane,like have used mi earbuds before ,no comparison,u just have to charge once n forget the charging cable.and belive me ,thus is so stress free for any device which doesn't require continuous battery monitoring.2) just ok sound clarify ,(like bass n other stuffs)No so good things1) comfort : just ok ok, meaning I regularly use mi dual driver earphone ,so comparing with that, I didn't feel this not so great ,in fact my main usecase was to wear while cycling(4 hrs continuous),after 3 hrs ,it feels uncomfortable .but not so serious ,just not the best .for 30min to 1 hr no problem.2)music quality: I am not a music expert do give much details,but I felt old earphones( mi dual drivers) were better than this .And obviously it doesn't give any dope feeling ,just ok ok.Neutral1)call clarity2) mic (Audio in call for the receiver person),Have used for teams call ,it was fine.3)Overall build and usability,wires,ear rubbers.This allows to pair two devices at a time ,that is u can pair mobile n laptop at same time ,but it will take either mobile r laptop output at a time, sometimes it will be in mobile n u have to force it to connect to laptop ,so I felt for teams calls normal earphones is better.

title: Super awesome üòé
body: Posting a review after 8 months of daily usage ‚ò∫Ô∏èGood sound clarity, awesome looks, fits snugly in my ears without causing any discomfort. Charges quickly. Came well packed and with extra ear muffs. I‚Äôm still using the original ear muffs the earphones came with though, coz they‚Äôre still in perfect condition üòä Taking calls on this is a breeze. Perfect for workouts too!

title: Rocking even after a year. Go for it.
body: So I am writing this after a year. The set is still working as newThe headphones are excellent for listening, but don't make a good calling device. The person at opposite end will hear a lot of ambient noise, even the slightest movement  at your end will become annoying for him.Basically it will pick up niose even if you turn your neck or the headphone brushes with your collar.Would have loved it if the voice within was that of an Indian. This western sounding male is very irritating to hear.

title: Sounds Good, Boat should not have put the annoying voiceovers instead of signal beeps
body: The sound quality is good, there are plenty of other reviews to attest to that, but for some reason boat decided to put a heavily pretentious white guy voice gimmick over every thing - power on, you're now connected. But the most annoying is the dumb voice repeated every time you hit maximum volume, do we really need "Maximum Volume" to be repeated loudly each time you hit that? Literally every other high-end brand uses a beep to signal the indicator - learn from them.

I would rate it 3 just for it's battery.

title: Just Awesome !
body: Battery Life. Oh god they go for atleast a week! This is much of battery not even offered by top brand.Music quality. Man the bass is good idk most people care for it.
