title: Earbuds are giving chirrr chirrr magnetic sounds while pressing them in ears.
body: Ear buds Is making a sound chirrr chirr while pushing them in ears. Looks like buds quality issue, buds are not very good but fit to ears properly. Battery life is awesome, using from one week 2-3 hours a day but still it is having 60% battery.Overall earphones are awesome but I'm irritated with this chirrrr chirrrr magnetic sound in earbuds while pressing them in ears.

title: Affordable and reliable.
body: I have been using the product for the last few months and I am surprised by its battery life. It can be used for 6+ hours continuously on a single charge. The connection is smooth and the mic works great. I bought it for calling purposes so I am happy with the product but since I have used JBL and BOSE in the past so the quality of sound and bass is slightly low. However, for the price which I got, it was a steal.

title: Honest review, after using some time
body: I brought this earphones and now I'm writing the review with experience using it (I'm a light user not a heavy user).Battery backup lasts Max 3 hrs üò≠ since the time I bought, the microphone is very very bad, you might sound very low or like talking from a long distance üòì.I brought this on Jan 2020. This was billed for 1399 that time.Product quality is acceptable, but the price will be too much when comparing the battery backup, microphone quality and the bigger size button/cable.

title: Value for Money
body: 1st product I used in Bluetooth Segment for 1.5yrs...And more than Happy.Pros :-1) Good Battery Backup - About 12-15Hrs.2) Nice Sound Quality3) Easy to access - Call receiving, cut call, pause, play, next, backCons:-1) No active noise cancellation2) Poor Range of Bluetooth - atleast not as mentioned3) No incoming call vibration alert / siri/google supportOverall good product...Go for it

title: Boat Rockerz 255 user review
body: Over all good product. At discounted price it was value for money.Some -ve are,1) The bud quality need improvement. They are hard & prolonged use is irritating.2) Before buying I checked some reviews. My requirement was to use it for two mobiles & some reviews confirmed it but actually it is not the case. Manufacturer must have specified in description. You can synchronised may be with multiple devices but can operate only on one device at a time. I was really disappointed. I have Chkokko device working fine for more than 2 years now with two mobiles connected simultaneously.

title: DON'T BUY THESE, GET SOMETHING ACTUALLY WORTH YOUR MONEY LIKE THE ONEPLUS
body: The product is just like "doable" that is it, the neck band is very uncomfortable and keeps on moving around pulling the earphone, the earphone bud material is not so good and the earphones overall start painting after like 20-30 mins of usage. Before these I was using the one plus wireless earphones and they were better on everyway. Please save up your money and go for them. Also the magnetic feature in this is very useless, the earphone doesn't shut down when the magnets are connected and the pulling power is like next to nill, also the audio is not so rich and you can feel the audio quality is like those of the 300 rs wired earphones.DON'T GO FOR IT I WILL SAY.

title: Decent
body: Honestly speaking I have been using boat rockers 255 for last 2 years it was very good in terms of loud music,high bass and treble... But now I have switched to boat rockers 255 pro 1st it doesn't supports much to Dolby Atmos as it is not up to the mark and it has very decent sound and bass is not as 255 this time it has been reduced but has voice/music clearity and the material is very smooth overall it is good I hope boats give still more bass and loudness.

title: One of the best
body: It was delivered well before time.Product was in good shape.Best feature is its noise cancellation and how perfectly it fits in your ears.Pros -Very powerful bass.Very good Noise cancellation.Fits perfectly in ears.Battery backup is very good.Has voice command feature using which you can search change song or play specific song without touching your phone.Desing is very comfortable and sit comfortably around the neck.Light weight, you won't even feel if its around your neck or not.Cons -My last earphones were Sennheiser, and Sennheiser got the best voice clarity.These are good in terms of bass but in term of voice clarity they don't stand against Sennheiser.Over and all very good product. Quite satisfied with product at this price range. Bass is very powerful.

title: 100% honest review, these are just average.
body: I researched a lot basis reviews and finall brought them at rs 1000 in republic day sale.Coming straight to review, drop a like if it helps.Cons-------1) biggest con is huss sound or buzz sound at low volume. It is so annoying. I am quite surprised why reviewers have not said anything about this.If you want to listen to songs or calls at low volume. This is not the best, ready to get bothered by consistent hissing sound.2)if you like to run or jog while listening to songs, this one is definitely not for you, since the movement of band will cause lot of noise disturbance while running and will annoy you. Its ok if you want to just sit and listen.3)I don't find the fitting very comfortable, it seem claustrophobic to be. Ears started to pain after 30 minutes or so. Boat needs to work on design of earpiece to make it more comfortable.4)sound quality is not as Supreme as marketed in reviews etc. The lows are very poor. Bass comes to effect after mid ranges. Overall not a very soothing experience in terms of listening.Pros------Build quality is good.Wires look string and premium and buttons looks of good quality plastic.2)bluetooth range is good, no issues encountered while moving from one room to another.3)there is a battery symbol displayed on phone, so you get to know the charge level.Overall summary For me the first con of huss and buzz sound is enough to not recommend you to go for it, I have not tried any other bluetooth headset so can't say which one is best.GO ahead for if you can bear with the same and only listen to music at very high volume.

title: just in 3 months this product got failed and unable to connect to bluetooth
body: WORST , PLEASE DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT, I HAVE BOUGHT TWO HEADPHONES FOR MY FAMILY, AFTER 2 months both started auto disconnected by themselves. Heck of issues in connecting them again. Don‚Äôt buy boAt , waste of money and time . looks like cheap ICs might have been used for cost cut but overall I have lost my money, I do have my invoices with me , will go legal on these sellers and company.

title: Reasonable earphones for the price- but have a short life span seemingly..
body: Wrote a much longer review but the page reset so I am not re-typing- The bass was good (bass lovers might enjoy it..) but a bit too high/heavy for my liking and so it tends to drown out/reduce the clarity of other instruments and the vocals at times too. Similar to the MDR and XB Sony ranges as far as the bass and overall output goes. The battery life is decent at about 6 hours listening at 70-80% + of the max volume. The wireless range was also decent and can be put at approximately 15 feet max - but with say two walls in between (so it might be a little more minus the walls..). The magnetic lock seems to work just fine, have not really tested the microphone much- the widened neckband is great and gives the earphones stability on the neck. My main issue came down to the life span of the product- I thought the build quality and durability was above average but then this happened- Bought this a few months ago but I left it pretty much sealed and untouched in its box (I continued to use my Apple and Skullcandy wired earphones-the sound quality on the Apple pods is still brilliant so I still use the wired ones over wireless earphones whenever possible/not too inconvenient) - so I only started to use the Boat earphones a month or two ago and well- the left earpiece is already malfunctioning and had almost stopped outputting any audible sound on a few occasions now. I did tend to use the earphones at 80% plus of the max volume but if that is the cause for failure then the earphones obviously are not engineered as well as claimed. Now the volume of the left earpiece is softer and less clear than the right- and has faded away completely on occasions that I have tried to listen to music for a stretch of about 4 hours on 80% volume or such- I am just trying to keep the volume low at the moment so that the earpiece does not stop emitting sound completely again- will have no choice but to get in touch with their customer service if the issue persists and see what they say- but the only conclusion I can draw from my experience thus far is that these earphones lack even say Skullcandy's durability which at least use to last almost a year even when used for long stretches of time at about 80-90% of the upper volume limit for music etc.

title: Very Very Disappointed for music stuck
body: I was trying to use this Boat 255 pro plus with my Redmi note 10 pro but very sorry to say while playing music or playing any video it had been observed after 25 /28 secs every time music became soundless i.e, stucked for 1 to 3 secs and that was clueless to me.But after one exchange similar problem arises.And It is very disappointment.And also I was selecting AAC or Aptax or LDAC in blue tooth codec, but automatically it had turned into SBC. I did not understand whether is is a issue of mobile or neckband.But it is sure that for music stuck 100% neckband is responsible.And it is not expected from BOAT like company

title: Decent but...
body: Honestly First bummer was packaging.It looks like it was already opened.The package got little torn.. tape looks off the place. Also, earphones inside also didn't looked like fresh packaging. It really looks like It was used before.but I could be wrong and it could be just bad packaging also.sound is good though , average loud, but not very good. Range is good i can easily use it while moving in my house. You will always feel some disturbance while playing.Also, I tried connecting with multiple devices but it can not be done while it's connected to other device. First, you gotta disconnect it then it can be connected.

title: Boat rockerz 255 pro üëçüëç

Quality of the product is good looks like premium qualityConnectivity is very good u can pair easily with two devices this one gives voice assistant for power off/on and pairing its very helpfull to use.Comfort to wear no pain even if u use for long times less weight and flexible to useIts wont slip from ear.Last thing battery life is decent u will get more than 6hrs under moderate usage and its support fast charging 5V-2A

title: Better product if you are looking something just wireless
body: I bought it for my father and uncle. They dont go after sound quality and bass so it was good fit for them.Pros:1. Long lasting battery life.2.budget friendly.3. Light weight.Cons:1. bass is not upto mark2. Magnet is not that strong ( i personlly uses one plus bullet z it has very weak magnetic hold but this model has even worse)‚óèI would recommend this who is looking for calling purpose specifically drivers, delivery guy cause it has long lasting battery life upto 3 days almost. And has decent sound quality (not cheap but I would give it 3.5 stars for sound.)‚óèDont buy if you are looking for better sound quality and bass.

title: Audio sync issue
body: Cons:1. Audio sync issue in online videos after being interrupted with a call. You need to disconnect and connect again for getting proper sync.2. Noise cancellation in call is not upto the mark, people at other end hearing all sounds.3. My Mobile battery is draining fast after I start using this. Did not face this issue with other BT headsets.Pros:1. Audio quality is good.2. Fast charging really works. 10min charge giving nearly 3 hrs continious playback.3. Can pair and connect to multiple devices simultaneously. This really helps to those who watches videos on PC and attend calls from phone.

title: Red is what attracted me in the first place!!! Y
body: Yes. The color Red is what attracted me in the first place. I find it intriguing to see this color on this head set.Being one of the big fans of boAt, I always though to have an attentive earphones and finally I found one. The sound quality is splendid and when you plug in, you attain true Nirvana!!. The bass is awesome and when you listen to high beat songs, you will definitely notice that. The band grip, the ear plugs and the hooks that help in retaining the ear plugs, everything was fine.However, I find that the bluetooth connectivity getting diminished day-by-day. At first the connectivity used to retain more than 10 mts. But after using it for some 2-3 weeks, it becomes weak. The hooks wouldn't stick around.All in all, I find it by far the best product in this price range.

title: Best Bass Earphone with Long Durablity
body: Using the earphone from more than 2+ yrs ( its one lasted which I have used extensively over other brands JBL, Sony etc.)I am upgrading now to Pro+Pros:Best Bass ( No brand can stand near to it)Loud Volume overall competitionLogn Battery LifeSolid BuiltCons:Can sometimes irritate in the ear after longtime useIts looks and use material can be improved more aesthetic and ergonics

title: Honest Review after 2 years of usage!
body: Purchased boAt Rockerz 255 in October 2019. Within 5 months of usage, the right ear piece started putting out lower volume than the left ear piece. Thankfully it was still in warranty so got it exchanged in June of 2020. Today is 23 July 2021 and the new replacement also is having the same issue. The right earpiece output volume is very low, exact same problem as the last one. The unbalanced volume causes irritation especially when watching movies or listening to music.This is actually a very common complaint with boAt Rockerz 255 and their other wireless products. If you google it, you will find 1000's of people like me who have just blown Rs1000/- for a product that doesn't even last a year properly. The annoying thing is I cannot even get my money back or exchange these.Pros:1. Fits in-ear properly2. Good bass and volume.3. Decent range. More than 10 Meters in line of sight. Catches my Bluetooth signal from my phone even when in the other room.4. Decent design with attractive colours.Cons:1. Completely unreliable product and boAt Rockerz 255 hasn't even made an effort to correct their mistakes. I am now left with Rs1000/- junk which is hardly one year old.2. Microphone is extremely sensitive. Caller hears all the background noise to a point I have had to disconnect the headset just to save some headache for the caller. There are times where I had to turn off the fan because the air from the fan was creating enough noise to irritate the caller.3. Battery  Low warning to unit completely shutting down is way too less. It gives hardly 5 min warning before shutting down.4. Battery doesn't last more than 5 hrs at full volume. Might last the promised 8hr but that would be at 50% volume.5. The charger port cover is flimsy that it breaks in the first couple of months. Happend to both the headsets.Overall, I suggest you avoid this product till boAt Rockerz rectifies the issues, recalls all the faulty headsets and either replaces them or repairs them. This product reminds me of the cheap Chinese junk.

title: Don't buy if you listen good music for longer time
body: I bought this product after using one plus wireless z bass edition for a brief period of time.Coming to the boat rockers 255 pro plus:1) Battery life 10/10 The beat thing about this earphone.Charging speed and battery performance is at par with claims.2) Not very comfortable.The built is unsatisfactory, sharp edges and heavy weight. Your ears start paining after some time of usage.3) Sound 6.5/10 - Not very satisfactory for music lovers4) Cannot be used for exercise purpose, it keeps jumping on your neck because of band stiffness.5) Mic quality is decent6)Connectivity is good7) Buy only if your usage is moderate and you want your batyery to last long.

title: Misleading details. No aptx
body: It said that there is aptx, but only got aac, whereas on my other earphones, got aptx hd. It doesn't have aptx guys, the product details are misleading. Hence returned the product

title: Average product
body: This product is average in sound and built quality. 3.5/5.It comes up with good boat packaging and additional set of earbuds rubber in different sizes similar to other products. However 'Rockerz' branding is missing which is not big deal.Previously i have used sony, nokia, skullcandyand  JBL bluetooth headphones, so its difficult for me to lower down with boat. If you want to listen music then its good option. Little Bass is present.Controller buttons plastic plate length is little extra compare to other headphones. LED indicator is tiny and not continously available. Additional rubber curve above earbuds are good for little additional grip.Considering lower price in segment, this product is okay. If budget is your priority or if its your first try with Bluetooth then blindly go for this. It will not put you down.Cheers, Ashutosh

title: Stopped working
body: Barely not even a month old, it stopped working, unfortunately just exceeded some days of amazonsnretirn policy.it just suddenly after charging even an hou, says battery low, the red display light (which is usually on while charging) stays lit continously now.Do not buy

title: One of the best products i have bought
body: Second ReviewBluetooth connectivity with Windows 10 is getting really bad! Most of the time connection fails and becomes a headache to connect. I tried with 2 laptops and same issue persists. Slightly disappointed. Rest all (Battery backup and voice) is working smoothly as exepected.First ReviewFor this price, its worth it.I use it for my laptop zoom calls mostly. Stays for max of one day if u are in meetings for a total of 5-6 hours. Dual connectivity is ok-ish.Overall- You can go for it. Worth the money

title: Bad product and bad customer support
body: It has been 3 months that I have bought this product, it was working fine and suddenly just stopped working..as per the warranty mentioned on Amazon, it was showing one year warranty...I had called customer care and they had told me they will get back to me the next day but there was no help.....infact it was an Amazon choice recommended product....I called the customer care and Naresh who was attending my call told me that Amazon won't be able to help.....such a bad experience... would not recommend to buy this product....I thought Amazon values are linked with Customer first....but looking at the way they deal would not recommend others to buy the Boat headphones..... Overall a bad experience....

title: Simply Awsome
body: I am not sure on people commenting no deep bass...but it works perfectly with my Samsung Galaxy A50 and Sony Xperia XA Ultra....tried on stock music app (brand provided)  and third party music app its just awsome bass...high and low nodes are too perfect...got at 899 in offer...build quality is also good...and button placement makes easy to use...all control on the buttons...

title: Review after a year; not worth it
body: Pros: Decent sound qualityEarbuds don‚Äôt keep falling outBand stays around neckEasy to use buttonsCons: Terrible Bluetooth connectivity. Range is less than 2 feet. It disconnects even if the phone is in my pocket and I‚Äôm wearing the earphones.Bluetooth is buggy and will constantly disconnectTalking handsfree is a hassle. Bluetooth handover is not smoothPoor bassAt loud volumes, the sound is distorted.I‚Äôve used these earphones for a year now and it‚Äôs honestly not worth it. For the same price range there are other earphones that are way better. The sound and bass issues are less of a problem than Bluetooth connectivity. They‚Äôre  wireless earphones. Without Bluetooth connectivity it‚Äôs useless. Looks like they tried to cut corners in the wrong areas.

title: Boatrockers 255 vs JBL T110BT
body: I have this and boat rockers 255, so i m giving a comparison here. Believe me guys this is not at all compared with the boat one. The bass is excellent in boat, where as this does not have at all. I saw the rating and bought it, but please don't get fooled by the name JBL. The sound quality in this is same as a roadside 50 rupees earphone. I paid 800 more for this than the boat, but repented. Only pro in this is the earpieces are lightweight compared to boat one, whereas the holders in boat gives a nice support to hold the ear pieces. Rest any feature you compare the boat exceeds at par.

title: Good earphone
body: Build quality is good, wire could quality could have even better.Magnetic attachment could have functionality.Sound quality and Range also good,Faster connectivity and good battery backup.Dual paring is excellent, stay connected both phone and laptop at the same time that is what I wanted feature.Update:After using for a few weeks, I found the audio quality is not good and clear compared to cheaper quality earphone.

title: Battery life No comments
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Packaging quality good and product best for under 1000 Rs and battery life.30 hours to hogye abhi tak use karte but abhi tak 60 % hi use hui.Mai bta du ki maine sirf Bgmi game khel la or song sune hai itne time me.Overall battery life aap samaj sakte ho kitni achi hai.Sound quality ki baat kre jyada better hai.But ek problem aayi thi live stream krte time game sound low hojata hai mic on hote hi pta nahi esa kyu ho rha jiski waja se stream sahi se nahi ho pati but stream video mai audio suno to sahi aati hai.Thanks boat ‚õµ Rockers

title: Best headphones under 2k
body: Before stating it's pros and cons, I would like to say that I've used Sennheiser Cx180 before this which just broke down after satisfactory use of more than 2 yrs. So I'll be comparing sound quality of this with that.*Pros*‚Üí Lightweight‚Üí Superb sound quality‚Üí Attractive & durable design‚Üí Good Battery life‚Üí Google assistant/Siri‚Üí Tangle free wire with magnetic heads‚Üí Sweat proof*Cons*‚Üí Though Bass is awesome, you can find a bit compromise in mids & high, but you won't be able to notice this unless you compare it with some high end headphones.‚Üí Slight pain in ear if you wear it for long.*Overall verdict*9/10Just go for it if you want Bluetooth headphones for ‚Çπ1.5k, you are not getting any better than this.[ EDIT:After using about 7 months one side of earphone stopped working. So I raised a ticket for warranty and also they were able to pickup my product, but unfortunately due to corona they could not replace it as their service centers were closed. I've sent them almost 7-8 mails which were not replied and many calls which were not answered and if somehow they answered 1-2 calls they didn't solved my problem. Now it has already been 3 months and everything is normal after lockdown still my headphones are stuck with them. Finally I have lost hope from this useless company and their incompetent service and I am looking for some genuine brands this time.]

title: Great earphones, but with a few CONS.
body: To the point,PROS:1. The sound quality is good.  The bass is sometimes too much, clarity is compromised. But most of the times, it does pretty good job.2. Pairing and range is superb. Upto 5 meters even 6 it does not cut if no obstacles. Comes handy in gym where i move away from the phone.3. Ansering calls/speaking is very convenient, and because of the band the mouth piece is at the right position for calls.CONS:1. The band is a nuisance in gym when you're running, doing pushups etc, it keeps falling away. Cannot secure it tightly during workouts. Wearing on the head is temporarily okay.2. The fitting of the ear piece is not correct. With the same sized ear tips my other earphones fit very snugly. This one keeps falling off my ears.3. Although the sound quality is good, the clarity is not great if you're concerned about crisp music. The sound is loud and bass is good, but the clarity of music is average.Finally, for this price, This is the best on Amazon.

title: boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Bluetooth Wireless Earphone review by ViP
body: I had bought this earphone for my brother for his office use. Below are experiences:1> The noise cancellation is quite good.2> the voice quality is also great. I can hear people well and they can hear me well.3> The band is light weight and do not feel like a weight on my neck.4> Good to hear songs while running. The sweat do not affect the band.5> The talk time is superb and covers my office time. With one full charge it can go for 10-12 hours.All I can say is I am happy with the product and I recommend you to buy this product if need be without any doubt.

title: Must buy
body: Hi All,Got this earphones delivered in next day itself once I ordered. The packing was good and the colur of the earphone is the same as shown in the image. Main thing the sound system is awesome and there is a new feature whenever we get a call it says that there is in coming call coming so if in case u r driving u can know when call comes. It has 1year warranty and usb for charging and whenever u charge u can see the red light on. Overall very good bluetooth earphones.

title: Awesome earphone in an amazing price.
body: Writing this review while listening to music with this awesome earphone. Got this in prime day sale in just 999/- which itself is a great deal. I have used Boat basshead 225 earphone and Boat rockers 400 earlier but this is better than both of them. Comfortable, lightweight, superb bass, great noise cancellation, no issue with pairing with my Android device.  Sound clarity is ok. I will review it again after a month of use.

title: Absolutely worth the price
body: The best you can get at this price. Fits well and is comfortable to wear for 2-3 hours (don't know why would keep it for any longer). The Bluetooth range is good. Battery backup is also good. Amazed by the sound quality. Usually, other earphones offer quite flat sound in this price range and with these many features. But I found the sound to be crisp and clear in these earphones. Noise cancellation is absolutely not the feature for which you would wanna buy this. But it didn't matter for me, so a 5 star for the overall product.

title: worst product and after sales service
body: Never ever buy this at all. stooped working after 3 months both side audio not working. when approached customer care they said they will not repair it or replace it. they said it happen sometime so we don't replace for it. what the hell.... worst "cheap Boat" brand cant even give customer support after sales. Please no should think of buying it. rather buy sony headphones.

title: Perhaps the Best in Class
body: I love music. In my phone you will find  music ranging from Mozart to Linkin Park. And for the purpose of enjoying my music I have used various earphones (Sony, JBL, Skull Candy, Sennheiser etc.), but this is my first bluetooth earphones (a birthday gift from my wife) and after using it for 4 days, here I am sharing my detailed review...1. Build Quality ~ Very good. It's very lightweight, but doesn't seem to be fragile. (4.5/5)2. Sound Quality ~ Absolutely brilliant. I had seen many YouTube reviewers claiming that the Bass is this overpowers all the tiny sounds, but that's compeletely wrong. (4.5/5)3. Bass + Treble ~ The balance is quite fine, and if your music player has an equalizer you can tweak the balance according to your liking. (4.5/5)4. Comfort ~ These are lightweight as I have already mentioned, so it is a given that they are comfortable, even when using for hours. But personally, I have found that the left ear hook doesn‚Äôt fit as comfortably as the right one. You can remove the ear hooks though! (4/5).5. Battery backup ~ For me it has been more than 4.5 hours. (4/5)6. Pairing ~ As easy as it gets. (5/5)7. Noise Cancellation ~ Great. (5/5)I got it for ‚Çπ1199 and I can confidently recommend this to you. üôÇ

title: Returned the earphones twice!!!
body: I had a 255 T which I lost somewhere, i was quite impressed with the quality of my previous 255T.So I decided to buy another one, a 255 pro, which was supposed to be an upgraded version.The earphone that I received first was working fine for music, but as soon as I would use it for calling or zoom meeting, the voice would start cracking so bad that neither could I listen to the caller, nor did the caller could listen what I was saying.So I went ahead and ordered a replacement.The replaced earphones that I received had the same issue with calling.  The replaced item was even worst and it stopped working at all within 3-4 days.  So I had to return the second earphones for a refund.I was lucky that it stopped working within the return window.  Otherwise I would have been stuck with a non functional earphones.It is worth mentioning that I tried both the earphones with multiple devices, 2 Androids, 1 iphone 7 and 2 windows laptops.  Same problem with all of them.Amazon did an amazing job in handling my return requests.  A big thanks to them for that.I am now going for Sony or JBL, hopefully those would work fine.

title: Terrible quality - stopped charging after 10 days.
body: UPDATE 2:STATUS AFTER CONTACTING BOAT TO COMPLAIN ABOUT MALFUNCTIONING PRODUCT STILL UNDER WARRANTY:Tried to contact boat portal / company help line number for warranty complaint. Provided genuine proof of purchase (invoice etc).After you've bought the product, they make it really difficult for you to do anything with a malfunctioning product even if it's under warranty.Asking a customer to travel all the way to some service centre (spending Rs +500 for a Rs 899 item) in the city to get the product examined (esp at a time when COVID is all around) is preposterous and reeks of customer apathy. They know customers will not follow through.On contacting the service centre (number provided by boat on their email response to my complaint) over phone, they said "You want to come come - you don't want to come - it's your problem. This is all I can do. Speak to the company if you have a problem with this."-------------------------------------------------------------UPDATE 1Terrible quality - stopped charging after 10 days only. Dead as wood and wouldn't charge at all. Money down the drain.PLS DO NOT BUY AND WASTE YOUR MONEY.

title: Sincere and Personal Reviews on boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Wireless Headset
body: I write this review after 4 days of using this wireless headset boat Rockerz 255 sports. I bought this headset with Rs.1399/-. Excellent SOUND CLARITY with DEEP BASS. But, I do no know why some people are given negative reviews for its sound clarity and bass. I think they have listened low clarity music through this headset. If you play a true HD sound clarity file  then you can  experience the music  transmission in true HD sound clarity. Listing 3D music through this headset is awesome. Battery life is more than 6hrs. Light weight and exact fitting in ears without any irritation for a long time. Very bad mic for talking but for music lovers it is fine. Built quality and finishing is not up to the mark. Connected  wires are bit long. Noise cancellation technology is very good.

title: Go for either rockerzz sports or one plus z not this one
body: I have used it 3 days straight, after then returned it for one plus z (2k).I might personally suit uPro-Have good build quality, metal earpice,  plastic neckband, crystal clear sound.Con-Ear mufflers might pain u depends upon person to person (though after removal problem vanished)Poor noise cancellation or we can say surround sound effect(this was main reason for me) I thought it was fake but who knows may be I have phone with Bluetooth 4.1 .For 1700 it's not value for money.Yes the sports version for 1300 is more good value for money.One plus gave far better deal by just adding 300 more, ie Good noise cancellation despite having Bluetooth 4.1 phone, can easily penetrate 3 walls before distorted sound starts to come in boat it was after 2walls.Insane battery with my use I charge 1time in two days. Though build quality is not premium but it was far flexible(very important) if u r like me who lay downs a lot & put in weird position below pillow before sleep in or in pocket in hurry. Sticks to earphone while in Rockkerzz pro it pops out while doing yoga & workoout.

title: It does the job @ ‚Çπ999
body: Sounds good enough for the price I paid which was ‚Çπ999. The bass is there but it's not with a thumping effect which most people love. Using an equaliser will not have any drastic effects on its ability, so you have stick around with the audio quality you get, which is mediocre. The Bluetooth connectivity is good but is not far ranged. For eg. The signal breaks down when i move to the next room. The battery backup is wonderful and lasts me more than a day of casual use (provided, I use it for 5-6 hours a day @ approx 60% volume). The charging, as I noticed, takes a little over 2 hours. The battery that it shows in your phone is very inaccurate. My battery was 40% and suddenly dropped to 20% and it started anouncing battery low warning. Once it reaches less than 20% there is a battery low warning every minute. Volume buttons are tactile and feel good. But raising or lowering volume will be with annoying beeps that interrupt the audio. It does not come with a carrying case and the packaging is unimpressive.

title: Best Headset for the price.
body: Great and comfortable headset. Had no issues in pairing with 2 devices simultaneously. Decent sound quality with high on Bass. Good value for the money.  Have been using during work out and looks like it is really sweat and water proof as advertised.When switched on and connected, the voice that announces is very silly.. "you are connect to nirvana" what????? and also when you disconnect or power off .. it says "adios amiego".. why an Indian company chose this announcement is beyond me. Wish they had it very simple and plain .. like good bye...Overall a very good headset for the price..

title: Need to work on fitting, it have missing part like sound need real boffer feel
body: I am see many review about bass and sound they said to loud but its average means not irritating its give good results. Not to loud nor to much bass but its ok(good) in sound fector. Battery life is so good and if you have fitting problem with cup earphones then you face same problem in here its not for sports. Because after 15-20 minutes its fell loose and when i laugh it come out same like other.This review about boat 255 pro+But overlall experience is value of money near about.And one thing latency is to high you can even notice in video also so never think if you want buy for gaming. if you are only music lover but don't have big budget then buy with closed eye. You never disappointed in terms of sound quality.

title: Battery is like Batttteeeerrtrtrrrryyyyyyyy
body: I got this product on 08-Oct-2021 with 100% battery; and today it's 29-Oct-2021 and at moment it's still showing 40% battery remaining....(my usage is no music; only call with timing of 9 to 6 on weekdays; calling is heavy as I am into sales job and during COVID, calling is on high side; no use on Saturday and Sunday)So literally around 15 days of usage and I am still waiting to recharge it for first time....I don't know may be it's my usage or what but still waiting for first charging....Bass was tested by my wife and she is satisfied with the voice and bass quality.

title: Buy only if you want to regret later.
body: Can't recommend.1. There's a clear audio lag though negligible while listening to music it can be felt hard while playing games.2. None of the silicone buds sit well in the ear. Need constant push every couple of minutes.3. Those hooks or whatever, they are you can just throw them away. Don't understand how they advertise these for workout.4. Just some cheap junk endorsed by celebrities to give them premium appeal.Better to go for wired or those true wireless buds if you have the budget.Good luck.

title: For Gamers and BassHeads üí•
body: A month ago, I bought RealMe Wireless Headset and It‚Äôs Bass and Game-Latencies were pathetic, I returned it immediately.But here, You can clearly feel the BASS and for GAMES like PUBG and COD the audio latency is minimal (compared to RealMe)So if you‚Äôre a BassHead and wanted to use this for gaming with low latency this is the best headset in Rs.1000-4000 Segment.I have listed the audio latency details belowMy Device: iPhone 7Boat Rockerz 255 (Rs.1300):‚Ä¢ PUBG - Classsic 0.2 to 0.5Sec delay  TDM - 0.5 to 0.7Sec delay‚Ä¢ COD - 0.5Sec delay (both Multiplayer & BR)RealMe Wirelesss (Rs.1799):‚Ä¢ PUBG - Classic 0.5 to 1Sec delay  TDM - 1 to 1.5Sec delay‚Ä¢ COD - Multiplayer 1 to 1.2Sec delay  Battle Royale - 1Sec delay

title: Thanks Boat for Brilliant Coustmer Service
body: So i am writing this review after one year of purchase. After 11 month of use and abuse the earphone finally died. Just before 1 month of warranty remaining i made a complaint on the boat website with not much hope. Within 3 days the product was picked up from my home and after 3 weeks i received a brand new product which i didn't expected at all. At last thanks boat for respecting the warranty period. Now i proudly own 3 different boat products and all them justify their quality and price.

title: Boat Bluetooth Neckband Earphone working only 13 to 14 month
body: Hi Team,I have buying 3 set boAt Rockerz 255 Sports in-Ear Bluetooth Neckband Earphone with Mic (Active Black) all 3 Earphone working only 13 Month now all Earphone not working.Pls help me on this

title: Best BUDGET earphones for awesome voice calls with pretty decent battery life.
body: I rated the earphones 4 out if 5 just because i am looking at them without considering their price. If I were to include its price in the equation then it'll be probably 7 out of 5. Yes it's that good in it's price range. What caught me off guard is it's call clarity. I take a ton of voice call on these and the other parties never complained about the call clarity. If you receive a lot of calls on a Bluetooth earphone then you can't go wrong with these. Other than that you don't need to read this review further where I could complain about an over emphasized bass and muddied mids and highs....just watch a few videos on YouTube and you'll be good to go..... Battery life is decent. Call clarity is pretty dope. That's all I have to add on

title: Not suitable for TEAMS call
body: Sound quality is good. But the main purpose for which I bought this product was to attend office calls on Microsoft Teams and Zoom, but connecting to meeting with this product was an embarrassment as after 4-5mins call will drop and you have to connect to meeting once again.

title: Great battery backup. Base heavy sound. Call quality is good.
body: Battery backup is really good.Call quality is good. But u cannot speak in a very low voice otherwise the other person may not be able to hear you clearly this is not an issue. Mike Quality is good. I have taken a lot of call and nobody has complained about the quality of my voice. But there is no noise cancellation. It will pick up the environment noise. The overall sound is bass heavy. The voice notes are bass heavy. Not natural. I expected a better sound quality. Its only good for the bass lovers. Those who understand the music technicality will not like it. It's good for a casual music listener. These are very light weight. And build quality is good. The price should be around 1200 maximum for these.

title: Can hear nothing expect a weird crackling sound
body: Review after 1 day of usage.- After 10 minutes of connecting to any device, they start producing a crackling sound.- There seems to be a lag in the audio as well.- The company has made sure that the wire is of low quality material so it does not last long, and you will be  left with no option than to buy a new pair.When they do work, ( magically once in 10 times)- THe sound quality is good, noise cancellation is also good- The sound is a bit bass biased, bass can be truly felt but not so much for the other side.

title: Overall a great product to go for
body: I got a different colour than what I ordered, blazing yellow would have been awesome but it wasn't. Rest everything is great about this.Also to mention, there is sound latency in PUBG (and yes there will be some latency in Bluetooth device) I read reviews claiming no sound latency ( please do get misguided, if you have used good wireless headphones in past, you would easily notice the latency).Bass is too good(compared to other headphones I used in this price range)It's much better than boat 400 wireless, 390, 900(comparing overall and all the aspects)One full charge would last a whole day.Sadly I returned it because of the colour and latency in PUBG as I have boat 510 too(I would have kept it too if latency and colour issue wouldn't be there).Overall a Greta product to go after. Just too good

title: Budget earphone with best quality
body: I bought this Bluetooth earphone for online class and casual stuff. I am using it with my Dolby Atmos enabled tablet. The sound quality is like awesome with the Dolby Atmos. You can feel every rythm and beat. And the Bluetooth works fine. The battery usually last me for about 3-7 hours based on the use and content. And it also supports Google Assistant. You can activate the assistant with a 3 second press.

title: Overall Good But needs some improvement
body: First of all, The Product is amazing.Been using it for the last 2 months and I am very happy with the product's overall performance. battery life is amazing. You can use it for 3-4 days fully functional. The sound quality is decent, Good Bass, Charging is fast within 35-40 minutes it is fully charged and would last 4 days. one amazing feature is you can connect 2 devices at the same time.BUT......The noise cancellation is worse than any other earphones of this range. Also, the magnets are not that effective as Oneplus bullets. Moreover, the earphones are not water-resistant as mentioned by BoAt.And, lastly, it's not related to the product but I received a damaged packaging product was okay but package was not.Overall if you listen to music a lot or play games you can Go for it but if you want to buy it for calling purposes I would you should choose other products.

title: Good fr 899
body: Got this fr abt Rs. 899(card discount not included, include it if u want, about 100 rs) in great indian festival sale.Pro-1.Really Good sound.2. Very Good base. (abt 90% greater than samsung level u & JBL( used both).3.Good bluetooth earphones at this price. (almost nil competition).4.Good colors(got mine in fave black.Cons1. Material used is cheap. ( but keep in mind it is fr 899 only, fr 1399,dont go fr it.)2.earphones wires r too long fr my comfort.(deducted 1 star fr this)3.Earpieces not at all comfortable fr ur ears in long term. (deducted 1 star fr this)

title: No CVC technology. Lot of distortion in microphone.
body: Audio is good, but microphone is bad. The description and package is misleading - there is no CVC (clear voice capture) technology. Such unethical and unprofessional marketing gimmicks are not expected from BoAt company. Highly disappointed with BoAt. Won't be trusting any BoAt specifications from here onwards. They just lost a loyal customer.

title: Price is lill high
body: I tried infinity, Apple and bolt, over all good product, balance and soft sound quality.Bass is good (high)Vocal is bit lowTreble also bit low.As i am a not bass lover might be the reason I don't like this device. Infinity and apple are much batter than this one.Battery backup is decent, 8 hrsRange is also very nice.Comfortable wise good, but i am a bike rider so it's not ment for helmet users.Quality is good. No -ve feedback.Fonts are different on my ear plugs check the photos.

title: A good choice
body: A good buy for the 1.3-1.5K price rangs.Pros:1. Bluetooth 5.0 does provide a fast and reliable connectivity2. Noise cancellation is good whil watching movies or listening to songs3. Battery back up is good supported by quick charge. 15mins charge does give u a good 1Hr of continuous playback.4. Lightweight flexible fairly good build quality.5. Fit is comfortabke and secure6. Nice base and good sound clarity. Lyrics and instrumentals are crisp and good.Cons:1. Mic pics up a lot of background noise even if its TV running 20-25ft away at medium volume inside the house. Outdoor havent been able to test due to lockdown.Not the best choice if outdoor calling is the highest priority of purchase2. The earhooks keeps coming off the earbuds and there are no replacements are also provided.Hence if u loose the earhooks its gone forever.Although its not absolutely necessary to use the earphones. Without the earhooks also the fit is fairly secure.3. Simultanious pairing of two devices can sometimes be a pain. But its rare amd only in case of new pairings.

title: Defective Head Phone provided through coating on it
body: I have purchased boAt Rockerz 255 Pro in-Ear Bluetooth NeckbandEarphone with Mic(Teal Green) | B082VSJPD6 (B082VSJPD6 )HSN:8517 but now its side edge is not fixing and the coating on it is also removing on its own and also there is issue in hearing while on call the person on the other side of the call cannot hear my voice mostly and also he complain that the voice is not clear and very slow to hear.Also the piece was send defective as the coating was removed on its own the side edge of left ear phone on its own come up as it was fixed through a coating and send me as per the attached images.Request you to please help with the replacement at the earliest.

title: Worthy @ 799 rs.
body: I got it during Independence sell @999 (excluding 199 rs. Discount.I m waiting this review after 3 weeks of use.Sound volume: I m using realme mobile and I feel that sound volume is little bit low.Sound quality: It depends on device. When I use it with my PC, sound is ossm. Also it give good bass in mobile.Looks and materials: definitely it is good and longevity is high. But it could better if available neck band as boult provide. Other issue is that there is no vibration,so sometimes you will miss the call when earpiece is not in ear.Battery life: charging time is 2 hour approximately. After fully charge, you can enjoy 5:30 hours battery backup.All over no any other issue till now.If your budget is around 999 rs, you can definitely go with it...

title: Best headset. Beautiful sound and great battery backup
body: I am using this headset for last 2 years now and i must say i am surprised by its quality.I rarely say this for any of the product but it was worth every rupees I spend on it.Battery : Awesome battery life, at least 3-4 hrs on music and upto 6-8 hrs on standbySound quality : Sound quality is also great. I listen soft music and this headset gives me proper sound that I need.The best thing in this headset is it can connect simultaneously with my laptop and my mobile. This feature is even not available in many higher end headsets.

title: Waste of money. Not at all comfortable for running/exercise
body: Update: The product is non-functional now.Sound quality is worse than product half of its price. I own infinity bt earphones of similar design which is much cheaper and far better sound quality, lighter than this product.Earpodes comes out when you are running  as it is heavier and neck band is also not at all comfortable.There is no return policy, so do not waste you money.Highly disappointed. And this is my genuine review

title: Worth the price , best quality, IPx5 instead of IPx4
body: Well i used boat products before they are good as they were before.pros - base is good , water resistant ( here doscription says IPx4 but my earphone box says IPx5, and that is even better , you should update your product description. ) , Magnet lock , design .Con - cable is a bit long. As it has control box both side and a little hard cable at back, the remaining cable shouldn't be this long.Above all its a good product. Recommend to all the people who wants to buy a cheap but best wireless earphone.

title: Loved it.. then now disappointed..!!!
body: Review after 4 months of use : using it for online classes.Battery detoriated and now it gives only 2.5 -3 hours backup.Single hand use.Sounds are still awsome bt disappointed with massive low level of battery life ......‚Ä¶.........................Review after purchase:Super dooper sound.Worth every penny.Noise cancellation is just wow.Wear it & forget the world.U will feel the every beat .At this price it's a lottery.

title: Excellent headphones!! I am very happy with their performance :)
body: These headphones are such a good deal! I bought these at ‚Çπ999 during prime sale.- Excellent performance for a low cost!- They are very comfortable to wear, I hardly notice me wearing these headphones.- They were very easy to set up initially and easy to operate.- The sound quality is excellent! I think the design look great too!I had no problem with syncing them to my Pixel 2XL and they stay synced even when I walk away from my phone for up to a distance of 30 ft.I am very happy with the long battery life, since I can be forgetful about charging my various devices.I sweat a lot and that has not affected their performance so far and from what I read in other reviews, it will not be a problem in the future either.All in All, I very much recommend these headphones!Great performance for a low price!

title: Fantastic quality , technology and sound quality....
body: Using for 4 month and don't face any problem yet exept one thing, Battery backup is sincerely ok but The Warning for battery low is not working properly....Manytimes, it shutdown just after 40 - 60 seconds of battery low warning, while it should have to give first warning at 20% battery warning it warn me when 2 - 4 % battery left....I don't know this problem only happens with me due to single defected piece or all product do same, While fullfill it's promish to give 4 - 6 hr of battery backup ( it gives me 5 : 30 hr backup) and Sound qualities is also nice.....I will recommend it 4.5 star for its performance as using for 4 months.....  JAI HIND üáÆüá≥.......

title: A good earphone for the price range
body: I was so amazed for as to get this one. I acquired a same day delivery. The build quality is top notch, it feels rugged and strong; the wires and the earpiece felt wonderful. Yet, the thing I'd like to regret is it is not as light as the Boult wireless headphones. This is a bit heavy. I specifically bought it for gym as I have three JBL for home and office purposes. So in gym, while on a workout, you can definitely feel the a light weight on your ears.Also, I feel that the wires should be length adjustable as in a Boult headphone. I feel the wires are a bit lengthy. But, this definitely is a better choice than Boult. I compared it with my friends Boult headphones. This one was the best in sound quality, build quality and all.Secondly, the noise cancellation is absurd. Not upto the mark, not even as good as other earphones of this price. But the other qualities like sound, strength, battery, Bluetooth connectivity, all rocks in this headphones. To this price range, this is wonderful.

title: Good one & After sale service is also very good.üëçüèª
body: I bought it in Jan-2019 & it stopped working in May-2019.Build quality is good & sound quality was also pretty good.But it stopped working & charging. If I charge it for whole night then it is only usable for few minutes & then it is turned off.I claimed warranty & they took my old one & reolaced it with new one. boAt after serviced is very good, I'm impressed. They came to my home & took the defective product & replaced it with new one. It took around 10-15days to get a new one.

title: Recommended
body: Not recommending for music purpose.If you want it for music then go for head phones instead of this ear phone.If you are taking this for webinars,phone calls,meetings then absolutely awesome.Its purely canceling noise.Even if you talk with very low decible sound it will catch your voice and audible to your friend who talks to you.Absolutely amazing experience....Battery back up superb...

title: A Good Earphone at this Price Point‚Ä¶..
body: Few Pros. & Con. As mentioned below -* Need slight improvement in sound quality, it‚Äôs not very noticeable, but can be better.* It has got good quality & clean bass.* It is comfortable to wear with or without the Ear Guides (removable). Wearing along with the ear guides may irritate you but again at the same time it helps to hold it in ear.* Voice of calls were clear & loud to other end but you feel some annoying sounds.* No auto on-off with magnetic bud, this feature can help to improve the battery life.

title: Worth it
body: Nice one.. audio quality is best.. battery is awesome.. really last long..

title: Life of the boat rockerz 255
body: I had purchased my boat rockets in April 2019.Pro's-Fantastic musicGreat calling qualityGreat bassFantastic value for money.Ffw - 6 months after usage of an hour each day for 5 days a week for 6 months -The volume up and music skip button is not workingRegistered a complaint with boat and they took the headphone and repaired it and delivered it back in 15 working days.2 weeks later it does not charge anymore and I am loosing my cool.I have registered my complaint again on the boat website for a repair.Verdict -Fantastic usage for 6 months with usage of 20 hours a month and approx 120 hours in 6 months.Good for 6 months usage.

title: Satisfied by the product
body: Pros:1. Excellent sound quality for this price range ( I got it for Rs. 999 in sale)2.Long battery life ( lasts 6 hrs after continue usage with a full charge)Cons:1. It should come with an extra pair of ear hooks  as I lost one and unavailable in the online/ offline market for the same model2. Experienced hindrance in connectivity many time while playing it.3. While u r on call it doesn't cancel background noiseEDIT:- it has started loosing the connection in between even though phone is in your hand and it's been only 18 months to the purchase, so think wisely before buying.EDIT 2:- After 20 months earbuds stopped working one by one.  -----THE END----

title: Top Class Neckband
body: It's been 7 days i'm using this wireless bluetooth earphonesHere's my reviewSound Quality Is Quite Great,Bass Is Really GoodAnd Battery Backup is AmazingIt's fast charging support and It will be fully charged within 20-25minsIt's been under budget 800-900rs in Sale.Design- 3.5/5Build Quality- 4/5Sound Quality- 3.5/5Bass- 3.5/5Battery backup- 5/5Overall- 4/5Pros-1) Fast Charging with type-c support2) Battery Backup is Awesome (Upto 42 Hours)3) it's waterproof4) Sound Quality Is Quite Great5) 10mm Drivers.5) Dual Pairing (Mobile And Laptop)6) Mic And Noise Cancellation Improved.Cons-1) Sound Quality is Decent..2) Feels distortion rarely.Overall..I Must Say It's An All Rounder Neckband..Must Buy It.Need To Remember-Charge This With 5v/2Amp Adapter or 18w adapterBut Don't Charge With Turbo/Fast Charging Adapters. it will affect on battery of life of this product.

title: Headphone with a style.
body: Date: 17/12/2019- Magnetic back stick to each other while hanging from neck. I usually hang the earphone crossed i.e. left in the right and right to the left and while wearing, I wear the ear pieces properly so that it crosses my neck. This helps the earphone not to fall from back due to wind while driving. I usually wear the earphone with helmet though.- Auto switch off if not in use for quite some time.- Good power usage. Lasts the whole day and 80% charge remains. I charge everyday as a custom.- Microphone has great clarity but don't expect a condenser mic level sound.- Can be used as a hidden mic for speaking in conferences.- Nice placement of buttons for Volume up & down and pause & play.- Nice audio feedback while powering on, connecting, connected, and switching off.- LED blinking light while powering on, connecting, and switching off to know the present status of the headphone.- Easily connected to laptop and other devices i.e. multi device connection and seamless switching between the audio playback from various devices. Preference given to laptop than mobile with mobile phone audio going to pause state.**Update: 19/12/2019**- Earphone turns off when connecting to both mobile and laptop. [Batter Charge: 80%]. First I connect to mobile, then connect to laptop, then earphone turns off. Previously this was not happening. It used to connect to multiple devices and play through each of them seamlessly depending on the output of the bluetooth audio input. Preference was given to laptop over mobile playback.

title: Good battery life and multiple device connection
body: I used to use Sony XB55AP. So my review of this Boat earphone is based on relative comparison with sony earphone.Sound: very good. As good as sony XB55AP. Bass, vocals and treble all are equally good without any overpowered frequency.Loudness: it's sufficiently loud. My volume for calls is 30, for music in crowded area is 60, Netflix is 30.Noise cancellation: it's good. But it's too efficient in that as I don't insert the buds fully so I am aware of the surroundings. It depends on bud size and ear shape though.Bluetooth: good. I connect phone and laptop simultaneously and can switch between zoom on laptops to phone call automatically. Range is normal - can penetrate one wall only. There is Qualcomm aptx hd support but my phone is rooted so I get only AAC option.Mic : it's good. Blocks background noise and other side can hear me crystal clear.Comfort: the support hooks are very useful to keep the buds in ear while running or gymming. But cause discomfort after around 60 mins of use. I slid them away so I only use when necessary. Otherwise it's comfortable earphone.Design: looks classy. I bought teal blue. Black is too aam junta. Magnets are not strong but that's ok. Probably it's weaker to prevent earphone chamber from damaging.Battery life: that's the best part. My daily usage is 2 hrs calls (phone and laptop combined), 5 hrs video. Daily drain is about only 20%. Can go for a week without charging. Below 20% there is annoying battery low voice notification every 2-5 mins so have to charge it.

title: Average product from BoAts.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
