But i dont think it make any difference. But voice call is decent. Battery backup is under testing. Bluetooth range is also good. I had ordered 2 of this. 3/8/2021. I found some gaps in the body of this bluetooth battery pack. Images attached. Not satisfied with overall built quality. I don't i this bluetooth will sustain ipx 7 rating.

title: Superb product
body: I baught that product in 899 on Great Indian Festival sale .In terms of battery it's much extra that you expect , you need to charge just once in a week when you are using it daily for 10 hours  , they said that battey is 40hours but it's much more around 70hours something .Mic quality is impressive , noise cancellation really works wellSound is good 4/5Battery 10/5Mic : 5/5Design : 3/5Build:  3.5/5Comfort : 4/5

title: Satisfactory.....
body: The build quality is averageA weird hissing sound comes when you are not listening to something but you are connected to a device(the sound stops after 30-50 sec)That hissing sound is really very annoying.The audio quality is great and volume is also very loud.Bass is more than average.Other than that hissing sound everything is great and is value for money in this price range

title: Great product | Water resistant
body: Purchased this for the second time as lost the first one. The product is fantastic and the bass effect is superb. Using this product for multi purposes including running, cycling, and commuting. Cycled in the rain and so far nothing has happened to the product. Recommend it as it is also less expensive.

title: Felt irritated using it. Don't buy it.
body: Pros : Best sound quality in the segment around 1500.Cons : The welcome, maximum volume, battery low messages voice is very irritating.Don't buy. You will feel irritated. It's like SIRI/Google Assistant getting active every now and then.The work would have been done by a beep sound.I don't use it anymore, I gave it to my sister as I like electronics to be useful not irritating.The moment you the love the music and start to increase the volume, it will shout : MAXIMUM VOLUME.And when you would like to shut the sound, it will say : MINIMUM VOLUME.I know it's minimum volume, I have done it myself don't tell me b****

title: Loved it
body: Good quality earphones. Good noise cancellation. A piece of advice: if you use this with 2.4 GHz WiFi, then you might fave lagging or Internet issues because Bluetooth works on the same band, and the two interfere with each other. Best if you use 5 GHz WiFi. But note that this is NOT a problem of this product; every Bluetoith earphone will cause some interference with 2.4 GHz WiFi.

title: Waste of Money üòûüò†
body: I bought this headset after listening to positive reviews from a popular youtuber in his channel. Now I regret my decision to buy this üò†This is my review after 8 months of usageI got it for Rs 999/-The sound quality & bass is ok.The range is around 10m without any obstacles in the way.The worst thing is that it doesn't fit into my ear properly. It always keep falling out.üëéI tried the 3 pairs of earbuds provided with the earphone. No use üëéüëéIt can't be used while doing exercises or gymming. The neck band kind of jump around with u when you move. Again the earpiece fall out. It might be a design flaw.Can't even use to make phone calls or recording audio or voice. Same issueüëéüëéüëéAfter a while , when you turn your head or when u  move or sometimes it comes out of ear by itself.Now I only use this to watch movies because it's wireless & I can put it back when it goes out of place.Doesn't serve the purpose. Don't waste your money on this !!!!üëé

title: Battery backup is very good.
body: Battery life almost 2 week for just calling purpose3 days for full use (continues music listing and talking)20 days for idle situation. Just connect not utilize30 days for standby time approx.Bass quality is almost like sanhizer / jblNoice cancelation algorithm Also works good.But feel high weight on the right side ear bcz of side control button unit.Control unit contain 3 same size button so confusion when ON or OFF or call receiving and rejecting find the middle button.Quick connect.Latency is sometime more.Quick charge.

title: Good product
body: Boat this neack band is very good quality for sound . Call connect build quality all good last 20 days  iam using i am connected both mobile & smart tv no problem good sound actually this model 2020 ipl model but I am buy now delhi dare devil's jercy colour I am buy .In my use cons is neck band is big size wire and all otherwise good product battery backup is realy very good

title: Over all 3.5/5 sound and build quality to be improved
body: I have used the product for more than 4 months... and just started feel like I'm using it for few hours..this is my impression..first I'm a Boat head..and has been using themvfor the last couple of years..I have discarded my earlier JBLand Philips head phones long back...I'm extremely impressed by boAt 225 edition...just awesome and I am comparing this 255 Bluetooth to the 225..First Bluetooth connectivity is very good and easily covers 10 feet...build is ok but needs a good look...second sound quality may not be like the wired ones (I am slightly disappointed)..voice clarity using microphone is good ( little disappointed) noise cancellation is better compared to 225... finally battery quality is good ..will surely run for 7-9 hours depending on use...bass quality is good..not better than 225..HD sound is impressive..For other Boat heads..if I am wrong let me knowSound quality-3.5/5Build quality-3.5/5Bluetooth connectivity-4/5Noise cancellation-3/5Over all 3.5/5..Boat please improve the quality..for new buyers it's satisfactory but not overwhelming at this price..good luck

title: I wouldn't recommend this product
body: Do not buy......Okay don't get me wrong, my first impression after getting this was like "this is the best headphone at this price!" But now, I don't recommend this....here's the full review...pros:1) Comfort-This is the most comfortable headset I've used, didn't feel uncomfortable even after 6-7 hrs of using.2) This is so light weight, you won't feel anything hanging from your neck.3) Sound and microphone quality is awesome.3)Battery lasted 6-7 hrs on single full charge, that's impressive!Cons:1)Bass, okay if you like bass, then it's pro for you. This has super extra bass! But if you are like me who enjoys all tones of music then it's not for you. Too much bass! I had to use equaliser to use it!2) Elasticity of neck band is so low, it's just like a thick wire. Often slips off your shoulder, that's annoying!3)THIS IS THE REASON YOU SHOULDN'T BUY! THIS THING HAS ZERO RELIABILITY! OFTEN DISCONNECTS ON ITS OWN WITHOUT ANY WARNING! AND THEN YOU HAD TO REMOVE THIS DEVICE FROM PAIRED LISTS ON LAPTOP/PHONE. AND PAIRED IT AGAIN! NOW I HAVE TO DO THIS EVERYDAY! SO SO ANNOYING! TODAY I JUST USED THIS JUST FOR ONE HOUR AND IT HAPPENS! DON'T BUY!4) Range is so poor, five steps from your room, you can't hear anything!

title: Received the functional product only after exchange.
body: I am purchasing the boat rockers for the third time. The sound quality, noise cancellation and bass quality seem fine. The earphones are long-lasting. The previous ones are working perfectly for more than a year. But I received a faulty product this time. The Bluetooth technology was not working, I couldn't connect it with my phone/tablet/ laptop. Then received the functional product after exchanging. Thankfully Amazon has really good return/ exchange policy.

title: Good mid range Bluetooth product with great sound quality and battery life
body: Product arrived on time with good packaging, no damages on package.Pros:1. Worth every penny spend on this headset...2. Sound quality is great for this range of product.3. Excellent battery life... i'm using from approx 1 year, still having 3-4 hours of battery back up for continuous usage.4. Bluetooth range is good.Cons:1. Charging port rubber cap is not durable will fall of after 4-5 month of usage.2. No extra ear-hooks provided, as i lost one side hook and its difficult to get same.

title: Great product ! ***** Service !
body: I am writing this review after 11 months of constant (4-5 hrs) use. In terms of quality it has never failed me.However in the 11th month of use, the right bud stopped working at times. Clearly like most earphones the contact had become loose.Due to pandemic restrictions could get the service station only two days back. Was pleasantly surprised to get a replacement as it was under warranty. No fuss, no hassle. Just registered the complaint online on BOAT website, ticket no was instantly issued and the service center simply gave me the replacement headphones.5 star product, 5 star service.

title: Worth the cost
body: So I bought this earphone with some suspicions in mind. Wasn‚Äôt very sure that it will work ok. I have used it for a week now and here is my review:Mic quality for calls : Good, if the mic is on your neck, near your mouth, the quality is good. Have received feedback from friends who were on the other end of call.Audio: Audio is quite good, bass is alright, the level you can expect at this cost.Comfort: Comfortable to wear, the earbuds fit perfectly, just the little rubber thing sometimes doesn‚Äôt fit in my ears (guess it is meant for bigger ears)Connectivity: Range is about 5-6ft, not more. Sorry to say this but I have faced this issue with all bluetooth headphones. So I guess either you buy more expensive or stay within this distance of your phone/laptop.Battey: Battery life is surprisingly good. I use it all day with one time full charging. About 6-7 hours.

title: Am completely dissatisfied this product.
body: Iys very waste product. I don't want to say don't buy this product, It's your wish. This product have low connectivity. Because the producu connevtion music player was struk. While listening songs if get any cal or msg after the songs was discontinued in boat rockers but music player running in mobile. I confirm ly say it's not mobile fault. Other wase sounds quality good. And battery back up also very poor. After complete charge is using continusly will come 4 to 5h. Others wise the battery backup 3 to 4 hours.

title: Unable to claim warranty in chennai
body: I purchased this headphones after seeing lot of reviews.After 7 months, unable to hear one side. Also noise cancellation is terrible..During corona lockdown,  tried to raise request in Boat website. But after filling all the details, it asked to reach out to service center in chennai.. But due to lockdown restrictions, Service center was closed.So dropped an email to support team but no response.. Even tried to call Boat service helpline but it did not connect to the service representative..When service center opened in chennai, visited directly in person but was shocked to hear they no longer accept Boat products due to payment issues from Boat.. Again tried to contact customer care but unable to connect.Was trying to connect for weeks but was unsuccessful..And on one day, successfully connected to the customer rep. but shocked to hear that the product ran out of warranty (Only 10 days) and they cannot replace. Told him about the service center problem but he didn't care a bit..  He was saying the same thing again and again that product ran out of warranty.Was it my problem that service center was not accepting boat products due to payment issues ?Will never buy Boat products and will suggest all my friends and family to avoid Boat Products...

title: budget earphones
body: If you are looking for budget earphones under 1000 rs than it us good but still u have choice for boat rockerz 255 and infinly glide 120. I would recommend infinity glide 120 because i have experienced the sound quality of both earphones but i liked the sound quality of infinity glide 120. Everything is perfect.In boat Rockerz i faced 1 issue is with battery backup. Even when you are not using just it is connected with your phone than also it drains the battery while it not seen this type of issue in Infinlty Glide 120. So i would recommend 120.

title: Great For Bass Lover, But mic.....
body: I got this earPhone at Rs 999 during the sale, this is my first Bluetooth ear and overall experience is great.Build quality is superb, lightweight, sturdy and stylish.Sound quality is great but not as good as Skullcandy,  JBL, etc but again in this price, it's awesome.Connectivity is super quick, just turn on and it's connected. BT range is not that great, it can be improved.From the battery side, it takes about an hour to juice up for 0%-100% and last for a day(at volume Level 50%-60%).Things that I didn't like is wires are longer than it needs to be, as I already mention BT range is not that great,  mic catches to much noise(no noise cancellation).

title: Value for money at this price.
body: Got this product at a deal in Republic sale.It has a decent battery backup. Best thing about this is that you can use this as a great driving earphones. The support is not hard so you can hear it when you lie down on your neck.Sound quality : good, can be betterNoise cancellation : not the bestBass quality : good.Overall, there are great headsets out there that gave far better experience compared to this. But at this price, it gives a tough competition.

title: Issue with battery and connectivity
body: Battery suddenly drop 0 from 40%.When battery is shows 60% ON button does not work until its plugged into power, post connected with power it get ON and work well even if you remove power cord.Connectivity is good if only used with one device if you are using it with 2 devices it behaves crazy many time or i should say you should only use this with 1 device only.I thought most of the issue may resolve once i am use to it but its not the case now i am using this for more then a week and worst part is now i don't have option to return or replace. Good Luck if this works for you and seems like a Chine's product only to me.

title: Replace your wired headsets completely
body: Excellent battery life. Not an audiophile but my biggest use case of taking office calls while moving has been solved. No ore charging in middle of the day. This has replaced my wired headset completelySound quality is quite good and the new placement of mic and controls allows easy access and better calls clarity.

title: ISSUE WITH SIZE AND LOOK.
body: over all the neckband is good in quality. like built quality, sound quality,  call voice quality, and battery back up. all are very good. but after using it almost 20 days i found it very long when you are not using it or it is hung around your neck. and the controls and mic is provided separately on right wire of neckband so it makes it little bit heavier while using it for long time. and due to its heaviness it keeps falling while you are moving fast or running.also it doesn't have a premium look so i am thinking of switching it with boat rockerz 385 V2. which have a premium look while wearing it.  you can see both the products in photos.

title: Just a regular earphone with flaws
body: Pro:Cheap(in terms of price)Basic functionality (Bluetooth connectivity, microphone, basic music listening experience, good for office meetings,calls,Less charge time with good backup(12 hrs)Cons:Bad fit in earsNot for folks who want to listen to loud music for longer durationSometimes difficult to wear for a longer duration

title: Product is okay okay
body: I received the product early,1) look wise nice2) sound is good3) Bass is not that good4) Bluetooth connection is good, till a good distance5) Issue is sound breaks some time, and automatically reconnects, I replaced the product with new one, but ithe new one seems to having the same issue.

title: Survived for a year
body: Product is good, only survived for a year..and I have same complaints as another reviewer so I am just copy pasting his views.1.Bluetooth range not more than 10m2. Pain in ear due the conical buds(can be removed)3. Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in front.4. No pouch provided.5. Worst part is very low quality and distoring mic. Other person keeps complaining about my voice.

title: Don't buy,  worst quality and Service.
body: I am writing this review after using it for 10 months.  It stopped working so i visited the service center in Pune for replacement but Service center experience was really  bad.  I met with Mr Kamal and post inspecting the headphone he told me that there is a gap in the part where battery is placed, hence it has drained out and can't be replaced even though it is under warranty. I am really frustrated as it has taken me more than an hour to reach service center which is a risk in this Covid situation.I can confirm that this gap exist since the time it is delivered and there is no physical damage. To me it's a manufacturing defect,  refer attached photo of the same.Mr Kamal asked me to send a mail to customer care with the photo of the defect and then company will arrange the return.Customer care no is not reachable, sent multiple emails to their support mail ID but no response. It's a low quality Chinese product,  don't buy it.

title: Not for Calls
body: Been using this for 6 months now. Here are some pros and cons.Pros:1. The sound quality is decent and detailed.2. Build is good, flat wire makes it sturdy.3. Battery lasts for about 6 hours. Full charge takes 10-15 minutes..Cons:1. Mic volume is too low. Don't use for calls.2. Bluetooth-WiFi interference is there.3. There may be delays in sound when you pause and play a video. Happens rarely.4. Causes tinnitus..Better to use it for watching movies and sometimes music.

title: Good product, worth buying !
body: It is worth buying and is best in its price range. The battery backup is great, continuous listening gives more than 10 hours. Listening at high volume will drain battery faster and is also not good for ears. So listening at moderate or soft volume will give you more than 10 hours.Noise cancellation and bass quality is excellent. But high frequencies (treble) are not so prominent as it should be, maybe due to increased bass.Charging from 10% to full hardly takes 1 hour using just 1amp charger. Yes fast charging is good.Bluetooth range is quite good and even works beyond 2 walls and around 9 metres. I placed my phone in my living room and went to my bedroom which is after the kitchen, and it worked flawlessly. But when I moved further to my terrace, I faced the intermittent sound issue. It works at more than 10 metres when we keep it in open or near the door so that walls don't interfere.Range issue is also dependent on your handset's Bluetooth range. Some handsets have poor Bluetooth range, so those who are facing range issue should check with some other handset with better Bluetooth range.Best value for money. I am satisfied.

title: Only bass , not true music
body: Boat just focuses on bass nothing else, which u can get local made at 300/- I have Sony jbl n Blaupunkt I can hear each n every instruments in the music but boat only drums highlighted,  that too not original sound. Seems like local item in brand name , over priced.

title: They Rockzz!!
body: Amazon packaging : Not up to the mark, only comes in a plastic ploybag which is the outer bag, no internal protection per se!Durability : looks sturdy, package also says sweat resistant, only delicate part is the charging port flap :PSound : it rockss!! Bass as well as treblesOne good thing is it wont let you increase the sound beyond a threshold via headphones ( u can do it from phone :P)Noice cancellation is awesome.Felt slightly more protruding, needs to be inserted deep into earüëÇ otherwise chances of falling down ( not on the ground btw)Package contains : charging cable 10-15 cm long, 2 pairs of buds of different sizes, warranty card + manualColour : red + black matt finish.Its post delivery feedback so no idea of battery backup, charging, sweat proof. (Will add later)

title: Average product
body: I purchased it as a gift.Sound is okay, but the magnet that holds both of the earpieces together is weak.I have OnePlus bullets bass edition headphones. Their quality is far superior. Although to be fair, they're double the price of this product.Go for it if you want an average product that meets the minimum requirements and looks cool.

title: Must buy, keeps hands totally free for other work
body: Wonderful handsfree bluetooth headphone. Easily connects to any bluetooth device. Is best for train travel as you can keep phone inside bag and still talk/listen to music with no discomfort. Now a days has been very useful during this pandemic for wfh office calls particularly as its wirefree so my hands reamin totally free & dont have to roam with laptop plugged wired headphone. The earplugs are soft and dont bother even after hours of use. Charging lasts for quite 2-3 days so doesnt need to be charged every now and then.

title: Not Worth the Price
body: this is good brand product butit is not up to the mark and features here are also not that satisfyingbass is there but on a Lowe Profile sideHigh and Mids are are clear but sound pretty low one cant hear in a low volumeNeckband strap is also not skin friendly so be careful with that.Overall 1.5/5No Mangnetic on/offno fast chargingno type CDidnt Like the Product.

title: Ok...nothing great....
body: Well first things first...it's boAt..so don't expect it to perform like BOSE...Bluetooth... I initially had some issues with setting it up with my mobile, but eventually things got sorted out...Sound Quality....it's ok nothing great...can't compare it to any other brand like JBL, Sony etc...because I didn't pay that much...In the Ear fit...now that's the real issue with it...it would never fit properly...no matter how hard I try...keeps falling off...So overall...go for it if Ur budget is less than 1k...otherwise I would suggest to go for a better device from Sony or Samsung or JBL....

title: An honest review after a month - Overall a true value for money
body: Well, I have been using these for a month now and the earphones are really good. The sound quality is immensely saturated. I could figure out the bass, treble and other modules separately. The bass is good for people who are not audiophiles. Like if you're not into sound recording or need minute details to grab onto, its perfect for you. I grabbed the deal in 1k though, so it was a nerve cracking deal for me. The battery lasts for 5 to 6 hrs for me even if I stay connected to the phone via Bluetooth without playing any music. It lacks the backup if I keep using it for listening to music for an hour or so and lasts for about 4.5 hrs or so. Mic quality is kinda okay clear but it catches too much of sounds of around you which can irritate the person on the other line. But on an average a great deal to get your hands on.

title: GOOD BUT NOT BEST
body: This is my third boat Bluetooth headset after boat rockerz 235V2 & 255pro..  I think 235v2 is far more better than 255 series. I will provide its quality as per pros and consPros1. Very good wire quality2. Noise  cancellation goodCons1 Sound quality not upto the mark.. 235v2 far more better2. Whenever u receive calls 235v2 starts vibrating which I have not found in 255 series3. Battery backup not goodSince I have used 235 and 255 series I would say go for 235v2 for better sound quality and experience

title: Bad battery life, mediocre sound quality and uncomfortable to use
body: The sound quality is mediocre at best but that is not the worst thing about these headphones. The worst thing is the battery life, it simply doesn't works for more than a day. My usage pattern is quite common: listening to a few songs and keeping it connected to the phone for calls.Another irritating thing about boat as a company is that they are not creating earphones(or headphones) which are comfortable to use. The same is true for this earphone (or neckband if you want to be fancy), it will cause pain in your ear after 25-30 minutes of usage.Overall the product is not recommended, as you can get many other earphones in the price range with better battery life. (I think sound quality can't go down)

title: Consider This before buying
body: Battery Backup kam hai yr.. 6 hours toh kuch bhi nhi hai or pubG k liye thik hai kaafi hadd tak sound bass everything is good but battery Backup as compared to other brand is low... Go for it .. i received a one side not working..but thanks to Amazon hassle-free return policy i am returning it back...If you want Beat or skull candy like quality simultaneously you can compromise on battery Backup go for it... High quality music 6 hour voice call 8hours youtube videos almost 8 to 9 hours...

title: Worth the money
body: Review after 2months of use.Pros1.Good sound quality for the price.2. Adequate bass (my perception)3.Pairs almost instantly4. Volume control works fine5. Ip68 works just fine serves it's purpose during workouts.6.Magnetic ends of ear buds serves the purpose to keep the headphones around neck without ear buds swaying around when not in use.ConsBattery back up could have been better. Lasts for almost a week on full charge with daily 1hr usage.Final verdictOverall value for money.

title: Comfirt Quality Regular usage.
body: After a week almost i would say that its most comfirtable and light weight.Appearance is ok sporty touch and black colour looks professional too..Comfirt in Ear, non slipy and proper fitting in Ear gives good noise cancellation.Sound are good at vocal and music both.. Bass is as per other good haedphone and not so so much extra as mentioned here in other reviews and product discription.Batery is ok for mderate use. Charge every day if use is more then  4- 5 hour in a dayIts very very  good for routine listening of music and talk, but if you looking for party type sounds like other big headphone then its not suitableAnd so is orice to be kept around 800-1000 thats too also due to brand

title: Good quality, good price, in good range.
body: Well ...Writing true review after using it for 7 continous days, ..Product quality is good as well as awesome. Also the sound quality is more punchy as well as bassy. Battery is good . It works for around 6 to 8 hours in continous full volume. Also the buds are on lighter side so easy to wear. Microphone is on a distance so some how difficult for microphone usage. Other things are good and best.

title: POWER  NOT ON AFTER 2 DAYS....and A Blue light always on...
body: Let me tell you about the product in Details,1. Sound Quality is good. It is harmless for ears. Not too loud but traffic noise can't disturb you while listening music.2. Look is awesome but wires are too lengthy.3. Battery Backup 'WAS' awesome. Six to seven hours after 1 or 1.30 hours chargingBUT4. Product is not CHARGING AFTER ONLY TWO DAYS OF PURCHASE. And it is not acceptable. That's why the rating is ONE (lesser than one is not available though)I will change my ratings and review too but after the replacement or refund against this product.And one more thing, do not put too deep to this thing in your ears, it might be painful after few minutes.

It music gets bit messyBattery life is about 4 hrs and it's really to hang aroundFeels weight less on neck

title: They are not Okay
body: The problem is its battery life.. worstI had boat rockerz 270 which worked so well once charged.. also.. it has a very abrupt behaviour when discharged..I had kept it on charging for good 3 hours and when turned on.. it started saying battery low in 5 mins .. then switched off.I put it on a car usb charger for 15 mins hardly n it said 100%.The sound quality is just ok... Not sure of its real or fake coz its just like any other local earphone brand.You will start feeling headache / ear ache if you are using it for long time.Also the charger provided with the product is cheap, low quality and the wire is very small in length.The 2 magnets are not quite working..Only good things about the earphone:Lightweight and good color.The earbuds are fine as they fit in and do not get off easily, in case you go on a running or something while these are on.

Sound - it's excellent, it's clear and bass is like dolby sound with max noise cancellation.2.batter- i used for 20hr *4days . i got 4 days charge3. title: Go for it....
body: Good Bluetooth in the ear headphones....Sound quality is decent....may seem a little thin, takes time to get used to, but definitely not bad or poor.Battery life too is decent( around 5-6 hrs) when connected.Build quality is good, though you need to b a little careful.All in all a VALUE FOR MONEY deal ( especially sweet since I got it at an attractive deal price of INR 999 during the Great Indian Amazon Sale).

title: Budget Bluetooth earphones
body: I had been using it for more than week now. 1) Audio quality is good,2) When I put it around neck, I don't feel it is there.3) But for some reason after long hours of usage ears started paining. I removed ear loop hooks and changed the ear phone tips to smallest size. Now I am able wear them for little longer.4) During call I checked with caller about noise and call audio quality. They didn't complain.5) 3 buttons can be felt easily when you are wearing them. Accepting calls is easier with middle button and other 2 buttons are volume up and down bottons.6) With long press and saying "OK google", google assistant can be activated.

title: Pathetic Customer service.
body: I purchase this on 6Aug'2020 and within couple of months one of the earphone stopped working. Initially BOAT use to provide door-to-door pickup Service for replacement. But now they expect to visit Service Center which is almost 25-30km from my place. Is it fair to spend 300-400 bucks going to service center for a replacement of a product which costed 900 Rs.  Tried to contact their Customer Service but every time they disconnect the call or ask to mail them on their email Id. I have email as well but no response. Really pathetic experience. NEVER EVER BUY BOAT PRODUCTS... please share the review with as much folks...

title: The best I have ever had.
body: I am very impressed by the product. Everything from the sound to the build to the battery is excellent.It is going to be my everyday companion for sure!Plus with the complete trust that I have on boat customer care, warranty and replacement policies , this product will last you endlessly.

title: Amazing is just a word
body: I knew Boat was good but this exceeded all my expectations.1. The sound is amazing, better than some.wired headsets that I have.2. The highs and lows are captured perfectly.3. Easy to pair and operate, simple and easy; even kids can operate it.4. Been using it for my walks and use it for both phone n music. I keep my phone in my pant poclet and there is no loss of range.5. Have used it for 2 hours and the battery charge is still on.

title: Awesome is the word for these Rockerz!!!
body: The Boat rockerz are awesome. That are perfect for use while running/jogging. They are comfortable enough that you wouldn‚Äôt even feel they're plugged in. Sound is clear and loudness is enough even in crowded areas. Phone calls are good and no irregularities found in voice reception. Battery lasts for over 10 hours even after constant usage. Charging is fast enough. Overall I'm fully satisfied with the rockerz.

title: Budget friendly good for casual use.
body: So it's been some time I've been using these about a month I guess, and I can say I'm fully content with these, sound quality is good, they are durable, light in weight, fit in ear just there, bass is a bit overrated but I think for me it's ok, voice on call clear enough. So overall a good make all in all, find the below review to check out and decide if these fit your specs for a perfect buy.So when you unbox these quite a good box and you can see through the plastic covering the headphones, once you open the box you'll find some docs such as the warranty card, and the boat pamphlet, and some other doc's related to boat.Make - I think the make seems to be quite good in this price, when I wore them for the first time I couldn't feel the headphones around my neck then, they've just managed to make them light but still heavy enough to sustain around your neck, you'll find less buttons and the best part for me is that they have provided a C-type charging socket which was just a Cherry on the cake for me as I possess a One plus. They've taken care that it doesn't get itchy around your neck and also you keep enjoying your music experience so great work on that front, the wires are a bit long coz they are connected to the end of the heavy plastic material, and I'm afraid I might just pop off one the wires if my activities are a bit aggressive, so I hope they work on that part, the erabuds fit okay in the ear I can feel a heaviness in ear when I wear, them, plus the smallest of the rubber tips just seem the medium size to me maybe because of the external part being bigger in size than the internal part that goes in-ear. So I'm not satisfied with the earbud part that goes in-ear but all in all I think they've done a pretty good job to provide the best quality in this price range.Music and call quality - On the music front I think they've done a decent job, the earphones a loud and packed with extra bass, now what happens is if you are connected and you get a call it just bangs in-ear which could be dangerous if your phone ring volume is full, they are just too loud so it's difficult to guage other music fronts and beats, as far the bass is concerned it's just wow if you're listening to bass packed music. So if you are looking for that detailed music breakdown it's a heartbreak there, and I also happen to get a lag for about .1 or .2 seconds which means gamers I won't recommend these to you, but if you're just looking for casual use I think you can just go for it.Noise cancellation - Actually people have misunderstood the noise cancellation funda in these, so there is no extra feature or a button where you press and get the Noise cancellation mode active, so then what does it mean, whatever they have advertised that is partly correct yes it has noise cancellation but not that at par, it does a pretty decent job though, if you're wearing these then you might wanna press them into your ear to get better results for the noise cancellation part.Price - I got these in a sale price of ‚Çπ1499 on Amazon, so I feel that's a great buy in such a budget, the original price appears to be ‚Çπ1999 however you'll find them at ‚Çπ1700 - ‚Çπ1800 on Flipkart, do remember to check your prices before you buys these.All in all a wonderful product if you're engaged in calls, and casual browsing and streaming videos online, good enough for listening to music, I would suggest a best buy budget friendly.

title: Good sound quality ,Partial noise cancellation,  Terrible mic
body: Pros : *Good Sound quality* Partial Passive noise cancellationCons :*terrible in outgoing audio.We cannot use the mic whatsoever. If u try to record a voice note with this , or call someone  , either it will not be heard at all or will sound like you're standing a mile away even if the mic is right next to your mouth.If it's only for hearing music , go ahead , but don't rely on the mic.

title: A bit disappointed with this ...
body: This is my third boat headphone and unfortunately this one was a disappointment. The previous rockerz versions had the ability to be used while it was charging, which was something that I really cherished.Not to mention the annoying "Maximum volume" voice when the volume level is at max. It should have been a simple feedback (a small beep would be great) and not the entire sentence which blocks what the end user is trying to say, making the use of this in meetings a bad thing.Hope boat addresses these issues in the next release.

title: Seriously amazing battery life with decent sound & call quality.
body: I basically needed a good enough headphone with long battery life.So far, I've never had to hear "oops battery low" in this one even after using it and also leaving it on standby for 4-5 days. Fast charge juice it up to full within 15-20 min after i put it on charge from ‚âà80% battery.Sound quality is decent enough, bass is awesome, and they're quite loud as well.Call quality is not bad either.With Bluetooth 5.0, it won't get disconnected if you roam around in another room with your device lying in a different one.At Rs 1500, it's value for money if you want a longggg battery life and decent sound quality.

title: Lousy headphones
body: I primarily use this headset for my daily bike ride to farm which is full of pot holes , trenches and bad roads. When I listen to music I tend to forget these obstacles and focus on my day to day goals. Day one use was okay. However now whenever I plug this with any of my Bluetooth device, I hear screeching sound just like old days mobile network coverage sound. I tried changing my mobile with other however problem continues. Also if you add another 500rs to will get jbl ones better than this boat rocker. Absolutely waste of money.

title: Serves my purpose
body: I bought these neck bands for one purpose only, for hands free calling. I will say that the neck band serves this purpose. I have never used this for listening to music, and hence do not know what is sound quality, when listening to music. I generally use only the right ear piece, as it serves the purpose of making hands free call, leaving my left ear and hand free to connect with intercom calling, which may happen simulteneously.I did not purchase ear buds, as i was afraid of loosing them within a day or two. these being neck bands, they stubbornly hand around my neck, and hence chances of loosing them is very less. audio is interrupted most of the times, and I cant hear the call continuously. but I am not able to verify, whether this is attributed to service provider or neck band. but as of now, I havent got a single breakfree call. each and every call has broken sound.somehow these do not connect with my laptop, however have I tried. that does not go well. fortunetly I have a 3.5mm ear phones, which serve the purpose. but these neckbands do not connect with laptop

title: It's better than expected....
body: At first I want to mention battery life, believe me I've heard music whole night. Next morning when I woke up with the music in my ear. I quickly check the battery, it was 51% remaining.Sound quality is also awesome with rocking base.Driver cabinets is also small enough to set it up for helmet too...No disconnecting problem so far...

title: Won‚Äôt support the basic operations
body: The hooks and ear buds comes off always and very uncomfortable design, the wires are too long sometimes you might feel you‚Äôll using a wired earphone. The sound quality dropped to low after using it for six months I‚Äôm giving this review. You should be very careful cause of the delicateness of the product. Need to hold it for longer to change the song it‚Äôs even better in normal cheap products.The only thing I liked I can use it over IOS or Android or any other model.It‚Äôs Bluetooth coverage is very limited just inside the single room.

title: Value for Money
body: This product was recommend to me by a friend. Good product and connects easily. Good sound quality and also has long lasting battery. Sometimes I don‚Äôt have to charge it for even 2 days after heavy use. Sometimes while speaking on the the person I am speaking to is not able to hear me. Over all a good product and value for money. Will recommend this product.

title: Annoying Hiss/Clicking Noise
body: Excellent pair of earphones especially for the price of 899-999 (on sale). It has very good range, great sound, IPX7 rating and CVC for clear calls. Unfortunately the right earbud produces a constant hiss/click noise when idle which is extremely interrupting and annoying. Upon reading many other users have also reported the same. Game of Luck I guess.

title: Decent pair BT earphones under 2k
body: I'll break down my review into 4 parts : Sound quality, noise cancellation and calls(mic), battery and ergonomicsSound quality:For the price range of 1.2k, ( I got it for 900 rupees during 2019 Dasara sale ) the quality of sound is pretty crisp. There is a slight overtone to Bass while the other elements are balanced. Personally, I think this balance is perfect. Given the pricing, I'd rate 5/5 for sound quality.Noise cancellation:For the pricing range, I'd say the noise cancellation is pretty decent. Somewhere close to half volume your noise cancellation works seamlessly while listening to music. On the other hand, when I'm on calls, the noise cancellation is pretty poor. People often tell me that they're clearly able to listen to all the talk and noise and honking etc, from the background but not my voice. So I have to pull the mic closer to my lips to be audible enough to eliminate background noise. So, I'd give 3/5 for noise cancellation.Battery:I play music at a pretty low volumes (some 3 button presses lower than half volume) So, the battery can easily last upto 6 hrs. If I'm watching a movie or TV series, it'll last for 7-8 hours. The charging time is pretty nominal. I charge it from 6:45 am to 8:15 am and it would have gone from 0 to full charge. You could charge it with a 2.1 A adapter for a much quicker charge but I don't know if the earphones can handle that current without getting damaged in the long run (read the institution manual). So, at this pricing, I'd give battery a 4/5Ergonomics:I must say, my favourite part is the magnetic lock. It's convenient and you can simply wear it around your neck like a necklace. It's easy to tuck it under your collar and keep it locked when not using. Looks sturdy though I don't wish to test it ! One disadvantage would be that that wire is a little too long and that wasn't necessary. It's bulky and unlike other BT earphones, you can't throw them in a bag, you'll need to be careful where you put it. If the ear hooks are positioned correctly, you should have no pain around the ear cartilage while wearing them for long durations. I wear it 2.5 hrs a day to work and I rarely feel irritated or pain around the ear.  So, I'd give ergonomics and overall comfort a 3/5Combining the ratings for all the above mentioned parameters, the overall eating turns out to be a 4/5 for this pricing which is pretty decent I'd say. Whenever it's on offer (under 1000 bucks) and you want a pair of BT earphones, simply go for it. I can absolutely vouch for it.

title: Good choice neckband
body: The neckband ar very good. The quality of neckband is very awesome, the cables the earbuds and the neckband are looking premium. Tge sound is very loud and bass is high. The sound is ballanced. The noise cancellation is very good.when we plug the earphones the noise cancellation works very properly.The charging is very fast. When i open the box the earphones are only 40% charged and after 5 to 10 minutes i plug tge earphones for charging and after 40 to 50 minutes the neckband are full charged. The one thing that disappointed me is that the playback time of neckband. And the mic is also very good. The Bluetooth connectivity is also good.

title: It's a good buy for less than 1000
