For on call, u need to speak to Mike and it's very clear in close environment didn't test in openCons1. The band slightly loose for running, I am tall and broad but when I run its keeps on shaking near the shoulders and neck.2. In call if you talk with face facing away from Mike call quality deteriorates

title: Its Good if you got Lucky
body: I exchanged my bluetooth Headphones coz They were so Poor in Call Quality and so tanks to amazon they exchanged it within 2 days and the new headset works fine now , in terms of sound or bass quality i was satisfied with the one that i recieved earlier as well, noise cancellation is what youll find at this price is not as good as this one has so yes, the defective one i recieved i was unsatisfied with it but the new onwe i exchanged made me feel Value for my money

title: Not the best wireless earphone if you are looking for awesome sound quality
body: I got this earphone on a Prime Day Sale for 999 INR only. Such a great bargain.So I have been using this for over a month now and this is what I have to say:Pros:1. Price. Get it on a Prime Day Sale or wait for it to go on a Lightning Deal.2. Great Noise Cancellation. I have used it in various environment staring from overcrowded bus to setting beside loud sound and the noise cancellation has never failed. It blocks almost 90% of the incoming surrounding noise which is a great plus point.3. Great battery life. 16+ hours of listening.4. Quite high volume.5. Great form factor and the magnets to hold the earphones together is quite strong.6. Boat provides various ear-cups of different sizes.7. One tap Google assistant.8. The wireless range is no doubt great.Cons:1. Terrible bass. My 350 INR Boat wired earphones have better bass than this one.2. Volume could have been a bit higher.3. Not the greatest sounding earphones. Opt for a wired one if wireless is not a necessity.Conclusion:If you are on a tight budget and looking for a wireless earphone, then this might be it for you but if you want a great sounding earphone with nice bass, then look for other options. Boat is a company which you can trust. They also have a great customer support. Props for that.

title: Connectivity issues after 4 months of usage.
body: Purchased on 20-June-2019BoatRockerZ wireless earphone has started giving connectivity issues since this morning. Now it often gets disconnected and after a few seconds it again connects. Sometimes I have to turn off and turn on to pair againInitially I thought it was because the device was away from the headset and I started holding closer. After several trials, I gave up thinking that could be because I haven't put the earphone on charge last night. But after entire day of charging, when I connect to listen the same issue recurrs.I am now looking for my abandoned wired earphone.

title: Quality product from Boat
body: After using for a week, it's value for money & there is no doubt about it. I basically wanted these for making calls which it is totally capable of without a complaint, so I am satisfied. Sound quality during calls is very good. Looks beautiful, has good built quality & the finally the main quality ie. Sound & here sound quality is pretty good, gives a thundering Bass at above 50% volume & overall very enjoyable listening.

title: Stopped working in a week
body: It just stopped working after giving off a static sound in 2weeks. Boat speakers used to be good but now with its rampant orders across the country and staunch mass manufacturing facility it forgot to encase it's products with the quality it was once renowned for. Terribly disappointed. Never again will I buy another product from boat.

title: HORRIBLE
body: The product purchased was working fine, but after a month only one side of the headphone started malfunctioning. Although the product is covered under 01 years warranty, No one is responding to the complaints. Customer care number is not working, emails are not getting replied, online complaint status is on progress mode since past 10-15 days.

title: Mic is not good, background noise
body: Writing after a week‚Äôs use....If you are looking for an earphone to make phone calls forget this one. The mic picks the background noise. The listener at the other end of the call hears more of the background noise than the speaker‚Äôs voice. I bought this one to take long office calls. Turned out to be a bad choice.Battery life is good.Sound quality of the earpiece is good. So if your purpose is only listening & not taking phone calls this is an ok one. But for that purpose I believe you may find a cheaper one.

title: Perfect companion in all circumstances.
body: Built quality, Sound Quality, Noise Cancellation, Voice commands, Call quality everything is just perfect BUT biggest drawback is Battery backup. When 60% left and you start using within few mins it directly falling to zero. Which is really pessimistic. However it takes couple days of moderate usage to reach 80% so overall it's a bang for buck. I strongly recommend to go for this sportive wireless headsets.

title: Amazing product at affordable cost
body: Writing review after 4 months of usage.Instant connectivity, however i find the power on and off voice notification irritating.Charging and charge hold is good. Gives 3 hours approx. talktime in 20 mind charge. I found this useful.  Full charge gives atleast 6 hours of usage (used it more than couple of times when watching series).Noise cancellation is good, voice clarity is nice loud and clear, however is sometimes bassy like the person from other end is talking in a hall., Maybe something to do with the network.Music is above average. Had given 5 stars for music and bass but after 2 months of usage i found the volume drop i.e. even when setting the volume level at it highest level, the output is not that heavy as it was in first two months. Though checked all my phone settings, nothing has changed.Bluetooth connectivity, and range is seamless and fantastic.Overall a good product at the price offered. Surviving the lockdown using this for my office calls and evening movie time.Will recommend this product who is looking for an above average quality at an affordable cost. Don't expect too much for music, for voice calling a best available product.

title: It's great 'but', Not actually!
body: No doubt about the product. The quality of music and it's bass will never disappoint you. The only thing that is extremely disappointing is it's Bluetooth connectivity, So it comes with Bluetooth 4.2. You can never enjoy music in an open area where it's airy, Cuz that creates hell lot of disturbances while listening to music, I have used Bluetooth 4.2 earphones before this is the worst experience I ever had, The audio stops for more than 3 seconds if it's really windy. And it keeps on interrupting. You can only have a great experience when you're in a room. Plugging in the earphones and riding a bike is your worst decision (first of all it's not safe, 2nd of all, You can't hear a thing of the music or a voice in a call). So I suggest people to go for Bluetooth 5.0 only! If you want seamless experience. I'm not sure boAt has any device that has Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity.

title: Best in Class Bluetooth Earphones Under 1K
body: These are best Bluetooth Earphones available in market till now if you grab it in 1K in any sale of Amazon.*The Sound Quality is fabulous.*The body of band is plastic build but it's very durable enough,no need to think about it's toughness.*It fits in üëÇ perfectly without giving pain to your ears.*The connectivity is also decent, it can pair with 2 devices simultaneously (laptop & smartphone) , whenever you turn it on, if the last paired device is near to it, it will connect to it quickly.*It supports Google assistant or any other you use in your smartphone.*And guess what it even works pretty well with your keypad phoneüòÖ.*Battery life is decent as well (will easily last for a working day on a full charge)*Bass is definitely the best in this one.So if you are looking forward to buy a Bluetooth Earphone for the first time , you should definitely without any thought go wmfor this one carrying the Brand name of BOAT & many good user reviews/experiences like of mine.

title: Amazing sound, awesome connectivity, disappointing battery
body: Undoubtedly quick Bluetooth connectivity.Portable light and affordableVoice quality is good, liked the neon colourSome issues I wanna discuss in detail1. Earbuds don‚Äôt fit in ears, there‚Äôs no extra pair of earbuds lock, you loose them quick, it‚Äôs kinda cheap material2. There‚Äôs no noice cancelled support and pre fed boat rockers dialogue are annoying3 pretty bad battery! Doesn‚Äôt stand whole day gets drained in like 2 hours of constant music playingRest everything is fine! Battery is disappointing

title: A decent bluetooth neckband from boat
body: Here is my review for boat Rockerz 255 pro ( blazing yellow ) . Got it for Rs. 930. Its original price is 1399. If you are getting it below 1k go for it otherwise its not worth it. If you're in a tight budget then only go for boat . Otherwise go for brands like realme, oppo, Mi, OnePlus, Dizo etc.  Okay here is my in depth review explanation.1. Build quality - 3/5.The neckband is made of decent quality plastic. The ear phones are made of metal and has magnets to stick together without falling.2. Sound quality - 4/5.Im satisfied with the sound quality . It produces good bass , and clear vocals even at high volume. No issues with it. It supports AAC which is not that good, doesn't feel the difference.3. Battery life - 4/5.Battery life is good. Gives around 5-6 hours at 80% volume. which is pretty good.4. Call quality - 4/5 .Im not a person who take much calls in this neckband  Call quality is good and nothing to complaint. Both ends are clear.Pros-1. Sound quality is good.2. Latency is very minimal.  In BGMI and most of the games the latency is less and playable. Nothing too bad to complain . The gameplay is playable with it.3. Battery life is good. And charging is also pretty fast . Can be charged in 1 hour.Cons -1. For the price 1399 its totally not worth it.2. The wire length from the neckband to the earphones is a bit short . If you are in a situation to raise your head the band will lift and give a uncomfortable feel.3. These band is more than a year old since its launch so its a bit outdated.4.  No call vibration alert. If you are a person who takes lot of calls you need to reach the phone to know who is calling.5. Joining the earbuds will not pause the content which is a bummer at this price point.  Hope this review will help you to decide . Will update if any good or bad things found about the band. Thank you for reading.

title: Didn't Even Last 4 Months!
body: These earphones are of pathetic quality. These got delivered to me in August 21 and I am writing this review in November 21. The issue right now is that they get switched off automatically again and again while you are in the middle of a call, watching a video or listening to a song and it is so annoying. The company that seems to be manufacturing this seems to be just interested in fleecing the customers with a low quality product, so its my request to anyone reading this review to not to buy this product.

title: Very good for a normal user
body: If you are person who cares less about high quality precision bass, treble, outputs and are looking for a neat and practical wireless headset, this is for you.This is such a neat no nonsense headset. The bluetooth connectivity is pretty quick, the range is good enough (keep your phone and move around, it works well. The drop was imminent beyond a good 30ft. It happens with most of the budget gadgets. But why walk a point beyond?This was bought for my FIL. He enjoys it. It's easy for him. Light, easy to fit in ears. Nice quality sound. Good mic. Good battery life. So it's a go-go!

title: Fantastic
body: Boat Rockerz 255Pro+Pros:-1. The bass is amazing and the quality is excellent. The 10mm drivers work really well.Music is just pleasant to hear and the vocals aren't suppressed which is a good thing.Signature Boat sound quality, bass is the best, mids are well balanced2. Call quality is excellent.. the mic on this headset is good and gets the job done3. It's very comfortable and light weight4. The quality is excellent and the wires feel really sturdy. Probably the best quality that you can get at this price..5. And the battery is just mind-blowing!!It's so awesome that this headset is unstoppableI thought that battery might not be this good bcz of how good the music output was, but no prob, this headset is an easy 2-3 day machine even on heavy usageYour phone will run out of battery before this oneüòÇ6. Bluetooth 5, the connection is seamless and you can literally connect to 2 devices simultaneously which is amazingI can switch between 2 phones or 1 phone and laptop7. IPX7 rating- just don't worry about it's water resistance, it's beyond amazing, best for workouts8. Fast charging- it supports Type-C charging which is a relief. And it charges very fast with my phone's fast charger.Like they claimed, 10-15min charge is enough for a day..9. The pricing- you get so many features in one headset but the pricing is really mind-blowingI got this for Rs.1100/- in sale but blindly consider this product as the best under Rs.2000/-I'd buy this even if it was priced Rs.2000/-That is how good it is..10. Noise cancellationIt comes with Passive noise cancellation and it's goodCons:-1. Treble isn't the best (it's a typical boat headset problem, not the fault of this particular headset, so don't worry, I'm just mentioning it)It's good but not the best and not much people care about it..2. No app supportI wish it had app support like realme headsetsVerdict:-This has so many pros and it works fantastic. I can't believe how good this product is. A reputed brand and a fabulous product..Just go for this one..Thanks boat for such an amazing productTotally worth the money..

title: Not good not bad (but they are lying about the water resistance)
body: Pros- Very good battery life, good bass for bass lovers, good design, fits good.Cons- Audio lag in high-end games, can't handle even a drop of sweat, that ear fin thing is way too annoying, it not smooth to connect to a second device if you are already connected to your phone, the buttons are user friendly.Conclusion- If you are looking for a gaming earphones or earphones for running, workout this is not the one, if you are looking for something casual earphones, a long battery life, bass lover you can go for it but KEEP IT AWAY FROM WATER OR SWEAT. THEY ARE TOTALLY LYING ABOUT WATER RESISTANCE.

title: Sound quality is best and clear.
body: I am using this earphone for the last 1 week and so far everything is working absolutely fine. I really enjoyed listening to music and it is comfortable to wear for a long time. The build quality is ok. It is all plastic except for earbuds.The sound quality is really good and if you are a bass lover then you are gonna enjoy it. Overall, it is the best wireless earphone to buy.P.S - I will update my review after long-term use.Update - There are some issues with it (2 Months review).1- There is a hissing sound that is very irritating and you will hear it clearly during night time because there are no environmental sounds at that time.2- It sometimes gets disconnected while using and sometimes don't get automatically connected at all.(Already paired)3- If you are connected to one device (let's say Laptop/Desktop), then you can't connect it to another device like a phone. (Both the devices are already paired. I am connecting them one by one and dual pairing is giving issues.) It gets connected on vice versa. (First phone then Laptop)

title: good deal at this price
body: I got it @ 999/- on the day after i ordered it. Sound quality is not the best but good, extra bass is available which somehow destroy the lows and mids. but decent at this price range. battery back up is also good. i have not charged it,already used it 3-4 hours at mid volume. Call quality is also good.overall a good package from Boat, you can go for it.only con is the bluetooth range. it is very disappointing. if you roam about in the house keeping your phone on your room the connection gets lost!otherwise it is good overall!

title: Buy if you can compromise a little for sound quality
body: The headphones are good overall but not in every aspect that it offers.Pros:1. yes the battery life. Mind blowing.2. Noise cancellation is good. (or at least i am satisfied with it)3. Lightweight4. Good feedback from buttons5. Good bluetooth range.Cons:1. Not so great sound quality (compared to oneplus) a minute hiss and distortion at high volume levels2. Takes time to switch between devices4. You feel the latency if you observe for it5. Doesn't support aptX as per claim atleast not on my poco f1 which supports aptX and aptxHDOverall i won't say its VFM but a compromised product for the price.

title: Excelent bluetooth earphones for the price range
body: 1. The sound quality & noise cancellation is really good2. Microphones are of very good quality, the person I'm talking to on phone can clearly hear me without any distortion or noise.3. The range is about 10 meters, & the earphone & microphones work even when there are multiple walls in between.4. The battery is quite good, so far I have seen the earphone gives 5-6 hours backup with a single full charge on conference calls. I have not used the microphone till it gets fully discharged, so not sure of the complete battery backup duration.5. The ear guides are a little uncomfortable & creates pain on the ears, but after removing the ear guides I found them very comfortable.

title: Nice product
body: Very nice product. Good battery backup. I get almost 4 day's on continuesly connected to my phone for calls. For full charge it takes around 1.5 hrs but if you charge for 10 min it lasts you for more than 4 hours continues use for music. For calls noise cancellation is not good, your caller will able to here other person's voice too. But Overall good product.

title: Good
body: I am using it for more than a month now.It voice not the best in quality when heard on the receiver end.Good battery back up. I recharge once in 3 days. Excellent music quality. Good bass.But overall very much satisfied with the product. Good service also I think(Their customer service team also contacted me to check about the product)

title: 3 star
body: The range of Bluetooth is very low. It does not work properly if you are in a different room. Sound quality is good however, during calls there is fluctuation. The person onnthe other end of a call always complain about the irritating noise coming from the earphone, which I cannot hear. To confirm it, I asked my friend to record the call. After listening btobthe recorded call, I could hear some sound like tak-tak-tak. My colleague does not have this issue though. I cannot use it for a longer period of time since my ears start having pain.Otherwise, it a good earphone. Good to buy at this rate.

title: Returned my Product...
body: I really rely a lot on reviews while buying stuffs. So I take efforts in writing one to help others too.Well, I was actually blowed out by the near to lakh positive reviews of this headphone. So ordered it without 2nd thot, faced two issues,1. Bluetooth range wasnt satisfactory and 2. Constant disturbance. I assumed that may be mine is defective as I still relied on reviews I had read. So I ordered a replacement. Sadly the replacement looked like a refurbished item with no proper seal and packing. Anyways it was the same as I felt on my 1st boat.Additinally, I ordered sony WIC200 headphones. The experience was different. Advantage was good range of connectivity and soft sound on ears.So to summarise, in a line for people who like bass, mostly want to use it for movies or hear music, BOAT is best in range and for people who want good call range and soft sound for music n movies may like to buy WIC200 Sony.

title: Very durable product
body: very durable and long lasting headphones ,value for money a trustable product. Even have tried many expensive headphones I want to plant to get this for a temporary purpose. Now it became my daily use headphones.It's amazing that how board can give search quality product for such reasonable rate you can trust this I am using this for almost a year now it's so good and very believable and durable I used to even sleep with this for many nights it never had any breaks are cuts till nowrefuse headset very preferable for gym and other physical activities

title: The ‚ÄúBoat‚Äù experience !!
body: I feel they are the best in the business. They have come out with exceptional quality, awesome product at the exact right price point. Awesome accoustic experience is what Boat provides and i would go so far to say that they are the Bose of their price point. I have been using Boat rockerz 250 in the past and those lasted well over 3 years while delivering exceptional music experience throughout. The battery started to give way after 2 yrs but that is expected of all these products. The 255 have better sound quality in terms of bass, accoustic, treble if compared to the 250.The wire is a bit too long for my liking but that‚Äôs probably cause i had gotten used to the short wire of the 250.I am sure these will again last me well over 2 years. My brother didn‚Äôt listen to me and bought noise shotz and he is regretting his decision now. Poor sound quality, battery quality, connection issues are some of the issues with the noise shotz.Everyone should give them a try once.I had skullcandy before and they were replaced by the company 4 times in the first year while the warranty was active and i had to throw them away after the warranty expired as the 5th piece also malfunctioned. The Boat experience though has been an awesome soundblowing experience.

title: Buzzing sound
body: Sound quality is not so good .. always a distorted sound is the background like a radio ....bass is super great ..but that buzzing sound make it distorted and yes they cause pain on the ears and then into the head ....

title: Boat head
body: First of all..,If you are looking for a good Bluetooth headset go for this one.The product is amazing and very pocket friendly, thanks to amazon for the discount and speedy delivery. Was Not very sure about boat headset but this one surprised me..Battery backup is awesome and also displays the battery level on the mobile phone to which is connected.Amazing bass quality and refinement in the audio clarity overall a very decent and good product. Last but not least this carries one year warranty.

title: Genuine Reasons to go for Boat Rockers 255 pro
body: The product is really appealing in its design.Its weightless. The colors in which the earphones comes are really pleasing. Easily chargeable and holds charge for more than 6 to 7 hours.Its highly user friendly. The earphones are well positioned in affordable and normal price range by Boat. I am able to experience high quality sound. It's highly useful for fitness freaks. In my opinion, I would definitely suggest this product to experience immersive, good quality sound during intense workouts. It really keeps me upbeat and focus on my morning walks and intense gym sessions in evening effectively....!

title: worst sounding headphone with long battery life
body: do not buy this headphones expecting good sound quality its a cheap headphone built with big battery.i have used oppo enco m1 and found it extremly good in case of sound quality but it has latency problems.boat is good in dual paring and latency deparment and not to mention the big battery but boat are the worst sounding headphone in history of mankind

title: It's incredibly fantastic!!!
body: I've been using it for over a week now, almost continuously. It really lasts for 40 hours. To my surprise, as they claim, 10 minutes of charging really make it available for the next 10 hours. Before this, I've used many Bluetooth, including JBL, Sony but this one works as it claims. I'm more than happy. It's really worth the price. Rather I would say it's a steal. Noise cancellation works well. I would definitely recommend it.

title: Product has with wrong sound frequency details in manual with marketing gimmick.
body: Product mentioned in manual it is 20hz to 20khz but it's actually it's not I am sound engineer I know what's the real frequency of 20hz to 20hz. Product actually have bass boosted you can't listen more than 1 or 2 hours. In the end product is sturdy but with wrong sound frequency as mentioned. So I am not satisfied with it. Bass lover can loved it. But my experience with this product I didn't recommend who Love overall music presence.

title: If you want to buy a Boat bluetooth earphone then you go for it .
body: Sound quality is amazing......battery quality is very high. I purchase this bluetooth earphones 5 days ago till now it's charge lvl is 80%....it's so amazing. Only one problem is extra earbuds feels or make irritating in ear otherwise all is good till now  .Boat service center also helpful......it's depends on location wise....if you Are  out of area ( service center ) then boat provide you door to door replacement.

title: F**** Notification killing my ears.
body: I dont why they are making such a loud(FULL VOLUME) notification for each and everything like."You are connected to rockers 255 pro"" you are Disconnected/ connected/ ready to pair" at full volume.Dame it. not satisfied due to this issue.

title: Value for money
body: Just got this and I must say that the build quality is great. Coming to the sound it has really good bass. Can't comment of the battery yet as I just got it. I will update the review later after checking the battery backup.Edit: So, after using it for few days, the battery easily lasts for a day and half a per my usage which includes 1-1.5 hrs of music, one movie (1.5-2hrs) and one episode of Tv series (40-50mins). I end a with 40% battery left as per above usage.

title: Good Device
body: It's good product while traveling.Good sound quality, and noise cancellation.The good thing about the device it's goes OFF after certain time if not used and when needed can switch it back ON and gets connected to phone automatically.Good battery back up, approximately 8 hours(continuous-non stop-use) on including calls, videos, music player.But the draw back may be on calls, the person on other end hears the other noises around us than what we speaks.Other than that device is good and perfect.

title: Boat Rockerz 255 Wireless Bluetooth Headset
body: I found the performance of the Boat Rockerz 255 wireless Bluetooth Headset is fairly good. The sound at lower volume is quite good but if the volume is increased there is a slight distortion. The noise cancellation is not very good but it is tolerable. However in this price segment I think the overall performance of the headset is satisfactory. Those who want to go in for a Bluetooth Headset they can try this.

title: Great wireless earbuds but doesent really do well with sweat and rain or moisture
body: the brand says it is sweat proof ...... i do not feel so i took them for a run for some functional exercise and they give up after a week or so as the sweat seeps in the control pad of the earphones..........that is the only downside to these but they are great sound wise, quality wise really light weigh can go up to for 6 h really great headsets for a price such as that, would really reccomend these if you are not into heavy sweating ....... really great for normal day to day life usage but have to be careful as to not folding the  wires of the earbuds....as the wires withing it gets bound and then the device is disfunctional

title: Great value for money
body: These wireless earphones were just amazing. Fits really good and sounds good! Compared to OnePlus bullets bass edition, it has better battery life and bass is little more pronounced. Whereas OnePlus provides magnetic On/off feature and good premium silicon tip instead of plastic, however the wire is  more fragile. At cost difference of Rs. 1200 of boat and Rs. 1600 for OnePlus, boat rockerz 255 pro+ were truly value for money! Just keep in mind that OnePlus has a little better sound latency and hence kinda better for gaming. However I will not recommended any wireless earphones under Rs.2000 which is good for gaming.

title: Nice earphones with some problems..
body: The headphone is great, but it loses track in between and then behaves wierd.I usually use it to watch movies and sometimes it loses track and the voice breaks. Also delay keeps getting added to the signal. Have to disconnect it form laptop or mobile and then restart the earphone. Upon reconnection after restart it behaves fine for some time, but again the same thing keeps happening.Hope the manufacturer does something for it.It lasts decently long once charged.Sometimes my ears pain after using it for 3-4 hours.

title: OVERALL its awesome . . . but this BEEP
body: the product is all over good in this pricei got it in freedom sale for ‚Çπ999sound quality is awesomebass is also goodno connectivity issuesno discomfort to the earsbattery backup is of 6-7 hourscharging time is 1.5-2 hour for full chargeyou can use them for half hour after 10 minute chargingbut . . . the only thing i hate about these earphones is their BEEP soundevery time i play a video it beeps if i pause the video it beeps and on instagram while scrolling posts if a video comes up it beeps there also and on next video post it beeps again and while scrolling stories on snapchat/insta it beeps there alsoOVERALL its awesome but i hate this BEEP

title: Not worth...cheap quality
body: The left earpod started giving the crackling noise just after the return period got over... and after that it completely stopped. Not powering on, not charging.. Warranty claim and replacement is not the solution...Product quality needs to be reviewed, recalled, replaced and relaunched with issues fixed... I just wonder how can Boat do such a shoddy job

title: Good quality phones at the price
body: Got delivery on the same day but it had some issues with charging. Requested for replacement and Amazon was kind enough to replace the item in no time. The quality of reception is good and I can walkover my entire house without much of disruption in the signal quality. The battery life also good. It charges very quickly and lasts for a long time of phone calls/music etc. Overall a good quality of phones at a reasonable price

title: Bad Quality Plastic
body: The quality of sound though is acceptable the durability of the chipset casing plastic is not very appreciable.The plastic casing housing the Bluetooth and sound control chipset broke /detached in two within one 2 months of using the Charging port alone (Inserting cable.tk port) ,which is necessary to use the earephones.I mean I think it is necessary for the most important component of a Bluetooth earphone to have maximum durability in general but , when it breaks just by inserting the charging cable that's a bummer even against earphones cheaper than this.

title: Good but needs few attn to details
body: After a month of usage - headphone is good but has few issues like once disconnected, it takes 2 attempts to reconnect. If phone is restarted, pairing has to be done again.Otherwise the product is good with good bass, and ear sound. The voice call is also really good.An adjustable strip would have been good bcos if you fix the earphone in one ear, the other side tends to hang more on other side and have to keep adjusting in between

title: Maybe good enough at Rs. 899, but performance is sub-par
body: I purchased the navy blue edition about a week ago at Rs.1499.The magnets were pretty weak and the sound quality was dismal, especially at higher frequencies. Although the bass is kinda punchy, the audio wasn't smooth. I experienced higher latency on Netflix on my PC, although that wasn't the case on my phone. I returned it as soon as the price dropped to Rs. 899. I ordered the active black this time around, and the same issues persisted but worsened. I got it replaced with the exact same item but to no bliss.I am finally returning this product and going for Rockerzz 330, which is currently available at Rs. 999, and it seems to have bettered the sound quality issue along with a slight improvement in the magnetic field strength of the buds.

title: Very basic wireless headphones
body: Got these in sale and very disappointed. I had earlier JBL wireless headphones and they were of very good quality then I lost them. Saw ad of these wireless headphones in newspaper and decided to buy as I already use Boat 400 which are awesome but I got disappointed with these, I have to speak very loudly in order for my voice to reach the other party (which looks very weird in public) and I feel that quality is also not upto the mark. Amazon I feel knew about this and thats why these were on sale and non returnable.I am now stuck with them and I DO NOT recommend that you buy these at all.The band got cut on its own where it‚Äôs connected with the small box thingy.Thanks.

title: Product stopped working within 2 months
body: Bought this for 1000 bucks for my Dad who goes regularly on morning walks. Dad liked it initially but within two months it stopped working as it never switches on. Keep in mind that he would have used it for not more than 10 times.Though it is still under warranty, there is only a single service center in Hyderabad and it is like more than 35 kms away from my place.Glad that I wasted just 1000 bucks coz I have so many other audio systems (home theatre, sound bar) requirement for my new apartment and this experiment means that I will stay away from boAt brand.

title: Best device
body: Best among the competitors, even better than other bluetooth devises which are double or more in price or so called branded products.Good audio bass, all day batterySays it's splash proof, but I had forgotten it on my garden and it withstand all the rain in night and worked totally perfect after drying üëçüèª

title: EXPECTATIONS and RATINGS are MORE THAN its ACTUAL PERFORMANCE
body: ##READ IT BEFORE U BUY##SOUND QUALITY not absolutely like HD.. Its Good as compared to others models or companies at the price u get.You need To do a lot of tweaks with eaqualizer in the device.So i didn't like it. TREBLE IS LOW, MIDS ARE BIT GOOD BASS IS SUPERB BUT SUPRESSES ALL OTHER THINGS AND GIVES UNPLEASANT SOUND.NOISE CANCELLATION not as per mentioned on the case. We still hear the things like TV @16VOLUME, HORNS OF BUS, LORRIES AND AUTOS. which actually disturbs ur feel towards music.BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY... Its quite disappointing that even the phone is in my pocket the earphone shows some lag and complete loss of music for few seconds.. It never happened with the other two products i owned. (ALREADY I HAVE BOAT STONE 1000 and ROCKERZ 600 they are awesome in all circumstances at their price).BOAT AUDIO is very good at aggressive pricing and quality but this product disappointed me.****SO I RETURNED BOAT ROCKERZ 255...****

title: Boat is not provided genuine product as well as service. Dont buy boat poduct
body: product is average just not more and warranty and feedback service of boat is very unfair . I have get defective product like it battery power appear 60% after few minutes it show low batter as 20%  so that try to contact boat service care where she replied like you have send this product to our only service center located in ahmedabad only on center in Gujarat as well as same in other state also and both sending and returning courier charges paid by me sich terms and I have get this product after 10 to 20 days back after repair or replaced . so that i contacted boat's official E-mail but not got any feedback. so that I suggested don't buy this Boat product becoz they not provided genuine product as well as customer oriented service also . wasting your money .

title: The most irritating messages played by bluetooth device
body: "You are now connected to rockerz 255 pro" - the device keeps playing this message every min during the call. Even when I answer the call, instead of connecting the audio of the call immediately, it plays this message and then connects the audio. In those 3-4 seconds, we can't hear the other person. Another irritating message that is continuously played is "Maximum Volume". It keeps playing this message every 30 seconds during the call until I reduce the volume. In short, if you are looking for a hands free for the calls, don't go for this at all. You will hear rockerz ads more than the other person.

title: Good product!Go for it.
body: 2 days review: Upto now its awesome. Bass is too good.(But if you are melody song lover then MAY BE you won‚Äôt like this product). For loud and bass loving person its the best.Sound quality is 90/100Bass is 95/100Comfort 99/100Noise cancellation 95/100Bluetooth connectivity 100/100Mic quality 99/100 ( At the time of buying I was worried about mic quality as many people said its not good but its good no-one complaint about my voice while talking on phone).When more than 1 lakh review gives a product 4 stars than it will be most likely a decent product.At this price range it deserves 5 stars for bass , connectivity , comfort , noise cancellation and sound quality respectively.I have used many headphones but at this price range its the best.Go for it.

title: Amazing Product !!!
body: Finding a bluetooth wireless earphones is always difficult when you have so much options available.I have gone through every single video for almost all of the wireless bluetooth earphones under Rs1500 and came to the decision of buying this product.So, the product is almost perfect in every term.Design & Build Quality : 10/10...SuperbFitting : 9/10Audio : 9/10...The bass is very good with highs and lows are also very good. Felt bass is kind of on the higher side but sound is a bit on the deeper side in my opinion.Loud: 10/10Battery : 10/10...Used almost for 3 days without charging for normal 2-2.5hr usageEven bought Infinity(JBL) Glide 120 earphones for comparison but this boat one is more clear in almost every aspect.Genuine Music Lover so consider if these reviews are of help.

title: NA
body: This is after a month of regular usage at gym.  Sound clarity is good. Bass is good. Battery backup is nice. Noise cancellation is also good. The only issue with this is the range. Too short. Even if there is some pillar in between, the sounds breaks. Except that everything else is fine. As long as the phone is very close by, this works good.

title: Awesome Sounds Quality
body: Sound Quality is Amazing. We can hear and separate each and every music instrument.We can hear the even very low bits of every instrument separately.Bass quality is awesome.Bass and Treble Balance is perfect. The Ear cannot ache after long time use.Mic is very sensitive. Even on High way with full of wind and even we wear helmet, the crystal clear voice can be listen on ther side.No noise issue.I recommend to buy 1000 times..

title: Well, A product that value for your money...
body: This earphone is a good product in this price range and it's running good. Although some minor issues I have felt in this product and one of them is convenience. There is a knotch above the earbud which is helpful to fit the earplug in the ear, but some people may have different structure of ear and for them it will not for well eg. one of my friend.Another issue was there; just after reaching the battery level to 20% it starts disturbing telling low battery, and within a few minutes it turned off, I think boat should think about this.Otherwise I'm using this product for couple of months, till now its running well and the sound quality is also good.

title: Pretty Good!
body: I have the wireless on the ear headphones from BOAT (400 I guess...can't remember the model details) for about 2 years and still works well. I am an occasional user of that.But I wanted something for my commute and I was looking for something wireless and with in ear buds to go with my 1+6T. I found these for 1k during the recent sale. Here are my initial impressions1. The sound signature is very very bassy. You need to use an EQ to bring it to your liking. Try listening to a song that has a heavy beat or bass played high to experience your tolerance levels.2. If you use a One Plus 6 or newer phone, go into the audio tuner option in settings and set the 'Sound Enhancement' option to 'One Plus Bullets Wireless's and the EQ preset to 'Pop'. This should balance out the bass and it surprisingly alleviated the mid tones.3. Pairing was east. Long press the middle button and put your phone on blue tooth discovery mode.5. Sweat resistance and durability is something I have to wait and watch as this is just initial days. But looking at the construction quality, I think it should be ok.6. Call Quality - not checked. But I don't intend to use it to take too many calls anyway.Verdict: Good for 1k but not worth more. in fact paying more than 1k and buying something for listening music falls into the audiophile category. For that, you should really invest in an established brand like Bose or Sennheiser.

title: So Claverley designed . The idea of inline mouthpiece is so useful
body: So Claverley designed . The idea of inline mouthpiece is so useful. battery back up is like huge. Overall best buy. I had brought at 1400/- now it became 1300/-. In HDFC credit card it became 1190/-. I don't know why they don't give offer for other credit cards.

title: Best bass earphones at this price
body: So here is my review after 1 month of use1. bass is good and boosted2. sound quality is also nice3. i got these earphones with 100% charging.the conclusion is that i loved it....i found it better than what i was expecting.The built quality is high....in short its awesome bluetooth earphones in this price.i got it at just 950rs on amazon festival sale.So go ahead and buy itü§ó‚ù§‚ù§

title: Comfortable and best in this price range
body: Can't compare with sony or any other branded ones. But in this price it's good. Silicon material good to wear no feeling of like we are carrying it on our neck . Its comfortable having it around the neck due to good silicon material.  As this is in ear canal type speakers we. Eed to really push it inside the canal 1st 1/3.then only we can enjoy real beats and bass. If you wear it superficially sound won't look great. So far battery , durability,sound ,price this is best one.

title: Enjoyed purchasing in 2019, regret purchasing it again in 2020
body: This was a great buy when I purchased it in 2019, since then the price got cut considerably coz of competition, and so did the quality. They've spent more money on hiring celebs, than on product quality.I was so happy with the 2019 purchase that I got it again in Nov of 2020, but this time it did not last even a year, there's no external damage, but the headset started off with regular disconnections without any reason, and now it will only work if I keep holding the power button, like what?I have bought another, but if it has similar issues, it will be my last but from boat. üëçüèª

title: Poor Bass
body: Looks like I got a fake product. Less sound more noise and no bass. Typically not a boat material. May be I got duplicate. I want to return this but due to some emergency I was unable to do so. I lost interest in buying headphones and mobile's from Amazon. Better to give 500 more to shop and purchase a product after carefull observation

title: Two time power-failure and replacement.
body: This is a horrible product. The boat's site says IPx7 water resistance. I bought the product on 13th Aug 2021, took it for a road run, and on 15th Aug, it died. Wonder if my sweat makes more pressure than IPx7. Got it replaced in September and it died again after 15 days during a run.  In past, I bought a cheap Anker headphone that went for 2yrs. But this product is just horrible. Can't replace the product so many times. Probably last time I bought from the boat brand. My infinity headphone is doing great, should have stick to that.

title: Great Product with average battery
body: I have been using this Boat rockerz 255 pro for more than 20 days. Sound quality is awesome. Bass is extremely good and the call quality is awesome. None of the person at the other end complained regarding the voice quality. Everything is perfect except the battery. I usallly used to charge once in a day and it comes for a full day. It comes for more than 5 hours on my usage. One important thing is it charges quick . Within 1 hr it charges full. There are 3 buttons in it. Center button is for On/ off / pause/ google assistant and Volume up button is used for volume increase and playing next song and Volume down for volume down and previous song. Whenever you power on and off it will comes up with a voice command. Often the sound breaks for 0.003 seconds and connects backs automatically.  It's not a cons. I'll hereby provide the Pros and consPros:1. Excellent Sound Quality2. Bass is awesome3. Call quality is good4. Connnects two devices simultaneously5.Build quality is awesomeCons:1.Battery is average2.No auto pause feature when the earbuds are joined like there is realme buds and oneplus

title: Wonderful product, great sound quality and the best battery backup time.
body: Noise cancellation is wonderful during conversation, Microphone is wonderful, even in a noisy background it delivers great sound. and the biggest highlight is the battery, charges fast and standby is over 10 days with 2 hours of talk time each day, and a couple of hours of music / podcast listening.overall a great product and the best value for money.

title: The pros outweigh the cons
body: I am using the Rockerz 255 pro earphone for over 2 months now.After receiving the product, when I first tried pairing it, I was unable to do so as my phone or my laptop was not able to connect to it. I had to manually reset the device (it's simple, look it up online), I was finally able to pair it with both my laptop and my phone.I have used it to attend numerous meetings and interviews, and never had any problems with it. It has decent noise cancellation.While it is true that it can connect to both laptop and a smartphone simultaneously, I personally experienced some audio interruptions while listening to music from my laptop, while also being connected to a smartphone. I never have any such problems while being connected to any one device at a time.I only have to charge it once a day, for only about 30 mins. It's usually connected to my phone for about 12 hours a day, out of which I actively use it for about 8 hours. I have very recently observed a minor bulge on the left box (the part where the left earpiece is connected to the rest of the neckband), so I think the battery is puffing up a bit (I am not sure about this). The performance has not been affected because of this issue, and only time will tell if this will ever cause any problems.Initially, I did not like the audio quality of this device. I do not prefer music with a lot of bass, and it feels like this earphone is specifically designed to just amplify bass in any music that is being played. I tried attenuating the bass using the equaliser in my phone, but that worked only to an extent, so I had to download an equaliser app from the playstore to completely attenuate any bass from the music. Doing that, I surprisingly found that the earphone is very much capable of delivering crystal clear audio. As I am not a big fan of bass, I cannot comment on the bass quality of the product.[Edit after 6 months of use: The battery did end up puffing more over time, and the battery life was affected (as I predicted while writing the first review). Thankfully though, as it was covered under warranty, Boat arranged for a doorstep pickup, took a look at it, and sent me a brand new replacement in just 6 days]

title: Horrible customer service
body: Never buy the boat product, there customer service is pathetic and so is the product. Within 15 days it stopped working and it's been more than another 15 days that am struggling for the replacement. Boat's authorised service center people are rude and there customer service and service center people are not on the same page.As per customer service the replacement is to be done immediately but the service center people ask you to wait for another 15 to 20 days on top they don't give any acknowledgement post taking the possession of the faulty earphone. I have sti ll not received the replacement.NEVER BUY BOAT'S PRODUCT, NOT RELIABLE AT ALL.

title: Good Product for normal use nothing fancy except battery life

title: Defective Product from Boat through Amazon
body: I have ordered many products from AMAZON  but this  time a wrong selection for a Product  from BOATi mean to say about  Boat Rockers 255 sports edition .Got the product today by 1 pm (11Nov)  tried for switching on ,but its not powering on, thought battery low for new product ,so kept for charging  for 1.5 hrs  tried to switch on again  its not powering on..while connecting to charger its showing  bluelight (its means its fully charged), but while removing charger its not powering on.So its clear fact its a defective product. returned the product on the spot to Amazon .Very bad product , i was going through reviews found many of them has faced issue with this producti don't why this kind of product amazon has kept as best seller  and Amazon choice product.Kindly remove this product from Amazon choice their are other best products  than Boat.Thanks

title: Review time..!!
body: I bought this boAt rockerz 255 on my friends suggestion, hez using these for a quit while now say months... Whn i ordered i got a defective one...mic issue...crackling sound, buzzing noise.., So replaced it. Now coming to the review, the sound is OK OK at this price range, battery works fine but the more u use u know the electronic products the work time reduces.. they mentioned 6hrs but for me..5hrs max. Again it depends u see. Easy to use.. some devices tale time to settle as i said my 1st  defective product , ot took min to settle down n give a good sound.. untill thn u hv to bear with crackling sounds buzzing noise..(i said with some devices not all, u shld b lucky to gt a gud product at 1st time or else replace/return). Wire is a bit lengthy though if u dn hv a problm with tht, then its fine. Buttons are on right side so difficult to operate while riding bike as we hv accelerator on right side. Overall OK product at this price... Atleast its better than boult curve band/ boult probass space. And now my friend got an issue with his boAts mic... Hv to see how long my boAt will be in condition.Sound quality  - 4/5Noise cancellation - 3/5Moisture wicking  - 3/5------#---------#---------#---------#----------#----------#------REVIEW ON 8th March 2020Facing some issues with Mic - voice assistants not responding when i say hey/ok google, hey cortana..Charging is okHearing Some crisp disturbnce sounds, sound quality a bit lowered...Very difficult to maintain this band around neck while riding..Sound volume levels got lowered a bit..

title: Only basss it have. My old sony head phone is much better than this..
body: I am using this boat ‚õµ F255pro. After 2 month use i feel that it fitting in ear is not so good. You can not plugin to eat for long time. Shape of ear loop is also not good. Sound quality is ok Bass is High but the actul sound quality of every beat is missing. Only bass bass bass.... My previous sony ear phone was much better than this....

title: Good looks n built but Average Sound
body: This earphone looks really good. But sound quality is just average. Bass is heavy but sound is not punchy n crispy. If sound quality is your priority and you have experienced some good quality earphones then you will feel that something is missing in it.In this case don't go for it.If you are an average user who wants a decent sound and a good looking bluetoth earphone then go for it. Buit quality also seems nice.Noise cancellation and ear grip has no issues at all. Average battery back up. But it charges quickly. Bluetooth range is also decent.Overall a decent product in it's price segment.

title: Average Wireless Headset
body: After using 1 month writing this review.... bit disappointment.. am using this on daily basis when u used it continuously then ears getting pain.. I would say rs 999 wireless headset its average....PROSGood battery life.Fully water-resistant.Decent sound quality.Comfortable, well-fitting.CONSBass and low tones could be better.Utilizes old Bluetooth version 4.1.No storage case included.

title: It gives what it claims!
body: It is a nice product. I use mainly for calls and watching videos. My friends told me the call clarity is better than One plus bullets. Pairing is easy.I think an average person uses his phone for 6 hours only per day, so just have to charge it everyday like we charge our mobiles. It gives proper 6 hours play back, range is as listed. Inconvenience is only that the magnetic function on the earbuds doesn't switch off and on the device as in oneplus. But if you wanna go for earphone under a budget price, I really recommend this. Tip: buy while the product is on discount, we got it for Rs.899.

The logo is displayed on all three sides of the original product, I did not find anything like that on it, it has a barcode sticker but there is an exception.

The quality of sound was still clearer/bass wise/ shrillness wise in the wired one. Still does its job. Able to take calls during my jog with its mic,able to change songs with the buttons on the sides, everything works great.  good one.

title: I can confidently say go for it.üëç
body: See I'm writing this review after rigorously using it for 1 month. So it's my honest opinion on it. No BS.1) Sound Quality is really very good. I personally like it. Now I don't know of others taste. While listening music it feels good as it gives balanced output.2) Among all I'm quite impressed by it's battery life. It really goes on long after continues use I've noticed it & even quickly get charged also once put on charging mode toh anyways battery ka toh muje nhi lagta problem jaldi aane wala h.3) I've handles it in various ways and also put  it in various ways in bags sometimes thrown here and there and main thing I've use it in rain recently for really long time I was riding and suddenly rain came so at that time came to know the quality of it. It's really nice. I've used it in rain for almost 4-5 times in heavy rain although that's different thing that I later on after 10 min covered it because intentionally I don't wanted to damage it.4) When you are riding a bike and if unfortunately you put earphones in ear which you shouldn't do it but if someone does also then the problem is that by air flow the üëÇ earphones get moved away because of air from our body which sometimes make us uncomfortable while riding. So for that you need to tuck earphone's inside your tee or shirt or beneath your collar of shirt to get hold on.5) It's a very light weight earphones don't go on my words you will feel when you take it in your hands.The only thing they should have provided is more earphone buds of various size they didn't gave anything with box.Overall till now I don't have any hard feelings or negative feelings toward it might be because I haven't I think experienced, that's why. Good to go with this product. üëç

title: Too many issues. Not worth the price.
body: This product is good, but not worth the price. I found three issues:-1- bass quality is poor (poor than the boat 225 I used, and regardless of its description saying "extra bass"2- hissing sound on connecting.3- no proper volume boundaries. When it is on vol. 1,2,3, the sound is very low, and increases suddenly when taken to vol 4. On achieving minimum volume, the earphones tell "minimum volume" with a volume which is full I guess. Lol.Overall, I hated this product, and have issued it for return.

title: Best in class but battery backup is low
body: I already had boat rockerz 400 which has good battery backup upto 9 to 10 hours so i brought this for 1299 in an offer.Talking about pros1. It has great design with metal body feels premium.2. If you listen music equalizer than believe me it has some really good bass.3. It has a great connection with i think above 10m which is again great.4. Battery charging is really fast i mean this charges the earphone from 0 to 100 in just 45 mins.5. Sound quality is good i can hear all the instrumental sound clearly.Cons.1. Battery backup is very low at 70% volume it will run for only 5 to 6 hours so to get more battery you need to lower the volume which is not good.2. Without equalizer the vocals and mids are good but bass is very low.The only reason i am returning it is battery backup otherwise this may be the best wireless neckband under 1500.If battery backup ia not an issue for you then you should definitely buy it this is best.It only lost my 1 star bcuz of battery otherwise it deserves 5 star.

Overall I would buy again.Design wise, I like the Boult wireless better than this as the wire tends to hang long down your neck when you are not using the earphones  Otherwise a great product to buy!

title: Good for normal usage, mediocre sound quality.
body: Rockerz 255 pro+ : Using this product since 15 days and the performance is pretty good. The sound quality is a bit low, but again the biggest usp is its battery backup. It goes for about 5-7 days without charging upon regular usage. The range of the bluetooth is also very good and connectivity is maintained within a normal household. The bass is okay, wouldn't say it's great, because the sound clarity goes down on high bass setting. Many times sharper beats are skipped while playing the songs. The only thing which is bothersome is the those pionty silicone attached in the bud, which I removed within two three days because they made buds heavy and were not helpful in any way.Pros: battery, noise cancelling, range, economic price, type c charging, bass, fast chargingCons: sound clarity, ergonomics.Overall worth a buy, if you do not care too much about the sound quality and need good battery backup.

title: Gone in a Month.. Beware
body: Boat started showing its business. Got earphones with brand image. Everything went well upto a month , then one side got off.Yes there is option for warranty. But it doesn't mean that product gets out of order in a month.Bass is not up to mark, as other boat earphones I have.Hope company starts providing complete products,without compromise.

title: A very good product
body: after a month of using it, here is my review.The battery last for about 5hrs of continuous usage. The connectivity over a long distance is better than most earpods. calling connectivity is smooth as any other earphone. And lastly, the sound is soft and easy to listen to, it felt clear and doesn't hurt my ear.

title: Poor sound quality and harmful for ears
body: 1. The sound is too blurry and it's very irritating. It's like you are listening on some loud speaker.2. If you keep the buds in ear and not listening to anything, you start feeling ear pain and headache.3. Not able to use it continuously for more than 20 mins. Everytime I had to remove it, rest and then use.4. The magnet on the bud is useless and its has very less attraction and buds gets detached very frequently. Also the magnet neither stops the song nor it disconnects the earphones. Thus battery is not preserved.5. Build quality is also very poor. The one is received looks like reused.6. Total waste of money.

title: Mic is a disaster!
body: Everything about this product is good except for the mic. It captures everything that is happening around me but not my voice lol. It's kinda funny as well as annoying because during calls you have to either choose a quiet place or simply talk the old school way i.e. directly holding the phone. It seems like these earphones will be great for spies like Mr. bond where he can just stay mum and let his comrades know his location from his surrounding sounds lmao. I am telling you, this product can save people who are in trouble and can't speak while hiding from danger, they just need to call the police and wait for them to deduce where that person is by hearing the noise coming from all around him/her.3/5 for the sorry excuse of a mic.4/5 for comfort and battery.5/5 for music clarity and bass.Overall I'd suggest some other BT product over these for overall better performance.

The range is around 6-8 ft (ca. 244 cm) but in open space it is more than 12 ft (3.66 m). The charge is for 3-4 hrs of continuous running else with my calls it is good for 8 hrs+/ . In last 10 day the right side speaker stopped working. I raised warranty (11 month/12 month) and got a new replacement from service station - while I had to wait for about a week for the service station to get replacement.

title: Very nice buy @ 1000 bucks
body: I am using this for last 2 weeks now. Using mainly for online corporate meetings. I got it in a deal @ INR 999Pros:- Very nice built quality & ergonomic design- Well fitted in ears & also has option for 3 sizes of ear buds- May range upto 5 to 6 metres in absence of any obstacles (Haven't tasted beyond that yet)- Clear & excellent sound quality for songs & videos (For meetings, it depends on your network. But still found it very neat)Cons:- Bluetooth connection & switching devices takes little more time than expected- Battery life is very short than expected But charging is quickOverall:Worth & must buy at INR 1000. It's actual price is INR 1500 now. So you might think longer before booking this & might want to compare above features with other products at this range.

title: Overall Best one. Less noise generation. Battery is 11/10 Yes, beyond the expectations.
body: 40 hour battery backup is mentioned is description but in my case, it lasts 6 to 7 days( on lite use i.e. 5 to 6 hours per day media playback and connected for 10 to 12 hours per day). All products of boat have a common issues , when the wire is rubbing with your clothes or with neck, an unbearable noise is generated. All other features are beyond the expectations but noise generation can be improved by boat. Other neckbands with silicon type smooth material may be the good choice if you hate the rubbish noice. Charging time is also very less. I got it in 999/- after 100 rs cashback (if you pay using Amazon pay then hopefully you can get 10% cashback upto rs 100).Some audio legging is there in these earphones, it can be upto 0.5 seconds. You can notice is easily when watching any video. A bit heavier than the wired boat earphones. Looks are exactly same as shown on Amazon.

title: Genuine Review
body: The boat wired earphones (225) which come at the price of 500 is quite affordable and value for money if u r comfortable with the wires.I found a bit more bass in this product.. . .Bt 1000rs just for bluetooth and a litte bit of bass is not something which I would go for.Rest is all ok...And.. The delivery boy worst ever handling of the product.Kamina mu thhoda aur ladata to pit jata. Jaahil kahi ka. Utterly idiotic behaviour.

title: What else do you want!!ü•∞ü§©ü§©

title: Good bass and good battery backup. Mids and highs are not upto the expectation level.
body: Not for music lovers. The bass is good but I found Mi dual driver wired earphone has better sound quality when it comes to playing songs. I use it for office works like attending Google meets and calls and switching to youtube video in lap to avoid frequent plugging in and out from mobile and lap. Battery backup is very good.

title: All rounder product
body: This is a nice product by BOATEverything is good (music,call quality,bass,treble,instrumental sound,vocals)Only thing it misses is that these earphones misses the comfort in ear üëÇThese are designed for people with kinda big ears but if you will use it frequently you will get used to itOtherwise these are very niceBut not recommended for heavy gaming

title: Good one..
body: I have researched the available wireless earphones in the market and chose this one based on the reviews and YouTube videos. I am using it for my Cell and while watching movies/programs on my Smart TV. I was unable to connect to my laptop due to Bluetooth issues on my laptop. I may have to use dangle on my laptop.Likes -1. Its easy to pair your devices with this earphone.2. Sound quality is good.3. Noise cancellation is good.4. Light weight and stylish to use anywhere.5. It is water resistant (Not water proof, remember). One time, I have used it in the moderate rain as well.6. Easy to carry and not bulky. Provided magnet keeps both earbuds at one place, so it won't be a discomfort when you are walking/running/in Gym and not using the earphones.7. Decent battery backup. I use 2 hours at a time mostly. In a day, I use it for like 3 to 4 hours and I only charge once in 2 days based on my usage. If you use more than that, then you may have to charge it everyday.Dislikes -1. As they advertised, I am unable to pair two devices simultaneously.2. Its an irritation to charge as the battery pin will not fit with adapter at one go. You have to carefully insert it.3. Unable to answer the call via ear phones. You have to answer it on the cell phone and talk via earphones. Same goes for cutting the call.4. Initially, there was discomfort to keep the earphone in the ear for an hour itself (while walking). After that, Its ok.My conclusion - Good one to buy.

title: SAVE YOUR MONEY.
body: After 3 months of usage1. Company claims for an 8 hour battery backup : It‚Äôs not the case, nowhere near. I got these solely for my gym sessions lasting 2 hours every morning. Despite leaving it overnight on charge and the indicator does show fully charged with a blue light, these earphones have deceived me on multiple occasions and the battery didn‚Äôt  even last 2 hours upon complete charge.2. Bass & Overall Volume : I was aware of its low bass prior purchasing, however the overall sound/volume has also fallen by 20-30% of what it use to be. In 3 months, this product has become nearly useless.3. Poor Noise Cancellation/No noise cancellation : You can‚Äôt use these to make phone calls, unless it‚Äôs 3 am at night. Even if you try, the other person barely hears you but everything around you like vehicle honkings, dog barks.Summary : I‚Äôm not even comparing this product to any other brand or any other product of the same brand. Simply the way it worked 3 months ago for which I have given 2 stars, it fails to do so now.So guys, either save your money and skip this or save some more and get something else.

title: Think twice before buying!!!
body: I also own a Bose premium headphones which I think I cannot wear everyday to gym, so I bought this product for my day to day workouts. Comparing it with Bose, sound is not that crisp but for a Bluetooth earphone under 2k it worth it. I really like the beats and sound is pretty awesome too.Full marks for that, but I find it pretty annoying while working out in gym. There is a U shaped clip at the end of which two wires are attached which connects to earphones. The sturdy clip has to hang round your neck all the time. If you are running, the clip might start rotating and that would slowly force one of the earbud come of your ear. Pretty annoying...believe me, you have to turn the clip time and again to hang it around your neck in correct position. Also, while doing ab crunches it will keep on falling back and take both the earbuds along with it.I was mislead with the pictures, I thought it is all wire and no clip but its not. Just wanted to point this out so you dont make the same mistake ;)But if you are not into too much workout and want it for travel, then connection range and awesome beats is great deal.Cheers.

title: Poor quality.. no clear sound
body: This is the worst thing,  i buy at amazon...i already bought 2 earphones of boat rockerz 255 pro,  they both were good but not better than tagg inferno.. still the sound quality was good,  base n noise cancellation was ok...So i bought this earphones,  keeping in mind that they will be of some lesser quality than 255  pro but just after 10 min of use.. i knew they are  like some local earphones... even after with maximum volume on my phone... i m not able to hear clearly... forget about the noise cancellation n sound while i m eating...  i was not expecting the same with boat vompany...either this earphones are defective or this is the inbuilt poor quality... i don't know...I even don't want to use them.. but there is no refund policy... only replacement is available..i suggest everone please do not buy this.. even after that.. i would say avoid boat product... because my boat stone speaker 1000 also show poor performance just after 1 year of very low usage.. Hopefully boat rockerz 255 pro earphones which i bought fr my brother approx 6 months back..  will not show d same poor performance..

title: Noise cancellation not upto mark
body: Ordered this product at 699 (03-october-2021) in Great Indian festival sale of Dussehra received on October 7th 2021It is 5 days now still 60% available.I take calls for 8-11 hours a day as I'm a stock brokerNoise cancellation is poor. Everything will be heard.Bass is good in full volume, but when volume increases battery will drown fast, as it is argued to be best at 40 hours with 50%voulme level.With full volume my brother usually getting 11 hours battery backup.Overall it is a good productI'd rate 3.5/5Only con is noise cancellation.

title: okay okay ... please replace it

title: Good Product

For Music enthusiast bass quality is slightly not up to the mark. But for a general user its the best and Im overall satisfied with the product. I highly recommend the product for day to day usage.

title: Good Product - Can Buy
body: This is a very good product, but if you can buy Boat Rockers 255 Pro,then you should go for that product. It has amazing clarity & is a completely value for money earphone. This is why I was able to give this product a 4 star rating whereas I have given a 5 star rating for Boat 255 Pro..Also, if you are buying this piece, always do that during the sale time as the price lowers down to 999.

title: It's is the best and the worst reasons
body: This headphone is the best but it is fake that it supports apxt it only supports SBC and AAC but mobile gives warning of AAC audio codec may break the audio so some times it gives low quality and if in AAC Mode bass is 6/10 and in SBC bass is 10/10 but if you are playing BGMI in SBC mode it will give a bass effect to guns like m24 and awm and footstep in SBC is 0/10 and footstep in AAC is 9/10 and i recommend to play games in AAC mode which really gives 3D audio and if you want to hear music I recommend keep the settings to SBC and one more thing if you hear the music in AAC mode then you will need to hear there music in 80% volume and one more thing if your are watching video or trailer or games then AAC mode is the best I was watching Trailer of spiderman no way home in AAC mode in full volume I was feeling I was in theater. Latency is very good or the best in AAC mode and worst in SBC and about the quality it may break within 1 to 2 years or within 1 year if you will not use it properly I recommend using boat neckband instead of ROUND CHEAP HEADPHONE OF BOAT

title: Excellent Sound Quality at this Price
body: This is my second purchase of Boat Rockerz 255. The earlier one is being used by my wife. I went to Reliance Digital to purchase some other headphone. I almost finalized on some other product when i got demo of this product. It was way better than what i had planned to buy. To differentiate i listen to the 3D Barber shop video on YouTube. On comparison, this definitely got more points. This is one product i always advocate for. Using it for three month, will post long use review after a year of use. Wires from the unit to ear could have been short though.
