title: Waste of money
body: I purchased these earphones about a year back after reading the great reviews on Amazon. The first thing I noticed is that the bass and noise cancellation were really poor.Initially, there wasn't much of an issue apart from these two things. Eventually, the battery started getting drained very quickly despite charging them regularly. After a few months, I started facing connectivity issues. I had to reconnect them to my phone every few minutes.Overall, I'm not happy with these earphones. I'd recommend the OnePlus Bullets over these.

title: Best Bluetooth neckband
body: After a month's usage,Pros:1. Clear Music, Clear Voice, Good Noise cancellation in Mic.2. Excellent Range crosses 15m radially, I'm using it in a place where there are many interfering devices in 2.4GHz band.3. Good Bass, but not the best4. Connects 2 devices at a time, but plays from one at a time.5. No random disconnection, used for long hour calls with Windows laptop and Mobile too.6. Battery life is around 8 - 10 hrs, depends on call duration, and volume level.7. Comfort on ears, very light weight. Choose earbud size accordingly.Cons:1. I paid Rs.1490/-, while in 5 days price was Rs.1049/- and now again it Rs.1499, so watchout for price before buying.2. Battery indication on your mobile for this device, shows 100 to 80 then directly to 0 sometimes, or 100 to 80 to 60 to 0.3. Charging time is clearly 1hr 40min. Which is 1hr in 255 Pro. Still not a Con hereNote: Do not use while riding 2 Wheeler(not recommended too), Mic area here is exposed to air or else covered up within your Helmet, so the on other side your voice will be heard with lot of wind noise/disturbed/feeble.

title: Excellent for everything you need including casual gaming
body: Writing this review after 1.5 Weeks. This is an amazing product especially the sound quality and bass. On heavy usage (6-8 hours a day) this earphone should last for a week which no other earphone under 2000 can offer.If you do casual gaming then this is okay for you but if you are a hard-core gamer then can't recommend. While Playing BGMI/PUBG the earphone behaved weirdly with footprints but other games like Clash Royale or COC and even Call of DutyMobile this game is amazing (if your phone supports APTX the experience may be better). This earphone also has some kind of passive noise cancelling which is good. It is good for cycling and walking and Bluetooth range is more than advertised. Inside a house the range is 20-25 metres. Outside home in open area the range can go upto 50 metres (yeah I tested it).Mic quality is really good no problem with calls.If I get 50 upvotes I may be updating the review after 2 months.

title: Good, but isn't great!
body: Sound quality is excellent..noise cancellation is great and bass as well..but the problem is with the connectivity..I use these earphones on my OnePlus 7T and this earphone disconnects just beyond 10 ft..One more prob is, when the battery reduces to 20%, it automatically disconnects from my phone on its own! Battery life isn't bad, isn't good either..can run for 6 hrs in a single charge! If you can spend ‚Çπ500 extra, can go for OnePlus bullets wirelesss Z!!Edit: the battery is turning out to be awful as the days pass by. Even when the battery stands around 60%, I get to hear "low battery" indication for few times and it goes off! Bit disappointed!

title: review after 6 month use
body: decent battery lifei am not into heavy bass and awsome sound clarity so i dont care much about music quality. but i can say that one can live the music quality but if you are music buff and looking for some high end earphones like bose or beats or high-end sony in your mind, this is definitely not for you.mic works wellbt connectivity is good and pairs parallelly with multiple devicesbetter than ear buds as these earphone works with helmet and body is also of good qualityi feel comfortable to wear these while workout with the exception of running.while running you should put this inside shirt to avoid the neckpiece from jumping and create annoyance but i never had issue of ear buds coming out of ear during workoutbut sometimes i feel battery life could have been even better

title: The best neckband available.
body: The sound quality is great with 3d surround effect and the color is great. However the main and probably the selling point of this Bluetooth neckband is, it promises 40 hrs of continuous backup, at mid volume when fully charged. And it's not just to say or claim; it delivers that much backup without a doubt. I am a heavy user and still a charge it after 3-4 days. My previous tws needed a recharge almost thrice in two days. So, a relief there and it has dual pairing option too (which was also missing in my previous TWS earbuds). It definitely is a great buy at this price and have purchased a total of 3 for my family members and myself and recommended to one of my friends as well; she too likes and loves it üòú and not to forget about the after sale service boat offers; it's incredible. Have been using boat products since last 2-3 years and had a great warranty experience as well, barring one last year during the lockdown.So, overall it's a good earphone to go with and you will love it for sure üëç

title: Issue with the right side bud
body: When I started to use the earphone, irritating sounds were coming from the right side bud. As the replacement period was not over I requested for replacement and the Amazon team did their best to replace the unit as soon as possible. But now the replaced fresh unit is also began to show the same issue.Irritating sounds are coming from the right side bud. When I gone through the review section many have mentioned defects about the right side bud. So the right side have got something serious issue.Manufacture should definitely look into that.Now I am going to return the product to buy any other brand. Note that sound quality and battery backup are pretty good.

title: Product with gradual defects
body: Boat is building its products to look like stylish and solid. I got this teen green bluetooth earphone which I was happy with the style, decent sound features. But the real problem started once you use the product for sometime. Within 3 months the ear buds, ear support have started become loose and getting out. Now just after 1 year, one side of the earphone has stopped working. So they make these products with less durability and aims for usability of around 1 year max. Then there is no point of buying these well showed off brands...I would recommend not to buy this product if you are looking for a earphone with proper use with minimal problems. You can buy this product for lesser use and delicate usage purposes.

title: Good at what it does!
body: This bluetooth headset is a nice one. After almost 1.5 years of usage, it is still doing a great job.The box contained the boAt Rockers and three pairs of ear-tips ranging from small to large size.The battery life is not amazing but it can suffice for a full working day with a lot of calls and streaming internet content. Battery is still in good shape.It shows battery percentage in multiples of 20. For example, after 100%, it will show 80% directly. No issues with that.The bluetooth range is decent. It tends to disconnect when the device it is connected to is say, a room away.The microphone quality is also decent because no one complained about it.It is certainly not the absolute best in terms of audio quality. This department is highly subjective but, a pure, neutral sound cannot be expected because of the emphasized bass which I enjoyed. The mid-tones and the high-tones tend to get muffled a little bit but then, that's what we must expect from any earphone that has added bass to it. It is definitely enjoyable.There exists latency but it's negligible. One might not notice it unless exclusive attention is paid to the same.If you want that added bass and neutral sound isn't your cup of tea, you can check it out!Noise cancellation doesn't make a major difference because the ear-tips are in-ear style.However, it has a micro-USB port that it uses to charge.However, with the likes of Realme Wireless Buds, OnePlus Z and Oppo Enco in the market, this is not the best buy but it's still a good buy if you're very tight on budget. But 1.5 years ago, it was definitely a great buy.Cheers!

title: One of best budget Wireless
body: Well after using Boat Rockerz 400, JBL, Motorola i bought this one and its defiantly worth buying in this range. Bass is average not too much nor less. Looks premium and best quality build. If you got budget 2k buy any Rocekerz from Boat and must read all details. This one is Good for outside coz IPX7

Boat rockers 255 is super awesome sounds quality ( better than expected ) as they said bass is very good too and even noise cancellation is well define. All i want to tell you that boat rockerz 255 gives double compair to it's price.As many of the buyers said thier box was opened .....mine was perfectly seal. (Sold by : appario retail private ltd.)

title: It stopped working in 3 months!!
body: In less than 3 months this speakers are dead. Cant use them as the battery is dead. goes from no charge to full charge in 5-7 min and doesn't get switched on at all. what a useless product and complete waste of money. Now three months down the line cant return as well.. !!!Thought, boat was a sensible and good company selling genuine stuff... was fooled.

title: Best Bluetooth Earphones !! Go for it. You won't regret.
body: The best Bluetooth headphones I have ever used. The Best in this price category.Pros:1. Unbelievable battery backup. I am getting 1 day battery stand by. I use in office from 9 am to 7 pm then the battery lasts throgh out the night.2. Best fit. The earpieces will not fall out how hard you shake your head.3. Light weight. It is so light weight you can not feel the band on your neck.4. Stylish look.5. Magnetic parts on the earpieces make them stick together.Cons:1. Sometimes you feel like the wire is lengthy.2. There is a voice notification when calls come "incoming call". It would have been superb if the voice notification says the contacts names.

title: Can be better but definitely needs improvement.
body: I had ordered it because I had expected more from it. This is my second Bluetooth inear headphone (first was the old LG HBS 730, mind-blowing device). Anyways, the sound is OK - not bad but not good. Noise cancellation is good, voice call audio quality is clear to the other end, the buttons are good but can be more tactile.My only gripe is that the music audio quality can be better. Bass should be more powerful and the mids, treble should be a bit more clear and refined.Also, I suggest that they should add the two volume buttons + call connect/disconnect button at the left side +  a vibration motor and keep the right side only for multimedia buttons (play/pause/rewind/next/previous).But, since the price was much less in Amazon sale (below 800), it is only fair for the quality we get. I will hope they fix all this and release their next version, even the price is higher.

title: Good earphone but now have problem within 8 months of purchase
body: The product has a waranty of 1 year (My purchase is in July 2019,  now May 2020). My one side earphone is not working now after use of 8 months. I use this mostly for office calls and movie watching. Seems to me not long lasting product.Now I'm residing in Bangalore where Govt marked as Corona red zone, and want to raise a complaint on warrenty. But what i hear is that, we must visit service center for warrenty claims.I'm OK with this but why not register complaint online and then visit center? If the lockdown continued more and i might miss warrenty period to claim the same.Please first take the complaint online and that means the defective product is highlighted and we can then visit the store later for replacement or repair.I'm writing this as a proof of defective product that i have. Also  i spoke to service center (DVG road Bangalore - 09886114663) and recorded the call for future reference.

title: Value for money but quality of material average
body: Good value for money,nice battery..we ca say long battery life upto 40hrs(30-35 hrs medium use,25-30 hrs high use,20-25 extreme use actual)..nice color..nice fittings.ConsWarrenty not covered some places. Registration process is not good in any boat products. so it is not exceptional.. sometimes customer care service is remain silent or inactive.After registration of complaint..pick up service is very average.sometimes almost zero..I am using this almost 3 months but confirmation of registration Emil or sms not received yet...So buy it at your own risk.but product is good.. overall 3 stars.. registration is biggest con..

When you wear it, appearance is not that great because wire hangs around the face wierdly unlike other brands. Not stylish but sound quality is good.

Thus contacted the Boat Service center, they arranged for the pick up and all. However its been over 20 days there has been no update. Despite several reminders over email. title: Product is good, service is worst in India
body: Product is good, works as expected and if and when the product fails to work, please do not, DO NOT ever give it to Boat service center. I am waiting since over 2 months, they do not reply to mails, customer service calls also not fruitful, they just read out status. Very bad experience.On their website, they write #1 service, laughable.Pl get it repaired locally, the product is not worth the wait to get repaired from such worst service center who don't even care to reply. Checkout internet for such customer harassment where many others are suffering.Super pathetic service.

title: Boat - 100% customer heart winner
body: Boat produces best quality products & I appreciate their warranty policy.Just before 10 days of warranty expiry I found one of the ear pieces is not working & I asked for replacement they accepted for repair/replacement. They find fault with the earpiece & they sent me a new one as a replacement.I am very happy with your customer relationship.I will definitely recommend boat to everyone & also I want to purchase ur new airdopes.

title: Good but not best in budget
body: I have bought it 4-5 days ago and i am not happy with this. there are few point noticeable .1) Audio Quality - is Good but not very nice as it have over Bass. so you cant feel the song. you need to adjust the levels.2) Fitting - cause it is light and not flexible this wont stay at your neck. i can drop very easily if you are riding bike or running. also the earbud are very big in size.3) Charging/Battery - i did charged it more then one time for now as its new so i am not sure how long it is gonna work. but i feel that the charging port is only working with its cable only (as it has universal charging port so it should charge with any mobile charger also)overall good but expensive according to its quality.

title: Decent quality for the price
body: This wireless Bluetooth stereo headset is of decent quality for its sizeHigh frequency sound is reproduced fairly transparentlyMid ranges are decent tooLow end bass is a bit boomy for my likingAt first look, the piece is well made and seems durable. Only time and usage shall tell.Do note that the neck band, while being flexible can't be rolled like a wire. So don't buy one of the round cases with the hope of fitting the headset into it.

title: Good product.
body: Overall good quality as expected from boat but nothing wow factor is there.. bass level could be more better.. only battery performance, water resistant level is great. I would recommend to buy rockerz 255 pro which is already available in more cheap price..

title: Best buy under 1500
body: You need not to look for any other product if you are looking for earbuds in this range. In amazon sale I got it for 899/-. I even own wings earpods worth 3999/-Trust me this pair compete with wings premium quality earpods.. Super base, awesome sound quality and excellent notice cancellation with comfortable to ears.. I selected this pair after searching almost 15 items and m happy with this one.

title: Read carefully
body: Please read carefully1. The earphones look good and are light weight but the design of the eartips is disgusting , they are very hard and are not perfectly bended at an angle2. I can not wear them for not more then 1 hr3. The battery is not good as shown I am getting only 4 hrs of playback4. The sound quality is average  it is not of a 1600 rs earphones kinda like the 600 rs realme buds noice. Cancellation is averageSo think twice before u buyAlso I got the left wire tangled and after 2 days it is not coming in it's original position

title: Very good product.
body: Very cheap product. And voice quality is very much higher it displace full voice in ear üëÇ.I have used Skullcandy inkd wireless but the voice is very slow in comparison of this wireless. It comes with 20 min fast charging and cable and 2 extra earmuffs. If you have to fill charge and you have time you have to charge it for 1 hours. 6 hours music playback time continuous upto 10 hours . Power off stand-by time 24 hours. Comes with IPX7 water resistant facility. Very good facility. Light weight sport product. Extraordinary colours. Comes with Qualcomm chipset. Charging compartment is on side that's great. Many versions available in market comfortable design. When an call came on your mobile it says "Incoming call" until you receive or reject it. Backup is very good. One thing is cord have to reverse upside from the compartment in order to make for to adult neck and years. Very great product in cheaper rate.

title: Very good product with one drawback
body: Though it can connect with two devices simultaneously, you cannot use it for same. If it connects with mobile first then it cannot connect with laptop. So first disconnect from mobile, restart Bluetooth of laptop, then you can connect with laptop first and after that with mobile.And for people working from home and taking RDP access of office should not dual connect this with laptop and mobile. There will be 10-15 second latency for RDP response or many time disconnections, if connected to laptop and mobile simultaneously.But yes, sound quality is very good for the price. And battery backup is unbelievable. After one full charge, It lasts for 4 days with 50-60 % volume usage.

title: Boat is worth to money paid
body: Recently I bought this product for Rs 1399, I have received the product one day earlier to the delivery date. The connectivity of the product is good but the range of the product is upto 10 meters. There is no any noise disturbance in the product and the sound quality, bass and the clarity in sound is impeccable.We can connect to two devices at a time, where we can switch from laptop to phone when there is a call on phone.The material over the neck is not much flexible, there is chances of breaking and the wires are bit long.One interesting thing was the delivery boy was using gloves, mask and was carrying a sanitizer in the pandemic lockdown due to Corona virus outbreak.

title: awesome sound and bass quality awesome power back
body: 1- box got damaged i expected it would be fake and already used later when i opend and easily to connect and it connects and plays above 10 mts sound is awesome and bass but i wont say noice cancellation1-for sound ill give 5 stars2-for base 5 stars3-noice cancellation 4 starsfirst of all i like the battery persentagethey mention only 6 hrs play back with full charge but i personally experienced it came 11hrs play back continuously thats why i fiddajust i upset with box damage but any way we wont take any boxnxt when comparing to quality it is awesomeextra earmuffs are came but it is not looking good just old black colour but i had already stylish red earmuffsi attached to that now it came awesome looknx when we compare to charging correctly 1hr30 min it takes but gives 11hrsso i suggest u can buy directlyif u effort more u can buy boat 225 pro i think it would be awesome

title: Best for connecting tv or mobile
body: I'm using it with my fire tv or mobile and it works well, not heavily into music so not sure about bass and other related aspect.While used in mobile call and it perform well without any call cut or any other disturbing voice and no caller raised any issue for voice issues, I also own one other board bluetooth speaker so sound, connectivity and durability is good even here in this device magnetic earphone and wire are of good build.so if you want to use it for tv or mobile viewing and some calls then you can go for it.

title: Great Sound. Poor Mic
body: This is first time I have bought a wireless neckpiece.After receiving the product I started testing it's Sound quality. And it gives awesome sound along with good Bass.But.... When I started calling using this, became very disheartened.Very very very poor Mic condition. To whome I was calling they are unable to listen to me clearly.Then I replaced the item and got the new item. New item also giving the Mic issue.Very unfortunate from a renowned company like Boat.I am returning this product!

title: Good headphone but very bad battery experience. Hope it is replaced.
body: From last one week the battery has suddenly stopped working. It does not work for more than 5 mins and charge does not report above 60% when connected even after 2 hours of charging. It was perfectly fine for 2+ months with around 45 mins of continuous playback time and around 6 hours of standby time. Please replace the battery or provide new unit. I had a lot of hope from BoAt Rockers brand on long and reliable operation Thanks

title: Review after using one month. Consider before buy
body: Review after one monthI bought it in 899rs during sale.good sound quality.Good bass.Noise cancellation is good.Build quality is average. Doesn't give premium look.Keys work fine.Battery is not enough if your using all day.As per my experience it works upto 4 hours. If it decrease to 40% then it will work for 15 minutes max.It's only problem I faced yet.

title: GREAT PRODUCT üëçüèª
body: This is by far the best Bluetooth earphone at this price segment. I have used almost 7-8 bluetooth earphones & this one is best.The sound quality is great, bass is just perfect & above all it has a good noise cancellation quality (many people doesn't go for thia feature but yes it's a great feature to have in this budget).I highly recommend this one to everyone.

title: Useless for jogging, Wi-Fi gets slow down or stop working when it's connected
body: It's not good for jogging! Don't buy, if you want to use it for jogging! I wasted my money for this stupid bluetooth earphones! They start falling down again and again when you start running üèÉüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èI found out new problems with this Bluetooth headset, Wi-Fi doesn't work or slow down when I connect it for listening to songs! üòëüòíüò≠

title: Rocking Sound for a Cheaper Price.
body: I bought it for 899 rs during Amazon Big Billion Sale. Amazon delivered it on time. I am writing this review after one week of usage.*Pros*1. It's light weight and easy to use.2. It can be paired with your phone very easily.3. Sound quality is punchy and it has decent noise cancellation too.4. Call quality over this earphones are great and no one complained from the other end.5. It's cheaper than most other competitors at this quality range.6. It is great to use without the protruding rubber ear petal holder. So, remove it and use.7. The battery with stood almost for 4-5 hours average.*Cons*1. The battery percentage option of the Bluetooth earphones on your phone might show 100% for some time and it may jump to 80% after a while. It can't be trustworthy, because it may suddenly jump to 20% and may turn off immediately. So, never trust this battery percentage option.2. It has a decent range of Bluetooth connectivity, if you move 5 feet away, you may experience sudden dip in the quality of music or call and the clarity deteriorate.3. The ideal charging Ampere is not mentioned in the user manual. People may tend to use high Ampere chargers and ruin the battery.4. "People also bought together" suggestion for a pouch along with this earphones is misleading. I bought that zip pouch and you can't keep this earphones inside that small pouch. Because, the neckband of this earphones can't be rolled or curled or bent.*Final Verdict*Go for it, to experience a decent pair of Bluetooth earphones at this cheaper price point.

title: Cheap price comes at a cost
body: For 999, this Boat Rocker is rock solid. Pairing it to my phone and laptop simultaneously. Google Assistant works but to ask to play music you have to unlock the phone. Will review the battery life later which seems promising for my usage. The earbud and hook also fit in my ears properly.Update: After 7 months of usage, the charge port malfunctions, and now after fully charged, it just won't start.  I was hoping it to last at least a year.

title: Bass based headphone
body: Boat Rockers : Mainly concentrated on heavy bass in equalizer bas mode is excellent. But other modes are just like normal headphone sound. Battery back up excellent i mean on full volume [100%] exactly gives 6hours music playback. And normal very low 30-40% volume gives playback upto 9-10hours. Disadvantages of all Bluetooth device is need to charge every day we don't have enough time to charge our cellphone these days who else will plug both device and Bluetooth headset at a time for charging. Please go for wired headphones.

title: Only One side is working at the end of 7th night
body: Bought it recently, got it delivered on 7:30 pm 17th Nov, 2021. Using it since then working fine. But all of a sudden only right side of earphone is working and left side is not working anymore. No physical damage, no mishandling, used it 5 mins earlier it was fine and at the very next moment its gone. I feel like being cheated to be honest.The funniest part is I never thought of returning it even though its music quality is not that good, but now I had to, so when I checked the returning policy today, Nov 25th, the window gets closed last night only, Nov 24th.I mean is it planned or something!!! That with 7 days return policy item it will work fine till 7 days only? I am feelings so cheated now can't say anything.I request Amazon Customer Support or Boat customer care to help me out in this. I don't know where to go now.

title: Wifi Reconnecting Issue..
body: If our phone is connected to both wifi and boat blutooth headset, WiFi automatically disconnects after the phone detects boat headset and later WiFi automatically reconnects...and this goeson. I don't know why this product has reconnectivity issue ... review after 10 days of purchase.. If there is any option to return the product definitely i will return this Wifi cancelling product.

title: Okay but need few tweaks.
body: Some disturbance always comes through speaker after hearing some message tone or some music. I don't what it is. It's kind of some electric leftover pulse discharged a some kind of sound through the speaker.Also when ever I cut the call, automatically music starts. Where I never played a music before the call.Rest is fine. Bluetooth connectivity is good. If we receive a call in one mobile and cut , it automatically switches to other mobile if any call is waiting there. That I really loved.

title: Absolute Garbage
body: Received the product with a broken seal. The box inside was dirty and the battery was dead. Charged it up and paired but sounds terrible. High bass and treble. Bought it as a gift. I'm unable to return it for a refund. It's only offering a replacement. I'd rather discard this and forget about it instead of getting a replacement. Please stay away. and the delivery guy tossed it inside my house when we weren't home.

title: Good one ‚ô•Ô∏èLoved it
body: The color looks same in the picture shown and also looks classy. It has good noise cancellation. It‚Äôs definitely a go for those who are looking for a BT at this cost. Sometimes if I wear it for too long it‚Äôs paining, like more than 4 hrs or 3 hrs . It has a very good grip and not falling of frequently.The best part about this headphones which I like is that it has a auto sensor to power off the headphones when it is not connected to the phone.

title: not a very great item
body: while the sound quality is satisfactory, this earphone is very poor in terms of connectivity. even with the mobile in hand, the bluettoth connection keeps breaking. the battery indication is also very superficial. just after 60% it suddenly goes down to 10% within 10 mins  the shape of neckband is also not very convinient for use during jogging. it tends to come out . overall it is not a very great product for the price. ine must try sony or even mi.

title: Poor battery... Think before buy
body: I am a regular customer of Amazon and I bought this Boat rockerz Bluetooth headset after seeing some positive reviews and Indian product.  But unfortunately it is a Chinese product and imported and  repacked in India. Sound quality,  noise cancellation etc are good but the real drawback is battery.  You have to charge multiple times in a day to enjoy this headset otherwise it is of no use.  This is biggest drawback of this product.  Better to buy a wired headset instead of this.An honest buyer.Thanks

title: Good Buds for the price But Extremely poor customer service
body: So i have used this bluetooth headset for a month as my daily driver, left side speakers just stopped one day while listening to music so i logged a complaint with customer service and they came to pickup the defective one in next 2 days, after that from last 15 days i didn't heard back from them, even the customer care numbers is useless since nobody picks up the call there. till date i have not received my replacement or repaired headset. overall good headset considering the price but extremely pathetic customer service towards customers from OEM, I would suggest rather go for Phillips, Sony, Mi or any other reputed  brand since they provide excellent customer satisfaction.

title: So far absolutely PLEASURE to own these pair of earphone!
body: I have been using this earphone since a week now, the overall experience is just superb. Few advantages below:  - It easily get connected to 2 devices simultaneously  - amazing noise cancellation  - On/Off voice instructions  - Paired or UnPaired voice instructions  - One full charge can last more than 2 days (depends on usage hours from person to person)  - Once paired, it easily gets connected with iPhone or Android device. We don't have to explicitly search name and click to establish connection.  - Overall sturdy build quality and durable material, feels very good and light weight.I am enjoying my music on this earphone, BOAT: Job well done, Kudos!

title: Long term review of an awesome earphone
body: I'm writing this review after having used this earphone for mora than 20 months. Its been used while jogging too and it's still working top notch. Noise cancellation is good, sound quality and bass is beyond compare. I would say it was definitely a good investment. Have bought the newer airdopes for my sister which just look better but this is my go to earphone for video conference. Buy wiithout a second thought. Only downside is the usb 2.0 charging in an era where all my devices have a type c charger.

title: Good not very good
body: It's been a month, I'm using these earphones.The product is good, still I would say for this price it could have been better.It's solid & has very good sound quality.Easy to carry & smart looking but it sometimes takes a lot of time to connect with my phone & the part of it which holds it into the ear got loose already & it got out of ear a few times.. on the charging point of view it work pretty well.. 30 mnts charging is enough more than 3-4 hours continues use. All & all it's good but a lil expensive.

title: Best if used for listening to songs alone...
body: The headphone is really good until you are using it for listening to songs but not good taking calls, as it doesn't cancel the outside noise and the surrounding noise is more audible than our own voice to the receiver.. but it is best for gym purpose as it completely covers the ears and no other noise from the surrounding disturbs while listening to songs and also it has a tight and comfortable grip over the ears..

title: Okay!
body: The very first thing I would like to mention is that the neck band is very flexible its a go to product for comfortable wearing, its non movable when u plug in your ears ,it will not fall even if ur running ,gym and other routines ,controllable and  smooth product are some pro'sTalking about the con'sif ur a music lover u will not find it attractive because its bass is okay upto 70/80% vol rise beyond that would be difficult,pairing issuesNoise canceling i would give 4.5/5  make sure while ur on a call put it in a 50/60% vol till 70% is appropriate beyond that would not be better!!

title: Amazing purchase with some acceptable cons
body: Review edit -after 3 months.Buttons stopped working after 3 months.Have to press hard to operate.Product quantity is below acceptable level at this price point.Amazing purchase.Pros -Sound (lows, highs, miss) good and acceptable.Bass is amazing. Thump is good and feels like premium.Ease of use - pairing is quick, everytime.Cons -Battery is a little bit below acceptable limit.Helmet fit - possible if you have loose fitting helmet like Vega crux front opening helmet.But not possible with Vega ryker/bolder series as these helmets have tight fit.

title: One of the best bluetooth headphones in this price range
body: I purchased it one month back after comparing it with so many products. But to my surprise noice cancellation , bass and sound quality of the product is just amazing. Even compared with JBL LIVE200BT which costs around 4200 , this headphone is far better than JBL one.just go for it if you want to have a good wireless headphones in this price range.Only Con i came across is the battery indicator is not working properly it suddenly jumps from 40 percent to low battery but actual battery life is as claimed around 6-7 hours

title: Average product.Poor connectivity reach . Loses connection easily
body: Not an hour has passed and I started disliking boat rockers headphones . It's poor connectivity that is the main reason. I tried it over call and played music but it has poor connectivity. On call it has a reach of  meters only which is very less this means we have to carry phone in pocket everytime. While playing music it has connectivity upto 6-7 meters but if you change rooms in-between the connection loses. Though sound quality is good. Overall product is average though is also cheap. So a nice tradeoff. I give 3 star .

title: Good Quality Product.
body: boAt Rockerz 255 Pro, while being lightweight in design pumps out your favorite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bass. The 10mm drivers installed to ensure that you get an exceptional sound experience with articulate audio reproduction with a blend of pitch-perfect frequency response. The sound produced by the boAt Rockerz 255 Pro ensures that you differentiate music from noise and hear your favorite artists the way they were meant to be heard.

title: Good Only for Listening not for Calling
body: For listening to music it‚Äôs very good. In fact Awesome.For making calls its not worth it as People will keep on complaining that they are hearing all surrounding noises better then your voice. May be because of bad location of mic or poor quality of mic.Noise cancellation is just a myth. It doesn‚Äôt happen in this neckband. Infact other person will hear more noises than your voice. But still at ‚Çπ999/- its good... at least you are able to listen to music perfectly.

title: Must buy product
body: In this price range, its a good one.Earlier I was in doubt that how tha mic may be ?But the mic is so much clear, even its that clear so that the next person can even hear the background noise highly if you are not in silent place.Sound quality is good. Battery backup can be improved. As of now the backup is okay okay.Powering on, incoming call messages are good.Bluetooth connectivity is also good.Overall a very good wireless headphones with mic.

title: Truly amazing
body: After using around 3-4 months..This is one of the best earphone at this price(‚Çπ999) wait for the offer.Noise cancellation is truly awesome. I m living in a place where the wind speed reduces the speed of the vehicle, and when i was using JBL earphone then the person i was talking to get irritated due to the sound.But this cancels all this wind sounds.And yes bass lovers.. u can expect an average bass as compared to a precious earphones. U can adjust bass through Equalizer if u need more bass

title: Best quality at a pretty good price!
body: Till now I have bought couple of these Earphones, and also recommended it to my many friends. Also I have used Boat's other products too, their USP is the best quality at pretty good price. And about this product, its the Best Bluetooth Earphone to start with. Its Price is really low as compared to other Bluetooth headphones in the market. It has a superior bass quality that one can not get even in higher priced earphones of other brands. Just one con I can say for this earphone is its age, my first one got dead when it just passed 1 year,  but it depends on your usage too. But I will say definitely go for it for its low price and its quality in sound and bass. Boat is really a nice brand, its all products are worth a try!

title: Do not expect much. heavy technical issues.
body: a normal quality product. there are some technical issues with it.it automatically disconnects with the paired smartphone when using and connects with some other device if its Bluetooth is ON.do not buy it, if u want to use it with laptops. it won't pair.

title: A Good deal
body: I was not sure about the product, especially when it comes to under 1500 bracket, but after doing some research, which I'm actually good at i bought these ROCKERZ 255+ PRO. My soul reason was the need of a back up wireless earphone, as i have oneplus buds. Being said all this, these never disappointed me, even on a heavy use. Battery backup is upto the mark, sound quality is average and build quality is not that bad, easily value for money. In this price range i.e.1200-1400, this is the best deal. My review comes after 3 months of use.

title: Terrible earphones, horrible sound experience
body: Sub-par audio quality, music sounds like hollow like it's from well, call quality is terrible, game performance is horrible and bass is just too much. Overall a very bad earphones. Please think twice to buy these really horrible earphones ever.

title: Best quality earphones in an affordable price
body: Giving  review after using it for a week.ordered on 16th oct received with in 2 days.brought at a price of rs rs899.sound quality is good.bass is perfect and with immersive sound quality.noise cancelation is too good even when u play audio in low volume level u can't here an external noise. Watching movies and listening songs using this earphones is really a bliss. Bass quality is good. Connecting to device is very fast. Lastly if u want to buy this product then go for it sure.

title: Pretty awesome.
body: Got mine this Monday, been using ever since and the battery life is simply great, used extensively specially for voice calls for around 6-7hrs a day, music for like 1-2hrs a day and the battery is at 70% now, Boat did awesome with it's battery.Connectivity is pretty quick be it with my phone, pc or both of my LG & Samsung TV's, never had any disconnection issue.It doesnt hurts my ear even after having it on for hours.Noise Cancellation is great on this one, bass I would say is above average.But over all what I liked most about the BT apart from its battery is the call quality, never for once anyone ever complained about call/voice at all.So far the build looks pretty solid but time will tell.For only ‚Çπ1,499 its worth every penny.

title: Battery issue, slow charging,too much bass, high latency, slow charging,no proper playback
body: Not enough music back up, whenever you are in a mood to listen music the battery just dies no matter whatever volume. Slow battery charging. Sometimes it's irritating can't relie when u are traveling...thts the biggest issue with this headphones. Not enough range when ur on a call. High latency. If you u have the headphone for more then 4 hrs it has a typical connectivity issue...have to disconnect nd connect again... battery shows 80% which should last for around 4 hrs but dies in no time...it would recommend to not buy this headphones looks fancy but of no use

title: Worth Buying
body: It is a good product. It's lightweight and gives amazing sound quality whilst cancelling all outside noise.It is also very handy and the earplugs stick together because of the magnet when you leave them hanging in your neck which helps to keep it from moving too much. The neckband is a little flexible which prevents any discomfort on the back of your neck. It doesn't take much time to charge it and the battery lasts easily for 4-5 hours. You can pick up and disconnect calls and reduce and increase volume. It is also easy to connect to your phone.Overall, it is a good product and one can buy easily.

title: Product got damaged after 3 months & got good product in return in a very smooth process
body: Using this product since 2 years. & Somewhere in dec 2020, ear phone had some technical issue.Since I had warranty, I had raised a request for exchange. Along with me, one of my colleague also raised a request.Exchange process took around 10 working days but it was very smooth & got timely update on phone & got another product. Overall nice experience with boat rockerzz.Coming to the product, using new earphone from 1.5 years. In WFH, had used this product extensively but didn't faced any technical issue.Audio & mike quality is very good & it fits for everyone. Would recommend everyone to buy it.

title: Asymmetrical Right Left sound .. please read before you damage your hearing
body: Within 3 months of use this earphones is sounding 3 times louder in left ear than right. I manually need to change the right left balance in setting.  This has potential to.damage your hearing especially if you use it in gym as sometimes we tend to not notice this during workouts.Please buy OPPO instead before you damage your hearing in one ear.

title: Good for workout but can't surely say value for money.
body: I got it at 1299. I do have Sony bass and infinity headphones so comparison will be with them- Delivered before estimated time.- sound quality good (not good at max lvl)- noise cancelation work average.- bass quality is also average.- Build quality is good.- its do charge fastly as they said.- playback is around 6hrs.- overall can't say value for money as now you can purchase airbuds while 100 or 200 extra, but its ok to have it while exercise as less chances of dropping it down.

title: Not durable...wont purchas a boat product ever
body: This product is really not durable.I would suggest not to purchase this product..i bought them for workout purpose as the company said they are sweat resistant.The sound ,bass and noise cancellation is good.But these earphones are not durable.They malfunctioned 3 times in one year mainly due to battery.And their service procedure is very tiresome.They will send a courier service to your doorstep and then the earphone will be couriered to mumbai after which it will be inspected and get repaired/replaced.It almost takes a month and sometimes 2-3 months.And many people whom i suggested to buy these,their earphones also malfunctioned after sometime.So ots better to opt for some better product than this.

title: Fair deal
body: My neckband got delivered yesterday and it was on time. The Boat 255 Pro+ was fully charged. I tested it for full one day and from morning to night, it only consumed 20% battery. The sound quality is good though it would've been better if it had bit more bass. The sound is clear while making call with no lag. To sum it up, it's a fair deal. I love it's battery performance and that's what I bought it for.

title: Good speakers and best battry backup
body: Using this for 3 months now . The sound quality is good but not the best .battry back is the main thing in this blutooth even with good quality sound it won't be useful if you have to charge it in some hours but 255 pro Plus has from my use a week worth of charge . On using it almost 10 hrs a day watching movies and all it has a stand by of 5 days . But if you use it just for short period of time but mostly in standby . It will last upto 7 days on single charge . I bought 3 of these for my frnds and family . Mainly for battry backup. It also has good speakers but not the best but it's ok . So no prblm.if you want battry backup go for this without any thoughtüëåüëçüëç.it has the best in class water resistant also . Fast charge in below 45 min for full charge from 0% to 100%. Best for battry.

title: Excellent earphones
body: Sound quality is good. Build quality is also nice. Its flexible and u can twist  or fold it which is not possible in most of other bluetooth earphonesEdit: I am giving this review and after 10 months. It is still working fine and I carry it around my neck for 10-12 hrs a day for almost 4 days a week. It's bass effect, sound quality and noise cancellation all are well balanced. It's build quality is really awesome and I have recommended to many of my friends.

title: Bad experience as all 3 got spoilt
body: Had ordered 3 pieces for my husband and children  and all hve got spoilt . 2 r not owrkong at all and in q.one one side works .There is no After service of boat company even of it's under warranty . Very bad experience. Called Amazon but they said u hve to go to the boat service center for pick and drop if it can be repaired  which is very far from my place.

title: DEFECTIVE
body:
The media could not be loaded.

I purchase for gift to friend on her birthday but her birthday will gone and she is biggest fan of CSK.. but the product disappoint me... title: Good "Made in India" headset
body: Update -One left ear-piece stopped working 20-Aug-2020. Purchased July 2019.Original review -I read somewhere that BoAt products lead to drop in pricing by JBL, Jabra and others. Now I know why. At much less cost the headset delivers. I am facing a problem in charging. Full 100% charge lasts easily for a day. But next day it shows 80% charge and after a while drops to 20%. I have never seen 75% or 40% charge, it is 100%, 80%, 20% and Off. Will update after contacting customer support.

title: Best in this segment with unbelievable battery backup
body: I am really impressed with battery backup. There is no need to charge for an week even moderate use for call and listen music for couples of hours on daily basis.Quality of material is also very good even though rough use.Sound quality for Music lover is good but not the best as we know Sony is the best for Music qualityOverall I am very satisfied and definitely recommend this product in this range.But if you are planning to purchasing just for listening to Music and budget is not concern then go for Sony

title: Great wireless Earphones by Boat but battery indicator an issue
body: This a great wireless Earphones and the green color looks really cool. The quality of sound and bass is also satisfactory at this price range. It's worth the price. The charging speed is little bit slow I feel. And with continuous use it can work for like 7 - 8 hours. I felt if the battery life could have been better like if extra 2-3 hours was there then it would have been great. And one issue I found was with the battery indicator for this earphone, it's not that reliable. In just 5 mins the battery indicator which shows 20% suddenly drop to 0%. They could have improved the indicator and made it more reliable and efficient. Otherwise it's a great product.

title: Disappointing quality
body: This isn't my first Boat earphones and I must say first time I am disappointed with the quality.1. Falls flat on bass... definitely not for bass lovers2. Volume output is pretty low3. Mic quality is an absolute turn off4. Very long wires, feels weird to useReplaced the first piece thinking it was a manufacturing issue but found the same issues with replacement as well so finally returning it.

title: Received used/damaged product
body: I have purchased this product during great indian sale. Seems like the dealer is interested in selling the damaged products during the sale .I have received either damaged or used product ,the product looks too old and the brand name ‚Äúboat ‚Äú written on the product is faded even the colour of the product is faded and it was in dirty condition full of dust , charging port cap is broken thus missing also both earbuds are different from each other .Worst condition of the product.So much disappointed with this product.

title: Good bluetooth earphones in a budget segment.
body: Sound quality is decent for both music and call quality. Noise isolation is there bu it can be improved by using the proper set of eartips . Fortunately there are three sets of eartips provided. I am not a bass lover and this earphones produce a lot of boomy bass. It mutes the finer instruments in jazz and new age music.Battery is like 5-6 hours while listening to music. Calling takes much more battery life. And charging is fast. Takes around 1.5 hours to charge fully.One very irritating thing is that at 20% battery level , the headset will inform you almost every 20 secs. We understand that battery level low is to be informed but not so frequently.Also DO NOT go for the aqua color as it's quite different than what it looks in picture. The actual color is quite pale in comparison to it's picture. Thats a big deal. Color should not be misleading.

title: Worthless
body: No idea about the actual product as I received a horrible and defective piece... I have used boAt products earlier but this time the packaging looked like it was opened and used for 3 years and then someone packed and gave it to me... The old was worn out... The seal was non-existent... The left earphone doesn't work and the earphone only switches on when charging... Have been charging for 8 hours still doesn't not switch on if removed from charge... Highly disappointed is an understatement...

title: Real life experience - overall review!!
body: Cons:1) The build quality of the product is really questionable. There are spaces/gap in between the battery compartment. Hence it does make it vulnerable to sweat & water.2) Also, This is the second retail unit which i got after replacement & the length of the two sides are not equal. There is a slight difference between the 2 sides.3) The buttons are tactile however the volume lower button is not tactile at all. You can't feel you are pressing the button. Might be an issue with the product. It might be a defective product (manufacturing defect)4) The magnetic bond between the two headsets is very weak. It5) This is a serious quality concern & Boat as a brand should adhere to the quality of their products.Pros:Apart from the cons mentioned above, here are some of my observations which i liked about the product.1) The bass level is good - this is a bass heavy earphones. As most of us like it.2) The dynamic range is also good. Will get a bit of a surround sound effect.3) The passive noise cancellation is also good. Once you plug it in to your ear, you will not hear any sound from outside.2) Also the mic quality is good. The other person on the other side will hear your voice - crystal clear. CVC Noise cancellation technology has been used - software based.3) The call quality is nice. You will hear the sound crystal clear. No drops in connection.4) Battery life is extraordinary - after a day's normal use - 10% battery got drained out.5) This is flat wire - hence doesn't get tangled.Conclusion - overall its a nice product, keeping aside the build quality/manufacturing defects.

title: Poor bluetooth range & receiver in not audible
body: First time I ordered and received a product in which the bluetooth range was very poor & not audible to the receiver while attending calls. So I raised a request for replacement. The product which I received for the second time also had the same issues, so I retured the same. Very poor quality & unsatisfied with the product. However the delivery was ontime, packaging was good & service from Amazon was good.

title: Awesomeness as usual..! üå†üå†üå†üå†üå†üå†
body: Ordered tis for the 2nd time as a gift.. Using one past 6months+ great sound quality, Bass treble noise cancellation, call quality.. Too good.. üëåHad Ordered a neon last time wich looked good, got a red one this time n it looks awesome, kinda shiny metallic red colour is what it is n man it looks ammazzinng...!!!!Worthy of its price..!

title: Great Product with best Customer Support
body: This product is very good. I say, best at available price. And moreover, the customer support is impressive. Had an issue with one side earphone not working after 7 months of usage. BoAt replaced me the product with a brand new one. This is what delights the Customer.Thank you for such a great service in such a competitive market.And with my verbal marketing, 8 of my office colleagues, family members bought this product and they too have a best experience with positive feedback.Thank you BoAt once again for the great product and service offered.

title: Dual Connectivity is of no use as it never performs perfectly ..
body: Sound Quality is Good not too high and Clear as well..Bass is not that much good and it does not have any Bass Booster mode... Overall Sound and Bass combination is good.Range is also good u can get a clear uninterrupted sound even if u are 2 or 3 room apart from your device.But here comes the main issue THE DUAL CONNECTIVITY its just bogus... In practical it is almost impossible to use this facility because when you connect the Laptop and phone simultaneously Prob 1. There is no auto play/pause system when u switch media play from mobile to laptop or vice versa2. When your mobile is connected and you are playing audio from laptop its actualy breaking and this problem is persistant until you disconnect your mobileSo Dual connectivity of this earphone is just Bogus and very disappointing ...My 3 star rating is only because of dual connectivity issue...

title: Got Duplicate product fail to claim even after having all billing details
body: I planned to buy earphones for gifting to brother, it was stopped working in just 3 months , when go to service centre I come to know that I got a duplicate product, contact to Amazon help line & sent all billing details, but they were not responding, not even call  , very much disappointed,how to believe in reliability on Amazon's product & after sell service.Very much disappointed I decided to never ever buy from Amazon

title: Warranty not honored
body: Company does not honor warranty and the product is no good- 1 year reviewThe product is so so in quality. One of the ear peices stopped functioning in a year. Still company refused to honor warranty despite due information sent to them. Overall utterly disappointing.

title: Good Quality - worth the price
body: I am an old school type and does not really gets comfortable with the gadgets and accessories. My role at my workplace demands approximately 50% of my time on the phone calls. After giving so much consideration and thoughts about new mobile phones does not have the earphones jack support system, i had to buy one bluetooth earphones. BoAt Rockerz 255 Pro in-Ear Bluetooth Neckband Earphone, it turned out to be very comfortable and i am happy with the product quality. I have the freedom of not holding my phone all the time when i am on the calls, no entangling & detangling of my wired handsfree.  It is waterproof. It is light weight. Grips so well. The color is so... so... amazing that it absolutely adds up to the entire product.Worth Worth Worth Buying.

title: Replacement of product not working
body: The product of Boat Rockerz 255  sports in ear did not work to my satisfaction and I tried to replace d product but no positive response was received from Amazon. Country went under lockdown and all services stopped for 4-5 months and the product could not be repaired, however as per Govt of India's Force Majeure clause all warranties should be extended accordingly. I once again request Amazon to repair d product or replace it

title: Good
body: Its Almost 2 months since i am using this headset. Since last one week i am experiencig a small glich sort of problem with this one. Like if i am watching a video or movie it cancels itself and voice gets in normaly so i will have to reconnect it again. I am right now checking on the occurence again.Overall the product is good. Flexible and comfy to carry around. Charge stays through out the day.

title: A great headset, worth its price
body: I have been using this set everyday for the past 3 weeks and the battery life is impressive. It can last about 8hours of total usage, even spread out over a few days. Charging is incredibly fast.Sound quality is good, volume levels are adequate - you will rarely have to use the max volume, but the bass is slightly muted for those who want the 'boom'.Personally, 2 things bother me - it refuses to pair for calls with my Oppo Color OS though it allows me to pair for audio (Youtube etc). This could be an OS issue more than the headset though it seems to have the same issue with OnePlus as well. There is a welcome message and a goodbye message that loses its novelty very fast.

title: Awesome headphones
body: Simply amazing. The sound is just brilliant and if you can get it for 1000 bucks then even better. Beat is very punchy. The bass is held together very well. Mid tones and table are perfect as well. No issues with Bluetooth connectivity. Battery backup is great. I haven't used it at a stretch but I feel it should run for 6 - 7 hours on full charge. If you use it while jogging it does hold but not the most comfortable. They can fall off your ear while jogging.

title: Unreliable
body: item stopped working within 15 days,  completely dead. charging also not showing anything, reading the other reviews its clear that there are many ppl who had faces this issue with the earphones it suddenly stops working and shows no signs.

title: Good sound with base. Nice feel
body: Good sound with decent base. Infact it has simulated base on the right speaker. Nice rich feel. Wires strong. But what I don't like is that I have to press for 3 seconds to go to the next song. I don't know whether their missed call facility for registering for waranty is working. I emailed them a couple of times to confirm, but they have not even bothered to respond.

title: Utilitarian. Not recommended for WFH, calls, etc
body: Bought this in June 2020. The very first thing I noticed was a slight tinny quality of music, and slightly fuzzy audio. Another issue is an oversensitive mic. I bought it for WFH, but received repeated complaints of high background noise from the people in call. I had to relocate my entire setup to resolve this. To be specific, the TV in the next room could be heard clearer than what I was saying, even the dialogues. I also have a Boat BassHeads wired earphones, it didn't have these issues (it has an UNDERsensitive mic, but that is any day better)I was pretty disappointed, and got it replaced, but the issues persisted, leading me to believe this is what I can expect from these earphones. Recently, I also started experiencing a significant audio delay (~1-2 seconds) in both directions. This may be an issue with my particular piece as well.Other than these, the product is good. Its durable, easy to use, and the convenience of not getting bogged down by wires can never be understated. If you are okay with wired, go for wired. But if you are like me and need a pair of wireless earphones, keep the above issues in mind before ordering these.

title: After 1 year and 2 months of use, Rough use.
body: Pros,1. Charge - 2 hours for 8 hours backup, 1 hour for 4 hours and so on2. Charge complete - Blue blink without break, depleted - Red 7-10 blinks3. Takes time to connect? - Keep Switch on button pressed for 5-8 seconds right from switch on, don't stop pressing in between.4. Can connect 2 devices.5. Sound Quality - MEETING: 10/10, Gaming - 7/10, Music - 8/10.Cons:1. Band starts losing their touch and become jagged at earphone heads.2. Dual connection issue - Alternates sound from both, hard to manage.3. Buttons start to become less interactive with more pressure required to press them after 3-4 months.4. After 10 months - completely jagged pain to manage.5. After 1 year 1 month - One side(right side, depends on your use), no sound from earbud.Overall - 8/10Better performance than many competitors.

title: its value for money product
body: but I have observed there is delay and lag in connecting the devices and on-off suddenly it will disconnect from mobile and again connecting in 2 mins. this problem needs to be rectified and NOT a great experience with connecting two devices at a time feature.

title: Best Battery Backup Earphone
body: Boat earphone sound quality is always at good side but I am surprised by the battery back up of this 255 pro+ wirless earphone. Once it's fully recharged then it can easily goes till 7 days by using 7-8 hrs on daily basis. I have purchased green colour earphone a month back and so far I haven't found any issues. üëç

title: can be bought
body: IT IS VALUE FOR MONEY. Its been a week since I have been using Boat Rockerz 255+ Pro.............& can say this1. Connectivity - The range is excellent. The connection, on the other hand, can be improved. Many a times I have faced difficulty connecting simultaneouly with both of my devices. Either it doesn't connect at a time with both or is disconnected automactically from one to connect with another.2. Battery - If I had to give points for battery out of 100, without a flinch I would give 200.3. Comfort - Not good if you have to wear for long period of time, or in your helmet. Its the only con I have come across which can change your decision to not buying these.In conclusion, it can be said that if you want a comfortable thing, this is not it but rest assured that everything else is up to the mark.

title: Awesome battery backup.
body: Amazing battery backup. Lasts for days without charging. But can't be used for prolonged period of time due to uncomfortable fit. The buds are made of slightly harder material due to which ears starts to hurt after some time. Not recommended for continuous use. Otherwise great deal for 1k budget. Audio quality is average. Can't expect more for this price range. Bass is decent. Sound level is high. My device volume was mostly below 50% indoors and it was perfectly audible. At maximum volume distortion would be there due to the slightly lower audio quality. Overal, a decent product. I would have returned it if not of the battery backup. Coz it's highly uncomfortable and I typically use earphones for longer durations. But I can't because of this. I'm keeping this so that I won't need to worry about charging it. Calls are ok. Mic is also decent. Controls are also fine. Dual pairing works. Can play audio from one connected device at a time. If you are getting it, get some other silicon tips for better comfort. Otherwise best deal for this budget in my opinion, which is mainly focused on battery backup.

title: Go for it guys!!!! They are superb!!!!!!
body: I love this earphones!! I had done a lot of research when i was buying and then i decided to buy this... Now it's been a  7days and i still have 20% battery... I'm a student so i use  it daily for my online classes for about 8 hrs and I'm really surprised by it's battery backup... Now let's talk about it's sound quality -- guys it's superb!!! I'm really impressed with ths sound quality, even at high volume u won't feel any distortion in sound quality , bass quality is boom! No words for bass ,it's awesomeüî•üí•üí•  I'm really happy and satisfied with the product and I'll definitely recommend it to you guys!!

title: Sound codec , Automatically turns on and off
body: Just ordered this product and when it got delivered within 2-3 days it disconnecting sometimes itself and then I requested replacement after that within the period of replacement delivery I saw that it has AAC codec which is a low codec than Aptx codec they have mentioned that it supports Aptx but it has AAC codec and sometimes it's latency gets high itself and it has a hiss sound in background you won't notice in daytime but you'll notice at night.

title: too great charging speed and better than rockerz 255
body: this product is soo good, i have tried both the rockerz 255 and 255 pro, and 255 pro is too good. it charges so fast, that you cant imagine, i was listening to my lecture, when it told me, "battery low" i put it on charging while using it, my lecture, finished in like 30 to 45 minutes, when it got over, i checked its battery, it was full, even when i was using, it got charged to the fullest so fast, and i pretty much use it a lot so the battery life is rather above satisfactory

title: Cheap move by boat
body: Boat has played very cheap this time. It is printed that aptx is supported by headphones but in reality it does not. So boat has stick a new sticker on the box to hide the aptx printed. This is very cheap stunt by boat.

title: Not impressive or suitable for Apple devices
body: The product is decent, however certain flaws.1. This item is not a right fit for apple devices. Whenever there is a volume increase or decrease in apple mac or iPhone or ipad, it gives buzz sound.2. It often disconnects from the devices and reconnect.3.it often started giving welcome note without even i am disconnecting the device.4. Does not connect to 2 devices at a time.5. Very long cable in the front and often goes down to your tummy if you are moderate person in size.If you are good to invest couple more bucks, you can get either realme or mulo bluetooth earphones which are better than this.

title: The detailed and useful...
body: You know its only good for music not for games and anyone who want to buy first check the size of your ear because mine was unstable and was falling down again and again ... In fact , I returned my earphone and instead bought boAt Rokerz 400 headphones that is better as, for music is amazing and wireless and in gaming foot sounds and so on are amazing and you can either choose wireless or wired (cable given with headphones)that is why it's make more adorable... I prefer choose wired headphones or earphones for gaming...

title: Not as per my expectations
body: Pros:1. Battery life is amazing.2. Turbocharging and super fast.3. Bluetooth connectivity is good. Pairing is fast.Cons:1. Sound quality is mediocre.2. Bass is too loud and thumping. It irritates sometimes.3. Design flaws. Appearance when you wear it. Not stylish.

title: Nice one
body: Received today, Ordered yesterday Night, I am using first time bluetooth earphone, i not a fan of heavy bass and i am also not music centric person, i only buy these because of calls, and calls are good i don't know about outdoor conditions like traffic etc. bettry backup is good, out of the box 100% i used these almost 3hours still it is 100%.sound is similar to boat 255, little better than 255, my friend is 255 not too mucb difference.According to my usage i think it is good, i am giving it 4 star because i don't like heavy bass. i like balanced sound.

title: Purchased 5 Pieces and all works GREAT
body: BoAt Rockerz 255 Sports is my first ever wireless bluetooth earphone ever. First I bought one for my use and after listening to it my colleagues started purchasing and even I bought it again and again to gift it to some of my friends and family members. All are working fine and absolutely mid blowing sounds. Loving every bit of it.The best out there for sure.

title: Buy Under ‚Çπ1300 anytime. ü§ôü§ò SOUND IS LIT!
body: Everything is perfect in this earphone, but giving 4 star just because of the earphone wires are too long and they irritates. And when i use a single earphone it irritates a lot.Well coming to the weight and sound quality and earphone fitting!- Sound Is amazing full of bass, and fine quality of tereble. (I personally enjoyed listing songs it this).- Weight is negligible, i dont feel that there i something on my neck. Perfect.- Once i put the earphone inside they neither fell or nor they pains, even if i use them for 5-6 hra.- Battery is pretty impressive i used it for 5 hrs and still the battery was there. And its supports fast charging which really impressed me a lot.Overall its a nice earphone but there can be some more features like auto play/pause thorugh magnets.Low latency mode. So that one can play games and do editing too.

title: Disappointed
body: Damaged Product and Packaging.Though this item was packed in another bigger carton box with air bubble cushioning and few other items, this particular item was damaged and the deal was open already.Thought, at least the product should do well, but the product failed to take charge and power up, which clearly indicated the product was a formerly returned item due to malfunction. Rather going to manufacturer warranty and repair/retirement this got resold.I've had many ear phones from BoAt and really love this brand (in the wireless category) alternating to House of Marley (in the wired category). But this one was shear disappointment.

title: Good product by Boat!
body: Nice product at INR 999. Noise cancellation is really good. Great bass. The only thing is, once you've it connected, if you change the volume using buttons on the earphones or via mobile, it pops a sound every time. It becomes annoying then. For phone calls and video calls, the other person can hear you properly. The quality of sound is not at all compromised on call. If you are going to be on a call for long time, I'd suggest to keep the volume low. At higher volume I got a headache after a while. Do go for it for daily use like listening to music/podcasts or frequent calls.Edit: Been using this for a year now (August 2020- August 2021). No major issues. Only it has begun glitching the sound once in a while. I have been using this earphones daily for atleast 4-5 hours for last whole year. No problems at all. Worth the price!!! Buy it already!

title: Poor pair of headphones
body: Big cons for a wireless headphones in 2021:1. Magnets barely hold, and don't pause when connected. Music/audio continues to play and doesnt stay in sync with the phone/device.2. Material used is quite annoying and just too long and dangles too long around the neck.3. Cant pair multiple devices at once, and smart switching doesnt happen.

title: I blindly recommend to new buyers
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†This is my first neckband and first boat product. It is really good the sound quality and Bluetooth range everything is good at this price. The power backup is good, it's 3 days after delivery still I haven't charged it. Having 50+ percentage of charge. I using this for 9 to 6 Work from home and watching movies. I am using 8 to 12 hours a day. This is the best product at this price range. The one star reduced because of the length of wire it's little bit longer and the neck support is not that table. I have make refund order but as per this product no refund provided. Only you get replaced same earphone... Oneplus earphone is better than this in comparison to bass, sound and comfort.

title: Very worst after sales service, product is good buy if product got faulty then u have to throwaway

title: Stopped working just after a month's use
body: I bought 2 pairs of these for my office work. These do not connect with MAC!Also, 1 pair stopped working just after a month & when I tried to register the complaint on their portal, its showing me that the service centre is closed due to pandemic. There is no other alternative suggested. I just wasted my money on these. DO NOT BUY THESE!! Wastage of money

title: No connectivity
body: For me, comfort matters the most. And rock boat-rockers has no comforting after wearing them my ear starts hurting, I thought it new that's why they are hurting so decided to write a review after a month and after a month it still hurts me in the ear and I cant be able to wear this at least for a minute. They are no doubt very uncomfortable. talking about the music it's average it was my first product from the boat and probably the last one, they didn't maintain the dignity of their product and paying 1500 for this product is like spending your money on waste.And the connectivity is worst it didn't connect to my laptop for 1/2 an hour in starting I'm a student and I bought them for my classes and they take 20 mins every day for getting connected it's a waste of money I must say...otherwise its your choice..

title: Excellent call quality - mic is good. Simultaneous pairing to laptop is good.
body: I returned a true wireless bud from a different brand, because hte mic was not sensitive. Got this due to past experience with the brand and this type of earphones. This is really effortless to use on calls. I purely use this for calling, and I don't have to bring the mic closer to my mouth to talk...i can talk naturally with both my hands free, and the other side can hear me clearly. This is the only thing that matters to me, though music too sounds awesome. Even the bass is good, nothing to complain. Pairing is good too, with simultaneous devices (phone + laptop is all i tried, and it works fine most of the times i.e. it will give computer audio, but when a call comes, it receives that too seamlessly). Sometimes though, you will have to repair it, like other bluetooth sets, while using 2 devices simultaneously.

title: Okay product
body: So, Here's me After using this headset for around 8 months now.Pros:1. It has a great bass,2. Good noise cancellation3. Quite better sound clarity and4. Decent battery for 4-5 hrs when used cont.Cons :1. Stopped working from one side in less than 10 months.2. Bluetooth range is okay, not best( Can be counted in pros on this price range)3. Probably there's no Pick up Warranty support for this model.4. In aesthetics, Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in front.5. Worst part is very low quality and distoring mic. Other person keeps complaining about my voice.Over al 3.3-3.5 Rating out if 5.

So we raised a complaint on boat website ( as that is the procedure to complaint and claim warranty ) on 18th sep we have raised complaint and today is 27th it is still pending. But they will give false promises and pick up of your product doesn't happened either.A product is good only if AFTER SALES SERVICE IS GOOD, otherwise people won't purchase it again.

title: Battery backup is horrible!!!!
body: Bought this earphones considering the good audio quality mentioned in reviews. People who bought it forgot to mention the horrible battery backup of this earphone.I got my first earphone, and battery used to go down to 80% after a 10 mins call... And after a 1 hour call.. It would just be 50%. I thought it was a particular unit issue, so got the earphones replaced.And the same problem started happening in the new piece as well..As of now dumping this earphone and get a new one from another brand.
