title: Useless overrated headphones
body: So here we go again. You move away from boat cause you have used it and it hardly works for more than 3 months.One of your supposedly tech expert friend buys a new boat headset and goes crazy making you think if the new product is really as good as he says.You read reviews (should be paid as most of them are positive) and start going over the technicalities.Amazon has a sale slashing the prize by 500.You go ahead and buy one.Boom!! Three months and one side of headset goes either blank or too low to hear anythingYou try for a replacement but they point you to a shop on the corner of the city (Imagine my plight as I stay in Bangalore)You throw this useless headphones away and go back to your old Sony headphones which look so outdated now but seems to work just as perfectly as it did since the day you bought. Oh, it's couple of years old as well.

title: Waste of Money I wouldn't recommend.
body: Second bad experience with boat earphones. Its been a month and found so many issues. Mic is not responding properly. Have to speak louder everytime so that the other person can hear me properly. Toggle on both devices are very difficult. Donot go for boat devices i would suggest its total waste. Noise cancellation is 0.

title: Good sound quality, best battery, worst design earpieces to stay inside ears.
body: Good sound quality and best battery playback time in this price. One of the worst design I've ever tried. The wire is too short from neck collar to the earpieces and worst choice to join the cable to the earpieces. Its at the end of the earpieces enough far from the ear plug to pull out the earpiece from ears again and again like some sort of lever by pulling then downwards, and these wings kind of things are not supportive enough to make them stay in your ears. If the cables were attached near the earplugs instead of the outermost end it would be much better and if the "boat" have provided some kind of hangers which could have like hanged the earpieces to the ears instead of these wings it would be best then.

title: Excellent quality overall
body: I m using since mid March 2020. Getting appx 8 hr battery life for continuous usage of like listening to song, video, etc. One full charge a day is sufficient for the entire day. Best part is the bluetooth strength is for 20ft distance without wall in between. Device remain connected while I go to another room leaving the mobile in a separate room. I got it at 1399/-.

title: DUE TO HIGH BASS.. IT MISSES OUT TREBLE. Sound quality not up to the mark.
body: 1. Sound quality is not good if you like slow Romantic songs or you're Neelesh misra story listener then this is not the right choice for you... Because due to high bass.. sometimes it misses out treble.. which is a big No no.2. Person on another side gets very compressed sound while talking on the call.3. Gives you 6-7 hour battery back up on full charge. Gets charge quickly. Battery gets drain too quickly after 30%

title: best if u purchased of 899 . amazing product
body: best in this price , bass is good but beats are nI'll get straight to the pros and cons of Boat Rockerz 255 Pro Bluetooth earphones.PROS:1. Sound- compared to the non-pro version, it seems to me that there's slight improvement in quality. Not that it is very noticeable, but a slight improvement.Bass- has got good quality and quantity of bass compared to others in the same price range. The bass is clean, tight and is not muddy like realme bluetooth earphones.Vocals- the vocals are clear and crisp.Loudness- it is loud enough to be heard in a noisy environment.2. Comfort- the earphones are comfortable to wear but without the ear guides. Maybe that's just me, but wearing along with the ear guides gave me pain in the ears which eased off once the ear guides were removed.3. Design- it is of neckband design that is comfortable to wear. The buds have got magnets in it which helps it stick to one another when hanged down so that no tangling occurs.4. Colour- comes in some trendy colours like yellow, teal green, blue and red. The youngsters would love this just for that.5. Fast charging- gets completely charged in just an hour and has got high voltage protection too.6. Sound isolation- nothing to brag about but comparable with others in the same price segment.7.Mic- the calls were very clear. The person at the other end told me that the voice was audible without any disturbances and indeed very clear.8. Connectivity- this has got the A2DP feature. So dual connectivity is present and I did not experience any connection drops of any kind.9. No Lag- there was no lag experienced while playing PUBG.CONS:1. Battery- this is the biggest gripe anyone could have with this earphone. The battery gets emptied quickly compared with its peers. Though there's fast charging one would expect headphones in this price range to last at least 10 to 12 hours but not Rockers PRO lasts for almost 6 to 8 hours. That's what I got out of them and that was not enough.2. Price- the asking price of 1599rs is high. You may get it for 1200rs during offers. Even then it is not value for money because of the poor battery backup.3. No auto on-off with magnetic buds- the feature which is present in Realme bluetooth earphones. This feature could have improved the battery life of this pair very much but alas it doesn't have it.Final words:Boat Rockerz 255 Pro bluetooth earphones are good in terms of sound quality and trendiness but lack in terms of battery backup. Though there are several pros than cons it all comes down to the battery life and this one loses out on that badly.Other options in the same price range - LoodAudio Everloop (good @1169rs), Boat rockerz 255( when in offer @ 999rs), Blaupunkt BE50(999rs during offer or even @ 1399rs), Sony WI-200( pricey @1699rs and high in treble), Realme bluetooth earphonest clear comparetively to jbl or sony .

title: Best in battery backup but with few demerits
body: I have used the OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z earlier which was very good inbuilt quality and sound. The battery-saving option using the magnets in the OnePlus model was its USP which is not present in this one. The Bluetooth remains active and connected all the time which drains the battery but on the contrary, the battery life is quite high as claimed by the Boat, and gives you that extra time gap to recharge it again. All in all the earphone is good in bass and sound quality and since it has a huge battery life, therefore, the battery-saving function can be compromised. Price is also competitive.

title: Low battery. Horrible service for return
body: It worked well for the first 2 months. But the battery is a huge problem from the beginning. Hardly works for 6 hours. You have to daily charge it. After 2 months the sound quality suddenly dropped to just 10% of the original. I requested a return since it was in the warranty period of boat but my product got merely picked up and since 10 days I have been trying to contact them to know the status but to no avail. Looks like they have disappeared now at the name of return. Horrible service from boat

title: Worst product and worst service regarding replacement
body: Am just using this product from Aug 2020. Recently in this month (April 2021) the battery got expanded and the chare also drains within 2-3 hrs. so I just applied for a warranty replacement on 15th April, also they picked up the next day 16th April. and the shipment also shows it was delivered at the other end on 20th April. Due to Covid-19, they've been mentioning commonly in their website as, 'there will be a delay'. so i just waited for 9 days till now. its being frustrating that, still i didn't got any notification on this. so i trying to contact their team via their mail and their customer service number, i can't even talk to them. no one is picking the call and also no reply for my mail. WORST SERVICE & WORST PRODUCT!!!!. i decided not to buy any product from Boat anymore.

title: Product box damge Already someone used this product.
body: Boat is good company and sound quality is best in this range. I used already 2-3items of boat. Amazon shipping is also good but this time i recived a used product so i replace my order . Now lets see what happened.

title: Too much Bass
body: The product itself is all that was mentioned in the title, everything was exactly as I was told. It's amazing!The only thing is, due to the extra bass, other sounds are a little bit underwhelmed.The noise cancellation is awesome, the first few days it was noticeable. I wouldn't say by how much it reduced the noise, but if I had to say at the very least - half - but over time, maybe I got used to it or something, but I didn't pay much attention to the noise cancellation anymore. I believe it still works because it's passive cancellation.Another thing, the earpiece (i.e. the curved rubber part that is there to support the earbud from not falling off) starts to hurt over time (for my ears at least), and if you remove them, they fall off due to the weight. So I can only use them for an hour or two (which is alright, I mean, I'm not supposed to use them for that long anyway).So, overall, again - great product!

title: Battery life üëç
body: Bought it because of battery life. For music I have separate pair of earphones(wired). This one is only for Teams and phone calls during work hours.Sound - average or below average (don't expect much in this price) sound covers all bass, balance, high, lows and all other thing you know.Battery life - as advertised.

title: Good deal for the price offered
body: For the price it is offered I would recommend this . Noise cancellation is surprisingly good . Sound quality is also impressive but not the greatest for sure . Bass effect is more . Fit the ear perfectly and doesn't come off . Wire and exteriors are made of plastic but serves the primary purpose . Bluetooth slightly deteriorates when you keep the phone and move to another room with too many walls obstructing . But overall is a good deal . Battery lasts upto 6 hours .

title: Great Sound quality, great noise cancellation, great battery, below average 2 device connectivity!
body: Most honest Review after 1 month use!  First, sound quality and noise cancellation is best in class! Way way better in comparison to Boult earphones. Fitting in ear is awesome too! And battery lasts at least 2 days on full charge! The only issue is that it doesn't always connect to two devices as claimed! My Boult earphones didn't have that issue! They connected two devices perfectly! This one doesn't, even tho claims to! For the rest, it's best in class! If you're looking for earphones, these are the best! Might not look the coolest but the performance holds it on top of its competitors!

title: Good earphone
body: I love the earphone. I worked a 6-hour shift and played music nonstop. The volume is loud and clear, so I had it turned way down. The noise-canceling is good. They are very comfortable and do not fall out. You can tuck the neckband in your shirt and only see the earplugs. I recommend these.

title: They're Actually Good
body: They're best at this price point , before buying them i did my research and i was right , it's amazing , the only thing i didn't like is the right side piece fall out of my ear alot whenever i try to use the control buttons , maybe my ear is built different , but from sound perspective , they're really great , bass is also really good , clarity was on point as well .The best selling point for them is the battery , no other product is offering 40hrs battery.

title: Fantabulous investment!
body: Pros: excellent sound production even though it's bluetooth; I've stopped using panasonic wired earphones because this product produces better sounds. The mic is positioned perfectly and the other person can hear well. Bass is very good indeed, I connected it to TV and the movie sounds were mind blowing, felt like a movie theater. Battery back up is really impressive and lasts a whole day for me, it depends on how you use it though. Charging time is another pro because it gets fully charged in an hour even when connected to laptop. The chance of losing these are minimal thanks to magnets on both earphones which attach themselves when not in use.Cons: the band gives me allergy because of constant rubbing with the back part of my neck (this is just my issue as I suffer from skin related allergies). The lights on the earphone are too dim. The bands on the earphone which give it a unique style are hurtful, so I removed them totally and also changed the ear buds to red (used panasonic buds) . If you are a fast walker like me and when not in use, the earphone will swing like a pendulum, so I put it in my front pocket or shirt (this is not a con really).Conclusion: absolutely great earphones and bluetooth is perfect üëå don't waste your time looking for other options unless you have high expectations with bass and other features.

title: Best Budget Friendly Wireless Bluetooth Earphone
body: If you are looking for a pocket friendly bluetooth wirelss earphone with a decent sound quality, this product from Boat could be a good choice for you. I purchased it @ INR 999 during the great amazon sale (usually available @ INR 1499). I am writing this review after using the product for 6 months.First let us talk about the features that the company highlights with my comment on it:-- Super Extra Bass - I would not completely agree with this claim although I would say that it has a good bass (Plus I personally do not prefer too much of bass)-- Water and Sweat Resistance - It is definitely sweat resistant and I can claim that as I use it while working. The sound quality is not disturbed with sweat; but not very sure with its water resistant claim. I have been out in light drizzle with this ON; the sound quality did not get affected in the first 10 min, but then it got a little bad. I would not advise to try any stunt with this pocket friendly earphone ;)-- Sound Quality - I would rate it above average. Cannot expect anything better in this range.Now, I would want to mention a few more pointers that I look at in an earphone:-- Noise Cancellation - Not that great with noise cancellation. There are 2 aspects to it. One, the unwanted noise is not passed through the mike. Second, while you are using it, you are not hearing others around you. It provides partial noise cancellation in the second scenario-- How it fits in the ear - Could have been better ergonomically designed. The each support may come out at times and this is the only part where I thought Boat could have done better even at this budget.-- Buttons - Honestly, I do not use it to receive or end phone calls too often, but it works fine to receive calls and adjust the volume. The buttons are on the right side and very conveniently placed.-- How it feels to use it- The product is to be worn around your neck and is very comfortable. although the wire length from the shoulder to the ears is a little long and could have been shorter.I am using this earphone regularly for the past 6 months and have bought one more to gift my sister too. If you have a limited budget, like I did, you can go ahead with this. It is surely one of the better products available in this price range.

title: Avoid even if below ‚Çπ500
body: Very bad sound quality. Old system of having controls on the wire instead of the stick. Bought it cause it had same day delivery, and my previous headset had broken. Btw, it was a ‚Çπ600 product, whereas this is double the price. Unfortunately, it has replacement warranty only.

title: Received a replacement in 4 days... That was fast. They stopped functioning. But received it asap!!!
body: It was bought due to necessity as my speakerphones werent functioning properly albeit lockdown.Started troubling in a week.The earbuds or whatever u call them werent comfortable at first but then I gradually got used to them.. It maybe becuz i never used headphones before on a long term basis...Now under warranty . lets cUpdate:Replaced in 4 days... That was super quick! The headphones are nice but discharge a lil faster that others.  Still i like them.

title: Not charging bought just 7 days back
body: Dont buy this product. very cheap material also  had bad experience following up the customer service. I used it while jogging and in a week's time it is not charging. My return period has also expired yesterday 18th Feb 2019. I keep it for charging but the red light never glows and also not switching on. Regret buying this product for 2000. Advise not to buy this product very bad quality. Should have invested that 2000 in some other products. I have been a regular buyer in Amazon did not expect this type of product. Please allow me to return this product

title: Honest Review
body: Boat rockerz 255 proWell overall a good product from boat .ProsBattery backup is good.Sound is not so clear like jbl but ya good bass.Fast charge capable.ConsColour (for teal green ) looks  bit ugly and looks like a  used product so dont buy this colour .The colour of wire is skyblue but the wings and cabinet where there r buttons the colour is very bad seriously dude i thought it was a used product but later on observing other buyers photo i realised that it is manufactured colour.The Bluetooth connection takes a bit timeAnd sometimes it didn't even connect.Bought in sale for rs 1099 which i think was a good deal it is best in segment to rs 1400.thank youWill edit this after 6 month

title: Not so great
body: After 3 months usage :The product is not so good as it looks.Pros :Holds charge for long time.Connectivity is quick.Cons:Not comfortable fit.Sound distortion when used in calls.Not so great sound qualityOverall i regret spending 1.5 k for it.Update after 6 months - Charging port got damaged and product useless. 1600 rs gone in vain.

title: Requested For Return
body: Hi All,I purchased this product, Everything seems to be fine except below things due to that i requested Amazon for return the same and they are1) At low volume of music you will continuous listen the humming sound (Means not music sound, Sounds which speaker generated by own) which is very discomfort for Ear and this is major issue, due to this i requested for return2) Cables length is quite long, Which not looks good when it hang till near to your stomach but above of that (5'6)3) To fit the noise cancel soft bud you have to enter speaker very deep in ear, so for long term in and out activity like this to  your ear probably can make ear hearing problem.

title: Manufacturing defect and after sale service issue
body: I bought two rockerzz 255. A good sound in this price and good backup......But after using 5-6  months both of them had same problem. One oh the ear piece stopped working. One was used by me in Delhi whereas other was used by family members. No wear n tear but still stopped and sometimes give sound for a second or two. It is not easy to get warranty complaint. Neither online nor on phone.Planning to visit service center. So device is good but seems there is some manufacturing defects and service is not also up to the mark which should be as it is growing company....if it continues then Boat will be also like Micromax

title: It's a good product, but I do feel sometimes it sound automatically starts distorting
body: It's a good product, but I do feel sometimes it sound automatically starts distorting. It does not happens always but once in a while the right earphone sound starts distorting after using the earphone like for 15-20 mins and that is bit irritating. I think it's a manufacturing defect. I was facing the issue with the earlier headphone too and I replaced it with Amazon. And now 2nd one is alsi giving same issue. But on other hand I have tried using Noise brand earphone and it plays well, it's sound doesn't distorts.... Don't know exactly what's the problem? Either it's earphone or my phone... M not sure! ... But the sound quality is excellent of Boat compare to Noise....

title: Go for it
body: This is a very good product and very useful 1)Sound quality is very good 2) noise cancellation works very good 3) the two pair of extra ear plugs provided are also of very good quality 4) the rubber hook which is there to provide better stability helps while doing rigorous workout 5) quality of the flat cable and the buttons is very good one can buy it without having a second thought

title: Good, but could be better!
body: Overall good. Sound is clear, loud and not distorted. Noise cancellation is proper. In 999-1299 ‚Çπ price segment, I think its worth to give a go.Packaging of the original product box was pathetic, amazon shipped it in a plastic only, without any protection.. very bad I would say.Product price varies within ‚Çπ999-1499. Amazon is ridiculously varying it instantaneously. Despite repeated requests and communications, even though price decreased by ‚Çπ490 in a single day, I got no goodwill/compensatory cashback, which  Amazon used to provide before.

title: Confused wid Boats or JBL in 1500 to 2000 price range
body: Hi All,I have purchased boats earphones after reading many reviews and asking to my friends who are using boats....from everywhere I got good feedback and when I personally felt good.Meanwhile I check JBL brand aswell costing 2000 aprx with the same specifications. JBL also good one but if u r looking MORE BASS then boats bit more than JBL in this price range.CONS: because of rubbered ear strips...u cannot hear outside sound...coming to JBL u can hear outside sound as well...u don't feel like ur ears are completely blocked with JBL earbuds.Concl:Both Boats and JBL are good... U have to choose based on your Priority and interest n comfort u feel with..

title: Value for money
body: I've purchased this one in Big Billion sale at 899/-. I just wanna say,within one thousand, this is the best one IF you want longer battery backup. Seriously boAt has given a monsters battery. One more thing,its IPX7 rating, you no need to worry about collar sweat, headfone will be in safe hands for its IPX7 rating. Truly recommended this headfone under 1k. But I didn‚Äôt get a new cover box from Amazon,an old box was received, don‚Äôt know why amazon has done this...

title: value for money
body: I am writing this review almost after 1 year. This product still going on happily , battery performance is still awesome and definitely going to recommend you this product.If 2 devices are connected at a time and if you disconnect any one then it will disconnect other device too, this problem am still facing.

title: Gr8 product
body: This is a great product that is super easy to use. The controls sit on your neck, so I can use it when I am wearing a helmet, which is a big plus for me. It was easily paired with both my iPhone and my Samsung M31. The charge lasts a really long time. I highly recommend it.

title: Very good purchase for this price.
body: I am using it from last two months.(Rs. 999)Sound Quality_ Moderate (difficult to listen music in hevat traffic)Noice cancellation _ Not upto the markBluetooth connectivity _ ExcellentRange_ goodCharging time is less and has sufficient battery backup ( say 1 day)Conical buds causing pain innear so I removed them.Wires are quite long.Gud to play PugGü§™

title: headphones 1 side of it is not working.called for warranty on No 02249461882 but it's not working
body: After 3-4 months of rare use as like other local headphones one side of headphone is not working ...we called regarding warranty on No 02249461882 but it's is not connecting at all... really don't know if this headphones is made for sport's man's who can use it while doing extensive workouts...how the quality of such headphones like local...

title: No Warranty support from Boat
body: Hi, After using this product for quite sometime now my product stops charging and hence i reached out to boat for the same. My product is still under warranty and i came to know that for this product which is sold on amazon. They do not have any customer care support nor any place to raise the ticket. They simply display the address to Hyderabad city and when you try to call to those number or reach that place no one is there to help you out with you  concern.I am writing this review with my 1st hand experience and i personally feel that there is no service for this particular product. So, Please purchase this product on your own and if it stops working better throw it instead of wasting any time.Thanks.

title: Great product
body: One of the best headsets in terms of quality.. however it doesn't stay in my ears for long..it falls off. Amazon should keep a return policy for them incase you are not comfortable using them you are stuck with it.. otherwise the quality of the headphones is awesome..clarity is good.. especially on calls you won't hear any additional noise..if you're planning to use it for longer duration choose the one tht'll stay in ur ears.

title: Sums up to be a good product at low price . Headphones that can be said to be value for money.
body: I am using this product from last 6 months and happy with its overall performance. Bluetooth connectivity is good connects faster to both Apple phones and android phones .Battery lasts for 5-7 hours depending upon how much calls and music you hear so at this price it‚Äôs a good product to go for . Noise clarity is good but it‚Äôs average for noise cancellation. Would recommend to go for it .

title: Worth for money. Best battery with noise cancellation, with moderate sound quality.
body: This is my 2nd blue-tooth, the sound quality is proportional to the money you pay. Battery back up is really good I used the old one more 10 months and the battery (7-8hrs) performance was still as good as a brand new headset. Now its been 2 months I am using this am happy with the performance. Must buy this product for GYM.Noise cancellation quality is also really good.Can connect 2 device at a time is the best thing. I so connect to my laptop as well as mobile phone this feature really saves time and handy usage.

title: Super satisfied customer. Hence bought 2 of em üòú
body: Great battery standby is the 1st thing i would mention, 2nd would be awesome quality sound. Pretty loud when u need it and not overwhelming at the same time. Great bass and surround effects. This is my second purchase of boat rockerz 255 and am currently using both of em as i am on calls and music most of the time. Still it gives more than 8 hours standby.Great buy. Very much recommended. Also i have claimed warranty from boat and got a replacement so i can say the warranty claim they make works. GO FOR IT.

title: Waste of money
body: This is the very worst product i ever bought, its get automatically disconnected while playing songs or speaking in calls. One side earphones are not working properly. If i used for calls the other person on phone keep complaining about my voice (like your voice not clear, your voice is not audible, your voice is very noise etc...). Not worthy for money, if you are use only for listening songs its suitable otherwise dont go for this. Waste of money....... I got a same complaint on the first one i ordered then i get a replacement but that too seems like the older one..

title: A bit disappointed
body: I have been using this nearly for a year now, a bit disappointed.The only thing that forced me to write a review is after sales service of boat, these guys managed to pick up my earphones during lockdown when I registered a complaint. I have till date claimed the warranty three times ( while I am writing this it is the third time my earphones are with Boat).The first time- there was a malfunctioning issue it used to turn off on its own sometimesThe second time- the time one of the sidrs stopped working, this was during lockdown it took a month for them to give me a replacementThe third time- the mic stopped working, it is currently with them.3 times there is an issue with the quality of the product you offer, although your after-sales service is good but it is of no use of I have to wait a month everytime they stop working.

title: BoAt Rockerz 255 pro+ || Awesome earphone from BoAt || Review By Arif
body: BoAt Rockerz 255 Pro+ , I think it's a brilliant neckband/wireless earphone from BoAt in battery life..I received it on 30 may 10:45 Am (with 100% Charge) i using it from after 12:30 PM , and I reviewing it on 5 june, after using 6 days in normal way (6/7 hour daily), it says battery low on 5 june around 9/10Am , then i plugged in charging for 10 minutes , then it shows 60%, then i think it can provide upto 10 hour or 7/8 hour call/music playback in 10 minutes charge, and it takes 1 hour for full charge..Comment by features :* Look : Look is not a premium look, in comparison to others neckband. (335, 330 etc.)* Noise cancellation : Noise Cancellation is good but not excellent.* Sound Quality : Sound is good and bass is excellent with AAC codec, but my phone (Samsung Galaxy J7 ) doesn't support aptX codec then i can't tell anything about aptX codec..  I'm a bass lover üòç* Battery : battery is awesome , it's provide me 6 days after using it 6/7 hour daily (charge from manufacturer/marketing agency or packer)But you can assume as it can provide 36 to 38 hour battery backup..* Sticker : I puted the sticker on earphone left handle and it's improve the look of the earphone..And i suggesting to BoAt that print this as a plastic print on any handle of earphone..* Dual pairing : Dual pairing is good but not excellent.*** Tips/Suggestions From me : Turn on Hall and surround music effects & balance the bass/treble and Instrumental/Vocal from your phone for better sound quality as per mentioned screenshot.After turning on these effects, you will feel that you are in heaven of music world..After using these effects you can't feel irritation in long period of listening music, it provides you soft music..Note : I'm using it, and i can modify the review as per performance..

title: Not enough range
body: I've been using this headset for over a year now.Still functions as good as a brand new one. Great battery backup and great audio quality.But the device does not have enough range. If the headset is not within close proximity to the paired device, the audio is interrupted, sometimes it even disconnects from the paired device for only a short distance(like just going into the next room) . It's not a big issue for me, but this is a negative aspect of the device I have to point out.But overall experience is great. I do not regret buying this headset (I bought it for INR 900/-).

title: STOPPED WORKING WITHIN A MONTH | DISAPPOINTING CUSTOMER SUPPORT
body: The earphone stopped working within a month after the purchase. No response on charging, no LED light blinking, nothing. Very disappointing!If this wasn't enough, the customer support is even worse. There is no way to register a complaint on the BOAT website, they just tell you the address to the nearest service center.Expecting your customers to visit a service center amidst a pandemic, just for an earphone, is not what you'd expect from a company that literally has the words 'next generation' and 'trendsetting' on its warranty card.This was my first BOAT purchase, which I had made after being impressed by the product portfolio, branding and the fact that BOAT is an Indian company. But with such a disappointing customer support service, I may have to reconsider my future purchase decisions.

title: One of the BEST Earphones in this price range!
body: One of the best quality earphones.Great Build Quality. I don't think anyone would have any problem with that.Great Sound Quality. Clear Sound.Noise Cancellation. Good but scope of improvement.Great fit. If you are going out for running with this earphone, you won't any issue.Good Bass Quality.Highly recommended if your budget is in the price range up to Rs. 1500.Will leave another review, once I try the one plus bullet earphones.

title: Quite nice!
body: The battery backup is excellent. Indeed a great companion for travellers and all those who do not have all-day access to charging points.With normal use it retains enough juice to keep running for at least two days, if not more.Water resistance capability is best in class as well. In times of a pandemic, one is compelled to shower sanitizing spray on electronic equipments. This withstands the liquid pretty well.A perfect purchase!

title: Awsome quality and warranty service is best which I never get in my whole life
body: Boat headphones are based in india.its sound awsome.price is also in range.i really thankful for boat warranty service which I never get in my whole life.my b.headphone sound drop .then contact in customer care.upload my address with bill.they take the product from home and contact every 2days.otherwise msg and mail also.tracking no given also .repaired product given me within 10days.its customer care are really powerful.if customer service is too good then you can purchase any product  from this company.

title: Redesign ear plug as per 2nd Picture.
body: All the features mentioned above meets customer expectations based on value for money . One feature of the product needs rethought in design modification. Ear plug provided doesn't firmly fitInto ear lobe. Very difficult to keep the plugs in place. 2nd picture shows the better design and gives a firm grip.

title: Not Recommended
body: I have purchased the boat earphone [boAt Rockerz 255 Sports in-Ear Bluetooth Neckband Earphone with Mic(Neon)] on 29 Jul 2020, after sometime it disconnects automatically from the device or produce guitar type irritating sound on call so I raised the support case to replace the product under warranty period.They replace headphones and the new product got delivered to me. The worst thing is that this time the product I got is not the same which I ordered. My product which I purchased was [boAt Rockerz 255 Sports in-Ear Bluetooth Neckband Earphone with Mic(Neon)] but the product I have received is BassHeads 220 N In-Ear Wired Earphones which is very cheap as compared to my product. I have tried to contact their support team but they didn't respond to my emails or call.Disappointed with their service.

title: This device failed to connect seamlessly while working with MS Teams app calls / meetings.
body: The music from any app works fine and bass is average.The main purpose I purchased this device is to connect via bluetooth for calls for computer / mobile and move around while i speak. Unfortunately this purpose was not resolved.  The device fails to keep the connection with computer app or mobile app while in call in MS Teams app even if we sitting in front of computer / mobile. Makes a noise which is undesirable.On the other hand it works fine with music from youtube / amazon music app.So if you are looking such device will solve the problem of

title: Good headsets
body: Does the job for bass lover this product bis exceptional. But not for those who don't like bass because bassless songs are struggle to produce clear sound. Medium is excellent but lower volume it struggle to produce pour quality.  Maximum a little bit na ki barabar distortion on some songs. As per price point no complaints (((((chalega))))

title: Value for Money and Classy Feels.
body: I bought Black colour Model and After Using it for more than 10 days i am Writing this Review. The Sound quality, Noise Cancellation, Built Quality everything meets my expectations for this price range. The Color Black suits me because it goes with anything i wear and it was cheaper than other color models . I have also used it in Moderate rain and it still works fine, which states truth of IPX7 Protection. Battery life is best feature, i have myself used it for 5 days without any charge . Charges in less than 2 hours (approx 1.5 houds)if completely drained. Looking for a headphones for using and Not Bragging ( Kind of basic look , not too fancy and you can't flaunt with this colour model ), this is the one.

title: If you are gonna need some good quality music go for it!
body: I have been using it for like 3 months and everything is really good. However it has a very big demerit that is the wire length is very high and looks so awkward. The control buttons aare not present in the neckband but in the wire to the right ear which makes the right sided earbud weigh more and causes discomfort when you go outside. It is only recommended for the persons who are not mobile i.e not moving.

title: Product which is overrated
body: - The quality of sound is good.- It is made in China product, conflicts the claim of make in India.- the ear buds are made of poor quality material. Due to this, it is hard and irritating to ear within short time of usage. It is key for any earphone to be comfortable for ear which is missing here while designing.- Overall quality of material built is inferior.

title: Expectations not met. Totally disappointed with this purchase.
body: Totally disappointed with this purchase. Had high hopes since I was happy with the wired earphones from boAt which was of amazing quality and lasted for more than a year. Just 1 month into using this Rockerz 255 pro, my right earbud stopped working. I can only listen through the left earbud though nothing went wrong with function buttons and speaker. Was satisfied with the sound quality but in the end I was only able to use for a month. Did see negative reviews but did not heed them since I trusted this brand through my experience. There is 1 year warranty but don't know how to avail the benefits as there was no response from the calls that I made to the numbers provided alongwith. I guess it would have been a great purchase if it lasted longer as I have no other complaints whatsoever on the product.

title: Value for money
body: Got this for 1399 during lighting sale.. it is worth for what u paid.. don't expect toooooo much performance.. it is value for money that's it.. yesterday afternoon I have received this product. That time battery was 100%. It is always connected with my phone.. after using of nearly 12 hours (only connected with phone. I am not using for audio & video purpose. Approximately I have used 2 hours for audio and video purpose) now it's battery is 60%.. it is okay product

title: Very good product
body: I used these earphones every day for many hours. They worked very well for so long although I used them very roughly. After extensive usage for one year, there is a problem with the earphones as the wire got twisted and damaged. When raised the repair request on their company's website, Courier person came and picked up the product and after a few days, I received a replacement product. The company didn't asked for any courier charges which is a very good service.

title: Do not buy, Warranty is a SCAM
body: Pros:Decent bass and clear sound qualityCons:Bluetooth range - not so good.Warranty is a scam :The right side of my earphone stopped working after 8 months , was in warranty so was replaced.BUT the replaced earphone though looks same is of very inferior quality.Connects to only one device a a time (the original one connects to 2 devices)Range is even worseSound quality is ok but not as good as original oneBATTERY: Goes straight to 0 from 80% every single time , since the 1st day i received the replacement.DON'T BUY THIS, better go with JBL or add some money and go with One Plus.

title: Zero noise cancellation and Connectivity issues
body: After 15 days of research I ordered this product. I got the neon one. The band is flexible and lightweight. I mostly use this while I go for cycling, on the first day, I just kept my mobile in the front basket of the cycle I was not able to hear any sound from the earphone. Later I moved my phone somewhat near to me then I'm able to hear songs. This is the first thing which I didn't like. Second thing was there is no noise cancellation, very poor noise cancellation. People on the other end of the call are able to hear everything from the background. They are not able to hear my voice properly, background noise was so clear that they disconnected my call telling that they're getting headache. After this incident I immediately returned the product. Usually I don't write reviews for anything, whether it's good or bad. But if I don't write many users will buy the product unknowingly. So do not go for this product. It is not good in any way. Leave about bass and all. There's is no noise cancellation and poor connectivity issues.

title: Worth a Try for Rs. 1100
body: You'll find many reviews about it, but i would like to compare it is my previous realme neckbandMy points1) Megnet is not upto the mark (namesake), realme neckband Megnet is so much powerful2) Megnet does not have any functional capabilities like on/off3) Bass is ok....I mainly bought it mainly for long calls as microfone Housing is somewhat near to mouth compare to others...... for casual music and routine workout.... and it does it well...Suggestions...

title: Don't buy warrenty product
body: The product was niceBut do not trust the warranty given by the company The whole thing is cheating I have made a request to the company if the product is not working they picked my product on May 21 /2021Product replacement on Twenty Days but So far two months have been completed Continuously I'm calling the boat guys But they bothered me a lot  plz don't refer to others

title: This is a great product and the battery backup is great and I plan to order it again.
body: This is a great product and the battery backup is great and I plan to order it again. This product was delivered to me on 21-Oct-21 and since receiving this product I have not recharged it even once. It's surprising but it's all about to my usage. I have liked the one product here other than the oneplus bullet wireless z. Sounds quality are good and Bass is also good, Environmental Noise Cancellation is also good and It's perfectly fit to my ears. I would highly recommended to buy it. And thanks to Appario Retail Private Ltd Seller and also Amazon to Timely delivered my product.Sounds Quality GoodsBass is also GoodEnvironmental Noise Cancellation is also good I'm mostly using this neckband on driving but carefully on road and background noise not disturbing any conversation.

title: Worst boat product ever!!!
body: - Audio issue - when playing YouTube, insta video etc. audio is breaking continuously.- Audio is not so good its just ok type- connectivity issue - Disconnect several times after randomly- They claim battery backup 7-8hrs with 50% if volume, but actually battery back is only 4-5 hours with volume < 50%- There is other neckband with low price and great audio quality then this- I just returned this neckband,-DON'T BUY THIS WORST PRODUCT, MOST OF THE PEOPLE ARE JUST GOING WITH THE "CROWD" :/

title: 7months use update
body: Voice cancellation is jus not available. In six months off light use (twice a week) already one side earphone has got loose connection... Totally a no...This was my review at 6 mos, I claimed for warranty online, they picked up product and replaced it. Totally hassle free exchange.. So that's commendable I guess.. So giving 4 star sound has been great always especially the bass. Awesome service guysüëå go for it

title: A Mediocre product
body: 1. The battery indicator only shows in miltiples of 20%.100%, 80%60,40% and 20%. Once it reaches 20% it's pretty much unusable as it keeps on promoting"Battery Low" which is very annoying.2. The battery does not fall linearly. Almost half if the runtime will cause it to fall to only 80% and the next thing you know you're already at 20%3. he charging takes an eternityüòí4. Build quality looks good, buttons feel sturdy enough5. Audio quality is mediocre6. Would've been better if it had a c-type connector instead of micro-usb7. Audio breaks and/or stutters when you leave your phone in the other room. Bluetooth 5.0 may have solved this issue8. Did not have any issue with pairing and connecting9. Would've loved the auto on/off feature when it the earbuds are held together or pulled apart magnetically

title: Earphone cables are a bit lengthy that makes irritation
body: In terms of price range it is a good earphone but not the best one. Sound quality is good, no issues with battery life and also feels very comfortable around your neck. Sometimes the connection was breaking while you are travelling by vehicle but it is not a big issue as it happens rarely. The only thing that I did not liked was the length of cable. It was really a bit long that can make some disturbance to you especially when you are not listening to music and casually hangs it from your neck. However the magnetic effect was working very fine.

title: Best in range and Serves the purpose
body: I personally have a problem with headphones as none of them would fit into my ear during running and workout.But trust me this one is the best as it has better sound quality and doesn‚Äôt slip off.Got this one during festive season at 999rs.It has descent battery backup as well.My marathon run has become more enjoyable now.Thanks Team Boat.. üëçüèº

title: Value for Money
body: I wasnt expecting the world after reading the reviews, but these seem to work pretty well for the basic purposes. Noise cancellation, as expected is average. Bass is slightly low for my liking but over all sound quality isnt bad at all, especially given the price. I would say, for a pair of everyday earphones, these are definitely a good choice. I have been using them for a week or so, shall update review in a month if need be.

title: Good for music but not for call - A Honest review after a year of Use....
body: At this budget, this earphone is very good. I am using this earphones for almost a year. This earphone is very good for normal music. Don't expect too much of Audio quality. The call quality is pretty decent. No ANC is available, so if you are in a noisy area or under the fan, it will definitely affect your voice signal at the other end, so the receiver might not hear your voice very clearly. It can connect up to two devices at a time. I am connecting both my phone and laptop at a time, therefore it satisfies my need of having a single earphone for multiple devices. Given the price segment, this is one of the best earphones. Go for it without a second thought if you want one in a budget segment.

title: Product good but after sales service centres inadequate
body: Hi Boat.!First of all You seriously need to increase service centres in Delhi. Last checked - just 5 for whole of Delhi.!! That's ridiculously low.Purchased rockerz 255 pro on 3rd May, it developed snag on 1 September. Went to service centre in karol bagh on 3rd. Was shocked to see atleast 100 people waiting for their turn to enter 10x10 service centre. Took me 3-4 hours to get the complaint registered. Must add, staff was very courteous. Now will get replacement product in 9-12 days.Please look into this.

title: Excellent product go for it üëå
body: Boat is a company which is known for it's quality and  affordable prices it's a company you can trust I got these rockerz 255 pro + at 1300 let me tell you about these crazy piece of metal my order was delivered within 3 days  here is my experienceSound quality -Sound quality is excellent  it has 10mm sound drivers which gives your neckbands  a deep bass and clear sound  if you are a bass lover, you'll love it even more ,voice of music never distorts at high volumes even at 100 percentCalling -Calling feature is quite good and sound is perfectly clear you can easily cut and pickup calls by using the multifunction buttonBattery-The best feature about these neckbands is the battery it has a massive 300 mAh battery which is pretty long lasting I used these neckbands straight for 6 days from the day of delivery with daily time usage of 5 to 6 hrs at 80 to 70% volume still it showed 40% battery left which is impressive charging is also very fast 10 min charge will definitely give you upto 8 to 9hrs playbackAdditional features -It has active noise cancellation which gives it a clear soundYou can connect upto 2 devices at a timeBuild quality looks luxurious and it hasCons-Only problem with these neckbands is that sometimes it gets uncomfortable in your ears if used for longer durations

title: Don't work with laptop, Poor voice quality with mobile as well. No deep base as mentioned
body: Poor voice quality at this price, my wired earphone at 455 providing same quality.I have to raise volume above warning level to listen to the music videos from mobile.Not working with Laptop at all, voice breaking after 1-2 seconds.Poor Bluethooth needs to connect manually everything with laptop and mobile as well, No auto connect.So I am returning this item, not useful at all as I specially need with laptop as well.I had Intex 201 Road Headphones which was having 10x better voice and mouth deeper base and 24 hrs backup,  I was used to charge after 4-5 days. I was feeling like theatre with less than the full volume. which was cheaper, I bought that at 999 only.

title: Ok ok product not up to the mark
body: After using of 7 days I am sharing my experience build quality is goodBattery back is good almost 8 hrs long after one chargedThe wire looks weird in your neck the length of the wire is too long it seams touching to near by your navelMagnetic part is work prety well but in only 7 days the logo of Boat is getting fadeSound quality is good but not up to the markWhile driving the 2 wheeler wearing this headphones the disturbance while listening the music online experienced couple of times may be due to lack of connectivity of BluetoothMost bad thing about this device is it captured surrounding sound very quickly/easily better than your voice during on call ppl compleining what's going on near by you so my main purpose of purchasing this is not solved thoroughly as I want noise cancellation during call but it totally failed I purchased in 999 bucks

title: Dissapointed with this model.. Thought to return back
body: Dissapointed with this model. I love boat heat sets. But this model has many flaws. Speaker volume is very low. Speaker magnets are not that good. No auto switch off and unpairing when we remove the two speakers. Thought to return back

title: Have trust in boat,but not this time...
body: Very happy to receive the product well before delivery date,good work amazon.I bought these ones after seeing it's no of buyers,good reviews etc.But the product won't connect to the Bluetooth,It just would not show on my mobile/laptop while connecting through Bluetooth.I might have received a defective product,so can't comment on the sound,but the construction of the device is super good for it's price,packaging was also good,also you can connect to only a single device at a time if that matters.I had immediately applied for refund,as I might not go with boat again.My next most preferred earphones is the OnePlus bullets...

title: Stop working within 3 weeks of purchase.
body: I received my boatz earphone of 1 Dec,2021 and it stopped working on 19 December,2021. It would not start still after having full charge. Resetting the earphone also didn't help. And the worst part is the customer support of boat, they keep on cancelling my replacement request, I don't know why but they keeping doing it. Today is 30th December, 2021 and they have cancelled my replacement request for third time. Those who are looking for Bluetooth earphones just keep in mind that the customer support of boat is the worst. You can buy OnePlus or any other earphone with good customer support, because these devices tend to get defective after a while.Thanks for reading this review & regards.

title: Happy with purchase completed year !!!
body: Build quality is goodEasily adjustable in ear üëÇSound wise no matter if you keep your phone in pocket it work the same.Charging time on continous use u can expect 6 hours.Standby 4+ days ( I only tried for ths much)Has pretty decent bass is ths range - 999 + 10 percent bank cash back.Took around 2 hours to charge thts fine.Major problem is on call ü§ô people also will able to hear surrounding voice.No voice cancellation of surrounding.As well as boat has pretty decent service to replace.I'm pretty happy with the purchase.Locket + earphones üòÑ

title: Three cheers for boatüòòüòòüòò
body: First when I opened the Amazon wrapper, I am little bit upset as the box is tampered and seal seeems to be broken, hence I thought the product may be used. But when I have just paired and start listening...just brilliant!!! Under 1.2k I don't think you can find better than this.Pros:Sound is crispy and clearMaterial and designPriceCon:Bass is not so high, but it is enough!!!Love the co. This is my third earphone from boat and I have never disappointed. Whoever want a budget earphone, just go for it.

title: Noise cancellation technology
body: I have placed an order this headset as it have mentioned that it comes with CVC noise cancellation technology but when I have tested this product it doesn't have any kind of noise cancellation feature. Then I have replaced the product but again I didn't get noise cancellation feature with headset. So I have returned this headset and got refund.I really like this headset so please help me with noise cancellation feature for this headset. Is it misleading or I have got defective product both times???

title: Highly recommended
body: I got this beast for 1300 . And I am happy . Noise cancellation is good . Without songs u can use it to  meditate . I don't know a lot abt bass and all but sound quality is good . One week review , approx used it for 32 hrs in one week without charging and it is still showing 35 % battery . I still don't know abt water proofing and yes connecting to two devices ( phone and laptop) helps

title: Comfort is the only issue
body: Pros:1. Battery is superb, I have used it for 10 days with single charge.2. Can connect to 2 devices at a time, this feature is very useful for me during work to connect to laptop and phone.Cons:1. Not comfortable, gives ear pain, feels heavy. You need to keep your head straight cannot move much, may be because of the cable type.2. Cannot use during work out, comes out of ear, specially the right ear bud because of the weight of seperate controller in cable. Controls should have been provided in the module itself.

title: Honest review after use of one month.
body: In this budget range this is the best heaphone. Sound quality is inadjestubaly great, and bass is good enogh for this price range.1.Sound quality#Good points.*Best quality in this price range*Heavy sound recognisable even in low voice*High and low pitches are identifiable*Great experinece for 6+D Musics#Draw backs*In louder volume music can be heard by third person*long period of use causing heavy ear pain.2.Bass#Good* Good in price range* Gaming sounds are realistic#Draw backs*Extra bass for music is not available3.Noice cancellation#Good*Use for calls*In low traffic Noice cancellation is much helpfull#Draw back*Not Usable in heavy traffic*Weak cancellation in noisy condition4.Connectivity#Good*Bluetooth version 5 is available*Can get the range of an average 10m*No lag in the time of any type of videos#Drawback*Sometimes connection loss in time of calls*Lags experience in the time of gaming.It is the best earphone in this price range. Easily connective to an device and easily carriable and good body condition.

title: Best but very Costly
body: This product is very good. My wife is using it since a year. We had purchased it for Rs.890/-. Thus Rakshabandhan, I wanted to gift this same earphone to my sisters however price has increased to Rs.1500/-. This product is worth buying however I have given 2 stars less just because the earphone being an old model, they have increased it's price.

title: Good product in this price range
body: The product is good in its price range along with boats quality and confidencepros:Good battery . It lasts about 6-7 hours with moderate use.Design and style is appreciableProduct build quality is fine.The bluetooth connectivity is good. Covers a decent range .cons:The buds aren't comfortable . Ear will hurt after a while .The bass and volume are not up to the mark when compared to wired headset in this price range.Problems with audio while connected to 2 devices simultaneously.Conclusion: The set is good for people looking for the benefits of bluetooth connection. Not recommended for people who wants high audio quality and bass.

title: Waste of money
body: I gave a 2 ‚≠êfor this product just because of the battery capacity. It's battery is excellent. So being this big battery actually made this the worst, it's actually because of there design. It's really heavy. The battery part(which is the part where the battery,charging,volume and power button is located) is damn heavy and is placed alongside the right earbuds wire(As you can see in the picture of the product). Because of this even after wearing the headset properly, it's always leaning to fall from my ear(especially when I am joggingüèÉ it always falls from my ear(right ear only).  This is major drawback along with the terrible sound quality (very low sound and nearly deadly bass)

title: Thank God I chose this one !
body: You get what you pay for.Honestly... Its been almost 1 year and this product is performing the same as it did on the first day.Also it doesn't provide any kind of Delay while you're playing FPS SHOOTING GAMES like PUBG Mobile or Call Of Duty MOBILE.The only issue I went through, is a physical one.The charging port got loose and is now moving internally but it still charges the earphone at a certain angle. Although it just needs a simple soldering and its back to work again.Overall... Outstanding product !

title: Excellent features Bluetooth neckband
body: It‚Äôs a very good product. Quality is fabulous. Also it‚Äôs material is durable . Sound quality is also nice which give some extra bass. Battery backup is almost if 7-8 hours and requires 1.5-2 hours for fully charging. The design of the product and the available colours make it suitable for daily use. It automatically turns off if not in use for about 15 minutes. Moreover, it has magnetic earbuds. The product also comes with 1 year warranty. The product got delivered the very next day when I ordered the neckband. I really liked this boAt Rockerz 255 sports Bluetooth neckband. You will also definitely like this Bluetooth neckband.

title: Don't get influenced by the celebrity ads
body: Absolutely poor quality sound, very low volume, lousy bass. I would have even ignored the sound but for the fact that the earphones just don't fit properly. Even with all the options given. These are only suitable for walking at a leisurely pace for those who are on a very tight budget. NOT recommended for running or jogging as the earbuds will keep popping out. I  returned the originals once thinking I had a defective piece but the replacement too had the same issue. Spend a little more and buy something better.

title: Facing issue with whatsapp video call
body: When I'm trying to do video whatsapp call, the video paused during the call. When I turn off Or disconnect bluetooth connection the call normalize. I tried almost everything by unpairing the headphones and check all possible settings but still facing the same issue.

title: Great product!
body: I really loved these headphones. My intent to buy them was for the gym and they completely solve the purpose. They are light weight. Easy to use headphones. I also use them for all my calls now, it is saving me from all that radiation we take from using the smartphone on our ear. Really happy with it.

title: A small view after using it
body: Bad product... within one year right side connection is lost... totally fake product..I was bought it with around 1500 rupees but now it's available with only 900 rupees..but finally products are fake...on the other hand we can't repair this due to absence of service centre...

title: Good buy but not sure of battery life
body: Head phone is good but after talking for some time i noticed a flaw or a fault when the head phone is on 60% and if u r talking it will be beep twice after sometime and it turn off. Maybe a fault not noticed or I have a faulty headphone. Noise cancellation not so good in this headphone and not recommended for Gym lovers as the headphones don't stay put for a long time.

title: not worth it
body: Its been an year after I have bought this product and I would say it's not at all good. Sound quality, noise cancellation are all fine however in a span of one year I had to send the product thrice to get it repaired. Everytime one of the side stopped working and this was same with many of my friends as we ordered one after the other. For first three months it will work fine but the the problem starts. Even to get it repaired it takes weeks in resending and getting it back.

title: Worthful among all competitors in the market , even better than from some of high range products

Totally worth it to buy it from Amazon, beware to buy it from other portals ,  one of them delivered me a same korain product which is not genuine,  so returned it back and then ordered from Amazon.

title: Don‚Äôt buy

( a cheap product selling company) was liable to give  free replacement, Till due date  was  on i did follow up with  their customer service number , they  gave me reason of pandemic and said  their will be delay and  will be provided replacement as soon despite of delay,Despite of several call  I had escalated  this mater to  their administration email id.  And now they have removed my complaint  number 1054133 from their system. And not even bothered to respond to my mail, call back .Already  boat  products are very worst in performance and  this  is not brand product, i thoroughly regret to chose this cheap- boat product , i realized brand is brand Boat - is cheap product selling , it is not at all  a Brand . Pay some extra money but don't go for such a cheap product.

title: TOTAL SCAM
body: This product is like a total scam. I ordered this product and received a product which had only one side working the other side of the earphone was not working. I initiated a replacement.The next day I received another product which is visible in the photos.The product does not contain the 6&9 of the earphone.This product seemed that it was already used and just handed over to us.This company selling this product is a total scam and would not even give 1 star and totally not recommended.Thank you.After replacement also, the 6 and 9 given are chopped off and clearly it shows that someone else used it.

title: genuine sound quality

Average build qualityCompared with my previous Sennheiser CX 275 this one less quality only.if your in very tight budget if you want to purchase Bluetooth neckband go for this otherwise dont buy.

title: Quality not good being a big brand

They replaced within week. After use for 10 days,  left hand side earphone stopped working. Again I have to sent it back for repair. Now, 9 days has passed still waiting for the product after repair. Please send it soon. Thanks.

title: Unexpected quality product recieved
body: I received the product on 22 Aug 21. Upto 15 days the headphone was ok, but later the button stopped working, neither it offs, i have to keep it on continue, all 3 buttons are not working, did not expected thisfrom boat. Sound quality is good, bass is ok, noise cancellation is not as expected. They say thart there is 1 year warranty, so how can 1 replace my product. I need a replacement for my headphone, now where do i contact, as the replace window is closed. Plz kindly suggest me where to replace the headphone.

title: Affordable product with a brand name.
body: Very Nice product in the price range.Nice sound and base output. The only area it lags is the outside noice cancellation but it is manageable.Here are some key features of the product:boAt signature audio: boAt Rockerz 255, while being lightweight in design pumps out your favourite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bassPowered By Qualcomm CSR8635 Chipset : High Level functionality is provided to the boAt Rockerz 255 by the Advanced Qualcomm CSR 8635 Chipset providing the features of the latest Bluetooth 4.1 Version10 mins charge, 45 mins play : The boAt Rockerz 255 are equipped with a 110 mAH battery that'll surely allow you to spend your time with these earphones a quarter of your dayAttractive ergonomics with a Comfort Fit: Built with uncompromised craftsmanship from premium materials including metal housing earphones and chrome accents the boAt Rockerz 255 is both sturdy and stylishFree access controls: Since controlling your phone through your hands is too mainstream nowadays, you can take charge of your auditory experience with the boAt Rockerz 255With the inline controls you can toggle the volume, skip tracks, attend calls, and activate Siri, Google Now or Cortana voice-controlled Smartphone assistantsWith the wireless functionality and free access controls, the boAt Rockerz 255 is surely your companion for your travel and daily needs, stay edgy with voice command.The build is nice and light and looks very attractive around the neck.

title: Nice product, great sound.
body: I bought this product in sale, so got it in very affordable prices.my first impression towards the wireless earphones are not so good, as it comes with some constraints in which battery issue is one of the major.but after purchasing this product my perception is completely change, this earphone has a very nice battery backup, I have used this earphones since last couple of months but still I have not facing any issue for use this product. also has a very nice build and durable quality.I recommend to all who wants to buy wireless earphone in affordable price.

title: Okay product.
body: Built and finish is good. Don't expect much from sound quality it's good by price. Just arrived. First impressions.After use extensivelyPros: best battery, best for binge watching, connection range, calling.Cons: not for exercise, not for running, not for music, No app for updates, earplugs get loose in workout.

title: Better go for other models
body: Have been using it for past 8 months and below are my observations.Its been an average earphone that does the job.But more than liking it, I am disliking it.Cons:1. We need to press power button for few seconds to on/off and wait for 10 seconds or something to be complete the boot up.2. Doesn't have magnetic on/off features which are available in other earphone of similar range.3. Battery life is low. I am able to manage with office calls for a day.4. Most thing i hate is the long charging time. Takes more than an 1.5 hrs to charge from 0 to 100.Instead of this just increase the budget and go for oneplus Bluetooth Earphones.

title: Good but with a pain
body: Awesome speakers with good amount of bass...at full volume you might get a headache but around 80% sound max you can enjoy your music. Got it delivered today and after 30mins or so..my ear started to pain...not comfortable...battery is not great 100-80% in 10mins usage...my be i need to charge more as a first time..charged it for like 10mins and the was full - the blue light was on and i used...Overall OK product but my ear hurts

title: Quality compromised however model name is same
body: This is my 2nd boat rockerz 255. The one which i used before had a little bit more clear sound in terms of mids and lows, it was a tat louder aswell. The 2nd One which i purchased 2 weeks ago seems having the same model number but the quality has definately been downgraded, the branding on back of the earpiece has also got washed out in 2 weeks. I beleive this has been purposely done by boat as there is a high demand of this earphone and they are selling it at their lowest price ie 999 during the sales.The people who had the old make and has the new make aswell will definately understand what i am saying. When connected to bluetooth the old one said "you r now connected to boat rockerz 255" however the new one says "you r now connected to boat rockerz" this is one of the difference aswell.Boat will loose customers faith if the downgrade their product and sell it with the same name.

title: Terrific purchase
body: Review for this product is always positive as the product itself is amazing.Bass is very much exceptional as we can expect it from any of the Boat accessories.Audio quality is Good.It gives 6 to 7 hours of battery life on continuous music play or movie time. While gaming it gives approximately 10 hours of battery life, I personally tested it.But one cannot put it on ears for a very long time. Ears start aching a little after 3 hrs of uninterrupted usage.Connectively is very good. Sometimes it gives normal glitches but still there is no need to bother about it.My overall experience is Highly Satisfactory and worth buying it!I Recommend to buy it without any hesitation.  Very good product at this price range.

title: Good for call and bass songs

I use this for calling and music the bass is Extremely good and for music this is good but battery life not so good and all things considered good and Sounds is loud not as loud as wired earphone but it good and Bluetooth is really good. title: Bad Bluetooth connectivity
body: Worst product I haver seenMultiple try than it will connectI does not support dual devicesNoice cancellation is ok to the extentRange of this product too much lowI buy this product because of nameNow I regret why I purchase this productIf you ask they can replaceI already replaced and they send this worst product as there is one time warranty they take advantage of this send worst productI buy this product without discount means rs1500Now one can understand how bad product is itNot RS. 999Better to purchase product worth RS 350I regret but I can't do anything other than this

title: Only Replacement item no refund
body: This is a good quality ear phones with durable wire. But the wire is very hard not so flexiable and big compared with other earphones. This doesn‚Äôt fit to a pocket for sure. It has a magnetic base which combines two sides when not in use. The major thing is that this ear phones once bought cannot be returned only replacement option is available in amazon which is quite disappointing

title: Must have earphone, but its not perfect
body: Love these around the neck earphones, good sound. The only issue, minor detail is I don't understand why Boat placed the minus volume button on top n positive below on control tab. Its the wrong way around. All headphones have the positive on top n negative below.

title: #Stupid policies #Disgusting services
body: I ordered the boat rockerz 255 sports earphones and thr is a problem in the bluetooth connectivity as the signal drops also the battery backup is not good and not working upto 6 hours which they have mentioned in the detailsThe most disturbing is when i asked the customer exceutive to return it its not ina policy and when i asked to ship a replacement order pickup and drop on my new address they are unable to change the address. This is the kind of services amazon and policy they have.#Stupid policies#Disgusting services

title: Great piece of kit.
body: Absolutely great headset. I have been using it moderately and after over a week, I am still at 60% battery. Haven't charged it once since purchase. The sound quality is very good and the entire headset is pretty sturdy. I especially like the flat wires used and they flex quite well. I don't see these fraying at the joints until the wire just breaks. It connects to Bluetooth with all my equipment with absolutely no fuss.The one thing that niggles is the magnet that attaches the pods together when not in use is not powerful enough and they hang loose at the smallest pressure. Also, I miss the automatic switch-off when you attach the earpods to each other.

title: Good product for casual user.
body: I got it fo rs.900+ in offer. Worth the money. Quality was okay for 900 but actual cost was 2000+ so for 2000rs its not up to mark. Sound quality was amazing. It cancel noise for some extent. In this price cant expct 100% so 5 star from ma side. Bluetooth connectivity s working fine so far. Can connect 2 device at once. So if u listn song frm any bluetooth device n u get cal from ua phone , u can recieve right away. Overall satufied by it.

title: Boat rokers
body: Battery life was good for few days did not get extension for one day for product replacement  as requested call centre exe but didn't work no service centre accept warranty for items purchased from Amazon .So big no next time  items purchased  from local shops as customer gets service .Too bad

title: Below average performance at this price
body: Not worth of RS 1599/- below average performance.If u music and bass lover don't buy it.If u also gamer lover don't go for it it has high latency rate you'll hear delay voice and sounds. Using this for one month.Not good for listening music.If u drive bike and use this has major problem that right side bud blow away from force air.Company claiming that this can connect two device at the same time it's false.If u connect with Mobile and then connect on computer u have to disconnect from first device and also delay in pairing. If u turn of mobile bluetooth and powern on Headphone it don't connect automatically you have to go to bluetooth setting and connect or on/off bluetooth of Mobile and laptop.

title: Good deal for a low price Rs.889
body: Got this deal Amazon Great Indian SaleIt's a worthful deal at the price of Rs.899Battery life is around 5 to 7 hrs (not sure of the maximum limit)Good connectivityBass is little higherWire is little long but its best used for sports activities...difficult to hide device inside the shirtGoogle assistant works fineI doubt the durability of the wireIn short, best for the budget sports headset at low cost( Just wait for the deal and buy for 889 then if its not working after 7-9 months just replace it with another deal) just my opinion for low budget headset

title: Read full review
body: 1.Design flaws: the neck band is oversized & has no spring action to lock around neck thus while running bounces off ur neck/shoulders which irritates & produces rubbing noise.2.Product defects: Bluetooth mic not functioning.3.Return policy Flaws: for COVID precautions, I disposed off the original packing immediately and thus now CANNOT return the item :(

title: Average prouct
body: I was going to buy a Bluetooth wireless headsets but couldn‚Äôt find a single one with good rating and ultimately purchased boat ones and they weren‚Äôt even getting connected to had to return them and purchased this instead.It does the work but isnt wireless entirely.Ok for the price.

title: Decent audio quality but keeps skipping...
body: I've tried 3 different earphones of the same model and in each one I observed that the audio skips even when the phone it's connected to, is right in my back pocket.While listening to music, the audio quality is decent and battery life is about 5-6 hours depending on the volume levels. On calls, the audio is also decent and others were able to hear me clearly.Overall, it's a decent pair of in-ear earphones within 1500 bucks as compared with JBL.

title: Best quality and sufficient back up. Connects to devices fastly.
body: Connects to 2 devices simultaneously. Sound quality is good. Charges fastly. Nice to buy. Very good mic quality so no issues of voice on the other side. Very useful devices for talking in meetings while WFH.I bought second and my brother is happy with it.

title: It's okay. Could have been better
body: I bought these for ‚Çπ1,500. And this review is edited after 7 months of usage.Cons:-1.My battery life drained to just 45 min working in 1 month usage. Though it might be because I used a higher voltage charger than what was instructed.2. One thing that I hate absolutely is the the greeting tone when you switch it on or off. The voice is so shrill that it hurts my ear. So that might be irritating if you have sensitive ears.3.Sound quality is average. Base is normal, nothing to hype about.4. Some kind of a plastic coating started coming out after 7 months of usage. But no harm as such to the product.Pros-1. The wire looks feeble and weak, but it is not. More than 6 months of usage and no such complaint.2. The sound is loud. Helpful for the ones who like listening to music on high volumes.

title: Value for Money
body: Having used Senheissers cx275 wired in ear headphones, I find the sound quality average. But then this is a Bluetooth headphone and for this price is value for the money paid. Bluetooth works upto a radius of 5~8 m with no obstruction between.Finally you get the value for what you pay for though I felt the sound quality could have been better.

title: Full review after 6 months of uses
body: Very good product for bass loverPro:1-. Good bass2- maximum sound level is good compare to other3- fines of earphone just create vaccume like so outside sounds is eliminated4- great battery backup5-charging time is very less6- a indian company product7- very comfortable for long usesCon:-1-design is not attractive.2- sound clearty is just above average3-after 6 month uses range of connectivity is also not good4-bit of heavy

title: Low quality product. Boat has disappointed me on my first purchase from the company.
body: 1. Bluetooth range is poor - Disturbance even with a 10ft distance2. Multiple device support is bad - This is no longer a fancy feature. It is much needed. This device cannot connect and disconnect seamlessly.3. On/off switch is weird - Sometimes the device is on and even after a long press of 30 seconds it doesn't switch off and doesn't connect to a device either.4. Hanging magnet - I do not understand why all BT earphones in India follow this design. Mpow Jaws has a brilliant design where the earphones have a slot in the neckband where they stick when not in use instead of dangling near the chest. Mpow Jaws is expensive in India but is cheap in the US where I used them for 4 years straight.Wish that companies like Boat can replicate such a simple technology and design in India as well.

title: It's must a good buy
body: I felt when I listened any song I got its not as clear as it should be..I'm not not saying sounds quality is bad it's very good enough, I enjoyed a lot with pop songs ...I just saying clearity is not up to the mark but the base is extremely fantastic...one who loves bass in a song that person can go towards this product blindly... call quality is excellent but if you will buy this product to enjoy with BGMI as well ...this product is not made for yours..it happens not only with this all kind boat neckbands has sound letacy problem which gives you not up to mark experience while playing in BGMI...u have to use your wired earphone for this.. overall I love this product..hope for the best how it will be lasting üéà‚ù§Ô∏èüî•

title: I give honestly reviews after two week of usage
