title: Worst experience I ever had
body: Worst experience I ever had, waste of money.Received a defective piece, the sound quality is very low.The battery back up was given as 8 hours but its losts only in an hour and that too with decreasing volume.The device is not detectable for phones and laptops. Waste of money, the quality is very bad. I have uploaded pics as well, please think before buying it.

title: Great earphones üëç
body: This earphone is very good and very comfortable. Very good for bass lovers and noice cancellation is decent. I brought this for 999 so I think it is worth the price. But if you are not used to the rubber tip it has for not slipping from the ears then it is a little bit itchy sometimes but after we are used to it then its not a big problem. The only problem is that there are no service centers near me I live in Thane and the center is in Andheri and the one I got here is not good, they never have the stock and always delays the service. title: Poor bluetooth connectivity, poor batter back up
body: Pros - sound is clear, fairly loud with less distortion, charges very quickly - in 20 min.Cons - poor battery back up, discharges equally quickly (max 3-4 hours). Keeps losing connection with your device even when you are sitting next to your phone or laptop. The connection, switch on switch off notification is very loud.Previously I had a Boult bluetooth headset. It gave me very good connection, very good battery back up and clear sound.

title: 100 marks for this neckband
body: I just love everything about this neckband. Had a worst experience using JBL. After that I bought this one. I just love it. It has a fantastic battery life.. songs just sound amazing. Within just 20 mins charging I can use it for almost 5 hours continuously.

title: Overall review(charge, battery, design, audio quality, noise cancellation and many)
body: Battery backup is good. It lasts for 3 day and night as an average usage.The buttons are too smooth and gets pressed with body movement.Bass is extraordinary as usual with boAt.Charged before 2 days and I'm using with that charge. So I'm not that sure about the charging time.The LED indicator is a bit disturbing at night asusual with boAt.Audio quality is great.Also has a high quality mode additionally.Strictly NO NOISE CANCELLATION.

title: Very Poor mic sound input, Not useful for calls/meetings/WFH. Replaced device is also having issue
body: I have purchased 255 Pro device 3 weeks back and I am already having 255 Sports device with my wife. This is my genuine feedback.When I started to use 255Pro for my meetings, there was always someone who complained me about my voice is too low. This was not a issue with 255 sports device. I compared the mic sound input quality in macbook by going in sound input settings and compared the sensitivity. 255 Pro mic sound input quality was very poor than 255 sports. Same issue was when I connected the device to mobile as well.I went to service center in Pimpri/Pune and got this replaced. When I check the same sensitivity again it was still same, very poor Mic sound/input quality.If you have finalised boat, then go for 255 sports instead of 255 pro.

title: Vinay
body: Delivery service is worst. I was waiting for my order since morning as it was to deliver on Wednesday for God sake I didnot receive any call, when I checked in the app it showed me product is out for delivery. I tried to call the Amazon delivery number since morning, call rings n get disconnected. It was 7 in the evening, I called the number again call connected n delivery guy stated he will come in 2 hours. I was angry like anything, is that a tym to deliver the product ? I said to him I need the product urgently as I had to go out, however it got delivered at 8.30.Coming to the product it is good for the people who are looking for Bass. We cannot hear the words clearly, Bass is too high some times and it blocks ur ears completely cannot hear the sounds around you. Felt dangerous while driving n other situations. Battery will last upto 6 to 7 hrs when fully charged. However I bought it at discount for 899/- it is good at this price range.

title: Awesome Bluetooth Earphones
body: Wow! More than what I expected.Sound quality - 5/5Bass - 4/5Noise cancellation - 5/5I received the product just some minutes ago so don't know about the battery back up. But I'm sure it must be good too.Overall, it's just awesome in this price range. You should definitely go for it.EDIT -After 11 months of usage, one side of the earphone was not working. Maybe it was because of my carelessness. But thanks to BoAt. I applied for a replacement and I received a brand new piece in about 25 days as it was still in warranty period. Just go for it without any second thought. Amazing earphone!

title: Good bass, Value for money, Magnet feature is good
body: On time delivery and product is good.. the bass wasn't feeling great initially but after changing the in-ear buds with the bigger ones provided in the packing the sound was significantly better with better bass and treble. Easily connected to my mobile phone, Smart TV, and laptop. I got it on 26th October, today is 30th.. I have not had to charge it at all so far.. i use it for a couple of hours everyday.. so battery life also seems decent.It's good value for money. Would surely recommend.

title: Superb battery life, built and heavy bass
body: This product absolutely nails battery life, I hardly worry about its battery running out and then comes the sound, it has a bass heavy sound signature which you come to expect from a boat product, it fits well in my ears and provides some environmental noise cancelling, nothing like active noise cancelling but it is something, the built quality of my unit is pretty good using it for about a month now but still no loose ends. In conclusion, it is a good product if you don't want long and frequent charge times like me or you are a fan of boat's bass heavy music then it is perfect for you. Anyways at this price point it is quite compelling.

title: Damaged exactly after the warranty expired, the product is good but expected a bit more life.
body: I bought the product at 899 in 2019 September on 2021 Feb ie exactly after 5 months of warranty expiring the product has been damaged.Also they do not have much service centers in tier 2 cities so please try to check the service centers also.Product users experience: The product is good has good sound quality but if your planning use it while driving a bike not so good as it attracts wind noise.

title: Near flawless
body: After using this for almost a month, here is my review:Best things: Amazing battery backup (almost 6-7 hours), very good noise cancellation, comfortable, easy to use, proper sizeCould have been better things: The quality of sound could have been slightly better, I don't have any other complains.Absolutely go for it, best option in this price range. You will not find any other in this range that is this good.

title: Boat Rockerz 255 Sports. The Perfect Choice!
body: This will give you worth of every rupee you spend. Don't go for boat rockers 255 pro because its almost the same (except bluetooth 5.0)PROS:1. Sound- compared to the non-pro version, it seems to me that there's slight improvement in quality. Not that it is very noticeable, but a slight improvement.Bass- has got good quality and quantity of bass compared to others in the same price range. The bass is clean, tight and is not muddy like realme bluetooth earphones.Vocals- the vocals are clear and crisp.Loudness- it is loud enough to be heard in a noisy environment.2. Comfort- the earphones are comfortable to wear but without the ear guides. Maybe that's just me, but wearing along with the ear guides gave me pain in the ears which eased off once the ear guides were removed.3. Design- it is of neckband design that is comfortable to wear. The buds have got magnets in it which helps it stick to one another when hanged down so that no tangling occurs.4. Colour- comes in some trendy colours like yellow, teal green, blue and red. The youngsters would love this just for that.5. Fast charging- gets completely charged in just an hour and has got high voltage protection too.6. Sound isolation- nothing to brag about but comparable with others in the same price segment.7.Mic- the calls were very clear. The person at the other end told me that the voice was audible without any disturbances and indeed very clear.8. Connectivity- this has got the A2DP feature. So dual connectivity is present and I did not experience any connection drops of any kind.9. No Lag- there was no lag experienced while playing PUBG.CONS:1. Battery- this is the biggest gripe anyone could have with this earphone. The battery gets emptied quickly compared with its peers. Though there's fast charging one would expect headphones in this price range to last at least 10 to 12 hours but not Rockers PRO lasts for almost 6 to 8 hours. That's what I got out of them and that was not enough.2. Price- the asking price of 1599rs is high. You may get it for 1200rs during offers. Even then it is not value for money because of the poor battery backup.3. No auto on-off with magnetic buds- the feature which is present in Realme bluetooth earphones. This feature could have improved the battery life of this pair very much but alas it doesn't have it.Final words:Boat Rockerz 255 Pro bluetooth earphones are good in terms of sound quality and trendiness but lack in terms of battery backup. Though there are several pros than cons it all comes down to the battery life and this one loses out on that badly.

title: Not good for runners
body: It feels like some cheap plastic, not a good fit on your ears.Don't even think about it for while doing cardio activities, not a secure fit. The neckband model was a worst choice by me for such activities, should have opted for TWS earbuds.Sound quality is good when at home or some quiet place.The magnetic tips do not stay fit properly due to its uncanny design.Battery life is excellent though, I charge once in 5 or 6 days after extensive usage.

title: Value for money for price paid
body: I am using the earphones for two months now.Sound quality is good. Charging lasts for a day at the most. Dual connect feature is unique and awesome. You can connect on laptop as well as your phone at the same time. You can pause audio/video in one device and play in other device. Band is flexible which increases it's durability. While Sony offers better Bluetooth earphones at higher prices with longer battery life it lacks this flexibility. Noise cancellation does not work properly. If you are travelling and speaking on a call the other person will understand that you are travelling which is not the case with Sony earphones. One should assess one's needs and choose one to go for.Unlike Boat headphones it does not sound outside when turned On/Off (Those who have used Boat headphones will understand this better).

title: Depends on ur preference..
body: Adding review after using this headphone for more than 6 months, actually i have not used it more thn 2 months, i dont know why , but somehow maby because of charging the headphone was quite boring for me, the headphone has verygood noise qulity,  which is not good for me as used to travel a lot on bike, so i must hear the surrounding sound for safety reasons.  This is my personal experienceRest about the headphone, the sound quality is good, balanced,  bass is also nice. Build quality is awesome.  If u r ok with charging it every day go for it.. i got it for 999..

title: Sound quality is good but quite uncomfortable to wear for long or on bike ride
body: Sound quality is good but quite uncomfortable to wear for long or on bike ride and especially with helmet on, it will start aching after sometime of use and very uncomfortable feeling. Also, I feel the band design has a big flaw as it's without a strap to hold earphones and it will come down till or below your abdomen if not in use and on neck.Otherwise, except design it's a very good product quality and output wise.Review after using more than 2-3 months.

title: ok headphones butt
body: the sound quality is ok but there is a constant buzzing when it plays something. idk if its intentional like some noise cancellation trick or something but thats a small issue. The voice alert in this earphone is the worst. It shouts in a man's voice "Power On! You've plugged in to nirvana!" whenever you turn on the earphone at almost full volume. What nirvana? when you turn off the device it shouts "Adios amigo, powering off" i mean its ok i might not be a fan of such a UI but i can tolerate that much. But the worst part is when your battery reaches 10% i think, it shouts "Oops, battery low" every minute or so at full volume. like we get it the first time man no need to shout again and again. Imagine you are watching some movie or video on youtube and an intense scene is playing, you are completly engrossed in it and suddenly someone shouts in your ears "OOPS BATTERY LOW!" man that is super frustrating buy it if u can tolerate that obnoxious voice its the only con i can think of

title: Fantastic
body: I am writing this in the month of July, 2021 and I think it's the best in the market in that price range. Let me tell you why :1. I usually have to think when was the last time I have changed this headphone.2. I wore it in the shower to test it's IPX8 certification and it went smoothly.3. I will give 4.5 out of 5 for the sound quality and it your device compatible with AAC then your life is awesome.4. Comes with Bluetooth 5.0 support seamless sync with two devices.*Only con is : when you ware it the vol up key is in the bottom and vice versa for the vol down.

title: In reality it's poor
body: The headphone doesn't have that good Bass as described. sound quality is also average. It has issues with Bluetooth connectivity when on call, voice doesn't pass other end as it does on wired headphone. Samsung wired headphones are better than this Boat Bluetooth headphone. Price is overrated compared to what they are serving.Charging stays very long and that's a good go.

title: Defective product received...
body: Hi all,I got a product with defect... The problem i experience is... When ever you going to start or stop playing some audio... You will hear some fussy sound like ssssssss... for 2 seconds.. after that only audio will start or stop playing... this sound comes even before the notification tone...i never experienced like this in any of the Bluetooth earphones... I saw few positive and negative reviews before buying... I was convinced, beacuse of the price...And other factors i didn't like in this earphones is1) the wire is very uneasy to use... The neck part is semi flexible and post that wire length is too much lengthy even for a guy with very lengthy neck...2) the ear piece is not at all comfortable.. it keeps popping out...3) i didn't feel i am using a boat earphones... It looks bit cheap... Of course the price is less

title: Will get your job done
body: Well, I was eagerly looking for a neckband and after a lot of research I bought this one . The sound quality is good 8/10 the bass is present and does not look fake . If you are someone who is going to use them with your laptop you will be blown away by the quality it gives after some tuning. I personally loving them . The battery is decent as well easily lasts a day . The only problem which I faced is that when it is idle It automatically turn off itself which I don't like as I have to pair it again. The dual device connection work seamlessly . I never face any issue with that  .Overall it's a great buy I will rate it 8.5/10.Watch for the prices it will drop to 899/- during sales

title: Good in this price range
body: First of all, don't expect, it will look like pic... i doesn't look like premium quality. Look is gareeb type. I am bass lover.Baby ko bass pasand hai but itna bhi nahin jitna isme aa rha hai üòÇ after using  2 days i feel bass is over the top. You will miss the originality of song. I have used bass 100 headphones 350rs, and feel that was better. If I talk about pros: connectivity is good. Sound quality and 'bass' is also good in this price range, bettery is awesome.. So with this neckband, I can talk without holding heavy phone. Can watch webseries as it is not heavy like headphones. Can listen to songs... with extraaaaaaaaa bass.

title: Only bass, nothing else. No service.
body: P.S. one side stopped working. Warranty only on paper, as such non existent service.I don't even care about anything else if sound quality is below par.I've used many Boat wired earphones and they're decent. Too loud bass always but still you can hear highs and lows and mids fairly clear. This one has just so much bass there's almost 0 clarity.

title: Excellent Battery life with super fast charging
body: Hi All,This is my first time writing a review on any product..And I felt like reveiwing this produt would help others..The delivery process was quick and clear..Coming to sound quality these ear phones make a way difference relatively whne it comes to noise cancellation and louder..the main interesting thing which forced me to write this review is about its battery life..I saw the website claiming 6 hours and it's true..for me it lated more than that..I started watching movies and stiff from 1 PM in the noon it's still running in the night 9 PM with some 30 % left.. ofcourse had a break of 2 hours in between..So if someone is looking for long hour usage go for this...

title: Inconsistentancy in connectivity.  Some times mic stops working
body: After 10 - 12 days using I'm getting connectivity issue. It automatically disconnecting itself and try to connect again it showing only connecting connecting bt not get connected.Another problem facing with most of the time while talking on calls after few minutes mic stops the working so another person unable to hear me but I'm clearly able hear that person. In such condition I need to do either disconnect the call and call again or disconnect Bluetooth and connect again.I really want hear reply from boat team about these issue...

title: boAt 255 pro vs Protronics Harmonic Notes
body: When I compare boAt 255 pro with Protronics Harmonic Notes (little old model) for sound quality,boAt Pros - Passive noise cancellationboAt Cons - Duplicate bass (unnatural), No punch, music feels like glassy (unnatural).Protronics Pros - Realistic bass (though less), Strong punch.Protronics Cons - No proper noise cancellation, all instruments seems little mixed up (need to try working on equilizer), lacks sharpness (kind of voice clarity).I reduced 2 stars for 255pro as it lacks the main things that a hip-hop music lover looks for.This doesn't mean all other boAt music systems are bad, I found some wired boAt earphones which was costing around ‚Çπ400/- little better than JBL wired T100A. On a similar note, Protronics Bluetooth speaker (SoundDrum) was far better than JBL or any other speakers which are in same price range or above its range.

title: Loved the headphones. Amazing experience üòç
body: Just received my boat rockerz 255 headphones. It's just awsmü§©Update: I've been using it since 2 days, it's perfect in music, youTube nd all. But in google meet and zoom it can't be used at all. Voice breaks a lot and mic is also horrible in zoom and meet, and the main reason to purchase this earphones was to attend meetings without any issue, which it didn't fulfill at all. Also earbuds of this earphones are heavy So it pains a lot in ears if I use it for long time,which is the biggest drawback. So I refunded it.If u want to buy a earphone to attend meetings then don't buy this, but if u just want to listen good music with good bass and watch videos, then only u can buy this.

title: Good quality headset but not for Sports
body: Since this item is from boat, I knew the sound quality should be very good. I'm absolutely happy with that. But the biggest issue I have, is the word "Sports". I'm a long distance runner and this product is not at all suitable for running. Oh yeah, you can comfortably watch sports on your mobile with this though.

title: Invest some more and get a better pair or go wired
body: Better to invest sone more and get realme buds or from jbl. No noise cancellation or sound isolation.sound quality is moderate you can only use it indoor , in traffic or in public it doesn't isolate properly. Bluetooth connectivity is not good at all it disconnect within 10m range, and most annoying this is the battery backup, it take too long to charge and Max runtime is of 3hr at max

title: Product replaced under warranty.
body: Good sound quality and massive battery capacity.But about 1 month of usage the product failed to power on due to manufactoring diffect.I claimed for warranty and company replaced the product fr free.Replacement duration took about 2 weeks.Overall good productGood customer support

title: Good sports quality, waterproof. Acceptable sound quality.
body: This is some awesome sports earphones a true sports gear. I've tried a number of sports earphones and they all fell flat-faced with the kind of sweat I get during workouts and I had to return or dump them later but this one withstood all i gave and still going great.Sound quality is okay but good for a wireless headset of this price range, doesn't matter for me as I use it for sports activity only.

title: Worst warranty service
body: I purchased this in Jan 19 for Rs 1000 as part of some sale. Firstly, I was very diappointed to see that left side of the earphones stopped working within 5 months i.e. June itself. But I thought it is okay since the product was still under warranty, but let me tell you all.. I LOGGED THE REPLACEMENT SERVICE REQUEST IN JULY AND IT HAS STILL NOT BEEN REPLACED!!!!I never expected such bad customer service. Since July i have called their customer service a thousand times but it always says that all executives are busy currently. Then I raised another request online, still nothing to that too.I am planning to take it to consumer forum nowSo my conclusion is product is bad as it has chances of getting faulty anytime (in my case as early as 5 months) and service is even worse!

title: Good one but not great !
body: Eventhough it connects two divices at the same time, however audio doesn't switch to the first device connected.  While playing the audio from the first device connected, it doesn't work. Only it works for last device connected. We need to reconnect the previous device to get it works.Not sure manufacturing defect or functionality limitation.  Atleast it works flawlessly for other bluetooth headset like Jabra.ANyway it's light weight and sound quality is better than many other product of same price range

title: Neckband with codeless Mic
body: I am searching for a Neckband especially with a good Mic for this I tried many of the items but disappointment with the mic.After a long search of budgeted Neckband, I found this Nirvana from boAt Rockerz 255 Pro. Great product and I am writing this review after using it for one week. I am fully satisfied and suggest that people to go on with this model.

title: Great headset for its prize & sound quality, But too lengthy!
body: This is a good bluetooth headset for its process, sound quality is great and I recommend this for Bass lovers!Bluetooth coverage is pretty good but average!The only thing that that I hate in this is the LENGTH, when I put them it comes till below my chest, irritating while washing face etcSamsung Level U design is much more greater!Only that, apart for that this is a great one!I got it for Rs 999/- in Amazon Summer Sale early as I‚Äôm a prime member

title: Best fit for my ears
body: Excellent fit to my earsAlready used many in ear earphones but it's amazing fit. Sound quality good for the price. First time a neckband wireless earphone with 90% satisfaction. A friend had this and i tried, then i ordered this bcz of the exact fit to my ears (very comfort)

title: Received Damaged Earphone
body: Unfortunately I received damaged wire of the earphone...I was unable to open at the time of delivery...just checked today itself...I don't know whether Amazon will return or change it or not... although have ordered many times but this is the first time I received damaged product..But still I do have trust on Amazon..Plz guide (@amazon) if it can be changed...thanks in advance!!

title: Very Nice Earphone under 1500Rs budget BT earphone.
body: This Boat Earphone is Good in Sound and Nice product with all Functions like packaging,delivery,warranty etc. I recommend to other people they can buy this earphone with eye close trust.

title: Loved it
body: I loved them so much: till one day they just stopped working. I want to know if these can be serviced and used again.For a simple device the price of these bt earphones is very high and there should be a way to service and use them.But love love loved using them. Great for walking and running or bike riding

title: good instrument but the charging cable didn't work
body: The product is good. Charge stands for more than a week for a moderate usage. But the charging cable that was provided with the handsfree did NOT work, It didnt fit correctly and charging did not happen. I am managing with my mobile charging cable. How can a good quality product can accompany a sub-quality or a broken accessory??1

title: Good I am purchase only 899 quality is good
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†I like it it good for me and every body beacuse 40 hours continue backup and ipx7 it's awesome in these price sound quality is good noise cancellation is good only bass quality is normal as compared to headphones otherwise overall rating 4.5

title: Good for music but not best for calls
body: The ear phones is good for listening songs but feel little high on bass for talking, and i am particularly don't like this type because when completely on you can listen your body movements loudly and which irritates.. other than that a good build quality and good sound quality for listening songs..

title: Highly disappointed
body: To be frank sound quality is goodBattery backup is goodBut the product had an ear attachment that is faulty, it keeps on slipping while wearing. To recomended for those who wish to wear during jogging or while travelling in busy places.I am totaly disappointed with the quality and i missed one ear attachment while travelling and now only one ear piece is useful for me.

title: Read this for a complete review and features of this item.
body: If you're looking for a budget wireless earphones with more than decent sound quality, give it a go.- bass is truly amazing and sets it apart from other competing wireless earphones.- my phone is Dolby atmos configured, so the noise cancellation as well as the surround sound is excellent.- dedicated keys for volume control, pause play button are available. And you can switch to different songs by long pressing the volume keys.- connectivity is fast.- extra earbuds, a charging cord and a manual comes with the purchase.- I experienced a 6 hour battery backup on a single continuous use, so it's pretty good considering the budget.- takes an hour and a half from 0 to 100 percent charge.- build quality is valuable. A smooth design with durable body and the wire length is also adequate.- neck band is not hard and not too soft, just the proper amount of flexible so that it won't break easily.- one of the best thing about this earphone is the magnet inside the earphone speakers. So when you're not using it, you can stick them together while it's hanging from your neck.The picture shows how I keep/place it at home. It's the magnet.Cheers.

title: Worst and fucking customer service.
body: Worst experience. After purchasing of 6 months one side ear phone not working and placed for return the boat company. They have picked up the item but not returned still even after 30 days. Very worst experience after using it for 6 months. My friends also has same complaint. Plz don't buy.  The photo is uploaded of replaced ear phones. I have waited for more than 30 days for a small replacement. How can someone wait for so many days. The customer service shall be quick wen u have pblm. Plz don't ever buy this.

title: Good deal under 1k price.
body: I got this one for Rs 900. After 1 week of using I'm giving this review.# Sound quality is decent, not as good as premium but ok.# Bass is moderate quality. Enough for me.# Noise cancellation is below average. It captures the noise of all your surrounding things. Not much helpful in traffics.# The battery is really poor. Maximum for 4 hours with volume 80%. One thing that I have noticed is the battery quickly drained from 80% to 0% in just few mins. That I really didn't expected.# There wasn't any problem with latency or mic issue while playing pubg. I'm not heavy gamer btw.

title: DOESN'T DO THE JOB WELL. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
body: It is not good quality. Do not buy. Call quality on phone is not good (there is noise) and the moment you go outside your room the connection becomes weaker and noise increases. I have a small 2 BHK house; I went to the kitchen and the connection started to fail. The bass has been provided compromising overall call quality. One cant keep two earphones - one for music and one for calls. There are connectivity issues and it also takes unusually long time pairing with the device. Major set back for people who want to work from home using their office computer through remote connection. It doesn't connect to remote desktop. I work from home using team viewer to connect to my office computer. But the headphone doesn't work if i play audio in the office computer. My work is all about quality control and to listen to call recordings. It is not useful for me.  Also, the packet came damaged. I would not recommend this earphone.

title: Most Hardcore Bluetooth Earphone available
body: Pros :1) Excellent Battery Backup(Using it since four days on a single charge).2) Crystal Clear Hd Sound with no audio video lag.3) Durable flat wires.4) Looks and Build quality is awesome with magnetic earbuds.5) Sweat and Water Resistant.Cons :1) Call quality is good but Mic does not have noise cancellation so receiver receives noise.Verdict :Blindly go for it if calling is not your primary concern.

title: Again FALL IN LOVE WITH "BOAT" üòò

Go for it.)

title: I think it is best for those who want to get headphones for 1000 rupees.
body: Its awesome products.First of all this product built quality, design, mat black finish color and sound quality its really amazing. Basically I like it....üéßüéßüéßSound quality is too good  8/10Design quality  good  9/10Battery backup its truly 8-9 hrs.  9/10Weight  very lite (24g)  10/10Noise cancellation  7/10Music Bass is very high.  6/10Call & talking  8.5/10It's perfect for me........ title: good product
body: Ive been using this earphone for almost a year now. It works perfectly fine till now. The sound quality is okay. Its quite sturdy. it works for a reasonable time until you need to charge again. It has problems with the bluetooth connectivity especially when there is heavy wind, you cant hear anything even with 2-3 mts distance. Other than that it works fine.

title: Worst company with third grade products
body: Having a tag of " Indian origin" doesn't necessarily mean that the product is of best quality.This is one of the worst company with worst service facilities.This is my first and last purchase from boat.I will never buy or recommend anybody to buy any of their products.Update :Guys don't buy this product. I have a lot of issues with this even after replacing twice.They just bought cheap Chinese earphones and sell us in the name of make in india. It's really frustrating for me to claim replacement warranty for twice and still they can't resolve the issue. I don't know whether they test it or not before sending it to the customer.

title: Awesome under care
body: Flawless quality output but only until water went inside drivers. Tried to blow with hair dryer but drivers were damaged. So it's waterproof only if both the drivers are closed i.e. in your ears. Tried for warranty claim but boat team didn't respond to my email. The service center location in website is wrong. So it's ruined now

title: Pathetic Experience
body: I received these Earphones on 27th July 2021 and after Charging second time on 8th August they never started again, I mean On hi nahi huye dobara... 0 stars

title: Sound quality is not good, over bassed
body: I brought this one, after using boAt Nirvanaa Uno. Uno had good quality stereo with nice bass. This is sounds like a mono headset. I think bass is too much or not set correctly. It sounds differently on Mobile  and PC. I am not satisfied with the sound output. It connects to both PC and Mobile same time, so attending mobile call and Skype call with no hassle. For Rs. 1990 there are better quality available. I trusted boAt based on my previous purchase with UNO.

title: Good Product. Horrible Customer Service.
body: I am very much satisfied with the product quality in terms of sound, bass, and noise cancellation capabilities and would have given it a 5-star rating. However, the horrible experience provided by boAt customer service has made me rethink my decision, and I, for one, do not want to be a customer to a provider who cant take care of its customer satisfaction.All this mess is specially created when you try to claim the product's warranty within its warranty period. Despite leaving multiple mails and/or trying to reach their customer care via the phone number, the team's response is a shocker. Either they won't respond to their emails, or if you try to convey your complaint via a call, then the agent cut's your call in between without even listening to it completely. It's just pathetic. What's the use of having such "customer care" when you don't even listen to your customer?

title: Sound quality ok but connection is a hassle
body: The sound quality is okay but the biggest issue with the product is it's connectivity. We have to struggle a lot to pair it and even though it is shows connected in the corresponding system there is no response in the headset. It is a hassle to pair and connect it. Overmore the battery life is very short, the device drains out even in 3-4 hour. I wanted to return the product and that too is not possible. I am really dissatisfied with the product.

title: Complete satisfaction with Boat rockerz 225
body: I love the boat rockerz 255. because of the nice crunchy base and clear audio ,it is quite perfect fit in the ear as well. But it take time to connect with the device . I use other ear phones as well the the boat audio quality is more liking to me.I use this earphone for 3 month now and I have no complete with this product.If any one is reading this I recommend to try is one.

title: LIFE OF HEADPHONE IS ONE YEAR ONLY
body: I spend a 1 year with this headphone. It exactly stopped working after a year. The button which makes the headphone on is not functioning anymore. If the lifespan of the headphone is just one year, I do not recommend this product.I cannot claim now for the warranty and in a situation to throw this headphone.  If you are having a long term vision, avoid this product.

title: A good product of genuine review
body: Quality's: It's a best Bluetooth headphones i used, excellent bass quality, best quality loud ness, nice build quality and awesome product.Battery life comes easily 2days of medium use... Good battery lifeRating: bass 4.7/5, sound loudness 4.8/5, sound quality when hight and low volume 4.6/5, Bluetooth design 4.2/5 ( cable length is little bit long ), water proof 4.5/5 ( i am used this headphones in small rain & not problem i noticed)And final thing is you can trust the brand "boAt rockerz"

title: Budget bluetooth headphone
body: Bought this @999. It can connect multiple devices at a time. Sound quality is good enough at this price. Build quality is very good. Bluetooth connectivity and battery life is impressive. You can use it for hours without any issue. It comes with different sizes of buds. I would strongly recommend if you are looking for something reliable for daily use.

body: Bought it after several good reviews about the product. I don't understand the hype at all.1) Too uncomfortable. Never stays in the ear and the earpluges are big (even the smallest in the size).2) I started getting headache after multiple use. I could hardly use it for few minutes.3) Can't use for call and the quality is too low. Had bought this for conference calls and every time I had to change to normal earphones.4) The wire hangs from ear looks funny.

title: Definitely not for sports activity.
body: In terms of sound quality, it is good. But this earphone is not for sports activity. The cable is quite heavy which will not let the earphone stick to your ear on heavy physical movement.Range is not even 5 meters. As soon as you cross thredistance you start getting interruption.Bluetooth quality is way poor that when you are walking listening music and have put your phone on your pocket, you start getting interruption.Wire is way to long. Around 2-3 inches extra, which looks weird if you are not putting it on and just kept it on neck. I have given the image. I am 5.4. The earphone is hanging 5 inches below my chest.Overall, bearable for walking, but definitely not good if you want to buy this for jogging or exercise.

title: Left side is heard less / slow in compare to right. 255 was best in compare of 255 pro+

title: Waste product, Amazon should stop selling this product.
body: As of now I've purchased 3 ear phones of boAt rockers, all were stopped working within its warranty period and there is no one who can help you for service /replacement. Let's not get in to trap by seeing the volumes of review. I would suggest Amazon to not degrade their market by promoting such company's device.

title: Everything is good except for bass
body: Everything is good but there's 3 huge problems in this earphone.1. If you're looking for a good bass booster earphones then this is not that good. Except for this if you ignore this it's actually not a big deal.2. If you by any chance lost any of the ear hooks you won't be able to buy a new one. And this problem is bigger than bass booster because earphone will stay in the ear without hooks. That sucks üòî3. Boat has also it's website where you can buy products from boat but they also don't sell extra ear hooks in case of if you lost them.Try to buy a earphone without those stupid hooks.

title: Decent buy in this price range
body: After 1 month of usage,  this is what I have to say ..1st and foremost .... BATTERY BACKUP ..... AWESOME üî•üî• .... Charges up pretty quickly too . 5/5The bass is decent but those who like high base this is not for you ... 3/5Sound quality is great .... It's really clear and smooth . 4/5It's pretty sturdy too . Great build . Really comfortable . 5/5Noise cancellation is ok ....(I guess) . 3/5Overall I'd say it's a pretty good choice if you are looking to buy a decent bluetooth earphone in this price range . But if you are looking for a good bass ... This is not for you ..... (Bass is pretty good according to my taste ) .

title: Pathetic
body: Usually I never give any rating but this time I could not stop myself. After one year of using this headphones, left earphone stopped working.  What do I do with them now? We spent our hard earned money to buy these products and this is what they do to us. I haven't had good experience with boats. Nowadays people are buying their products like anything but all they get is faulty after some time. Now its out lf warranty. I am frustrated but I can't do anything with it. No one would listen me. I lost Rs 1400 on these headphones and also lost Rs 550 on boats 250 because they too stopped working from one side.

title: Nice product
body: I have been using now since over a month and i found corns in the product its not mine its over all of same model i checked with other too they also noticed the same1 . Noise cancellation is really bad ( its good that you can hear background noise with whom you are talking but sometimes its really annoying )2 . Battery indicator over the phone once phone is connected . It shows 100% initially then after using for few hours it will shows 80% then all of a sudden dead RED3 . Connectivity sometimes i noticed it get auto disconnected and manually i have to connect it back .Quality is really nice , Battery life could be better ,

title: Sound is good but not ease to use
body: Sound is good and battery battery backup is good but there are Many features missing which will make it a very good earphones1. Switching between calls and music is poor have to pick your phone all the time to choose option2. mic very poor quality it‚Äôs only useful when Surroundings are very calm3. Low battery alert comes just 3-5 minutes before full draining which is not advised for daily commuters4.forget about shortcut keys5. Bluetooth connectivity is good but range not good

title: Item isn't worth of  ‚Çπ1400.
body: It's been less than 40 days that I'm using this and to be home this is not something you should go for, complete waste of money.- it never gets fully charged- only gives a backup of 6 hours while listening songs on mid volume- once the battery low alert starts it jusr shuts down within 2 more mins of play- cheaply made and has no strong wire that connects the two ear phones or earbuds and can be bend with the flow of air.- If not used for 2-3 hours despite of full charge (90%) it goes down to 60%.

title: Only bass no sound quality
body: Only bass is gr8, yea only this part.If you are a music lover don‚Äôt buy it.there is nothing bad with these but, if you want a clear audio and a overall good experience in terms of music then go for skullcandy or jbl.By the way I brought this for my Mom and she is happy :)

title: Amazing product.
body: I like this product. Low cost high features. Than other brand blutooth headphones. Amazing Sound, crystal clear sound. I suggest purchase this Boat product.

title: Epic experience for Bassheads
body: Never used a boAt product before this one, but boy was i impressed by the quality of this thing....BASS 9/10Mids 9/10highs 8/10Battery performance  9-10 hours on full charge (also has a feature where 10 mins of charge will give you 35mins worth of battery)...BT range 7-10m depending upon obstacles between this and the phonecomfort 8/10 ....(those plasticy(silicone actually) things protruding from the might feel a bit uncomfortable at first)cons: 1) has a irritating indicator for low battery which i presume goes off about 4-5 times....at 10% first then every drop in percentage after 5% will have you hearing "oops battery is getting low" or a similar message  2) The charging port is concealed in an awkard way...although its durable but the cover is kinda obtrusive  3) i recommend not using a power/fast/turbo charger (or whatever they call it these days) if you want to see them live longer than a month.....110mAH battery Li-On battery would def not like that [i charge mine using my laptop USB port.....sometimes i have charged it using my phone too 3% drain for a full charge EPIC for travelling]i have used many wired earphones before this so having a comparison between them seems stupid but it does well in competing with the sennheiser cx 180, jbl C200Si and it even outperforms the sony MDR-Ex150ap in terms of sound quality...also getting it around for 1400 seems like the best price ...anything higher and i would save up for sumtin elsetl;dr if this fits your budget then go for it without thinking

title: Good earphones with some cons
body: The sound quality is good enough and you will not regret for the sound that you get. Major benefit is the monstrous battery. If you are a moderate user who uses for 4-5 hours daily on average,it will get you as far as for 8 - 10 days without any charging. Conical buds feel a bit uncomfortable in beginning, but you will get accustomed to it in 10 days or so. Sound volume is okay, not very high but works fine in any environment.The only con that i see is the magnet on the buds is not very powerful and many they detach from each other on their own.Neck band is fine but does not fit perfectly on your neck.

title: Regretting for buying this product
body: Often gets disconnected automatically. Takes much longer time to connect to the device. Poor sound quality. Unclear voice even when you are talking over the LTE network. The microphone is the worst feature in this product. Person on the other side often complains of my voice not being clear or heard. Extremely poor connectivity. Take 2.5 hours to get fully charged instead of 1.5 hours as mentioned on the box. Works for 3.5 hours maximum after fully charged. FALSE advertisement of this product being active of 6 hours of battery life, which is WRONG. I'm now regretting this purchase. These problems were there since the first day but I ignored. I thought, it would improve in next few days but I'm sorry to say, nothing changed. WON'T RECOMMEND.

title: Very good
body: Very good product am really enjoying it.. can connect to two devices at a time and calls can be taken from both devices by keeping one caller on hold, a feature that I required in a Bluetooth device.. also the ear buds are soft on the ears and fits in very nicely, it's like u don't have anything inside the ears .. very good product

title: I want to return not replacement
body: I want to return the item and take back my money.It is purely cheating to the customer . Nowhere it is mentioned that only replacement .There is no return available and only replace .Item is too junk and does not hold any charge.

title: Not good for workout.
body: I bought it to use during my workouts in the gym. And it fails miserably if you are doing exercises with lots of jumping and movement. It falls off very easily. Also, the most irritating feature is if the battery is low it will continuously start poking, battery low message and you can't use it. The build quality is also very mediocre but that's fine with 1000 bucks pricing.

title: Bang for the buck but richness in bass is compromised.
body: I have both boat wired headsets and sound magic. Both of them have rich bass. I love them totally & am using from past few years.This wireless in-ear headsets doesn't have the richness in bass. May be the quality is compromised somewhere between the wired & wireless.Except for this one drawback, this product is bang for the bucks you pay. It's lightweight, comfortable, long playtime and the offer price of 999 is excellent.If you're okay with decent bass, this is for you.Apparao retail seller is doing a great job regarding offers & return requests.

title: Product is good... If planning to buy for 5-6 months..
body: Bass is quite good for this price range... did hurt if used for very long time at a stretch... Plus had a little connectivity issues sometimes but it's quite negligible... everything was working fine for the first six months... And then one side stopped working... The worst part was that I complained to the customer care and they asked me to courier the defected piece so that they can replace it with a new one... I did as instructed but never recieved the replacement...!! Isse acha to me bhejti hi na... I dragged the defected piece a few more days with just one ear working but that couldn't happen either... Quite disappointing considering the brand and the price I paid for it...

title: Except battery nothing is reliable and durable in this product
body: I have purchased boat 255 pro+ on dated 25.07.21.Initially every thing was good. But after 10 days voice gets much slower and very difficult to listen in loudy  places like while traveling or even in office too.* Length of wire is to short to reach the ear comfortably. Neck band is so rigid to fold in fist* Noice cancellation:- Notice cancellation is not so good as expected.* Bass quality:- bass is good but even those songs where bass is not required it will put bass into that too which is very bad.* Durability:- As mentioned above my headphone gets malfunctioned in short period ,so not reliable and durable. When I talked to customer service they said it will take 20 days to replace it. Why should we buy it?* Conclusion:- Except battery life nothing is better at this price. I recommend u to buy One plus head phone

title: Stopped charging in 3 months - now useless
body: The product is quite nice - the earphones fit nicely and snugly in your ear, the music quality is decent, the noise cancellation is also good..But disturbance on call is a bother - I've had to disconnect Bluetooth and take the call through the phone several times because the static and noise it added to the caller on the other side. And disconnecting Bluetooth improved the call quality markedly. But this in itself isn't the bad thing - i could live with itIt stopped charging in 3 months - and no amount of trying has gotten it to charge.. Don't know what to do with the unit now that it is just sitting there as a piece of dud electronic..Overall, buy if you will use for a short term and moderate quality is acceptable!

title: Please don't buy this product
body: Its very disappointing that the product doesn't work properly. Initially I thought the issue was with my phone and now realised that the product has the problem. I have received a malfunctioning headset which keeps getting disconneting every few minutes.  The purpose of buying this was for attending the long office calls, but this doesnt serve the purpose. And the reason for selecting Boat is because, I wanted to buy an Indian brand where I could have easily bought any other popular brands, but this is what I am facing after buying it. I recommend, please do not buy this product and suffer later. Now I have raised a complaint in the Boat website and waiting for their answer.

I'm using synthesizer headphones which are counted as one of the best, compared to them, i actually liked these ones at this price range.Definitely go for it.After one month of usage, the audio breaks every few minutes and it's annoying.

title: Its not worthy to buy.
body: After using the product more than 6 months I am here to write the honest feedback.There two main purpose to use the wireless earphone i.e.- Listening to the music and talking over phone.Firstly, if you want to talk it will not satisfy the person on the other end as it doesn't have the noise cancellation method, moreover it adds more background noise than the phone actually. It will irritate the other end's quite much sometimes unbearable to  Listen.Now second concern- Listening to the music.Being a music lover, undoubtedly saying that is not rich in Bass nor the terrible and other things are perfect. You won't get much better experience either way, you will definitely get an average feelings for it.So, I conclude you could go to another brand for better experience.

title: Best neckband under 2000Rs
body: If you want a neckband earphone with super high quality sound and bass, this is for you. It's a little heavy, probably because of the weight of the battery. You just need to charge it for 10 minutes and you can use it for 3 days straight, i am telling this with experience. The only drawback of this product along with a little heavy weight is that it's a little difficult to connect with devices unlike oneplus bulletz wireless. It just takes a few extra seconds whereas bulletz wireless is so easy to connect if the devices are paired already. But i am sure this product is absolutely worth the price.

title: Worst product. Rockers 255 is better than Pro

Can't hear  the voice porperly from other side,  tried with many people but same issue persist. Have returned this product twice as in both earphones the issue was same i.e. call sound.

I thought they replace the product but they didn't and send me same product. Now again one same earpiece stopped working and than other one also stopped working. One more problem started that is connectivity issue of bluetooth pairing. Now I booked a complaint again. Let's see what will happen this time. Will let you know about it.Second thing as it's my first time when I returned any product neither I receive any information about handover defected product to courier boy nor that guy told me and I returned all accessories with the unit. But after 21 days when I receive my product back I receive product nothing was with it.That's the overall experience I have with this product and problem came on the 2nd month after using this and now again.

title: Good one to select.
body: There is no issue to buy it. I have purchased another one before one and half year and it is working perfectly till the date. So, I have again purchased it for someone special. There is one small issue with it is that it is captured background noise more while using it for calling, especially when you are driving. Other than that perfect for any kind of use.

title: Value for money earphones, if under 1500.
body: This is a good buy. Sits comfortably around the neck, earpiece is good, and feels sturdy.Noise cancellation is surprisingly good at this price range (during phone calls person on the other end hears very less background noise.)Sound quality - good with Android. With iPhone the sound tends to get crackling at high volumes when equaliser is on. No complains on flat sound.Wires are a bit long, but you get used to it after a while.My only issue with this and other BT earphones in this price bracket is with the voice breaking. If I keep my phone in my pocket (jeans) and walk the audio starts to break and I have to reposition the neckband. This has happened quite a number of times. I used to own a Tagg inferno and MiVi thunderbeats, both had this issue and this one too.To summarise, worth buying, if under 1500.

title: FAKE PRODUCT BY APPARIO RETAIL PRIVATE LTD.
body: The product I ordered was Boat Rockerz 255 and it is suppose to be dual tone product as per manufacturer. And this retail is selling fake product by giving original covering and inside the product neckband is not original copy. Because it is not dual tone plus the quality of metal and runner is also not good. So clearly it can be observed.PLEASE BUT DUAL TONE BOAT ROKERZ 255 ONLY SPECIALLY IN BLACL COLOUR IT SHOULD HAVE GREY TONE ALSO.

title: Best headphone in this price range
body: After using it 10 days i am giving my review about Boat Rockers 255..with impressive sound quality and a good battery backup almost 6-7 hours it is a very good Bluetooth headset in this price rannge..i purchased in Rs. 899 super deal..now comes to about noise cancellation so i would say while listening music you will listening nothing surrouning you but while calling if are in noise atmosphere like on road or people loudly speaking surrond you that time other side caller will not able to listen your voice properly otherside it is good product go for it..

title: Awesome headphones.

Bass quality is upto the mark.... Wireless connectivity is very nice.... The range is also pretty good.... Fits nicely in ur ears.... And doesn't fall down easily... So overall an awesome headphones.Cheers!

Buds fit properly into ear, and the band retains the entire setup firmly on the neck, and does not fall off.Good budget buy, durability is fine, should not have issues for at least 2 yrs.Battery life is not excellent but good enough, maybe around 5hrs continuous usage.

title: Try this 1
body: This is my third purchase for the same head set I was fully satisfied till I bought the realme Bluetooth headsetsThere are better headphones with better features available in the same price range orRs 300- Rs 400 extra , You get the realme Bluetooth headsets which is way better than Boat Rockers .Trust me it like upgrading from Maruti to BMW

title: "The best affordable wireless earphones"
body: I have been using this product for around 7 months and this Boar Rockerz 255 sports earphones are really very good. No technical glitch till now and it's quite comfortable to wear during workouts and exercises. The bass may be comparatively higher so I use equalizer and Dobly atmos present in my smartphone. There are different pairs of ear bud sizes that can fit every person's ears. The battery quality is also really awesome and runs upto 7-8 hours as per my usage. Some vocal sounds may be unidentified because of it's high bass.

title: Product OK OK
body: After around 6 months of usage what I discovered was my device is a defective one.The issue is with the mic. The person on the other side gets echo and not a clear voice.However, I can vouch for the noise cancellation. It is quite same with all boat rockerz as my friend has also complained the same.Not good noise cancellation - it's actually a noise enhancer.

title: Battery life us very bad
body: I bought these earphones 3 months ago , after 8 days of purchase one side of earphone broke and it stopped working, as it was in warranty,i registered a complaint and exchanged it ,  then the battery is always low it gets charged in 15-20 min however gets discharged also in 2 hours only so whenever u need to use need to charge it first. So if you are looking for bluetooth earphones my opinion don't go for it, its not worth investing 1000 bugs and still it feels like not having earphones üòÖ

title: DONT WASTE UR MONEY BUYING THIS!
body: There r sooo many reviews saying tht this is a good product,highly recommended,etc .But the reality is tht this is an 'AVERAGED QUALITY' product. There r many other companies tht provide much better quality than this. Mine earphones stopped functioning in less than 3 months of usage! And yes it has one year warranty and all but the CUSTOMER SERVICE IS HORRIBLE! It will take almost a month to replace the product(or more if u dont bug them by calling them everyday!!!). I didn't expect this BoAt & I'm very disappointed.

title: Worst Warranty Service by boat (& surprisingly Redgear too, they both share the same service portal)
body: BOAT Service Centre takes like forever to replace your defected product under warranty, They will pick up your product and will take a month to 'process your request', you will only be updated of the status until it goes to their service team, after that, you can just forget you ever had a boat earphones, it's actually better that way why waste your time attempting to contact them and constantly worry about the earphones that don't even last 4-5 months. Rather go for Sennheiser or some other trusted brands whose products actually last long and even if somehow the product fails the company will not abandon you with your defected product under warranty.

title: Headphone Beast.
body: Good product in such a great price. I have bought it for 899‚Çπ. I have been using this product from 1 month.1. The sound quality is good with bass.2. Battery live is good almost 8 hours of continuous use.3. Very flexible and no worries during the time of traveling even you go on sleep on your neck it doesn't give any feelings.4. I travel through train every week. When i plug this earplugs  not a bit sound enters from outside.5. Even having a  call is no more problem. You can recieve and deliver your message without any problem.

title: Decent sound but bad battery life
body: They're a decent pair of Bluetooth earphones, but the battery life is bad (not more than 3 hours total) & the sound quality is so-so. The bass is especially muddy.They fit in the ear & stay in the ear better than I had expected. Bought these for 1500 & they're definitely not worth that price. At ~800-900 I might have given these a 4-star review.

title: A decent and functional product with sooper bass
body: Mid range is poor. The finer sounds are not extracted.The product is extremely light and u won't feel it's there. This is an awesome feel. Sooper bass and crystal clear pitch. Bluetooth connectivity is remarkable. I received it yesterday and played for 3. 5 hours without and drop in performance. Seems sturdy. Yes, while listening to audio from Gaana, was getting a 3D feel, as if am sitting midst of a concert.

title: Don't buy ever
body: M very very disappointed with this product. I bought this product on 2nd Oct during sale period for my brother to gift him today on bhai duj.. and when I gifted him tHis today they are not working so complete waste of money even now m not able to return them as window is closed on 10th Oct ... seriously just don't buy them it's wastage of money and spoil your surprise too ..so embarrassing for me when my brother tried to use them but they did not start..spoil my surprise too

title: Battery life amazing,UNequal volume both buds,light indication problem,very poor noise cancellation.
body: The battery life is amazing, but most of the time left bud has more volume than the right bud and no blue light indication while charging leaving doubt if it is not charging or if it is fully charged and very poor noise cancellation while on call, caller on the other end often complains of background sounds. I tried resetting the headset but it is not resetting.I have ordered for a replacement, hope the replacement product don't have the above mentioned problems.

title: Review from an Apple fan
body: Connectivity: seamless, connected well with iPhonesound quality: surprisingly well balanced bassFit: really good, and can be used comfortably well during workoutvolume: since its in-ear, not reco for high volumes, due to its tight sitting, NC works quite wellVFM: fro 999, worth the cost, and is quite inexpensive compared to other BT sets

title: You can not pair two device at a time
body: I have been using this since last 3 months and my review till now is here1) Nice built quality2) Noice cancellation is also good3) Not Much bassISSUES-Company claims it can pair two device at a time but if you do that then you won't be able to use it properly as after every second hou will feel disconnected and again connected.If you receive a call and you are connected with your laptop with sane earphones then after 5 min Bluetooth conection will disconnect automatically.

title: Please read reviews before a buy.
body: Everyone please read before buyIi used this Earphone 3 weeks then i write review.I mentioned step by step what i faceing problem Quality - earphones quality is good..but when you wearing your neck getting irritating after some time...and very long wires..of earphone..Sound quantity- sounds quality is very tribble..No bass and and no extra bass in this ear phone..If u listen song half an hour getting irritating... because of sound...After that..when you talking through this Earphone.background noise is very high.When you talk to another person they will not listening your voice properly...bcz of noise issue in this earphoe ..Charging - charging time 2hrs for full.charge..And back alos if you using continue 2 hrs only backup time...So please don't buy this earphone...Don't go for this ear phone..Better opstion available in any brand like jbl/ sony.

title: Boat hurts!üòë
body: Bass is too much. Hurts your ear sometimes.. The quality of audio is below average.Trust me.. Go for Oneplus Bullets Z instead.

title: They sound good really good. Lag is really bad and connection is spotty. Don‚Äôt recommend it
body: Connection issues is my main problem. Phone is in pocket and sound breaks up. And lag is awful in PUBG you stop walking and sound is like good second or two behind. Amazing sound quality for price. Comfortable built quality is not bad. That‚Äôs why I gave 3 stars. I am going to use it for music mainly so I am keeping it, but if you are planning to use it for gaming don‚Äôt but it. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this. If you are using it for anything but music.

title: Stopped working after 20 days.
body: The product stopped working after 20 days of usage. 1st symtom, bluetooth (earphone)  is getting disconnected from phone automatically. 2nd symptom the earphone gets power off automatically after around 30 minutes of usage. Final symptom, power is not turning on. Really dissapointed with boAt and Amazon.

title: Durable
body: I've been using this headset for the past 7-8 months and the following is my review.Pros:durable,feels premium,good bluetooth connectivity,fair stereo quality,bass is acceptable,stylish,magnetic attachment looks coolCons:battery life ~ 3 hrs on continuous usage,mild uncomfortable after putting on for 1-2 hours,earhooks doesn't fit properly - always come out,noise cancellation is just ok.microphone doesn't catch sound properly while on call

title: Not durable, but worth it
body: Lasted exactly as long as the warranty period, stopped working the very next day. But while if worked, it was the best. Great quality, waterproof, I used it at work and at home. UNBELIEVABLE battery life, plus you can use the product even when it's charging. No other Bluetooth headset I know of has that feature.

title: üëåüëå superb üëåüëå
body: This headphone is really awesome üëåIt's bass is also too good , even it's battery backup is so good , I'm satisfied with this product in this range ,,,,Guy's I recommend you to buy thisBcoz I have used many electronic product of this company and  the boAt company never disappoint me ,,,,,So you should try this at least one time üòä‚ù§Ô∏èThank you Amazon ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: A decent Earphone for this price range.
body: I am satisfied with the product. For this price, it is indeed one of the best bluetooth earphones. Uptill now I didn't experience any malfunctioning. Battery backup is decent(If your usage is longer than 4 hours I won't recommend these). It has a pretty good sound quality and bass quality. Noise cancellation is also fine. A pretty decent match for a student and moderate user. My rating 4.1 out of 5. Drawbacks:The earphones cannot cannot easily fit inside your pocket due to their structure and are not that handyBattery backup.Regardless the drawbacks,if you have a low budget and want great performance, I will highly recommend these!‚úå‚úå

title: üòäTHE BEST product choice I've made so farüëåüèª
body: If you are planning to take this piece then you are making a correct decision.(Every one has different opinion about electronics because first, they've huge expectations and second, every body gets different piece delivered and unfortunately sometimes technical issues can happen and it's natural. So if any issue you can always exchange it.Anyways, following is my feedback that can be of your help while buying this product.)Since I've purchased it, I've come across only positive things. No complaints.1. Sound quality: amazing2. Battery life: sufficient. 5-6 hours at a stretch3. Bluetooth connectivity : within seconds.4. Calling : I've faced no lagging. Smooth.5. Noice cancellation : yes, little parcial. In short if anybody is talking about you in front of you, you won't be able to hear them unless you lower the volume or remove the ear piece.üòÖ6. Value for money : definitely. I can only say, it's like you're getting a car in price of a bike.Good battery backup, doesn't stop working, product quality is good, price range is so affordable, this particular model is good, designed lightweight, worth the money invested.PS. It's not been too long that I've used this product, but as time passes, I'd review it again.

title: Loved it
body: Good battery backup. As my ears are wider, usually any ear phone will not stay fit in my ears :) But this one is awesome. I use it for my daily calls, list to music and videos. Excellent sound quality and it is the best for this price. Yet to see the durability aspect but i think boat products are good on that aspect. I will suggest this product to all

title: I am happy with the support service of boat
body: I had purchased a set on 11th of oct and found that after use the product is defective and not charging properly. The product get automatically turn off/on continuously while charging. So I had initiated online complain on boat cust support service on 26th oct and the very next day they had arrange the pickup of the faulty product and inspect the product properly, On 30th of oct they had initiated replacement of the product and dispatch the same without any hurdles calls. On today I got the replacement and is working perfectly fine.Thanks Boat for the after sales services...!Go ahead with the brand.

title: Product is good
body: Product from the seller - goodDelivey by Amazon - awesomeBut if you don't want to get stuck with boat services just look for another option please... I bet even the Chinese companies will repair/replace your item faster than them. It's been 25 days since my product picked up and still they can't tell me exactly what's going on. It didn't get updated after the first 4 days. I'm now even losing hope to get it back seriously. Worst Servive Boat Community... Worst ever

title: Great Bluetooth Headphones for Rs. 899
body: I bought it for Rs. 899 and at this price range, I don't think I'll see a better alternative.Sound quality is a solid 4 out of 5. The sounds are nice and clean. The bass has a distinct punch to it. The noise cancellation is also great.The Bluetooth connects almost instantly and its range is about 25 feet on average (with walls and obstacles in between).The battery life is great too. It lasts almost am entire day with intermittent use.If you are getting this for under 1000 rupees, go ahead. I highly recommend buying this.

title: Original Review after using one month.
body: Looks very beautiful. Sound quality is good. Fits best in ears. Noise cancellation is upto the mark. Battery backup is also at satisfactory level. I'm using it since last month. Feeling some easiness with this. Inward/outward calls control is super. One drawback is that at long run it creates pain in ears. Hope Makers should improve it. All over it is a good product üòä.

title: Do not buy, headphone fails after 3 to 4 months
body: Do not buy, Headphone fails after 3 to 4 months. Normally the left side speaker fails.  This happened to be 3 different times.  All the three worked to 3 to 6 months and then failed.  Waste of money.  now  I am trying Sony and Realme bluetooth headphone.  2 months now, both are working fine.

title: Good but not the best!
body: I bought this after searching many Bluetooth wireless earphones.Here is my review after using this product for one week with my OnePlus 6T.Pros-Battery life is good compared to other earphones.-Bass is good-Light weight even u can't feel it's around your neck-Noice cancellation is awesomeCons-Faced some issues in connectivity when mobile is in my trouser pockets(When holding mobile in hand,no issues at all)-Running with mobile in trousers also shows some interruption in hearing-Sometimes I hear unwanted noice (I think there is compatibility issues with OnePlus 6T and other devices too)-Battery charge is always showing 100% in 6T-Bass is good but I feel too noisy-The voice on connection and disconnection is weirdIf you are looking for wireless earphones under 1500,it is the best among the all! You can't get all the best features in this price range. So go for it!

title: Amazing product.
body: Sound quality is extremely good.Light weight and fits in comfortably in the ears.Bass quality is perfect. Very handy effective item when you are traveling with luggage.Worth the money, I bought it at 999/- on Amazon sale.

title: Stay away from boat.
body: Absolutely inferior earphones. Boat couldn't provide sound quality, so, they provided an irritating bass so, you wouldn't notice the bad sound. I returned these and bought the OnePlus bullets wireless z instead. They are much better. If you want your ears to survive please buy a sony or Sennheiser or something. Stay away from boat.

title: Average quality product
body: Recieved the product in good condition but box looked like local. Build quality average, sound quality is good at this price, battery backup is good working for 4 hrs aprox, Bluetooth was connecting good for first 15-20 days, now there is some connectivity issue too.  service is not good, mailed several times to register for warranty, not registering the product for warranty at first now recieved revert maill after 4-5 days for complain numbers not yet confirmed the registration, toll free number doesn't connects. Used this product for more than 30 days. Not fully satisfied. Its an average quality product. So if you want good service and good product and if you can Spend some more money then get a branded trusted product than this one.

title: Good product but not compatible with google duo video calling
body: After 2-3 month research i bought this product. i m using iphone 7 .... the voice is clear, base is good but it gives beep frequency while listening music which is very irritating. not having same problem with other device. Otherwise its a good product ..... battery life is Ok....NOT COMPLETABLE with Google Duos video calling

title: Perfect for music
body: The product design is really good, comfortable, lightweight. The color combination is perfect for the unisex collection. I picked a red and black combination. The noise cancellation for the call is good but not up to the mark. The biggest drawback I felt was I could not connect to my laptop via Bluetooth plus you cannot take calls from the headset. the buttons are to control the volume and play and pause the call.

title: Great build quality but sound is average not so much noice cancellation
body: Build quality is great but low latancy/music in kow volume is bad compare to my other oneplus bullet z wireless is has low quality in music but + point for gamers it has great latency in gaming so u can easily enjoy game and main point i bought 255pro+ in 1100/h so if u find that deal on top model means 255pro+ just buy it or if u have 2k budget go for oneplus dont think anymore for other nechband or earbuds

title: After sale Service Quality is very poor
body: Very Poor service quality from BOAT. BOAT says that the warranty period is  of one year. But in my case the earphone stopped turning ON, even being in warranty period and it has been more than a month of registering the complaint ,and it was promised by BOAT that courier partner shall pick up the earphone but yet no pick up for repair or replacement has been arranged by BOAT.even there isn't any response from customer care on my multiple complaints in this regard.so in nutshell a bad choice to go for BOAT.

title: Amazing sound quality. value for money.
body: boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Wireless Headset is a great headset.I had bought it for my morning walks and I love listening to music and Boat Rockerz  255 is the best at sound quality, noise cancelling and very good bass effect, keeps you motivated for the extra run.it is value for money. Wireless with very good battery life. best in this price range.

title: Good product but not really for runners
body: It's a good product in itself with good audio etc. The issue for me is that I was looking for something that is good to run with and unfortunately the part that goes over your neck just jumps up and down when you run and it's quite annoying. This product is better suited for walkers. Even though sound is good I will buy another product instead which doesn't have the stiff heavy neck part but is just a cable.

title: Value for money. Endless battery
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†I have already used the basic version of this product which is rockerz 255. I was happy that it lasted for around a year, so ordered the Pro+ version for better battery back up.And yes... The battery backup is seriously long lasting.I have used this neck band for binge watching for straight two and half days and it still had 40% juice left.Sound Quality is very good. Bass quality on highest volume isn't THE BEST. However, it won't matter as we hardly go that high on volume.The ear wings fit to the ear perfectly. (ears might hurt initially if you haven't used such earphones with the wings before. But, that's just a matter of day or two.)The built is sterdy for the price and I have no complaints.The magnets aren't the strongest in the world. But, sufficient enough to hold the earpieces together.

title: After 1.5 year of usage. 5star to 3 star rating.
body: Cons: Lost sound on one ear bud after 8 months. 4 no after that the other one died. Now it just works as a Bluetooth receiver!!!Life Span: 1 year. If your looking for a long lasting one better spent 3k and go for Sony xb wireless or Samsung level u.Pros: Bass as promised. Water resistant as promised. If you're looking for a Bluetooth headset below 1000 go for it.Can be used for sports activities as it sticks on the ear with the ear bud design.Good for sport lovers.

title: Totally bassy!ü§òüî•
body: Noise cancellation is good...Bass quality is amazing...Sound quality is okay...Because of bass...even sufi or silent songs would sound bassy which I did not like.Taking calls is what I enjoyed the most...even while walking by a busy road our voice clearly reaches the other side and vice versa.

title: Don't buy
body: Overall the experience was sort of okayish till first 3 months. After that one side of the earphone started having problem. Sound is very uneven. One side the volume is high and the other side, volume is quite low compared to first side. This just spoils the mood. Also there is a great lag in sound. This might be due to Bluetooth again.

title: Don't buy plz read it before buying
body: Cons: stopped working one side in w-3 months, filed complaint to boat, the picked my product, after 15 days i got new pair from them, after using it, one side stopped working after 2-3 months, now I again sent it to the boat service centre it's been 3-4 days, iam sure when will provide me new one, but the thing is that these headphones are not reliable for long term ohh sorry not even for short term use, iam thinking what if the new one also stops working after the warranty expires. And it also have poor connectivity , from front pant pocket to neck it gets voice break . Not worth the money go for jbl my cousin is using he had no issue. Tooks some time to charge. Not worth the money, go for any other product. At least don't buy this variant from boat.

title: Good purchase under 900
body: It's being 4 5 days and they r working perfectly I really like the product I would love the product if it works perfectly for 5 6 months cause it only cost 900 and it's not airpods offcourseNice catchy designGood bluetooth connectivityEasy to handleYou can't take it out if you are going to walk and not going to listen to songs you maybe not get what I m saying of you don't just ignore this pointA good buy

title: Worst product, first day bluetooth not connected with Mobile
body: I have received this wireless boat bluetooth today 06.09.2021. but it's not working, even I searched 100 times but bluetooth not showing in my and my friend mobile and laptop. Never purchase it in life. Keval loot macha rakhi hai. On boat name doing fraud only, delever cheap product only. This is wireless bluetooth but it not working/showing.
