title: Wrong information provided by company no aptx codec support and no low latency.
body: It does not support aptx codec it only works on aac and sbc codec .Bass is good , sound quality is also good .There is latency when you press the pause ‚è∏Ô∏è button the music üéµ stops after 3 second.When the music stops and hissing sound comes it becomes very annoying .One should think thoroughly before buying it.

title: Headset problem
body: Bought Boat rockerz 255 in April 2019.Initially the product was good.However the right handside earphone is not working now and not sure if this will be covered in my warranty.Have tried all possible ways to rectify but in vain.Doubting the quality of such a simple product which is not durable.Raised a complaint once the right ear phones were not working. After 3 weeks the same was serviced ( faulty product picked up, serviced and delivered).But the problem surfaced again after 3 months. Right ear phone not working again.Looks like they have compromised on the quality of something basic. Thumbs down to Boat Rockerz üëéüèºüëéüèºüëéüèº

title: Satisfactory sound quality with low battery life
body: The battery life is remarkably low. I cannot blame the seller as it was said to be 6 hours, but my experience is 4-5 hours when I connect it to both my laptop and phone.Usually a good connection and switching between devices, but often my phone used to stop recognizing it when I just finish a call on my laptop.

title: after 3 month of usage = Worth in this price
body: I am writing this review after almost 3 months of usage, and I can say almost daily usage in this time period. sound quality is damn good, as well noise cancellation is also good [you can't hear your family members shouting, while just putting this in ear ;-) ]. charging lasts 2-3 days, but that's enough with very tiny battery in this much compact setup.only thing I feel as drawback is that the rubber ring they give in ear-piece to fix it into our ear is getting loosened with time. but that's OK with other positive points.over all I would like to give 4.5/5 stars.good to go with it.

title: Super se upper
body: 1) I have purchased this on 13/10/21. From that day to 22 nd October I have used it randomly but till now 40% battery backup which is amazing.2) Noise quality is good3) But it's magnet  quality is not good as like my previous boat rockerz 255 pro.4) It's Volume bottom is not in perfect order (+&-). I think it's wrong.5) connectivity is good.Over all if you think to buy this product then your money not waste. As a common man I advise to go  for it. üôè

title: Nice Bluetooth earphone
body: I was using boat 255 then I upgraded to Boat 255 pro. It has good battery and latest bluetooth version. I use it to connect with my mobile and laptop. I bought during sale and got the red color but I dont like the red color (red color was the only color available at 1099/-. Apart from red color other colors are good. Choice is urs but working perfect . Sound / Battery / connectivity is good.

title: Good but consider other products...
body: The build quality is good... But not top notch... I was using flipkart smartbuy bluetooth earlier... It was way better in half price but its only downside was thin wire and average build quality... The sound is FLAT there is literally no bass... As mentioned, it charges to full in just 10-15 min... Calling quality is great. No glitches... The welcome sound "connected" , "ready to pair" are too loud... It sends shockwave in brain... The overall quality is good for sport use

title: Bad product and brand
body: Headphone's sound quality was fine. But it stopped charging In April that's just after 5 months into the use. I couldn't replace it due to lockdown. Now I have sent it for manufacturer's warranty. It took 12 days to reach service center( Aurangabad to Mumbai it's hardly 320 km), now it has been 4 days, its lying in service center with no update. You guys deserve 0 stars. If I dont get any update in next 2-3 days I'm going to consumer forum. Bad product and service. Don't use it.

title: Real value for money
body: These are the first wireless earphones I'm using after using normal earphones for several years. I'm extremely impressed with the sound quality and also how comfortable they are even if you are someone like me who listens to podcasts or music for several hours at a stretch. I had to change the earbuds to the smallest size from the standard size that are part of the package. Bluetooth connectivity is great since I've used them with my mobile as well as TV and PC (using a transmitter) and never faced any issues or disturbance. Battery life is also pretty good around 5-6 hours and charging barely takes an hour. The sound is crystal clear and for the price its available at it is real value for money.

title: Awesome product
body: Been using this for a year now and it's very good in terms of sound quality,bass and noise cancellation and battery back up...I use it for gym workout so once charged lasts for about  5 to 6 hours...Fits well in my ears .however it depends on your inner ear shape, as the same was not holding in place  when my girlfriend used it . It does not fall while doing my skippings or my jumpings...it's dangerous to use this product outdoors for running or while driving as the outside noise is totally cut.

title: Bluetooth Earphones with superbb Noise Cancellation
body: Bought this from amazon prime sell @ Rs.999/- only.Super Bass with high quality sound and awesome noise cancellation.Near about 5 hrs battery backup after charging once.Calling is awesome.......but one has to be in a low noisy place while calling because if the place is noisy then the other side will get those noise more than your voice.Bluetooth range is also good without lagging.All over it is good to use in a low cost.

title: Super long battery backup Bluetooth earphones
body: After using 1 month, I can say it's worth buying . I am using it with laptop, Mobile and Tablet with dual pairing functionality. It's very useful for attending office meetings from laptop using Boat Rockerz 255 Pro+ neckband earphones. Single charging lasts for 1 week approx with daily heavy usages of 5-6 hour for calls, Videos, musics. Call quality is superb. Noise cancellation not good with laptop but ok will phone. Helpful for Work from home works who attends many meetings over laptop and Cellphone.

title: Great for music, atrocious for phone calls, just not worth the price
body: It is very good for listening to music and podcasts and provides good sound quality. If you are travelling on a two wheeler, the mobile has to be kept on your side pockets or your shirt pocket. If you keep it in your back pocket, the sound will keep breaking.The earphones are however absolutely horrible for phonecalls and just not built for that purpose. 60-70% of the time, either you cannot hear the other party or they won't be able to hear you.

title: The best battery life and high audio quality.
body: The best thing about these earphones is its high quality at such a reasonable pricing. They have a good bass which allows you to have a good experience with music. The only thing which can be a bit irritating is the conical buds. But since you can remove those, there's no issue. The battery is amazing. You can go for about 4 days with one full charge and an extensive usage. Overall, it is a must buy for people who are looking for pocket friendly wireless earphones which also adds to their style statement. I am giving it 5 stars. Would surely love to see what they would offer in the future.

title: Excellent overall headphones
body: This is an excellent product from boatrockers. The sound quality of these headphones is very good, much better than those of the original oem‚Äôs. There is no dropping of Bluetooth connection, although the range is pretty less than the high end headphones. the battery life is as stated, the charge in my headphone lasts for a whole week with my usage. It is noise isolating headphone. The only real issue that I find is that you cannot skip to the next track with them. The controls need a bit of an upgrade. I would recommend this headphones to anyone looking for decent audio experience at very reasonable price.

title: Dont Buy This Product, last for just 4-5 months and customer service BAKBAS
body: I dont recommend u to buy this product. My reviews are 100% helpful as I purchased the product last year.Good things:1. On sale, u will get this product for 999/-2. The sound is good, base is good with this price range3. Bluetooth is perfect4. Battery backup is almost 3 hoursBut why I am not recommending u to buy this, here are reasons1. Its durability is just 4 to 5 months. After 4 to 5 months one or both side earphone stop working2. It holds 1 year warranty but if u want to claim ur warranty, it is tedious process. They pick up ur headphone,  but they didnt give it back within 1 month. They take more than a month to give back ur headphone. Furthermore, U need to call them a number of time for getting ur product back. Also, they are very rude to talk with us. They  give u the product back only if u call them again and again, if not forget about the headphone.Personal experience:My one side speaker stop working after 5 months, then i request them for a warranty. They collect my headphone, but they took abot 1.5 months to return and this is even when I call them again and again. When I got the new headphone, they again last for just 3 months and now they are not working. Me and my friend ordered this product, my friend's headphone last for 6 months and then stop working, he claimed for the warranty  but so far he didnt get the product back even after 4 to 5 months, they are not picking up the phone

title: finally found something real good
body: i have special needs. my ears are big. normal headsets won't fit in my ear. over the ear headsets also hurts my ear coz i wear spectacles. if u hav same issues, then Boat Rockerz is the right device u sud buy... thank u Boat Rockerz. (edit-writing after 10 months of usage.really working good)

title: Got it during some offer so price was around 999, was worth at that
body: Overall product is great. Sound quality generally exceeds expectations. Snug fit in the ear.Can connect to two devices.This aside some things to look out for:1. The ear pieces have those appendages which are supposed to help them rest in the ear, they tend to become loose and slide off.2. Range is slightly limited and the quality drops are noticeable.Cons:Battery life is an issue, though something that is part of the product description, so well. Think about alternatives or charging options when you travel.Mike performance could be a downer.

title: Best model of boat headphones.
body: I bought it on 17 oct 2021 &  the charging was full. Till now I have watched 4 movies with this earphone.  And also every day I listen to songs for 2 to 3 hours. Still till date(29.10.21) my charge is 35%.  In my opinion, there is no better headphone than this. I will give rating for this head phone1- Battery backup-  5 star2- Bass quality- 5 star3- Design-  4 star4- Noise Cancellation- 5 star5- Ear cushions- 3 star6- Price range-  4 star

title: Descent sound quality but tampered packing
body: First of all I was pretty pissed off with the kind of packaging that I received. It was tampered. So I exchanged it, but again got the same packet, with the same s.no. Seems like there was nothing wrong with the earphones. But still I was expecting a brand new packing and products. Hope Amazon would look into it.Coming to the earphones,I have used multiple products including JBL, air pod, sennheiser and now this. Sound quality is great, and noise cancellation is also fine to an extent. But its bass is not so great. It doesn't give the kind of bass and boom that you get in sennheiser. Also, the Bluetooth range seems pretty low. When I moved from one room to another there was a minor disconnect in the music and then it resumed.My verdict: If you are getting it on discount price only then go for it. Otherwise you can get better earphones in such range ( not Bluetooth ones)

title: Great Value for the Price Range
body: Great value for the money. Almost all reviewers said that they found 'Hisss' sound defect, but I couldn't find any on my device, I guess depends of device to device. Only issue I found is not able to trace the exact battery remaining percentage (in numbers) on my Xiaomi phone.Pros1. Good connectivity2. Good bass3. Battery is fantastic4. Light weight5. Dual pairing6. Call quality is betterCons1. PUBG low latency could have been much better.2. Sound quality should have been made better on equalising bass, treble, vocals.3. Magnetic play pause option missing.4. Built quality is average.5. No app support for additional tweaks (realme link app)6. ANC should have been included.

title: Nice product!
body: The sound quality of this product is nice, bass also quite good. The color is also sporty. The only concern is its battery backup, although the product delivers the backup as claimed by the company of 6 hrs,yet is comparatively low and also irritating. Subject to that the product is really great. Connectivity is also pretty good. Comfort wise also the product is really good. Overall it's a great product.However the delivery by Amazon could be improved a bit.!

title: Hissing sound when no audio is playing... don't buy
body: battery life is superb. sound quality average.build quality is good but it's little heavy compared to other bluetooth headset.only downside is  hissing noise which comes when no audio is playing.if I had known this issue before buying it I would have not bought it.l

title: Good built and performance for its price
body: I have received the product just yesterday and this feedback is based on one day usage. For this price point, it is a well-performing device. Earpieces fit well in the ear. One and half hours of continuous use did not cause pain. Build quality seems fine and wires are sturdy. Buttons are tactile enough and easy to operate. Connectivity seems fine. Voice through mic is also okay.Pros:Good Bass.Build quality quite satisfactory.Loud enough sound.Lightweight and comfortable for prolonged use.Cons:Magnet seemed weak. Earpieces fell apart twice in one day.Mid-tones are on a lower side. Treble OK. All emphasis is given on building bass.

title: Just Awesome
body: Just awesome in quality.Battery life is very good.Connectivity is very good with multiple device.I attend several meetings with different devices one after other.Very useful for multi device operators as well.I did meeting for my research, for my startup and other as well. So it is very handy for me.Build quality is very good and perfectly fit with my ear.I am satisfied and strongly recommend it for purchase.

title: Manufacturing defect, No quality check?! "Avg earphones"
body: Manufacturing defect in charging cable.No quality check in BoAt I believe.Earphones looks average.Sound quality average.Slips out of ear every now and then.The extra horn given doesn't fits in ear properly.Pain in ear after using for a while.Cable quality looks OK, will come ro know about durability only after using for long time.Can only be connected to one device (Bluetooth veraion 4.0)Dont get fooled by graphical images with Bollywood models. The real looks are totally different than the graphical images.An average earphone at budget to have the feeling of owning a blootooth earphones.

title: Worst sound quality
body: If you are looking for good sound quality then this is not the right choice.No bass sound.Can't even use for more than 30 mins. Ears are paining.Earphone wire also not good quality.Only one highlight from my point of view is battery.If you charge it for 1-1.5 hrs then it will come for more than 10 hours of continuous use.But you can't keep it in your ears for more than 15 mins.

title: I am using this since 4 day some time create problem. I feel cheet just like flipcard.... üëéüò¨‚òπÔ∏è
body: I am using this since 4 day hear some time create problem. For example "I used it 3 hours continuously then ear phone show 40 % battery but it was not working... I changed it after 15 min its battery show 80% again I use wish my Samsung galaxy phone within 5 min battery show 40%. So I don't recommend it. I feel cheet just like flipcard".... üëéüò¨‚òπÔ∏è

title: only buy if your are a base lover(read below for cons)
body: the headsets are comfy and the design is sleek regarding sound the headsets handels most of the back gound instruments just fine not great just fine the base is so much that it interferes with the voice of the vocalist the sounds gets suppressed while the base is just loud the voice also cracks sometimes if you listen closely overall not for everyone but great buy.Edit this one con is bugging me after a month n half of usage i have been travelling in local train in mumbai for almost 4 years and this is not for those who travel in the morning in rush hours there are bunch of people sourrended you in the meanwhile the earphone stops working the voice starts to crackle and the earphone gets disconnected this happens daily in rush hours this irritates me a lot and another thing is battery jumps from 60 to 20 percent where is 40 percent and battery backup is max 4 hours n half min 4 hours

title: Good product but value for money depends on offer
body: I am the first time boat user. Compared to jbl bass is better but the clarity and voice punch is not that great. Giving full volume bass is ok but the sound turned to become distored and noisy, not that great experience in high volume. According to the price from other headphones it is value for money but the price is very high without offer but with offer it becomes value for money.

title: Good support by Amazon. Bad product.
body: I expected this product to be excellent. Two of my colleagues use the same model and have good things to say about it. So when I saw this product on a great discounted price I bought it at once.But unfortunately my experience was no where as good. It started well. Sound quality was okay for me as I am not an audiophile. But mic failed in 5 days.Raised a replacement request. Received one in less than 48 hours. Great. But this one didn't even run for 2 days. It started with a Bluetooth connection troube with my phone. Connected finally after charging for some time and then few restart of the earphone. Then the next day it started disconnecting and shutting down automatically. When I switch it on again, it's at 100% battery. And the next day, it refused to start at all. Had to return the product.Thanks to Amazon for handling the return well. May be it was just my bad luck. But I won't recommend this to anyone.

title: Sound quality is good. But waste as the wireless connectivity function not working properly.
body: While wifi is connected, making video call over WhatsApp showing "poor connection . Video paused" error and frequently this happens. I bought this wireless headset mainly for video calling.. Since it is creating the problem, my rating is a big zero. I recommend any other branded affordable headsets instead of this

title: microphones are bad
body: well the earphones are fine per say audio was good enough bass is kinda excessive to some level its not nicely balanced...the good part is the battery life ....why i am giving this such low rating is because of mic....its microphone is utter trash and even placed in a non convenient place ....the microphone doesn't work at all properly if the fan is on or there is even a little background noise ....you have to scream in a silent room to just have these to read your words correctly and that's kinda a deal breaker if you wanna be on calls at times speak in online meeting sessions or anything at all...

title: Use it for regular life
body: Im giving my honest review after using it about 2 days i have used it 6-7 hours a day and if u r thinking that this device will give u any type of battery issue u r wrong but there a issue with this device if u connect it with 2 device at a time one device will give u best sound quality but with other the sound will from somewhere from video or movie u r playing like in my case i used it with my tv but when i use it with my phone at same time it will have this issue than i have to restart it....On the other hand the sound quality is best in this price range and its a value product from my side.

title: Honest review used after 1 month
body: No doubt it has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity and mindblowing battery but the following dissapointed me though i tried a lot to adjust.1.Bluetooth range not more than 10m2. Pain in ear due the conical buds(can be removed)3. Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in front.4. No pouch provided.5. Worst part is very low quality and distoring mic. Other person keeps complaining for voice.6. Problem in connect with hotspot if connected with boat

title: Product is too fragile. It did not last more than a 3 ~ 4 Months
body: The product is fragile. One ear stopped working after 3 ~ 4 months of use. Their support is useless. Raised a ticket and they picked up the product 2 months ago. Website says Replacement was issued and dispatched. BUT THERE IS NO TRACKING NUMBER. NO CLUE WHERE THE HELL REPLACEMENT IS..They don't respond to any mails and they don't respond to any phone calls.

title: Fantastic in the price range
body: Best bluetooth headfones in the price range. i bought it under lightning deal @ 999/- However, I would have even paid the full MRP for this one. Everything namely connectivity, sound quality, noice cancellation, built quality, sweat resistance, responsiveness to the buttons, etc.. is awesome about these headphones. You cannot have the same qualities in any other brand in this price range.

title: Average headphone in this range
body: I have purchased headphones from Amazon and as written it has a 10mm driver and good chipset but this boat rockerz 255 pro+ sound quality is not good. I am using Oppo A57 it disconnects when I called, which may be due to the OS of my phone.Though the sound quality I have compared with my other wireless and wired headphone even cheaper than it but the sound was not comparable with that 2 headphones. The sound I don't like they need improvement. And another information that only replacement of the headphone is possible on electronic goog so be careful when purchasing the electronic items online. Also, voice during a talk to anyone was not smooth, it's annoying you. Thanks Amazon learn a lesson.....

title: Excellent
body: I was sceptical about the product when I ordered it , that's being honest. I had come across it several times earlier when I had bought my previous headphones. This time thanks to Amazon product placement, it was in my face and going by the description and certain reviews, I made the choice trusting Amazon and Leaf. They both lived up to their word and I am satisfied with my headphones. Had it charged and used it to find that the sound quality and clearity is very good through my phone. More than what I was expecting and I am sure it will sound better once I test it through my pc and music system where I can adjust the quality through a equalizer and amp. Overall a great product, great for my phone. Sure recommend it to all and the price is good too.

title: It is a great deal to get your hands on
body: Well, I have been using these for a month now and the earphones are really good. The sound quality is immensely saturated. The bass is good for people who are not audiophiles. Like if you're not into sound recording or need minute details to grab onto, its perfect for you. Mic quality is kinda okay clear but it catches too much of sounds around you which can irritate the person on the other line. But on an average a great deal to get your hands on.

title: Disappointing product
body: I'm writing this review after few days of usage.Pros:-Sound quality is good, bass is okay okay, overall good.Cons:-Keeps disconnecting and connecting in between, voice gets distorted as soon as i go outside or at terrace even when i place my phone behind me music gets distorted. So u cannot use this in open space as sound breaks everytime.I bought it twice, and returning it because of this problem. It sucks

title: Quality of product is too good
body: Boat is the best electronic company  only not in India, in the world also. It gives quality in the product. This earphones are very good . It's sound quality , battery life, is very good , wide and strong wires will protect earphones from damage. I will recommend everyone to buy this

title: Terrible product
body: The product is terrible.. bluetooth connectivity with phone is horrible, so can't use for calls. normal usage for music etc is okayish. The charging wire provided stopped functioning after 3/4 days. Sound quality is reasonable, it does have decent bass when it works, which is rare. When connecting to laptop or tab, one ear sound is louder but this doesn't happen on mobile. This is the second time I brought boat rockers and both products were terrible. I only bought it bcoz of lockdown and this was the only product Amazon was delivering quickly. Now I regret doing so. No headphone is better than this product.

title: Bluetooth disconnects and connects again and again
body: The connection is not stable. Keeps disconnecting even if I am using with my laptop or my phone in hand. And the voice announcement for connection or disconnection is so loud that it really is annoying. I have almost stopped using this bluetooth and my money is literally wasted.

title: Great wireless earphones
body: Have been using them since 6 months now. Got it for my wife but ended up using them most of the time. Great sound quality and connectivity with Android, Mac and Windows. Sturdy to use. Good battery life. Mic is also good while speaking on phone and on calls. People hear me well while using the mic.

title: I'm using this for the past 6 months. Here is my opinion on this product.
body: I'm using this for the past 6 months. This headset is overall nice.What I like:1) Sound quality is good.2) Bass is good.3) Good in looks.4) light weight.5) It is a nice one in this price range. (I bought it for 1499rs and now the price is just 999rs).But there are some things I didn't like.They are:1) Mike is very bad. The person to whoom I am talking with, always complains about the noise. Even small sounds from the surroundings feels iritating to the person on the other side.2) Battery is not bad. But, when it has become 60%, it suddenly starts falling to 0%.3) At few times, I had connectivity issues.Overall, Ignoring these problems, this one is a nice buy.

title: For 999, This is a good deal
body: This earphones are recommended when they are available under Rs999. They dont stay in my ear when i go running as the weight of the band pulls it down. I recommend Boat 261 or Chkokko M2. If you want to use it while walking or office then it's good and does the job. Microphone quality is decent and performs normally in silent enviroments however won't cancel much noise when you're in a crowded place

title: WORST PRODUCT EVER üëáüëá
body: Worst HEADPHONE EVER I ORDER THEM 3 TIMES AND I RETURNED ALL OF THEMTHE FIRST TIME I ORDERED THEIR WAS A BUZZ IN ANY OF THE AUDIO I PLAYED SO THEN I THOUGHT THAT IT WAS A DEFECTIVE PICE SO I RETURNED IT .THE SECOND TIME I ORDERED THE SAME PROBLEM HAPPENED THEN ALSO I THOUGHT THAT IT WAS A DEFECTIVE PICE SO I PLACED IT FOR REPLACEMENT .THE THIRD ONE WAS A REPLACEMENT ONE AND THE SAME PROBLEM HAPPENED SO NOW I WAS DAMN SURE THESE HEADPHONE SERIES HAD FULL DEFECTS .MY HUMBELS REQUEST IS PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. AND BOAT COMPANY IS READING THIS REVIEW PLEASE SOLVE THIS PROBLEM .** D O.  N O T.  B U Y.  T H I S.  P R O D U C T.  **üôèüôèüôèüôè

title: Good buy at an affordable price
body: I was looking for a pair of bluetooth earphones to use during my gym workouts and I found these for Rs. 999 during a sale event. Here's my review after 1 week of using this product -Pros:1) Excellent bass quality. You'll love these earphones if you are a bass lover.2) The earphones are lightweight and the magnetic tip makes it easy to carry around neck. I find them really convenient to use at the gym3) Good noise cancellation & sweat resistant.Cons:Battery life - boAt claims a battery life of 6 hours but these run out much before that. It shuts down even though my phone displays 20% battery leftEar pain - The ear buds are not the most comfortable pair you can find. My ears start hurting after prolonged usageMic - The voice quality is not that great and not preferred for taking calls.Overall it's a good buy for the price range.

title: Better than the older one.
body: OK. I had bought this same model 2 yrs before and this model is sooo different from the old one. The battery actually lasts longer for this one. I know coz I had used it for two days and both days I used it a lot. And also the phone is showing the correct charge percentile now. For the older model, the earphones would shut down at 50%. And sometimes it was irritating too. Also I think the Bluetooth module has been upgraded because this model has got quite good range which I didn't get in the older model. Overall, I really like this current model now.

title: Setting Your Expectations Right
body: At Rs.1499, there are few areas that boAt delivers and largely others where it doesn't. Noise cancellation and bass are it's highlights while you might have to compromise with the poor build quality, sub-par sound clarity and battery life.With 1 week's experience and daily usage I have come to find:1. The battery doesn't support more than 3-4 hours of playtime, even at 70% volume.2. Great bass which might sometimes overshadow the mid and high tones.3. One of the earbuds has stopped working for which I have ordered a replacement and will post an update on the same.@Amazon/Appario: Excellent all-round experience from order placement to delivery to replacement initiation.

title: Good
body: Sound quality is good but not excellent. Noise cancellation is very bad. On call other party can hear alot of surrounding noise along with our voice. Very irritating for other party. Bass is good. Sometimes face issue with Bluetooth connectivity.

title: battery backup and connectivity distance/range needs to be improved...!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I am writing this review after using this Cellphone over a week usage , I bought this t diwali sale for 999/- colour: Neon*] Battey backup will not come not more than 3-Hours.!!! DISAPPOINTED!!!!*] Bluetooth connectivity is bit poor, while talking voice , it breaks, person in the call will complaint your voice is not clear*] As said bluetooth range is not more than 10Meter*] Good sound Quality Earphones quality is good with strong magnetic lock, Comfortable on earNOTE:  boAT earphone ,difference between  With wire and Wireless, With wire earphone  Sound quality is awesome..!!!!!

title: Mic problem.
body: It work fine for normal call and music playback and all. Battery backup is also great. The only worst thing I found is that for webcall (whatsapp, messenger call) the mic will get disconnected. The person at the other end wouldn't listen your voice. Once you disconnect and reconnect the mic will work for a minute and again will disconnect. Very irritating. I am using Galaxy s9 plus handset. Just check others review also before you go for it. Thanks

title: Highly Overrated.
body: Although I thought this will be an amazing purchase as I bought certain speakers of boat earlier, but i was very disappointed.Cons:1.Mids are completely missing.2.Too much bass. Ruins the quality of music3.Hurts when listening loud.Pros:1.Light weight.2.Wont fall of while running or something.Conclusion: Do not buy if you are an audiophile. If you are ok with too much bass compromising quality of music while working out, then go for it.

title: Simply Amazing
body: Sound quality is amazing, Bass is also good , music sound easily manageable, calls easy to answer & hang up, cost is worth. But the reason i‚Äôve given 4 star rating is., it‚Äôs bit uncomfortable, giving the pain in ears , i was using the apple earphones before this and that has the amazing comfort level but unlucky one side of the my apple earphones gone after the use of almost 3.5 years.But again coming to this boat rockerz 255 pro plus, price wise it‚Äôs amazing, rest it‚Äôs completely up to you as everyone has different point of view and choice.

title: Worst ever after sell service
body: NOW, I'm editing my review,Product is good but they are worst in providing warranty service, i raised complaint for warranty and they took almost 1 month of time to get replaced my earphones. When we get in habit of use of this product then we can't live without this earphones in daily routine, and their customer service doesn't feel it, they took 1 month of time for replacement, worst ever service after sale.

title: Highly recommended and worth for money
body: Head phone is really nice to use.. Writing a review after using it for a week.. Sound quality is good. Very easy to use.. Call quality is also nice. I'm using it for taking long calls and listening music..  It fulfil the purpose. Battery life is good and easy to charge.. This product is good for those who look for good blue tooth headset with decent cost.  No cons as such.. Even the ear bud n model is good to use..

title: excellent service.
body: I am writing this review after using it for now 9months. Had no intention to write as I believed it to be a normal good buy.  The product since the beginning was perfectly working and was of worth the money I spend according to my budget. I am a constant user of headphones and hence in normal conditions both the earplugs got stopped working recently. With the help of my amazon bill details I requested the company for replacement, trust me I got the best service and got it replaced within time. I really felt nice that the supplier kept their promise of warranty and hence I would surely recommend this supplier for buying new things from them. Thank you Boat rockers, u guys are very very genuine and efficient.

title: Pathetic customer service, no response
body: I bought this earphones in Sep 2019, it was working decent and started failing recently. I called the service center in Chennai, Cell tech, pathetic service and response was even worse, its like they dont even want to answer you. Would I buy or suggest anyone to buy this, never in my life, not just this, will never buy any product from Boat brand.

title: More than average
body: The sound and mic quality is good. The person on the other side can hear you Cleary.ConsNo much noise reductionSome times disconnect automaticallyThe are some issue when i connect it to whatsapp call.Overall it is good.

title: Worst product
body: Disgusting product. First one was not working and second one is also good for nothing. Sometimes sound just disappears in between.Above that it give battery low warning every minute after first warning. I hate that sound. It was my mistake to buy this one

title: Don't buy for music
body: Product is too blurry as far as bass is concerned.In this range there are lot more good quality options available.It seems like they have forcefully tuned bass part to sound like that. No music quality .at all

title: Keeps getting disconnected frequently
body: The headsets gets disconnected frequently even when a song is playing. Then gets reconnected again by itself. Sometimes you have to restart the headsets to make connection again. Happens both on mobile as well as with laptop. Will not recommend to buy for this price. Color (teal green) is very good and the sound quality is fine.

title: Best in price, Loved it, Go for it
body: First impressions is very good and i was using 255 already. So this best upgrade.  battery is really awome i am binge watching lover, and 3 web series watched without charge earlier 255 was wired headphone for me as i wasn't able to watch single web series in one go. Just loved this headphone

title: It's been 3 days only . I will edit it after 3 months but for now
body: INR 999 seriously it's great deal .I use it for study purpose and also for music. I'm quite versatile for my music preference I love hip hop , Rap , EDM and on the same time gazal,  Sufi  songs so my experience with it is amazing like it knows when to use excess bass and when to not .I connect my laptop and mobile with it at same time and it's switch mechanism is great feels like AI built in or something. Double click middle button to call last person you called feature is really helpful.Battery life is also satisfactory I had used about 13 - 14 hours in single charge about 3 hours of video lecture on laptop and about 3 hours of music on mobile and about 1.5 hours on calls and rest on stand by mode.So for now its worth of buying .

title: Bluetooth Connection Problem while playing songs.
body: I have been using this headset for 4 months, here is my review:Sound quality - ExcellentNoice cancelation - GoodComfortable - Ear bud not comfortable as it creates pain in ear.Connectivity - Bad (Beginning it was ok but in long usage am facing too much of connectivity problems.Battery backup: Good.Bluetooth Distance: For Short distance it is good like around 7-8 metersOverall comment: Need to improve in connectivity issues and ear bud model. Ear bud can be adjustable but disconnect problem has to be focused.

title: Sound is good but it is not durable and customer care is pathetic.
body: I used it for approx 6 months (no rough usage), sound is good, you won't be disappointed , but one side stopped working after that. It had 1 year warranty , so I sent it to their service center and it came 'AFTER 1.5 months' (pathetic customer service). And, the product I received after service seemed to be new (it came in new package and brand name was clearly printed on it), but i think i was wrong because it  started showing charging issues just after 1 week and stopped charging after 1-2 months. I mean seriously, you sent it to me after 1.5 months and that too faulty. So, before buying just know that they are not durable,  you can't trust how long they will work. They say it is a sports earphone, but they didn't survived even the normal usage, how are they supposed to perform well if used in sporty way.I won't buy boat products from now.

title: Battery Disappoints
body: Everything is good with this product but only battery Disappoints you. I changed this 3 times thinking it would be battery problem with 1or 2 product but it same was with all.It cannot work for even for 6 hours. But sound quality is superb.For sound 5/5Battery  2/5Fit 5/5

title: Reviewing after 4 months of use.
body: Evrything is good about this product. Sound quality, Bass, bluetooth connectivity, battery backup-approx 6 hrs. Charging time is about 1 hr to 1.30 hrsOnly issue is for calling u can use this only at a peaceful nd quite place otherwise the other person will not be able to hear ur voice clear.

title: Amazing... Got what I wanted
body: Yes !! Quality is there....I was concerned about the sound but it is way up to the expectations... Treble is a bit low (marginally low) but the Bass n overall sound quality is been exellent... Happy with the battery backup as well... Charge once n use for straight 6-7 hours at high Volume....

title: A best bass Bluetooth earphones in this price range
body: This is my honest review.It's a wonderful Bluetooth headset in this price range. It has a good sound quality and bam booom bass.As a bass lover I am really impressed with this headsets. I play some songs like whatever it takes and old town road the bass and sound quality fully satisfied me. The pros of this headsets are it has a long battery life compared to the other Bluetooth earphones in this budget @1200,it has a comfortable fit in ears,less weight and the cons are it has a poor range. At the specs they said it has 10 m range but that's not true. In a open place like terrace, the music is interrupted when you walk away from the mobile. The range is nearly 5to7 metres. That's it. If u consider this is not a big problem. Then the headsets are absolutely fine to me. I love it very much.

title: Amazing value for money bluetooth earphone for BassHeads!
body: I have been using this earphone for almost 5 days now. I started with 100% battery. Till date my battery status is showing 60% !! This is amazing. I can just recharge once and use my Boat earphone for full week!As for the sound, I did slightly miss the chum-chum jingles on high trebles but it adequately compensates it with thumping bass! Noise cancellation works fine too. Not much of a bother. Pretty satisfied with the product.

title: Average product
body: I purchase in RS. 899. BASS and sound is average bquality. Megnate is very poor. My last bluetooth magnete was powerful. Overall product quality and build quality is poor. Mice is good. This product is only for calling with poor built quality. USB charging cable is also 3rd class. I can't charg from this cable. I am already using Boat bluetooth device so I again purchase same brand device but my decision was wrong. This product is average . I give 3 mark from 10.

title: Proper bass heads and best buy at this budget. Sound quality is good too but not the best.
body: The earphones are the best bassheads you can find at such a low budget. Sometimes the bass is so much that the sound quality is compromised. You literally can't listen at max volume on both you phone and earphones. The controls however are very friendly and also the earphones are pretty light weight. Connection issues haven't yet ever surfaced and it's been 4 weeks I am using the earphones and also 2 devices can connect simultaneously.

title: Doesnt fit { full reveiew down)

Earbuds are hard very hard no small eartips z ear support doesnt help at all prefer realme neckband just bass is less in realme everything else is fine ...... title: Best for Bass lover
body: I ordered this for 1299 and belive me this is value for money in this price but i am not satisfied with its build quality when i trying to plug it in charging it got a small crack on it. But when we talk about the sound quality its clear and bass is awesome.... I loved it hats off for the bass quality and yeah this also have working passive noice cancellation and mic also work good and connectivity range is decent...Conclusion: if you order this product you will not rigret over all good product üíñ(And if you. Like tech related things you. Can follow my channel HacksOnHigh)

title: Perfectly good
body: Boat rockerz 255 pro is really awesome to buy for hearing songs and watching movies.But, for gaming I won't recommend it because of short time lapse(0.25secs).And it gives bass and sound quality.And when connecting to 2 devices it is not that much good and noise cancellation is too good so, a busy man will surely be benifited.And connectivity lasts for 10m distance when it is without any intruptions such as walls etc.And, the main thing I want to convey is it is worth for Rs.1050.But,if this product goes for Rs.1500+ then you can move to any other neckbands........THANK YOU!!!!!

title: Amazon misguiding Indiansü§¨ü§¨ü§¨
body: Left side headphone sound is little bit lower side.Both side sound should be balanced. Not expected this from Amazon.Sometimes make showing china & sometimes India, can't understand why Amazon trying to fool Indians...Amazon is also sub standard company.Misguided Indians....

title: Bluetooth connectivity is the biggest letdown
body: Like many others have already written about it, the Bluetooth connectivity of this piece is embarrassing. You cannot stick your phone in your pocket or a bag and expect your songs to play without a glitch. The connectivity is really that bad. Boat needs to take this earphones off the market and fix the issue. Seriously

title: Great indian festival well spent!
body: Got this one for 899‚Çπ during great indian festival...for this price it is really a good headphone. The build quality is good...the main attraction is its bass...bass is really good...overall the sound quality is good....also there is no issue with bluetooth connection...battery backup is fine. Worthy purchase under 1000...This is the best bluetooth headphone you can get around 1000 rupees...go for it...

title: Cheap product don't worth money.
body: If you really need a good Bluetooth just wait and try to collect some money otherwise you will end up wasting your money like Me..  Cheap quality and less feature. Ear fiting is also non comfy.  I also don't the hardness of wire it stand straight like a tomboo..

title: Perfect sound
body: The sound quality with BOAt is excellent, no doubt there. But this particular product was very uncomfortable for me to wear even for small durations of less than 5 mins. The smaller covers were either so small that they slipped. and the regular ones which came fitted were plain uncomfortable for me.

title: OK for the price
body: The headphones are definitely build to last. They have metal heads. There are different size of ear tips which is great. The magnet in the heads is also great and strong. They are comfortable to wear in long durationsSound-The sound is not so great but considering the price i would say its ok-ish. The bass is enhanced and produces a thumping effect. That's it. The mid and lows have are not at all clear and get drowned due to the enhanced bass.Bluetooth range is good and since they are in ear types so they do provide a good seal cutting major sounds around you .Call quality is again OK-ishThey are a no go for an audiophile or some one who listens to mellow songsGo for them only if you are tight on budget ( got it for ‚Çπ999/- ) and are ready to compromise other tones for the bass

title: Sound/Bass is very good. Design not good. Falls off your ear
body: +vesWorks very good for Bass. Sound is a bit low but still okay. Very clear sound. No disturbance at all.-vesThe one I didn‚Äôt like is the design. It doesn‚Äôt fir in your ears properly. It keeps falling down from your ear. The rubber grip doesn‚Äôt hold the earphone in your ear. Should definitely be redesigned. Also the soft part of the wire is little long and looks weird when wearing.

title: Superb product worth of money ......
body: Very very good product interms of quality and futures. I have been using since 6 months allmost , I used like anything ,those who are looking for best one this is the product .Quality is very goodFutures are very goodThere is no echo voice .Over-all build quality is owsome .

title: Charge every day if you listen more then 2 hrs.
body: If you have heard Sony before then you won't like these.Average base.Average noise cancelationLooks premiumGood to holdBattery back is not so goodLast about 2-3 hoursWill have to change every day.When battery is low it gives repeated warnings which are irritatingBattery drains fast

title: Goods and Bads
body: "Great cry little wool" I can say honestly about it, when I decided to brought new Bluetooth speaker, I preferer to Boat because it's a well known brand but It didn't matches with my requirement. It has some good points and bad points also. fast of all, let's talk about good points- it has amassing sound quality, it destruct you with outer sound. now, it has some bad points also like- It's battery usage is very low, I charge it many times.  It hurt my ears, hence I am unable to use it for a long period of time.

title: In FREEFIRE  there is some issue,Some latency seen.
body: Best in this price , value for money.Note -if you are playing PUBG or COD its work properly no any issue  but in FREEFIRE  there is some issue, its not work properly, audio latency can seen in this boat 255pro+ ,This is why i'm giving 4 üåü rating.If you are only a FREEFIRE player so read this review after than purchase it.

title: Go for it
body: Initially it was not on my list as I thought it was a cheap brand. I was looking for something which could give me good call quality. I tried JBL, Sony and Samsung. None of them could provided the call quality I needed. Then I tried this as last option and to my surprise it was the best and no one ever made a complaint about the call quality.I give 5/5 for all features.

title: Great product
body: Boat's signature sound quality - fantastic.I wouldn't depend too much on noise cancellation - not too much.Pretty comfortable but I had to take out the extended rubber hooks (or whatever you call it) from the earpieces and it was great then.Would have preferred a shorted cable but it's not a deal breaker.Regular use sweat over ears or at the neck does no harm, but I have been skeptical to try in the rains.

title: Hassle-free use
body: These are my first Bluetooth headphones. It was easy to connect. The sound clarity is not bad, but a little muffled, I feel. But since I bought it at 1k, I think it was a steal. It comes with 1yr warranty as well. Overall, a good buy. Unlike the neon green variant as I like the pop of colour.

title: Raised a complient
body: This is the worst product in my career...I bought boat wireless headphone through Amazon..It  was not working after three months.I have raised a complient to boat service center.After I got mail from them as send by blue dart courier for the damaged product.but still I have not received  any update from courier office and boat service center.....As the blue dart courier said that many complient  about boat product from the customer.I am very irritate about this...I am not go for any purchase through Amazon in coming days..Thank you...

title: Communication problems with the phone
body: The sound was good. But they are indeed wastage of money. The earphones did work well for some days when I purchased, but they started making trouble soon. They will automatically get disconnected from your phone once you commence playing any multimedia or audio, and it has been the problem for long now. And because of that, it also irritates you with voice "disconnected" or "your device is ready to pair". And these voice recordings' volume is always high, doesn't matter what you have adjusted. I regret I  wasted my money on such useless stuff. It is so irritating when you want to listen to your music and it irritates you just because of a silly communication issue. And yes I have checked my phone. It's Bluetooth is working fine.

title: Best Buy for those who use it more for calling
body: Great battery time,Suitable for gym, calls, while driving.Sound quality is good.Base is Good but its not for Base music lovers, if you want it for all time music then you will feel base is sharp. But if you want to listen music while running, gym or for some time then all good.Overall Best Buy.

title: Quite Good, but many more scope for improvement on sound and overall quality.
body: Review after 2 Months of usage :I have never used branded earphones , so I was expecting the performance of this earphones to be decent in all aspects.Some Cons first :1. The neckband material is complete plastic and kinda hurts my back neck when I wore it directly on neck.2. Whenever I am walking somewhat faster , and if my phone (Moto E4 Plus) is in pocket , the connectuvity abrupts some times.3. Claiming warranty is tedious , it should have been more easier e.g. just by scanning an QR code or so.4. The bass is okayish , not the best not bad.5. The snapdragon chip used in this earphones claims to connect two devices simultaneously (Scatternet) but there are no clear instructions on how to do it.6. Just few days ago I have experienced that after connection and in working normal condition, the sound from ear buds stops abruptly , and kind of weird click sound comes and even after reconnecting same issue remains.7. My voice while in call is not really clear , I have to repeat my words while on mic.And here are the pros that I found :1. Battery is quite good , daily I use it for around 2 hours and I charge them once or twice a week, I literally never ran out of battery.2. This earphones seems to have water resistance, few days ago, one of my earbud dipped into water , fortunately earphones just working fine.

title: Amazing performance...must buy
body: One word for this product "Awesome".After initial charging for almost 1 hr started using on Aug 19th evening..Used for more than 40 hrs as of now. Still little bit of charge is remaining.its day 13.Sound quality, call quality , mic everything is good.Initially I bought boat 335, which disappointed me with low battery performance i got nearly 20hrs only. Then I returned that and bought this.But with this boat 255 pro+ i got more than 40 hrs at 50% volume as mentioned in the manual.I used this mainly for YouTube videos, music. Out of the 40 hrs total usage phone calls were just 5-6 hrs.I'm totally happy..and I recommend this to everyone.

title: It is made in China product
body: With boAt I was expecting a made in India product, was disappointed to receive a made in China. My mistake I didn't check details to confirm this beforehand.Headphone quality is okay, need to wait to check on battery life claim of 40 hours.

title: Please don't buy
body: Bhai kisi ki mat suno youtuber ya kisi review ki bhi sach batau zero noise cancelling hai or bass to bhai pura zero hai me boat ke dusre product use kar raha hu or unke samne waste of money hai bhai please mat kharidna sach bol raha hu

title: Nice but can be more improved than previous one
body: Nice product. Better than sports edition. Bluetooth 5.0 working properly nice. Good connectivity throughout the home another rooms. Battery looks good . Noise cancellation is not so proper. Sound us lil bit crisp...in high volume sound must be crack on high pitches notes....in 6-7 sound feels goid sound but all over nice

title: worst product due to Battery issue
body: Sound quality good 80/100Bass 75/100Battery 01/10016/04/2021 maine Amazon se purchase kiye tha, 1 month accha chla 1¬Ω hrs charge karne pe 8 hrs chal jate tha, 2 month baad 5-6 hrs chlne lage phir abhi 03 July 2021 ko 1¬Ω-2hrs charge karne k baad 5 minutes chlte then power off due to battery low...Phir jab boat customer care wale se baat kiye maine 16/07/2021 ko to boat customer care wale ka support to itna accha hai ki abhi tak mera parcel receive nahi hua haiBoat ka earphone agar purchase kar rahe ho to 6 month k ander kaise money waste ho jayega

title: Good but not great.
body: Got it for Rs. 999. It's been 3 months of usage. Okayish product under 1000 but not worth the 1500.Sound quality is OK. Noise cancellation is average. In a traffic or crowed places background voice is dominating than ours. Sometimes gets disconnected when trying to pair it up with our phones. That ear hook is not for everyone and causes severe pain on my ears but we can remove it form the headphone. End call notification is not there atleast a beep when the call ends would be fine. My suggestion only buy if it costs less than 1000.

title: Battery Backup is Not up to mark
body: Review after 2 weeks of usage(-)Sometimes pairing is too slow even takes 1 min which is very high.(-)Battery back up is not good.(+) Good for people who have low indoor network coverage. u can place ur phone to window side ,connect this earphone and enjoy improved call quality anywhere around 10 m radius.(+) Good if u get this thing for 999 or low. Otherwise bad choice.(+) Double tap middle button for calling most recent contact which is good for me.

title: Okay Product
body: It‚Äôs good. Clear sound, Deep bass, fits well in the ear, has decent battery life. If you expect it to look premium, you will be disappointed. I find it just okay. The wire looks delicate and one might damage it if not used with care. It‚Äôs a rubber coated u bend and buttons are also coated. Felt the blue tooth connection a bit unreliable and I have often felt it to crash if your phone is kept in your trouser pocket. Connecting it to any device is easy and super quick and with no obstruction, it works fine.Overall it‚Äôs okey for the price I paid (899‚Çπ).

title: Replacement and services
body: I purchased this headphone few months ago after 2 month i found some problems with their wire then I registered my complaint last months from their website and till now i haven‚Äôt recived any confirmation from boat side their cc not picking my call I tried from last months after that i send email aswell approx 50 time but I didn‚Äôt recived any reverts from their side.boat service is so pathetic I advise to go with any other brand as compare to BOAT

title: Better than OnePlus go for it
body: For the price, its just awesome. I had initially bought Onepluse bullet wireless but replaced it with this as rhe one plus had issues when taking calls(it's an on going tech issue). Boat wireless head band works like a charm for listening to music, vidoes and taking internet and regular calls.

title: Overall good
body: Hello all. Writing review after 10 days of use. I use it only for jogging around 50min a day. Got it charged the first day and till. Now I didn't need to charge it. So the battery backup is fair enough. During calls also it is quiet good. The person at the other end can hear me without any disturbance. Sound quality is good. For songs played at full volume the voice cracks but the sound at full volume is too loud so ideally we don't need to go that high. I got it at 1350 with discount. Overall my experience with it is good. I loved it.

title: Good product
body: Super bass as you hear and good battery backup, If you use under 1 amp charger it may not get charging so always use between 1 to 2 amps charger. Never charged 100% or full. If battery goes 30% plug-in charger for 20 to 30 minutes and enjoy full day.

title: Amazing sound quality but not reliable
body: Bang for the buck. Only improvement i would suggest is a longer battery life. It lasts only for couple of hours of usage. And after 9 months of usage it is now broken. The right channel doesn't have a voice now. Stays connected in idle state for a day though. But if we use it continuously it doesn't last longer than max 2.5 hours.

title: Best Deal
body: A device worth buying.Sound quality is excellent ( for phone calls actually it depends on network and for music it purely depends on media player with equaliser).Battery is low for normal usage. (Reviewing after using for 2 days) It came up with 80% battery and after using for 4 hrs, it is showing 40%.

title: Don‚Äôt Buy..Go for Sony or JBL
body: Stopped working in 3 months.Claimed warranty but it takes forever..still haven‚Äôt received the replacement as well as no email or SMS or call from Boat.Don‚Äôt buy these earphones...spent a little extra and buy Sony or JBL at least their products a good and if any issues they treat their customers better and resolve the issue quickly.I already bought another Bluetooth earphones and I guess I‚Äôm gonna wait for 7-8 months for Boat to replace their faulty product.

title: Great Buildquality and good sound signature
body: Firstly I have used this for almost a year. Very good connectivity long lasting battery life better build quality than any other brand in this price segment.But it has a con also, boat should definitely work in the eartips quality it feels itchy and not that soft , I just changed the eartips with jbl 150si's and sound quality became 20% more pleasant immediately... Boat ‚õµis very good brand and I hope they improve eartips material and quality.

title: Decent earphones.. could be better if it had long range and no unnecessary static sounds
body: Decent earphones taking into consideration price(900 rs) and sound quality. Low Bluetooth range .Sometimes Static sounds comes when nothing is being played or when bing connected,which is very irritating.Also there should be some extra weight on center so that it balance between both ears and neck.Hopefully they would improve .

title: Bass Heavy in Budget.
body: The Bass and Sound output of the earphones are astonishingly loud for the price.Fit could have been better, but that has also been taken care of by providing extra ear tips.Noise cancellation can be termed as best in class, for the price. You barely listen to stuff going on around, even at 60% of the volumes. (Depends on choice of songs, as I say that. Still, substantial Noise Cancellation!!)Connectivity flickers a bit as you leave from one room and go to another, doubting the connectivity range mentioned. But even that is totally manageable..Too good for the price kind of product, no secodn thoughts required. Just Go For It!!! :)No second thoughts required. Totally go for it.

title: Best for music and not for calls
body: Product quality looks like it was already used because I can observe dust over ear buds and color faded than the usual picture as shown.Charging will be completed with in hour with 2A charger and last for 48 hours for the users who listens music mostly and less for calls.But disappointing thing for calls it is not all good and better only for music lovers.

title: 3.5/5 stars, good at this price range itherwise ok ok
body: Good build quality at this price range. Sound quality is good but a little improvement will be appreciated. No battery indicatiin. No full charge indication. No option to change the male notificatiin voice to female notification voice. Glitches are too often. Battery level indication in connected phone is wrong, shows 100% and 80% then direct 20% 4 to 5 minutes before shutting down.

title: Decent product under 1000 rupees
body: Pros-Decent sound quality-good bass-sufficient battery life-excellent noise cancellation-magnetic earbudsCons-annoying beep sound while increasing and decreasing volumeSummaryOverall a decent product under 1000 rupeesSound quality is better than ant audio wave 702 wired earphone

title: Great Value for Money if you get any deal
body: Overall really good earphone, I just wish that they had provides a couple of other rubber earbud cover sizes the one that comes is a bit small. But sound quality and battery life is excellent!! The design is also  nice with magnets to keep the earphone from falling off when not in use

title: Satisfaction
body: length of its both wires are frustrated as too lengthy and not comfortable at all, when you fix the buds in ears not hearing any outside sounds clearly...Also hurting eqrs. Other than aboveBattery capacity and Bluetooth range & built quality r good...Inspite of my review,I loved the warranty of the productMy product's right bud wasn't work for a while I have opted for claiming warranty, they were accepted my warranty and replaced with another piece within 20 days...You really awesomeboat

title: Nice Ear phone at cost of 1099
body: Like:Price: I got it in 1099 in an offerBase: Superb baseNoise cancellation: quite good at this price range of productHandling: you can easily use it while running in the gym or park.Dislike: The earphone cable is of low quality. It got a tear just after a month.  The service center charged me Rs. 450 to get it replaced even earphone comes with a 1-year replacement warranty.

title: Hearing break in sounds every 2-5 seconds.
body: I am completely  disappointed  with this device) You will hear break sounds if you are watching movies (even offline), on calls (you will hear break sounds and person in front of you complain that he not getting proper voice) and frequency  like every 5- 10 second (even batteryshows 90%). ( for cross check  disconnect the Bluetooth and replay the dialog  then you can easily compare)

title: A budget all-rounder by boAt
body: I have been using boAt wireless headphones since two years they have never disappointed me.This is my 3rs boat wireless headphones but i must say this one impressed me alot according to the price segment (Rs 999),it's doing a perfect job of delivering good quality of sound.Regarding the battery life its is 6hrs, but its quite Ok since i have purchased it for 999rs only i can't expect much from it.Coming to sound quality it has a bit more bass, the bass is more than treble but not a problem for those who love high bass.Overall sound quality is more than good in this price segment.The build quality is not that high quality but yes it is sturdy enough to withstand normal drops.Acording to me the length of cord is too lengthy.One thing i dint like about boaAt is connectivity range, the range of connectivity for this is less than 10m,but again budget matters. Given a thought i had paid only 999rs,i am very much satisfied with overall performanceRegarding service center, the customers leaving in Mumbai has added advantage as i had.My previous boat rockerz 275 one earpieces suddenly stopped so i visited the service center in Goregaon and they replaced my headphones with new in just 5 minutes without any questions asked.So customers in Mumbai don't worry about the warranty.

title: Higher Price With Moderate Sound Quality!
body: A good product for performance but not good for that price ! Else ok for buyer,good blutooth connectivity,sound quality must say towards BASE and less TREBLE! Noise cancellation is mostly adjusted with the help it‚Äôs fitting in ears! Or may be done by active circuit then sacrificing the sound quality!Else ok!

title: Please it's a request don't buy this. You will waste your money
body: I am writing this review because I had been using my boAt rockerz 255 for almost a year and hence I thought this one would b more better. However to my utmost disappointment I regret buying this one. Firstly the range is too low. I mean only a couple of distance and the thing looses it's connectivity. Secondly when I'm on call the opposite person finds my sound too low or at times can't even hear me. Battery life is ok. Sound is good. Bass is good. But I didn't expect this low quality from boAt. I should've bought my old model only. It was amazing with sound n battery and range and noise cancellation and everything.Utter waste to money and disappointed

title: Does not work with linux ! Worst design factor !!
body: Update : These earphones does not work with linux ( tried with ubuntu, zorin, mint,elementry) . I have Airdopes 441 and that works flawlessly with linux also.Completely useless earphones due to uncomfortable design . The wires are so hard that you constantly keep on feeling as if something is hanging beside your face. A constant downward pull in both the ears.The sound and bass is Good. But I dont think that should be the only criteria to judge the earphone.

title: Nice sound quality but poor mic quality
body: Kudos to the product, for giving this sound quality in this price point. Got it for 1000 bucks on sale . But considering the original price bracket i would definitely recommend you to add 2-300 bucks and buy realme bluetooth earphones coz the ony drawback i found in these is its mic quality, most of the times it picks external voices more then yours which causes disruption and flickered tone. Rest sound quality is good

title: Do not buy
body: I purchase this headphones but not satisfied with this product sound quality  is not good and there is lag between videos sound. Headphone plastic quality is also poor. Don't purchase because if you purchase this you could not get refund on this after delivery

title: REVIEW AFTER 2 MONTHS
body: Although For a price of 1100 they are quite considerable ( for the sky blue variant ) and the pros and cons are -1. The sound quality is Good2. Good For listening Deap Bass songs.Cons1. Completely ruins gaming experience as the Latency is at its Peak.2. Loud Alerts for Battery low and powering on.3. Many times our voice is not clearly audible to opposite person on Phone call.4. During a meet call if we switch to other multi media apps like youtube both the sounds completely try to kill each other and we can not even operate them individually like we get the option when we are using any wired earphone.5. Of no use in daily life

title: Review
body: After using for 2-3 weeks:1. Quality of sound is fine. Nothing unusual.2. Bass quality is ok.3. I found connectivity issues quite common if it is connected to 2 devices.4. Many a times automatic bluetooth connection does not work!!5. Quality is worth the moneySome of these could be possible defects in my device!!

title: Small Sized NeckBand & Caller ID Announcement

Thats Important while working handsfree.

title: Go for it for gift purpose
