title: Good Product but won't fit into my ears
body: Boat product quality is satisfactory and value for money..But requested return within an hour i opened the pack..Since I found it is not properly fits into my ears..It is coming out..After years using headset, this is my first experience.

title: Not a that good product practically
body: This is a detailed review unlike past ones you've readFirst things the good things about the product-:1- battery is superb it easily gets along 3 4 days on a single charge as per my daily usage2- sound quality is awesomeThe things i Don't like are -:1- the length is very long. When you run they jiggle and sometimes fall off as the weight is quite heavy2- the battery is long lasting but you could easily get 12 hrs battery life with a cheap and light productAnd trust me 12hrs is good well enough for anyone3- they are very heavy and non comfortable

title: Value for Money
body: After 6 month use, I can say this is best Bluetooth head phone in 1500 rupee.Likes:- Good battery life. On descriptions it had written 8 hours but I'm getting 1.5 day battery life in a single charge.- Sound it good and extreme bass. 5* for bass- Built quality is very good. light weight and handy.Dislikes:- sometimes it disconnect and reconnect automatically- ear buds are not holding my ear perfectly and some time it's slip down.

title: Stopped working after 18 days of use
body: I bought this product on 3rd november and now suddenly it's not working,do not buy!and the sound quality isn't great even with the highest volume sometimes you cannot hear and when you send it torepair it takes about 20 days to be sent back.

title: Worst product. Never buy boAt products. Total waste of money.
body: Worst product. Even local products are better than this product.Right side speaker stopped working just 45 days after purchase. Customer care number given on boAt Rockerz web site was not reachable at all. I went to service centre in Vashi,  mentioned in web site, 4 times and everytime I received responce that boAt Rockerz 255 wireless headphones are out of stock. I can come next week and check. I am fed up of this product and after sales service.I also emailed on customer care email id mentioned on website. I got no reply. I sent reminders, i got no reply. I am seriously fed up of boAt products.I wasted my hard earned money in this product. I will never buy boAt product and will tell everybody to not to buy any boAt product.

title: Good, could have been better.
body: The headphone seems nice, however lately I found some issues with the microphone while using in laptop during video conferencing, the audience could not get my voice. With a great effort, I finally manage to speak by holding the microphone closer to my mouth. Not faced this problem with mobile.

title: Keeps falling off
body: The biggest problem is that they don't stick 8n the ears and keeps falling off.Sound wise it's ok, nothing great.Delivery on time even in lockdown.I could have rated higher if not for the bad grip. I had used Boult pro curve before and they are designed perfectly to hold in the ears unlike this  headphones.Got it 899, anything higher that 1k is waste of money.

title: Not bad
body: Bought them to check their sound quality...i wud say not so good...you can get the best sound quality with jbl and skullcandy wired headsets which will cost you just 500...when you want wireless than I'll suggest..again..jbl or skullcandy...which will cost you a 1000 more but they are worth your money...don't buy these

title: Waste product and worst customer care
body: I'm writing this review 6 months after using the product. All of a sudden lots of issues have started, battery dies after 15 mins usage, can't make calls via the device. Registered a complaint in their website and the product was picked up by courier since it is in warranty, its been more than a week now, no update from the company. The customer care number provided is always unanswered. Don't waste your money on Boat devices.

title: I have some connectivity issues
body: I have some connectivity issues. 29 I buy this product. Jan 05 the product's return window is closed. But I have some issues. How can I rectify this. Pls help me.And also noise cancelation is not working properly. Many time when iam in croud place. There is so many noises in my call. So I disconnect my Bluetooth and use direct call.

title: Nice product, can buy
body: I am writing this review after using it for 5 months. Its working as like day 1. No changes or problem in bluetooth and sound quality, Good. But sometimes it shows wrong % of charge in some device when we connect. So, I will say you can't trust the % charge but it will not matter for you when you will use regularly. It's battery backup is good, I used it for 7 hrs continuously still it has 40% charge. Nice product.

title: Battery backup 4 hour and sound quality is not upto the mark ..as bass is not good.
body: Its been 10 days ...since day one it get charged in 20 min and discharged within 4 hour only..As boat 255pro claim for 6 hour batter backup but couldn't reach upto the mark.Sound quality is quite good ..u can't expect bass from this model of boat ..For good quality of sound u should search above 2000 rupees product...of reputed brand..Overall Not recommended for them who use earphone for long time..not for student who study online.

title: Battery backup is awesome.
body: Pros1. Sound quality is good in this price point.2. Battery is awesome. I have using around 6 day and daily i was use aroud 4/5 hour and till date charging still 60% i thought i can use more 4/5 days.Cons1) If you are havy bass lover then this is not for you. Bass is good but not for bass lover because it's maintain balanced sound.2) For some person they can face fitting issue because of that holder yes we can remove but without holder it will slip from your ear.

title: What I wanted
body: This is a great product. The best part is the design. It's been crafted with so much care that it fixes all the issues anyone otherwise would have with any earphone - such as constantly popping out of ears, ears getting sweaty, well balanced on shoulder and you don't even feel it if it just lies there.

title: Kindly Don't buy and waste your money...
body: Don't buy this Product. I'm a regular user of this Headphone... It was working fine in the last few months, exactly 4 months. Few days back, it's not at all working...Problem is While charging this Headphone, it shows battery is full and when we tried to turn on the Device , it's not turning ON....1300/- gone within 4 months of use... Kindly don't buy this product and waste your money...

title: Good sound quality & good customer service
body: Giving this review after using 10 months. Very good customer service. My earphone stated creating some problem in mic just few days ago . Boat did arrangement for free pick up service and they repaired it and sent it to me. Good sound quality. Value for money

title: Battery issue
body: I am writing this review after using this for 4 complete days:+ves*compatible with neck and ears.*Bluetooth connectivity is fast.*look & design is awesome.-ves*earphone size is littlebit big: mainly with the earset which gives pain in ears when you mix helmet & earphones (while driving).*finding disturbance in music when im ‚Äúrunning‚Äù (probably due to connectivity issue)*music: everytime When there is change in song or toggle between music/video/call/other, experiencing an irritative beep sound.*Bass is not that good*when im driving: (onCall) sound quality is low & bad and mic aswell.*siri not working*grip for earbuds/earset is low quality and can damage anytime*when on call: other person keeps complaining about low voice and disturbance (..mic problem)*most concerned and the biggest problem with this bluetooth earphones is BATTERY backup;Even though when im not using bluetooth (call or music) battery discharging.*very bad thing: battery/charging directly falls from 80% to 0% within no time.*it is giving 3hours of battery backup only (at the max.i am returning this product: mainly because of battery backup which is a big issue for any bluetooth device!Really disappointed with the performance.

title: Pathetic product
body: boAt Rockerz 255 pro wireless headphone I ordered and on the day 3 the charging cable stopped working mean after spending good 1400 u get a headphone without cable it's pathetic I will never ever recommend anyone to buy this product not from Amazon or from anywhere they fool people showing only good quality they don't show the bad comments.In my family everyone use Amazon but now I will tell everyone to delete the app and stop using it such a pathetic product. never buy nothing from here

title: Sound not great, Earbuds uncomfortable
body: These earphones are okayish. Sound is not so great, but decent for a earphone in this price range. Also the earbuds are damn uncomfortable while using it for 30 mins +.If you are looking for a earphone with mic to attend meetings or talk over phone then I highly recommend this. But if you are looking something for listening to music then these could not be a great choice.

title: Fantastic product. Justify it's price üëçüèª
body: The only thing which not same as on the specs sheet is the battery. The company claims 40hrs of battery backup at 50% volume. But it's definitely not the case. You will get 30-35hrs of battery backup. But still it's more than enough when you compare it to others earphones at this price range. You can't really complainüò¨.Otherwise, the product is overall good, justify it's price. The sound quality is good, the bass for which boat is known for its fantastic. The call quality is superb.

title: Boat rockers 255
body: Sound is very good.....but i think their is a design issue which make it not fit in ear properly.... that's why one can't experience the bass properly if not tightly pushed in. Battery life is suprb upto 6 hours and charging time 1.5 hrs. But due to metal finishing in winter it becomes very cold and hurts the ears. The summer u can think....Its a nice purchase for listening music but some  designing faults i can see that's it.

title: I feeling Like I was Cheated!!!!
body: Exactly after a Week of Last day of Return, the Product Started malfunctioning.  It Does not get switched on without plugging to a power source (Some times). Automatically, the Volume is getting reduced and Increased, Automatically the Songs getting Paused and Changed in the middle.. (No touch required at all....). Mic also Not working properly. I have checked this with Other Mobile also , and got the same results.Full time u can hear the Sound of Some one Pressing the volume Button.. Beep Beep beep.I want to Return or Replacement. Very bad Experience.

title: Worst item with zero noise cancellation
body: sound quality: -100000Noise cancellation: -200000Amazon should immediately discontinue this item.Such a worst item

title: Reliable for daily use since the last 8 months
body: Bought this for Rs 999 in Oct 2019 and have been using it on an almost daily basis since then.It has got good bass and noise cancellation is also good.Charge will last through 1 whole day and it gets charged quickly within 15 minutes.Only con is that yesterday, the small rubber flip cover for the charge port fell out. So I will need to use it carefully and clean it so dust wouldn't get stuck in the port.I would recommend this to everyone for its quality. But the price shown now for Rs 1,499 is a bit high as I had got it for cheaper.

title: Disadvantages
body: After 2 days of use:Pros already everyone knows as shown in product details, I'll talk about cons about which one should know before buying.Cons are written in descending order of severity:1. Not sturdy in ears, I have to adjust them every 10 minutes2. Battery %age shown in mobile isn't accurate, we have to depend on wearable's signal of low battery.3. It may look little weird when we wear it due to its built. I'll say it's 60% not okay to wear outdoors.All in all, you can go for it, it's good for people who multitask.According to me, they are amazing and all the features said in the details are accurate.

title: A huge disappointment!
body: As much as I was looking forward to using these Bluetooth earphones, they turned out to be a huge disappointment. The call quality is pathetic, there's so much background noise that overlaps your voice, the receiver is not able to hear you clearly. Always feels like the voice is coming from a distance and there's a lot of background noise. Only the music experience is good, however call is the most important function for which we need earphones and this definitely isn't a good option. Disappointed by boAt!

title: Don't buy!

That's it and at last i think i will say if you are planning about buying this so plz by adding a little money you can buy bset product and you will not regret it!Thank you!

Can't wear for more than 30 mins3.Decent bass but poor mids and highs- not good enoughConclusion: I would recommend you to buy ptron tango tws for 1500

title: Great product and sound at Rs1000 : )
body: The price is great for the quantity of sound it offers at Rs1000. Ok , good , great are my rankings.Great - PriceGreat - SoundGood - BatteryGood - BassGreat - FlexibilityGreat - Product qualityOnly 2 complains .I hve to charge battery every day (max 5 hour continuous use)My left ear sound is getting low thats an issue that bothered about.  Evn my friend faced the same issue that one side of his headphone stoped working(5 months of use for freand & 1 month for me ) . And that an quality issue . I hope i will get replacement under warranty.  And mind it no physical damage or water damage.But at that price point its worth it .And imp thing the light turns frm red to blue when fully charged .

title: Quality and battery backup of product is very bad
body: It has not much quality which is mentioned in this and also the battery backup is also very poor which is less than 2 hours which is very bad for this. the battery percentage abruptly come down from 100 to 40 then it become zero. Yeah, it did very disappointed to me. So overall , the product is not good that much I have heard about it. I don't know it happened with me or every customer could be disappoints by this.

title: All you need to know about the product

title: Best Product
body: Best product I have ever used. I have use JBL, one plus buds but the battery back up is worst in both these products. In boat rockerz++ has good battery backup last for whole day continuous use. Sound quality is good. Charge in minimum time. Sturdy to use. Only cons is I have to press hard for switch off the device.

title: Good but connectivity distance issue

title: Good Product
body: Boat Rockerz 255I got this product at a very discounted price.It has been a year since I purchased the Boat Rockerz 255.The Call Quality in this BT headset is Excellent and noise cancellation is good.The Bass quality is OK when compared to wired headphones.It does not support Smartphone's Inbuilt Equaliser.After longer use you feel pain in the Ear.Battery Back up is 4 Hours for Movie Watch.Overall a good product for the Discounted price I had Bought.

title: Neck support is like wire so it can fell anytime from neck and you can lose it.
body: Neck support is just in form of flexibility wire. The earphone will keep falling from neck and top most care is required for not loosing it as it may fall anytime from your neck. The bud magnet joints from a perticular side so it takes lot of effort to join them from a perticular side. Brand is superb but this specific earphone is not worth of many even if it comes in 1000 rs as it can fell anytime from neck . One big disadvantages I observed is in between of call or watching vedio, the Bluetooth connection gets disconnected and than reconnected automatically.

title: Feeling bad buying this.
body: Sound quality isn't that good. Not worth the cost. Durability, well it comes with a plastic construction, that you need to wear around neck. So can't fit it in anything.Feeling bad buying this product considering the image doesn't clarify the plastic ring around the neck. Oh yes one more thing Ear piece has rubber hook on it but design is so bad that you can't get it in ears properly.

title: Poor quality

Sound is okay quality. Go for JBL of same price, they have better mic, I personally have used them. The only positive thing is that you can connect two devices simultaneously with this BT headphone.

title: Go for it

title: DONT BUY..BAD QUALITY

title: Sound is not clear and battery also poor

title: Great quality and a suggestion to manufacturer
body: Very good quality. The manufacturer has given option of connecting to multiple devices at a time. Explore the option of having the device active for latest connection. For example, I have connected to laptop and mobile. When I'm watching a video on laptop, if I get a call to mobile and I answer it, laptop connection should be on hold and I should be able to talk on phone without interruption. Currently while talking on phone, if I get a notification on laptop, it makes call inactive and connects for a laptop notification for few seconds and then switch back to phone.There should be an optimum way of handling this.Apart from thisz amazing product!

title: Malfunctioning....go for JBL
body: It starts getting disconnected in with 1-2 minutes gap ....last for 2-3 hours....no matter how many time you reset ..the device...and this cycle countinue with a gap of 2-3 days.....but atleast their warranty services is good they pick-up and deliver at your door step so ..it's good...I have already replaced it like 4 time... within a month......but same problem again and again.... this kinda problem exists in every boat product (Bluetooth) ....go for JBL if you really want to buy....

title: Best Customer Service !
body: I bought these earphones in January this month.Later in September, I started facing some issues in the microphone. I registered a complaint on bOaT portal and attached the invoice.The next day, a pick-up guy came and collected the defected earphones from my house, and in less than 2 weeks' time, a brand new set was at my doorstep. Just amazing!The sound quality is very good. The only issue I am facing with these earphones is you can't take online classes with it. My students say that it gets disconnected in between the meeting.  If this microphone issue is fixed, then this headset is worth Rs.2000. I wish bOAt guys will fix it soon.

title: Highly recommended

Have also listened to music....bass is good.All in all would recommend this to anyone who wants a good neckband pods in medium range.

title: Product is nice but warrenty and services fake

In my earphone one sided was not working and product was under warranty, I complaint.Pick up of product was initiated by xbees courier service and I am still checking my service request which is not completed yet. Nearly 1 month going to complete and I have no idea where is my product. Very cheap service and when you call the service centre number which is toll free number its always gone busy I mean you can't complain or you can't do enquiry of your product after complain.

title: worst product and worst battery
body: worst product. after charging for 2.5 hours also the battery lasts for maximum 10 hours without use. body: The sound quality is at best average. Although the fit n finish is good, the most annoying feature is that it frequently gets disconnected while in use. I would not suggest buying this particular model.I am planning a switch to a better brand. Maybe JBL or Samsung

title: Can buy if you are dealing with music & voice calling issues.
body: I was first confused to order as I was also surrounded with people using the same device. Then I order one & it's pretty much descent in this price point. title: Decent product for the price with struggling battery life
body: While the product is cost effective, there are issues with the battery life. It says 6 hours but it just lasts for appx. 3 hours. Also it says 60% battery and then in a split second it starts to display battery low to 20%. This has been happening always.  Decent sound quality for the price. Go for it only if you are looking for something cheap to use while it lasts.

title: Disconnects sometimes in between
body: I have been using these earphones for about 2 months, and this is what I feel like. The noise cancellation is of optimal quality. You won't hear most noises even when the music is off. The battery life is amazing. It easily works for more than 6 hours once fully charged. The only drawback I am facing is that it sometimes disconnects in between a movie or meeting. It takes about 2 minutes to reconnect, which is quite a long time when in an important meeting. Maybe it's just my product, but consider this con when buying them.

Amazing battery backup5. Easy to useCons:0

title: Little disappointed with performance on MTK processor
body: I think it doesn't support MTK processor for best CVC as opposite person could hear background noise of vehicles when used in traffic.  Sound and bass quality is good. I think it works best with Qualcomm processor as mentioned but not that best with MTK processor.

title: Great one for the price,Decent one for the sound
body: Been using this since about a month now,First of all Kudos to Amazon for super fast delivery.Earphones are definately one of the best in price range1. Battery :- about 5-6 hours of continuous use on a single charge, pretty good battery life2. Connectivity :- I'd say around 10-15 ft, works best with newer ones with newer version of Bluetooth, my Redmi Note 4 loses connectivity faster than my brother's poco F13. comfort :-. Not so great but bearable, occasionally noticable discomfort and ear becomes Sweat Dam on longer use4. Sound :- Pretty much balance and great output . Not too much bass,not too much treble just appropriate for daily use5. Calls :- mic is pretty good and you don't have to scream so that person on other end can hear, just need to speak a little louder than on earpiece, would've loved it if this was improved.Overall, a great dealCons :-1.Super fluctuations in price :- I bought these on prime day deal but the price other times is fluctuating fast, best would be to but when around 1200/- odd . If budget is 1500 might as well but mi sports wireless earphones .2. Could've improved on comfort.3. If you break the support rubber ,there's no replacement

title: Zero noice cancellation
body: Purchased around 4 months back. Sound quality and Bass is superb. Battery back up is great. No issue in connectivity.But, I have only one complaint.. its noice cancellation is almost zero. I mean, we can hear the clock ticking sound also if we are talking in a room. And if its noisy background, u can't talk at all.. it amplifies noice sounds rather controlling..

title: Excellent sound-stage at this price point.
body: Having owned multiple high end earphones I decided to buy a cheaper one for daily usage. I settled down with this after doing some research.  I would say the sound quality is above average. Excellent sound stage with decent noise cancellation. When I first tired them on the voice prompt literally scared me lol. Built quality is also good but the wire length is big for me. I can connect to two devices seamlessly. I feel bass is little overpowered. Bought this for Rs.999 and it exceeds my expectation.

title: Excellent audio performance üëå
body: Considering the price point it has to be one of the best among all the other bluetooth earphone.Seamless bluetooth connectionAudio quality is upto the markDesign is goodBattery backup is ExcellentOverall its a product which u can buy without any doubt.

title: fake product
body: when we go for service center then find out this is fake productcomplaint to amazon but no reply from amazon

title: Overall review of this "Bluetooth Earphone" boAt Rockerz 255.
body: I just want to tell you guys go for it. As I purchased @999 only.( It's not good for gaming. )( But good for playing videos, listening  musics/songs. )*Noise Cancellation*Its noise cancelation is awesome it cancel all the outer sound & stops reaching to our ears which prevents the internal musics/songs from outer noise, which we were listening.*Bluetooth Connectivity*Once you connect to your device & after that whenever you will try to connect,  it will connects in a second only. Connectivity is too fast.*Sound Quality*As I see its sound is not so clear just because of its high bass but not too bad also. When you play music it is good but while playing online multi-player games some time voice is not so clear it feels like heavy sound is initiated through it. Bass is too good.*Some More Info*It has three buttons on right side of bands: Upper button [ + ],  Middle Button [ O ], Down Button [ - ] & a charging port respectively.Upper button is used to increase the volume by just a click & to play the next/upcoming musics/songs press it for few second.Middle button is used to power on or off by pressing it for few seconds & also used to control Google Assistant by pressing it for few seconds which which should be less than its power on or off timing.Down button is similarly used to down the volume by just a click & to play the previous musics/songs by pressing it for few seconds.At last I want to say overall it is good product & purchase it without any hesitation at this price ‚Çπ999. Actually the cost of this product is about ‚Çπ1499.Thanks!

title: Investing on my first pair of blutooth earphones
body: Got these mainly for my gym sessions.Build: 4/5Battery: 3.5/5Sound Quality: 4/5 (good bass)Connectivity: 3.5/5The build quality is pretty good and sturdy.The battery level is displayed on the phone once connected which helps me know when I have to charge it.The battery life is also fair enough, you can use it for a good 3-4 hours listening to music at 40-60% Volume.But once the battery level reaches 20%, the battery will last no longer than 15 minutes. Generally, if you see a phone's battery, it drains out slower when it's below 15%.If you do use it at max volume, I'm sure you won't be hear anything but the music, so if that's "Noise Cancellation", then it does a good job because these earphones are really loud!Overall a good product from the price point and sound quality point of view.Happy Shopping! :)

title: Not Expected this shit from Boat
body: Bought Boat Rockerz 255 pro+The Boat headphones are so hyped.I thought of giving it a try.Problems I faced -1. battery getting dropped to 80% directly from 100% ( middle percentage does not show2. multiple bluetooth device connection issue.3. stopped working and charging within 1 week of use - replaced again.4. after replacement - bluetooth not connecting with multiple device.5. audio stops working frequently.Please add 200-300 Rs more, and buy some Other brands.

title: Awesome sound quality but....
body: Everything is good, sound quality is awesome, look wise also decent but.....But battery life is bad, if you consider it for using a whole day battery may end up just before your day ends. Backup of 6-7 hours is not enough for a whole day use. If you want something with good battery life jabra elite 25e is what you are looking for but something with good sound quality this is what you are looking for but if you want both this thing in one, then sorry there is no such thing available i have searched and watched each and every earphones review but this technology seems to be failing you can even see that very few wireless mouse and keyboard have good ratings.

title: Issue in 225 Pro model. Don't buy 255 PRO.
body: I think boat has now started ignoring regarding quality check. I have ordered this product,  at day 1 I found issue in dual connectivity & after that device goes automatically in switch off mode but in device I t shows connected. I request for replacement. When the replacement came the same issue was in it & it was so irritating. May be the issue is in PRO model of boat 255 because I have used 255 sports active black for 1.5 years n it performed fantastic n so rough n tough but this PRO model having so much issues ..Don't buy 255 PRO..

title: Not recommended for people who switch between two devices regularly.
body: I don't recommend this product for people who doesn't care about their headphones much as I don't think this can be roughly used.Cons :- It's not C-type charging and the charging port doesn't seems to be well build.- Switching between two devices not easy.Even after purchasing this, I'm using my onepluse bullets all the time coz of the comfort and easy switching. Still I'm giving 3 star for the sound and price of the product.

title: Works good, sound is okay, pains your ear after sometime
body: Does the work for portable music listening. Needs a quiet place for the mic to work, it isnt great and I never use it for calls. Base is quite high and pains your ear after and hour of listening. If you get this around 1000 bucks, take it for a portable experience otherwise invest on a good wired in-ear Sennheiser which u get below 1500 and gives the best audio output

title: Value for money
body: The sound quality and build quality is pretty good. What I disliked about the product for which I have given 4 star to it is the length of the cord. It's a bit lengthy compared to Boat Rockerz 255 or 235 series.But overall a value for money product.

title: Not durable
body: Went for this as I have previously used boat handphones. But this product disappointed me. The headphone tip broke within 1 month of use.Got this for Rs.900 in the sale.Pros:Good soundCons:1.Bluetooth connectivity issue. If kept in lower jean pocket, sometimes the connectivity drops and its very irritating.2. Poor Quality.3. The headphone tip easily breaks due to poor design.

title: Good value for money.
body: <Pros>* Rich bass* Good built quality* Magnetic lock* Nice grip over neck*Good company service (had to replace it because of faulty charging)<Cons/>*Dont leave the charging cap open because sweat can get in through it and damage the charging...*Detailed review*Boat Rockerz 255 bluetooth in-ear headset is a very good quality product. It has a very rich bass and nooce cancellation is also pretty good. Accessories like ear buds of different sizes and charging cable are provided. If you workout and sweat alot then make sure to keep tha charging cap closed because if sweat goes through it then it may damage the charging, the charging stopped working after 2 weeks so i had to replace it..and the company service was amazing it took around 10 days and then i got a replaced piece back with extra accessories..*Conclusion*I would really recomend this, this headset provide a very good value for money.PS- Just dont walk while using it..because the noice cancellation will not let u hear anything else and it may cause an accident..

title: Not amazing not pathetic
body: Bluetooth connectivity is good, sound quality is average. You can live with it I bought it to answer calls without picking up my phone. Not for songs or gym or driving. So it's okay for me.Battery backup is above average.One con which tips me off often is that the ear buds are pretty heavy. So a single tap on the chord and it comes out of the ear. But as I said, you can live with it. Not bad.

title: Its good for gaming
body: I would recommend for gaming. I dont like the audio for music. I use my jabra 65t instead. The audio is not that pleasing but the low latency while gaming is really good for this price. The battery backup is just mind boggling.

title: Devesh Shyngle Genuine Reviews
body: After months of research of which bluetooth earphone to buy, I decided to go for these and it was all worth it.I'm a base loving person and I will say if you like base-y sound/music these are the earphones for you.Battery life is really good, gets charged in an hour or so. Completely satisfied with this product.Recommended by me.

title: If i had option to return now.. i would have returned
body: Good things :Battery is good,Sound is good too for the price,Bass is good but not what i wanted..Bad things :Mic isn't that good.. im having problem while calling..Rubber tips are Hard, i can't wear them for much long.. 15 -20 mins max. ( pro tip : i plugged my old Mi wired headphones rubber tips to these headphones, problem solved for me ),Sound & Bass quality could have been better

title: Battery is awesome
body: Pros : - Battery Backup is awesome - The sound quality is good (Not too heavy or too light, feels good) - Light Weight (Expected from Bluetooth Headphones)Cons : - Bluetooth connectivity takes variable time. Sometimes it connects as soon as it is ON. Other times, it takes a couple of minutes - The multi device connect is gimmicky and not very seamless. I got it to work with a mac and an iPhone - Mic is not very sensitive and may not be suitable for speaking while traveling

title: Useless product, battery life is too low barely 3 hours
body: I made a mistake buying this item. It hardly gives 2 hours for a promised upto 6hrs. That is just half of it. Once full charged I checked it, but after two hours battery is dead. The sound quality is average, built quality is decent but the battery is too bad. I am thinking of replacing a new one.

title: Good at first but now I'm facing connectivity issues
body: Let's get the initial review out of the way.Package arrived on time and packing was good as usual.I've been using these for almost 2 months now. The sound quality is good.For the past few weeks I'm facing connectivity issues. I tried using different phones but had the same problem. The headphones keep disconnecting at random moments when I'm on call with someone. Either a normal voice call or VOIP like whatsapp. However, this doesn't happen while listening to music.

title: Disappointed
body: Been 2 months since I bought it. The left side stopped working gradually and now the volume has became so low..Guess it‚Äôs better to opt for better branded products at similar price!There is literally no service centre in Bangalore for this product. Travelled like 13 kms to a place which looks more then a residential home then a service centre.. and only be told to register online as services are only done in Mumbai. Better not buy from Bangalore for convenience sake. üôÑ

title: Boat Rokerz review
body: Sound-4.5/5Build quality-4.5/5Battery life -4/5Earphone's quality is good with strong magnetic lock... Straps are of good quality the  wires are too good. Buttons quality is good.. sound is full of punchy bass and and balanced treble and has sorrund effect.Comfortable in ears connectivity is good..It has features of latest bluetooth 4.1 Version.The best part is 10 minutes of charging can work around for an hourOverall it's worth the price. I recommend all of you to go for it

title: Not Good for music and i also not received extra earmuff in exchange. its really disappointing.
body: After I used product I found bass is very heavy and not able to manage and sound is distorting, not balance with treble. You can hear your own voice like humming while talk which is ridiculous.. n for music it's big no. Battery like is good. Give 20 Rs extra and buy from original BOAT so if you don't like you can return. For music its waste of money. and conical buds gives pain not able to used more than 5 min. Its even not stay fit in my ear. its fell down. its really worst. Never buy from amazon as no option to return only exchange. better buy from Boat official side.

title: Expected much better than this.
body: It's not what I expected it to be. Bass is Flat no such bass , noise cancellation is okay. During call bluetooth doesn't work so you might reconnect and re-think of buying it. Earbuds won't stick to ears if you're running or doing HIIT workout. Normal walk or gym for that it's good. Not bad. Overall rating 2.5/5.

title: BAD MIC, made in china, waste of money
body: ‚àÜ  Pick up more background noise, people from other side of phone complain about my voice low,and background noise more. Even in room anyone is talking in a low voice, the other person over phone thinking its a crowd.‚àÜ  Made in China.Thinking about return, bt there is only option of replacement.After replacement same problem..finally got return option.I got relieved.

title: My review after using it for 3 month.
body: Bass is good it has active Noise cancellation audible on roads also.I get to enjoy loud crisp and clear musicIt can connect two devices at a time so pairable with mobile and laptop together is a huge advantage.With a full charge, i get more or less 8 hours of battery lifeconnects easily without wasting time with my mobile phone.

title: Very poor bass quality, very low volume.
body: I bought this item, just because of the number of reviews displayed for this product. I have used with my MI Redimi Note 7 Pro mobile. I was so disappointed with the qulaity of the sound. First of all, the volume is very low even though at maximum volume kept. The bass effect is also very poor. Totally disappointed with the product.I need to return this item, I want complete refund.

title: Microphone not working
body: This product are only battery backup and average bass is good other all off very bad. Microphone not working during call. Hisssssing sound hear in background.This product is very bad quality. When I took the first time, multifunction botton defective I replaced it's.second time microphone not working Now I have a placed refund order,

title: Just don't buy this product.
body: This is totally worth less to buy headphone like this, very uncomfortable dimensionally while adjusting into the ear & lot of connectivity issues through out the bluetooth while continuing on call as well as videos. Not that much good in terms of sound quality and other things, likewise they don't have replacement options so that customer can go for a better one, I would suggest just don't buy this product. I am the custoner of Amazon since years however the very first time I am very disappointed with Amazon.

title: SuperDuperAwesome
body: Value for money . I bought it for 999‚Çπ in lightening deal.Bass is fantastic feels like home theatre sound.Sound quality as expected, was looking for something to atleast reach my iphones earphones .. and this is exact what I wanted.Noise cancellation is superb.Light weight. Look wise Porsche, rich look.Easy access. Siri to working with this hps.Ear bud magnet it very nice.In love with this product , planning to order 1 more for my sister.

title: Good design, but average audio quality, medium bass
body: Pros:1. Design2. Build3. Tactile buttons easily perceived by touchCons:1. Medium bass which sounds not natural2. BT connectivity range is not more than 3 meters. After that it goes on-off-on-off (breaks & reconnects)3. Audio quality is not very greatIf you are a bass lover, I would recommend Portronics Harmonics at same price but at less design quality.

title: Good but not the best!
body: Sound quality is good compared to other similar products. Provides sufficient bass for an in-ear headphone. Fast charging really works well. Very lightweight and tangle free cable.Bluetooth connectivity is not very fast.The audio prompt on switching on and switching off the device is extremely loud and annoying. It will be much better if they removed it altogether.Earbuds are metallic and heavy so bit uncomfortable but u get used to it.Magnets at the back aren't really of any use even for cable management.Workmanship is poor. The cover on charge port won't work properly after sometime. The housing of the battery and controls is loosely fit so not watertight.

title: Extremely good sound quality although not by default but through an Equalizer
body: Sound:Excellent sound quality. Although the default sound is more bass kind and I love a balanced Vocal+Treble+Bass so I had to manually configure my EQUALIZER. So either learn to use an Equalizer which enhances the sound quality to a great extent or if you like bass and heavy sound then default settings are fine.Battery:Lasts good enough.Very convenient, durable and flexible. Good call quality butNot suitable for long time listening, the grip hurts a bit in earOverall great. If you want some new features like bt 5.0, usb C then go for something else. And yes it's MADE IN CHINA!

title: Waste of Money to purchase this
body: I am trying to use it for calls. But there is too much noise and other person is not getting my voice. So I think waste of money to purchase this. I can connect this device to two platform computer or mobile. But there will be noise while using it. Within a month it's stopped working now. Useless product, Please don't purchase it. It's stopped charging now. You have to disconnect one device then you can take the call.

title: Ideal for listening to music & running!
body: --- Reviewing after 2 months of use ---Very happy with the boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Bluetooth Wireless Earphone.Pros- Sporty look and feel- Great audio quality.- Pairs seamlessly with two simultaneous devices. Used it with my mobile and laptop.- Has decent battery life.- Fits perfectly in the bowl of the ear making it suitable for running as well.- Well priced.Cons:- If you are taking calls on both your mobile and laptop (VoIP), then the mobile always take precedence and interrupts the call on the laptop. I generally ended up disconnecting my mobile before getting on a call from my laptop. Not really an issue if you are only listening to music on your laptop.- Ear clip felt a bit hard in the first few days so couldn't keep it in ear for more than an hour or two.- Ear clip can become loose and fall off.Would I buy it again?Most likely

title: I never ever used this monster Product ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©
body: i recived this product on 14 july i listen music 6pm to 6 am continuing and bettry still 100% charge i used to till date 18 july and now bettery is low 15% i say this device is god off all Bluetooth osm for gaming you easyly know where is enemy comeing left or right both are osm i used daily 10/12 hour daily and say its really monster 40 hour bettry back i salute boat company for this osm product üòÄü§©ü§©üòòüòòüòòüòò14 july se use krrha hu company ne chrge krke diya vhi 4 din cla bhai sahb mja aagya

title: Distracted Bass Quality
body: I like the Bass quality . But having Helerious trreble quality . If u Like good punchy bass then go for it . It will not disappoint you any way . 1. Pros : 1.a. Good battery ( Highlighted Feature ) 1.b. Good Bass . 1.c. Have seperated button for mic and controls.  2. Cons: 2.a. Have Latancy issue while gaming. If u r planing to buy this product for gaming purpose it will dissatisfied you. , cause it has some delay sound problem . 2.b. Mic response is not up to the mark . 2.c. Meterial Quality is Cheap .. ... Otherwise OK .product

title: Poor sound quality for video calling
body: Don't know what went wrong with it. Its "boAt". I guess bluetooth technology is not working that properly. There was lot disturbing sound in between. Not at all good for video calling apps like zoom and google meet. The other side people were not able to hear properly.Had already ordered one and then replaced. But found same problem with this one also... so finally returned.

title: After sales service
body: After sales service of Boat is very bad. My piece stopped charging and when I went for replacement to one of the service center in Bengaluru, they said charging port is damaged. However, I used to plug and unplug the same way I do for my phone which never got damaged. This means the charging port Boat uses is of worst quality. There was no mention of how to plug/unplug charger and hence Boat should have replaced it. Completely disappointed with the product manufacturer.

title: Bluetooth  won't work properly
body: Honest feedback after 6 months usage.1. Left hearing totaly gone bad..it worked for first 3-4 months, later it's not working..I have to visist service center to get it fixed.2. Some times buletooth won't work. I have to disconnect and keep reconnecting..3. Based on many reviews only I purchased.. but not really that great product..

title: NOT TO BUY. WASTE OF MONEY
body: I DONT KNOW WHETHER I RECEIVED GENUINE PRODUCT OR NOT. WHENEVER I PUT IT ON, IT SAYS 'WELCOME TO NIRVANA'. NOW I DONT KNOW WHAT IS THE CONNECTION BETWEEN BOAT & NIRVANA. FURTHER, IT DISCONNECTS MOST OF THE TIME WHILE YOU ARE TALKING ON PHONE. THIS IS THE MOST PATHETIC THING. CONNECTIVITY IS VERY BAD. ACTUALLY BLUETOOTH RECEIVER IS ON RIGHT SIDE OF THE EARPHONE & IF YOU PUT YOUR PHONE ON YOUR LEFT SID-E, IT WILL DISCONNECT. VERY BAD EXPERIENCE FOR VERY HIGH PRICE. I HAVE BEEN USING THIS FOR APPROX.  18-20 DAYS. FURTHER, IT TRANSMITS VERY LOW VOICE TO THE PERSON WHO IS TALKING TO YOU ON PHONE. BATTERY BACK UP IS GOOD. WASTE OF MONEY

title: Worst product.
body: Dear all users or future users , I would like to share important feedback about this product .Negative point -I bought this product on 10th feb and I used this only 15days and now it is not working. Suddenly it was stop working while I am on call.I though it was discharged but actually it was product failure. Now it also not taking charging also.Positive point-Good sound qualityGood connectivityGood voice clearance during call.Over and all I will give zero points , if product is not working then positive point doesn't work.Now I want to change this product under warranty but doesn't find any path to return this.Pls suggest how to return the product.

title: Perfect,  very good, genuine product.  Thanks Amazon
body: As usual,  products from Amazon and associated teams are always perfect.Same thing is applicable for this product,  on time, durable, quality checked, got at less cost  as ordered during Festival deals.Thanks to Amazon team, delivery team and all other associatesHappy And Prosperous Dipavali !

title: Issue with Mac Air.
body: So I used it for a while and really loved the quality of the product. The sound is crisp and loud which is best. The battery backup is amazing! I really loved it. But recently I realize that when I connect to my Mac Air, it shows that it's connected but the audio still plays in my Mac (Works perfectly fine on mobiles though). The replace date has expired and now I cannot do anything. I hope I get some good response from the seller.

title: Great product
body: Unbeaten at this price,comfortable for use on runs and while exercising ,though increased usage of more than an hour a day can cause pain in the ears.Decent sound quality.The semi hard neck band though is a little irritating

title: Hopeless Upgrade !!!!
body: Dear Viewers,Highly advisable to not to opt these earphones as an alternative to Boat Rockerzz 255 Sportz.Hopeless upgrade and extremely disappointing when such renowned brand is floating such kind of product.From Day 3, microphone malfunctioned.Contacted the customer support team and sought for replacement.The new device is having bluetooth connectivity issues and no option to replace or return the product.Not at all recommendable.The preceding versions are great....

title: Great product...
body: This is an awesome product you can get at this price range...nice bass and you will love it...at max level you can feel little bit distortion but that's not a big deal... and if you talk about about gaming there is very negligible latency and it's like nothing...I was curious about products originality but it seems gunine one...it's my first day with this product and I will update in next 2 weeks about its reliability...I got it in just 999/-

title: Disappointed with sound and bass
body: I am using boat from last 5 years but as compared to boat basshead 225 this model is very low in rating of sound and bass and price difference is big. Sound quality is bad so bad not at all impressive as compared to basshead225. Didn't liked it. Boat is mostly famous for bass but this ome is like china Bluetooth headphones i wish i cud return it and buy another one i can pay more but i need amazing bass which i guess comes from upper versions like 255 pro amd above that..... So honest review dont buy it for 1200 not at all worth of you are looking for bass and sound ... I am disappointed #boat

title: It's a Substantiall wireless earphone to buy,
body: It's average quality of wireless earphones. There were some issues like not connecting with device and some static sound sometimes but they were ok to use for 8 months. After 8 months there are majour problems like battery daining fast and one side of earphone not working.

title: Defective products and poor quality
body: BoAT rockerz 255, was poor quality make and suspect not really authentic brand. Issue was that left ear piece making some irritation noise, request for replacement and 2nd which is received is horrible. It doesn't detect range as per recommended (10m) but it not able to work with 1 metre.  I have to keep mobile less than 1/2 metre to get clarity sound. Poor bluetooth connectivity, poor performance and unhappy with brand.#Who knew Amazon offers may selling all defective products at cheap price so people can buy blindly!! It may be one of the strategic planning to clearance of damaged or defective products.Juz waste of my time! Unhappy

title: Decent earphones
body: I have been using boat 255f for last 2 years. I thought 255pro+ will be a much better upgrade. It is infact better than 255f on terms of connectivity, battery, quick charge. Sound is almost same. The only drawback that I can clearly say is the buttons are poorly placed. There's a whole other inline button set on the right side which increases the weight and that feels odd and might start hurting your right ear. It is really unconvinient during workout too. But if your are just looking for good earphones for using at home and without much movement, then go for it.

title: Waste of Money.
body: first one stopped working within 10 days but likely I got replacement for that.  After seven month, it has stopped working for both the ears, wire quality is very bad.  Only one service center in Pune which is also very far away from my home, I did register its complaint using Boat's official website but it is hopeless.  I would suggest you to go for any other brand but not for boat.Amazon it will be great if you have NO start option as well for these types of cheap products.

title: King of BAAAAAASSSSS!!!
body: Impressed with this product. This one has got a lot of BAAAAAASSSSS. So if you like to burn your ears for some beats. Go for it!Battery back up is decent. 6 hours in high volume)(not recommended) and 10 hours for a decent level volume and sometimes more than 10 hrs üòäGrip is really nice. Sticks to ears properly. The charger that we get along with the headset is a nice product. Chargers quickly in about 20 mins charge for 3 hrs playback time. Cooooool isn't??? üí™Thank you Boat alias Nirvana!

title: Mic not audible to other while speaking
body: The mic is not clear.. no one is able to hear me clearly. I have to disconnect and talk directly via mobile. Wats the use?Need a new replacement... Just rec'd yesterday but now happy as my friends too have purchased boat headset from Amazon but product was great and no disturbance... Can listen and talk clearly...I know boat has good brands don't know how not happy purchasing this one. Please help ...

title: Not worth
body: Do not buy this. Go for zebronics journy instead. That is much more value for money product. There are three cons as per my usage:When to turn on this bluetooth it will connect with all the mobile devices it was paired earlier. So u r listening two diffrent songs from two phones inthe same headphone at the same time...Second it has three buttons n two humps on both side of buttons. So if u are using this headphone on bike ride, which i do n u r wearing gloves. U will end up pressing wrong button.Third it created problem with samsung phone as it was not appearing in the available devices...Though sound quality of this headphone is very good..

title: The product sucks
body: This is my 2nd product that I have purchased with boat. Both stopped working. This one lasted for 40 days. The customer service is designed in a way that you don't get your product or wait for a decade for replacement. Too many processes to follow. Would recommend to burn that cash but not buy this.

title: Excellent product, but stopped working after six months of usage.
body: Pros:lightweightmutifuntional buttonsgood sound qualityuser friendlystylishdecent batterycan connect two devices simultaneouslyGood noise cancellationTells who's calling if feature activated in phoneCons:low bluetooth range (works well within same room)magnetic earphones don't pause musiclittle too much basswhile using two connected devices, without manually pausing the first device, we can't hear the second deviceBottomline: Cons are nitpicked. I bought it for rs 899 during sale. Overall it is a great product for the price and i am very satisfied with it.Update: one side stopped working after six months of usage. Also a few weeks before that, i was having trouble charging it due to the rusted charging port. So reliability is an issue here, although i can't ask too much for 899 rupees.I must say that the service experience is exceptional. Amidst the lockdown, my damaged earphones was picked up from my village, and the replacement earphones right after a month. Really impressed by the service. I recommend boat due to its service and warranty.

title: Pathetic after sales service
body: Terrible mistake in buying this product. Became non functional within one month of purchase. Warranty available for 6 months. Being denied to me by the manufacturer.One of the worst after sales service ever. Hate to admit. But the people telling me not to buy an Indian product for this very reason suddenly seem right. Cheats trying to swindle their customers for a quick buck with no aim or plan for long term sustainability.

title: Over powering BASS
body: 'Rockerz' is known for BASS but it is overpowering on other frequencies. Instrumental is muffled.But most of listeners enjoy due to heavy BASS. Noise cancellation is 100% completely block external noise.Eartips are good (not best). Bluetooth ver 4.1 , so works on all latest phones. Bluetooth range is average. No prb. in connectivity.

title: Durable and Good battery life
body: The sound output is great. The built quality 8s also looks good. The battery backup is absolutely phenomenal. The brand is also very reliable. They will provide free pickup if you will face any problem within the warranty period. I got this product at 999/- only üòå

title: Good experience for music lover at this price range
body: Good Headphone for music lover but if you buy it for watching movie then go for another option. Bass is really good which makes your music experience better but you will miss lower tone and mid tone when watching movies. Low vocal and high bass suffer you in movie experience. When we need high vocal and low base at movie. Its high base and instrumental tone suppress the vocal of movie.. Battery backup is good. You can get 6-7 hours battery backup easily and takes 1.5 hours full charge.

title: Earphones not suitable with pubg
body: Everything is is perfect but if you are buying this earphones for playing games "pubg" dont buy these earphones because there is a delay of sound for about one second and that really effects our game play but for calls and videos or songs these earphones are perfect at the price i got it for 899 InrReview after 6 monthsleftside of the earphone stopped working but after i visited the service center i got a replacement within 10 minutes no extra question were asked

title: This is my genuine review giving after 6 months of use..
body: 1) When it comes to the SOUND QUALITY at this price segment no other brand can beat this, no doubt in it and bass is reasonable may be I felt like this because I used some other better sony earphones I didn't found that bass in this but there's a 1500Rps difference for that and this earphones so that doesn't need to consider this as a majer issue at this price rate the bass and the sound quality is great.2) Let's talk about the BUILD QUALITY , Quality of this product looks unbeatable but after six months of use , female input charge port is gone inside but I tried to pull out and charge,  later I found that it was damaged internally . Internal female input port was separated from the Motherbord.. now i'm not sure whether I can clime the warranty or not have to find out after this covid-19 lockdown.3) CONNECTIVITY, in the beginning after I bought , the connectivity Is pretty cool but later I found issue in switching with the other devices it takes time but it connects, Anyways That's not a big deal it connects just in sometimes it'll take like 5-10 mins while switching devices.

title: Highly recommended
body: It's a stunning and tremendous headset at this price, moreover, it has good bass and sound quality is astonishing and melodious. The most important advantage of this product is its battery backup. I plug in this once in a blue moon but I get remarkable battery backup, even though It is being used by me for a long time regularly. I must say that above everything else the battery backup is the thing which was loved by the most out of this product.

title: Headphones are like hookers, you get what you pay for.. Don't expect Studio level features
body: Good quality for the price. Haven't used while doing sports yet. Its been long since I used bluetooth headphones, have been using the wired ones from senheiser, bose and other brands, the good thing with this one is, I can connect to my phone and laptops at the same time, it pauses the videos on laptop when I get a phone call on my mobile. I think that is cool. And with the noise cancelling part, this one doesn't do a job on that part unless you keep volumes at very high levels to get you a headache. The sound quality is good for the price range. Nothing more on that. Bluetooth connectivity is pretty good, within 5 - 7 meters I guess, more than that there is distortion, noise and all the other wave range related problems. Buy this if you just need some good quality headphones for 6 - 8 months of usage.

title: Low cost but high value
body: One of the best boAt earphones. I have been using boAt for two years and I found their services to be very very impressive. The audio quality is very good. The music feels amazing. Bass is also good compared to other boAt products.However, one problem is that there is latency in audio while you are playing a game. I played PUBG using these earphones and there was a mismatch between audio and the action performed in the game. If you are a gaming freak and plays a lot of game such as PUBG, Asphalt, COD, or any other game where audio is everything then don't buy bluetooth devices. Go for wired one, they will perform far better. Hope you will find this review helpful!

title: Best Quality sounds with Best battery back
body: It is Best product of boat with very high quality sound. When you play music with full volume you just fill dj sound around you. This product have Long lasting battery back up  I just use continue last 7 days without charging and charging is very fast when you charge it 10 mint only you play continue 12 hours. It's work with google voice and shree with good controller.  So I hope it is best ones product by boat so buy it if you want best sounds with higher battery back

title: I will review it honestly for who all are reading this review
body: I read many good and bad reviews for this product and I brought it now I will review it honestly for who all are reading this review1.My product box is fully damage and reworked the box it's like some one used it but the product is fine.2.The sound clarity is good only for music with extraordinary bass in it but not for movie and YouTube videos.3.Noise cancellation is not good at all it's waste I still here background noise4.Not a great fit for workout session because due to sweat it's run out of ear and the magnetic lock is not locking perfectly when we unplugged in ear5.its has a good battery life like there said solidly 5:30-6 hrs and it's charge time is 1:30hrsThat's it everything I about this earphones.

title: Not recommended copy products of boAt.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†It's copy of BoAt product. Sound quality is like Rs 50 headphones, bass quality is less than Rs 50 headphones... It's really not expecting from this seller.. boAt is very strong Brand of sound quality. But this headphones are really copy of boAt and has not recommended. I was showing the each part of images .. lookwise from box to internal all parts it's not like boAt product. Highly dissatisfied.

title: It is a semirigid neck band, not a fully wire type of headphones
body: This is a semi rigid neck band with hanging wires from both ends. This was never mentioned in the description. Was looking for a full wire type earphones which can be conveniently carried in pocket. Long wires hanging down from tip of neck band reaches near ur umbilicus, kind of odd looking. Voice clarity is just ok. Clarity of the music is not exactly reproduced.

title: Excellent Sound Quality...Value for Money!
body: Writing this review after using boAt 225 wireless headset and JBK t160BT...I must say that boAt has got excellent bass and sound quality compared to JBL one.Superb sound quality and built. Very comfortable in ears. Value for Money!!!

title: Did not work as per the features mentioned on the description and got damaged soon.
body: Bought these hoping for a good experience, but then faced many issues. The product didn't connect to more than 1 devices at a time, the sound quality was not good, the charging got over in like 2-3 hours after a full charge and the mic wasn't working at times.And adding to all these, the right side of the product stopped working automatically within a month.I am still trying to get a replacement but apparently my invoice has been rejected once and the BoAt site is irresponsive right now.Not a very good product, please buy at your own risk.

title: Wowwww excellent battery backup.
body: Wowwww excellent battery backup, i received today mrng, used 2hrs but still 100% charging, sound quality also superb, i got it for just 899, thank you so much üòä

title: Okey
body: Sound is okay , noise cancellation is very poor ,other voice disturb on phone call and battery life is also okey , All time show full battery n sadan battery 30% , I don't know maybe I'm wrong but that is my 5 day experience n I'm not happy

title: Terrific purchase
body: After using it for a couple of months I'm totally satisfied with the sound quality in this budget. Definitely worth a purchase.Don't expect sony's quality and bass but overall nice product in this range.Update after almost 11 months of usage:Battery is starting to discharge quickly now. Sound quality is also little degraded but the main issue is with battery.

title: not good for long term
body: i am using this product for last 1 year.its back up , sound , performance was good initially.in 2 months its backup reduced and started giving 3 hrs backup.in 6 months one side stopeed workingin 9 months earbuds got teared.in 1 year sounds started cracking wth 1 hour backup & range of less than 5 feet.now i cant use as the voice keep on breaking while using .max productive life of this product is 6 months .

title: Boat customer service is really very very bed
body: Earphone Is good I am just not satisfied with Boat customer service. Last 2 months my earphone is with them for service as one of its not working since it was in warranty they picked up my earphone 2 months ago still no one reply from them,no one pick call in customer care I can understand lockdown situation but it's 2 months now all services started but Boat customer care is no even respondingSince last two months I'll try to connect them but only computer generated automatic replyReally very bad no one give me idea that when I'll receive my earphone back.Please note I can understand lockdown situation but atleast they have respond on call or massage me about status of serviceNothing

title: Review after 1 week usage
body: Pros: I got this one for 999 INR as a prime day deal. The sound clarity and bass is nice. Fits perfectly in the ear. Can't get any better one at this price. Connectivity is okay and working perfectly while talking too.Cons: Long wire (which may not be a problem for many).I would recommend this to my friends. Hope this review helps.

title: Review after use of 2 months
body: After using of 2 months-Good things-Sound quality is good enoughEven bass is also goodFast chargingBad things-Build quality not so goodBattery backup poorWhen you use this for only music then it gives around 5-6 hours battery backup but if you go for call or zoom (online class) then it gives 1.30 - 2 hours.But the main thing the company shows that it will take around 1 hours to get full charge but when i used this product it took only 30-35 mins for full charge.

title: Poor Quality
body: While hearing songs it was stuck often...there was problem in bluetooth..whenever try change songs or increase volume though boat device, songs getting stuck,there was some disturbance..so i returned it..amazon replaced to me another device but that too doesn't work.. Tried to put charging for more than 2hrs but battery remains 10percent, not increasing morethan that... It was working only when connected with charger..if plugged off,  stopped working... Had bad experience..please try to change the dealer...

title: Not Satisfied
body: For first couple of months the earphone was excellent n I have referred it to many office colleagues .Later one side of it wasn't working whenever there was low battery, thought it would be some technical issue and I've kept for charging in that caseBut now it's totally stopped working n I'm unable to reach out to Boat Support on this .

title: Durable!! Using it for last 7 months
body: Durability is amazing! Boat as expected delivered a good product.Speakers and both earbuds are functioning well even after rough use.Charging stands upto 24 hrs even if on continuously.!A negative is pathetic noise cancellation!

title: Not good
body: I have been using this product for 2 months now. First time it got charged in 1¬Ω hours. Second time the red light didn't turn to green even after chargin for 2¬Ω hours. Since then the battery percentage turns100% but the red light never changes to green. Also, the battery percentage decrease with 20%. Example: 100%, 80%, 60%, 40%, 20% and the device starts giving battery low warning at 20% and switches off within 2-3 minutes. Few days back one of the ear support got lose and it came off today. 100% Comfortable but overall product performance is not upto the mark.

title: Best in under 2000rs price range
body: The sound is good, bass is good too as per price ,its clear and doesnt cause irritation. The connectivity is good in between devices and playing media from connected devices is flawless. Its multifunctionality make its much prior choice among its price range. Calls are clear and do provide noise cancellation. Battery life is humangous it goes for atleast 35hrs and as per my usage it goes for 4 days without charging. Moreover boat's customer service is excellent. That's what make a company and its product a reliable one.

title: Great product , Poor after sales service
body: I'm reviewing this product after using it for 6 months. Let me tell you the pros and cons:-Pros:-1) Great bass2) Great product design3) Easy controls.4) Easy to use5) Fluent connectivity6) Best price(Buy it under 1000‚Çπ)7) Great vocalsCons:-1) Too much loud bass2) After sales service poor as compared to other brands.3) 6 hours of battery back upNote:-Replaced the product after 5 months of use. One side wasn't working. Took almost 2 months for replacement. Don't buy for a price tag over 999..

title: Average Product
body: Iam writing this review after 3months yrrr....It's a good product for Listening Music due to its good base quality and clearity but worst for Calling because of its 0 level of noise cancellation.....You can't believe that if a dog bark at a distance of 500mtr. The person who is on a call with you, can easily listen the barking sound...Overall product is average....

title: good one
body: It works fine. Everything is good including battery life.Except..- When I am in call, my friends say they could hear the background noise louder than my voice.- When I watch video, I can notice the significant delay between the video and audio

title: Amazing battery but poor range
body: The range is just 5m not more than that else ur audio will brake even if there is a wall between u n the device ur audio brakes, mic is good since close to mouth its working as expected. Have a one plus bullets bass edition, but this lasts long with similar performance

title: Loud voice feedback
body: Irritating voice feedback on every action like connecting, disconnection etc. The voice feedback is too loud irrespective to volume level and there is no way to lower it. A subtle beep would be appropriate. I call this a defect and it exists across boat products.

title: Excellent product
body: Writing this review after several months of using it. This is a great product, very good bass, excellent noise cancellation and the best part is battery back up, it gets full charge in just 45 mins max and you can use it for more than 7 hours, approx. I am very happy with this product. Boat is definitely in the market for something big as it's providing awesome products at very affordable price.

title: Not worth for money
body: The first one delivered, was not powering on after 3 days. Quick service from Amazon and the replacement was done. The in ear speakers are good and comfortable. The sound quality is good.  The Mic is not good in quality and you need to pull the mic in front of mouth so that people on other side can hear.

title: Good but you don't mind few things
body: Looking good. Nicely designed. Sound is not high compare to others. When you want attend or decline the call you need search for center button. Charging the battery is not easy. Afraid of damaging the type C connector. Once charged it works for 2 to 3 days. Good backup.

title: Good product! Good sound!
body: It's been only one day so I can't rate it 5 star as I need to see how long it will last. From the first feel it seems to be a reasonable product.I was under the impression that the neck band is made up of the wire itself but it's a semi-soft material which looks ok and doesn't cause discomfort. Buds hold well into the ears.

title: Great value for money, build quality is great along with sound quality
body: It is simply the best product. Used it for about 1.6 years and only then I faced some issues. I am pretty sure for an average consumer it will last long. Also it's sound quality is exceptional the bass is good and overall a pretty good listening experience microphone is also great and build quality is good for its price battery life is simply amazing it usually lasts about 5 to 6 hours for me when I use it continually for playing pubg, watching movies or listening to music

title: I lost trust on boAt product quality
body: I dont lik that Bluetooth connectivity of this product its easily lost the connectivity with in 5 to 6 meter even company claim that 10 meter of connectivity and microphone not good opponent Cannot hear voice properly they telling u need to talk loudly even m loudly yelling opponent can hear voice very low amount rather than normal phone talking microphone is worst otherwise may be this product has problems i want original product with proper replacement and dont want defective product again

title: Indian brand with Chinese quality
body: In short, the product is of inferior quality. Sound quality is low and not good at all. I deferred buying this product twice before I finally purchased in oct 19 after looking at huge sales volume and I think the decision was primarliy driven by good sales vol, less price n instant connect with indian brand but their all components n mfg is China based which is reflecting in their quality. I will surely not going to buy boat product in  years to come until the perception changed.

title: 9 months Review
body: I bought this neckband on October 4th..Now right side of the band is not working..It's about to die..1.Good sound quality..Not to expect too much on this price range.2.Worst Noise cancellation.3.Heavy bass4.Perfect battery life..Im using this for past 9months..From day one the battery life is same.Continous usage for 6 to 7 hrs..Normal usage for a day..At the last Oct or 2019 it's worth for money..Bt now they have realme buds and latest OnePlus bullets..

title: Value for money and daliy office use
body: I was hesitate to Buy after using lg hbs750 but then show entirely changed, use the frist time impressed wll handle small features, ur mobile in DND u get voice messages incoming call pretty cool üòé sound quality good and noise canceling bestTesting 5d songs wearing this u will locw itLast but not least its fit inside the helmet ‚õë

title: Fantastic Gift for my Brother
body: I have gifted this earphones to my brother and he is actually very happy with it. He impressed with built quality, length of earphone wire, sound quality and noise cancellation. I can say that in 900 rs i have found a fantastic deal on amazon.Thanks #Boat.. although i really wanted to buy the blue ones but you have not reduced the cost to 999 in sale. No worries, black is also good.

title: Durable and meets expectations
body: Writing this review after 1.5 years, as came to see how long ago did I bought these and from Feb 2020 to august 2021, the earphones have performed well taking into account the toughness and the falls they have endured as a result of my extra carelessness. So it's a go in the budget earphones but if a higher budget can go for another brand but this works well for an earphone under 1500.

title: Worst Bluetooth earphone
body: First of all I during call , sound quality is not good and also there is echo and disturbance sound.Secondly for music lover it is not good , I would recommend to go for other earphoneDuring travel signal is getting break.So go for some good quality earphone with some extra money that would be really pleasing for you.I have used it for 11 month and now one side ear is not working

title: NEVER PURCHASE BOAT PRODUCTS
body: It's a waste product to get in hyderabadWhen switching off it's telling "areyy oo sully gaa powering off" which is rude and unparlimentaryWaste part from boat company...BEWAREReport: Valgur language  Sexual comments  Disrespectful.

title: Only for listing music bcx have mic issue
body: If u using just for listining music then its good but when u started talking on call using this then another sid3 person unable to hear u, u have to use ur hand to lift the band from neck and keeping near ur mouth to talk someone over call..... In short this devic3 have mic issue... I was changed this device two time because first device have some issue but when complny replaced device then i found this device also work as same that device was...

title: Connecting two devices at a time is another level crappy
body: Everything is great, the sound quality, noise cancellation and the bass quality is ok as well, but hate the connectivity issue. I mean you've provided an option to connect two devices at a time, but the fact that if you're watching something on the laptop and then you close that window and then start another video on your phone you'll spend the next millenium to reset it so that you are able to listen to it, no matter how many times I restart the device doesn't help. I would have liked it better if they just didn't give this option. I mean what's the use if you're not able to use it properly, and wasting more time to reset, it would've been easier to shut one device's bluetooth and connect.

title: Boat Rockerz pro plus
body: The only major thing is battery backup. Continuous connecting with my mobile getting 3 days backup.  Comparing to other companiea in this price range call quality also good.  Audio quality also good.  Don't expect morethan this price range like anc.  High bass etc.....

title: One of the best Bluetooth earphones in the market.
body: I loved the product. At start I was reluctant to use it bcoz I was using realme wireless earphones and shifting to this Earphone was a little bit hard for me. But when I got used to it, I started loving the product. It can connect simultaneously with 2 devices. I have been using it for 3 months now and as of I haven't faced any issues with it, neither with the sound quality, nor with the mic. Bass and noise cancellation could have been better, but at this price one cannot really complain.

title: Okay okay product
body: Sound quality is ok not that great. Also noice cancellation is also not upto the mark. I found the boat in ear wired headphones much better. Can't say about the battery life since I don't used earphones that much. If getting it below 1000 rupees it's a good purchase. It's distorts the sound if you shake a bit.

title: Brand is excellent  product faulty
body: Thanks to Amazon ,I had waited for so many months to purchase this item,nice product.Most important  is product is faulty, audio sound of call is so low ,i can  not able  to  voice of other side, well  now I am  trying to  contact  with  customer care of boat,but office  is closed in Monday  also, it is my suggestion to Amazon  before  send the product to customer, are they confirmed that  product  is in good  condition .

title: Worth the money
body: This wireless earphones are worth their cost.Good sound quality for calls and music(treble and bass), good bluetooth range, no disruptions, light weight, there is a hint of noise cancellation as well, battery backup is good

title: Left headphone stopped working
body: after using it for five months, left side of the headphone stopped working.Sound quality is good, but the sound is not up to the mark. Noise Cancellation is bad, person on other side cannot hear our voice properly even if there was a small disturbance. and last but not the least, the service center for boat in Hyderabad is located in only one place and it is approximately 25kms from where im staying, it will take 2 hrs for me to go there in traffic and have to deal with them and may be after whole day i have to spent their to get it fixed. Basically what im trying to say here is, service is bad.

title: Trash mic and audio quality
body: Straight garbage. Got these headphones a few days ago and at the start I thought they were fine. Today I was on a call with my friend and he asked ‚ÄúHey, what happened to your mic the quality is so bad‚Äù. I was playing a game and there was this one sound effect with a bunch of bass and loudness to it, but using the headphones it just became this light squeak that kind of shrilled. I do not recommend these headphones at all, I strongly recommend Sony‚Äôs WI-C200 at around 2K. Definitely not recommending these to anyone.

title: Careless, Irresponsive, Untrustable Customer Care Team. Never responds ever via calls or mails.
body: Sound Quality, Noise Cancellation and Bluetooth Connectivity is good enough in this budget. But the mic went bad within 5months of purchase. Even one side earphone stopped working.
