But the main problem is that their customer service is hardly ever reachable if you face an issue. They pick up the earphones for service by a courier and never responded again. It's been 2 weeks already since I sent them my bluetooth earphones but I am yet to get a reply, leave alone getting my earphones. As far as I know this is a similar case like another brand called 'House of Marley'. 'Boat' Brand is very bad in their customer service response. This is a major drawback for an upcoming brand since if customer service team is careless then buying a 'Boat' brand product is as risky as buying any other non branded product.

title: Very good earphone of this cost.
body: Sound quality is good. Bass is wonderful. Better life is awesome. There is no connecting issues. Before order I am very much doubtful about the performance of this earfone, because of reading some reviews in Amazon. But when I used this, I am very much satisfied. Amazon shipping is always good and prompt.

title: The boat company has to give parament colour for the blutooth
body: This review I give after the using this product 3/4 month, the price range is very nice and look also grate its have a premium look, sound quality, bass and convectivity is very good but the product colour is not permeant. Above I uploaded the pic please watch and make sour to buy because the colour is not permeant its destroy only 2/3 monthsThe boat has to upgrade the colour quality has parament because after colour destroy its not look Your company logo also destroyed so plz before buy sure about the colour

title: Waste of money
body: After 6 months of use the left side was not working. Then got replacement of new earphone with warranty which lasted for only 2 months. Now OnePlus wireless z is available for 1999 please go for that. Sure OnePlus build quality is 100 times better than this earphone with better battery also.

title: Classy Product
body: I like the design of the headset. The best part of headset is sound the movement just turn it on i feel like i was in heaven and the beats were so good very can abel to listen each other and evry instrument which was played in the headset it was crystal Clear and i recommended this is one of the fantastic product and paisa vasool product.. please go for it...

title: Worst product
body: The product gone bad after 14 days of usage. It is not getting turned on and when turned on, it hangs and battery drains completely in half an hour. I saw many bad reviews also but I went for the brand name Boat Rockerz but it's completely horrible.I suggest don't buy it or u will surely regret.Now I am worried I have to run here n there to claim warranty.Again guiding don't buy it.

title: Decent sound
body: Heya,Sound is good bass is perfect treble is bit low and talking about comfort noise cancelation is perfect. Souind could have been better from  my end, add some money and go for realme wireless buds 2, Loudness is perfect but mic is not worth for calling.

title: Headphone was good they never give warranty on product
body: I have taken 255 pro after 5 months headphone was not working properly. I have download invoice from Amazon  then after I my completing on boat service they give me ticket number after 2 days they are saying invalid invoice. Then I have seen my emai that boat  service send me a another person bill and saying that my bill is invalid ... I am very disappointed from boat service .... I will never purchase from boat products .. I think they give fake warranty and fake products.üò†üò†üò†üò†üò†

title: Stopped after 3 months
body: It's been 3 months and they stopped working suddenly. I will raise request through the customer care to see if they give any refund or replace.I really don't think they are sweat proof so if you are considering them for workout just keep this in mind.

title: Worth it!
body: I brought it as I needed something to use while riding a bike or exercising but was not sure if it will be able to handle sweat, water, etc.To my surprise, it's working nice even in sunlight and rains.The only star I deducted is because I find the wires are little stiff than what I expected...probably that's good enough to keep ear plugs intact but having a visible loop to self is a little annoying to me.

title: Bad connectivity.
body: The product was well packaged in the usual amazon bubble wrap bag although the bottom of the actual packaging was squished. But after using it for two days, i noticed that it had a lot of connectivity issues. The minute i keep my phone in my pocket, the sound starts glitching. I can't hear the music or the voice on the other end pf the call. This is disappointing since I expected this particular brand to have extremely good connectivity, at least 10m. If my phone is in clear view, like on the table, the earphones work well. But the moment i keep it in my pocket & walk, the sound starts glitching.Pros:1. The earphones have a good look.2. They sit well around the neck.3. Get connected very fast to devices.4. I like the in built voice to indicate phone calls, powering on & off. Rather than the phone's ringtone blaring in our ears while connected to the phone, "Incoming Call" suffices.5. Pop music, rock music ounds really good.6. Very good noise cancellation.Cons:1. Bluetooth range is bad.2. Not good for instrumental, classical music.3. Bad microphone. No noise cancellation for phone calls.4. Ears start aching after a while.

title: EXCELLENT AFTER SALES SERVICE
body: Purchased this on may 2019. Good sound quality and clarity.One of the speakers stopped working after usage for around 6 months.Filed a warranty claim against the one year guarantee out of the boxWhat amazed me was the prompt response and service i received from the customer care/support team at imagine marketing india pvt ltd. after arranging for a pickup on mY product,today on 25th february 2020,i received a replacement unit completely free of costWhoever is reading this comment, i highly recommend you to purchase this as the after sales service was way beyond satisfactory.WELL DONE IMAGINE MARKETING INDA PVT. LTD.

title: Not recommended
body: Not happy with the product at all.The battery dies within 2 hours. Don't even expect it to last for more than 15 minutes after it hits 40%.Sound quality is so bad. If you keep walking while having this headphone on there is continuous sound distortion.Wire is too long.Also there is no way to skip tracks by double tapping the button.The magnet is not functional and does not pause or play music.Oneplus z is a much better option. It also has the functionality to switch between devices.

title: Value for Money
body: These some of the most worthy BT Headphones in its price.Pros:1. Good Bass2. Flexible3. Easy to Connect and Control4. Decent Battery Life (6-8 hours)Cons:1. Loose Ear Grip2. A bit too Lightweight3. Flimsy4. Doesn't have any indciation for battery life

title: Amazing sound quality but have LATENCY issue
body: It has amazing sound quality bass is superb and punchy.Pros1. Earbuds seals the ears and cancels the outdoor noise it fits properly and stays in ear for longer time.2. The battery backup is good about 6-7 hr of playback and about more than full day standby.3. Amazing sound qualityCons1. Bluetooth connectivity is not so good you can feel the desortion in sound when phone is in another room. Also i have experienced signal drop in open areas when phone is in pocket.2. LATENCY IS BAD its not a good product to play games and watch movies and series you will have to adjust the audio delay everytime and still you will face half second latency.This is the only issue overall product is awesome

title: Not recommended at all! Wastage of money!
body: It is one of the worst product in the wireless headset segment. It just survived 1yr.Battery backup: approx 4hrsWhen on Call: gets disconnected from the phone, additional annoying sound can be heard to the person on the other side.

title: Not worth it
body: Decent for work or causal music listening. But not the best option for running or working out. Lasted only 6 months. Mic gives a lot of noise to the listener. After 6 months of use, it stopped connecting on its own. The automated voice of the speaker went from male baritone to a squeek.

title: Best headset with battery backup
body: Positive points:Very good battery backup, single time charge comes for 3days.Sound quality is good.Negative :Magnet connect will not cut off Bluetooth function.. It will continue playing till manually switch off.We have to wear headphone to understand  the feedback for the headphone is switched off.

title: Adds too much noise while calls
body: this neckband very handy and lightweight to use, but no value for money.very poor calling feature much time the other person on the call couldn't hear your voice, sometimes call doesn't switch to the neckbands microphone and most importantly it adds too much noise in the call so you will have to switch it off and use your phone's mic to continue on call.Battery life also not much 6-7 hrs.buy this if you want it only for listing music

title: Amazon selling duplicate electronic product
body: Very bad quality product. I am not sur amzon sell original product. Policy no refund. Amazon customer care guys behavior very bad. I am very fadeup this time. I recommend buy any product from Amazon read policy and avoid to buy electronic product from Amazon..

title: I used them personally & would strongly recommend against any other earphone in same range.
body: So, If ur looking for a balanced product around 1-1.5k price point these are the best u can get. Bass & Sound quality on this one is great. Bass is bit more but can obviously be adjusted using music players & Noise cancellation on this is great. Best part is battery. Battery of this product is like awesome & recharge time is also less so that is what makes it special & fits in ears perfectly. And also cable quality seems good. So, Yes it's an even deal go for it & enjoy ur Boat rockerzzz.

title: Worked fine for only 6 months.
body: I am writing this review after 10months of use.It's not reliable. it's one earplug is not working now. And also I am facing connectivity issues.Please don't buy this product. I have purchased 4 neckband for me and my cousin. But All them got faulty after 6 months. I will not recommend this anymore

title: Experience after 1 year of usage
body: I have been using this product for an year now. Let me share my experience:Pros:1. Battery backup was good for 3 months2. Comfortable3. Bluetooth connectivity is goodCons:1. Right side speaker stopped working after 1 year.2. Noise cancellation is very poor3. Battery life after 3 months is around 4 hrs. 2 hrs with continuous usage.4. Bass and sound quality is average.

title: Bought once replaced once and stopped working
body: Bought this as it was recommended due to its value for money. After 3 months of use, one side stopped functioning. Got a replacement as it was under warranty. Now the replacement also has stopped working after 3-4 months of use. It is not charging hence I'm unable to use it. I'd recommend going for another Bluetooth earphones.

title: Head phone is ok but company is worst
body: My experience with boat headphones are very bad it is in warranty for 1 year, one month left for warrant  right side speaker stopped working as company policy they changed my product with new product, that's good, but product i received from them after 1 month facing same problem with new one, i called boat customer care about this they said sorry sir your product is out of warranty, we cannot do anything you have to charges for repair, that means they are making fool of customer, they said they gives to new one as replacement but they will gives you faulty product,

title: Except for the specifications.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Love the product for now. Considering that you know everything about the specifications , I won't bore you further. The packaging was good. It was bubble wrapped properly. The product quantity is really good. Love the feel. Colour is amazing as well. It will come 100 percent charged. Also , the charge will last for a good 38 hours.  Talking about the sound quality, A class!  (:

title: Bad Performance - boAt Rockerz 255 Pro+
body: I bought this boAt Rockerz 255 Pro+ two weeks ago. Unfortunately I am very disappointed with the quality. They say about Bass, there is literally no Bass. When I play music, this is horrible.If you are just looking for calls, this may work so-so but do not expect to listen music, specially with bass.Unfortunately I can't return it now coz 10 days are over. I wish I could have return this boAt Rockerz 255 Pro+ back.

title: Excellent Quality
body: Excellent Product! It comes with 1 charging wire, 2 pairs of extra buds, 1 sticker, gurantee/ Warantee card. The pointers above are smooth and protects the earphones from falling but if you have any problem with them you can remove them. Just remove the buds and take it out and then again put it on. The mic works really good and no problem from in listening continuously for 6hrs and after 6hrs the battery remains around 70-80%. Charging is also really fast. It totally worth it.

title: Tight ear buds.
body: I enjoy having ear buds that fit tightly and don't need adjustment when I exercise.  Sound is great and when I try and turn of the volume it pauses to warn me that the volume is too loud.  This is important because I already have ruined my hearing with another pair of earphones.  After years of working out wearing earbuds I made the mistake of purchasing systems that allowed me to go loud.  In the moment it seemed like a good idea but at the age of 53  my ears have a permeant high pitch ringing.  It sucks.  Very happy with this product.

title: Doesn't even produce sound man!!!
body: I got a product which was not working.. then i replaced it , hoping it would be sorted and boommm.. this time it didn't even work üòÇ.. this is an honest review with no intention of hurting company's ratings.. but seriously getting this from a company like boAt is not at all expected. Hope it helps!!

title: Highly recommended
body: Now, im writing This as a musician.So you could expect This review to be credible.First of all, im in love with these earphones. These are one of the best if not the best budget bluetooth earphones in the market.Sure there are a few flaws, but if you're not a musician/producer (anyone related to the music profession.) You'll not understand. Hell, even a few beginners wouldn't understand.If you're looking for great sound, a great experience and a great customer service, boat is what you should go with.However, if you're looking for perfect sound quality for something like music production or mixing, you're not going to get that in this range.

title: Best earphone with a lifespan of 3 months.
body: Purchased it couple of months back. I learnt my lesson that if you are looking for a reasonable wireless earphone you gotta empty your pocket a bit. These mid range wireless earphones within 1000-2000 rs range is just waste of money. Because after 3 months these become useless. I bought sony mdr xb50s that cost me close to 5k that time, but i lost it. Decided to go for mid range pieces . None of them lasted for more than 3 months including this one . Bought sony mdr xb50s again .

title: Best headphones no word
body: My best purchase ...very honest review plzzz read all...1..First best part of boat rockerz 255 it's sound quality and build quality ...No compare with other Bluetooth headphones like bould curve probass neckband like noise and etc...2..boat a papular brand and most trusteble brand in India is also made in India product...by most papular company Harman ...3..the bass is totally fabulous.... I believe you like very much ..4 ..I request to all plzzz don't west your money and time for bould noise and other headphones purches ..Go for it........

title: Call quality issue
body: Everything was good like sound quality noise cancellation and battery life.. but call quality  is not good I dono while taking I can hear only some robotic noise from the other end.. help me to fix this or I will return

title: Great headphone with a major drawback.
body: I'm purchased this headphone in January of 2019 and using it daily since.# Battery last about 6 hours of mixed use( gaming+ call+video)# Sound quality is good and call clearity is nice.# This headphone has a major issue that is left or right side of earpice stops working after about 3 month of use. I have replaced it 4 time in a year, with a waiting time 1 month to get replaced by boat. This problem is not limited to me only my 2 friends have the same problem. Because of this I donot recommend this headphone to anyone.

title: Good earphone
body: The earphone is pretty good. The grip is excellent. It does not move when you workout. It provides decent sound insulation. The sound quality is pretty good. The battery backup is good. I could play music constantly for around 8 hours before it discharged from full charge. It takes around 1.5 to 2 hours to charge it from 0% to 100%

title: Nice product
body: Battara is good üòö i used it 3-4 days (7,8 hrs every day) , sound quality is also clear and good but if u need only for listing songs then bass is not that much good (10 mm ), mic quality is also very good I didn't get any problems while calling , latency is low  (not that much good for gaming), Some suggestions -1. Never charge with a high voltage or fast charger.  Charge with a low approx. 15 V charger. 2. Don't ever put in water it's really not water proof  üòÖConclusion is that best for songs listing and battery backup. It's value for money product.

title: Connectivity, Mic & Customer Service Issues
body: Purchased this product just a 3 months back trusting the quality of 'boAt', however, I have been repeatedly facing issues with its Connectivity & Mic.1. The device takes time to get paired, gets disconnected anytime, sometimes gets connected only for media and not for calls.2. Mic of the product is very poor. People on the other side of the call, often complains that they can't hear my voice and as soon as i switch to the phone's mic then everything gets normal.3. Trying to reach out to the team to get it exchanged as it's under warranty but getting no response.Utterly Disappointed!!!

title: One of the best
body: Well, first things first... Amazing at this cost... I have used Sennheiser, Sony, JBL... But when compared to these premium brands, Boat Rockerz 25S headset has beaten them all!!!! Why??1. Noise Cancellation: One of the best noise cancellation headset, I've ever used... I would say, 8/10 on this parameter.. Outside noise is very much muted, but as I would have wanted, a bit outside noise is very much needed.. Safety first...2. Sound Quality: bass is just awesome.. Just good enough that one would have wanted. Treble is also good. Sound is clear and that's what matters most.Blootooth connectivity: It is above average, connect quite quickly..

title: Very disappointed üòî
body: Have heard a lot of good things about these earphones, but to my disappointment I'm not happy with the purchase. I bought it two months back, and now one of the earpiece is not working. Only one side is playing the music and that too at low volume. Very disappointed. üôÑ

title: Awesome sound quality.
body: Awesome sound quality this product is really fantastic if you want to buy bluetooth headset under  2000 rupees this is the best option I would suggest really enjoy listening music through this Bluetooth headset and voice quality is awesome during calling good battery backup and prices also usually.Thank you so much boat and thank you so much for reading my review.

title: A fine product with genuine features.
body: *Writing the review after 1 week of use.Product is good, the brand #Boat you can trust it. Sound is amazing and #Bass for which i was excited is good enough. May be for some of you bass can be a problem but guys for a price of this plus wireless you can't expect more. Also this product is long lasting.  Things i liked about this-1. design2. Bass3. Magnet4. It's  durability

title: Super as of now
body: It's one day use... will write later--After 5 days use i have found one issue. that battery is getting drain within 1 hour from 60% to 0% and get switch off.Pro:Good sound qualitygood battery until 60%Good quality for this priceQuick connection2 device connectionnoise cancelCon:Battery after 60%For battery issue i made replacement.so i got new one today 11/22/2019. : )Will check and update the status.Hi Got replacement.after 1 month use am updating belowsound/battery/bass/clarity all so goodrealy worth for money. dont wait grab it.

title: It used to 12hours it's so good and comfortable
body: I use headsets about 12 hours a day, so I require that they are comfortable to wear.These are comfy and nice, I like the design. The back part is flexible and rubbery and you can hardly tell it's there when wearing them.Everything (except charger) is in one convenient location: around your neck. No need to stuff it a case, your pockets, bag, or backpack when traveling from place to place

title: Above avg sound quality and Value for money product
body: After exactly 6 days of extensive use of calling and music.Below is a short review,hope it will help.Pros:Pocket friendly bluetooth earphnNoise cancellation goodNo prblm in calling voice qualityBass is goodQuality of wire is goodCons:Music quality is above avg,not overwhelming if u r an avid music listener.Rest everything is gd if u look at the price bucket,I bought it @1100,and it's working fine till now(touchwood).I will say its value for money deal.

title: mic not working
body: It has magnetic earbuds but it does notsupport turning off when earbuds are joined.mic not working.Quality and looks is average.Lot of voice feedback thats annoying sometimes.Got connected to mobile and Laptop very easliy.

title: Not Very Comfortable to wear
body: Okay the product is over-all great for the price range i.e 1499 Pros 1. great overall sound quality  2.Battery Capacity is overall great since it lasted days of medium use on 100% Charge3. Connectivity is great tooCons  From my personal experience of using it for 2days I have noticed that it is not very comfortable to wear the earbuds as I felt a slight pain and I don't know why it won't go into my ear completely but again it is what I experienced personal preference maybe you will find it comfortableOverall a great product and I would definitely suggest it for the given price range

title: Average headset with irritating ringing tone
body: I did not have any special expectations for the headset and it was simply that. An average headset for an affordable price. There is nothing special to write home about.Cons:1. The irritating ringing tone that blasts your ear when someone calls. I feel like pulling it off my ear and just chucking it somewhere.2. The battery level indicator is not linear. It stays at 80% most of the time and when you are in the middle of a call, it says battery low and goes off within 5 minutes.3. After six months, the right ear bud stopped working. I guess the replacement warranty was for six months.All in all, I would not recommend this.

title: Waster of Money.
body: I ordered it 3 months before. It was working fine but suddenly it stopped working. Some time it was very noisy and some times very low sound. I contacted the support and asked for service and they picked up the product for service. But when they returned it where was no ear bud and the ear holder in it which is important to hold in ear and noise cancelling and i cannot by it anywhere separately. Now the money i spent is waste. The earphone is hanging in a wall at home. Worst quality and worst service.

title: Pretty bad to be honest. Can't understand the high ratings
body: Gotta say. The sound quality is garbage. I don't know what the other reviewers are smoking but the sound quality is reaaaly bad. It's muffled and booms and clarity is atrocious. Imagine hearing a waterfall with artificially boosted bass. I have a pair of 700 bucks sennheisers and they're MILES better. I only use these earphones for calls now.

title: Long battery avg sound quality
body: I have been using this from a week ,ratings are as below1)good battery backup upto 37 h 5/52)average sound quality , not that great 2/53)price is very cheap only 900 in sales 4/54)sound very loud but not good quality 3/55) very uncomfortable to wear , especially right side one due to weight of mic. it used to fall from ears. 1/56)no lag while listening song and video , but lags little while playing PUBG 2/5Overall not bad at this price range. Good for students , not for music professionals.

title: Value for money
body: I am using this headset for more than 1 year. Purchased for ‚Çπ1500. Sound quality, Base everything is good for this price.Charging time: 2 - 3 hours normal charging (Not tried turbo / Fast charging).Working time: 6 - 7 hours, of music & phone calls.For music: smooth and clear sound quality. Volume increase and decrease buttons available.For phone calls: Good, i didn't found anything bad.Wearing: I am using it for running, Gym, driving (Able to wear inside helmet).Connectivity: Bluetooth, automatically switch off when device not connected (within 5min)

title: Good at this price range!!
body: I brought this headphone compared to nothing. So previously i didn't have any Bluetooth headset. What i find good about this product is that 1. Its very light weight, very easy to carry while wearing 2. The quality of the chord is great, it can't damage easily 3. The sound  quality is awesome and the best part is the noise cancellation which works completely great. Its takes only few minutes to get charged while plays for hours which is very great.Now after using this for about one month the problem i have found is with the Bluetooth connection, sometime might face problem with lagging while listening.But this problem you will feel rarely like in a day 4-5 times.Apart from that, this is a great product to buy.

title: Must have..... Good one to buy
body: Good product with decent battery life..... I bought it during Great Amazon sale for RS.999/- and it's worth for the money.... One of my friend bought Realme earbuds for RS. 1599/- during the same sale but when compared to Realme Earbuds, boat Rockerz 255 is way better in terms of sound output üòç. I am very much Happy with this product üòä

title: Worst item ever.
body: Worst item. I Purchased this headset on 29th nov 2020. For 2 months it good to use. After that i faced the issue. When i tried to see a movie the sound will disconnected every 10 seconds. I cannot get a clear voice .  I was very disappointed about this product in Boat.I tried to register a complaint regarding this, but the website is also not supporting. If i want to replace or repair this item i have to travel 20kms for service center. Its shows lyk that in the complaint page. Wat a nonsense .

title: If battery is not the concern, u can go for it at 999
body: Though sound quality is good (according to it's price). I would suggest u to simply switch off the dolby music in ur phone settings to enjoy the original boat.My concern is about it's battery life... it's not been a month and it started creating problem. Showing 50 to 60% battery and fall to 10 instantly.hardly gives 3 hrs irrespective of what volume u r using it. I bought it for 999 and I found it not worth for it's price.

title: Better grip expected with hooks over the ear
body: Product received is as per the description given at time of order placement. Bass is good if used in both ears simultaneously. Voice clarity is good. Good battery life.Only thing I wished was a better grip . The rubber hooks hardly helps to keep it fixed in my ears and the buds seem to come off frequently even though they are at an angle.i wished if manufacture could have provided over-the-ears hooks as an option

title: Terrible sound quality.
body: Terrible sound quality. I don't have much idea about songs from the EDM, pop genre but if you are one who's into rock/metal or the likes then stay as far away from this as possible. The sound clarity is terribly. Lows can be lived with, the mids would make you hate your decision to buy, the highs would make you kill yourself. Noise cancellation is satisfactory but nothing beyond that. Charging never seemed a hassle to me and lasts a decent amount of time on battery. Build quality is good however it's only been a week. In terms of comfort, never really had any issues despite running it for a continuous 2-3 hours once. Buds are soft and fit in snugly. Bluetooth connectivity is strong, however there are times when the connection stutters.And yes, it cannot be refunded,only replaced. So purchase wisely.

title: Bass is on heavy side
body: Bass is on heavy side battery back up is good I get close to 7 hours with half volume the grip on the earphones are really getting good overall I see there should be a bit more balance of treble and bass on the headphones I Brought these on sale for 999 which is awesome price go for it

title: Service life 1.5 years
body: Well I used it for 1 years 8 months. I bought this in April 2019. The first time one ear stopped working was in October 2019. Since it was within warranty period I had it replaced with a new one. Then again it stopped working 2 days ago and now I cannot get it replaced. Overall it served good and am satisfied with its quality. But it's not sweat resistant actually so wouldn't recommend for a heavy workout session.

title: Best in the budget
body: I am really glad of having this product. The previous one from boat was boat rockerz 400 whose sound quality with bass was just fabulous but call quality dissapointed me but this one really is excellent... I think i made the right choice of having this great product. Really awsome product with best call quality , best durability, an excellent sound quality and a decent battery backup. What else one need from a product ranging around 1-1.5 k.. Really i just loved it

title: NOT CHARGING. REPLACE IMMEDIATELY

body: I had my boat rockerz 255 picked up on 11th September for replacement as one side was not working properly Since then I have got no revert from the boat's team, these guys are not picking up there calls on customer care number and are giving no response over the email from 20-25 days. My Ticket id is 538530.It's been a pathetic experience with the boat as these guys clearly don't value there customers and are running there business like "Gupta Jee's" Shop. They are only hungry for your money and as you can see they don't provide any real support on their social media pages as well.

title: Very good product
body: I am writing this review after one and half months the battery life is good . Value for money but it was costly i got in sale gor 900 wait for sales of diwali . If u buy this product i suggest if u want for calling and listing songs its good its noise cancellation is also good, if you want to buy onlyfor music listening go for head phone it will give nice experience .

title: Don't buy it!!!
body: The worst product I have ever bought.I bought it thinking it won't give me a chance of complaining but it's one side stopped working after some days and other side also started dysfunctioning. I couldn't return it back here because this earphones stopped working after it's return date mentioned on Amazon. And now I am trying to claim warranty but it's also very frustrating as they aren't providing me any meaningful help for it.I suggest not to buy this product as neither the product is good nor the boat gives good customer service

title: Absolute value for money

Superior build qualityCons:1. Bluetooth range is low2. Noise heard for other person on call3. Sound distortion at high volumeMy verdict it's an absolute buy if you get it under 1000 Rs deals.

title: Good one at this price level

Noise cancellation is not up to the mark.2.call receive and end function some time work some time won't.3.I am facing it when I was in Whatapp call and if I received normal call than after normal call end up it got disconnected and than manually need to reconnect.

title: Best in the price.
body: Good build quality, sound is good, Bass is moderate and doesn't suppress the treble, noise cancellation is average, suppress little background noise(better have cvc noise cancellation than nothing). Call quality is very good, gaming latency is high. Not recommended for gamers. Rest It serves my purpose.

title: This product boat rockerz 255 pro+
body: This product we but under 900, this is best product under 1500 . We are use from 15 days or more , this product battery life is extreme normally use 2.5 hours gaming üéÆ, 2 to 3 hours movie or video after 4 days use battery percentage is 40. title: Boat rockers review 3 months
body: Pros:+Decent sound quality+Durable+Easy to fit in ear+Noise cancellationCons;-Extremely poor battry life (lasts less than 2 hrs)-Not recommended for people who love to hear original sound effects in music. (I like bass so it was okay for me)3 star due to poor battery life. Had to recharge very frequently.

title: Totally wasted
body: I received the product on 25th Dec and then onwards it worked properly for 2-3days, then it started creating issue, it always get disconnected and connected everytime, it's return option is also get closed on 1st.I am so helpless

title: Excellent base
body: First things first, If not every one few people are curious at what price did others buy it, like am I paying too much ???? or Am I getting it at low price and book it out!!!! and stuff.So I got this product at 1,399.00.This is how I personally felt, so if there is anything wrong ignore it.Now coming to  pros and cons.Pros1 ) Base is extremely good, you don't feel like its screaming into your ear at high volume.2) Noise cancellation is pretty good.3) Taking calls and stuff is good.Cons.1) Bluetooth is a bit slow, it takes 2 sec to reflect say to pause the Song or go to next one.2) It makes that beep sound every time hit vol +/- . Personally I hate that.Thank you for reading.

title: Product Support
body: One side of the Boat 255 stopped working and I have been trying to reach the customer support with no success to claim warranty. I called the nearest warranty center of HSR with no success. I have sent them an email a few days back also and no response. Their online complaint registration form doesn't give the option to enter the pin code and other below details and later when I attach the Invoice and try to send, it says enter details. The warranty is expiring on 28th SeptAmazon should help to claim a warranty!

title: Very Poor battery life
body: Extremely poor battery life in this price range. Sound quality is very very average. Don‚Äôt buy, you will regret. Connectivity is also very bad disconnects randomly.Worst product form Boat. üëéüèæüëéüèæüëéüèæI replaced it once thinking issue is with one particular piece but I was wrong.

title: Recieved a defective product
body: I have ordered two boat rockers, one black for my mom and one red for myself, so the black one was truly awesome, but this red one was different, the sound quality was different, it was low, the earnobes fitting was loose, and then when i tried replacing it, it said i have to courier it myself, there is no pickup, so i m not satisfied with this red one, the other black one i bought is truly amazing. I wish the red one was also like that

title: Does not last for more than 3 months
body: This is bad product in the sense that it works for a couple of months and then one headphone stops working and after a few days the other one too stops working. The worst thing is that the company sells this product under replacement warranty of one year, meaning that they will replace the product within one ear, but when you call their helpline no one picks up the phone, the website does not work. Seems like a fraud company with fly by night ethics. I had bought two headsets-- one for myself and one for my brother. Both of them stopped working within 3 months.

title: Not upto the mark...Treble low..Bass High...Poor Connectivity
body: First impressions were good but after using for about 1 hour..real problems came to my knowledge...Bass is no doubt of decent quality but treble is low...i felt some point that the voice isn't clear..and i am not that fan of bass that i would compromise with the Voice quality (Treble)... Secondly the connectivity is very bad...it claims to be having a range of 10 meters but in my case lost it within 10 meters...and also the Bluetooth isn't provided with the latest 5.0..its still version 4.1..perhaps if it would have came up with the latest Bluetooth version ,the connectivity could have been better..as now all phones supports Bluetooth 5.0..i would suggest in this price range...Nu Republic JAXX 3 is a very good Earphone with great sound quality then this..

title: Not bad
body: It's good for listening music and calls. But when I disconnect calls or receive calls.. the sound of disconnecting calls  & ringtone is too much that hurts your ears. Battery doesn't last longer. Lasts only for 3 hrs approx. on calls. Can be bought if the price is less than 1000.

title: Average product
body: Better sound quality with almost noise cancellation.I brought this product mainly coz i want to attend all type of call without keeping mobile on call. But there was a problem with this product that if it is connected then also when anyone calls through whatsapp the we can't hear the voice through earpiece if the Bluetooth mode is enabled on. For attending whatsapp call we have to talk directly through mobile no use for this earphone at all.That's the main reason for not recommending this product

title: Good for price range
body: Sound quality is good. Deep bass. Battery charging takes about 1.5 hrs... Battery drains very slowly till 60% and after that it'll drain at double rate and it becomes difficult to use headphones after 20% battery. It keeps giving battery low warning every minute or two which is kinda annoying. Overall battery life for continuous use is 6-7 hrs, with standby it can go upto 12 hrs.Bluetooth connectivity is good but music stops momentarily sometimes. Other than that it's a really good product.

title: Well it says pro but it isn't
body: Honestly this is good if you prefer professional communication for work, it would help as the battery will last a week.But for music, gaming and handsfree use its averageIf you're riding a bike or in the market the caller would hear everything but you, so poor noise cancellation

title: Must buy wireless earphone.
body: I have already used boat earphone and was quite satisfied with the performance interms of sound and bass, however I didn't expect that much this boat rockers 255 is tremendously performing great sound, clearance, noice cancellation bass will never gonna feel you headache and all if I talk about battery it works 7 Hours a day continuesly...well fitted in ear without any pain got this deal at lightning price at 999.Thanks Amazon to provide such deal and swift delivery and your faith!!!

title: Amazing sound quality
body: Must go for this. Lower priced perfect bluetooth earphone. I used it for around 1 year and battery life was stands constantly 4-5 hours and charging was 40-60 mins. No issue with battery and not with sound quality.A single drawback user feel is its wire length, but it's not that big issue. Just go for it

title: AVERAGE PRODUCT.
body: I have purchased OnePlus first, that had some issues, then bought Boat Rockerz.Starting from the package, I wasn't happy it had issues with sound quality, voice recording and all. The build quality too isn't upto the mark.I tried to return this item, but amazon said they can only replace. I have replaced it. The new one is slightly better. But not what I want to use. So returning the same.

title: Overall aaudio quality during  the call
body: Pro:Good for listening to musicCons:First thing this product though claimed Indian, is made in China.Second during audio or video call the person on the other side is not able to hear properly either low volume or breaking voiceThirdly Battery life is not that greatNext is when the battery is at 20%, it just keep shouting battery is low and very annoying during the callNext From 20 % charge with in 20 min the headphone switched off during the call

title: Good product at this price
body: What more do you expect at 899. Even 4000 rs Bluetooth headsets are failing. None of the products have completely positive reviews therefore I decided to go with cheap and best and this one really does the job. Battery backup is not very long but ok. 20 feet of range approx

body: I highly recommend don't buy Boat products, If you are looking for expensive product without any warranty claims requirements than go for it, dont keep any expectation for after sale service, they will niether answer your call or if you visit service center there also you will not get any positive response (Service centre executives are also frustrated because of companies bad after sale service, they are also helpless) as the problem is in roots of this companies management, you can try calling National Customer care number of boat they will not pick up your call - 02249461882, either go for some other brand.

title: Worst Sound Quality like 50wala earphone
body: Sound Quality 50 wale earphone ki hi jaisi hai uske alava battery hi sahi haiMic wala part left me dena chahiye tha right me de diya isse acha Boult ka probass flow x hai bohot acha tha uske badle le liya tha boat ka naam suna tha magar expect nahi kiya tha ki itna ganda rahega 3rd Replacement dala hu ki koi to acha mile sab duplicate hi lag raha hai og ki feel nahi aa rahi haiLagta hai Refurbish ya first copy hai boat ka og maal nahi de raha hai ye seller

title: Read the whole...do not use for gaming lag of 1 sec is found
body: Using it for 3 weeksBass is good but could be betterNoise cancellation not upto the mark bit yes on 90 percent volume monst of noise is cancelledSound quality is excellentBattery is good because in one charge i use it for 5 hours or maybe a bit less at 80-90 percent volume which is niceGets connected very fastDo not use for gaming as the sound of footsteps and bullets will come after 1 second(happened with me I have realme 6 with bt v5.0) and no one prefers any wireless headphones for gaming until they are above 2500Go for wired if you want to play games

title: Much recommended
body: I am more of a calling person rather than music one. I carry two phones which keeps on ringing alternatively throughout the day (don't worry i dont work in a call centre üòù). The biggest reason why i opted for a Bluetooth earphone was to protect my phone's from the sweat as i live in a humid area and also to avoid direct exposure to radiations to a certain extent. I did a lot of research but nothing couldn't convince me so i thought of purchasing Bluetooth headset of reconnect (reliance electronics brand) which costed me Rs 1000/-. It is a decent product to start with but will always be in back of your mind as you have to keep adjusting it time and again. Also the battery would last only 4 to 5 hours with my time of calling. Also the other person on call used to complain very often about the poor voice quality. Then i switched to boat rockers and trust me it's all together a different experience with almost similar price. The neck band will ensure its stability and it lasts almost the whole day even after 100 calls a day. And after almost a month of usage, nobody has raised concern about poor audio quality.

title: Waste of money, poor quality
body: It was a gift for my dad, didn‚Äôt work the way I wanted it to. Poor quality and the life of the earphones isnt good at all. I ordered one and it went bad in 2 days, exchanged it and other one went bad in 2 weeks! Extremely upset about it. Its still in warranty but feels like its just waste of time and money.

title: Satisfied at this price
body: This is my first bluetooth neckband üòäüòäüòäAnd this product fully satisfied me.The actual price is 1599 but in GREAT INDIAN FESTIVAL I got it at 999.My overall ratings out of 5Sound quality at high volume-4.5Bass-4Battery backup-4Fast charging-5Look and design-5Bass is punchy not extraaI think you should wait for GREAT INDIAN FESTIVAL to bought it at 999 because at 1599 this neckband is not value for money and clearly it doesn't satisfies you.This is my opinionIf you like this review ü§†ü§†,dropüëç

title: Okay but not great !
body: Sound quality okbass quality okNoise cancellation goodNot very handy to carry easily slips from shoulder, high chance of getting misplaced while carryingNot sturdyDoes not justify BoAt quality ; a Little disappointed

title: Headphones is very good but service of boat is very very and very worst.
body: Sound quality is good bass also very good and noice cancellation is very very good. But the problem is service of boat is very very and very bad. I had never seen before as much worst service. Totally Disgusting. I do complain of my boat rockerz 16 days before but till now I don't have any thing. No headphones, no information, no any msg ,no call , nothing. Totally a bad service. If I talk about costumer care service then it's like a cowduck or potty. If you want to talk costumer care then they will never pickup your call or otherwise they say..iss rout ki sabhi line vayast h. That is the service of boat. And this is happening 3rd time with me.

title: 255 Pro+
body: Not a paid review. If your going for 255 series go for the pro + variant. Battery is mind-blowing, 1 charge can work for a week mostly on general usage. Range is awesome, no issues at all even if you switch rooms at times, just don't be over adventurous. Quick charge is awesome and works perfect. Once you buy make sure you adjust the buds as per your ears or you want get the clean sound output. Loudness is just right and sound quality is decent

title: Read so you can describe the product on yr own way.
body: Pros :1)Product quality good,sound good .2)light weight3)battery time /playback time over all good4)connectivity averageCons:1)After 30 min yr ears feeling presure2)Good connectivy when phone is in range3)some times i feel the lil slage in connectivity while silenting music.4) Its Not a product for daily bike commuters due to low noice cancellation.Overall good product on bases of prices...

title: charging cable not fitting into earphone charging port  .....  gud at this price ...
body: The charging cable is not fitting into the charging port of the earphones not sure was it one off case or problem with everyones cable.....bass is not that great as of now ... not sure if that improves after some hours of burning ....i was using sennheiser cx street 2 so bass is not upto the mark is what i felt ...the vocals are a great treat though .....Bass - 3/5vocals - 4/5connectivity - 4/5vfm - 4/5

title: It's a good headphone
body: I had bought it for online classes. But I couldn't connect it to my 10 year old laptop. It is not supported on older bluetooth I think. But the headphone itself is a very good one at this price point. It fulfils all features that are advertised. Nothing to dislike.

title: Good Quality and Price-UPDATE
body: I really like this set. It's better than the one I got from the US. The drivers in this one are very good. I recommend this set.UPDATE: after using it for 9 months.1 side of the earphone has become very low. The one I got from the US is still working very well. I use the 1 from the US more than this one. I will not buy this brand again.

title: Best seamless service ‚ù§Ô∏è
body: I have ordered 2 of these and both of them have stopped functioning within a week. But the best thing about BOAT is its warranty service they provide. After i registered for warranty claim i received my replaced product within a week. I don't know its good or bad but all the 6-7 products i used all have issues after sometime,but this is the awesome seamless service they provide that i become a fan of BOAT‚ù§Ô∏è. Proud to be a member of ‚ú®BOAT ‚ú®family.  #plug into nirvana

title: Worst service i ever get
body: only after using for a month the the product stop working. I opted for warranty option. Even after 20 days when i returned the product to Boat team...did not get info when can i got my earphones back. First they said due to covid its is getting delayed then they said due to technical glitches we could not update when it will be repaired. pathetic experience.

title: Great Sound and Modest Price
body: I got this for Rs. 999 and have been using it for about two weeks. So far I have used it to listen to music on Moto G4 Plus and some other phones, and I've used it to watch movies on my laptop. While the Bluetooth connection to my phone was seamless, it was a little difficult to connect to the laptop.Sound Quality: 4/5Bass Quality: 4/5Noise Cancellation: 4/5Design: 4/5Packaging: 5/5Pros:1. Easy to use.2. Great sound quality.Cons:1. Wires are a little long.2. Simultaneous Bluetooth connection to 2 devices did not work for me.

title: Pathetic connectivity
body: I am not sure whether its original boat Bluetooth... its been only 2 months but I am fleeting connectivity issues or charging issue... not able to understand.. I want to replace it with new one as I am fed of this Bluetooth...

title: Decent sound quality but product feels cheap
body: Sound quality is just about ok. Not something to rave about.I had issues with pairing or sometimes reconnection.Also the fit of the buds were not very comfortable in the ear - it hurts a lot

title: Disappointed
body: Not satisfied by its fit in ear, its really uncomfortable, I have put small earbuds into it.. bt still it doesn't worked. My ears start hurting only in half an hour.. its sound quality is good..bt fit is completely uncomfortable.I need to change this model.. it is in return period. Bt Amazon is only availing its replacement with same product.Disappointed

title: What else can do the job better!
body: After using the product for more than two months, I am posting the review: this is the best budget Bluetooth Wireless Earphone for all my needs: be it the official calls when connected to laptop or smartphone, or for watching movies, this one does the job. Highly recommended from my end.With Love,Sarav

title: Overall good product but poor quality control
body: I ordered a blue boat rockerz 255 Pro+.Build, sound quality, bass, BT connectivity, battery backup and noise cancellation are all upto the mark.The issue is the quality control. Boat needs to work on that a lot. The first one I got started having outgoing volume issue within return period and the replaced one kept on connecting and disconnecting when not in use. Finally, got my 2nd replacement that is working fine as of now.

title: Very upset üò°
body: Its been a month i bought the product... all was going good now i am facing trouble with sound quality. People over the call don't get my voice no matter how loud i am speaking but the surrounding noise is too much... i can't even listen to my own voice note. Also the sound quality i hv experienced before 1 month  is getting too poor day by day... I am regretting now!! I heard of boat so much my expectations are all low now.. Please do help!!

title: Poor After Sales service by Boat Nirvana - Useless Warranty
body: Please do not buy Boat products as the company has an extremely poor after sales service. My headset stopped working after 6 months and I have been sending mails and tweets to the company regularly from past 2 months however, there is no response from them yet. Later on, they will say that the warranty has expired and we will not be able to help. Better buy some other bramd headset.

title: Not durable
body: Stopped working within 4 months.. since then got replacement twice and none of them lasted for more than 2 days.My observation is that it is not sweat resistant as everytime I wore it for workouts it starts showing issues.

title: Issue with cable.
body: Before using comneted to power supply for full charging bt the cable attached with product that was value less not inserted properly and even not able to charge any device .After using 4-5 days  the backup was not so.good as per description & it shuts down when it was 20% of battery .so it's return period was over now I I don't know what to do with the issue .just make sure before delivery to customer all parts are working including the box.

title: Overall a good deal üëå
body: Loved the colour (neon green). Sound quality is good. Felt heavier than the others I've used but that's understandable because of the bigger battery. Build quality is good, felt sturdy not flimsy. Got it for 899 in the sale. Will add my experience after I use it for more time. ‚úåÔ∏èOne thing I didn't like was the outer packing by Amazon which could've been better. üòë

title: Not for calls only Music
body: After purchasing i regretted. Bcoz when i was taking calls outdoors the other party could not hear my voice properly as the mic is grabbing more outside noise than my voice. This is one heads-up to the users. If u are the person who takes calls during traffic or outdoors opposite person will literally get irritated.

title: Good for normal sounds lover
body: Its good for those who listen to music in a bit low volume...as its volume is low as compared to other ... I don't hve issue with tht. I don't listen too loud ... Bass is ok ... battery is quite good .. material is good hope it last longer... Sound quality is good

title: Not clear sound because of heavy bass
body: It is good earphone but not acceptable at this price i bought it for 1400 but now it is available in 999 so you can buy it in cheaper price. Sound is not as good as expected it has so heavy bass that the soung clearity is not there but if you san spend some more money then i must prefer for realme earphone. It is far better than this in sound and battery both.

title: Never buy again this product and never suggest to anyone
body: While I'm connected bluetooth so after 0.30minutes to 0.45minutes automatically disconnect and sometimes sound is very slow music / watching time and calling time opposite person always ask your voice is very slow please speak louder.

title: Falsole mrp mentioned. Original mrp isn't more than 3000.
body: No doubt the bass is good and charges quickly. I have been using it for past 4 months now. But the mrp mentioned on the website is WRONG. At the time I purchased it the mrp was 2500. Now it is showing almost 4000. So beware the original mrp is 2500. And yes it's a good deal but state original mrp.

title: Good product but not suitable for ladies
body: I checked the reviews and bought it,it is good, but I missed the point, it doesn't suitable for ladies, it's too big for our ears, so disappointed, that product is good but I can't use it, I kept it for my brother

title: Issue with battery üîãüîãüîã
body: Bass quality is good but I think little more this is a required the build quality is really very nice metal body but 8 I have one issue regarding battery in starting it give a really very good battery backup but if you charge more than its capacity it will give you less battery backup so do not charge more than 1 hour I am using that headphone from last 6 months now I have to charge that earphone more than two to three times in a day so before buying this earphone please look at more options

title: Fake/substandard quality product
body: I had been a Boat fan for long time and have multiple Boat headset at home with great build and experience. I have bought it from retail as well as flipkart and am sure got the genuine product which is evident with not just the quality but also the authentication barcode on all products except the one I got from Amazon. Please refer the screenshot attached which has to barcode marked in green white the one from Amazon is marked in Red.Product from Amazon not only has poor quality and build but also doesn't stay longer also not a great range which defeats the purpose of bluetooth headset as the phone has to be kept near the headset all the time.I have requested for replacement but will be very disappointed if I get similar product which is substandard quality or fake.

title: Worth & do go for it when needed.
body: W/L earphone in 1-1.5K price range. Handle carefully for 1st 1 week to understand different feature capability. Had many -ve reviews on Amazon but I still opted for it. Incidentally all is well till now after 1 month use. Little problem in call/audio management but that's not a major issue. Same feature of JBL is on higher price rande (4K) so not bad this one.

title: Good for listening music, Worst for answering calls!
body: The Sound quality is Good. And the battery is pretty decent as well. This may sound OK to hear songs, but this is not good for handsfree calls. Noise cancelation is very bad as we tend to hear the noise of external sorroundings most of the time. The person on the other line of the call gets irritated after a few mins of the call due to this failure in noise cancelation.In short : If you are looking for a handsfree earphone for music - This is good choiceBut, if you also looking for handsfree calls then this might really disappoint you considering the budget... Think twice before buying

title: Malfunctioned within 25 Days of Purchase
body: Wish boat had spend the amount of money/time/research on quality/sound/durability rather then spending on ads, celebrity endorsement and to get their label on IPL players caps. Bought after a lot of research but the earphones malfunctioned within 25 days of purchase, a static noise is coming from the earphones whether it's switched on or off, the warranty and customer care sucks, I can't take a 800 bucks cab ride to a service station for a 1400 rupees headphones that too with no guarantee of repair or replacement.

title: Bad product send by Worst Retailer
body: This review is related with Boat Rockerz 255pro plus. Don't buy any products from "Appario Retail Private Ltd." They send box with broken seal and taped by local tape.They send me the product in bad condition already used by someone. It's looks old and very dusty.They steal accessories from the box, this product comes with 2 pair of Eartips but they send only 1 pair. Not happy with the Retailer. Don't waste your time, money and trust on "Appario Retail Private Ltd." They don't deserve it.

title: Superb sound and battery life
body: Sound quality : Superb , you fall in love with music.Noise cancellation: I use them on bike and never got any problems. Yes not the next level but experience is good.Bass quality: Trust the fame of Boat u will never feel cheated and no requirement of using Equalizer the bass is so goodAt last i would say good lows and good highs .Go and buy them also looks good I bought blue you can also go for green .Remember if you want good battery life these are the best

title: Awesome
body: Very good sound quality. It is perfect for sports and also other purposes.Very good bass (if bass is not there download app bass booster you will get it)Noise cancelation is goodIt is given that battery backup of 6 hoursBut after i used it, i came to know that it can give a battery back up of 6 hours and more

title: Review for 255 Pro. Awesome buy for price of 999 Go for it.
body: Review for 255 Pro. Bought it for 999 , it's pretty good considering the price. Dont get fooled by the colors shown in the site, Teal Green isnt as bright as it is shown here. No issues till now. Yes amazon needs to work on its packaging. Packaging was worst. Earphone box was not sealed, n it ws bent bcz of bad packaging. 0 stars for Amazon Packaging.If u are tight on budget bt want a Good earphones go for it

title: Dissatisfied
body: I'm extremely disappointed with this product. I bought it in September 2019. Since then I had to send it back to the company twice because everytime one of the earphones stops working. Both the times the company sent a new product but even then it barely works for 5-6 months and then the same problem is faced. Since it was under a warranty of 1 year the company easily changed it. But now that won't be possible. I just don't get it why a product worth 1500 had to be changed twice in a span of 1.5 years. I do not recommend this product. Dissatisfied

title: This headphones for songs listing not recommended for call
body: Good product for  song listening not for call it's a actually gym or exercise use headphones not for call peaking I used this product from last 12 days around i noticed some major cons in it when you call another person from this headphones make sure you stay in quite place coz this headphones mic pick each and every sound surrounding from your place so your speaking voice is not that much clear for your call person  overall one line review is very nice and high quality headphones for songs listing not for call

title: Certainly not for taking phone calls
body: Overall quality is good, however it is certainly not the best choice to take phone calls. Have been using it for a while now and have noticed that noise cancellation is almost non existent and other end can barely hear even when there is slight noise around, works OK only if you are in absolutely noise free area.

title: Average product - buy only for wireless use.
body: Just another average product from a brand that promises a lot. Meets the purpose of tangle free handling of earphones which otherwise provide better sound quality at 1/3rd the price of bluetooth earphones.Sound quality - like any other, don't expect too much. Just about clear. Average sound quality at mid volumes.Bass - Good bass punch. The clarity of the earphones don't compliment the bass well.I'm not a sound expert !

title: Not value for money
body: Didnt fit my expectations,sound quality is good but battery backup is pathetic never lasted more than half an hour on 100 % charge,moreover the range too isnt good.doesnt work for running as the fitting isnt great .packaging too was pathetic it had dust inside the package.Stopped working within two weeks,wareanty isnt smooth too,jun 14 se complaint daali hai no response.wasted my money

title: Good at this price range
body: BoAt rockerz. Very good at reasonable price Bluetooth earphone. Got it at Prime sale at Rs 999/-.Pros.Bass is good.Fits properly inside the ears.Cons.Pre configured voice that come while connecting / Disconnecting, or incoming call is not clear. May be bcoz of Male voiceüòú

title: Value for money awesome bluetooth earphones
body: Like the product completely, no complaints whatsoever. Sound quality, noise reduction, battery life(a few days with moderate use) all great. Prior to that, timely delivery, good packaging etc. Fully satisfied. Recommend to all.

title: Not worth
body: This is just an ok type product. Faced lots of issues while switching connection between laptop and mobile phone. Used it for few months but not satisfied. Finally got pissed off as it was not connecting while i was taking an important call from office through my laptop. Smashed it to ground and put it to dustbin where it should actually belong.

title: Better bluetooth range than other Boat earphones
body: I was pleasantly surprised by the bluetooth range this one had to offer. Deducting one star because the connection does get cut off all of a sudden when detected out of range, rather than fading (which would be helpful), and the functionality of long-press for 'on' and then connecting with your phone every time is a ridiculously time-consuming process.But great purchase, value for money.

title: Worth for the price.
body: Looks but cheap but does the job just fine. Sound quality is good. The ear buds grip is not that great, it keeps falling even with additional support. I baught this for taking calls so cant really comment on bass or music quality.

title: Noise addition instead of cancellation
body: I have a very bad experience in using this product. Whenever I talk over calls using this ear phone, person over call from other side always complain about heavy noise. Which distracts other person badly. I don't think it has noise cancelling feature even I think it adds unnecessary noise. Worst thing is that I can't return it because of Amazon policy.

title: Second time I got a fake one
body: I've ordered two products last year and listening to the quality of the headset I ordered one more. However, the second one was duplicate. While connecting, is says till boat rockers (255 was missing). By the way the cover and the headset looks like the replica of the first one which I purchased.The sound quality and noise cancellation was perfect for the first oneüòä.

title: Not worth the bucks
body: Writing this after  4 months of usage. Not any expert on earphones, just a layman trying to get a VFM Bluetooth headphones with some nice audio quality. No doubt boat rockerzz dissapoints to the core. The built quality is really bad one of the edges is already coming off. The battery caught and the coating started pelling off. The Bluetooth connectivity is also bad. There are gaps in the connectivity even when the phone is in my pocket.The only saving Grace is the bass in the audio.Bluetooth connectivity - 2/10Build quality - 1/10Audio quality - 6/10Value for money - not at all

title: Boat Rocks !
body: Writing after 1 months of rough use .Only get detached the rubber cap of charging point.Super compatible with my Samsung Grand 2 , Samsung M20 and Lenovo Lappy.Light weight.Super sound quality.  Same as JBL as I am JBL freak . Now a days JBL is giving bad cord for headphones... this one is good in 255.Only problem is the distance frequency is very very low.I purchased on Rs.999/- on sale.Better than other products as the round neck is not stiff so can listen while sleep too .Don't think too much just go for it .. not disappoint you .

title: Sound quality is disappointing , sound is so muddy and unclear. Wrost for those vocals
body: If you love muddy sound and only want to hear bass ,yes you can waste your precious time and money on this earphones. My old nokia earphones were more clear in terms of soundIt looks like boat just increased the bass and forgot about every other thing.Watched some movies too and voice of actors was muffling as hellBut anyway i would say order one and check it ur self. Becoz you can return it back and get it back in Amazon pay.

title: Zero CVC... Frustrated with the product.
body: I have just ordered this headphone. Sound from the music apps and videos are good but on call it has a constant buzzing sound and CVC is ZERO. I thought to replace it but for some reason I couldn't. But still I felt to review it because I'm completely frustrated right now hearing all kind of complaints from those people whom I talk too through this earphone. It is not worth the price.Please let me know if this issue comes under manufacturing defect and I still can exchange/return it.

title: Won't last very long
body: Have been using for a year.Build quality is average... Wont last you very long. The buttons will start to fall off. One ear has stopped working for me.Was ok while it lasted. I would say not worth the money you would spend

title: Nice product, if you are BASS lover then go for it.
body: Nice product, worth it. Writing this review after 2 weeks, I have charged it twice.  It can long upto 5-7 days if use it on 50 -60% music volume. However sound quality is crisp and treble is also good. If you want base just raise the volume more than 50/% and enjoy the deep bass like home theater.

title: ROCKINGG!! ROKERZZZ 255 PRO
body: Honestly telling, these earphones areee mind boggling!..ü•µ  ..The sound quality is just aawwwsomee! The battery backup is also too good üëçüëå.. and one thing if you are a bass lover you DEFINITELY gonna like them a lott! I repeat... A lotüôÉ !! the fit is perfect you can surely use them while doing any activity either walking, running, cycling etc and they won't fall of ...I personally liked them as I'm a big fan of BOAT and I use most BOAT accessories.. when I planned to get these they were new in the market but when I purchased them they were just fantastic and more than what I expected..overall fabulous product...you can close your eyes and just go for them ü§òüéß‚ù§

title: If u would kindly replace my earphones would be great
body: Its been 8 months since i have baught this boat rockers 255 in the beginning it wos working perfectly fine after three months the battery started to degrade because when it was new its battery used to last for atleast 5 and a half hours atleast but after 3 months it used to last only for three hours and i had to charge it for atleast 2 hours so i started using other wired earphones for a while and now within this lockdown i decided to start using my boat earphones but now all of a sudden its right earpeace is only working and the left one has stopped to work so please kindly help me and replace my earphones.

title: Not upto the brand name
body: I like Boat products especially their speakers, I have 2 of them and they have excellent connectivity but these headphones have terrible connectivity. Max range is 8-10m and clear sound only if there is no obstacle in between you and the phone but once there is a wall or anything else there's static sounds

title: Excellent Product
body: The earphones are sleek and not bulky around the neck. Give a really good sporty look. The sound quality is very nice and not harsh. Good bass and treble balance even when on full volume.Got this product during the Amazon sale on headphones. had ordered two earphone, one was defective; hence one less star in the overall review. The other one was in great condition. a good deal for the price.

title: Not value for money
body: Sound quality is not good and bass is also not good . Both thongs should be good as it is a boat earphones and it is rs 1500 . When i use this neck band boat rockers 255 pro in zoom meeting the sound  comes  low and when i use zoom and at a same time i use youtube sudio of zoom stops comming and the app which i use at a same time the audio of that app comes low .I thing in 1500 rs the bass and drivers should be good and there would be type -c cable .Really dissapointed .

title: Awesome product, Love With Boat Rockerz 255
body: It is an awesome, I really like it cause the sound quality. And the most important thing is that it won't trouble your ears if you wear it for a long as I tried most of the headphones, wireless Bluetooths most of them troubles me a lot if I put them into or on my ears for a long like 1 to 2 hrs. But this one is really awesome, the bass is superb, it won't fall down from your ears while running... Amazing product. Boat rocker 255 is really rocking as the name..... If I want to rate it so definitely it will be 5/5

title: Horrible after sales service
body: Guys, it's an honest review. I bought the earphone in 2019. It was working fine with minor grievances. After 10 months of usage, one of the sides stopped working. I applied for warranty. Boat people took my earphone and never responded. They neither returned my old earphone nor they exchanged it for a new one. Horrible after sales service. Better go for bigger brands, even if it costs a bit more.

title: Read this before buying
body: I read most of the review's before buying this earphones and i ended up buying this amazing boat rockerzz, the sound clearity is okayish but oh man, the bass, it's amazing and the connectivity is brilliant, i walk from one room to another without taking my phone and it works flawlessly Without any glitch.The problem in most of the bluetooth earphone is you have to press and hold the power button for almost 3 second to turn it on and the same for turning it off or shuffling between songs which is annoying.Wire postioning is good but it can be better.The battery almost lasts for about 3 days if you use it fot 2 to 3 hours a day and the ear hooks are excellent for outdoor activities with this earphone.After all with my personal experience i can tell everyone that you can but this phone bluetooth earphone if you want good sound clearity, amazing bass, a decent battery life, and comfortable to use.

title: Worth it!! Maybe.. But...!!? Think about it.
body: Everything about the earphones are really good. But jus that even the best products has the cons to it! So first off...,The sound Quality it's flawless and buttery smooth... But..! In an immerse content called the "Extra Boost" they've pumped up the Bass alone!? Where's the original bit of the song Ya'll!? üòë The bass is so dominant that the original bit of the song isn't present.Secondly.., if your are frequent user of the earphones.. I highly recommend not to go for it. After my extensive usage for about a week I found that the Backup charge in the device is horrible... And the most irritating thing is that it powers off at 20% (What the Heck) that's a true example of a poor Build. The battery doesn't even last for 3-4 Hrs of continuous playing.. But if your a timely user then this device might a perfect fit!

title: Berybad quality of product.
body: The product is a worst quality of product. Automatically broken twice . No reply from boat. Amazon also not taken any responsibility after selling this type of 3rd grade product to their customer. Really horrible experience. Total money wastage.

title: Product delivered seems a used product!
body: Find attached the photos, the box seal was open and also product was not packed properly. It seems some one has used it. Also the battery was fully discharged which was supposed to be fully charged and new product! Disappointed with the dealer plz do take a strict action on him. Attaching here the photos as proof!

title: Worst product
body: Worst product. Sound not good and color also different which show in image .look like duplicate.after using 10days one side eartip broken.Worst product delivered  by amazon

title: I am using this product for past 1 years
body: 1. Mic stopped working  with 3 months2. Battery is dead after 9 months of usage3. Service center call number is not reachable and not responding for the message4, Not sure how we can drop to the service center during the COVD situation.

title: Magnetic switch off not working
body: Since the magnetic touch off wasn't working, if was it really the new product or refurbished one. I finally returned. I didn't like the grip also, the earpiece extrudes out of ear unlike oneplus earphone. Oneplus ear grip is good. Realme 2 with new design is also good which is similar to oneplus in terms of ear grip. I cna give 3 star overall. Since product is defective, I'm giving one star.

title: Sound error
body: Purchased a month ago for 999 , and when i used it for first time bass was awesome and sound quality was also good but when i watched a video whenever th sound of video reduces earphone automatically start givin tap tap sound and whem volume of video reaches below 20%  it didn't gave any sound i actually didn't knew if it was a technical error or something else so i returned it and purchased oneplus bass edition for 2k and believe me they are real beast as compared to these 255 pro.

title: Good product overall , but might not be stable during running / work out
body: Early reviewGood sound quality and builtHowever the c shape fixture on the buds, which has been designed to provide stability during work out serves only a theoretical interest . During running atleast my buds are slipping offI am ardering now the one which holds the ear  pinna

title: boAt are very good brand
body: If you like bass than buy it superb bass but it's survive in low beats.Overall it's best item and justify price.By the way boat after sales service are damn good. If your earphone having any issue you need only log a complaint on website and upload proof of purchase they send courier person to pickup and they replace your earphone with sealed pack new within 10 days.

title: Great for such Price
body: Its the 4th day i am using boAt 255 pro and it is a great pair for such price . It has a good battery life and sound quality and bass is also good but only one this that it do get some statics on terrace if you have a mobile towers near by. And design is little uncomfy if you plan to use it for long hours. Rest all good üëç

title: Satisfied
body: Superb product. Sound quality is impressive. It cancels out the bad sounds perfectly. Very easy to connect to any device. Compatable for android or smart tv also along with android, apple, windows devices also. Sound quality remains same even after 6-7 years. I would highly recommend this product.

title: Quality
body: This product has excellent quality and really very good design and sound quality. Battery life is very long. Overall if anyone wants to buy it go ahead.But I bought two products both have the same problem automatically disconnected during the call and when I watch any video or listening songs.I think this connectivity issue is a major issue in this product.

title: Well done boAtüëç
body: Great Neckband. High base and sound is pleasant. Fantastic performance when Used it for calls inside room. Outside on road with less noise surroundings it works fine.Audio is great even in noisy atmosphere. Overall if you want awesome neckband go for it, and stay tuned on youtube channel Niraj Tech Show.

title: Good for this price range, Best one you get
body: One of fantastic earpiece in this price range, i got it for 899 from Great Indian Sale on Amazon.inSound quality is good but not best.Bass is good.Bluetooth connectivity is fine as i can use it anywhere in my home.Battery is good as it gives upto 5 hours playing music or talking. (ONE PROBLEM I DETECTED IS IT WON'T SHOW YOU HOW MUCH BATTERY REMAINING) as when fully charged it shows 100% in phone suddenly after sometime it shows 80% then after sometime it's on 60% thn it can be switched off anytime but exactly it will run for 5 hours.It gives warning of battery low at 20%Overall good product for this price range.It shows that it will give battery backup upto 6 hours but i find it will go upto 8 hours.

title: Uncommanded static in the left earphone.
body: The earphone is good. But curiously uncommanded static creeps into the left earphone within a couple of days of use. I noticed this on two consecutive occassions. The initial earphone and also on the replacement earphone as well. Just short of returning the item, the left earphone completely stopped working. The uncommanded static turns into a whistling noise even when no bluetooth device or phone is connected to it.

title: Music lovers don‚Äôt look at it. Battery lover order now
body: I have received product today morning and writing review at afternoon..If you are true music lover and want out of the box sound experience don‚Äôt go for this ones check wired earphone which can deliver great sound at much lower price.If you want great battery life and descent sound experience with good specs like water certification get this one.Overall deal is fine in 1500.

title: It has sporty look and easy to carry while running
body: The sound quality is very good, obviously don't expect so much bass.In terms of look, it is very much attractive.Charging and power back up also promisable. Hoping for long lasting .But worst part is about noise distortion while talking. Other side of the phone party keeps complaining about outside noise.

title: Good Value for money
body: Gets 7-8 hours on full charge .
