It been 2 months since i bought this.PRO'sValue for money (i bought it for 950 rupees)Bluetooth connectivity is good.Dedicated button for pause /play/on/off/google assistant (same button different duration of time)another 2 buttons for volume up/down /next/ previousCreates a vacuum in ear.Properly fits.CONsHurts ear if you wear it for long time .Creates audio that is irritating when you put volume to mute.Charging still done through micro usb port and not type-c.Build Quality not for workout just wear at a desk.

title: Awesome
body: I never give 5 star rated to any product. This is the first time I am rated 5 star because I am high satisfactory.Already bought 2 qty and waiting to buy one more...Pros:Batter: unbelievableMic: soooperbAudio: awesomeCons:NothingSuggestions:The position of volume + - button can be interchanged

title: EARPHONE CABLE IS TOO LONG üòèüòèüòè
body: NO DOUBT PRODUCT IS VERY GOOD BUT EARPHONE CABLE IS TOO LONG THATS WHY I M UNHAPPY WITH THIS . PLS BE CAREFUL WHEN U BY YOU CANT RETURN. U CAN ONLY REPLACE.

title: Not really impressed
body: I have few pros and cons. Don't know what others are reviewing.Pros:+ Good battery life+ Good bass+ Good sound quality for musicsCons:- Bad quality of sound for other on voice call- voice assistant not working- while connecting two phones very bad music voice sometimes cutting sounds in-between

title: Good product. Go for it.
body: It's really a good earphone. Amazon provided a great delivery, I got my product just on the next day of ordering it. I bought it for 1099 during the sales and I must say it is the best wireless earphone I have used. The functions,  Battery life,  audio quality everything is just awesome.Ione drawback is that, boat is supposed to provide a carrying case with it.  It's really risky to put it in the bag or somewhere else.  Otherwise it's the best product.

title: Good for sound quality
body: After 6 months of usage i'ld say it has min 4-5 hrs of continuous battery for 100-0%. But when it comes to noise cancellation that's tricky, i mean noise from your side is made high for other person and you'll be safe from other person's noise. Sad part is its connectivity with two devices does not work as mentioned by the company. There are even rare chances  with single devices it irritates with sudden on and off connection during the call.Overall for a normal usage its better product. i wish if there is any improvement in battery life

title: Do not buy this product.
body: Super sound qualitybattery life was good around 6h and takes 1.5 h to make it fullreally like the productAfter 7 months of usage right side of the ear speaker not working,i send it for warranty claimon July but till date there is no update about the product and services,Service center is in mumbai so if the product is  send for service it will take around 3 months may be more to repair it or replace it.Think again to purchase or not to purchase,I suggest you people should purchase the product that the service center is in your home town, Go for other product.Thank you

title: A Great product but...
body: Product is great in every aspect but it packs the ear and make a bit uncomfortable... Overall great product... But if you would like to go for walk or gym then prefer ear buds .. These are pretty good for home purpose , and moreover you can't lay down with it .... So , think before buying . I am myself suffering with my choice as I didn't went with ear buds ..Overall product is good and decent ... I have already used it for 3 months.

title: Best to buy in this range!! Honest review
body: All in all this could be the best wireless earphone in this range !!!!Although it has some pros and con for which boat can overcomePros-~the sound quality is so soothing~ texture of bass is properly splited for both side .~ built quality is also good , you can feel the toughness of the product.~design and color texture is also fine.~Cons~ battery is not uo the mark in one charge i.e within 45min full charge battery the output u can expect is 2 n half hour if u using it continuous or by keeping standby or with a call u can expect 2days battery backup.~ the upper layer of the body leaves the material i mean thing poly coating gets automatically removed

title: Product is good but the rubber earbud tip is of low quality
body: Product is good but the rubber earbud tip is of low quality. within 1 month it got teared and with normal use only. Instead of rubber tip boat can provide silicone tip which will have long life. Other wired boat models have silicone tip, but this wireless comes with rubber tip which is pathetic

title: Betrayed
body: I bought the product as the reviews were good. I even liked it as it is a descent one. It was the price point I thought was little higher Rs 1699 but then I thought that it being a Branded product hence the price could be high.What I am regretting right now is that I bought it at 1699 and within 2 weeks the price has dropped to 999.I feel like betrayed.

title: Horrible battery life !!
body: If u think of some bad product's I've got. This is one of the top ones. Got the new one which died a week after the return date passed. Sent it for repair and got the replacement after 4 weeks which worked for less than a week.  Sent it back again and got it after 4 weeks which worked a little more this time and lasted for 3-4 weeks and the battery is gone again. The battery doesn't last for more than 30 min no matter what I do. Charged it for a few mins and hours and neither made a difference

title: Not Good Sound lag, Dont recommend to buy.
body: Sound quality is good, but when I keep the phone in the pocket there is a lag in every 6-10 sec which is not good and make the product among all the available option, got the product seal in open seal condition, Giving 2 star because the sound quality is good and one for the amazon superb service. If I got a good quality then I will update my review about the new one. After replacement Provided the good wireless earphone , but they also lag sometimes,Superb service by Amazon.I recommend Dont buy this...

title: You should just go with it . Perfect buy for the price .
body: Perfect product to buy right now . Live up to the 40 hours battery life mark . And previously I was using the one plus bullet wireless but I had one issue with that one that my ears use to pain after 1 hour of continuous usage but no such issue with this one , I have used it to as long as 4-6 hours continuous. Really liked it .

title: Awesome product in this price range
body: A very good neckband bluetoth earphone . The battery back up is excellent with ASAP charging . As usual boAt sound --very nice but some hiss noise during call . Bass is superb.But it feels heavier on ears , however the quality of wire is good and flat wire. boAt should give pouch for carrying during travel.

title: No doubt go for it..100% Worth value.
body: After all trails waxed up with high priced bluetooth devices like (bose),JBL Sony...As a lost trail I purchased boat ...as my friends r saying it's good but the price was low compare with others including Samsung level 3 ....but my first look ...its cathy and tried with my I phone and android it's great in sound.....at present if it stays like that for 1yr..also I ll b happy ...

title: Very Satisfying product üòÄ
body: First of all I like the fast delievery of amzon it delivered before expected ,This is very very super at bass and has nice sound quality .‚Ä¢It is very satisfying at design‚Ä¢It is Perfect for all the requirements .‚Ä¢You can use it for gaming ,listening songs, Doing online class ,office meetings ,etc.‚Ä¢ And this product has a nice build quality.‚Ä¢ My opinion is to just go for it...

title: Needs to fix connectivity issue...
body: After using 6 months this bluetooth m writing this review,Pros.It's cheaper than its competitorsHas 3hrs battery backup for musicFor calls it lasts half day on avg.ConsConnectivity with xiomi/ Samsung phones is an serious issue, I have xiomi note 6 pro and samsung M30s and Note 10 this device has issue with all devices but it works well with samsung tablets.

title: Surprised by the audio
body: I was actually in dilemma in buying this or MI. But took a chance. Surprisingly i didn't go wrong. As samsung phones has mild low sound output, even i these mobiles it sounded far excellent. Then i tried with MI, honor and other mobiles. It was outstanding. Bass punched my ears so good. High and mid tones was good but not awesome. Call quality is just fine. Overall best earphone for budgeted. Just go on, u will never get unpleasant.

title: Not the best but good for the price they come in.
body: I've now used this product for over a month.Sound quality is good.Mic is good.Major problem is during calls, even if a spoon falls near you the other person would hear it as a loud thunder. It catches lot of noise. Sometimes I've to remove earphones and then continue the call.Fit is little weird. Right side ear plug keeps popping out.

title: Boat is my family member now... üòÑ
body: I have 7/8 boat earphones including headphone, its impressive. Worth each penny. Best sound quality. Bass. Noise cancellation. Microphone is okay. Long lasting battery if you are buying Bluetooth model. And affordable.

title: Left side earpiece low volume
body: I didn't realise it initially maybe but on the 10th day I may say it that the left earpiece has about 60% volume of right one.This is not expected. Also they refuse to replace at boat center.

title: Average product and poor after sale service
body: U really need to vigilant when it comes to boat wireless,I bought this three months back.Initial all aspects looks good and it's gradually decreased in value.Dual Bluetooth won't worked for me. I enquired with my fellow guys who bought this after me. Even they too find difficult in connecting two devices ie lap and mobile.Later after lot of search, it worked and every time it made me to do the same process to get connected.The mic is outside below Bluetooth and not inside ie near mouth, so it receives all the outer noise around you and your voice will not audible to the receiver end.Bass is little low when compared with boat 225 wired headset.Don't know how much charge utilized and always shows 80% and suddenly shows warning and switched off.After two months of use, The earpiece wire got disconnected / tore on the right side ie Bluetooth side. When contacted Amazon, they told to register the product inorder to claim warranty. Also they told to look out for near service centre where we can change our product.But in Chennai, no such stores available the nearest service centre is at Bangalore. The same reported to Amazon again, I was advised to look out of shops in local market area(Richie Street). I have told them that my product was registered in website and I didn't get any confirmation or registration code to activate or claim my warranty.They asked me to search contact numbers in boat website and proceed further.Twice I have  registered the product andIt's been a month they(boat) have not  acknowledge and send registeration code@AmazonU really need to look into this and arrange for replacement from your end as the manufacturer is not prompt in the registration process. Better u can arrange for replacement from the seller side which would ease the consumers difficulty

title: Value for money
body: First, let me mention that I got this product at Rs 999 during sale. The build of the product is average and the magnet holding the two earpieces is average. When it comes to sound quality, these are perfect for listening songs and movies in surround sound. However, the only area that the product lacks is the microphone's performance on a call. You'll often hear the other party complaining that they can't hear you, instead the background noise takes centrestage. So avoid using them for calling in busy, noisy areas, otherwise they work fine in quiet environments. Hope the product price drops to 1000 Rs mark permanently.

title: Disappointed with product design
body: Sound quality is great and good bass, but disappointed with product design. Volume up/down tone is played whenever there is a change in audio stream. Example while scrolling Facebook and Instagram videos page, Volume up/down tone is played each time before start of the video. This is very irritating, looks like product design fault. I have observed this on my iPhone 6+, not sure about Android behavior.Note: this is behavior observed after device volume control is used.

title: (again update) earphone stopped working but got replaced within no time.(color change extra 150 Rs)
body: I was nervous while purchasing this earphone based on all reviews i read. but im so happy that i purchased it.Its too good1) sound is too good.2) fits perfectly in ears, as it provide three ear buds with different size.3) bass is so good.4) EDM music lover will love it.5) Can connect two device at a time.problems :1) Bluetooth connectivity problem you may face initially, but if you switch off earphone and mbl bluetooth, and again on it it will work. Once it connects your device you wont face connectivity problem.Customer service:1) Really happy to say that i had issue regarding bluetooth connectivity, after raising complaint i got fast reply from boat people, even though issue was resolved, i was keep getting calls from baot people for issue.2) you can replace item within no time, service is too goodps: i have never written this much big review for any product.

title: Battery backup and sound
body: Battery of this product is very long performing. I am continuously use this earphone for a week but battery is still remain approx 20%.Bass quality is good and noise cancellation button is effective after 2 sec of pressing the button....some little calling issues are in this product but very little...range of Bluetooth connectivity is sufficient not any issue...so end of this review is product is best in this prize  range üëç

title: Poor for calls, Ok for  Musicüéµüé∂
body: Poor sound quality, has cracking sound always throughout calls. Good for listening music, but absolutely rubbish product for calls.. Connects instantly with devices. Never had a smooth calling experience with this headset yet after almost a month's use.. Disappointed with the product keeping in view the price paid for the product.. üòî

title: A quality product
body: I use it mostly for calls. It's my second boat product and there is no doubt in my mind about the quality of their products. Sound quality, noise cancellation and bass quality are best at this price range.

title: Excellent product
body: Boat is awesome if you like to hear bass's and quality.I am using one plus 6 and quite satisfied with boat. In case of audio controlsDouble tap + button to increase volume & single tap for change next track.Double tap - button to decrease volume & single tap to previous track.Double tap o or middle button to dial last call, single tap 2 seconds for Google assistant, single tap immediate to play or pause music, single tap long press to on or off boat rocker or Bluetooth connectivity.If u charge daily 20 minutes it's enough for long day continues music.Overall Good product.

title: A must buy @ 999 Rs.
body: I would say at this price (999 Rs.)  it's a must buy product.Pros - 1. Bluetooth connectivity is really good, I kept my phone at bedroom and was at hall and the sound was clear.2. Mic and noise cancellation working really fine.3. Flexible and durable.4. Sweat Proof.Cons.The only con is that it's sound quality was damn good in iPhone but in Android it's quite normal like other basic headphones.  As I have iPhone 7 and Android phone,  I prefer to listen to songs by connecting with iPhone as it is giving good support to this headset.

title: Don't buy if you love clear bit loud-audio.
body: Bad audio quality !Very ambiguous sound. Horrible audio level. Bass is a joke.Noise cancelation- i was able to hear everything apart from music.Sound level is absolutely nonsense, you'll keep struggling to raise the volume all the time.Very cheap product also control are on right side, BIG NO FOR ANY BIKE Rider.

title: Not something that people rejoicing.
body: After more than two months of usage i am reviewing this product.It's third month and start creating problem. I mean bluetooth connectivity. Very low. Noice cancelation is also not upto mark.Sound is good no doubt but lacking tow big things, durability and Bluetooth connectivity.Noice cancellation not all up to the mark. Can say "chal jayega" type.

title: Good on for those who loves bass
body: Vocal is not Cristal clearIf u want to listen clear vocal u have to download 3rd party software. And  if u use Samsung m series like m10,20 or 30 phone than there is no need to download 3rd party SOFTWARES,BASS IS REALLY VERY VERY HIGH.if u are a bass lover and u can compromise little with vocal than it's for you and if u can't compromise with vocal even 10%  than I won't suggest to u

title: Nothing great, average performance in line with the low price
body: Decent voice and connection speed. These are not bose so do not expect a thumping bass or a sharp treble. Noise cancellation is almost non noticable. But ok for the price as i use mainly for office calls and occasional movie/ music

title: Poor reliability product. Doesn't work even after sending for repairs twice.
body: DO NOT BUY. First 3 months of use was fine, working normally and getting good battery life as well. After this period one day it suddenly did not turn on. Sent it for BoAT service repair and received it back after two weeks. After the repair was working fine for one month, then again same problem. It did not power on. Sent it for boAt repair again but got it back only after some 3 months because of pandemic lockdown. Was working fine for another month but now it doesn't work again. The blue light is always on, but it does not connect to any device and the buttons don't seem to work. Very poor quality product. Sad to see this condition after seeing it sent for repairs twice.

title: Stopped working after first charge
body: The most pathetic product I ever saw by far. Not just once but even after replacement same issue seen. It worked fine when it was fully charged on delivery. But once on low battery when I tried to charge it again, it never comes up again even after full charge. Also on the left side of earphone, it constantly gives irritating noise even without connection to any device. Now I am not able to replace this junk since time is over. I should get my money back for this garbage of a product instead of replacement actually.

title: Waste of money
body: Dumbest thing I have ever used I have been a big user of boat head sets since a verylong time this time the headset gets disconnected frequently charging problem  it doesn't even let you manage the battery life it shows high and sudden says battery low... Please  don't buy boat rockerz 255 pro

title: Very disappointed
body: Not happy 2nd time purchased it seems look like duplicate even the connection voice and accessories not original all fake not happy with amazon please take necessary action against suppliers who provide duplicate products very disappointed

title: This crap stopped working within 6 MONTHS!
body: I have bought this absolute piece of plastic! on sep 2019. which stopped working within 6 months ie.. during march, see don't buy this, no matter whatever sound quality this plastic gives, whats the point if it stops working within such a short period of time. I thought only i am unlucky, i found same thing happened with my friends too! please don't waste your money on this piece of plastic you can get way more better sound quality than this in many other earphones which are not like a plastic toy, that too in similar or little bit higher price. Meanwhile i gave this earphone to my father also and even he is saying that left part of earphone stopped working, trust me guys this plastic works flawlessly during first 6 months or less, after that it sucks!

title: One ISSUE but the performance covers it up.
body: Sturdy product but have a connectivity issue. Sometimes the Bluetooth doesn't recognise my boatrockerz I have to restart the phone to make it work. That's annoying but other than that the product is awesome, always have a pleasure using boats audio system. Using it for a year and the sound never dissatisfied me. Go for it

title: Battery Life is So Good
body: Previously I was having Boat Rockerz 255 ..it's was good...after that I bought Oppo encho m31 ..it's sound and fitting was good but I had to give it 2 times to service station...so I bought this and overall for daily commniting and entertainment I found this is good..it's having so  good battery life...sound quality is not like oppo but it's ok..

title: not a good product
body: returned it once and got it replaced because it was hanging an not connecting. the replaced one also worked for few days then stopped charging. in both the earphones was having trouble in talking on phone as i could here but my voice was not transmitted on other side. some issue with software i guess cos at times it was ok and at times only one way

title: Boat Earphones
body: Dont buy BOAT earphones at all,  i had facing a  problem with wireless and wired earphones. All of them are working similarly only one channel sound is getting properly the other channel is getting very low. I am experiencing this problem after a month of buying this products.

title: They are pretty damn good considering the price
body: You really should buy these coz the battery life is awesome .Voice is decent , could have been even less audio leak which would have resulted in much better sound ,but sound is decentMicrophone is also good.Build quality is good idk but in my product there was small gap where the led was there which leaks the light whenever the signal is given .. It is a manufacturers problemOverall it deserves to be accepted instead of just blindly buying random studd

title: Good quality product in an affordable price
body: I just love this headset. I‚Äôve used many other big brands before this. But most of them don‚Äôt have noise cancellation and also there used to be some echo. In the boat headset, noise cancellation is really good. There is no echo. Also the price is not high. It is quite affordable. The only thing is that the battery discharged within 6 hrs of usage. For me this is not an issue as I just use it for calls. If your usage doesn‚Äôt exceed more than 6 hrs a day, you can totally go for it

title: Good Product
body: Hey I am using this product for last 10 days. Below is my experience.1. Sound quality is good with nice base.2. Comfortable in wearing and can be weared for long hours.3. Battery life is average.4.  Worst part is bluetooth connectivity, frequent disconnection. Organization must work on this problem.

title: Only the cost matters
body: It's cheap so it's good. Nothing special. Wat else you get in less than 1800. Do not expect a high quality performance. But if you are ready to spend some more bucks, then I suggest sennhizer neck band. The sound quality is 100 times better than boat

title: Good Only for music. Not for calls.
body: Giving review using after 2 weeks. Too Long wire & neck wire bit hard, I tied to stick with a pin to hold the headphones. not in good flexible condition, not comfortable to wear. I  for calls not good, better for music. Battery time also not in 40hrs effect. But quick charge is good.

title: Dont prefer this for I phone
body: This is really good quality product. But I bought this for my I phoneXR. As we know already apple will perform good only with another apple. This has perfect external noise cancellation for the user but the con is this abosrbs external noises too much that disturbs a lot to the other end speaker. For songs this will shout a lot which may create even pain or itching in ears. Battery back up and water resiatnce quality was appreciable.

title: Connectivity issue is the main problem with this device other wise it's best product
body: I used this model with from 1 month issue with the connectivity ,when it's connected there should be lots of overheads while listening the music I don't that's because of the bluetooth version and built quality is good but I think need some work on the connectivity software otherwise product is good and sound quality is good but some time the device is connected but still not able to attend the call again need to pair and all those things that's pathetic and feels irritated

title: Good Product, But !!!
body: I have been using this product for exactly 40 days now, and this is what i have to say :Good product for the money; But,1. Takes too long to connect or disconnect to a device.2. The Battery is its biggest con, It never really gives 6 hours of usage. And on top of that, the battery drops from 60% to 20% or less in less than 40 mins... after which it starts interrupting your music stream saying " Battery Low".And the charge time is more than 2 hours, which is difficul to understand, given that it has a very small battery.Other than that, the product is fine.

title: Amazing Headphones
body: Comfortable fit n good sound. My device stopped charging abt 4 months after purchase. I followed the online instructions to repair / replace the item as it was under warranty. Must say boat has a very impressive online system which is efficient n responsive. The service centre took some time but i have received my earphones back hence the 5 star rating. All electronic items can malfunction but its the after sales service that really determines the serious ones and from this it appears that boat are here for the long run. Good sound, comfortable fit, great after sales what more could one ask for.

title: Worth it.
body: Great product. Got it for a price of 999 only.Range- As mentioned in product descriptionSound- Quality is good unless you are a die hard music lover or music creator.Might hurt your ears on extensive use.Good for rough use.Battery life-6hrs(verified)I personally use it for working out, watching movies and listening to songs.Great value for money .

title: Questions regarding build quality??
body: Purchased this in June 2021, completely died in Jan 2022. Wont turn on or charge, have contacted boat support for warranty, will update this review based on how they handle warranty claim. Sound wise, it is average at best and it suited my needs perfectly. Quality wise, well its not working after barely half a year of not much usage so that leaves a lot to be desired. Customer service now remains to be seen.

title: Garbage product boat rockerz 255
body: Biggest mistake to buy such kind of product. Boat products can never be trusted. These products have life equivalent to their warranty period or sometimes much lower than that. If u want to waste your money for a product that has shelf life of 6 months u can go for this stupid product. I purchased it in June last year and its battery life got damaged within 5 months. I replaced the product from the service centre which is quite far from my home and again it got damaged with similar issue within 2 days. Boat should stop making such garbage products. Beware of this trash is you value your money. Either go for a reputed brand which might cost more but have a good shelf life.

title: WORST MIC , SOUND QUALITY .NOT AS EXPECTED , DONT BE  DECIEVED BY ITS TAGS FAKE COMMENTS....
body: Many reviews I read positive but... When I bought & used .. there is no extra bass jus as normal earphones... The worst part is MIC... It takes all the other noises except voice.. as a musician.. I can say it is a  normal earphones . There are no clear highs & mids & low... I prefer music lovers to buy Realme some what ok..better than this.. for a decent Bass & Good quality in Stereo HD sounds better for 8Dgo for Infinity  glide 500  cheap & best..

title: Slightly disappointed..
body: Got it for Rs.999 at Amazon Day sale. Using it for last 2days. If compared with my old Boat 225 earphone, sound quality is almost same. But the bluetooth connectivity is really disappointed.  It's getting disconnected very frequently... Even within 6-7mts. Noice cancellation is just ok. It's very light weight and very much comfortable.

title: Noisy Microphone
body: 1. Something is really wrong with Bluetooth tech.The pairing gets interference with wifi signals of other devices like when it‚Äôs placed near another phone/ ipad. FYI: I use 2.4/5Ghz dual band router.2. The microphone picks only noise more often than  voice. It‚Äôs annoying for the person on call.Picks up the noise of fan/ vehicle honking/ breath/ wind etc., but usually NOT the VOICE.

title: Bass is good, looks are good, mic is awesome but treble is less.
body: Earphone's capsule look and feel is good but the wire is a bit long, when you hang it in your neck, it looks weirdly long but except that, the bass lovers would love this, good high volume, extra realistic bass and mic quality is awesome. Battery backup will amaze you, just charge it 100 once in weekend and it will assist you for the whole week. This is a real deal if you are getting this under 1500. Go for it.Rating 4* because of only upto 17khz treble. üî•

title: Worst product and worst customer service from boat
body: I wnated to rate it zero but the interface don't have that option. Worst product I have purchased. I have replaced the product bec it stopped working and the same problem with the replaced unit. And still the product has not completed 1year. Worst noise cancellation. If you ask the other person on the call what they hear is only external sounds and that to very clearly. If you call boat customer care they tell ticket id is not valid. What the hell!You won't be able to contact the customer care executive

title: KILLER SOUND QUALITY ‚ö°üî•üî•
body: Just go for it guys !! This neckband will not disappoint you !!Pro -Superb & clear sound quality. Nice bass and treble !Build quality is goodButtons are well featuredComfortableClassy DesignCon-Slow chargeHas some noise leaking issue... I mean if u are listening song at full volume then who's you're sitting beside, he can listen youBUT BELIEVE ME IT IS AMAZING WITHIN THIS PRICE

title: Waste of money
body: Forcefully am giving single star. Waste of money, no battery back up and audio quality not clear, if audio not playing automatically showdown within 7-8 minutes. First time am facing problem with Amazon they mentioned 30days return policy am received product on 04th Oct and am booked retrun on 10 Oct they mentioned 12th oct they will pick a product and now it's showing 11th Oct closed return policy, first time am facing problem with Amazon product.

title: The Worst Earphones Ever
body: First of all,, This review is about Boat Rockerz 255 Bluetooth earphone. Generally , I don't have the habit of writing product reviews but this s*** earphones made me review this in order to save the other consumers who are planning to buy this CRAP. In my opinion ,,Firstly , An earphone should be comfortable to wear. In this regard,, it makes you to cry in pain even after 5 minutes of usage !! Secondly , it should have a good audio Quality !! It's just okayish when it comes to sound quality, Nothing great to talk about it. Overall, Never buy this earphone even if they give it for free unless if you wanna hurt your ears with this abysmal earphones.

title: Nice product
body: Good quality sound. But magnets are not strong enough to hold together, they separate when shaker a little. But all over it is good. Bass, mid-range, treble all range of sound is covered very nicely. And the best is is battery (omg! 40 hrs@70%).

title: Nice product and worthable
body: Only to sae battery little bit weak and the finiahing of rubber material is very goid also i using in rain season not at all problme also sweat happens no effect  or damage occur to headphones very nice auperb headphone.rest sound  of bass and treble sound is awesome  i buy from amazon.in thanks amazon . From.chepas headphones better buy this one I recommend to all..

title: Excellent for music not so good for calling..
body: Product is excellent,,,but one problem is mic is not capture the words properly..so for calling it is not so good,you have to speak louder otherwise nothing will hear to recipient.........sound quality is so good,i am enjoying as INOX .......... battery charging very fast and run for 5-6 hr.....with my vivo mobile charger its get charged within 10 min.........so good for music not so good for calling....

title: Good sound quality and bass
body: I really loved this product.I m happy with this one. It has a very good sound quality & bass. Really enjoy when a rocking music i play becoz of bass. Design is also good. Earbuds are comfortable.Little heavy as it a metal but ok. Neck band is awesome. But sound quality get distorted when  simultaneously 2 sound means i in cls my teacher saying something and when i play music on background, at that time sound quality get bit low. Thats something but overall its a good one.

title: Problems only after few months use.
body: Loses power within 3-4hr.Loses charge without use within a day.LED indicators are not turning off.People can hear my voice when in call using headphone.Very sad with these boat head phones. Did not expect this from boat.Edit:  Boat gave me a new replacement.. But charging stopped after a few day... Why am I getting all the defective ones üò©

title: Decent product but....
body: Good product. Decent sound, but Little too much of bass that it reduces the brightness of the high frequencies.Wish it sat flush in your ear but has quite a bit sticking out but that's ok.Battery life is good.Easy setup and access with the controls on the side

title: Good one
body: Not up to the mark.. but not so bad either.. bass is good.. sound quality is okay.. if you use regular basis.. you might not get any trouble but if you want to focus on the beats of music or any sound very closely the it isn't so good at it..Noise Cancellation and bass also not so good.. but it  is also okey.. as I said for regular activity it is good but when you want to go inside any sound thoroughly then.. it won't be so helpful..

title: You're now connected to rockers piece of crap!!!!! [DONT BUY this thing is EARRAPE]
body: I use Sennheiser 3.0 for my laptop, got these for my phone.Headphones will tell you every time you connect your phone it says this stupid line.This thing is EARRAPE every time you connect and doesn't stop there, it'll also scream in your ears when the battery is low.Also, it says it on full volume like your ears gonna torn apart.Will never buy boat crap ever again, the worst experience EVER!!!!will NEVER recommend this company to anyone ever.

title: Not at all good
body: I bought this and returned it the same day..  Bass and sound output is pathetic. SUCH PRODUCT FROM BOAT IS REALLY a Disappointment . Poor BT reception.  Guys go for BOULT instead. Iam using that and really happy with it.

title: Black in place of Neon Green , but its still okay for me.
body: Update:One side of the earpiece stopped working permanently - 18June2020.Need to return and ask for replacement.I received a pure black piece in place of neon green with black and it seems to be slightly defective. Extra ear buds are also not provided as promised.At times one side of the ear phone isn't working, after head shake it suddenly continues to work.In terms of sound quality, it is good. Crisp and clear audio. Battery back up is also fine. May be need to continuously use to understand its working efficiency and long life durability.

title: Product could be robust !! But not
body: Product is ok ok. Sound is ok.Quality of wire is questionable !As i red circle weakest part of the  product. Donot know how long it will be durable ?Possible wire cut or damage in long run since it is always get repetitive bend while placing on neck and removing. However i will try to treat this part very carefully.But this area could be robust.

title: Decent only
body: Don't expect more for what you have paidPros1.decent built quality(go for black)2.awsome battery backup3.noise cancelationCons1.music experience is not that much great2.bass is low compared to other brands at this segmentAt last if you have a plan to buy it for your regular office use then consider it,if you are looking for music bliss the go for 330 or 335 for better experience

title: Battery drains out in 1.5 hours
body: The battery drains real fast, exhausted in 1.5 hours. Unlike other headphones, it still keeps running even when the earbuds are locked with each other. And there's often this disturbance during calls and I have to switch to earpiece.Sound quality is decent so alright for listening to music but there's still the battery issue.

title: Warranty cannot be claimed. It's a scam
body: This product warranty is a scam.When I mailed I get a auto reply . I checked the website and reached the nearest customer service but they said they won't work on it and gave a number. When I tried the number it was not reachable.Very disappointed that there is no customer service for product related complaints. Better don't buy this product

title: Not happy with this product
body: I have been using it since last 5months , recently it has got some problems. Some times not getting charge, sudden discharge and key buttons not working. I am not happy with this product. It has got 1 year warranty, but helpline phones not working and website also not working properly. Any one advise me in this regard.

title: Must read
body: If you are a Bass lover you will love it, but if you are not then don't go for it. If you are a student who will use this earphone for a lecture or listen a human voice then It not for you, Trust me bass will trouble you if you are listing to lecture or human voice you cannot listen to it for hours rather go with normal earphone which don't have high bass I choose Oppo encho M31, its good

title: Nobody is able to hear what I'm say
body: I received my Boat Rockerz 255 yesterday. The earphones quality and sound is good. I'm able to listen to music/movies...etc. Sound quality is really nice.But during the audio and conference calls, I'm able to hear other parties correctly but nobody is able to understand what I say. My voice completely cracks/distorts. It's very embarrassing especially during office conference calls. I had to switch to my wired headsets.I need to return this product and need my refund.

title: Poor After sale service
body: I am writing this review for after sale service, Headphone is outstanding for everything but after 6 month one side is suddenly stopped nd after that I am Continusoly trying to contact from April 2020 to till date to contact BOAT customer care but their phone nd office both are still closed,not getting any support from Boat and not even getting proper reply from Amazon customer care after calling so many times. I thought due to COVID 19  they closed their shop but  after july 20 everything started And now My warranty will be expire in September 2020. I don't know whether they help me Or not for this issueüòîüòî

title: Awesome apart from BT Range (4.1)
body: Well, initial impressions are good. Got it for around rs 870 applying discount. The Amazon advertisement page showsBT 4.2, but the seller is selling BT 4.1. Previously was having JBL Infinity Glide 100, well those were having pretty below average sound quality, however the Bluetooth range in those was good (BT 5.0) , so returned them.These Boat Rokerz have awesome sound quality, however the Bluetooth range (4.1) is not that great but can't complaint more considering the price nd sound quality.Noise Cancellation remains to be checked. Build quality is superb.(I got Black nd my frnd got Neon, well Neon colour is looking super awesome. Buy Neon colour if u buy these)Will update after using for few more days.

title: Worth Earth phones for given cost
body: I have been using boat rockerz 255 pro+ last four months.The most likeable part is,1. charge duration is very long. I am charging earphones weekly once. I am using earphones for at least 5hours per day in the week.2. Sound quality is good.3. The way they made earphones it is easy to use it. Most of the earphones doesn't stay in my ears. Now they create proper shape keep it in ears.4. weightless

title: Awesome sound quality...........worth buying it....
body: Hello Guys,This is Moorthy Shettiyar......After watching en number of videos & reviews I ordered this product yesterday at 10:00pm and today in the afternoon at 12:30pm I got the product.....very fast delivery........keep it up Amazon & teamNow let's talk about the product....First of all the quality of the product is awesome.....It's superb durable......nice tangle free cable....also I love that magnetic bounding between each other.....Now let's talk about the sound & call quality....Sound signature is literally superb guys It's beyond to my expectations...I was planning to buy realme buds wireless but I thought let's give it a try & really guys m very much impressed with the sound quality.....For sound signature I would rate 10 /10.Highs, lows, mids, vocals and bass everything is Crystal clear ....It's worth buying  @999/- I strongly recommend to buy this product it won't let u down...Boat rocks‚Ä¶................

Finding trouble while phone call....people on the other side asking to talk again...as the voice is not clear as it could be understood on first instance. Best for listening songs and waaltchig movie... However, lag in audio while watching movies.

title: Average
body: Average product .....Pros :- battery life- noise cancellation- pretty good sound quality for this priceCons:- very irritating earbuds (painful)- wire is long and looks weird on the front not at all stylish

title: Bluetooh connectivity is horrible.
body: The boat wireless/bluetooth connectivity has a serious issue. I was using boat wired headphones and it worked well for me. But in wireless section boat does not justify its presence.The wirelss headphons tends to disconnect  intermittently after few minutes and ruin the experience. Not worth it guys.

title: Not satisfied
body: This is my worst purchase from Amazon. After reading the reviews I thought it‚Äôs going to be good; however first delivery there was charging issue as the charging point was broken and in exchange the second delivery is again defected as the charging remains for only one hour and even if fully charged battery get drained in switch off mode also within few hours.I am really sorry that I bought this..could be the seller issue also, over experience is not good

title: This product is best for battery backup. The backup is
body: This product is best for battery backup. The backup life is so good . It's not 40hours that mentioned in the title but not less than about 25-30hours . The sound quality is good but espected bass is not required what is need . And product is 100% water proof which I have been tested and material quality is best . It's purely value for money product . In my opinion you just go for it . But remember that if u need much bass and musical thump you can watch also others .

title: Exceptional  after sales service from Boat
body: I am hugely surprised with after sales service from Boat. This earphone was bought about 10 months before and was in warranty. One side of the earphone stopped working about a month back. I reported this issue to Boat customer care. It was pretty seamless experience right from picking up and getting replacement for the earphone. Boat has set great example of after sales service for other local and Asian brands.

title: Bass lover here. But gets too bassy
body: Issues.Cinnectivity.---------------The Bluetooth connectivity is not at all good. Just breaks some times. Not at all recommended for gym workout( atleast not for cardio.) Stopped working many times when I had a good amount of sweat.Sound.I am a bass lover and always a budget guy. Till now used different kinds of in ear earphones. Senhizer cx 180.. jbl . Panasonic, boat, etc.. all in same range approx. But i still prefer senihizer cx 180 over boat 225.  Boat just has too much of base the voice mainly feels submerged. I had to turn off all the equalizers ( music app and mobile ) so that I could get a better voice..however it feels too bass. Atleast not while listening to music but it feels while watch a movie speciallly Hollywood.Disappointed a bit.. satisfiesld a bit.. but majorly disappointed

title: Worst headset - Do not buy it and there is no warranty center too
body: I have researched a lot before investing in bluetooth headset. Within two weeks, left side of headset doesn't seems to work. Amazon is now saying that return policy already got over and there is no service center in chennnai. During the covind19 situation, i'm fed up with the customer service from amazon as well from boat now.When service center are not there do not mention it as one year warranty rather update as use and throw. Guy i'm music lover, thought boat would satisfy me during the pandemic but actual pandemic is far better than boat service center and customer support. I'm writing this review to make you all aware about this issue.

title: Too Bassy! Mudding down all tones. Even Bass lacks thumping.
body: Cons: 1. Too Bassy! Mudding all tones.  2. Unable to listen all instruments getting  played due to heavy bass.  3. Even Bass is not best which lacks clear  thump.  4. BT connection always requires line of  sight. Poor reception within rooms.  5. Battery life average.Pros:1. Noise cancellation is great.2. Bulit quality is good although plastic.3. Call quality seems fine. No complaint received from far end so far. However, Bass comes to picture even for voice.4. Bass centric. But don't expect much from bass also.

title: Waste of money....go for something else.
body: Sound quality is fine..........bass is super strong......connectivity is poorest of all the wireless earphones or headphones i have ever used .......everytime when i opens my phone while music is playing there is a lost of connection and the sound quality also degrads and also music lags a lot.......whenever battery goes below 20 % it notifies you with it's irritating high pitch sound......doesn't connect properly with my laptop.....you can't change songs from it's buttons.....i am using this from past 2 months all the problems are happening from the very first day.

title: Hiccups are there .
body: There is hiccup in the audio even when there is no other bluetooth devices around. When there is a bluetooth device turned on nearby, frequent hiccups are assured. Keep this in mind while making a purchase.

title: Value for money ¬• must buy
body: great in most aspects( only for music lovers )bass-9/10bass is ultimate if u r a bass lover than it's for u.PUBG player note:-not recommended for playing games for it has sound lag, which most of this budget earphones give.If want ear or headphones for gaming than this is not for u.sound quality-8/10noise cancellation 7/10the main part of noise cancellation is that it could cancel most noise like people's voice,traffic etc. but not useful against sharp noises i.e. sound of all same frequency .bluetooth connectivity-5/10very poor u an even go even 8m away but description shows 10m.overall 7.25/10BUT still great in budgetgot this for 999/- in GIF

title: Left side ear bud speaker not working within 2months time.
body: I purchased this on 29..9.2021, within 2 months of scarce usage the left side ear bud speaker is not in working condition.I purchased this for my wife.Although I purchased boat rockers neck back about more than a year the band is still in good working condition. Hope M/s Boat Rockers will either replace this two'month old one or consider servicing it at their authorised service centre at ERNAKULAM.

title: Super osm product + beast battery üîãüî•üî•
body: This is super osm product by boat in this price range. When I receive it from Amazon it's battery was 100% and then I used it for 7 hrs @50% volume after that when I checked battery percentage it was 99%. And if you are base lover plaese try it once.But one thing I not liked is its build design, extra  controller makes its design weird and if you use it for 2-3 hrs you feel pain on right side because of controller.

title: Not a consistent one, worst warranty service
body: Bought 3 and giving review after 5 months. Sound quality. Battery backup is really good. But the product quality is not at all good. And the worst part is that during warranty period, service by them. Worst service. It takes more than a month for a replacement to get. So what will happen is that 6 months it will be with you and 6 months with them. It is cheap, but you will start regretting it, when first time, it stops working, then waiting period will start and will never end

title: 4Stars only for the battery, but not satisfied for calling, Hopeless Mic
body: If you want to listen to music, podcasts, audiobooks, go for it, but if you want to attend calls? then I won't recommend this earphone, because the other person can hear a little hissing sound, I didn't like the microphone quality, but the rest is just ok. Battery is really good.

title: Poor customer care
body: Its been over a few weeks trying to reach Boat customer care to fix an issue with the bluetooth headset. Stopped charging one fine day and no response on mail or call center number. Do they expect customers to assume the product is due for replacement once it stops working??

title: Worst product and much worse service by the manufacturer
body: It stopped working within a month. then I contacted for warranty. It is now 4 months since I have returned it and haven't received yet.When I filed a complaint with consumer forum, then these people created a ticket for dispatching the product. It is now a week since that ticket was created and not yet received the product.The service phone number does not work. It take nearly 50 attempts to talk to their support team.Pathetic product, pathetic service and pathetic system of warranty.

title: Go for something else , Spend money more get a good one.
body: After using of 1 months :1. Bass is awesome.2. Battery is also good.3. The design is good but the wire is bit lengthy. It feel a little out of the neck.4. The buttons on it are horrible. Sound buttons are good but the middle can do nothing useful. It will pick up the call but u can't disconnect it from there. Also no music forwarding after two click instead it redial the last dialled no. Shitty Configuration.5. Also after a long use , i usually get a bit of headache. Its quite often. So , i use it only when i need to other times, i had to off it.

title: Outstanding sound quality. Best buy!
body: I have been using this since 3 days. Liked it, but price (1500) is a bit more. Overall its a good buy. Sound quality is great.Reviewing after 12 days of use:Don't believe in charging time of 6 hours as they said. I am literally getting not more than 3hrs. Hence, reduced my rating from 4 to 3.

title: Rockerz...Truely Rocks..Thumps Up
body: Boat Rockerz..1. Noice cancellation 4/52. Bluetooth Connectivity 4/53. Battery Backup 5/54. Call Connectivity 4/5And most important one5. Music/Songs clarity..4/5..If you install Bass Booster App and do the settings as done by me then you will get surprised by the sound output.Hence I advice to those whose main purpose of buying this earphone is to listen music, to install Bass Booster App with the equalizer settings and do the settings according to your needs which will improve sound output to the great extent..ThanksBut that app only supports some of the music players..thankfully Google play is supported by the app..

title: Frequent noise coming after few days of use .
body: Used for 3weeks now , good sound quality for few days . After that some noises began occasionally, thought it was some glitch at that time . But now it's frequently occuring , since my Return window closed , i can't able to return the product. got stuck now . Never experienced Boat product like this . Worst buy for me .

title: Returned the product once and the replaced one also had issues within 7 days.
body: I did not expect the replaced earphone for the second time also to create problems within 7 days.The voice while talking to other person was breaking and sometimes not even audible and same while listening to the downloaded songs the voice goes away for few secs and then continues playing. This was irritating. Now it will not even connect to my phone tried with 2 3 mobile phones after unpairing and pairing n no. of times, still it won't recognize.Very disappointed, i don't know if the problem is with the supplier Appario Retail Private Ltd or boat itself.Won't recommend this to anyone.

title: Honest review after 2 month continuously using
body: it has  extreme bass and a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity. It has a mindblowing battery which gives 7-8 hrs music playback time . It's mic is also good & you will not be  disappointed with the voice quality. But more than putting 2 hrs it feels very uncomfortable to me bcz of its conical buds(can be removed). It's Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in looking.It's long wires really disappointed me. Its packaging is bad.Otherwise it is a very good headphone in this price segment.  I really liked it.

title: Excellent Product
body: Exactly as per description.  Super product.  Pods fit snugly into the ear and the guide to the inside of the ear for stability.  Will remain secure with head movement associated with physical activity.  Cord lengths are good enough for big head sizes also.  Feature of magnetic connect of the two sides when not being used ensures that the accessory will not fall off when hung around the neck and not being used.  Very good sound quality.  Noise cancellation is excellent too as even when the pods are in the ear, you can barely hear the person opposite to you talking in their normal voice.

title: Awesome piece with minor probs
body: This is a great neckband... Noise always makes awesome products... I bought this neckband and the bass, sound quality, noise cancellation is very good...But it has 2 cons:1) The mic quality is not very good... The other person said my voice to be very cripsy and sometimes distorting2) The magnetic powe of the neckband is not strong...BTW I will definitely suggest someone to buy these neckband...

title: Average But bulid quality is more improve it
body: Background noise is riseing while Bluetooth is on timeAnd second think is not comfortable for this specific typeAnd change better type to flug moreEar is pain most of use this typeBass is okWire is not fluxable so improve the bulid Metrial

title: Not upto the mark
body: Sound quality is ok okNo noise cancellation it's only written material but in reality its not thereBass is ok in low volume but not for high volume listeningBluetooth range is as per product 10 meters but if you go 1 foot away from your phone or other device voice cracks or unable to hear sound or music

title: Worth it?!
body: So this Bluetooth earphone is widely bought by people because of course it fits the good budget range . And to be fair its not a bad choice altogether.But come 2/3+months and it shows the real worth .Connection drop no sound cancellation.  Abruptly hetting disconnected and the list goes endless. There's no workaround for any of these its like absolute frustrating when you are in dire need of it and it will just not connect or drop .

title: For bass lovers
body: The sound quality is crisp and a good amount of bass, in terms of comfort this comes with a metal head which will cause u pain after 2-3hours but the neckband is weightless , you will get a good noise cancellation only when the volume is above 70%, the battery backup as claimed gives a 6hrs which enough for two days, when it comes to design the wire is too long which makes a awkward look, there was no Connectivity problem if you find so please check the transmitting deviceOverall a good bluetooth earphonesBuy this only during sale days

title: Good quality Bluetooth earphones
body: I am writing this review after using the earphones for 3 months. I bought this earphone only after my uncle confirmed me about its quality. The sound quality is excellent feels as if you are in a movie theatre, the charge lasts for quite a long time. I use it daily and charge once in two days for 30-45minutes only. But the only problem is during a phone call when the voice breaks a lot and we have to switch to wired earphones. The Bluetooth range is appreciable.

title: Not expected this from Boat
body: Its good to hear music I will give it 7/10 but it keeps disconnecting once in a while I use this around 8-10 hours not continuously but taking break in between and it disconnects around 4-5 times and sometimes when I call someone I and connected to Bluetooth I can't hear someone's voice untill I disconnect and reconnect and sometimes when I receive calls while playing battle royale game and then get back to game the sound comes from speakers instead of bluetooth

title: Utterly Poor range and no auto-connectivity
body: After two months review.1) Poor Bluetooth Range: It often gets disconnected due to poor range, you even can't go to your balcony/kitchen.2) No auto connectivity and smooth Multi-connectivity: No auto-connectivity when you come back in its short range and you have to switch it on first if you hadn't connected another device with it and, if you had then you have to struggle to connect your device.3) Good bass, noice cancellation and sound quality.Earlier, I was using Boult Probass Audio, it didn't have connectivity issue though but, noise cancellation & audio quality were very poor. I bought this because of the foreign brand but, it has its own different problems.Seems like there is no bluetooth earphone within Rs1500.

title: Best
body: I was second customer  who bought this neckband and I must tell you one thing that the Quality of sound and 40 hours long battery life is what makes it different from Others. This is my 5th purchase of boat product. only con I find was YouTube getting pused and both audio on YouTube and call are not possible.

title: Overall gud need improvement Specially while connecting
body: I got shipment on time through Amazon. I hv been using this since frm 10 months. I feels gud sound quality, gud bass quality. Bt it lack in noise cancellation. On call other person can clearly hear others long surrounding noise.Plus in starting its battery backup was upto 5hr. Bt now it reduces day by day. So i hv to charge more.Also it created problem while connecting with my laptop. Every time i hv to do switch on and off regularly so that i can connect properly, sound lag occurs which is very high negative point for me.

title: Really good
body: Exceptional product at its price! Battery is a monster. Lasts all week with mild usage. Charging and Noise cancellation is also very good.What could have been better - Placement of component that houses buttons and mic.Also if it had auto off function after magnetic sides of ear buds connect, then it would have been best w/o a doubt.

title: Good for general perpose
body: Good if you are in <‚Çπ1500.. sound wuality is not superb but it cant be registered as bad. Is good but not matchable with jbl. Higher frequencies are missing and baas is not enough powerful. Actually it is serving my requirements completely as off watching movies and series. For enthuastic music listeners, this is not recommended but for routine use its is good. Battery life is for whole day with normal calls and 6-8 hour movies. Product looks sturdy and durable. Connects automatically when paired with a device earlier, sometime you have to manipulate in your ear for fitting, ear bud looks cheap though, extra 2 set of earbud are available in the box along with small usb cable

title: Not a good choice
body: Bass us good, but very poor noise cancellation. Bulky buds causing pain in ears after sometime. Battery life is not good.Compared it with boult which comes at same price. Sound quality and bass is good compared to it but  It is heavier than Boult. You will keep feeling something bulky object fitted in the ear.

title: Good product but bit expensive
body: Battery life is good but not that great, expecting bit more for this price.Sound quality nicely clear, loud and no distortion at moderate volume.Durability is good but product looks somewhat delicate so I am not sure it can handle some rough usage.Wearing comfort is good, connecting process with phone is very easy and fast.

title: Don't duy, 6 month headphone.
body: Dont buy this. It will work only for 6 months. After 6 months it will stops charging/ one side speaker will not work. You have to go for replacement, replavement product also will work for 6 months. I have same issues with 3 of my headphones.

title: It is a below average product
body: The sound quality is not good. Also it is not very user friendly when it comes to usability. The quality of material is also substandard. It looks like very cheap quality plastic and rubber used.

title: Best Bass and pure sound.
body: This bluetooth earphone is awesome. Bass is very good, I love to watch bollywood and hollywood action movies with this earphone.Truely very nice product on very low price. Battery backup is decent.

title: Disappointed üôà by BOAT
body: The output is ok but not that it could have been .There is a problem with clarity as the apple wire earphones have a much better output and clarity then these boat rockers 255.O bought it in on sept 28, 2019 and today on 13th aug 2020 they have stopped workingSo the value for money is 1 star ‚≠ê out of 5 and rest is average max 2.5 star ‚≠ê or 3 star but could have been betterAnyways disappointed with boat I guess they hoax about there product a lot but it's not worth it.Will definately not advice you to go for this one.Might be cheap as compared to others but not good at all

title: Poor bluetooth connectivity
body: Positives1.medium bass2.good battery back up3.stylish...can able to hear even in bed(it wont hurt ur ears when u r lying by side)Negatives1.very poor bluetooth connectivity.if u keep ur fone in one room and if u walk away to another room with headset,then it will get disconnected..2.the wires are too long.so while walking it is little bit annoying by swinging.that too it touches the belly3.when the battery gets lower,a very annoying sound keeping on repeating(its irritating..my previous headset mivi thunderbeats wont do this)4.bad noise cancellation...it will clearly absorb all sounds at outer area.so while travelling in bike or in outdoor, opponents cant able to hear ur voice properly

title: Go for it...
body: Bought it last week didn't charged it once still 40% charge left used it for almost near to 20 hoursAt this price range (1400) there's no other alternative for boat rockers 255pro+Sound quality - 4.5/5Bass - 4/5Battery -10/5 üòÇProduct quality - 4.3/5Connectivity - 5/5If you're looking for a Bluetooth earphone with good battery backup and above average sound quality at this range this is one for you

title: The product is bad and not usable.
body: I bought the product on 6th May 2021.  Sorry to say that the product is not working properly.  Person on the other side is unable to hear my voice.  One of my friend bought the same product 3 days back and he is also having the same complaint.  The voice is not clear, speakers are not working properly, the mike is not clear.  Didn't expect such a product from boAt.  The product is not giving its basic value, functionwise.  Please look into the matter urgently.

title: Not good
body: I have been using this product since 3 months. Initially it was working fine but now the bluetooth connection breaks automatically with the phone. Tried switching off and on several times, it's not working fine. Not recommended. Even I dont know where to complain since I dont find a service centre. Would request amazon to provide me assistance with boat rockers service centre

title: Works only with in warranty time
body: After using 11 months ,left side cable lose contact ,Got replacement ,After 10 months replaced ear-phone left side cable lose contact ,So it works only with in  warranty time,previously i have wired one ,it is also same problem, Sound quality was good

title: Overall average product.
body: The build quality is not upto the mark the wire quality is not so good, realme buds wireless and one plus buds are even better build and presence. The battery percentage is showing 100 even after 4 hours of use and then suddenly it directly drops 20 percent of battery no exact battery percentage shows with time.

title: Damm Awesome Earphones
body: This neckband is damm awesomeLook and colour is niceVery clear and loud soundBass boosted...if u r bass lover then definitely go for itOne of its best feature is Fast chargingFast bluetooth pairingNoise cancellation is also goodI like this neckband specially for crystal clear sound and high bassU should go for it üëçüëç

title: Okay, need to improve..
body: Need to improve: -*All of sudden it is showing battery down, 80% to 20%* The design of product need to improve, it is not exactly fitting in the ears..*Overall everything is good..Sound , quality, bass everything is good, I'm giving 5/3 ratting..

title: Give some online help about to replacement/ return/ repair of the product.
body: The product sound quality and bass quality is good but after 20 days it suddenly stops working. Now,  It is neither charging nor connected to my phone. I can't able to return/replace the product due to expiry of replacement period. It still have 1 year warranty but how can I change without visiting its workshop as there is no option for return/ replacement on online portal. My money is wasted for this product. So, I'm suggesting not to purchase boat products.

title: Worst noise cancellation
body: The earphones sound quality is ok, but when used as headphones for calling purpose, the other person keeps on complaining about the sound quality. Checked the same and found noise cancellation of the earphones is very poor.Very disappointed with the product.

title: A generic toy with a brand label
body: Just okay, not as advertised.Bass: 4/10Sound: 6/10Comfy level: 7/10I thought I‚Äôd get a deep pounding bass, but that was not the case. I thought the sound would be crisp and clear, well, it was up to some extent just as you would expect in a generic brand, but not even close to that of JBL‚Äôs.Bottom line: I regret the choice I made.

title: Good
body: Excellent battery backup/charging is super FAST / Bass quality is good, I do not know if there is many of settings on this. easy to connect via Bluetooth.My usage is very high in terms of talking over the phone, I use FULL day with a maximum over the phone.

title: "Nice product" & " Great service by boat"
body: Everything is just awesome except the noise cancellation microphone while talking on calls ....it catch surrounding noise more then person's voice................From here i write it after 1 year of use:- My product get damage after 11 month of use one side Earphone is not working. But nothing worrys me because it has 1 year replacement warranty so i registed complaint on boat website they provide me door to door replacement option however i have to wait for near 25 days and finally i get my new earphone.I am totally impressed with boat service so i definitely recommend boat product to you all .

title: Not Efficient

title: Good pair of Bluetooth earphone however not useful for RUNNING. And cannot be Stored in any case.
body: Disclaimer: This is big detailed review.Bluetooth Earphones are of good quality. Sweat and water-resistant. Charging time is ~40 minutes. Works for 4-5 hours use straight. And can be on standby mode for 6-8 hours. Hence overall covers 10-14 hours usage initially if you are migrating from good pain of wired earphone like jbl cs100si or scheniser CX180 you will feel its sound somewhat different with extra base. However, you can control sound profile using installing Equilizer app from play store.However, one thing is important this is not that much suitable for runners. When I start running with them its neckband and battery unit starts oscillating over my neck. Earbuds remain fix on ears due to the extensions provided with it however this neckband and battery units are not at all that much stable.So if you are planning to use these for day to day use then this is great Bluetooth earphone. But if you are trying to pair them while running then this is not at all a suitable match.In addition, the design is such that after wearing them around neck cables creates a sharp bend near the battery unit which is a matter of concern and can cause Bluetooth Earphones to go bad in short time.I almost forgot about keys provided on the neckband. These are great, tactile and highly responsive. Google Assistant also works flawlessly with the help of them. Range wise if you are in the same room around 10-12 feets distant from mobile then these earphones works best. After that, if you increase distance further or change room and go to the next room some glitches in sound occurs.I almost forgot about one thing the storage for these earphones. It is very difficult to store them in any container or box as compared to any other wired earphone which you can wrap and place in any box or pouch. Hence as you cannot wound it you have to always wear them on the neck. No other option, you cannot just slip them in the last pocket of your backpack as this can cause harms to cables. This is almost annoying for me every time.

title: To claim warranty

title: Not really worth it
body: I used it for 2 days and I'm not really happy with this product. I purchased this to find something good in budget but it came out to be total waste. Guys if you are looking for something good in wireless, try to increase your budget a little bit higher. You will definitely find something good.The mic is the worst. I'd give it a 1/5. There is zero noise cancellation. The person hearing your voice can barely tolerate it. Do not get this product if you are gonna use it for calling as well. You even have to use voice chat at the time of gaming and it gets really annoying for them.The feel of product is decent. But the wire is incredibly long, feels weird while wearing it.I have attached images, i have used an A4 sheet for size reference.You can't wear it for longer time. The earpiece is huge and bulky. If you wear it more than an hour, it starts paining. It's not really comfortable plus it's made up of metal, it is a bit heavy.It looses connection often or you hear distortion/breakage of sound when you are traveling. You have to keep your device very close to you otherwise the sounds start breaking. You can't even use it across the room.It doesn't really have a good bass, the bass is okayish; 3/5. You can play around with equalizer to get a slight bass, other than that, it doesn't really have any bass considering it has 10mm drivers and that "super extra bass".The battery was fine until it reached 50-60%. The rest drained within 10 minutes of usage. It charges quickly though.I recieved a small charging cable and 2 pairs of earbuds (image)The packaging was average. It didn't damage the product but the cover was dented a bit, it could have been better with some protection.Sound: 3/5Noice cancellation (sound): 4/5Bass: 2.5/5Comfort: 2/5Mic: 1/5Noice cancellation (mic): 1/5Product feel: 4/5Delivery: 4/5Feel free to ask quarries

title: Conectivity dissapointing, design of earpeace flawed
body: Overall:  Decent product, not worth the cost.Issues below are experience over 1 week of using the product on iPhone 6.Pros: Sturdy material, flexible behind the neck strap and wire quality durable and tangle free. Good battery life.Cons: The device does not have good Bluetooth connectivity. If your phone is more that one foot away from you, the sound gets cut off very often. For example, if you have your phone in your handbag/backpack/pocket, you can expect multiple cut offs, especially while moving (walking, using a scooter/motorcycle). If you move further away you need to be in direct sight of the phone for continuous music (if you turn your back to the phone or if there is any obstruction (not even a wall, a bathroom stall door is all it takes) the music gets cut off. Not sure if it is just my piece but this is very frustrating.The ear pieces have magnets so that it connects around your neck when not in use, however this makes each ear piece heavier, as a result if you are using smaller in-ear buds, they tend to fall out due to the weight of the ear piece. This becomes a hassle while working out, particularly jogging/running.

title: Don't Buy. All Show, but poor performance.
body: The headphone looked awesome over the internet. It looks grey physically too... But it has the worst performance of any headphones that I have used. First of all, it does not connect properly to phones. It takes a lot of time to get discovered.Sound quality is ok, but when listening to music, clarity is not there at all. JBL or Skull candy is far far better than this. Even when connected, when I am receiving a call, it is making some robotic sound, hence the voice of the caller is not at all clear. Initially I thought it may be due to low charge or network congestion. But even with a full charge and strong network it does that.The mouthpiece is also of a very poor quality. People complain that they are unable to hear my voice, when in reality I am literally shouting at this end.Also the ear buds are uncomfortable.So all in all, please refrain yourself from buying this crap. Instead go for any other headphones.

title: Best for 1k

title: Conquers the competition...
body: Build: Well designed, lightweight and comfortable. The wires are good and not flimsy, wearing comfort is well maintained, better than Mi bluetooth earphones( the main competitor of boAt in the 1499 price category).Comfort: As mentioned above, these earphones are really comfortable, fits in the ear with no chance of slipping out (unless you're trying desperately and internationally). They're lightweight, so no hazard on that department. Perfect for long hours of music playback.Sound: The most important aspect of an earphone is the sound clarity, and boAt surely doesn't disappoint here as well. A bit base heavy but the sound is clear, crisp and loud. Good noise cancellation also helps to isolate the music playback. Although, judging from a pure audiophile's point of view, the Mi bluetooth earphones might have a more balanced sound signature, but boAt, being a bit base heavy, is just awesome for hip-hops or Bollywood genres. A music player with a good equalizer (preferably Poweramp for android) is going to elevate the listening experience even more.Battery: A single charge gives about 6-7 hours of music playback, which is decent enough, and full charge takes roughly about 1-1.5 hours.Verdict: In a nutshell, boAt Rockerz 255 is worth the price tag and then some. With it's better build quality, comfort, bluetooth range, it packs more punch than it's competition. For the extreme purists, the sound signature might be a bit turn off, but for most people, even for people with good ears, this is going be a great experience.

title: Best in the range and solid built.

title: Good for the price
body: Sound quality is more than commensurate with the price, esp if one likes it bass heavy.Blutooth pairing is so painful at first that I almost returned the item to Amazon. But once my devices got paired somehow, the experience is seamless.The isolation (noise cancellation) is better than expected. One has to be careful while using this in a public place, because it cuts you off from almost all ambient noise.The best part of course is the lightweight yet sturdy construction, battery life (5-6 hrs), ear comfort and seamlessness. Range (7-8m) and sound quality are acceptable for the price.At INR 1499, this is good value for money.

title: Unreliable below average product.

title: Pathetic experience
body: Worst experience, in few months use I was so obsessed with the quality and use of the headset but after few months i got issues with wired disconnect issues and one earpiece got damanged, then after registering complaint, I got repaired even after asking for replacement, then within 3mnth again gpt same issues, this time when I asked for registering complaint, the service centre asked me to visit the centre cox there is no online pickup in metro cities, another option he gave for parceling the same to mumbai ofc on my charge, I don't know what is the use of replacement and warranty then? Although 3mnths left in warranty over period, and second time issues and worst customer service.I would never recommend anyone in future.

title: Good product in its price range

Product is good, base quality, sounds cancellation is good the only issue I faced in this model is, when some one call me they complaints that my voice is coming very low although sound is at its max. Otherwise product is good as per the budget range. You can go for it.

title: Not satisfied first time at amazon

title: Best in this price range

title: A headphone with good sound but poor noise cancellation
body: Sound quality is really good and charging-discharging speeds as claimed by the manufacturer. But when on call other person hear noises (sounds of vehicles passing by, clicking noise from ceiling fan) way more louder. I used to crack this joke 'maybe thay have fit noise cancellation hardware inverted as it's enhancing and not cancelling' on every call.Since my jobs demands me to be on call everyday I won't buy this earphones again.

title: Awesome product!
body: Very happy with the product. Been using it for last one month. Pairing in seconds. Sound quality is pretty good. I mostly use it for listening to music from Spotify/ Gaana. It comes with 3 different sizes of plug. I changed to small one which fits well in my ears. The legs are rubbery and very flexible so sits in the ear properly. Go for it!!

title: Harsh sound
body: It‚Äôs looks very ordinary. I doubt it‚Äôs durability .  Quality of sound is little bit harsh. MRP on product is 2990, for its quality price should be 499.

title: Nice wireless earphone within Rs 1000/-
body: Thanks to Amazon for timely delivery!I am writing this review after 3 days usage, Sound quality is good,not very loud,good Bluetooth connectivity and comfortable to ears for long usage. But battery backup of this headphone disappoints.I have used this in mild rain also and it works perfectly fine. Heavy bass lovers may not like this, otherwise within Rs.1000/- with a one year replacement warranty it is a good option.

title: Awesome Product. No regret
body: I didnt want to buy. But I saw a lot of reviews and feedback about this earphones. So i finally I ordered and trust me I didnt regret. Awesome sound quality with high bass. People who like more bass definitely u shoukd go for it. Battery back up is also good. If u r sports person the hooks on earphones does it work fabulously. It dont allow to come out of ur ears.Cons:1. Bluetooth range should have been more2. Battery back up should have been more.

title: Low product quality
