title: Honest Review - Average Headset
body: Hi,This is a average quality headset. But in this price range I would say it is a good buy for sure.Pros:1. Very good battery backup. Last 6-7 hours on a average use.2. Build quality is good. Fit perfectly to the ears.3. Connects two device at a time. Connects easily.4. Less charging time.5. Very comfortable to wear.Cons:1. Sound quality is average. Don't expect much. You have to use equaliser otherwise no use.2. Call quality is not good. It could be better3. Connectivity issue if your mobile device is far from your headaet, even while your mobile device in pocket, sometime you will observe connectivity issue.Verdict- Well if you are a great music lover and if you are looking for a headset which has great sound quality than this is not a ideal device for you. However, if you want to use this device casually on a day to day basis like join meetings or gym etc than this a most value for money deviceThanks,Sourav

title: No Call Vibration Functionality
body: The product I received is not the new product. It was opened and used. Resealing was manually. Do not what kind of sellers are registered in Amazon. Ideally this product can be listed under refurbished products.In terms of products reviews, still there is opportunity to work improve bass quality. There is no call vibration facility available.

title: Basically garbage

The rubber casing came loose on one end after a month of use and i use it with the wire dangling out of the casing now. Not happy with this purchase. Then again, they didnt cost too much.

title: This doesn't have an active noise cancellation as mentioned in features.
body: Please do not buy this product. This doesn't have an active noise cancellation as mentioned in features. During call and sending audio messages, very much of surrounding noise disturbance is there. Even the sound of my friends from the other room is also being detected in audio messages and call. But active noise cancellation feature is added in their features list. Sound quality and bass are nice. Dual pairing is not that much smooth.

title: Value for money for sure !
body: Music - better than boultBass- better than boultBuild quality - better than boultBattery - better than boultCall handling - boult is betterErgonomics - boult is betterEar comfort - boult is better

title: Unintuitive
body: While the performance itself isn't bad it lacks basic intuitive features like switching off automatically when the buds are magnetically connected like on the Oneplus bullets. This feature goes a long way when you're constantly on calls. The long press to switch off/on is not handy especially since it doesn't have auto switch on/off.I'd rather shell out a couple hundred bucks more for the OnePlus bullets just for the intuitiveness.

title: Try for alternate upgrades is boat
body: I bought this @1500 , product is good by quality but it will work for 6-7 months only. I got a neck wire issue which is unable to resolved. Its also a sweat proof but after daily use I got wire issue. Battery life and sound quality is very much appretiated. No Noise cancelation.

title: After just a month.. Burnt on charging
body: Sound quality is awesome but today I had kept it on charging & the side on which there is the charging port & other buttons... the headset melted & it's not even working now. Melted on charging... it became so hot that it could not be touched. Posting a photo so that all can see. 1 star coz of poor quality of material & build which melts in a month when just kept for charging

title: Rest all is okay but battery backup
body: Not really impressed..Sound, Bass, Noise cancellation all is just okay like every other good quality headphones.. One extra Star‚≠ê I gave for longer battery life and better bluetooth connectivity with good range..

title: Best earphone
body: One of the best earphone with good sound balance with Bass and treble. Earbuds and comfortable, it hurts initially, you need to fix it properly on the ears. I was able to take up call without any distortion. The people in the other side were able to listen without any background sound.  I haven't checked the battery life. I hope it should provide at least 6 hrs.This is my second earphone from Boat. Boat is rocking. Listening the music through OnePlus 7 !!

title: My honest review
body: The earphones are great for casual use, I prefer some other earphones for running, training cause the wire is heavy and keeps banging onto my neck it's the worst feeling, the ear hooks are flimsy so it's not having great stability.Sound-4/5Quality -4/5Comfort-3/5For training-2.5/5

title: Budget earphone ü§ó

title: Too high bass makes the music feel trash
body: Honest review if you love bass then it's good but it's not the thumping bass it's literally an unbalanced bass which makes ur head shook. Moreover sound quality deteriorates just coz of this bass and charging speed is normal not a fast charger. And battery capacity is good not that gr8 but acceptable. At the end for a price range of 999 it's a good deal but could have been better if the quality of bass is improved.

title: Not for audiophiles
body: Its got good bass. but it range for  treble or Mid range is lacking.If You are audiophile.. You will notice it's lacking. Just one day into use.Did some tests... Yes, it lacks in higher frequencies.However with equalizer it helps a bit.Built wise good.. And will last long

title: Battery life is a beast. (With lower volume)
body: I am writing my review after using it for 4 days nonstop. Battery has been proving to be the best pro side of the earphones.I am using earphones mostly for music and some calling feature.Microphone is good and so is audio clearity to other person.With 4 days of continue use mostly in daytime (less than 10 hour a day) it stands at 40% battery and i assume it can last 6 days with less usage with ease. Would recommend to buy if you hate wired eaephones.Sound quality is upto the mark and its comfortable to leave around your neck, you dont feel the weight.

title: Worst for caller's because of noise cancellation is zero

It's worst of purchase so don't waste your money.... Now my return of replacement window is also close so plz don't do mistake of buying it.... Genuine review..also disconnecting again and again from blutooth....  Magnet is not much strong.....waste of money

title: On bike call receivers purchase this.noise cancellation is available
body: I am fan of mi sportz but there is noice cancellation issue while riding bike front person cant here any thingNow i purchased I used boat rokers RS 999 in offerI suggest to buy bike riders its good call quality.i tested  on 50km/hr also the front pserson here clearlyOn bike several people want noice cancellation bluetooth head set so buy this oneBattery is around approx 6hr not checked in depth.On Bike call  receiving is easy thanks for boat.

title: Pathetic product
body: Third class product. Got the first one that had battery issues. Like the battery just lasted for 1-2 hrs. Then placed a replacement order and again got a defective product which was not pairing with any of my apple devices.First one paired smoothly with iphone and my macbook but had battery issuesSecond one has good battery life when connected to android phone but unable to connect to my iphone or macbookPathetic product

title: Worst Sound and Poor mic
body: Sound quality is very poor no bass at all. Looking good but in terms music experience which is the real purpose of headphone is like street side product which usually available near metro. Honestly I had a not good experience with Boat. So if wants you buy this product for just a show piece or decorate your neck then go ahead.I initiated this product for Return and Refund.

title: Pathetic service and product
body: This head set does not even last for 3 months. Replacement comes with lot of conditions. Their service center is pathetic and unapologetic. Head set gets heated up or melts will charging even in laptop charging its heats. Other products like JBL, Samsung, Sony are more nicer than and respond well. I FEEL HAVE WASTED 1600 AND TIME AND MONEY SPENT FOR REPLACEMENT

title: Average Headset
body: Just an average budget headset.Good budget Bluetooth headset .Sony, JBL and any branded headset users don not buy this.You will be disappointed.I would say everything is average and not bad.I was using Sony and so not much satisfied.Worth only for 999 and not more than that.

title: Great experience.
body: It fullfills all requirement of music lover, action movie lovers, those who talk for long and those who listens audio books.Bass is high, it depends on choice. But it doesnt kill trebel, mid and high tones so listening is wonderful experience.Connectivity is very fast and battery backyup is 6hrs+ in playtime.Rest all is good.

title: Used product
body: The item I received was used and was in not working condition. I placed a replacement request and it turned out to be absolute scam. The pick up/delivery agent marked as I rejected the replacement but the actual situation was that he was not able to create the request at his end. By end of everything I had to create a return request.Please do not furnish the customers with the used products. It‚Äôs really very annoying to receive the used products despite paying the full charge.

title: Great for Music listening ; But not for taking calls.
body: Listening to Music: 8/10The sound quality of the earphones is good. The bass sounds are slightly over boosted; which may annoy some of the listeners. Bass lovers can buy without hesitation.Connecting Calls: 6/10The call quality is disappointing. The inbuilt mic is not that great. The other person's voice that we hear during a call is also slightly distorted when compared with the call without Bluetooth earphones.Over all build quality is good.

title: Good quality only for 2months. Later it is again a waste of money.
body: The quality of the product was overall good but it's been just 2months of use and already one ear has stopped working. If u really don't want to waste money then don't buy this product becoz by 2 to 3 months you'll also face the same problem. And the waranty is just for name sake as u can't get it fixed anyhow. Think before spending so much. If the product works in good condition only for 2 months then u can buy many other brands which are actually cheaper and also good in quality. And even  if that product stops working you can buy two of those  in the money spent for this product so basically that would last much longer than this.

title: Worst Battery Backup
body: Playing one song at 80% battery terribly drains in just 2 songs.  While in drowned in the music, you can hear the Boat Rockers Music Director sayings " Opps Battery Low".  Make it beep then playing the most every awkward heard posing american accent. Utterly disappointed. Guys go for JBL. It seems to be Quoted Indian version of Xi Jinping portrayed as made in India.

title: Honest review after 6 month use
body: I purchased this earphone on 29 September 2019. Sound quality is good, also bluetooth connectivity is good. After full charge it will work for maximum 3-4 hrs. But I don't recommend it. Today, on 4 April 2020 one side of earphone stop working. Though it has 1 year warranty period can't claim warranty now due to lockdown period üòïüòï. Let's see what happened.

title: Value for money
body: I bought them for around 1200 in salePros :-Awesome sound qualityBeast battery backup (Boat is lying about 6hrs backup as i have already used them for a movie and 1 hr call and 30-40 songs and overall usage for more than a day and still 60% battery left)Support Buds for earphones do good work for holding on the earphones in earVoice and beats are very clearCall quality is satisfactoryBuild quality is superb.Splash proofCons:-Support earbuds start causing pain in ear for long use but thank god they are removableStrap around the neck is good but strap goind towards buds is quite thin. Handle with careSmall range as it is 4.1 Bluetooth with less than 10m coverage

title: Best product...
body: I bought this product September of 2019. Used almost all the time in a day, In gym, college, while on travel. Its 100% sweat proof. And was used roughly and today one side of speaker stopped working, the problem was rough usage in the wired area. Battery backup is execellent. I used to charge it once in 2 days. If u give care to the wired region while using the prdct would last more 3 years..

title: Superior quality for music
body: Sound and bass quality is superior in price 999 as I bought during festive offers but noise cancellation is not good means not this any neckband I ever used even Samsung level u or u flex bault curve, every single neckband didn't give you noise cancellation whenever you are crowded with few people who were chattering, then the listener will also hear their voice which is more disturbing and that's why you have to put off your neckband for just to talk them for long conversation but if you are almost alone and your place is quite then this is the best neckband and if you want to buy it only for music then go for it it's amazing bass and sound quality will amaze you with it's superior quality sound.

title: not good sound..Not recommonded
body: Except the looks and battery backup i think nothing is good. Sound is of below average quality...after listening to sony i applied this and i could not fathom why such good ratings..rather try out philips/sony wired earphones guys..could not return as packaging was thrown by maid..üò™

title: Amazing (try to get it under 1000)
body: I use two Bluetooth earphones ( boat and boult).And both have good sound quality, high bass. Good competition.But i personally recommend boult wireless earphones on the basis of convenience to use ( coz wires came from behind the neck).At sound level both are amazing.

title: UPER POOR QUALITY
body: DO NOT BUY THIS ONLINE AT ALL. Pls include option of negative rating as well. This deserves a - 10.It did not last even for 20 days. The thing got disintegrated on its own like a sci fi gadget ....utterly poor quality. Surely it was a duplicate piece. Pls blacklist the vendor at once since the company is earning a bad name .

title: Manufacturing defect in this product, please avoid buying
body: There is a manufacturing defect with this product. I have been in touch with BOAT . They replaced it once but the replaced product has same issue (when both ear buds are connected together magnetically, music still comes through them).BOAT hasn't responded to my email that is sent a week before. Hoping to get a refund!

title: Nice product
body: Boat rockers is a good quality earphone for this price range. Because most of the companies providing the similar earphone at double the price. I got this product at Rs 999 and l am very happy with this product. Having 4-5 hr battery backup and it charge quickly.When I am listening music it will withstand up to 5 hrsWhen I am using for audio call it will withstand nearly 3-3.5 hrAlso I can watch a complete movie with out any doubt.And I found few disadvantages like, when you are listening music continually for hours during the journey and you keep your mobile inside your bag, then some times the music will suddenly stops and after some time it will become connected.Also it is a very bass boosted product

title: Honest owner opinion. Replaced twice in 8 months due to the fault in earbuds
body: Honest owner opinion:Sound quality - 3/5Sound quality is better than JBL/sony wireless within this price range.Bluetooth connectivity- 2/5It takes long time to connect automatically. More often need to connect by clicking on device name.Same for multiple devices. Does not auto connect to more than 1 device.Note: within 8 months I have replaced it twice. Over the period headphone's right side has stopped working. Then the left side.Customer care was not helpful throughout the process. Boat sent me new packed earphones in replacement. In next 3 months same thing happened again. And right side of the earphone stopped working.

title: After 10 days rough use
body: 10 days after replacement ..Build quality 3/4* (ok quality but not look premium)Sound quality 4/5* (great not deep bass but good enough to enjoy your songs)Battery 3.5/5* (3 to 4 hrs on playback , enough for a normal day use ) (on Standby great backup)Noice cancelation 4/5* (no one can easily disturb you)Durability 3.4/5* (very rough using but didn't found any sign of damage let see how long)Comfortable in üëÇ ear with hook 2.5/5* (painful) 3/5* without hook

title: Low quality product.
body: It has very bad connection issues and as the time goes by the sound quality decreases that is usage of only 15 days( Bought on 7th November 2021) . The product is not switching on and if by luck it switches on will last for 5mins and then disconnects.A request not to buy this product.

title: Bad Quality
body: It is not coming more than 6 months even after replacing warren also it came another 4 months lifeBut warren replacement was happened one time happy for thatOverall unhappy with productPlz improve quality of the product as u know the cost of product is not lessIt should meat the customer expectations

title: Really a good product. Worth the money only if bought in some sale/dicount.
body: Its a great product. would have beeen better if the charging port was type-C, but its not the case. the micro usb charging port is a bit delicate. Also the ear buds are kindof a bit bigger than the regular wiered earphones, thus long time usage results in pain in the ear. the battery life is good only if u are closer to the decive connected.; if ur connected device is a bit far away (eg-in other room) then the battery drains pritty fast.

title: Good Quality and value for the money
body: Fast delivery by Amazon. Just 2 days. Item received just today.First impression is soo well and i feel its worth the amount i paid for this item. The bass is good. It fits in the ears properly.Only i found a very little negativity is that the length of the cable. It just pops out of my shirt/Tshirt, feels little uncomfortable. Else everything is perfect with this product. 4.5/5

title: Just an average product.
body: Okay so the service was great. But the earphones didn't last, only in 4 and a half months later it's not taking charge. I've tried using different cables and adapters but nothing helped. Sadly due to the lockdown I'm not even able to have it repaired by the service center. The product is extremely unreliable, sound and bass are not TOO good if you're a edm or bass lover. Bluetooth connectivity range is pretty low, the voice gets distorted. Also the build quality, the wires keep hanging in front which is really awkward sometimes. A product like this at a price range of 1.3k is alot.

title: Doesn't deserve to be rated.
body: The 1st time when I received the product, it had scratches on it. The product looked tampered. Hence placed a request for a return.  The 2nd time when I received the product, it did not work at all. The boat DIST/dealer sent a DOA product. Such an awful QC. I didn't expect as I am already using their other products and had respect for the brand. I doubt whether I will buy any product of this brand in the future.

title: Kept disconnecting in calls
body: A decent wireless headphones. Doing quality and bass was ok. Obviously in this price range it was good. However it didn‚Äôt worked for me as the Bluetooth kept disconnecting in all calls and also the other party voice used to sound robotic, it used to be unrecognisable. Hence I had to return the headphones and now looking for some other headphones.

title: Just ok product. Otherthan bass quality nothing great about
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Bass is extremely good. No doubt. mic clarity is very poor, especially during outside. Mic noise cancelation is not effective. Ear buds are comfort enough and completely conceals the ears so during driving you should use only one side, otherwise you cannot hear the other vehicles horns etc., After usage for some long time of 1hr or so it pains in the ears. Battery back up is 4 to 5hrs hardly. Please be careful that once battery charge comes down to 20%, it switches off...bluetooth connectivity range is very short.

title: Good on pocket friendly budget.
body: Had purchased 02 Rockerz 255 earlier and gifted it to my colleagues, they were impressed, so during the Amazon Sale purchased another 02 and gifted them to my other colleagues, they too were happy with the products, all 04 of them are very satisfied with my choice and now they approach me for any purchases related to electronics.

title: An SUV ran over the earphones, but still working!
body: Let me tell you this, I've used Bose, Beats, Sennheiser, Audio technika, JBL, Skullcandy, boAts and many tens of top and mid level brands. But I'm a fan of boAts for their Price - Satisfaction ratio and used many of their products and never was disappointed.Bought these earphones, I liked the build as soon as I saw them, loved the thumping bass when I tested it with multiple songs, loved the audio clarity too.And then an amazing thing happened.I was wearing them and was riding my motorcycle a bit faster and they blew away. An SUV drove over it. I thought I lost the earphones. But when I put the buds in my ear, songs were still playing as loud, as clear as ever.Button areas were damaged so badly but still, working perfect. I did not find any problem till now. I'm loving it.Perfect value of money.*I wish I could have a replacement*

title: Poor connectivity.
body: I am writing this review after replacement headsets. First worked for few days then started playing up. Keeps disconnecting and breaks in between video plaly,  audio play regardless online or offline. Today is the first day of replacement piece and it's ditto same,  every few minutes keeps saying" You are now connected to boatrockers" and shows 100% battery available???  Amazing how on earth it can stay 100 % even after few hours usage?  I am returning this back and would take refund and not replacement this time. It is very annoying exeperince.

title: Need to be more enthusiastic and punctual..
body: 1..Product is duplicate..2.. Sound quality is very bad3.. boat rockerz 255 earphone box is different ( box is not original )4.. When we turn on the earphone it says 'POWER ON '. But the original Boat rockerz 255 earphone says " Welcome to boat rockerz 255 " Something like that5.. sellers  may try to deceive people but people trust on " Amazon " so it's duty of  "Amazon Service provider " ( Everyone who works for Amazon ) to make sure that we are providing a good service/product to the Customer..6..I have applied for return request Thrice and still No one has come to pick up the product..( pick up time has been increased three times )7..I am happy to being a Part of Amazon8..Being a part of Amazon, I request everyone (every person working for Amazon) to be more enthusiastic than before  and try to provide best service.Thanking you,Yours Sincerely,Mr. Divyaraj Dipak Gonde

title: Buy this without hesitation
body: Really cool earphone... But within a year you'll face issue of one side or sometimes both side... As you got warranty you'll get new one... But replacement process also takes long time...Except this sound quality, bass are really good, noise cancellation is not that good...

title: Nice product
body: This is nice product. Using this for 2 months now. Best feature of this product is it gets connected with 2 devices at same time. I use this with my laptop n mobile at same time n this device is intelligent enough to start voice of laptop calls or mobile calls based on call which gets first. Overall battery life last for 8 hrs but fast charging helps as it takes 45 mns only. Overall a nice product

title: Recommend in Bluetooth headphones
body: The product is amazing when it comes to sound quality and the material used in the making.It works decently at it's low pricing but the pannel of buttons on the headphones have stopped responding which as caused the Mic to not work as well.But still the songs play well with any issues.....

title: Spoilt in 3 months. Don't buy
body: Went bad in 3 months. Makes transmitter like noise when switched on & doesn't power off.  Keeps making this noise till the battery drains. Very frequently disconnects. Suddenly will power off in the middle of a call.

title: Very worst quality and I think it is defected copy product.
body: Very worst quality and I think it is defected product. The seller cheated me with the dublicate product. Very poor sound quality call experience. I think it was not boat it is copy product.I used the same boat heatset from my frnd it was awsome. I inspired from him and bought this product.. But it was worst in sound quality. I never no where is the problem araised. But I was cheated.... ü•∫ü•∫üò≠üò≠üò≠

title: Detailed review based on my usage experience
body: 1 week and no issue still eligible for replacement. Nice product when I've bought this it came with battery 100% charged. Easily give you upto 5.5 hrs of playback. Bluetooth range is not that good I mean if you always need to go away from your device from where you are playing this earphones then you will find that, range is not that good but if you aren't go away from device like you use it while using laptop or you use it with mobile phone and while listening you keep your phone in pocket or in simple words if you are not going away from it then it is best for you but for people who needs more range then this is not for you. Talking about sound quality nice little bit bass boosted but you will love it. Noise cancellation works fine.

title: Keeps slipping off
body: No radio access. Just plays audio of any video which is playing. Uncomfortable ear plugs. Keeps slipping. If pushed tightly, head and neck pains. Very good sound quality and noise cancellation when it remains in the ear.

title: Poor Connection quality
body: Voice breaks in between and sometimes we can't even hear on the call.The cap for charging cable has a sensitive joint which can break after usage for a few weeks.Sound quality, otherwise, is fine.

title: Horrible product
body: Horrible product with mic issues on call. The customer service is even worse. The customet service number is unavailable for last 5 days. There has been no update on the replacement of the headphone. They picked up the product the next day with no replacement or any update on when the product will be replaced. It has been 10 days that I am trying to get in touch with the customer service but the number is either unavailable or the office is closed.The sound quality is ok but the bluetooth connectivity and on-call mic is not working at all.

title: Excellent product
body: Hey folks , I initially made a choice of buying it in store where the price was ‚Çπ2.5k but then thought to try in amazon coz it had 7 days replacementI received the day after I orderThis is amazing perfect bass,sound cancellation, lite ,comfortable 5/5although it's lil expensive than other bluetooths but completely worthBattery backup is superb ,just go for it if u really need the best

title: Stopped working after 10 months
body: I am writing this review after 10 months,After 10 months 1 earpiece is now not working,Now I can't do anything,no warranty now...Now I have to buy again another product ..Now about sound quality is good,bass is good but noise cancellation is not enough and battery is worst and unpredictable...Now I recommend dont go for it,

title: Headphones are good with best quality
body: Headphones are goodBass 4.5Noise cancellation 5.0Durability 4.5Battery life 4.5After use of 2 months I'm writing this reviewLeft side of headphones is not working so I've returned the product to boAt.PS- I've already returned the damage product to Amazon seller so be careful while buying the product

title: Please don't waste your money buying this product
body: So its a complete made in china product. For initial period of 10 -15 days it was working good. After that 1st battery backup started decreasing then after few more days it started behaving strangly getting off automatically. Now the situation is that it gets off as soon as i turn it on .Worst cheap quality product.!!!!!!!!Do not recommend it to anyone!!!!!!!!

title: if you are confused between new and old version
body: this headphone is really great if you are confused between old and new model then definitely go with this modelthis model have super sound and quality bass and its charge less than 1 hour so its plus point of this headphone . i only hate one thing about this headphone is whe i increases volume till the end headphone says "maximum volume"so its very disturbing for meotherwise headphone is good its worth product

title: Don't Go for it...it's a genuine review
body: I don't know if anyone will read this...but if anyone does...please do not buy this earphones now....it is too outdated + the sound quality is not at all good and neither is the bass quality as mentioned in the titleI buyed it on 30th June 2020 and I'm regretting it as it has Bluetooth 4.1 which is like 2 years old...My suggestion - go for its pro version rockerz 255 pro...it's ‚Çπ500 expensive but worth it...or if your budget doesn't allow you to go that much then go for jbl infinity glide...it has both good vocals and a descent base...Hope it helps....

title: AWESOME SOUND...BUT MOST BAKWAS SERVICE OF BOAT... DONT BUY
body: Sound of the headphone is superb, super punchy bass, everything was excellent but after using the product for 5 months one side of the ear is not working. Raise a complain request to Boat and on very next day one pickup executive from Delhivery came and picked up my headphone. From that day I have repeatedly trying to contact with the service centre but nobody attending my call... PURA CHINA KA MAAL HAI BHAI, "AFTER SALE SERVICE" KA KOI GUNJAISH HI NAHI.. I strongly won"t recommend Boat so far service is concern. Rest up to you...PEACE

title: Good sound quality at a reasonable price
body: The sound is average not that good as compared to JBL and some other great brands. The bass is more but treble is less. If u travel on a bike or cycle and wind is blowing at a higher speed then there is lag in Bluetooth connection. Overall good at the price of 999. If you want great quality sound go for JBL or boult or Bose.

title: Boat rocker rocks....
body: Great earphones.. i got it during diwali sale for 1k... And I'm using it since then.. sound and bass is great.. battery life is good too. Play back time is nearly 7hours and charges quite fast too.. looks smart... U can go for it if you want a Bluetooth headphone..

title: Worst ever... Returned it in a day
body: Worst product probably ever I have purchased on Amazon, ordered it received a faulty device unable to hear the other person's voice lot of disturbance in the clarity of the tone replaced i, to my dis may even the replaced device is a ditto of the one which I returned,made yet another return and my amount is been refunded....Worst ever boAt speakersi have ever turned out to...... still bass is good to hear songs,But at 1k + it's not only fa hearing songs, it should do it's purpose unfortunately it haven't ......A big thumbs down boAt 255

title: Superb product
body: Writing this review after 2years of rigorous use.It‚Äôs such a great product to buy and solves all purposes. Had a speaker issue in between but got the product replaced within 10days.After 2years I‚Äôm facing battery issue but that‚Äôs worth every penny!

title: Awesome...go for it..
body: Really good product. Using it from last 15 days and so far nothing to say as disadvantage. Material is good it comes with spare ear buds. Charger cable is very short but manageable. Go for it, you will not regret. Thanks Amazon for timely delivery. I wanted black colour which is still out of stock, but this colour is also good.

title: Good product
body: I always buy boat as my primary choice but on a specific day due to some extra offer prize I brought Nu Republic Bluetooth headset and then ordered boat for my brother after 2 weeks. But really guys Nu Republic Jaxx 3 provide provides better sound quality than boat.In terms of bass and battery, boat is better as always.

title: Bad Quality
body: I purchased it, and its not suitable for my ears...I bought it for ‚Çπ1199, now they are selling it at ‚Çπ999, I want my refund and i applied for return and now they are replacing my product..What is this behaviour amazon, i have been purchasing so mny products... This product is not suitable for me.. I wanna something else....Please refund my money, i dont want a replacement product....

title: Great headphones for the prƒ±ce
body: Overall a great earphones.Good bass and sound quality, water/ sweat resistant, handy, charge stays for good time, not uneasy on neck.I do run with this one and is great üëç.Only con was the grip on the earbuds fell off after some use.

title: Awesome
body: I am a new customer in Amazon. After using it for 13 days I am giving my review. The rockerz 255 pro is really awesome product as I expect. It is beyond my expectation. But one thing those who like to listen music in base. The headphone is really for those only. Battery quality is quite good. It can give you 1 day battery backup if you are a heavy user. For gamers I think this is really good for those. Overall nice experience.

title: Great Product for the price
body: It is a great product for the price. Bass effect is good making the music more enjoyable. Voice clarity for phone calls gets a tick. It may not been great if you are using when riding, but manageable at lower speeds. I have used this during my bike rides. The ear buds sit firmly in ear and I haven't faced any issue. There are three sizes in the pack, so you can choose the ideal size.  The voice command works fine as well

title: Good budget Bluetooth headphones
body: Sound quality is as you expect from this price, bass is heavy which some might like, build is good and looks durable, there‚Äôs no noise cancellation for sure and you can‚Äôt expect that at this price. Connects easily to any device and you can connect 2 devices simultaneously

title: Good product at this price range
body: Review after 10 days use.. the product is great at this cost .The packaging from the seller was not good at all.. it seemed like it was a used product but luckily it was not...Sound Quality is GoodNoise cancellation is above AverageAnd for bass lovers this is your cup of tea ..Amazing.. Bass.Thank You Amazon for serving us in this pandemic Situations too...

title: Overpriced and not a durable product
body: Purchased in April 19 and after after 6 mths product isn't working. Initially the product performance was good like Bluetooth connectivity and  battery life but after 6 mths connection failure is frequent and finally no sound in both the earphones. My view at this point is product is overpriced and not that durable. Let's see what response I will be getting at service center as it's still under warranty.

title: Pathetic design and performance
body: Cons:~ Quality of plastic is cheap for the price.~ Cable that goes around the neck is very stiff and uncomfortable to wear.~ Ear bud rubber is slippery and even the bud with does not fit properly.~ Multifunction buttons provided in the right side tag is hard to press does not provide proper haptic feedback.~ Length of the cable is longer than the required size and makes sure that the mic stays away from your mouth so that during calls people can hardly hear you.~ -200% noise cancellation, when you are on a call, the receiver can hear the noise of a motorcycle that is 1km away from you. It actually absorbs the noise better than the users voice.~ For multifunction keys dedicated to power on/off, toggle previous/next and to enable Google assistant, the time defined for long press is so long that it's frustrating everytime when you want to turn off your device.Pros:* Good sound quality* Voiceover feedback on key press actions are highly intuitive.

title: Bass is above average.
body: Sound quality is great in this price range. Built in plastuic. Looks a little fragile but does the job in Rs. 999. You need to take a little care of them. Fitting in ear is a little problem in initial days but your ears will adjust with it. Bass is above average which is rare in bluetooth earphones.

title: Very Noisy and BASS is not good, it is almost like LOUD SPEAKER
body: My review after using it for a 20 mins. My ears are paining... Its not BASS actually, its like DJ LOUD SPEAKER... As I'm using of Sony Extra-bass wired headset and Apple, this is nothing compared to them. Just for the sake of Wireless headset, you can ahead. I didn't checked call clarity on it.

title: Rockerz rock but customer support poor
body: It's one of the best! I used it around 1.5 years. But recently there is lose contact in wire due to which I don't hear anything from the ear buds. Looks like a easy fix but there are no service centers around. There is just one which is unreachable and also the mail id on boAt website is unreachable. Customer support must be improved but I guess that doesn't bring much revenue for them so that area has been neglected

title: This is a SUB Woofer.......wow
body: Wow......i say, just BOOM boom....Bass......just awesome......DEEP bast is very very good....I used jbl bt160 which cost 2200rs...But this is worth buying....at Amazon in just 899rs....What a sound yaar...paisa vasul....Battery backup also nice......i recommended for this

title: Mic doesn't work
body: the design, look, sound quality, bass are all finebut the biggest drawback is when you are on a call or you are recording your voice.The mic is like a mystery it is able to record even the slightest of noise from the environment but your voice won't be recorded. The other person on the call keeps complaining this that all sorts of voices are audible except for the user.Even I tested it by recording my voice and I was amazed to see that what it recorded was birds chirping and rainfall but not a single word from my mouth.1 star for its hell like irritating mic.

title: Value for money
body: I just brought it in last week, and to be very frank,it's really Awesome. Beyond my expectations.Sound quality is like having your own personal home theatre,too clear and loud enough, you can listen every single bit of music.And coming to battery backup, they said it's 6hrs but it's more than that, for me it's working near about one and more.

title: Comfortable ...But Bass not there ...!!
body: I have purchased these headphones for my brother and he is currently using it but when I used these earphones I found that the bass is not that much good it is ok ok for listening songs on the go but if you are expecting something very powerful or something appreciable it is not in that League although it is quite comfortable to wear but you have to compromise the quality of song with the comfort..... that's what I feel.... show my birth date is if you want to have a comfort of wearing light earphones or headphones then it is a good bye but if you wish to have something good for listening to I would not suggest it !!

title: Good for music player not for calling
body: Sound quality for songs/movies is really good but when it comes to call then mic doesn't perform well. Along with main voice background noise also get added and caller from another end hear alomost any sound/noise even when it too low in real scenario. Battery performance is good and charging time too is moderate.

title: Worth for money product
body: Easy to carry. Gud material quality. Charge back up comes for a week of 4h/day continuous playing. Its taking shorter time for full charge. Gud quality which using for call. Base quality is not that much gud bt its worth for budget. I ll surely recommend dis product if u use it for light music and call purpose. Worth for money

title: Missing Magnetic Connect
body: Pro's:Build & Sound qualityCon's:* Missing Magnetic Connect/disconnect* Volume controls should have integrated in band, but given seperately is kinda uncomfortable* Band is very big compared to image* Actual Color differs from image

title: One side of the headphones got damaged
body: If you are looking for headphones for short term use, this one looks perfect. But I can assure you that this product won't last more than 6 months. My headphones got it's both sides damaged with in first 4 months of use and I asked for a replacement. Yes, they gave another headphones as replacement and after another 8 months the replaced headphones again got damaged. Since the warranty period is over by  1 month I'm unable to claim the warranty. Think wisely before selecting these sub standard products.

title: Nice product.. very decent
body: The sound quality is really good.. bass is also good.. but the only problem is with the manufacturing.. The earphones are MADE IN CHINA..But other wise really impressed.. good.. must buy.. affordable price.. thanks amazon.. good...

title: Unreliable battery less than 60%. Switches off anytime.
body: Battery performance has nose dived just after a year. It keeps showing 40% battery but switches off. It's become unreliable to use it if battery is less than 60%. Switches off anytime.

title: A good product overall.
body: Its a great product in the 1000/- segment (bought in offer).Over 10 pieces bought in my circle.Comfortable, durable, long battery, fits.Over all a Good product.32 hrs of battery with single device.With Multiple device around 18 hrsLitte drop in voice Quality while connected via Skype and microsoft teams

title: connectivity is poor.value for money
body: after 6 months one ear buds damage1.Noise cancellation is good.2.connectivity is poor when i call sometimes its sound is broken.bluetooth 4.2 is outdated its not work in havy wireless noise area i prefer blt 5.0. for room is good3.Price is value for money i got it ‚Çπ899 in bbd.4.This price range sound quality is good but not aowsem because i used before boat 220 wired (‚Çπ500) its base is better than it.

title: Very good and satisfied.
body: Using it since 1 year and they are very good for the price Rs.999. No issues so far regarding quality, connectivity and earpieces. Very much satisfactory. Bass is also good, right quantity of what a good music lover would expect.

title: Worst product ever bought from Boat
body: Within 2 months,1. Sound quality was bad2. No noise cancellation3. stopped at min battery of 30 percent.4. Battery last for only 4 hr after 100 percent.When repaired under warranty, the product now is in more bad state.In all, this product is waste of time and money.

title: Review after 1 year
body: Reviewing it after more than 1 year :No doubt sound quality at this range is best, but few cons - first noise cancellation is very bad, second battery sucks after 1-2 months of usage, third you cannot use it for more than 2 hours and fourth no matter how much you keep it with care one side no-sound issue will arise within 7-8 months but (don't worry thanks to the replacement policy)Overall ,if you are not going to use earphones to attend calls while travelling, this is the best available wireless earphone at this price range.

title: No customer support against warranty claim .
body: After 8 months  , one of the earphone stopped working I contacted the manufacturer Boat to repair or replace the the item as it got defect within warranty period . They arranged pickup from courier xpressbees , and and now for the last one month I'm waiting for the item , there is no clue where that has gone .

title: Value for money
body: The sound quality, noise cancellation, bass,...etc., everything is fine and fair with the price.If I have to speak about my product, I treated it in such a manner that if it is a living thing it will commit suicide instead of being with me.The item's rigid assembling and toughness of wires impressed me. Six months back I bought this product, even now it's working cool.If you're a rough fella I advise you to go with this.The perfect one with a reasonable price.

title: Worst customer service ! Hate it!
body: Earphones are fine but the customer service of boat company is worse .buy at ur own risk .No help will be provided and for that i hate this product.if i cud i woudnt evn hav given 1 star.

title: Just Ok
body: Very nice product. Sound quality is Excellent. Bass is awesome. Battery backup nice but not long time. CONNECTING Average . title: Worst in terms of Sound Quality. For music go with Sony CI200
body: I ordered 2, one was this 255pro and another was of Sony CI200. In terms of sound quality Sony is far better crisp and Clear. BOat 255pro is better in build quality nuts not meant for music listeners. So if your purpose is enjoying music go with any other brand. In other words Boat is a brand hyped by advertising making use of screen celebrities.

title: Broken earphones delivered twice
body: This is pathetic approach by Amazon twice delivered broken Bluetooth earphones. If Amazon want to hire cheap Vendors to delivered roadside items to valued customers then it is difficult to survive in the market. I will make sure I will not ordere anything afterwards from amazon.Always check the dealer Tech fire is not a genuine sellers he sells such kind of damaged articles

title: Just the perfect earphone you need for everyday !!
body: Actually a product worth buying.. I have mostly been a fan of quality products than brand names.. Boat has come up with a product that does just everything it is supposed to do.. I got it for under 1k on one of the sale days and that's why it's even more of a satisfying buy.. my views on this after using my Boat Rockers for almost over a month extensively..1. Sound is quite good..bass is quite good for regular use (I mostly listen to Psychedelic, Techno and Rock, performs genuinely on all the genres)2. Lightweight - I have slept wearing it twice, never realised..!!3. Good battery life- goes on easily for 6-7 hours with one charge..(mix of usage and standby)4. Love the color- I have a red and black colour one..looks super classy..5.noise cancellation is good. Blocks out pretty much all of the ambient sound even in the middle of noisy surroundings..All in all..I am happy I waited a long time to buy a genuine wireless earphone and Boat Rockers made it worth the wait..Cheers team Boat..!!

title: Good product
body: Good product but I would have rather gone for an earphone with better battery storage. Gets charged easily. Gets charge dissipiated easily.Otherwise good quality product. Convient use.

title: Very bad
body: Bluetooth connectivity issues always i need boat company is not doing properly QA testing . All boat product is used to damaged very soon and thay dont have service centre as well on Bangalore

title: Best headset [ BoAt Rockerz 255 ]
body: This is a very good headset. I have purchased it 20 days ago. It can be paired with Mobile, Laptop, etc. It is Bluetooth version 4.0. If we charge it for 10 minutes then it will work for 45 minutes which is great for online classes. While listening music, it's great. Sound Quality, Bass Quality, Noice Cancellation are great.

title: Do not Buy any boat product..!!!
body: I am being very honest here, the product might be very decent but the poor quality and durability. within 6 months of usage it stopped working. Raised complaint for the product replacement and its been 2 months but no response from them. I though i was the only one facing such issue m but when i went to their twitter page i saw people waiting for replacement for more than 3- 4 months.You can go and check on their twitter page and see how bad the after sales service is.I Hope Amazon stop selling their product as they are very bad with their services.

title: Just good not a great.
body: No doubt , it's long last till 5.5 hours... And charge very fast in an hour . But the thing is it's inbuilt quality is not so much good. Mine right ear peice got stop working in one and half month only. May be due to problem in my earphone set. But the bass is too high and the treble is quite low it can't be used for daily hearing it's a good for calling but the mic is in left string , so it must as much near to Ur mouth other wise other person next to phone can't hear Ur voice. And remember it's a not good daily . I loved its battery and charging and I would  rate 6/10 for music , 8/10 for charging , 9/10 for bass , 10/10 for battery backup , 5/10 for treble , 7/10 for calling , its my review after using it for a quite one and a half month

title: Not worth the price
body: Bought this for 1999. I was hoping this would be better than the Chkoko earphones I owned. Build quality is flimsy, but I wasn't expecting any better for the price. The Bluetooth connection was smooth, but the range is that for 10 feet.  Expect that to drop significantly if you walk out of the room or if there is a wall in between. Didn't fit into my ear very well and felt uncomfortable.Was surprised by the distorted sound quality. I am not an audiophile but these earphones don't do justice oo higher volumes and on call mic operations. Would not recommend. Returned.

title: Buy if battery is priority.
body: Battery - 5+/5Bass - 3/5Noise Canc - 4/5If you are not a music lover, use it for education, movies, calls, meetings with bestest battery backup - then this is for you. Impressed with the battery backup.

title: Exelent Value for money
body: It's a very good product.... Just don't wear it in rain because the earphones miggt be water or sweat resistant but battery and chipset is not that much....besides that its a great earphone..you can recive calls handlessly and play pubg without wires comming outta your phone...plus in the gym you can keep you phone aside during workouts and enjoy music ....and you can change songs...volume ... Redial ...pause/play using the buttons given...overall a handsfree experience with superb sound quality and the eargrippers do their jobs as well...

title: After 1month one side of headset is not working
body: only using for 1 month one side of headset is not working, again I submitted a request at boat site for replacement and it takes 20-30days its waste of time to buy and return the product.

title: Battery Indication Is Worst.
body: Writing this review after using 2 weeks.Overall it's an average product, not too good not too bad.Battery backup was also not satisfactory but not too bad at the same time. I have only one issue with the battery indication. It was showing 100% then 80% and then directly down to 20% and off. There's no in between. Boat should take a look for this problem.Sound quality, noise cancelation were above average, Satisfied for this criteria. Bluetooth connectivity is good can be more better.Overall this is a good product.

title: boAt Rockerz 255 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones with Mic (Active Black)
body: boAt Rockerz 255 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones with Mic (Active Black)  ` is not  switching on . Please replace it with a new piece as it is still under warranty.  I had bought it on 16th July 2021

title: Worth it! Classic Boat product.
body: It's a classic boat product, good noise cancellation, clear sound quality. I mainly use it to conduct online-offline hybrid classes, and the performance has been exceptional.

title: Awesome quality product!!
body: Very clear and crisp sound. Bass is amazing.overall a very nice quality earphone at this price range of 899,somehow the earcord are a bit longer which is a little drawbacks, but anyways we can't do anything because it's a company manufacturing style. Thanks amazon and boat.

title: Good sound, average battery life.
body: I have used Boult earlier and now this one.Sound quality is definitely better, however the battery life is on lower side.. continuous use of 4-5 hours will drain it, volume levels are lower too.Good for listening music and watching videos, performance is not upto mark for voice/video calls .. lacks the clarity.Nevertheless; for the price, it is its a good buy depending upon your usage patttern.

title: Awesome product.
body: Sound quality is very good with good bass. Its works great when comes to noice cancellation. I've tried it at 70km speed on heavy traffic area works great without any signal drops. Shows battery percentage of bluetooth. V.nice product for this price when compared to Sony products as I almost tried all sony product which doesn't support noice cancellation even after investing 6000 on bluetooth.

title: Bad experience and zero tolerance
body: After 6 month it is not working. After visiting boat style website and register complain, I received ticket no and pick up number but when trying to track using the link provided no details found. After 1 month I got a person mob no through sms from boat like call him and guide him about your address and handover the item but calling 100 times he didn't received my call at all. No response from boat customer also. Now its been 3 month before complain register, I am writing bad experience which I had with them and swear that no purchase in future from boat. Also informed every freind not to waste money if service is not good.

title: Nice sound quality and build quality
body: Best product I am using from 1 year but it still work excellent. I took in rain but sound is not change. It is work as new up to now. Best build quality. As per my experience with Amazon with this product so I suggest you can buy this. When I use this product other out side Noice not disturbing me I feel music world. This is realy saving of money

title: Not that great
body: I have used Boat before these however have not been that great , battery life is very short .The sound feels okay (i think). Given the price you can go for other earphones . But honestly the battery is something that is a major factor in not liking them as much I did the other Boat earphones . It is sometimes even difficult to connect them to 2 devices at the same time.In a nut shell , go buy other earphones.

title: Awesome sound quality at this price segment
body: Sound quality is awesome in the price segment, you can call boat brand as budget friendly JBL/Sony. Noise cancellation is not so great but works well for the price tag, bass is the best part of the earphone, go for it

title: A sturdy Bluetooth Neckband  in an affordable price range.
body: I use this Bluetooth Neckband to connect to my Laptop, IPad, Mobile phone.  It works equally well with all of these.Battery life of the product is decent.Bought this in a lightning deal on Amazon.  Its worth the price.

title: Defective product not connecting
body: Today 27 July 2021 I bought this Boat rockerz bluetooth headset which is defective. I tried everything on Google to connect it, reset my phone too but this piece is defective & it's not connecting to my phone.I ordered a replacement since it's non returnable. I'll post updated review of next headset they will give me.

title: More over average
body: Good product using approx from 20 days.Battery is super.Looks good.Magnets is also good.But, mic is not at the mark.Noise cancellation is not good.The one we are talking with will always complaint about the environmental noise.

title: Very worse customer service and cannot claim my warranty.
body: The customer care is worse they ask you to generate ticket and their customer care number is always busy.The product stopped working after 6 months in around May it's August now I am tired yet my product is not yet repaired.This is disgusting good luck with your useless customer services.

title: Best product i have ever seen....
body: I think this is the best product i am buying on Amazon.in really its battery backup  its about 2 day of continuing use still 60% battery i have.. only one mistake i noticed that only earbuds i think more efforts can be done on earbuds soo ear gets more comfort other than these i think the value of money of this product is great i am totally satisfied with these product.. And also i noticed that Amazon is trusted site for buying products than other sites thank you Amazon for such deal like these product...lastly ratingsBattery backup - 10/10Sound clearty -10/10Noice cancellation - 10/10Volume- 10/09Earbuds - 10/07Other than these i think all off these 10/10 its great product by boat thank you...

title: Good product at this price but interference with wifi
body: The product is good.Only issue, it has interference while attending calls , the mobile wifi access fails to work.Same issue while attending audio conference from laptop.

title: Don‚Äôt waste ur money on this product
body: I have just bought this Headphones 1 month back for my brother online class , it‚Äôs totally waste , I thought it‚Äôs affordable and good , one side of headphone is not working and the button removes itself and makes us uncomfortable, plz don‚Äôt buy this product by brother is suffering a lot now as becoz of this Headphones. If u want a good quality headphones don‚Äôt buy this as it‚Äôs affordable , if u want to invest on some good headphones this is not the correct product and u can put some extra money and buy a Nice wireless headphones

title: Doesn‚Äôt get connect in both devices automatically
body: I have paired it with my laptop and mobile. But when I carry the set out of Bluetooth coverage of laptop or mobile and again come back in Bluetooth coverage area, it doesn‚Äôt get connected automatically.

title: Don't fall for the false advertising
body: Bass - doesn't existNoise cancellation - just makes your voice louderFalse advertising - the website and Amazon page says it supports Apt X but it does not. It only has the option for SBC and AAC.Try searching on the internet about this specific model if you don't believe me. I only found out after receiving the package so now I can't even return it as the seller only offers replacement and no returns.

title: bass is very good
body: i like the music quality but built quality is not good i will say built quality is average.I don't know why Black boat 255 pro plus is costly than all other varients,I will love to know.but talking about all it is a good earphone but it can be better by reducing providing a better built quality.#Boat #BoatRockerz #boatindia #Amazonindia

title: Ok ok .... compared to others and cost it's ok to buy
body: Wire length is large need to reduce it . And u can't find case to keep it.so Don't forgot to keep box with you.you are able to.listen very small sound.also louder in call l. Some times.while listening songs by keeping phone in pocket and moving sound getting distrurbed. My first one is not able to connect two devices at a time. After exchange I got right one .but still needs some improvements

title: Nice earphones
body: PROSmaterial quality is GOOD.sound quality is great.Durable Enough.earpieces are good. Earpieces Fit properly in ears.The microphone works fine.Bluetooth connectivity is Good. Connects with both PC and MOBILE very easily.Voice Acknowledgements are great in this Earphone. ( for  switch ON,  Switch OFF  &  Connectivity)There is a small light Indicator on the Earphone that works fine.We can charge the Earphone through adaptor or USB.CONSAs it is a Bluetooth Earphone, therefore, it works great within a certain range. Try not to go too far from your Device(Mobile  or PC )While Commuting If the volume is too high, The earphone cancels all the noise around us. This can be dangerous.Overall this product is great  . Whether you are using it for Voice or Video calls or listening to music (soft or high bass) or listening to any video lecture.

title: Value for money
body: The product is quite decent for the price and is very convenient to use. It's Bluetoothconnectivity is limited to a few meters after which it gets automatically disconnected. It lasts for about 5 to 6 hours  but u need to turn off the headphone manually and it is not automatically turned off like the MI headphone when u stick the magnetic headphone together.

title: Good headphone in this range but sound quality not up to mark
body: I have got this for rs.1419/- and for this range for the wireless headphone it is a good deal, sound is ok and comfortable to use, it did not fall from ear, as there is some locking type of thing, which holds the earpiece in it's place, nice product. It may feel this way because i used to airpod from apple.

title: Disappointed after 9 months
body: It was working fine till last week but suddenly right-side earpiece stopped working after 9 months of normal use. As it was in warranty I have returned it to the Boat service center and waiting for replacement or repair. I will update my review after the repair or replacement.

title: THE DEALER HAS NOT PROVIDED A INVOICE , caution , product not durable
body: now my boat rocker is not working .... tried to apply for a warrenty as its well within the warrenty period , but on searching for the invoice i found that it was never delivered to me at all .... without which u cant apply for a replacmet or a repair ..........BE CAREFUL REGARDNG THIS .....Also customer care centers are present only in a hand full of places ......so IT IS A BAD CHOICE IF UR ARE LOOKING FOR A DURABLE PRODUCT ....It worked for ONLY 11 MONTHS .....that too with minimal use !!!!!!

title: Amazing for this price range
body: Earlier I had 255 in which one side stopped working after 1.5 years so I bought this one and I can say it is providing the exactly same sound quality with far amazing battery. I haven't charged it since it arrived and still the battery percentage it shows 95, overall i may have used it around 20 hrs total (haven't counted actually) but battery is really great.Go for it around 1000‚Çπ, everything else is good also.

title: Very poor product d9nt buy this.
body: Product is worse don't buy this. Within 4 month it creates problem during call. Sometimes ear plugs are not working properly.. after few months suddenly the sound disappeared.. so I clam in warrenty period but ita about to 1 month. There is not any mail or call comes from boat that your product is dispatch on not..Everything is so poor..I don't recommend anyone for boat..Poor very poor.

title: Nice buy under 1000
body: I got this for 900 in sale...so its a good buy at this rate.But i ordered Boult pro bass at same rate on another site coz i wanted to compare both n then decide.I found out that sound quality is good in both but main problem comes during the call....mic sound problem...the other person complains for for low voice.I chose Boult one coz that was a bit better than this boat 255....sound,mic,connectivity n all!Other features are same as mentioned...like magnetic earbuds, nice shaped neckband,tangle free cord, nice battery, etcHowever, noise cancellation and bass quality is not so good...its average!

title: Just ok product
body: After looking ratings I bought this but I didn't like it...not so comfortable in ear n feels heavy around neck. They should have given small medium large size ear clips similar to ear plugs.Ear clip given with this product is bigger for me..after usage I could feel bit pain in my ear lobe.

title: Good Sound Good Bass. Poor noise cancellation.
body: 1. Sound and bass quality is good as compared to the other products (At this price point)2. Noise cancellation is extremely weak. Even those unbranded cheap wired earphones offer way better noice cancellation.3. Device can be used effectively only upto 20% battery mark. After that, the device will start beeping and will automatically shut down shortly. So try not to use the device unless and untill it becomes extremely important after <20% battery level.

title: Not worth buying it
body: Purchased boAt Rockerz 255 Sports ear phones on 29th March2019. Stopped working in 3 days. Had to replace it.Now it's been 3 months and it stopped working completely.Very bad product. What's the use, when u pay so much and cannot use it even for a year.

title: Answer frequently asked questions only if sure as creating wrong image of product
body: As per frequently asked questions bluthooth goes off when connect via magnet however thats not case it just go on standby mode rest however this feature no where mention by company in their feature list so answer questions if only sure rest product is amazing in this price range. Amazing sound and battery life.

title: Troubling is painfull on 100% sound
body: I like this product bettery life but after 20% bettery this nackband automatically turn off then i am not use this product properly, this are most problem afterall  big betterylife. Noise cencellation are not workout properly, noise cencellation working evrage level like 20 to 30% and build quality is normal but this is not a big problem, i am disappointed on after 20% bettery this is automatically turn off this is irritating meee ü§¨.......

title: Average sound. Not durable.
body: These aren't durable. And I've not taken them for running or support activities. Just average indoor and outdoor use. No matter what you do, this earphone won't survive more than almost an year. You'll need to buy another one next year 100% sound quality is also not so great for what you'd pay for. I would now either pay for better quality earphone which will survive longer or buy cheaper ones, replacing which every year will not cost me as much. Makes no sense to but this earphone

body:
The media could not be loaded.
