title: Worst experience
body: I was not at all satisfied with the boats premium product.1-it was to heavy always feels on running2- poor battery life with poor indications3-after 20% life auto disconnect and does not get connect again4- while running or jogging it's connection get lost5-To much sound disturbance.6- no use sound cancellation feature.7- Audio quality is ok8-Call quality is also ok but not clear get broke in between.Overall only one good thing is sound rest is over priced

title: Save up and go for a better option
body: I am not very impressed. I bought a new pair because of the hype people were giving for boat products. Its very much bass focused and that's what you would like about it. My 840rs sony ex 155 does a great job than this. Its Bluetooth latency is too bad and the range is extremely poor. I own a wh 1000 xm3 but its not a comparable product. Even though i am saying compared to its lattency its too bad. And i don't know how durable it is. In my oneplus 7 pro even after turning on dolby its sound is not upto the mark. After these days of use the mic is not working. I am expecting a refund

title: Good product but bluetooth connectivity needs improvement
body: It's been couple of months since I purchased this headphones. The quality of sound is good. A competitive product at this price range. However I see few niggles in the Bluetooth connectivity. When songs keep streaming from mobile device continuously, there is slight interruptions in between breaking the seamless play.. The interruptions are more frequent when you touch the mobile device by hand

title: Not recommended
body: It has been 7 days since I have purchased this earphone. Sound quality is good. But while you are in call the other person cannot hear you clearly. Initially I thought it was due to network issue but while removing the earphone the call was pretty clear. Even I was getting the voice too late. Not recommended for calling purpose. Before this I had used two earphone from boat bassHeads 225 and performance was very good. This time I am very disappointed with the product.

title: Defective Product Battery doesn't Charge
body: Hello I have received this earphone on Saturday 31/07/21, sound quality is good but after discharge of battery doesn't take  charge even a few second after kepping it more than two hours of charging, but indicator showing red light .i just want to apply for Return . üòîüëé

title: Not reliable / durable
body: I purchased it couple of months back. Let me be very honest and straight forwardPros1.Nice design , light weight2.Decent battery lifeCons1. Not reliable / durable as after almost 7-8 months of usage suddenly it died ( not able to charge / use )2. Bass and sound quality is average3. Not able to attend phone calls on iOS devices ( over bluetooth )

title: Worth the 799 offer price
body: Everything i've experienced till now (1 week) is quiet 'satisfying'.Matte finish on the buttons and Battery is so premiumOnly 2 problems I felt was :1. The left earphone plug out (slip out) of my ear very often. I don't know why but that is what it is.2. The Cable length is a bit long so it feel Clumsy more often than not. (THERE SHOULD HAVE BEEN A LENGTH ADJUSTER).THANKS FOR READING...ü§ó

title: Overall a good budget headphone
body: I purchased it after returning one basic sports bluetooth headphone.(Not sure if I mention the brand) , it would violate Amazon's policies. Overall it is very good , and only rant is sound quality. Sound quality is average. Battery life is good . No significant sound drops.  I got it at 999 /- which was a deal to steal.

title: Big no to this product
body: What a waste product. There is no concept of noise cancellation except your voice each n every outsider sound u can hear in this headphone. The main purpose to buy this product is to avoid that helmet m phone fasa k phone pe baat krna but guess what when u use this headphone while driving u can hear only altu faltu sound but not that person voice. Infact it hurts your ears too when your wear helmet over this. Seriously after using 2 to 3 months I am writing this review and it really sucks. I am a boat lover person but this product seriously disappointed me alot.

title: The seller is not gud
body: Jst fed up with the seller..1st they sent the product which only wrked for 2 days efficiently then i exchanged it n the product i received now is having conectivity poblm..it only connects for audio not for calls..3/10 times only it connects for both..

title: Value for money
body: I have used this product for a week. First review of this product I must say is good battery life and awesome sound quality. I have used this headphone for making average phone calls and listen music for an hr or 2 per day and battery lasts fir 2 days. Also watch 2 movies continuously by single charge. It also connects with my smart TV.

title: Earbuds are hard. Not very comfortable to wear and causes pain
body: Sound quality is average.The magnet is not very strong to keep both earpieces together. It comes out easily.I have used realme wireless bluetooth earlier and felt it wasMuch betterAlso one has to specifically switch on and off. Again, realme used to do that automatically (based on the fact if both ear pieces are joined to each other or not)

title: This has inbuilt RJ voice
body: There earphones are good, have good sound quality but when it turn on , connects to anything and when battery is low THIS EARPHONE IS GOING TO SHOUT IN YOUR EARS WITH MAX VOLUME WITH ANNOYING RJ VOICE .Hope this helps you

title: Don't buy this product. Buy that rockerz 255F.
body: I am giving this review after using 5 days.When i am connecting this bluetooth in laptop and mobile at the same time after few minutes its automatically disconnected from the phone.While i am putting it on the charging the left part is heating too much.When i have charged at full time the maximum 5hours playback not more than it.Its not better than that boat rocckerz 255F.Range is for this bluetooth is only 3-4Meter not more than it.West of money. Don't buy this item.

title: Quality ok ok, battery life is banchmark to others
body: First sounds quality is 3.7/5Plastic quality is luks avg product 3/5 (premium look expected tha but hai nahi)The only you can buy this for its battery,Khatam nahi hoti hai....For battery 5/5Still itne Paisa me itna hi milega so you can go with it..

title: BUY IT ONLY IF WANT IT FOR LESS THAN AN YEAR WITH ONLY ONE EARPHONE WORKING
body: Good product but after 10 months one earphone stopped working and visited the service center twice and dint feeling like waiting in such long queues in such conditions. Thus could not claim the warranty also sent them mail but no response, yet as of now warranty done and ended up with single speaker working

title: Amazing battery and charging!
body: Amazing fast charging. If you're not listening to music all the time, just let it be connected, receive calls when necessary, the battery will last all day.Amazing and loud sound.Not much bass.Not much comfortable in ears, but the band is good.Overall a very good purchase.

title: Could be better!
body: Bass and treble are unbalanced, there is much bass compared to treble. Product is good for extra bassheads. Battery backup is good. Build quality is great.Comparing it with ant audio wave sports 540, ant audio clearly wins, i would suggest u to buy ant audio in the same price segment (If u like balanced music bass=treble) ant audio is a perfect choice.+Points of boatBetter grip in ear, hooks don't hurtTurns off automatically when not connected.Flat wires+ Points of ant audioBluetooth 5.0Bass and treble are perfectly balancedBattery backup is better than boat (around 1.5 hours extra)Calling quality is great

title: Great product but Quality and Support is Pathetic
body: I bought the 255 Pro in August but it went bad on the right ear - this was in 15th Oct less than an month since purchase. I raised a ticket and the it was promptly picked up on 16th Oct 2020. But till now i have no status on this as it was sent to Mumbai. The call centers are not reachable as well. I think i may even have lost the product. So while the product was great, its quality was pretty poor and the Support is almost non-existant.

title: Good Product: Value for Money
body: I order this product in Amazon 4th Oct 21 Sale. It is too early to write review but I felt satisfied when I used this product first time. Very good Bluetooth range, good bass in this price surprising. Decent battery back up. ( Can be more ) but ok for this price. Good sound quality and good build quality not fragile. Value for Money. I will again write review after use of couple of months. Thanks!

title: Sound quality is nice.
body: Overall a great product. Sound quality is great in mids. Buttons are tactile enough. Altho the charging port is micro USB which could be Type-C, as some products provide it in this price range. Wires could be a bit shorter, Also, the cover on the charging port is a bit tricky to open, feels like I would break it if didn't pay attention while opening it but that's just nitpicking.

title: Product received in a tampered condition
body: Product received in a tampered condition and charging cable is not as per company packaging and replaced with other type (not c type), product is not fresh seems refurbished or used. Cardboard packaging is fine but product package is tampered and resealed post changing the parts. Worst experience over a diwali gift product. Need fresh replacement at the earliest.

title: 6 months
body: I bought boat 255 rockerz in December 2018 and it's got non functional in 6 months flat, then I got it replaced and the replacement also got non functional again in 6 months period. So my experience with this earphone says this is product is good for 6 month only. Buy with care.

title: Not worth it.
body: No this time boat did not satisfied because product quality is just okay okay but the main purpose, sound clarity is really very worst so i will suggest Realme buds is the best one to people who are reading this comment so better go on that.Thank you guys.

title: Too bad for calling outside bedroom  even in balcony.
body: Overall good. No problem for audio/ video for user. Bad for calls. Mic is more sensitive to background noise than user voice. Hence person on the other end hears too much of background noise more than what is heard from normal phone mic.

title: Zero noise cancellation
body: Zero noise cancellation...other end person can hear background people/noise louder than you and really disturbing to whom you‚Äôre speaking with avoid using for calling. Sound quality is not that good, it‚Äôs ok ok. Bluetooth connectivity and battery life is good.

title: Good product, value for money
body: Two weeks over.. Battery back up is good. Sound quality is good for the price.. Soft buds for ears. Only drawback for Bluetooth based headphones is FM listening is not possible as antenna plug in is not there. Need to use online FM..

title: Great for this price range but slightly could have been better
body: I purchased this headset for 1500 and after using for 2 days,this is what I feltPros:1. Terrific Noise cancellation2. Sweat proof(Justified it's IP rating)3. Awesome Battery life( More than 7 hrs for me  as I was using medium volume just for a 1.5  hr charge)4. Premium sound quality while listening to  musicCons:1. Bluetooth Range, (although they mentioned  it to be 10 m), was very less, around 7 m.2. Conical buds ( removable)3. Voice call quality was not as expected

title: Above Average experience at an affordable price
body: Pros:- Amazing product for a price of 999/-  with 1 year warranty- The bass is better than existing bluetooth earphones in the market- The sound quality of it is good and accesible for daily runs- It is splashproof so you can use it anywhere and good for gyms tooCons:- Bluetooth 4.2, could have been Bluetooth 5.0!- Sound quality and noise isolation could have been better- Takes around 1.5 hrs to charge everytime it powers out- The fit is not as good as compared to other bluetooth earphones in  the segment but you will get used to itBut overall the performace is above average and battery backup is around 5 hrs at 85% volume and will get you through the day.

title: Good bass and quality sound...
body: After using about two months iam writing this review.As a hundred rupees earphone user for long time,First time i bought this boAt bluetooth earphone.Initially i had a very big hesitation to buy this earphone because of its price is about 1699.but later Waiting for a month i got this in 'lightening deal' for Rs.999 with including some cashback offers.Pros: =>Good sound quality,a very good bass,=>good battery backup(really it plays upto 45mins with10mins charging)=>Fits perfectly to my ears(various sizes of extra buds added)=>light weightcons: No cons for sound quality,but i feel that Wires are bit lengthy(but i compromised for bass and sound quality)Finally kudukara kaasuku worthu!!

title: Boat sails in every aspect but sinks in what is meant to do.
body: The way this product has swept the market is spectacular.Pros: No wonder it is a thoughful asset; its built quality is decent, fits in your ears quite well, isn't uncomfortable and it is cheaper than its competitions.It has a good bluetooth connectivity. The light weight of this earphone makes it comfortable to wear it for long hours.Cons: The only and the biggest issue with this product is that the mouth piece is placed on the outside and because of which the listener on the other end hears almost everything but the talker. There is way too much noise because if this. It would have been better if the mic was placed in the inside. This way Boat would have been undisputably 'The Best' earphones in the market at this price!

title: Useless, waste of money don't buy
body: A poor quality product. One of the worst earphone I have ever used. Didn't expect this from boat. Neither the sound quality nor bass is any good. It's like a cheap headphone one can buy on any traffic signal. Unluckily for me there is only replacement option and no returns and I would get the same product back. The ear buds keep falling off even after multiple adjustments. Complete waste of money

title: Earbuds are problamatic
body: The earbuds are getting removed themselves every time. It's a rather irritating experience with this product. Sound quality and battery life is pretty good but this thing is really annoying.

title: Facing Issue With Boat Rockerrz 255 Csk Edition
body: Dear Team,I have Facing Lot of Problems With This Products After 10 Days.When I am Using This Boat Rockerrz 255 CSK Edition Bluetooth unable to Speak On call When Bluetooth is Connected And Also Facing This Issue When I am Listening Music Or Watching Videos With Boat Rockerrz 255 He Is Disconnected between Playing time.Request To You Kindly Do Needful Please Return Or Exchange This Product...

title: Good
body: The sound quality is good, No connectivity issues as well. connects swiftly to phone. One of the major issue is the noise cancellation, often on calls people tell me that there is lot of noise around. this is the major flaw with this.Unless u are in a quiet place else its good.

title: One side ear phone not working properly
body: Ergonomics wise it was good. I was not regular user. But using it for 2 years one side of ear phone was not working properly. sound used stop intermittently. looks like there was loose connectivity internally.

title: Bass is bad. frequent disconnections
body: ProsSound quality is good.build quality is goodConsPoor bass.Buds coming out easily. didn't fit into my ears.Frequent disconnections makes your listening horrible

title: Good but OnePlus is best‚úåÔ∏è
body: To my amaze you have too switch off bluetooth to disconnect neckband...yes it's true then why you put magnet in it...and some times it looses connectivity too. Overall it's ok to buy if you have patience more than meüòÇ. Battery backup is awesome by the way..

title: Keep Playing.....Keep Going...Must buy..
body: Sound quality is good. Bass quality is good but not for base lovers. Bluetooth range is v.good. Noise cancellation in ears is very good but while calling, it catches little background noise , and sometimes voice of other person mumbles up,  and is not clear but doesnt make much difference. Battery backup is around 5-6 hrs with continue play. (To save battery keep ur volume low and not full.)Verdict- it's a good choice. Go for it.

title: A perfect product
body: It is just  wow product.If you are looking for perfectly balanced bluetooth earphones then Rockerz 255 pro is the one which you should buy.> Sound quality is awesome,>Bass is perfectly balanced,>Connectivity is extra fine,>Noise cancellation is just great.Now about battery after using it for 1 hour continuosly the battery percentage dropped down just by 2%.It is worth it's price.Awesome productüëçüëçüëç

title: Not Working After 1 month
body: Well well well....I bought it i was really happy and was expecting an amazing quality from boat and yeah it was good just for 1 month..After that it showed up am unable to charge it and yeah because of not getting enough power ofcourse its not working what can i now expect please boat modetator if u saw this review just try to imporve durability of your product...Searching for someone who can help

title: Good product, customer care/service questionable
body: I've been using it on runs for the last month and haven't had any issues. Lately however, the earphones have stopped charging, the LED doesn't work and the earphones heat up substantially when I try to charge it.I have tried to register the product and a complaint on the vendor's website but always receive an error. I've tried calling them but the always receive a 'network busy' error. I have emailed them and awaiting a reply.Overall a really good product but if one can't get the product to work during the warranty period, there's no point in buying it.

title: Good but build product it's not good
body: Product are good. Sound quality and base are too good but Boat service policy is too bad, they are not reverted any mail, msgs, calling and This headphone manufacturing not so good quality. some time there are showing sound problem.

title: After using 2 months
body: I am using this from 2 months. Sound quality is great for all types of song. Battery backup is not bad, i charge it once in an alternative day. It may be takes 1 to 1.30 hours to full charge. But I think there are little bit problem in mic, when i am in a busy environment, the opposite person always complaining about the noise. I purchased it on 1300, in this budget it is the best one.

title: Awesome product
body: Build quality (5/5)Durability (4/5)Sound quality (5/5)Microphone (4/5)Ear comfort (5/5)This product met my expectations....Thanks Amazon ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Bluetooth quality not at all good & very less battery storage
body: Purchased two Earphones, out of which one works good, however the second one has very bad battery storage (Drains out within 1 hr play, secondly the Blue tooth quality is not good, gets disconnected frequently from mobile phones.  I would  to better go for an better quality(expensive) earphone.

title: Poor quality
body: When I first bought it, was working fine for 2 or 3 months then one side of the earphone was not working properly it was like some loose connection. So I claimed warranty then I got a new one after about 20 days. It's not even one year now since I got the new one, again I'm facing the same issue. One side is not working and If I hold the right side up then its working. I don't know whether they replaced with the new one or They just fixed the issue and gave me the same earphone back.

title: Pathetic product.... picks up noise of whole world
body: I am using the product for more than one month. Bluetooth connectivity is pretty good, no issue. Battery is fine. Sound quality is just average, nothing special. But the noise cancellation is terrible. You can barely hear properly when you are on a busy road, and the person on the other end would be experiencing the worst voice ever. It picks up and enhances all other external sounds much more than yours.  So guys, please don't go for this product, unless you have enough to waste. You would want to throw it away after a few days, otherwise people would stop talking to you.  I would rate it negative if I could.

title: Review after one year of usage - Not value for money
body: I am using the product from last one year. initially the product seemed to be good the sound quality, noise cancellation and other things are 6/10. but the quality got deteriorated over time and it stopped working after a year. Boat teams are not responding with the warranty claims. it is not value for money

title: Good Sound Quality. No Lag in sound output.
body: 1) I have been using this since almost a year.2) Sound quality is decent.3) There is no lag in the sound we hear with the video we watch.4) We can hear the sound upto a maximum of about 10 feet without any walls in between the device and the earphones. There is some disturbance in the sound when we are in a different room with walls in between.5) I have used this with Samsung Smart TV and an Asus, Lenovo mobile phones.6) Takes about an hour to charge.

title: Call quality is bad wobbling noise can hear properly
body: It's good for music and not good for receiving calls. First few weeks it was working fine but after that when I receive call the voice is wobbling and u can't hear other person properly. Then I have to disconnect the Bluetooth and heart from phone only. Seem waste of money.

title: Amazing Quality
body: It's connectivity is very good.The best thing, I can use it with my mobile and laptop simultaneously.The battery backup is amazing.Initially my friend purchased these earphones. I exchanged my old earphones with him and tried from a week.After seeing the battery backup and build quality, I finally ordered these earphones.

title: Stopped working in 4 months Disappointing
body: In just 4 months the left earphone stopped working and today after 7 months the right earphone too stopped working properly it works only if the cord stays in a particular position. Very disappointing their service center is about 10 kms from my place poorly placed office during this Lockdown period they should have made it easy for customers to reach out

title: The best earphones
body: They are my second boat earphones i owned.....sound quality is really great.....it's noise cancellation function also works well...it can be connected to two devices simultaneously...but dont why this function is needed......otherwise these are the best ones i had......as mentioned battery lasts upto 6 hrs. when fully charged......not suffering from any issues because of earphones....

title: Positive Review
body: If you are looking for bluetooth headsets in the given price range Boat Rockerz 255 are the best in the category.Its sound quality along with the noise cancellation give you a good audio experience.The bass quality is top notch.Also to add the customer care service is very quick and easy to access.My headset was replaced with a new one when it malfunctioned from one side. The process of replacement was also quick.

title: Completly waste
body: Writing review after using 2 months of the product. Initially the sound quality was good and the connectivity was also good. But after one month of use connectivity problem started. After two month of use one day it suddenly got turned off and I was not able to turn ON the device. I registered complaint on there website and after 2 weeks they pick up the device and now after 2 week they collected for there pick up service. I will never going to buy there product. Pathetic service. Totally time and money wasting.

title: Don't Buy waste of money
body: All are good, battery was good,  but I'm use only 1-2 hrs then after my both ears was so paining.And some voice are came whenever you ON to this like Chirrrrr.....Like koi wire ka shock ho rha ho.And ear piece was so hard.I can't use now.Waste of money.I'll request for refund.

title: Nice
body: it's very very good product and no doubt about it, and its sound is pretty awesome bass sounds awesome. but you can't feel like a Samsung headphone cause it's too lower end product for sound. but still at the price point Of 1400 ok. but my original concern is that how I am gonna get service  this product as I know there is no service centre near about my location so how could I change.????  can you please help me about that

title: TRUE REVIEW, DO Read, not good for jogging quite good for gym
body: The sound is 90% perfect, loud sound, goood enough bass, comfortable, not for jogging as the band jumps a lot n irritating, if not for jogging can go, calling quite good not bad, not suitable behind wall, but range nearly 10m, charing more then hr, playback 5,6 hrs didn't charge from 3 days, but wait for offers as it gets 999,i purchased in June 2020 at 999

title: Good product
body: Good product. Easy to use. Good sound quality although I use it mainly for audiobooks so bass effect is not a concern to me. Not much of noise cancellation actually but would give good volumes even in noisy areas.It issue is it starts to become uncomfortable after about an hour of use. My daily usage is close to 2 hours and I've used a lot of in the ear type headphones.Bottom line. Definitely worth the money.

title: Boat 225 is much better than this
body: In the matter of Sound Quality, it falls behind Boat 225,  however as this is bluetooth model, can be sort of fine. There is no lag at all, and thats very good, tried while playing PUBG, PrimeVideo, Netflix, Youtube. Noise Cancellation is really good, notifications for calls, turn on and turn off. Over all I rate 3.5/5.0

title: Efficient but not effective customer service
body: The headset is having a problem while attending the calls, there is lot of disturbing sound and voice becomes robotic. When I complained promptly the product was replace BUT THE PROBLEM REMAINS THE SAME.Second time I wrote an email requesting a call back when repairing the headset so that I can explain more clearly the issue to enable them to fix it, there was no response to that. Boat please make your service effective, please drop a message or call me to fix the problem

title: Awesome while it lasted
body: Okay so i am writing the review for my rockerz after 7 months of incessant use. The battery life of this product is top notch while the sound quality is at par.The Bluetooth connectivity is good but the range is pretty modest. I got it for 999 and hence couldn't ve asked for more. That said, as with almost every other earphone, one said of it has malfunctioned exactly after 7 months of use. I was actually expecting it to last a year but nevertheless it's a good product for the economy and value for money segments.

title: Faulty item provided
body: The earphones kept disconnecting automatically. Applied for a replacement and was shocked to find the same issue of disconnection with the replacement as well.Reached out to Boat customer service center, they offered another replacement. But instead of the 255 pro+ which I ordered, they sent 255 pro! Absolutely pathetic!!

title: Good Quality Headphones
body: I am using these headphones last 3-4 months. It's Nice and Good Headphones. Sound quality is really nice. Build quality is also good. Bluetooth Connectivity is superb. You can use two device at a time. Some mobile devices you can listen music between the calls That's great thing. But when i talk with others on phone calls that time background noise of other callers you can here compared to the person voice you can't hear properly that time. But its happen when you are in rush or crowded area. The noise cancellation can improved by bolt Rocker so it is really superb budget Bluetooth headphone in india.

body: I bought this blutooth headset. (Boat Rockerz 255+pro) .after one month charging problem. I connect  charger its a red colur light sparked .after 20mins, i on this headset no working ...1month i used so no return option .i lost 1500Rs for this headset ..now this price 1100Rs .so what i tell about online product is use and throw may its a 10000000Rs product. title: Not same like earlier bOAT products
body: Packing is good but I'm getting lot of noise while talking on phoneIt's just 24hrs back I used to start the product but I'm not still feeling like this is new one.,  might be this is the first failure product from bOAT# Not connecting phone while i kept in My pocket# Sudden Battery discharging# Lot of noise while on phone call# sudden sound got disappear while playing music track# Specially not feeling comfortable while I using at gym / Running track

title: COMFORT OF WEARING IT
body: firstly received the product on time and in good condition..now moving to like and dislikes:  -what i like about it:-1)its dual colour tone is very attractive .2)simple to  use .3)economical.4)Sound quality is good.dislikes:-1)charging display is almost invisible ,you need to actually find out the indicator.2)not comfortable for long use.3)loss of connectivity while in use.

title: Amazing product in a stealing deal price

title: Pathetic customer care service
body: boat customer care service is pathetic. My Bluetooth earphones stopped working within 3 Months. Replacement issued status is being displayed since 10 days and no updates since then. Won't get back to the customers by promising to do so when they are not able to answer the calls. Have been trying to call them everyday since last week

title: Best in class Bluetooth earphones
body: My review after using this product.Honestly this Bluetooth earphones are best at this price range. Sound quality, bass quality is great. Mike is also good. Have separate volume management from android phone's volume, but make it's own volume 2,3 points low from max volume, as max volume comes with a little background noise. Bluetooth range is absolutely 10 meters. Overall great product.. I strongly recommend it.. Go for it

title: Noise Cancellation is not good .
body: I am writing a review after used more than 6 months boAt Rockerz, the Bluetooth range is not good, if you have Skype or Zoom call there is a lot of noise on other, I have always faced an issue while Skype or Zoom call, even on a Phone call is not giving good output results.yes, i can say for listing songs, this is really a good product. but we are not purchasing for songs only, right ?

title: Worst experience and worst performance
body: Have worst experience with this headphones also the performance is very worst after using 1 month now the the range of of the headphones is become very low as u put beside you it instantly get disconnected and also there is noice breakdown while playing music or video and some cracking sound occurs during playing the sound I want to replace it or refund whatever is possible please givee ASAP

title: Best ones in this price range
body: Pros:1. Battery backup2.  noise cancellation3. Easy connectivity4. Best sound quality at this priceCons:1. if you use this continuously for more than an hour, pain starts around the ear.2. Length of the wire is too long.Overall recommend to buy it

title: Best buy in this budget.
body: Best headphones on this budget though the noise cancelation is not efficient overall performance is solid and especially the battery its not exactly 40 hours but we need to keep the volume in or below 50%otherwise in max volume it is playing for about 16-20 hours , the asap technology is cool for10 mins 10 hours is like already we have seen it in oneplus bullets totally a good quality earphones in this budget.

title: Mediocre product
body: Overall product is good but somehow it doesn't fit nicely inside my ear. Tried with all sizes of ear tips. Somehow it fits but not recommended for long hours.Started painting after 1 hour of usage. I only use it for workout purpose. For better sound experience I'd suggest to go for over the ear headphones. Much more comfortable

title: Exceptional Sound Quality
body: Best Bluetooth headphones within this range, most importantly it is Indian Brand.Exceptional sound quality with extreme bass options, light weight, handy, portable, good sleek design.It has a good battery life of 6-7 hours and it gets full charged within 40 minutes from 0% to 100%.If you are using bluetooth and wifi on the same time, then the range of wifi becomes less, it is not an issue of the headsets but it is an issue of mobile.Go for it guys, best ones in this range. NO ISSUES! üòÅ

title: Not very good product
body: Not very satisfied with the product. The ear clip became loose and have to adjust all the time. The neck bend became shapeless after few days. Sound quality is good. Battery last as it mentioned in description which is good.

title: Boat is boat
body: Delivered before a day to day that scheduled. thanks Amazon. Product is excellent no words to speak under this budget. Battery still 80% from yesterday night to till today morning 12pm. Got with 100% battery when opened and connected to the phone. Above all got it for just 999/- that too on COD. Love you ‚ù§Ô∏è Amazon. Boat is boat no comparison just awesome.

title: Not worth buying
body: I bought these for listening to podcasts and audiobooks mainly so the audio quality isn't meant for listening to such audio files also there's an annoying incoming call aural alert when someone is calling and that would've been tolerable if it didn't work when I put DND on my phone but to my disappointment even after that it gives aural alert

title: Hissing noise when the default rubber cushions are used.
body: There is a hissing/humming noise when the default rubber cushions are used. Changed them and the sound quality improved. Just OK for the price. Not recommended at all.

title: Bluetooth connectivity is an issue
body: First I'll talk about prosSound quality is decent for the price if you can get it in 1000rs on sale otherwise better options are available.Noice cancellation is pretty goodBattery life is pretty decent as wellConsI find Bluetooth connectivity poor I don't know if it is the problem with my deviceCause when I walk wearing this and having phone in my pocket there are lot of glitches in connection which I found pretty annoying

title: The best earphones yet !
body: Above expectation, excellent sound quality and the battery life is just incredible, one charge easily lasts you around mote than 5 days with normal uses (only music while traveling) and 6-8 hrs in one go if you using it continuously. The durability is nice and the magnetic feature really comes handy when not in use. Light weight very negligible weight and not noticeable when around neck, but sometimes this may result of loosing it and not suitable for bike ride (if riding at high speed).

title: Good Warranty one year
body: Warranty is the best part.After few months one side stop working. Since warranty is 1 year, i got it replace in a week or 2, since then I'm using it for more than 6 months. So far so good.Sound is clear. Ear fitting is comfortable. Battery life is also good as well.Don't expect good bass sound and noice cancelation.

title: Disgusting after sale service of Boat
body: After using it 3 weeks i realized that it is malfunctioning, i tried to use warranty service of Boat but it is disgusting. My product was picked up on time and after some days i received used & old Boat Rockerz 239 Blue in replacement of my 3 weeks used Boat Rockerz 255 Black.I forwarded a mail to Boat customer care to look into this case but they are not responding.

title: Totally waste product
body: Totally an waste product i bought two boat rockerz 255f one for me and one for my brother but first 1 month works perfectly then one side doesn't working and after 2 months completed both sides also doesn't work. I applied through they didn't responded for ky problem totally money waste don't buy thz üôè

title: Not recommended, flickering annoying sound
body: Don't buy it, after 1 day one side is producing annoying flickering noise. Totally disappointed.  I have been using boat earphones for almost 2years and I am keep going back to buying this because there is no such good option available. Based on my experience every product I bought, I need to replace it because it stopped working after 4-5 months. I know that's covered with warrenty but it's really annoying.

title: Highly disappointed
body: I googled it before purchasing this product and really found it amazing.Today I received my order and was exciting to operate.After listening half portion of the song I immediately removed it.The bass quality is so high that my ears started paining and it sounds really pathetic. I didn't like the sound and not even the bass. The sound really bumps into my ear.But still I didn't loose my hope for this product.After this I called few people and used this product still there was some issue.Sometimes people were not audible to me and sometimes I was not audible to them.So guys please please don't buy this when you're looking for a nice product and if you're spending 1000 that too on wireless earphones.So highly disappointed.

title: Bluetooth Range Connectivity Issue
body: Bluetooth range connectivity major issue.This is a replaced product for prior sound issue. However facing the range connectivity issue with replaced product. Not happy with Boat Rockerz. This time disappointed. Unfortunately I missed the return date to re-return or re-replacement.

title: Best in class battery backup üëå but it hurt your ears üëÇ
body: Best in the price range I must say, Battery is best of the deal with 255 pro +, stylish look, lillte heavy, average built and great sound but the worst part of it is it will pain you in the ear if use long session like I do , have using it since 7 days and it pain me a lot so before purchasing please keep in mind to use it as much less as possible or have stronger ears üëÇ

title: Perfect friend for daily use
body: I have been using it for the past 2 months and seemed like a good time to review it now. Firstly, the headphones are very trendy and not at all cumbersome. The magnets behind the earphones help to keep them untangled. The in ear design cancels all noise and keeps the music clean. The music urself is very pleasurable as the bass and treble keeps the perfect balance and gives u an wonderful experience. Connection range is around 100metres and works well with call as well.

title: Bad product, pls don't buy
body: Bought in February, after 4 months it stopped charging, waranty claim took 1 month to replace, and after getting replacement in 1 month again the replacement product stopped working. Just don't but this....made in china are always like this

title: Frequent disruptions during calls are  disheartening.
body: I like 80% of the Boat Rockers and I dislike 20% about it's sound quality.Listening to music was fine but during call there were frequent disruptions and disconnections.I had to frequently on and off Bluetooth and connection to get back to the other person on the line.It is better to throw away if we have to use it for long calls/talks.Other features are fine so keeping for listening to music only.Overall, bad experience.

title: Battery discharge in 2hrs use
body: Sound quality is very good but my concern is BATTERY its getting discharge in 2 hrs.I'm keep on replacing the product again and again but battery life is the same as mention in all the product.4th times going to replace it but I know that product will also be same.Hoping that product battery will be fine.

title: Right ear bud not working
body: I bought this nine months ago because had good reviews till now the earphones were working fine but suddenly in this quarantine it has stopped working the right ear bud is not working I ordered the earphones with one of my friends id and now I am not in contact with the friend also it shows no replacement option I really want to return this product if possible please help me in doing that

title: Happy Experience
body: Bass is awesome... Loud speakers.. excellent connectivity... only disappoints at full volume..little noisy and not so happy experience in full-volume... but overall great product if compare with other brand... simply replacement of JBL products in less price.. you can consider it.. go for..

title: Avg product. better option available in same price range
body: Avg product. Better go with some other one.buds are heavy and keep falling of ear.Sound quality ok. Battery backup is excellent.Bought for 1399. connectivity not an issue till now.

title: boAt Rockerz wireless headset
body: I am using it now for almost 4 weeks. The product is very good and gives the freedom of handsfree operation especially during workout and driving. The cost to quality is very good. However, it doesn't provide the battery life as claimed by the manufacturers. Also gets disconnected (especially when idle for more than 15-20 minutes). This has been experienced especially while driving.

title: Justifying the price !!
body: I am using boat since last 4-5 yearsI love it‚Äôs bass and battery backupLittle disappointed with build quality because Once I returned Boat Rockers 255 pro plus because of there was some Gap in battery cover !! And again found the same and I don‚Äôt want to play return game again and again !!!

title: Boat Rockers  BT 255
body: One of best BT Earphones at this price range, noise cancellation is really awesome. BT connectivity is good some time when mobile is on pocket lite disconnections for Milli seconds...other than this product is good at this price range, audio sync with video is perfect.....!!! Boat is best at this

title: below expectations
body: not that great sounding earphone  i will recommend that others should invest little bit more and buy the mivi earphones that is obiously better sounding than these pair of earphone ... and there is lot of problem regarding connectivity also when the earphone battery percentage becomes 80% then there is crack in the sound.and if you expect good vocals then this is a trash  only there is bass which also becomes muffled after the battery drops to 80%.. for me this product is absolutely no.  But one good thing that i found is that it has a good battery life.

title: VERY BAD CONNECTIVITY ISSUE
body: I have been using this product for the past 2 months and I'm having trouble with the Bluetooth connectivity of the product. After a month of use I started facing these issues. I don't know if was the Bluetooth or the speakers, but surely it wasn't worth the money. Also, the battery backup is not as good as it claims to be. But yes, the teal green colour is really pretty.

title: Not good
body: I did not like the fit at all. The hook was constantly irritating me then I removed them, after that the earbud kept coming out of my ear and I had to fit them to my ear again and again.Sound quality:- bass is not goodThose people who like loud noise and too much bass can go fot it but not for me.Also there was a lag sometimes, so I returned the product

title: Worst ear phone ever

I'm very disappointed with this purchase, will never suggest boat.

title: Very good product

title: Stopped working in 8 months.!!
body: Stopped working in 8 months.!! Right side stopped working. Used without abuse or any water damage. Lot of sound leakage. Its not worth the price. Buy it for less than 1000 when there is a deal. Defenitely not worth the hype.

title: Just read to know everything on this
body: Awesomeee heaphone with high bass and noice cancellation up to the mark. Totally recomendable to thkse who likes high pitch musics with hard metal sounds. It is in affordable range and is better than any other bluetooth headphones of this price. Boat nirvana is giving this product as the best quality bluetooth headphone in the market with a playback time of 12 hrs.. You can easily take it on a day trip and even its charge will not drop out.

title: Worst service by boAt
body: The Bluetooth ear phone stopped working in a month time and I have been struggling to get this replaced but haven't got response. I have even written to boat CEO and his mailbox is always full to accept the new mails. Not sure what to do but I recommend to keep away from boat products just for its pathetic after sales service.

title: Very bad earfone
body: I purchased it 20/01/2021,but after 5 month there is charging problem,I call boat customer care for complaint but they are not responding,I call amazon customer care but they said this is not amazon warranty, contact boat.very bad experience.so don't buy any boat product on amazon

title: 1 year Life , dont expect beyond that.
body: If 1 year Life is Ok for you, you can buy it spending around Rs 1399  Else buy 2 quantity in mid range , that two will give you atleast 2 years life. My one stopped working just after 1 year even after taking immense care.

title: Battery discharges even when switched off.
body: Battery discharges even when switched off. Faulty battery has also caused the casing to loosen. Warranty claims process leads to a website where the link to register complaints leads to the service center page. Service centers don't pick up phones. Warranty claims made via emails are not acknowledged. Didn't except such quality issues with Boat as well as unsatisfactory customer support.

title: Waited for something like this..
body: Am writing this after using it for 3 weeks.. I always wanted bluetooth earphones with type-C charging pin and a big battery that'll last atleast for 5 days.. Got this on the first day itself and am much satisfied with the sound and battery life.. on the first charge for my usage it lasted almost 9-10 days.. dual bluetooth pairing works good.. magnetic on-off is not present but actually it saves battery life.. so am very much satisfied with the product and rating it 5 stars and worth every penny..

title: Amazon's eturn policy is not satisfactory
body: Overall Sound quality is not upto the mark. I have made request for return it but Amazon didn't execute return in time. I was asked to make another return request by cancelling existing one. Now instead of return Amazone making it exchange. This is ridiculousl and against the return policy.

title: Was expecting best, but result is bitterüòë

title: Waste of money. Do not buy.

Getting pain in my ears as I wear this while watching movies or listening music. I thought there was some problem with the product I got first so I had to replace this item. But the product I got this earphone second time then I realised it's not just one item  but the whole model is bad. In just 1 month it's gone. Not charging and cannot switch on the product.I would rate just 0 star.

title: A good buy.. Good quality prouct
body: I have been using this product since early feb and it still works like a peach. The sound quality is brilliant. Never experienced a break in the Bluetooth sync. No sound delay while watching videos and the battery life is excellent too.. I just have one complaint, well actually its faced by the people who i talk to over the phone. Whenever I use this product to talk over the phone, they always complain about too much background disturbance. It does not cancel out the background sound of others talking around you. Rather their voices gets amplified and I have to immediately stop using it. I validated this by being on the receiving end and the complains definitely is genuine. I think this is the only issue which restricts it from being the ultimate product.

title: Decent Earphones at a decent price
body: Pros:- Decent sound quality- Good neck band support to avoid having the earphones plugged into your ears all the time (like airpods or true wireless buds)Cons:- Connectivity gets broken at times, but the frequency is low.Overall, I would rate it very good for the price-performance ratio.

title: Great build quality, decent sound, earbuds bit heavy.
body: Great build quality. For a rough user like me, the rugged cables are just perfect. The bass quality is great. The only issue is that the ear buds seem a bit heavy, and they keep slipping off. But they're fine once you get used to it. Great buy, the wires will last you much longer than any competitor.

title: Great but can be better overall

In a earphones the sound quality is the most important but you cannot ignore the quality of the ear tips because one is going to wear these for long if required. I cannot keep buying ear tips every now and then. Please improve the quality of the ear tips but great job with the sound quality.

title: Sound and Mic issues
body: Pro's - Packaging, easy wireless syncing with laptop/android, noise cancellation, battery.  Cons - Extremely bloated bass which makes it hard to listen to music to, poor mic which attracts complaint of poor sound quality while using phone/skype. These headphones are useful for sports/workout only.  Not for serious music listening or any use which needs use of the mic.

title: Good but if you get it around 1000-1100 rupees

It usually sells around 1500 rupees but I got it for 1000 rupees at that price it's very very good but if it's around 1500 rupees than I would suggest to go with realme wireless which sells around 1800 and for 300 more you are getting more features and similar sound and better battery and connectivity. title: The sound is not that great and the battery isn't promising as well
body: I have been using the earphones for a while now. The main demerit is the battery , you have to charge it every now and then as it doesn't give good backup. The sound for bass intensive raps / hip hop tracks is not good. You can hear clear distortions and it isn't pleasant at all. Ironically, the noise cancellation doesn't work in this case. If you want an example , listen to Kendrick Lamar - Loyalty with the earphones and you can feel the clear difference.The most annoying thing about this is the bluetooth range and connectivity. It disrupts every now and then and the sound keeps tearing until you disconnect and re-pair with your device again.Overall , a very bad experience .

title: Battery heating problem
body: I bought Boat wireless Bluetooth headset thisNovember 2019 onwards...First used boat Rockez worked good and I saw Battery heating problem in this product...Except battery heat problem everything is good....Some days gone...Ie 03.03.2020 Boat Rocket device battery failed...I am already posted review box that pics....Just i used normally 2/3 hours a day in 4 months used Boat Rockez device but now it is failed battery...I want replacement this device becoz of one year warranty is there...I waiting forThe company how can respond....Giving replacement device

body: Great music. Some lows are missing. Charging time is less. Running time is like 4 hours of call on full charge. (EVEN AFTER 3 MONTHS). So much lag in video and game. So, big NO there from my side.

title: Not that good
body: It captures noise from outside, therefore, while speaking one has to speak louder for making his voice audible at other side. Nonetheless, receipients always complaint about the noise, which is being captured by the mic. It can be resolved by the company as the normal bud earphones do not have such problems.

title: Value for money
body: I m writing this review after 1 month of usage. Product is no doubt a value for money, quality of material is decent, battery life is around 6-8 hours. I mostly use it for office calls n response is absolutely marvelous. Earplug wires r pretty long comparative to other neck bands. Bass is good and overall a must buy in this range.

title: Quality Buy - Price worth.
body: This product is fantastic...it's got amazing quality sound and bass, clear and sharp microphone sound delivery, light weight and easy to handle. Voice guidance feature is cool.3 months down the line, it's started giving a bit of issues, disturbance issue via Microphone of the headset.Since it is a 1 year warranty product, in process of contacting for Warranty Support.I am loving it.Worth purchasing this headset.

title: Sound quality is not as expected.
body: Sound is not as expected .. I had the same piece before .. since I gifted it I had to purchase again .. but the sound quality is not as expected .. sad but true ..

title: Great BT Headphones
body: Very good and comfortable BT headphones. hangs around the neck well. Magnetic earbuds cling to each other firmly. really good backup time. Easily goes upto 4 hours with heavy usage of phone calls, listening to music, etc. Easy to connect to any device. I have tried to connect to 2 devices at same time. My laptop (Win 10) and My mobile (Samsung A51). it does connects but the connection is not always reliable if connected to more than one device at same time.

title: Bad Experience with the Service of Amazon and boAt
body: After receiving the headphone it was works fine but after 4 day's it stop working one side, later on I called amazon to return the product they straightway denied the same and said you have order it from the business account and return windows is closed, it has only 3 days return window instead of 10 days in regular accounts. then I contacted manufacturer for the replacement they took the product from me in 2 days after raising the compliant but it took 20 days to get the replace product. it is very very bad. my one month product warranty gone for toss.

title: BOAT is the WORST company. Do not buy their products.
body: Read this before you buy : Every time you connect these earphones to bluetooth, a guy SHOUTS in your ears at the top of his voice "YOU ARE CONNECTED TO BOAT ROCKERS". Boat is the worst company, who is advertising itself daily even after selling the product to customers by shouting into users ears daily. You did not give the ear phones to me for free. Then why do you think it's okay to shout your name in my ears daily a 100 times? REMOVE THE ****ING MESSAGE. BOAT IS THE WORST COMPANY WITH NO ETHICS.

title: Best under ‚Çπ1000.
body: I bought this product for ‚Çπ999 in January. They sound really good and are very comfortable. With the right size ear tips, you can wear them for a long time. I used them in gym, while travelling and they performed as expected.The battery will last 7-8 hrs easily. They charge from 0-100% in 2hrs. I was satisfied with them until I started having some issues recently like the greetings at time of power on/off stopped. The left side stopped working.But as it was still under warrenty, I raised a ticket on boat site. Hoping to get a positive response.I'll update their responseI got the replacement 15 days after the complaint.

I also feel that it should read out the numbers like 99999..... or the Caller's Name saved in the contacts for an incoming call rather than just 'Incoming call'

title: Not recommended

title: Amazon looted
body: It has a great sound quality. It is durable. At first I did not receive the item.. But then a replacement was delivered.Edit : It stopped working after 20 days of purchase... The product doesn't charge now.. F***ing waste of money.

title: It's not as good as I expected.
body: There's no Bluetooth connectivity at all, even if you move 2-3 metres it loses the connectivity, and also if you are walking, there's the connectivity problem. There's no noise cancellation, if you are in a busy place, the other end person won't be able to hear you properly. Only good thing about this phone is the sound quality.

But now it seems to be very feeble and even the neckband is also not strong. Not just external features but internally the technical part quality has been reduced i think. It disconnects & connects back when i move a little away from my device. I did NOT expected this from Boat. Planning to return and replace this.

title: Automatically disconnected

I want replace, dont buy this product, why amazon dont check the quality of the product.Please ban the seller otherwise no one purchase anything from amazon, they lose their brand name because of these fraud product sellers.

title: Worth it.
body: Wonderful sound quality and bass is okay.The build quality is really good, because the way I use it, it should have been torn apart, but its still firm and really in perfect condition.This earphone is easy to use and carry as it feels like you have nothing on your ears. It's really light weight and comfortable.I highly recommend it

title: Quality
body: I have been using it since the last 1 year and I must say that it's a very great product under 1000But now exactly after 1 year there are some technical issues such as very poor battery backup ‚òπÔ∏è and the sound is also getting a little bit torn but I must its great for workoutI would recommend you to buy it go for it definitely u don't have think twice but take good care of it and use its own usb cable to charge it

title: Realistic Review of these Earphones.
body: To those who doesn't get to know the realistic review about this product.I've been using it for 2 days and understood the sound quality. And i F-u-kin love these earphones.Noise Cancellation is very good. You can't hear noises until you try to hear them.Comfortability. You can't listen for a longer period of time. It will start paining after 20 mins. These were not comfortable until i removed the wings. And i had some old eartips which i am using right now. These are more comfortable to me. And now i can listen to 4 hours straight without paining.Battery life is excellent. Used for 2 days and battery percentage dropped from 100 to 40%.Now the Sound Quality.Mids are average. Won't miss any sound.Highs (treble or vocals) is not up to the mark. BUT, If you adjust the equaliser settings then you can make it sounds so amazing.Lows (bass) is SO POWERFUL. Rockerz 255 was only made for the bass lovers i guess. Their only focus was on the bass. These earphones have extra bass.(i am saying this so many times because it literally has so much bass)The people who are saying that it would have been better if it had more bass are stupid as fun.I have used some high and mid end earphones like Sony Mdr xb55 with extra bass, Jbl T110 and Oneplus Bullets.At first when i heard, i thought i made a mistake by purchasing these Earphones but when i equalised it. I made it sounds like some high end earphones. And i am very happy with the purchase now.You will only like this if you didn't have an high end earphones. But if you have never heard an high end earphones and wants some eargasm then i must say that you should go with the product. You'll be happy with the purchase and dont forget to equalise.

title: Nice but aapko koi aur le lena chahiye
body: Achha h me ek mahine se use kar ra hoon but ab yeh thode outdated ho gye h aap logo ko 235v2 ke liye jaana chahiyeBut yeh pubg ke liye achha h latency zara bhi feel ni hoti ek dum perfect hLe skte ho mixed feelings h abt thisBass h but jyada volume me sunoge to kaan dukhne lagenge thode time me baki connection achha h dusre room tak bhi chalta h

title: Money's Worth...Go for it...without second thought.

The headphones gets charged in 30 mins for whole day use. Works excellent on my Oneplus 7T Pro and good connectivity for laptops Skype & video call.Don't give a second thought. Just goo for it. Total money's worth

body: If you're someone who has to take calls all day, you'll have to recharge it by end of the day. But when it has sufficient battery, didn't have any complains as such.

title: good sound with nice bass
body: these earphones are very good for the sound they produce .connectivity has no issues ,comfortable for long periods of time , sound quality is very good and low frequency bass sounds are good (not super heavy bass) ,good for watching videos and movies , gaming has little lag in sound (due to wireless connection),battery life is fairly good (around 4-5 hrs of non stop usage at full charge at medium volumes) ... sound quality does not deteriorate at full volumes .....  built quality is good , does not feel cheap and flexible neck band ...good deal for =<rs.1500

title: Customer service :(
body: Firstly the voice quality of the product is very nice compared to others at this range, however the service from boat side is not right. Mu product was damaged at the 7th day and I initiated the replacement option, the reverse pick up was scheduled however no delivery information is available still. Itz being 3 days now, when you go to boat website the tracking status button does not works on the website and even you cannot reach an representative via call. I don't know if I am gonna receive the product back or not!

title: Too good.
body: The voice clarity & music bass is amazing.The only little thing to bother is the mic & buttons are separated from the collar , which is slightly difficult to handle.

title: Little less than an average experience

I was just simply not able to connect the set to my Mint OS. I cannot imagine a reason why!I am hoping that the replacement will sort this out!

title: Average Sound quality but a sweet deep base that'll make you addicted
body: Sound Quality of 255 is pretty average, falls short on lows but pretty much accepted when you get it for 999/-Base meanwhile is a different story all together, EDM's just don't sound the same and the deep deep base just sucks you inn.While it does falls short for crisp sound quality and treble, If you are a EDM person.. these are the best you can get for now.P.S.: I got it for 999/- hence the acceptable remarks. Definitely not worth it for ‚Çπ3.5k get any other wired earphone instead of these if you want better bang for your buck.

title: Amazing Product, Highly Recommend

title: Battery problem and on off problem
body: Extremely disappointed by your product, i bought this earphone on February,but it went defected so earlier. Fist 50% battery runs good but other 50 gets down in half an hour. title: Latency!!
body: Bought this product a month ago and this product is steal for the price. But you just shouldn't buy it. The noise cancellation and the audio quality are both great. But there is latency of almost 1 sec! I thought there was a problem with the video I was watching but after disconnecting them the sync was perfect. I tried YouTube and other video platforms and the problem still persists. I don't remember encountering this problem at the beginning but I didn't observe until lately

title: DO NOT BUY
body: Device is unusable. The bluetooth connection is pathetic. It disconnects- reconnects every 2 mins, with sound breaking for 5-10 seconds. I googled this issue and guess what there are soo many others with the same problem. Only if I knew before buying, I wouldn't have wasted my money.

title: Great sound quality, great battery, lightweight

title: Good but could have been better.

I wasn't expecting this from such a good brand. I guess if you're paying this much price you expect the product to last more . Altogether a good buy. I would give it 4 star.

title: GOOD ONLY FOR SHORT PERIOD OF TIME.

If you are buying this product at best it is good for 3-6 months . My usage was simple  max around 2 hr per day

The media could not be loaded.

Battery backup is awesome also, it remained on 100% even after playing videos & songs constantly for 3hrs. To sum it up, i have to say it is the best Bluetooth headset under 1500. You should really go for it.

But then also i had a trust in boat products now this changed everything.1).Bluetooth connectivity - sometimes there is a breaking issue eg. When i play a music song break for a millisecond happens for 6-7 times in a single song.2).while calling sound from other side is not so clear.3).Right side portion of this headset have some sound buffering or scattering issue.Overall it is waste of money. title: No earphone in the package  , only buds, a USB connector and a catalogue.
body: I cannot give a genuine feedback on sound quality, noise cancellation  and all , because , I order this for 1399 , and I received a package with additional buds , a USB connector and catalogues.  This package did not have an earphone in it . So disappointing  . I don't know if it's with the seller or manufacturer, it is so strange to see an empty package from Amazon

title: Value for Quality of the Headphone but not for the Sound Quality
body: Hi all,This headphone I have purchased to replace my 'JBL T160 in-Ear Headphones with Mic' headphone with lot of expectations from the Boat. But the sound quality of 'JBL T160 in-Ear Headphones with Mic is much better than the Boat.But the physical quality of Boat is awesome. If u are looking for the best sound quality please dont go for it and if u are looking for the physical quality, Boat is the best under Rs.1,500/-Headphone Quality - ****Sound Quality - **Base - **Battery durability - *** (5Hrs)Value for money - ***Over All I can give THREE STARS for this product

title: Avg product or may be even good product for the price.
body: Avg product. Packaging was badly damaged when received, product in working condition. I do not understand why this is so highly rated or has so many ratings may be, they captured the pulse of Indian buyers correctly?

title: About Warranty & Servicing
body: I buy this product after 3 month one side is not working so i can this warranty on thier website they approved it i have sent my products to their Servicing company mumbai after that no ones did not respond at meThey didn't pick my call they did not send any mail to me my warranty is also about to end i tried 100 call perday no ones didn't pick my call if they pickup they muted ...So this the worst servicing centre i have ever metSorry for my bad english

title: 10 to 30 sec delay in everything

title: Battery dead in three months
body: Within three months of purchase of the item, the battery is dead and doesn't recharge at all. Bogus products being sold on Amazon these days. There seem to be no checks and balances in their system.The product carries a replacement warranty of one year. Wonder whether Amazon will honour it???

title: My opinion
body: Output sound is extremely loud and high you can't hear in full high volume..Pros-1. Bass is loud and high2. Full volume is extremely high3. Very light weight.4. Fits in ear you can use for long time.Cons-1. Material looks cheap quality(does not matter for me after all sound matters)2. Battery backup is less and indicator is 100 to 80 to 60 to 20 then off.Conclusion- you can go for it if you love high volume with extra bass.

title: Ultimate product at such a cheap rate.
body: Awesome product. Works fantastic. Thanks for giving the freebie. Worth the penny.Pros:Good battery lifeSounds qlty is awesome.Easy to pair and disconnect.Cons:Nothing so far.Would recommend to buy this product as its best in this price range.

title: And expensive deal
body: Though I didn't buy it in prime day sale I am happy with the product and it's sound quality good bass and clear sound. Nice isolation but battery backup could have been better. title: Boat reall rocks with this specificproduct!!!

title: Expected a better quality product from boat but was disappointed.
body: Left side bud is bend downwards which makes it difficult to fit properly in ear. Sound and bass are decent but I am not happy with the noise cancellation. While on call, the person on the other end was not able to hear well even after I had to literally scream. Overall, an average product. It's better to spend a bit more and buy some other brand like Oppo, MI, RealMe etc.

title: Best Budget Bluetooth Headphones
body: It's been more than 10 months I bought these EARPLUGS and i find them the best at such a reasonable price. They actually have noise cancellation feature not to the top most but good at this price. The battery runs for 6-7 hours long once charged fully. Also good quality sound

Worst product, worst service Dont buy.

title: Beware! I got duplicate product.

title: It didn't even last for 3days.

title: Excellent

title: Disappointing

I am using Sound magic E10c, which in terms of sound quality way ahead of this product. I purchased it in 1199/- in sale (these sales are just selling gimmick,I knew BoAt is just a branding on chinese stuffs like micromax, they can sell their item only on e plateform, still I thought to give it a try.

title: product with typical one year warranty lasting period
body: Defective piece was delivered at first where one of the side was not working properly. After getting exchanged with new earphone after 1 year, right side was not working  properly and after next 1 month other also got damaged. Overall not a good quality product that can last for a long time. typical one year warranty.(or may be less than that in case of existing defective product)

title: Everything is good save that the earbuds are extremely painful
body: The pity is that everything about these earphones are great, starting from the sound quality, the technology/user-friendliness, and even the instructions. But I don't know which genius came up with the earbud designs. They hurt a lot! Unless you insert them deep in your ears you won't really be able to get them to stay on. Inevitably after about 15 minutes of usage, your ears will ache. Therefore even though its a perfectly fine product in all other ways, its not very usable. A great pity.

title: Light on control buttons should be shifted away from eyes.

title: Product OK / Poor Customer Service
body: The product was good until 10 to 11 months of warranty and then it had worn out. I wrote to the Customer Service / called them but the people who works in their Customer Service does not even value their Customer. I am writing to them for more than 2 months but no single action has been taken as per commitment over the phone. I suggest others to buy some other brand other than boat who might value our money. If boat acts on the same i will update you.

title: If u r a music lover don‚Äôt buy boat

title: Not worth buying.
body: Sound is not at all balanced. Bass is too loud... All other frequencies are being dominated. Bass is loud but doesn't have quality. Not worth spending 1500/-. Built quality is also decent.I have to tweak Equalizer a lot to get a balance of all frequencies. That's not all... Equalizer need to be changed each time for different types of songs. I am not at all happy to buy this. Wastee of money. I could have added some more amount and should have bought some good brand.

title: Worth your money, the battery life is the huge plus

I use it very frequently and have to charge only once for a hour or so every 4-5days.The bass is really good, but only one con is that I won't recommend it for long time usage as it will hurt your ears after after few hours else it's really good from battery and sound perspective

title: Good Sound; Bad for Running

The heavy arms are probably the reason for  delivering the sound quality and longer battery life, but they surely are not for runners.

title: Durable Design
body: This is my 7th product from 'boat' and i am clearly impressed. Apart from 2 wrong purchases, all the other products have been working really well.  The best part about this product specifically is its durability which is much better than other brands  at this price. so Go for it.

title: Nice & clear sound; great bass and decent price!
body: These are a decent pair of earphones at the given price. I have earlier used the Skullcandy and the JBL earphones and compared them, this is not a disappointment at all.The sound quality, clarity and bass are quite good. The quality of voice, when using for phone calls, is pretty nice too.The battery lasts for little more than six hours on continuous use after a single charge.I would highly recommend these earphones.

title: Best in budget
body: It has been a month since I got these earphones and these are my first own Bluetooth earphones. However, I have tried many other earphones and headphones from different brands from my friends like boat, Samsung, sony, Skullcandy, jaybird, house of marley. I finally settled for this one because it's giving more than it's worth when compared to others. These are cheap in cost and rich in sound. Casual music listeners will enjoy this earphones thoroughly.I will list some pros and cons that a casual music lover looks for...Pros :1)Deep boosted bass and balanced music at higher volumes...worth for money2)Good fit, Light weight and flexible neck band with sweat and water resistant... perfect for workout3)Around 6 hours of play time at 80% of full volume and around 1.5 hour for full charge4) multi function buttons and different bud sizesCons....1) little noise at the beginning that fades out as soon as the music starts2) disconnection ( lag in music ) due to displacement of device for the first time only. It gets settled after the first time you move it and stays connected with out any further disruption.

title: Good Sound Performance compared to Wired JBL C200Si and Sennheiser MX 170
body: This Boat Rockerz 255 is my first Purchase of Bluetooth Headphone and I found this better in terms of Sound performance than JBL C200Si and Sennheiser MX 170 which I have been using for quite some time. The Bass is very immersive and Lows / Mid are crystal clear. Treble is controlled and is balanced. This Boat Rockerz 255 beats the JBL & Sennheiser wired headphones that cost around Rs. 800-900. AT Boat Rockerz @ Rs.899/- is a great deal. Must buy, Boat Rocks......

title: Ridiculous Bass
body: FOr the price of Rs: 1000, build quality is below par. Bass is too much pumped up. It irritates someone who listens to classical/Jazz. Make sure you have the equalizer adjusted to your needs.

title: Worst customer service by boat. Not happy
body: Boat rokerz 255 is truly amazing in terms of sound quality and Bluetooth connectivity.I ordered the earphones in January 19. It worked really well for 10 months. But one earphone stopped working because of loose connection in the cable from last month. I tried to register the complaint. It showed error. I tried calling the customer care many times. No one picked up the call. Very bad service. Product is under warranty. But no use.

title: Best in this budget
body: Brought it after reading all the other reviews in the internet and I have no regrets purchasing this product. Works just as mentioned, very good sound quality, comes with noise cancellation, and plus point is for all the bass lovers yes it has got decent bass quality, with 10mm driver.

title: boat bluetooth neckband not switch offing automatically when we connect earbud magnets
body: Mainly it's not automatically offed by attaching earbud magnets we should switch off the main button every time that's a main mistake in this neckband & battery time is low sound quality is good but woofer is disturbing that sound quality mainly this Amazon people is not giving refund when we don't like product so best to purchase outside because we can check there.

title: useless product don't purchase.
body: worst of product weast of money,  i have purchased this hear phones 5 months back now both the speakers not working. i had raised the ticket for the same but no use.. several times i am trying to reach out custumer support not answered.Finally i realised that purchasing this kind of products weast of money and time spending to order this.

title: Replacement policy only for Manufacturing Defect.
body: Product is superb, but after 4 months of normal use right side ear piece stopped working.I tried to contact Boat Service Centre in Chennai for a replacement, they rejected my request because they can assure replacement warranty only for manufacturing defects. Then why Boat provides such a 1 year replacement warranty.My device is in the same condition how I received it. No water or moisture contact, No breakage of the body or wire parts.

title: Not Bad for the Price
body: I've been personally using higher quality headphones; so the sound quality of these earphones have felt pretty bad, in comparison. The sound quality for the price though, is pretty good, especially for a set of wireless earphones. There was almost no lag, so, would work with casual video viewing and gaming.

title: Overall not bad
body: I purchase it in DecemberDurability okBass over bass but no disturbanceSound quality good some unique sounds missingComfort ok but some problems my ear is not  comfortablee with it i used all buds Control some times calling is not workingGaming ,in cod the sound effect is take some time difference whike compared to wire headphones

title: Worth of money and quality
body: *I am using this for past 20 days*  1 battery backup is good enough we get almost 6 to 8 hrs of battery life which depends on ur usage2 sound as lik boat never let us down on sound quality bass is always awesome as well as vocal quality also3 product  quality is good when we wear its not heavy4 it is not recommended for pubg never buy if u wanna use if for pubg u will get sound lag

title: Don't think just buy boat.
body: Call quality is not that good the only problem i face with this product.I love boat when it come to music the quality is amazing, i used most of evey product from boat speakers, earphones, powerbank, neckband, car chargers. And they impress me every time.

title: BETTER THAN THE BEST :- ITS WORTHY OF THE REMARK :- NEXGEN TRENDSETTER
body: The boAt Rockerz 255, while being lightweight in design pumps out the favourite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bass.It can differentiate music from noise.An exceptional sound experience with articulate audio reproduction with a blend of pitch perfect frequency response.According to me everything is awesome except one thing :-The cover of the charging port.By any means if it tear aparts then I think it's very tough to fix it up again in the same place. Maybe fevikwik can fix it but do not try this.Hope that moment will never come because it depends on how you use it. Overall product quality is just mesmerizing.

title: Very long lasting battery with very high quality sound
body: Very long lasting battery with very high quality sound. I was fed up of charging again and again to previous mivi earphone. This has everything with awesome battery life. Just make sure you change with a very low voltage charger with the given cable to increase the life of any wireless earphones.

title: Earphone disconnects from bluetooth very frequently.
body: Writing this after 2 months of usage.Sound quality is good, noise cancellations is kinda ok coz whenever i talk from outside environment, the other person use to complaint about worst background noise.The main issue is nowadays am facing is earphone disconnects from bluetooth suddenly and  often while audio / video is playing. This is so irritating that suddenly if bluetooth disconnect mobile speaker enables which disturb others.

title: Not very good according to price

title: Pathetic service
body: Please do not buy this product , my complaint number is 881765, in a month it stopped working, i returned it and when i got the replaced one the ear plugs were not fitted with the product, i raised a request for ear plug i got ear plug which does not go in to the socket. Imagine marketing which took the complaint even the image which i had sent with the email they didn't bother to check the size of the ear plug whether it will fit the device or not. Worst worst service, will never buy boat again n will recommend same to everyone who i meet.

title: Worth buying

Battery backup is okay if you don't use it continuously throughout the day. Bluetooth connectivity is good not the best because if phone is very near then it's okay or else it will create disturbance if you move to next room.
