title: Buy it ... Nice and durable quality bluetooth earphones

Amazon is not returning the product also,only replaceable, for the first time I am not satisfied with Amazon.

Built quality is also good.Design can be improved.

title: Great for outdoors & indoors, but not for calls.
body: Noise cancellation herein refers to outside noise being cancelled to the one who's hearing. While being on a call, if you try to speak something, your voice would be 20% & the outside voice would be 80%. Solution to this is taking the mic close to your mouth as you speak.Otherwise, sound quality is 10/10.

title: Overwhelmed by the boat support

title: Only bass is good
body: This product has a good bass but noise cancellation is really horrible. U can literally hear the slightest of the surrounding better than the person u r speaking to. Also in a years time it stops working properly. Mine stopped working in 10months time though i always kept it in very careful and ideal way.

title: Connects 2 devices simultaneously. Not a great feature
body: Sound quality is great. Noise cancellation also works. Bass quality is not that great. The earphone connects with 2 devices at a time. Which is a blessing and a curse. If you disconnect one device another device also gets disconnected automatically. Which is quite irritating.

title: BATTERY LIFE ,  PRICE and SOUND
body: Good product for 1000 Rs.Sound is balanced.Bass is good not great but better than other earphones.Battery life impressive.Go Ahead.  Buy this product for this design ! bikrsing : Assurance Guaranteed !

title: Disappointing
body: Sound quality and bass are below average. Sound clarity is affected as there is a constant mild disturbance when the earphones are plugged in. The microphone is absolutely useless as the other person can barely hear my voice.I was actually a fan of the boAt wired headphones, I am extremely disappointed to receive such low quality at such a high price.

title: Noice cancellation/ music quality
body: Noice cancellation is too bad. Excet the caller voice you can here ever single voice.The bass is too high. You can not play music for long time/high volume if you are music lover then choose another one.Well rest of things is fine if you use this product for just talk and if you use it into the car or noice free place.

title: Pathetic Customer service from BOAT
body: I bought the product by looking at the reviews and it has started giving me trouble after 3 months of usage. I tried contacting customer care for several times but it will never connect. After couple of months... somehow i found a way to return the product and get it replaced. it's been months that i have returned the product but no response from the team. Bonus is, customer care number always busy or never connect. Be sure before you buy

title: Best quality headphones and neckbands to buy in a fixed budget
body: Battery backup is good... sound quality is also nice..bass quality is also too good...best quality headphones and neckbands to buy in a fixed budget... really found it convenient and happy that I didn't wasted money on buying other stuffs..... awesome neckband.... thank you@boat.nirvana for making this product and thank you@amazon for delivery it to us in a fixed time....Thanks a lot ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: I recommend boat.... Very good customer service...
body: Very good for daily talking..I recommend boat...Very good brand... Most of all.. Very good Aftersell customer service... ... My headphone have some issues with power button.... They replaced it with a new one.... Yes it will take time... About 20-30 days..... But they replaced it

title: Poor quality? I would say so.
body: This was a product suggested by many but with my comprehensive use of over two months I can say it's not a good product. The battery life on this thing is highly inconsistent even when I'm listening to music at same volume( It has happened quite a few times that I charge it to a 100 at night but it doesn't last more than an hour ). The second issue I want to point out is the Bluetooth connectivity. This device connected in a blink for a month or so, but then it used to suddenly disconnect from my device. After a month I started facing issues connecting to the device, sometimes ( even with full battery ) the device was not discoverable. As a whole I would not recommend this pair of wireless earphones.

title: Warranty service pathetic
body: Never buy anything from boat, their after sale service is pathetic. My earphones button stopped functioning one month after purchase. I've reverse shipped it under warranty claim of my product. Its been over a month since I've shipped it. No response and their customer care number also doesn't work, no representative is available at any time. Better spend some bucks and buy good quality earphones  whose  after sale service is also good.

title: Value for Money
body: Build quality average. Plastic build and rubber finished product, not feels cheap.Considering the price point, sound quality is awesome. Loud, crispy and vibrant. I purchased it in just Rs 999.Battery backup is also good. 5-6 hrs average usage. BT range 25-30 ft.Overall value for money product.

title: Not upto the price value.
body: Good but not best as per it's price value.Starting phase is good and you will like it. But after sometime say 5 to 6 months it shows signs of defect like one earphone stops working, delays in connecting, late syncing. I have used 2 products of this within 1 year and both showed same defect i.e defect in one earphone after 4 to 5 months. Boats used improve it's quality.Good earphones but not best rather go for other company I would say.

title: Highly NOT RECOMMEND!!!
body: People having Sony or other good earphones experience, don't go for it. You will not like it at all.I am personally a Sony user, but after a long time I wanted to other brand. This is where I went wrong.Honestly, people who don't have Sony experience can like(mentioning 'CAN') this earphone. But for those who love Sony sound, don't go for it.

title: Best Battery life
body: Best under 1500/-Great sound and Battery Life.Sound quality 4Battery life 5Noise cancellation 4.5Built quality 5I am writing this after 1 month of use...

title: Not suitable for office calls.
body: I bought it to attend office calls from home, in the current COVID-19 situation.Turn out that it is only good for music. Noise cancellation is not good for the voice calls when connected through laptop bluetooth.For regular calls also it is not as efficient, probably this is what you get in 1500.

title: The ultimate sound and battery
body: Best neckband I have ever bought. Build quality is in better side . Sound quality is the best part everything is well balanced.  Bass quality is unbelievable really appreciable. Battery backup is insane. I used it 8 days then it came to 20% out of 100%. You can go for it your eyes closed

title: Awesome boat
body: Purchased almost 2 months used it roughly.....as mentioned it is sweat proof.....sometimes the conection breaks when mobile is in pocket but it is nor regular... Good bass and sound quality.....connects to 2 devices no connectivity issues.....battery lasting for almost 10 hours.....happy with the device

title: Worst Replacement warranty services. Quality is also not so good.
body: Good Product... But very disappointed with quality because just in 15 days one side of  it stopped working... & I have tried to complaint but their complaint handling way is too bad... I've returned it 10 days back but I didn't receive any replacement yet.So I am so disappointed...

title: Driver error or what!!
body: Got this product yesterday.I was using 255f since 1 year so no doubt of sound quality I gone for this pro one.But each time when I lock my phone or exit from any app it automatically maximise the volume  & Nirvana says ‚ÄúMAXIMUM VOLUME‚Äù which feels like bursting my ear drum!! Requested for replacement.May be it‚Äôs a manufacturing defect on it‚Äôs driver part & so the new one gonna replace will be like the same or what!!!

title: Nice built quality
body: Product is good,but when magnets connected the device is not disconnecting...

title: EVERYTHING IS FINE BUT THE PRODUCT DIED FOR NO REASON
body: Its sound very inappropriate to say that but i was very happy with the product evrything the sound the noise cancellation the bluetooth connectivity evrything was fine . any one can go for the same for the reasonable price.but but butdont know the reason why its suddenly got dead . 1st time i got replaced the product but waited for somany days 15 - 20 days and get a new one and see again the same issue happened to me . dont know why after proper handling of the product again its dead. so if you are going to buy be prepared

title: Worth buying according to price and quality
body: Good noise, good bass, sound quality,  you can go for other product also, higher prices of Bluetooth earphones have a good sound quality and battery backup. I like this one , and according to price its worth.

title: Best Awesome
body: Best product you will get in this price range .Battery backup is very good. You could not get better Noise Cancellation in this price. Sound is awesome. Only bad thing about this ear phone is it does not fit in your ear properly .

title: Go for other brands
body: Not satisfied. Feels like something is blocked in my ears when I use. I hear my voice differently when I put. Other side people r also complaining the same. Not comfortable. Because of this headache is also coming. Which I did get through samsung or Sony. There was no return option as well.

title: High sound during start up in Chinese language.
body: The sound quality is very poor. During starting voice from the set is very high that is unbearable. Built quality is also not upto the mark. Hence I am returning this product after 6 days of review.

title: worst service center services
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†within a month i face problem regarding this products, charging draining quickly, red light which shows low battery are continuously blinking even after charged, and when i went for service centre near by my place for exchanging the product they always come up with reply like 'your product in currently unavailable come after a week' worst service when it comes to exchange product üôÑ

title: A purchase that is worth it
body: Sound quality is good and the noise is cancelled when playing audio. The bass is stronger than my regular wired earphones. It has magnetic ear pieces so that when it‚Äôs down around your neck it stays there. Battery lasts for 9 hours and recharged in 2 hours. Only pause/play, volume up/down buttons are there. Can not shuffle between songs. I don‚Äôt why, but it keeps beeping when viewing an image. Other than that, it‚Äôs a purchase worth it.

title: Easy replacement
body: The sound quality with extra bass was good but one earpiece was causing buzz noise even while on stand by, also it was getting disconnected on its own, ordered replacement on 13th Oct, got replaced item on 14th Oct. Thanx Amazon

title: There's no Post sale service.
body: Don't buy this product.After 8  months one side is not working. But the point is warranty claim service is very poor. I have Lodged complain on 1st august for defect in my boat rockerz 255 wireless Bluetooth earphone. As it was written in the mail to get any response from your side within 48hours.But till now I haven't received any mail regarding warranty claim. This is very sad to know that the well reputed brand is not paying attention to post sale facilities.

title: Best of the range headphones with a few averages
body: PositivesAmazing headphone with best of the range noise cancellation, bass quality and in ear comfort.NegativesQuality of the rubber hold is low.. it starts to itch and becomes gluey after use in sweat, the function buttons could have be distinct, mic quality is just okay, battery life is average (around 6 to 6.30 hrs if used with music continuously)

title: Best service of boat products , poor battery life , purchase it in sale
body: Only minus point with this product is it's battery life... Hardly 3 to 3.5 hr.. takes long time to fully charge.. I used to charge it twice or thrice in a day.Best thing is boat service quality.They will pickup ur product and replace it within 15 days if u having issue with product .Rest ... purchase it in sale...u will get it in 999 otherwise u have to pay 1499 for same.

title: Amazing Headphone üòç
body: I am using this headphone from last 2 years and still its working good.  sound quality is also good, so i am totally satisfied with this product.

title: Happy Purchasing!
body: Received the package on 7th May.It's been 4 days since use.Pros:‚Ä¢Instant Connectivity (switch it on & it's connected),‚Ä¢appreciable Noise-cancellation (can cut all bad vibes around you),‚Ä¢all about Bass <plug into Nirvana>‚Ä¢6-7 hrs assured Play Time (it's ok if you forget about charging),‚Ä¢Easy to use (In-line controls on your commands), Comfortable to ears (go on for hours),‚Ä¢Hardy design & Lighweight.Cons:‚Ä¢Range might be a little bit problem.(=<7ft)‚Ä¢Packaging could be a lot better....Anyways! It's all good at 999/- only.(I mean right now, the price is 1,499/-)Hope my earphone works the same in future too!

title: Don't use when jogging
body: Can't use when jogging. The base keeps flopping and sliding down your neck and tugging at the earphone which disturbs the sound experience.  I know that these are not "sport" earphones, but even regular earphones are less of an issue in this, and having Bluetooth earphones that don't suit exercises defeats the purpose of using Bluetooth.

title: Great Bluetooth headsets.
body: However i haven't used them properly. But one of my friend is using them. Perfect noise cancellation, great bass. Can be used for outdoors, while riding on bike. Mic is very sensitive. I think earbuds are having mic on each of them. Magnetic lock. Couldn't wait for the sale to buy it for 999. I bought it for 1499.

title: Worth the bucks
body: Packaging was good (thanks to Amazon), sound quality is good. But the amazing part is it's bass which is (to be honest) beyond expectation. I have also taken feedback from my friends while being on call about it's audio quality and noice cancellation, and it's all good, you won't receive any complaint with that. Battery backup will not disappoint you either, it can last upto 2-3 days with a fair usage of 4-5 hours a day. if you are looking for a value for money deal this is the best option to go with.

title: Best quality at lowest pricing
body: This was the product I bought for around 900 and the quality it provides is great, especially for the lowest pricing. The sound quality is pretty good, not excellent but connectivity and life is good. Notice cancellation is very good because of the design and overall it's great.

title: A very good product
body: It's an excellent purchase offering full VFM. The cheaper headphones i used previously used to give me headache after a couple of hours, so was reluctant to try these at first. But have been using Boat Rockerz for a couple of months now and they are really good.The only problem i faced is the battery % it shows on the cellphone. Like when i start the bluetooth device it would say that it has 80% battery remaining (which couldn't have been the case as the headphones were charged over a week ago and were used for at least 5-6 hours) ... and then after 20 mins the battery is zero.

title: Need to improve the quality of Product for rough and tough use.
body: I am using the ear phone while I am driving, so i am facing various issues in handling and listening. Below are the issue i am facing while using it :1. Background noise cancellation is not upto the mark2. Earbuds are heavy, it hurts after continues usages of 50+ minutes3. Battery backup is 4.5 hours instead of 6 hours as mentioned in their catalog4. battery charging time is too high, around 100-110 min.

title: Short life product
body: It worked good for 5 Months and now left ear speaker is not working. We hoped at least one year satisfactory performance. Not sure warrnty exists and can company take note to improve in keeping brand repute.Thanks.

title: Not worthy
body: Worst thing with Boat is they don't work for more than six months..Either one or both side will definitely stop working..And you will get replacement of those which is either repaired or refurbished..which will again Stop working after six months no matter how carefully you use them.

title: Warranty
body: I have 1 year warranty,  how to use it

title: Amazing Sound Quality but Poor Durability
body: This rating is wholly based on the duration they serve. I mean I don't know what is the problem with boat headphone. I bought two-three headphone of it in one single year. But after a few months their one side stops working. Again and again we had to apply for the replacement which takes a long time if you are applying online and support store as well.

title: Mind blowing and work 100 %batter then other

title: You can call him average or below average

No sound is heard in medium capacity of volume. Sound is heard when you raise the sound to its maximum capacityHandset band feels like oily.

title: Quality issue
body: Did not like the product. Initially there was some issue so i got a replacement. Now its almost 6-7 months and one side earphone is not working. As it comes with 1 years warranty, will try to get it fixed as soon as the lockdown is over.

title: Very bad
body: I have used several boAt products but this model is a huge disappointment. Once I returned and even the replacement is having the same issue. The issue is that irritating noise while switching from one track to another. üò° 1000 rupees waste. Not recommended people! Audio quality is 2 in the scale of 1 to 10.

title: Not at all long lasting !!!
body: The sound quality is descent. Battery backup and charging is also ok. The charging port cover is very fragile and it came off within few weeks of usage( attached image). After about 12 months of usage, mike has stopped working. Still using for music and workout but cannot use for calling. Wish it was more durable

title: Poor Product even Poor Customer Care
body: Don't buy this product as it is a total waste of money. Also it's cheaply made such that it will stop working in a year and don't even considering asking them about warranty coz they never listen. I HAVE MAILED BOAT ROCKERZ as well in hopes of claiming the warranty but they won't reply. And on the top of that there is absolutely no way to reach them, not on Amazon as well.

title: Ahh! damn this extreme bass with this nominal price had fired the music soul within me.
body: Overall the product is perfectly fine from bass, terrible, noise cancellation, battery everything is up to mark. Boat is providing the best ever music quality and it's for sure a product that can be purchased with close eyes.Cons**Amazon packing is worst, I have got the product with open sealed,  I was thinking about the return but though product was running alright I changed my mind to keep it so.**No casing, sometimes it became hard to keep them apart from wearing.

title: 2 weeks of usage and the left side stops working. Didn't expect it from a Boat.
body: The overall function of the headphones stopped after 2 weeksI called the service center, they asked us to drop it off at there and then they would decide if it needs to be replaced.My suggestion to all the buyers, think twice as they aren't of much quality.

title: Amazing Product
body: The Boat Pro Bluetooth headset is a total value for money.Because Boat Rockerz 255 Pro offers better battery life, decent sound output, fast charging, advanced QCC3003 chipset, new color variants and the latest Bluetooth connectivity.Boat Rockers 255 Pro gives us very good features with a little more money than Boat Rockers 255 wireless headphones.

title: Money wasted as only 1 earpiece working within a week of buying.
body: One of the ear sound out put has stopped within a week of buying the product without any physical damage been done.And since it was a gift to my friend by the time i got to know return window had closed.Money Wasted, hope i get a replacement for this after review is read by the concerned people.

title: Good for gym purpose
body: Using this from 2-3 months. All is good apart from battery discharge. It 100% for 5 hours and then in one hour it will 0%. I don't think its a big deal and this issue is there when I bought it.As per its design it can be use in gym with different exercises for that I have to set it above my ears sometime and sometime opposite of it.I won't recommend for long hours uses. It will cause pain in ears.

title: Good speakers for daily callling or if you move a lot
body: I use to call from my phone when I go on a walk. On my laptop, I prefer using a wired headphones because - no need to charge, great sound and can still hear if someone is calling, ear hurts less if i use it for longer duration.

title: * MUST BUY  *
body: Very well balanced. Sound is really amazing , build quality is just wow , would last for long. Bass is punchi n sound is well balanced.Last but not the least, if u looking headset for pubg then blindly go for it, there is actually no sound delay while paying pubg I triedany Bluetooth headphone even costlier but no one manage that which boat 255 did.Compare to latest Realme bud wireless this one is far better as I have used realme buds wireless.Trust me, just go for it

title: Battery backup is the majour concern.
body: No doubt about sound quality. Majour concern is battery backup, it won't come 3-4 hrs. Magic stuff is battery level will be showing as 20% and we will get voice alert too but it will get turned off immediately. It's not auggestable for those who are looking for long battery life.

title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR LONG USAGE AND WORKOUTS
body: First and foremost the sound quality is great . Secondly,  this earphone is great for working out and long usage (like 6 to 8 hours) . You will experience no pain in your ears until or unless you put the earbuds too deep in your ears .I highly recommend this for an average earphone user because they are just great for a price of 900.

title: Worst headset
body: I order this headset previous year and after 1-2 months I didn't able to talk via call because after few minutes on call the bluetooth was disconnected or some worst sound came on call like buzz buzz and also our voice breaks on call. Bad experience, Firstly in first month headset was ok and good sound quality but after few month it shows its quality and disappointed me.

title: Not happy with the product as well as return policy.
body: Gives lot of disturbance while driving.Also the bluetooth range is not good.Gets paused while listening to music..I want to return this product now but the window is closed. Also the retailer is not supportive.I ordered 2 by mistake and wanted to return one.I raised a request on the day I got the delivery. But did not get support from Amazon as well as the retailer.

title: Highly recommended
body: Highly recommended. These guys are so best and so professionals. I had my earphones not working so just lodged a service request, they arranged shipment to and fro and just replaced with a new earphones set. I was amazed already but this is epicüî• Go Team Boat üí™

All is good and worth the money. But accessories are not available which is a huge drawback and pushes me to the edge for not recommending it. Ear hooks are not available online and are easily lost. Why not but something with a pattern available over the counter. That's why 2 star, other wise a good buy

title: My first bluetooth earphone..... found boat 255+pro very much best
body: Received on 09.10.2021 & used continuously till date (21.10.2021), its battery is still 60 %I m satisfied by boat rockers 255 pro +No problem found yet.Brought under rs 900 offer.Thanks boat company

title: Simply Perfect
body: Got a great deal on prime day.. bought this wonderful productIt's simply perfect, sound quality is too good, connects to the phone very easilyCharging lasts throughout the day, with good amount of calls & music tooI would recommend a buy

title: Overpriced. Bass should be tuned to prevent it from actual sound.
body: <first  hour review>Phone call:Poor voice quality on phone calls. Some bass kills the clarity in voice.Music:Inferior sound quality when listening to music.Podcast:Average performance. Unnecessary bass is spooling the podcast experience.

title: Poor battery and noise cancellation
body: First impression is good. Sound quality is good. But the grip to hold earphones around your neck is quite light. Sometimes it gets fly away when you are driving. Battery life is good but after using it for 9 days i felt that when the battery is 60% and suddenly it gets down to 20 so fast and recently i was at 60% and suddenly the earphones gets off. After i got replacement, the new product seems to work very nice regarding the battery life but the noise cancellation was damn bad like you can't listen to the music while driving because the noise of the wind is too loud you cant even talk.. and hence i had to return the product..

title: Bass addicted fellows just go and buy
body: Amazing product ,As per in pricing concern ,,Who is addicted to find bass quality sound in music , just go and buy this , this is the perfect for you.Whenever you listen music every bit of every tone you can listen and feel that sound .Battery performance:Battery performance is also good , as per my usage while playing music , calling it's better .Just go and buy this product.

title: Value for money
body: It is good value for money.  Connects very well and no issues.  But sound quality is not that great to listen music.  It does not comes close to samsung earphones.  But sound quality for speaking is good.If music is your priority, go for other earphone, else buy this.

title: Amazing Product!
body: Boat products always come onto the expectations! Boat rockerz 255 pass my expectations!...The product finish is very good and the look is of premium earphones...the sound quality is good if u are a bass lover!....also the noise cancellation is pretty good if we compare with other earphones....The fit of these earphones is very good and comfortable and do not hurt your ears even after prolonged use. I have also been out in light rains wearing these and i am quite impressed with its moisture wicking!....also the earphones are very light weight and don't even feel on your neck which is a must condition for Bluetooth earphones!....overall it is the best buy for 999/-.

title: Good, perfect design ergonomically.
body: Quaint connection notification by disembodied Californian hippie. Love the way the wire leads thicken and have enough heft to sit on the neck loosely without danger of falling off.

title: Please replace my product.
body: Very bad Bluetooth please don't by this type of product..boat is very bad company. After 3 month battery got bloated , getting charging issue and battery will drain after 2 hr . please don't by. service centers not accepting this product they clearly refused to take this product and I already mailed to company for replace but I haven't get any reply from company.

title: Average quality
body: - connecting the device is very tedious, sometimes it won't connect until you power off and power on again.- static noise plays whenever any sound is played.- poor noise cancellation mic, the other person can't hear you properly.

title: Value for money at 899 ;)
body: Yet to use long term, but build quality and sound quality is good. Face some loss in connectivity when the band is covered. Good to watch movies and music on the go. Not sure how it well it functions when going for a run or exercising.

title: its wireless connectivity
body: wireless connectivity is very poor.when you put your mobile in the room and you enter in other room, your blutooth connectivity is lost.and one more thing while you walking or running, sound will be fluctuate.so, finally i want to say that if you want to buy proper neckband then you should have to purchase above rs 1500.

title: Sleek and worth the money
body: Handy and sleek design is what makes this bluetooth earphone amazing. With good sound quality, and noise cancellation, easy connectivity it has everything that is needed to make it worth the money. Go for it if you need a good blutooth earphone..

title: Value of money

title: boAt Rockerz 255 Pro
body: Sound quality is goodBass is niceBattery backup more than 5 hours in medium volumeEar holding fin is hurting my ear size differ from two sidesCharging cable too much tight..plug and unplugging is very complex.Fast charging good..1 hour charging more than 2 hours playback

title: Not worth it
body: No matter how many time you'll use this product , at the end of the year this will automatically stop working and you'll have to replace it and than after the replacement again the same problem will, either it will not charge properly or else left side of the earphones will stop working.  These two are the major issues which Boat should solve .. I've seen the same issues in many boat users

title: Not setting in ears
body: Sound quality is good, but it is not setting in ears, always falling down, I have tried to cancel the product but Amazon has replaced me with another one. What's the use in replacement, when it is not setting in ears. U should have given an option to choose headset of another company. I'm dissatisfied with this. If you have any possibility at least please allow me to cancel this and buy earphones of another company

title: Sound quality: Great! Build quality: Not so great.
body: Sound quality is great. The bass is especially very enjoyable. The vocals were not that good but if you like EDM, this neckband is excellent.The build quality is what made me return these. The material felt like it was very cheap. The ear buds were made of metal and the eartips were also good silicone but I'm talking about the rest of the neckband. The rest of the neckband was made of cheap silicone.

title: The brand name is enough
body: Its bewn a while using boat products and i am highly satisfied and recommend this.Quality is crisp and bass is heavy.Overall it depends on your song preferences and the performance varies accordingly.

title: Piece of Junk.
body: Piece of crap. Intially it was good . After 2 months one side became completely useless and the interesting part is it happened overnight. Complete piece of junk dont buy it if you care for your money . I got it for 899 and here I'm regretting if you're buying it for more than that you will regret more that i did.

title: Good gadget but not best
body: So after using it for more then 20 days I am writing this review ,first of all this gadget is cool in looking and working also ,but it will not work as per the specified effective range to operate, i have paired it with  asus zenfone laser 3 and few other devices ,facing the same problem.Talking about the battery backup ,it is awesome ,charging time is very fast and long lasting .The best part of this is that ,it is very comfortable to wear without any hassle or if you are a music lover that prefer to hear music most of the time than you can go with it, but you can check other option as well in the same price range .

title: Nice but check out others too
body: After using it almost for a month, at times, hearing low battery notification kills me. Initially, I thought 6hrs of play time is enough for me. I will not mind recharging it every evening/night but in reality that does not happen..at least for me. Also, I don't push the earpieces very firmly for 100% noise cancellation. And then, I feel to increase volume and then the expression...uhh..already max :(Overall, I liked it with above experiences time to time :|

title: Not as expected. Using indoor is ok
body: The charging percentage is not showing clearly. Always it shows 80 % and suddenly drops to battery low. Microphone is very far away from the mouth and is in opposite direction. So that the  surrounding noise is clearly heard than our voice to the other end person. Long time using tends to bring you ear pain as it is not ergonomically designed it gives us pain because of the ear buds. The wire width is larger than it appears on the photo and is not comfortable while run or working out. And the main disadvantage is it completely didn't allow outside noise while using hence it is not recommended during driving

title: Good for phone calls
body: Good product for phone calls. Good battery life. But sound quality is not good. Sounds of singers appears different when heared through it. Wired headphones with same price range offers far better sound clarity.

title: Best earphone if bought under 1500
body: I used this product for like 6 months. In between one side of its earphone stopped working but boat team is too responsive as they replaced this product with new one. Sound quality is good but if you want better quality would recommend for other product. Battery life is best even using for so much of time. But facing difficulties as there always some kind of issue happening again and again. Other then its fine if it is bought under sale.

title: So attractive Bluetooth headset with flexible deign and Immersive sound
body: Crispy and Immersive sound with top class built quality.. you will be fan of this bluetooth headset... Very nice design and flexible too for daily usage. After one charge it can last upto 3 days with 80% sound level and proper stand-by use.I can surely tell you to go for it, value for money product from boat.

title: Best in Segment, Battery backup is about 36 hours in single charge.
body: Best in segment product, Battery backup is really good, it's lasts up to 36 hours in single charge, Sound & call quality is decent, Bass is also above average. Worth buying, Recommend.

title: noise cancellation zero
body: how can they claim it is with cvc ? during call, noise is full and no words can be listened. better go with boat 385v2 or one plus for better call noise cancellation

title: Hyped product , really well marketed
body: bluetooth connectivity distance is merely 3-4 metres, finishing of the product is decent and satisfactory.  Not too comfortable in the ear. Plugging in the charging cable is not so smooth, you have to press really hard but you need to be careful too as you might ruin the socket. Noise cancellation level is really low and is a irritating for the person on the receivers end. Good product if you want to use it in places with less external noise and just want to listen to music and don want to spend a lot on a bluetooth earphone set.

title: Worth to buy
body: Fantastic product. Sound quality is too good. Most important battery back up i got delivery 4 days ago since then i dont need to charge and use daily 4-6 hours.

title: Wrost product
body: Hi friends, I'm writing this review after 4 months of using this product, intially it has good sound and bass was awesome but this head phones life was not good with in 4 months my right side of the speaker stopped working and left side of the speaker works with less sound and the quality of the product is very cheap. I would like to suggest you not to purchase this product.

title: Continuously Hearing weird sound
body: So I bought 2 sets of these headphones on the prime day sale(for 1299/- each).The headphones got connected very easily and I played some songs,the sound quality and base are totally fine but here's the main problem you continously hear a weird noise in the background both when you're playing and when you're not.So I'm telling you please dont go for the price go for the quality and brand (be It a little bit costlier but you'll get something better)

title: awesome product
body: i bought itfor 999,I purchased it second time, gifted first one to brother. This is really good.Sound quality is really good.You can connect 2 devices at a time.I connect laptop and mobile both.when listening music on Lappy, if u get a call, it switches to mobile,this switch between device is not good but again in this price its awesome.Battery stand by is 36 hours for me, and i have used it contiguously for 8 hours in one go. So Battery life is pretty awesome.Comfortable on ear.

title: Overall well built. Easy connectivity. Light weight only led indicator needs to be visible
body: 4sep Amazing product very very useful while taking calls as there great connectivity and 10 meter usage is actually true very Happy with the product.Happy with this product but the only challenge is that the led indicator is not visible clearly i think boat needs to work on that portion also it's very light weight easy connectivity having a good experience so far.

title: Not at all worth buying
body: This device is just too poor as it won't even last long. One side Gets damaged too fast and easily whereas within the next fortnight the other side also develops faulty issues which look like this device has been planned or programmed to get damaged one side after another within a very few months after its usage. Complete waste of money and very poorly created tech. Try spending on some other device rather than this piece of garbage.

title: Good one though could have been better
body: Good to opt for if you want a low range bluetooth earphones with long lasting battery life. Sound Quality is good though not as good as other models of Boats earphones. There's little bass. Bluetooth connectivity is impressive. And battery lasts for almost a day of normal usage and 5-6 hours of heavy usage. Only drawback is its very poor noise cancellation. You can't use it to talk on calls. Person on other side will hear all other surrounding sounds except your voice.

title: Poor After sale  Customer Service
body: Mine stopped working within 4 months.1. Good looks.2. Good sound quality as well but poor calling experience.3. Poor quality as it has stopped working withing 4 months.4. Bass is OK.

title: Bass and its range is very good it is stay connected upto 10 to 11 meters
body: I think in this price point . boAt  rockerz 255 is  one of the best bluetooth earphones in India. I bought it in  only 979 rs. Bass is good and voice is also loud  . so overall this is a  good product from boAt . And thankss amazon for giving  me this awesome product  only within three days . I am happy with this delivery undoubtedly . If your budget is under 1000 you will go for it . Thank u

title: Read this review before buy
body: Sound quality good compare to price.Best for zoom office meetings.Connectivity also good but can be improveI found difficulty with buds its little bit annoying when u plugged in the ear.Cannot hold for longOverall good product

title: Please please don't buy any Boat company products, please don't waste your money.
body: Guys please please don't buy any Boat company products if your product will not working and if you have a warranty then also they will not replace your products.such a disappointing boat warranty service.I lose my money because of those worst boat warranty services.Please don't waste your money and don't trust boat services.

title: Awesome bass and sound
body: I just received 255Sound nd bass awesomeBluetooth range 10 mtrs.Bill is not complete.Bill half-torn: If there is a problem in it, then there will be no problem in replacing it?If it is kept in a mobile room, then its range is 10-12 feet when you go out.If the mobile is kept out and we are out: its range is 30 ft.Received 4 earbuds.call ke time bat krne pr srrrr srrr ki awaj aa rhi h.Aaj to mujhe Mila hai.ise kuch time use krne ke baad hi kuch or bta skuga.abhi tk to ye mstttt hIt's my third boat product1st boat car charger2nd boat headphoneNd 3rd rockerz 255.

title: Poor quality of the product
body: Waste of money . Within two months the left side of earpiece isn't working . Inspite of the fact that there is one year warranty , when u raise a complaint there is no reply to ticket generated . Tried calling many times to the costumer care but no reply . Never expected this low quality from boat Bluetooth earphones . Poor quality of product and bad customer service .

title: Best Bluetooth Headset
body: The best part of this phone is the charge which dips down slowly.I bought it on 26th Nov'21 with 100% since then today 29th Nov'21 the charge has dipped only by 20%.Also the sound,bass is good soothing for the ears

title: Got Used Product..
body: Ordered new not refurbished but i got used one..Noticed opening impressions on both top and bottom side openings of the packing box..white powder like dust on both eartips, can be seen from outside of the box.not even opened the box yet.I'll post my review after listening to it.

title: Pathetic Headphones and Worst Customer Service
body: I had raised a ticket for a pair of headphones that were not working.I was promised a pickup of the product as soon as lockdown opens but looks like they just passed time till my one year of warranty expired in July 2020.I have to try to call them but stupid chatbot doesn't solve the purpose.Any new ticket that I file is just closed without any proper reply.I will post this review on Amazon.in also.

title: Very Bad quality Never buy again
body: Very bad quality of the material, initially the product seems to be fine, but after using for 3 months the sound quality detoriate, after 4 to 5 months now the right side ear piece is not working. leaft side is OK , however very low sound. Not able to contact the customer care. no one bothers

title: Poor quality
body: I will never suggest anyone to buy this product it has a very poor quality.. and the saddest thing is company gives extremely poor services..they don't even pick up call they don't even resolve your query.. don't even reply to your emails..service centres are sometimes open and sometimes close so even if the product is in one year warranty it is of no use it's a wastage of money to spend on this product.HIGHLY UNSATISFIED..

title: Bluetooth stopped connecting with any device within 10 days
body: The product was working fine for 10 days. After that it stopped connecting to any device. Tried charging for a full day, but it was still not connecting.Boat customer service was superb. They came and  took the device immediately within 24 hours of regsietring the compalint. It took them 14 days to fix the complaint and they have send it back. Need to check after recieving.

title: Duplicate product
body: Surely a duplicate product. I already own a raging red coloured 255 rockerz which has a very good sound. But this earphone sounds like a local train headphone. There is no option on amazon to return. I got it replaced again got the similar product. Worst in sound.

title: Price justified with some minor glitches
body: The headphones are justified for the price that they are available. I am using these since 15 days now and haven't noticed any major drawback, except that the Bluetooth keeps disconnecting if you are using it while on bike. Some modulations are noticed then. Also, after connecting to a laptop if tried  to connect to the cellphone it does not auto connect. Otherwise and sound quality is good for a normal usage. Battery life is also decent around 4-5 hours of constant use.

title: No service supprt
body: I bought this earphone in Feb. It has stopped working - under warranty period. Amazon directed me to contact Boat, but boat is not registering complaint. I hv informed Amazon, but even they are not helping. Boat does not hv service center even in state capital ( Raipur,Chhattisgarh ).  So, buy Boat product without expecting service support either from Boat or Amazon.

title: Bass lover
body: Length of the earphones are so long its handy after its best . The Backup is 5- 6 day on use of 60 to 80%  I am happy with this product. ¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞ Noice cancellation is just ok type. ¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞If you are bass lover then go for it ¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞¬∞sound quality is ok when you set on 100  volume then you go on another world

title: Sound is good. But after a few months right ear bud is not working. DON'T BUY
body: After 6 months of use sound on left side is not available. It has good backup. But most of this product has hearing problem on left side. SO MY SUGGESTION IS NOT TO BUY  THIS PRODUCT.

title: no bass, only stereo, earpainful sound quality, 3.5 hr battery,
body: its more of a stereo kind of headset.no bass and battery backup is only 3.5 to 4 hr of continuous usage.also, the battery Direct drops to 0 from 20% and switches off within 1 minute showing a low battery.also the discount is highly shown inflated.boat website themselves sell for 999, and amazon ka great indian festive sale price is 899.i bought a oneplus headset lateron , lot better than this

title: Good product can be better
body: It's very bad if wear it when you are laying on a bed not comfortable at all!Over the time you will be adjusted !Anyway it's charge very fast and last almost 7hours continue.But after 4 month of use it's stop working power not even on!Maybe my bad luck üòÖ

title: Just review others who has already bought this product.
body: There are no issues at all of sound quality, noise cancellation and bass quality. But yeah it sometimes causes noises to interrupt the earphones due to which when we hear sounds, the bass gets changed. Also, there are some connectivity issues and the connectivity gets automatically cancelled due to malfunction. Positive points include long battery backup, sufficient distance for connectivity, etc..

title: Overall Good enough.
body: The earphones are good enough for people not looking for something extremely great. Good dound quality and great connectivity. Backup is around 6 hours like mentioned in description. The only thing i found bad which others users have also mentioned is call quality. There is literally zero noise cancellation on call. Other person keeps on complaining that they can hear all the noise around except my voice. Overall.. its a good choice in this budget. Convinient to handle.

title: Fraud by boat
body: In spec boat mentioned that it dose support aptx technology but in reality it does not support it. In my phone all options of aptx are grayed out and it says your headset does not support aptx.

title: Poor Warranty claiming.
body: Don‚Äôt buy this product. Sound and base quality is very bad. Product become faulty within 2-3 months itself. I registered a ticket with them. Delivery partner collected the product from my home. Thereafter no reply. Tried customer care number, updated in ticket there is no update from boat. I strongly recommend for not to buy this product who lives in Kerala especially. Because there is no service centre available for Boat

title: Nice good.
body: I got at an attractive price of 799. This is my 2nd purchase. The first purchase was a year ago. And it's still working properly. This one I bought for myself.

title: Simply Superb
body: Excellent connectivityLooks durableBetter sound clarityMic is great tooBattery charging is great tooLove this product

title: amazing
body: don't think too much, just go with it. 7 people i know have this including me and no complaints. the fit is good and the quality is also good. Charge time is 2-3 hours and you can use up to 6-7 hours. Boat is a trusted brand, just go with it

title: Not worth as per price, even after increasing full volume
body: Not worth as per price, even after increasing full volume of mobile the Bass effect sensed, also no treble sound came, please don't buy this headphones at all its a waste of money. felt very disappointed after ordering a brand like boat such thing has happened. Please don't buy any Boat Earphones , headphones or neckbands, prefer other local brand infact.

title: So nice and budget friendly
body: Actually I used it almost for 3 months where I feel it's better Time to reviewBattery back is awesome as mentionedBass is superSound quality is goodNoise cancellation is goodIt's also can be wearable when jogging or at the time of exercise there is no tension of falling from ears which I feel so betterFor these reasons I'm so satisfied with the product and costI bought it for Rs 1500/-

title: Background Noise cancellation not good
body: Got the earphones 3 days back. As with other boAt earphones the sound quality including bass is really good, but the background noise cancellation is not good. When i am talking on phone, the quality of sound heard by the person on the other side is not good with lot of background noise from my side, which doesnot happen with wired earphones or talking without earphones. Battery backup till now is good. No other issues.

title: Received a faulty piece - Appario Retail Private Ltd
body: one side (left) earbud is not working - i purchased this product to support local brand but paid the price for my reason. received a faulty piece from this brand/seller. don't have warranty centers nearby. how should i approach and whom i should approach?

title: diconnects automatically... choppy sound
body: I'll keep it brief. Don't buy this item unless you are ok with choppy interrupted music. Also, the ergonomics suck big time.I hope amazon filters my review and you find this useful in avoiding your purchase. I decided to return the item within minutes of using it (and I'm usually quite patient). So you can now take a call.Good luck... God Bless

title: NOT FOR GAMING
body: Too much latesy while playing BGMI or other game. Foot step, gun fire, sound effects comes very late ..better use rs 30 earphones with audio jack it will provide accurate time and good sound..Bass effects are goodcall connectivity avgand it's painful can't use for long time

title: Works only for call and media
body: I'm writing this after using for 3 months. I mainly bought it for running and cycling to avoid wired earphones. Sound quality is great and you get what you have expected in aspects of sound. But, it works only for calls and media. There are plenty of other app like maps, etc., with voice navigator. If you are using it when driving with maps, it doesn't work. If you are going to listen just music, its good to go.

title: Pathetic sound quality
body: I bought it because i heard many positive reviews but tge pieces we got even in replacement, mic was very poor. Sound quality during call was very disturbing. Cant recommend it.

title: Awesome at 999
body: I bought this in May '21 sale, been using for 2 days. Bluetooth connectivity is good, I moved to another room i.e. away from the mobile, phone call did not get disconnected. I was skeptical after reading reviews about call clarity due to ANC i.e. Active Noise Cancellation, however, I found the call clarity to be good. I would recommend buying this Bluetooth headset

title: Good sound quality
body: The product is worth the money. It has a nice feel in-ear. It can connect to two devices at the same time. Overall very good. The five star is for their customer service as I received replacement without any hiccups.

title: Not having proper battery life...
body: Even though sound and other features are nice, the battery life sucks. It shows 80% in phone, and with in minutes it will be down to 20% and will turned off. Not sure if it is defective product or the model.Adding to my earlier review, this ear phone is not getting detected in any new devices after it got connected to first phone. Such a pathetic experience, first with battery and now with Bluetooth.

title: Average
body: ‚Ä¢ Bluetooth 4.1 not that much effective, you can buy v5.0 . It will stop working when any obstacle under 10 meter. Not good when you are working and moving. Sound will stuck.‚Ä¢ bass is average‚Ä¢ It has only 5to6 hr play back. Not for people who use earphones 24√ó7 but boat rockers have more play back time.‚Ä¢ built quality not comfortable as compared to boat rockers 235v2. Poor looking and irritating.‚Ä¢ Boat rockers 235v2 may be good compared to 255.

title: Bad earphone with sound and battery backup.
body: Below average product. Not happy at all.Pros : good sound qualityvery uncomfortable, silicon buds are not soft. Bought a memory foam bud pair to use it.Battery life is not ok. Battery is not run as it's brand name .Once give a low battery alarm, dies within  2minOne side is given good and another side give less.No return possiblePlease please please please do not buy any mode.

title: Very very good n cool product......
body: First of all thank you for selling good products.I ordered this product for gift purpose, but received in damage condition (charging section cover was damaged, charging kit not avaliable within box).Same we replace this, next day i received this replacement with good condition,sound quality Amazing......üÜílook wise üíØ% cool.battery back also goodüîã4.5 to 5 hoursValue of money....üôè

title: Not worth the price
body: Massive compromise on sound quality for bluetooth connectivity. Also not that snappy of a connection as their over the ear counterpart Boat Rockerz.The punchy bass of Sennheiser CX 180 is way better than this.

title: Not worth for money
body: The earbuds are not at all good , in quality as well as it will not fit in your ear properly.Battery  life is good and sound quality is below average.There are better options available in the market in terms of technology and value for money.I bought it just because Indian company making a product and and the in the add display it was appearing quality product.I bought this product @1999 INR , and after week i saw someone is selling it @1499 INR .But I'm not a kind of buyer to return the product just for money difference.

title: Got quick replacement of product by "Boat"
body: After use of 1 month I faced problem, but after contacting to "Boat", got quick replacement of product without any hustle. Thanks to pickup and drop warranty replacement proviflded by "Boat".

title: Boat bass & sound good quality product
body: The Bluetooth wireless headset boat is good bass & good quality & I order on 11.08.2020 the courier pick the item & today 17.08.2020 deliver to me I am happy for this purchase but the seller pack the item not too good I open the package the box is damaged so please note for this I extremely happy for this purchase boat headphone bass is soo good so likely product thank you amazon

title: *Product quality dropped drastically. Very much disappointed*
body: *Product quality dropped drastically. Very much disappointed*Product quality is very poor.The curve near the neck is very straight and not as mentioned in the picture online. The quality of income and outgoing voice calls is pathetic. This isy third order and experience of last two same products was awesome but nowadays they dropped the quality drastically. When we plug in the welcome sound now says "you now connected to boAt rockerz" while on my earlier devices it clearly says "you now connected to boAt rockerz 255" somewhat it looks duplicate product.

title: 2 days thought about boat rockerz 255 Bluetooth earphones
body: I really did expected something good from this earphones. The sound quality is neutral, Bluetooth range is not so good(maybe 6 meters at home, 9 meters outdoors) and latency is observable(when you notice that is(^o^), battery life is decent as it is new (will write once it's a few months old) and please don't fall for the 2 device connecting at same time. It's so poorly engineered that if u connect to 2 device after 5 mins of work (:-P) it flickers and sometimes disconnects. The build looks promising but the ear hook is specifically made for people with long ears ( it hurts my ears during prolonged use).

title: Just read once and u will get allü§üüòé
body: Worth for money...Connectivity is awesome..U gonna love the base.. its really too much..And most importantly battery life , many reviews says it's exhaust fast but I bet u can't increase the volume above 40% it's more than enough to listen a pleasurable song, and at this rate battery will last more than 6 hours for sureüòéü§üü§ü go for it.. and don't forget to register your product for warranty claim.

title: Good Product
body: I have been using for a few months now. It has a battery life of 4/5 hrs.Good Bluetooth connectivity, sound quality.The instrument is not tough for rough use. But if used carefully looks like it will last.Good buy

title: When you supply the product available service centre.
body: I bought product from Amazon use 20 day  after 20 day bluetooth auto disconnected from my Mobile more try but not connected then call Amazon customer care and say product replacement time over so we have could not change contact boat rockers care then contact boat rockers care no service center available in sri nagar very bad product waste my money.

title: Its Value for Money..
body: If you want to hear a real sound with a great beat..You can try it out..Its sound quality is far better than Rockerz 385 V2.However, the noise cancellation is not up to the mark but other than that.everything is just awesome. If anyone want to hear a good quality sound with definitive bass, should try this out at once .

title: Ok ok
body: Usually use for calls. Intermittently keeps getting announcement " Disconnected " & then again connected. Battery lasts for 3 days. Volume is loud while hearing & other person hears a lot back ground noise n unwanted noise n many times asks to repeat what I said earlier. With the given price it's ok ok.

title: the build is not up to the mark, and misguiding claims
body: features like qualcomm cvc and aptx were claimed on the boat website but it has nothing such, and it doesnt even properly perform dual pairing, you could hear only one sound.also ears pain after some duration of time

title: Connectivity issue while using WIFI and Bluetooth simultaneously.
body: Overall product is good.But DON'T BUY if you're using wifi as primary source for internet connectivity,as it hinders Bluetooth connectivity while taking WhatsApp calls.i checked the issue on 3 different phones(OnePlus 6t, iPhone 7,op 3t).i have returned product twice but the problem  didn't resolve.But on the other side,when your cell phone is connected to your sim card internet connectivity,it works well.

title: Good quality and light weight
body: I am loving this experience. Good sound quality and battery life is good too(My charge lasts for 4/5 hours) . I am yet to experience other issues if there are any.

title: cheap and best
body: got this wireless once when the wire once were destroyed ...... the product design is amazing the quality is good better than expected fits perfectly and the battery back up comes up to around 12 hours with full use ....so i would recommend this as you can charge and use it at the same time rather than putting it in the box and waiting till it gets recharged

title: Dont buy this cheap trash
body: I bought this on 24/04/2019..Ones side of it stopped working since 28th June... I requested for replacement..They picked up my product on 4th July..Till now (06/08/2019) I didnt get repalced product...They have customer care no. vch they never lift.. In 100 attempts they answered my call only once... and asked about ticket no. I provided my complaint token no....Then they siad due to technical problem status is not showing...then they cut my call without any further information... I lost Rs. 1700..I urge everyone dont buy this kind of trash from such kind of cheaters...

title: Good for temporary usage
body: After usage of 1.5Yr now one of my headset stopped working. Initially sound quality was damn good but after the regular usage can identify the distortion in meetings and also there is slight delay in audio. If you are looking for temporary usage go for it.

title: Awesome
body: Excellent product. I got it in lightning deal for 899. Worth at that price. Even it is worth to buy at 999. Sound quality is awesome. Bass is too good. Bluetooth connectivity is fast and no issue. I connected it to 2 devices simultaneously.

title: Price not justified
body: Overall the quality is okay but it can be improved. I bought this for calls mainly and have observed these issues.The band is very light & flexible which keeps slipping. The noise cancellation is bad which means when you're connection to your Bluetooth, the person on the other side of the call will hear surrounding voices which is irritating.

title: Don't buy.. go for one plus bullet Z

title: Not a good buy
body: Not a good product at all. Mic don‚Äôt work well picks up entire surround noise .
