Amazon customer service says that it is damaged in transit after the repeated followup, the replacement was still in cargo yard and none delivered it and updated as they wanted.

title: Higher Price with low bass
body: I purchased it in sell still the price was higer my friend purchased same one 599 and I purchased it 899 . This is not fair and bass quality is alo not good. I am using ptron bassbudds which is quite good as compared to this one

title: Sound quality is very good and its connectivity is good but the spares as a problem
body: Issue with this product is we do not get an extra ear support. As these are only given 2 of them and are very tent to loos them as there are not so thigh fix to the head phones. Even the same is not available to buy as an option to buy as a spares

title: Bad experience
body: It will not disconnect when both ear phons are magnetic connect,  main important point is when i was  called or who called  receiver not hear proper during communication voice volume very low we need take mice close mouth.....but i used another bluetooth device there is not problem, so i would request you pls give me good product with my expectation otherwise pls rambus my money, as per cost product is not good

title: Very bad experience
body: Right side ear bud stopped working , and when claiming warranty then it was unable to process ,also customer care no is not valid . Very bad experience with this product , as mentioned above it's comes with 1 year replacement warranty, but don't get tempted that's all lie

title: Try something else, don't go for this one
body: I heard that these headphones are good and so I went to buy these, but I won't recommend these to anyone, after I used these for a month.The sound quality is not up to mark and the main thing is the pitch changes automatically even when phone is locked.Noise cancellation is good but by other aspects, these headphones are not worth money.

title: Not happy, going to return it.
body: Earphone is not adjusting in ear. In every 5 minutes, it fell down.It happens due to extra weight.So I didn't like this. I wasted my money.

title: Decent for the price
body: Unlike my other blutooth headphones, this one has to be switched off manually. My other one switched off when the magnets connected.Also, I'm having trouble answering calls via headphone.But it's perfect for rough use and i keep this pair to use when I workout.

Everything thing is the best ..Sound quality ,bass, micro phone etc etc ..But the main problem is that after using 6/7 months left side of bud stopped working and the exact same thing happened with my sisters earphones , thats why I have decided to write review ..When we pay 1500 we expect at least we can use the same for a year and the problem is warranty they provide is only for only 6 months ..So take decision accordingly ü§£Otherwise these were one of the best earphones I have ..Something I still use my old earphones and the right bud is giving his 100%ü§£ü§£

title: Must have..!!
body: Lives up to the expectation. Good finishing.. Sporty look. Great sound & bass. Choose the music mode from your phone if it's available. Volume & play/pause button work great. Long press volume up/down buttons to change songs. Middle button picks/hangs up calls... Great deal..!!

title: Outstanding
body: Generally Bluetooth headphones sound quality will not good. But "boat" smash everything. It's exceptionally good. Build quality is awesome. No words about sound quality. User friendly. Comfortable in ear. I'm very satisfied about this product. üëå

title: Abruptly stopped working
body: This is the 3rd time I have purchased this. The earlier 2 are working fine, that were purchased many months back. However, the 3rd one has stopped charging within 3 weeks of the purchase and now I am unable to find any option for return/refund/replacement.

title: Another awesome creation by Boat!
body: Its a brilliant earphone! The audio is crisp, clear with thumping bass. Fits well in the neck and gets connected in a sec too. The Neon color adds some style to it. It came in a nice box with accessories and manuals. Boat never disappoints!

title: Stopped working in 6 months. Poor noise cancellation and durability
body: Writing this review after using it for 11 months. Noise cancelling is very poor. One can hear whats os happening around more clearly.  Durabilty is strong disadvantage. It is stopped working in less 6 months. Only 1 ear phone is working after 6 months. Overall waste of money for 6 month usage

title: Worst
body: Don't buy these.... battery is poor... always there's hissing sound even when nothing is being played.... There's continue disturbance in voice at fixed interval which drives you crazy l .... Don't go by the numbers.... Do your research then buyIt's an absolute waste of moneyI had to buy new headphones right after buying them

title: Not comfortable to ears
body: Writing a review after using it for 7 months.Overall a decent product in this price range.Pros:1. Good bass and clarity.2. Almost 5-6 hours of battery backup, though it depends on volume.Cons:1. Not comfortable to your ears.2. Fit is not very good.3. No noise cancelation at all and believe me this is very irritating while taking calls.

title: Good earphone,but some design flaws
body: Pros:Good sound qualityBattery backup is excellent!! You will love itComfortableand light weightCons:Design is not good compared to other headphone design. Mic kept in the movable wire instead of the neck band makes it difficult in calls if it moves here and there! Also that mic on the wire looks a bit awkward(personal opinion)

title: Awesome product, usb rubber cover got damged.
body: Sound from this product is awesome. It has a good buit quality, but when we came to the usb charging port cover it came to tear by regular use. My usb cover starts tearing off from it (may be it was due to my rough usage). Anyway they are claiming it as sports headset,though sport usages will not be a calm one so i noted it here. Otherwise it is good.

title: Value for money
body: Sound quality is very good.Bass is excellent.Its very comfortable in the ears.Its wearable for a long time and doesn't cause any discomfort.But its not very suitable for running purposes.Build quality is very good.Connectivity is excellent.Do buy this if you're looking for a value for money neckband at this price range.This one's totally worth it.

title: Best wireless headsets
body: The headset is awesome. sound quality of headset is good and bass is also good . noise cancellation is great but when i connect with two devices simultaneously i notice a little problems. battery backup is 5 to 7 on full charge. it has also fast charging (20min = 4 hours) support but i recommend use after full charge(it take 1:45 hours) for better battery lifeoverall the product is good!

title: Seems I received refurbished one, The quality of sound and the parts are not as in the original
body: The original boat-rockers 255 I have experienced from my friend was good. But the received item I received is different from the original. The USB charging port cover is not fixing properly and it has a sharp projection than makes discomfort while wearing. But the original one has a sap fit design and has no projection after insertions. I have uploaded 2 photos of the received item and the original for your ready reference. The sound quality also not as good as in the original. I request for a replacement providing a good one.

title: Worst product
body: I had purchased this on 27 jan 2021 and it stopped worked on 13 feb 2021. Light not on after switch on.  Worst product ever I had purchased. Don't purchase such product. You will pretend after purchase.

title: I give 5 star.
body: I give 5 star rating because the sound quality is so Cristal clear and the bass is extraordinary. The battery backup is suberb. The neck band is light weight, so you won't feel and the magnetic lock is so useful, so it won't drop from your neck. You have 1 year warranty so no need to worry expect physicall damage.My personal experience my headset not working one side after 8 month usage. I got replacement under warranty within 15 days. So customer service is also good.

title: Low price. connect appx 3-4 meters but sound quality degraded in 4 months.
body: HI Have purchased in Dec2019. the quality is like normal headphone with batter back upto 3-6hrs (depends calls/musics) but now after 5 months the sound output is 10% (not able to hear). submitted request under warranty.  and secondly on boatrockerz warranty request the this model is not listed to submit the claim.. hope they will support....

title: Good built quality as well as sound
body: I like the product but some how when i open the parcel its box seal is broken. May be some one return the package and they gave me that broken seal package that i dont like, Thats is why i am giving 3 star otherwise product is good.

title: Poor quality product
body: Poor quality product though the sound is good but the product quality is very bad. Poor durability. Last year I had purchased this product and after 6 month left ear speaker has stopped working and after 3 month right side also stopped. Providing 1 year warranty and thia product does not work even for 1 year

title: Read all review
body: If you but this only for bass boosted sound,Then thus is a good choice.But all-over that's not a Worth of money.Why???üëáüëá-Built quality is very poor.-so lenthy wires.-connectivity issues on very short range.-mic quality is very poor.-all over you should spend 500 more and buy a JBL or any other bot.

title: Mediocre, avoid buying these.
body: Headphones have servere connectivity issues  I use the Redmi note 4, the rockerz start having disturbance and voice starts breaking as soon as I keep my phone inside the pocket. Returned the product once 2nd one also had the same issue.Way of keeping them on the neck  with magnet is great.The noise cancellation is pretty good but at the same time is dangerous, it blocks out traffic noise totally.Audio is average, artificial bass dominates everything. Audio quality lacks basic details.Call quality was decent till the time there was no Bluetooth connection issues.Switched to tagg inferno, audio quality is much much better, connectivity problems are close to absent.

title: Bad Product
body: After reading many positive reviews i bought it. Within 2 Months of use i started getting connectivity issues when song is playing suddenly it will get disconnect. I Checked with other phones and Laptop found out headset is the problem claimed warranty. They will provide you a phone number but it wnt work everything is in email though it took 15 days to get my replaced product which i got now i was happy that i got replaced but it didnt last for 10 min too  i felt too bad when my replaced product stopped working in 2nd song itself worst worst worst product. Who will give faulty product for replacement better go for some other option waste of money ......

title: Awesome product
body: I've been using headphone from 2-3 months it has good sound quality, noise cancellation over calls , little less bass quality, n has real fast charging quality ...it takes 10min to charge upto 50%, bt it beeps frequently when connected to 2 devices that I didn't like about it , otherwise its an awesome product

title: Awesome
body: Make sure your device volume is below 10%,before you connect to this sh*  ,if not it blown up yourüëÇ.bass,bass,bass,bass,bass. Go for it. Good noise isolation. Before I'm using boat rockerz400. Little bit lack of treble compare to boat rockerz400. But bass is same.

title: Good at the price range. Only good not the best.
body: First of all amazon should really improve their packaging the box arrived almost in smashed condition. Torn from either sides and my extra earbuds and usb cable were missing. But my rating is not based on that. It's the product. It has great bass but voice clarity and low tones are compromised. May be I am not the right buyer for this product as I don't really listen to high bass songs. Moreover it's a tad uncomfortable to my ear. But at the price range not much to complain. But my product was incomplete thanks to amazon.

title: Good product for below Rs. 1000
body: I am using this headphone for last 1 month. Really a good product in this price range. I have got this in 1000 rs in a sale. This headphone has good build quality and good quality sound. Only one problem is the mic. That dont have good range.

title: No replacement if headphones stop working after 2 weeks.
body: I ordered these headphones, they went well for the first 2 weeks after which I got them replaced, the replacement piece was even more faultier. There is no way of checking the headphones, and Amazon does not guarantee replacement even if the product is originally in the warranty time slab.It seems like these type of headphones are programmed to stop working after sometime.

title: Quality of the sound is really awesome. But the company also must look at it's build quality.
body: Well i used boat products before they are good as they were before.pros - base is good , water resistant ( here doscription says IPx4 but my earphone box says IPx5, and that is even better , you should update your product description. ) , Magnet lock , design .Con - cable is a bit long. As it has control box both side and a little hard cable at back, the remaining cable shouldn't be this long.Above all its a good product. Recommend to all the people who wants to buy a cheap but best wireless earphone.5 people found this helpful

title: Good quality product
body: Valo head phone kharap na akta good quality product .bt amr j ta experience,,,, ai headphone a majhe majhe amr theke onno loker  ba garir horn ba music sound  besi sunte Pai jar stathe Ami kotha boli...Abr Ami jokhn jore bike chalai ba bus a kothai jai tokhn jar stathe kotha boli majhe majhe bole Ami kno sound I sunte pacchina hawa r amr kotha thik thak sunte Pai . A ki a?? Mukher kache mic. nia kotha Bolte hoi aktu dure thakle kotha sunte pacchina tai bole.To bolbo ai problem ta Jodi thik kora jeto to aktu update kora jeto jate all Time j kotha bolbe tar kotha tai sudhu Sona jabe onno karo kotha ba sound Sona jabena. Tahole valo hoto

title: Good sound quality & noise cancellation.
body: I'm writing this review after using the earphones for certain days. The sound quality is really good, you are able to hear the music & every details of it very clearly. Also it is of great use while on call, the sound is very clear. Noise cancellation of the earphones is fairly good. Overall a good product.

title: Already used and returned product delivered
body: This is not working,  already used and returned product delivered,  waste of money,  not connected to device, don't buy, if you can buy product cleverly checked first, this Bluetooth is connected to mobile with in 10 minutes disconnected, it's regularly,  first I am not checked, not used this Bluetooth,  after few days checked,  return timed out.

title: Handy and easy to use
body: It has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity but the following things disappoints me1.Bluetooth range not more than 10m2.Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in front.3.The battery gets emptied quickly compared with its peers.

title: Superb Bluetooth till date from Boat.
body: +Nice Bass+Exellent battery backup for me its15 days n more+Charging  100% under 20 mins+Zero Disconnection+Exellent voice quality while driving.+Best Music Quality+Super Build QualityEnjoyed till date.##No cons foundüòä

title: No proper Custcare service from boat..
body: It's been  2 months I have mailed as well as complaint by calling for the boat earphone not working still no response.. Very upset with the kind of Custcare services from boat.. So pls think before u buy the product..

title: Not water proof it seems, also the charging cable not fitting into the charging slot.
body: It says water proof and sweat proof but as the picture shows there is a gap between the connections. I really doubt wheathet it could withstand water or it can be used in rain..Also the charger cable which was sent along with the product is not fitting into the slotüò°...i had to use my phone charging cable!! It seems like a low quality product..

title: Satisfied
body: Its been just 1 day so I'll give my first impressionProduct exactly as shown in imageCrystal clear soundBass is ok...Not that highBuild quality is goodLittle bit uncomfortable after 2-3 hours as im not used to itOnly problem is sound vanishes for a second or two after evry minute or soOverall satisfiedüëç

title: 6 Months report - Battery issue
body: I purchased these earphones on 6 February 2019. It worked great until now. I used it regularly and it gave me 8-10 hours of battery life. Since the last 3-4 days, I am facing the charging issue. It is getting discharged only after 30-45 minutes of playing even though I charge it for more than 1 hour.Update: I reported a complaint with Boat and got a replacement product after around 15 days. The new products stopped charging after around 15 days. Very unreliable and disappointing. I have sent them an email regarding this and still waiting to hear.

title: Good and value for money
body: Perfect iteam but i dont like packaging but the main iteam is pretty goodi am placing this photos of boat to inspire you to buy it good oneSound quality 4.5Packaging 2.5Build quality 4I am editing my review after 1 year now battery back up is very bad and it only get 5 hour backup if it is in medium volumeSo go for oneplus bulletz or realme wireless headphone is better brand

title: Good battery backup. Can connect to both mobile and laptop/firestick.
body: Been using for few months now.Pros: Battery is good. Can connect to both mobile and laptop/firestick without any issues.Can use while jogging, doing exercises without any issues. Charges faster.Cons: Signals might be unclear for distances greater than 15 feet.

title: Right earbud stopped working within 1 month
body: Battery backup is superb. Was using these earphones only for calling. But right earbud stopped working within 1 month of buying the product.Update:Boat support were really helpful and sent replacement product. Still giving 4 stars as original product stopped working within 1 month.

title: Very bad, disappointed
body: Not goodOne side earpiece stop workingClaimed warranty but it again stop workingVery badDisappointing qualityAnd after warranty the noise cancellation stop working another person on call always complaint about background noiseGo for any other brand

title: Connectivity issue
body: This handset has a lot of connectivity issues for calling voice sound while calling is not clear, replace this handset for 5 times but this issues is not yet resolved,my preferences to someone to skip this because it's not worth buying things and keep  replacing continues.its very disappointing dont go with this product,2 time of these products were replaced within 7 days of delivery of replacement

title: Please don't buy
body: These wireless earphones have a FAULTY DESIGN. I felt uncomfortable after using them for just 2 minutes. I have used many different brands in the past, but never have I ever encountered such a faulty In-Ear design.Sound & Noise cancellation is good, and being a good brand I hope that it lasts longer.But its faulty design stops me from using it.Please go for higher priced earphones and not this one.

title: Please don't buy
body: Earphones stopped working in just 2 months and there's no way to contact Manufacturer for claiming warranty. You'll have a number where you'll speak with IVR automated call and it will send you an url which will throw you an error while raising compliant. The same thing applies to email support as well. They will send that URL in email reply. I've sent multiple emails till now, still not received any reply from them.  BOAT is worst manufacturer and weird support. This is happening for the 2nd time for me

title: Not worth it...
body: Not worth it... This was my first purchase from mi, and its not worth all the hype that has been created in the market.Overall build quality looked cheap, performance was average. The biggest con is connectivity and battery backup.Go for slightly higher price range and look for a better brand.

title: Good buy
body: We're using this product for a month now. It's really good. I was using Samsung level U but the wire snapped. This one is pocket friendly, flexible and worth buying. I went by Amazon choice and for the first month I'm really happy. Hopefully it works like this for a long time.

title: Good but
body: Using it from long time and the battery quality is best. Even for whole day use the battery lasts for almost 5-6 days. The neck band could have been more flexible for easy rest on neck. Else value for money

title: Original range 4 meter. Hook type design in buds cause pain in ear musles.
body: This earphone is good in sound & bass.But problem with this earphone is thier range isVery very very low I try this approx after 2.5 to 3 meter thier sound quality get cancelling.And after 4 meter Bluetooth disconnected from phone.2nd problem is due thier hook type design in buds after 1hour using earphone Continously cause pain in ear muscles, so i need to take 10 minutes break from buds.

title: Good but expensive.
body: The quality of the product is good. But I‚Äôm buying this product in May 2020‚Äôand at this point the product feels a little to expensive for 1500 bucks. If they could lower the price to 1k , so that the product justifies the price and the competition going around.

title: Nice
body: Nice product from boat I am using this for a year but its sound quality is good after 1 year also. It worth buying.  Its cable is slightly bend after a year and charging cover is broken but it doesn't affect sound quality. I have seen it's playback time is decreased by 1.5 hrs but still it's good deal to buy this

title: Very worst product ...Don't buy this.
body: After 18 days of purchase, stopped working. Return window on Amazon was closed,so I have to contact boat customer service for warranty. Unfortunately they don't have enough service station in Kerala. Even no office in Ernakulam. Waiting for them after submitting online complaint..Don't know it will fruitful...very bad experience.

title: Boat Rockerz 255 pro 4star/5star
body: Boat Rockerz 255 pro is Great product.Sound quality  is awesome, Battery  backup is good  9/10,Fast charging  only  45mnt to 1 hour 100%Bielt Quietly good....Thanks Amazon sel this product Wright priceAnd Nice service Amazon.......

title: For this price I think its good not the best
body: Sound quality is good but lacks noise cancellation. I have used it before too, faced issue in Bluetooth connectivity after sometime while connecting to new device. So overall i will rate it 3.5 out of 5

title: Within 5 months one ear phone stopped working
body: I bought it on 27th january and by June its cap of charging point is gone and one ear phone is not working, no sound.Sound quality is not so good, no noise cancellation...Not worthy of its price...Very upset with it

title: Wooh ...amezing
body: I reviewing it after almost 2 year of use.very light ,very comfortable,excellent sound ,very easy to connet.i cant say about online gaming experience becoz i am not use it on any online game.wire quility is good.only problem with that its has 2..3 hours back up with continue use.

title: Manufacturing defect...
body: Sound quality is good, but not recommended for long time continuous usage....Disconnected frequently after 3 to 4 hrs of continuous use...

title: A Better Choice Under 1Küëçüëç !!
body: Straight to the point...Bass - No problem...Sound - Decent sound...Vocals no problem...Treble somewhat...Mic - Ok/AverageComfort - So much Better than 225(wired), which was soooo uncomfortableBuild quality - Good but definitely not for rough use...Charging - came with 100%...Charging port is somewhat tight...Rubber opening make you tensed...Overall a Decent/Good product but only under 1K price !! So look for Dealsüëç

title: Noise cancelling doesn't work properly , May be it doesn't come with noise cancelling
body: Sound quality and bass quality are the best but there is a problem in his mic , there is no any noise cancelling which produce i received but my friends has same product but his product was worked properly . And his noise cancelling is worked properly . I don't know why my boat rockers 255 pro + is not being worked properly that's why i replaced this product .

title: Not worthy
body: I got the same earphones as replacement but there was no refund . The sound quality is poor ,very less even at the highest volume to be used in an open environment .no noise cancellation at all . The fitting of ear buds is very loose . Cant use while light workout even . Very very disappointed with the product .Doesn‚Äôt go with the brand image .

title: not bad
body: the original product was faulty.. had to claim warranty and had it replaced.. the replaced product is working fine but was in different color from the one i originally ordered

title: A Dissappointed long time Amazon customer.
body: The earphone's rubber hooks fall of easily.Bluetooth stops connecting sometimes when I connect my phone and keep it in my pant pocket.Right side speaker has stopped working completely.The one star is also due to Amazon's service. My product is within the one year warranty period. However, to claim this warranty, I have to submit the Invoice which is not visible when I try to access it through the Amazon app, website or messages.Wehn I click on 'view/print invoice', I get a message that says it is rush hour and traffic is piling up. Plz try again later..

title: Don't think so much just buy it üî•üí•
body: It cost me like ‚Çπ1200 but I think its really worth to buy it in this price.5‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êfor quality ‚ò∫It connects 2 devices simultaneously at a time.‚úîFast charging ‚úîNoise ‚úîAudio‚úîWater resistant‚úîEverything is best.üíØI will recommend you guys to buy it now without any doubt...Please ignore my cat in the backgroundüòÖüòÇ

title: Be Careful of Seller Sendin A Used Product.
body: Ive been a boat rockerz fan for past few yrs now. This was my third boat rockerz. But was disappointed totally when i opened the delivery box. The item seal was already open. When i removed the headphone i saw it full of dirt and was turned brown wid this i knew it was a used one. Third there were no extra earbuds included and boat never does it. I recommend dis headphone but if d seal is broken return it directly

title: Battery Life issue
body: Using this headphones from 5-6 days and found below issues.1. Battery life is too poor, while using it shows 100% battery but while using battery drained out in 15-20 minutes2. Automatically disconnection of headphone while connected with phone.3. Ears are paining while using the headphones 1 hour or so.4. Battery discharge very quickly.5. While plugin to charge when its 0%, it started showing 100% charged in 15 minutes, that's a CRAP.I have now returned the product back to the seller and call for a replacement. So, its better to be move towards SONY, JBL or Sennheiser Headphones.

title: This is Not original BoAt
body: The built quality is very bad, and I would recommend you to buy from the boat officials, it is a first copy product not the original

title: Fake product received
body: The seller is give the copy version of boat product amazon please go through this as I had give the photo u can se those are the same model boat 255 pro the yellow is missing key details is has no noice cancelation and also some basic build up quality I want refund for my product immediately and please amazon dont sell us this duplicate product and also ban thos sellers

title: Far Below Expectation
body: I was swayed by the numerous reviews, but it is just an average product.  If battery charging is fast, its depletion is faster.  There is nothing that calls for a higher rating.

title: Poor quality
body: Don't buy this product. Ear hooks are too loose to retain. I lost both and couldn't find new. One side stopped working within 3 months. Returned and waiting for replacement for 2 weeks. Too tough to contact customer care.Not a good product n service is too poor.

title: Won't say great but okay okay
body: Sound is okay but there is this constant hissing sound after you pause audio for some 5 seconds  which is kind of irritating. This I found out to be common problem with this model as there were many reviews on YouTube which I discovered after ordering this product. Battery life is amazing though. I would say battery life is all it has in its pro. Everything else is okay okay.

title: Wrong choice
body: Waste of money, people who all reviewed it as great seems they rated it for no good reason1. Sound quality is extremely poor and it feels like a local headphone which is sold in the market. NOT upto the mark.2. Battery drains in no time, charging hours compared to listening hours will be less.

title: Worth
body: Good one to buy at this cost.When the battery level is ~20%, Bluetooth connectivity becomes issue. But, battery lasts long and so I faced this issue only twice in past 4 months of usage.Bass is reasonable.

title: Good Product But Malfunctioning after 1 or 2 months
body: It was a nice product. Good Sound Quality and all. but Started malfunctioning when calling. Sounds from d caller get distorted and cant understand at all.. It still working good in otherwise like Audio Video playing from phone..I hav just registered a compalint in d support site (Tocket No : 421323)Hope it will get resolved soon and I can make it a 5 star then..Update : Product got replaced and new one works up to expectations.. thanks for the support..

title: Value for money !!!
body: Packaging was good.  This is my second bluetooth eargear purchase.  First was many years ago and was always reluctant to buy them again, but this one proves to be best buy.  Sound quality is upto the mark for the price paid.  It was actually more than what i have expected.  Thanks Amazon for getting this product.  Thanks again.

title: Defective peice
body: I can't believe that amazon is selling such defective products.. I trust boat for its product quality and have been using boat earphones since 3 years.. This is the first time i have received such productOne of the earpeice is not working..And even the battery backup is worst.. It's battery drained from 80% to 0% in just 30 min..I requested a return and then even the return was cancelled ... don't know why..

title: Product is good but after sales service is pathetic
body: the sound signature and product quality is above par in this price range, though the cable length is bit long. but if there is any issue and product is to be serviced during warranty period, then its a really different story altogether.its been more than a month and i am yet to receive my serviced/replaced unit and i dont have any way to get any further update to my ticket and my unit. its strange that the customer care number and support email ids are there, but those are not monitored well it seems.

title: Its really amazing under this price range
body: After over 2 month of useI feel its really amazingSound and bass quality is bestBattery backup also good accordance with this productIf u want to a gaming headset dont go for it because its not a gaming headphoneBut except gaming its really very very good in otherThis is best under this price rangeDont hesitate buy it

title: Product at its best and quality.
body: Bought it at 899.Sound quality is good.More focus is on Bass. You will feel bass.It is best at this cheap prize.Bluetooth connection is good. Wire is long so that allow to use while any activity.For those who wants good product at its best prize can buy.

title: Average bass
body: The best part about boAt Rockerz 255 Pro+ Bluetooth Wireless is its noise cancellation and decent sound quality. Battery is great so far.After some point my ear began to hurt, plus the bass quality is below average. Really want boAt to improve on the quality of bass on its bluetooth neckband products. Overall I would give a 3.5 out of 5.

title: Nice Product - Highly Recommended!
body: Comfortable to the ears. Sound quality is pretty good:-1. Sound clarity - Excellent. Clear sound.2. Bass - Nice.3. Noise Cancellation - Descent but not 100%.The battery backup is also very well ( as of now, at least, couple of weeks after using it) The design is sleek and trendy.Overall - Recommended!!

title: Poor battery life and built quality
body: 1) Battery Backup is Pathetic,hardly 4hrs.2) The irritating voice reminder when your battery is below 10% and it works hardly for 10 mins at 10%3) cheap plastic built quality.4) Sound quality is poor,low volume even at max level5) The wire is strong,won't tear off easily6) Go for O n e p l u s earphone ,way better

title: earplugs and mic are not comfortable
body: Earphones are canal types which feels heavy on the ears. You can't keep them fitted inside your ear for long. Mic reception is not good, u have to hold it near mouth to function properly. The plastic quality is below average, the earcanals are also of very low quality material. catches too much dust.

title: Appreciate this product for excellent features and quality..
body: Super bass with excellent and clear sound quality... Battery backup is awesome and also contain fast charging features that is make this product too good on this budget... Noise cancelation performance is also better...Thank you boat for providing this product with bunch of excellent features on normal budget

title: Worth it purchase
body: Boat has a pretty good sound quality and bass. This is great for travelling, gym etc as it does not fall out and has a neck support. The color is a little dim not as vibrant as in the picture, thats a small disappointment for me. Sound quality is good and makes it worth the spend.

title: Best
body: I love it great sound quality and colour is amazing üëç. I was quite skeptical to buy it before because I never purchased electronic stuff online but after I recieved the product every penny was worth it

title: Worst product damaged in just few days
body: With in fewdays of use, disconnecting automatically. And not working properly...waste of money...if we submit issue to the boat they're simply sending service center number...worst experience will never purchase boat

title: Battery backup
body: Boat Rockerz 225 Pro+ the only thing I fell in love is with the battery backup. I charge for one time and it goes for 3days max to max. If I say about the sound, it's also cool. But somewhere there you'll find some kind of noise disturbance still it's is okay. Passive voice cancellation is not there. Looks still good.Worth buying!!

title: Not Good
body: Sound quality is great compared to Realme earbuds I used before.Decent battery backup and quick charging.Earbuds magnet are very weak.Edit: Very bad built quality.Sometimes no audio on right side.Discharges fast.

title: Value for Money wireless earphone
body: Superb quality wireless earphone ever used, best sound quality to listen music,voice calling and noise cancellation is also perfact.Fits perfact in ear and suoerb battery life for fullday use.The only one thing i didn't like is loose rubber support, it can be lost easly at anywher.

title: No noise cancellation at all.. only good for hearing songs
body: The bluetooth is really good for listening music. To use it for calling, you have to be in an isolated place so that the other person can hear you clearly. If you are in a public place or even at home it will capture all other sounds very loudly but not yours. Only buy if you are going to use it for listening to music. It will not disappoint you there. It has good bass, treble and vocals.

title: Very good product
body: Sound quality is awesome however noise cancellation needs some work. Blietooth connectivity is also seamless. Battery life is good. Using since last 15 days now. No fuss about carying your phone around when you are moving  20-25 feed

title: No Vibration call alert, Buttons placed Inconvenient
body: Almost 1 week Battery backup is gooddisadvantage is..1. No Vibration call alert, it must need when we drive bike and phone kept in pant pocket2. Buttons placed Inconvenient - Call attend button is at right side wire, whenever we receive call, we difficult to find the call attend button.Both of the above is regular use. but inconvenient.otherwise ok

title: Really suprised me
body: I didnt expect this much from boat.I got this for 1499Sound quality is good and the Bass is deep( great)Fits so perfectlyButtons are very reliableBattety is good (  only used for 2 days)Its very worthy on this budget...Honest review

title: Got duplicate product in replacement.
body: Firstly i ordered this product and sound quality was pretty good.But because of some issues (sound disturbance) I replaced this product and in replacement i think i've got duplicate product.I just applied to return this product.1)Shipping box is damaged2)product is damaged too (button for lower the volume is always pressed) (clearly visible in image)3) sound quality is too poor.

title: Honest review üåö
body: It's a good purchase! ‚ù§I have purchased boat 225 and it is going good till now and 2 years have passed of purchasing that product..I also have purchased boat rockerz 400 and it's also running good till now and it has been 2.5 yrs now!So i am expecting this kind of durability from this üòã.. And my expectation has been matched with this! üòäAnd this ocean blue colour is superb‚ù§üí´

title: worst customer service
body: The product is fine , it started giving problems after 6 months but the major issue is customer service of boat. That is pathetic they neither reply on mails nor pick calls .people working at service centres they even dont know about their another services  not at all helping . Never gonna purchase boat product ever again .

title: Choose BOULT over BOAT. This is waste.
body: Worst Bluetooth earphones ever. Go for BOULT anytime. Bluetooth connectivity fails even when you go 5 feet away from your cell. I remember using my Boult earphones from bedroom till hall without any problem. Sound breaks even when ur cell is in ur jeans back pocket. Worst battery backup..Boult kills boat here as well. I bet you will get a feeling or using wire earphones..bcz dts d max range it can perform average.Do not buy and then regret.

title: Good product but I can't hear sometimes
body: I can't hear sometimes when I just connect with this during call, it takes me two times to cut the call and call back again, and sometimes can't hear for a second in regular intervals when listening to music or watching something when I have the earphones connected but haven't used it for a certain time like two or three hours.

title: Too much Bass, makes the ear ache

title: Average, not too great
body: The earphone built quality is good. But sound is average. Also, you have to manually connect and disconnect everytime. Whereas the Realme earbuds automatically connect and disconnect when you open. I would recommend to go for realme earbuds instead of this.

title: Excellent but producing them in india would have been better
body: Using this headphone for the past 15 days. Sound, Noise cancellations, battery life, and build quality is OK. As they are designed and marketed by an Indian company which produces other models of these headphones in india they should consider shifting the manufacturing altogether back to India from china. This will certainly improve the image of the brand as they will stand out from other Chinese built products.

title: Good and affordable

title: Worth it...
body: Got it within 24 hours from the time of Order. Great product, great sound.As I purchased it for usage during bike riding, while riding little difficult to maintain the voice calls, because like other earphones, mic can't be placed near your mouth and opposite person will hear very low voice and other vehicle sound will be heard too high.The strap has to be placed near the neck which is bit far from the mouth to reach out the voice.Rest everything is wonderful and fine.Go for it.

title: Value for money
body: Product is too good within this price range. The hanging control panel feels slightly odd but according to its battery life and other features, it is manageable. Overall value for money product. But packaging was too poor and seal was also broken. But product was untouched and without any scratches.

title: Almost fine in all aspects except fitting over neck while riding two wheelers

title: Nice bluetooth earphones .

Would not recommend it to anyone.

title: Great product

title: Full review after long use

title: Decent bass effect but submerged vocals.

It doesn't have Cristal clear sound like Sennheiser cx 180 or cx 213. I am returning the product as I am not enjoying listening music on it. Amazon service is great product got delivered within 2 days.

title: Never buy
body: Bought 2 sets after seeing reviews here...1.stopped working within 1 week,the next one stopped working in around 1.5 months...worst purchase from amazonGave 1 star bcos i couldn't find a lesser rating

title: Beast!
body: ¬∂ boAt name itself is enough coz it doesn't let anyone compromise in any of its features.¬∂ Only one thing disappointed me is its design and build quality. Dust easily accumulate on it and also when I put it on, it looks little wierd.¬∂ If only music is what matters to you, then it's a gem, trust me! title: using from 1 year review.
body: I am using this product from last 1 year. I use it daily at least for 3 hrs.  the product is as good as newly packed even after one year. After 1 year of usage the battery backup is still more than 7 hours.  I used it for 3 days in a single full charge.  the awesome build quality makes this  perfect one. i will surely recommend this product who is looking for long run in less money.  i wish to give more than 5 stars  but there is only 5 stars available to rate.

title: Not made for calls, Worst.
body: The sound is good but the connectivity is worst. While I was on a call the the other person was not able to hear me at all.Do not buy if calling is your purpose, if you want it for music only, then go fot it.

title: Eco problem during call
body: This is my replacement order and facing same issue. Other person can't here my voice properly during the call via Bluetooth. They can only here background disturbance even i sit in room. Eco problem! Deciding to return and order some other brand. This is only good for music.

title: Do not buy. Worst product. Stopped working 2nd time.
body: Do not buy. Worst product. Stopped working for the second time.Ordered it on 15th July, product was delivered on 16th.One side of the earbud stopped working in first week of Oct 2019. Got it replaced from the company. For users information, company allows ine time replacement warranty.Now since the product I use is already replaced earlier, the product is out of warranty.Rs.999 I spent on this product is a complete loss to me.

title: DO NOT GO FOR THIS.
body: Do NOT go for this. Bought it thinking about the company and it's supposedly nice features. First 4 months, Everything was fine. Noice cancellation was good. But the 5th month, without any warning the right side stopped working. Morning it was fine. Evening spoilt. It was exactly in the Same place where I had kept it. No wire cut. Nothing. Just like that. Paying so much we expect it to be durable for atleast an year. But 4 months??! It's absurd. I do not recommend this to anyone. Waste of money. Nonsense

title: Not as expected
body: Infinity glide 120 more better. It doesn't have neither good sound quality nor the proper bass. Only a voice is coming out even in most melodious song.

title: Worth it...
body: Nice product. Packaging was worst. When i received its messed up in plastic packet, but its working. No tracking available till i get the product.Amazon should improve these things.Otherwise boat is nice brqnd value for money.  I got it for ‚Çπ999 in sale. Worth it.

title: Rating -3.5, Good product for  Rs 999.
body: Overall Product rating is average but good at this price point (999).Packing is very bad. It seems like a second hand product as the pack is almost damaged but no issues for the headset.Sound quality is average. I can give a 3.5 rating for the sound quality. Built quality is good but the long wire is annoying. Design is not as good as other products in this price range.Bluetooth connectivity seems fine. I didn't have any issues yet.Overall I can give a 3.5 rating.

title: Painful to ears
body: Sound quality of the product is very good , Paring takes 30 seconds, amazingly easy . The biggest problem is in the zest to increase the bass , manufacturer has increased the overall diameter of the speaker , this when covered with rubber gloves is tight to ears and start to hurt after 20 , 30 minutes of usage . I felt the design to fit in on all types of ears is not universal , could have been of better design , i could not use them after 20 min due to an uneasy feeling and pain

title: Connectivity issue

title: Bass was not so good , not for pubg

title: don't buy waste of money and time

title: Build up quality

title: Try some other seller/ Or avail warranty
body: Don't buy this from this seller, not durable at all, the condition is really bad just after a monthEdit: Seems like I figured out late, but this product comes with 1 year manufacturer's warranty and so I got a replaced piece just yesterday and it's in great condition. It took 25 days to replace the piece since I filed the complaint, but considering the lockdown restrictions, I think they did a good work. Happy with it! Hope this turns up better than the earlier piece I got...

title: Great for the price.

title: The product does not delivers as per the Brand value.
body: The clarity while talking is not good, if you are outside it will be very difficult to listen. The sound quality is good only while listening to music. The LED light indication is not at all visible in the daylight. It's connectivity or pairing is poor. The looks of the product is very ordinary. This product does not looks like it is for 900/- after discount. The product does not meet up to its brand value.

title: Just like a Rs.3 pen. Use and throw material
body: It may be tempted by seeing this product, because of price and everyone around you is buying this product. I also bought the same due to the same reason. Frankly speaking, this is a good product (just like any BOAT), but the problem is it won't even last a year. I bought this on 27th August 2019, but just afer 3 months and 10 days, one of my ear buds lost audio; and it's now useless. About it's bluetooth connectivity, you can get good quality about 3-4m only not more than that.

title: Overpriced but best sound quality in this price

I hope I won't have to!Note: I bought it for 1999 and in 2 days the price dropped by 500. Now they are selling it for 1499. :-(

title: Nice quality and service...

title: High priced

title: Sound quality is good

title: Ear piece stopped working, It doesn't have good treble, Not for vocals

title: Music lovers read this!! Before buying.

Not only this all other Bluetooth earphones in this rangeI tried leaf sport 2, leaf collar 2(sounds similar to this one).jbl 110bt (hate it can't tolerate its sound quality for 10 sec).Now i am buying a wired for my music love and gaming lag in bt earphones.If movies and phone calls are ur priority go for it best in this range alternate would be leaf collar 2If music is ur love then try staying with wired ones though it seems old fashion.Honestly guys even 500 rupees wired earphones are better then bt 2k headphones. title: Good but poor battery functionality

title: Non-functioning product
body: The product stopped working within 4 months they won't connect to any device I've tried multiple devices and multiple fixes. Now they're absolutely unusable. The same thing happened to my boat rockerz 510. The customer support is hot garbage. The service center never picks up the phone and there is no online RMA procedure 0/10 would never buy from boat again. Don't let the price tag or features fool you it's all gonna break down in the end.

title: Great product in this price range.  Wort buying ..

title: Boat Rockerz 255 wireless bluetooth headset

title: Please prove boat

title: Wireless Toy!

title: Great Sound Quality

title: Good Product, as long as it lasts. (4 months for me)

The sound quality was good, and connection with the phone remained solid throughout. Full chsrgey took around 2-3 hours and it lasted for 6-7 hours on an average.The mic is a little weak, I had to often repeat what I said as the voice wasn't clear sometimes on the other end.I used them extensively for jogs and gym and they performed admirably, never getting out of the ear midway and the coiled around the neck pretty comfortably.Just expected them to last more than just 4 months.

title: Left side of the speaker stopped working

title: Received with missing attachments and tempered box.
body: I have ordered this for 3 times. Only once I have received good one. Other two times I have received with open box and missing attachments. Once I returned also and ordered new one but again I have received with tempered box.

title: Good

title: review after 5 months usage.
body: this should have come with a disclaimer-you will never look like Jaqueline Fernandez that you find in the manual coming along with this product. What I meant is not the cosmetic beauty of hers. The wire has to be twisted before you plug into the ear or it sticks out giving you an embarassing look in the public. This I learnt after several months into buying the product. Jaqueline was lucky enough to have somebody help her with the twisting part. On other accounts,Sound Clarity - 4/5Noise cancellation - 2/5Gym compatibility(sweat, chaos) - 5/5

title: Unhappy, didn't meet expectations

When connected to the bluetooth, it randomly gets disconnected and sometimes it stays connected and the video keeps playing but the audio is not at all playing. Happened multiple times. Really unhappy with the performance of these earphones, I had expected a lot since I heard good reviews but never met the expectation.

title: Disappointed with the product
body: Disappointed with the Experience. The selling point for me was the battery life and the sound system which was expected to be good. But it‚Äôs really disappointing. The vendor is really really looking to off-load these products. PEOPLE! PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS

title: Poor product poor service
body: The product quality is so bad that it gave up with in 8 months . It doesn‚Äôt turn on inspite of full charge. Cheap Chinese product sold at very high price . title: A budget Earphone and Good enough

title: Good for short time use. Stopped working after 4 months.
body: Works just fine if you are in same room. Bluetooth not great and sounds like robot voice if you go 10 foot away or next room from mobile phone. I order black color, received a blue one, but that's fine. Headphone worked fine just for 3-4 months. Now complete waste of money. I will try 1 year replacement warrantee. Will come back and let you know if I get a replacement as promised by seller.  Bottom line, think twice before you purchase this product.

title: Overall value for money
body: The product works as mentioned in the description.Just been using for about 2-3 hours and battery still shows 100% on my phone.Clarity of sound and bass levels are good.

title: + 3rd version bass boosted

title: Waste product only battery backup is good
body: The design of this product is very bad and the inear adjustment is very bad. The long band will give you irritation during the long run

title: Great battery life, heavy on the ears.
body: I bought it mainly for the battery life, which is amazing. Been using it for a while and it gives me over 30 hrs of playtime consistently. However, one thing I hate about it is the weight on the right ear. With the tiny ear grips they have provided, it just doesn't sit tight on the right ear. I had to use larger grips from another earphone I possess, and now its a little better.

title: Not good and bad quality
body: Not good. The noise cancellation effect is pathetic. Doesn't fit in ear properly and causes pain. Don't go for it, look for a better product.

title: Great Headset With Few Cons

title: Need to replace with good product
body: I'm not satisfied with this product.. when compared to wired headset it is not good.. Already I replaced this item once. This is the second item, here also I'm getting noise  during call and disconnection while watching movies and not getting any alert during low battery. My friend using this same product, I have used his headset but didn't find any problems and also getting beep sounds while battery is going down.. Request you to replace with good product ASAP..

title: Good for price but warranty rules worst
body: Only thing I dint like Is warranty doesn't cover ordinary wear and tear... So logically if you use it one weak u will have scratches on the earphones then u r not elegibke for warranty.

title: Defective piece received
body: Got defective piece. Voice during call was cracking. Buzzing noise continuously.Dont purchase if you want to use for voice call.I think seller is sending all the rejected pieces by customers.

title: Bluetooth connectivity Drops
body: I had used Boat earlier also. Now after a year, I bought it again. The same problem continues. The Bluetooth connectivity is not good. Connection drops on the first day of usage itself. Initially, I thought some prob with my phone. But no, it's happening with other devices also. The sound quality is good but connectivity and durability should be improved.

title: A good deal for 999
body: A review on 10 days usage. If you are buying this product under 1000 then it's a great product. Not worth if the price is more. So buy it in a sale deal. Bass is good but not great, if you are a bass lover then don't buy.  Battery back is pretty decent. Mic is ok. People on the other side get to hear you but not so loud.

title: Great product with good quality sound.
body: Great company and good product. Bluetooth connectivity is good and very responsive. I am using it with two devices simultaneously, Laptop and mobile. Build quality is also good and have a good battery backup.

title: Best bass headset under 1500
body: Got for RS.999 on sale. Sound quality is awesome. Best part I like other than sound is battery charges quickly, then the buttons are separate so we need not search and press like struggling with single button in realme Bluetooth. Under 1500 this boat headset is the best.

title: Very good
body: I play PUBG with it. Gives very free hand to control and no lag.Music quality is good.Can run almost 3-4 hours continuously.Cons:Sometimes difficult to connect. Multiple times needs to restart it.

title: Unreliable product, stopped working after just 6 months of use
body: Highly unreliable product, stopped working suddenly in just 6 months of regular use. It mentioned one year of warranty, but haven't heard from customer care even after follow up.Do go for it if you replace your earphones 2-3 times in an year.

title: It works for only approx 18 months

title: E
body: One side stopped working after 7 months. Then got it replaced and it again stopped working after 6 months. I would have given 5 stars if they would have atleast worked for a year. Sound quality is amazing. They can be used for gaming also. There is no lag in audio while playing games.

title: best Budget earphone with Known brand....

title: Good

From the morning I have used it thrice, after 15-20 minutes of usage my head starts to pain and when I keep it aside my head becomes normal. I am going to consumer forum to complaint and Lodge a FIR against boat as this earphone is hazardous for health and it's quiet evident. Won't take much to prove them guilt.  Please don't buy it, for your health it's hazardous.

title: I m suggesting this one ..It's having top sound quality and battery life...

title: Bang for buck, but.....
body: Got it at 900/- at a sale and it's a bang for the price. The Bluetooth connectivity is quite good and connects properly everytime. The range is around 10 metres and the sound distorts if you are in another room. The sound quality is okayish.. Neither too loud, nor too low. The disappointment is that the bass is flat. Don't know whether this defect is only on my device or for the entire range.  Battery backup is around 4-5 hours. But will drain your phone's battery really fast. It's a really good deal for the price, but it is not that great!Hit Like of this helped you.. Happy buying! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Worst earphones with the worst after sales service.

There's a problem with connection.I've charged them full, I've changed my phone, but still the problem is there.Service is the worst, I've written them a mail describing my problem and avail the warranty but no response. If anyone knows please let me know how can I return these or avail the warranty.

title: Good Product but without proper after sale service by authorized service center

title: The Bluetooth headset is ok.

The battery life is also good. Look wise is stylish, I have the red one. If you want to hear only music and need a cheaper one I will recommend go for a wired one Sennheiser CX 180. title: Good quality HP

title: All good but battery guage inaccurate i believe...
body: Battery showing in mobile is not accurate.. drops very quickly from 60 % to 20% almost in 15-20mins and get off... otherwise everything is fine.. its product defect or all have same problem....? But overall backup is good.. just percentage showing in mobile is not accurate...

title: Worth for the Price

Overall the product is nice as per the price. Noise cancellation is good and the sound also. If you are planning to spend 1K on a headphones this is good option.

title: A loose ear hook
body: I have lost left ear hook because of loose hook. I didn't find them to buy.  So it is difficult to handle them. Please advise.

title: Pros and cons
body: Considering the price point and the brand the product is superbly amazing. I bought it at Rs 1200 and till now I am not facing any problem except the microphone that is not that good and sometimes when I travel in a two wheeler there is a Bluetooth lag ( rarely ) . The noise cancellation pretty good but you can't wear this earphone for too long as I had faced headache after 1-2 hrs of use (depends on the individual)

title: Worked well for 1 year
body: Perfectly worked well for exactly for 1 year later battery issues started and Now it isn't turning on but for 1 year 100% guaranteed product, i have used it very roughly so.... Satisfied

title: Some noise in the background.
body: There's a light hush noise in the background when the earphones are on and detecting sound. You can notice this sound for some time when the earphones are not returning any sound. Noise Cancellation is good, Bass is good, sound is good, built quality is good, comfort depends on your ear type. If you are an average user who just needs earphones, you can go for it, but it can't be your best option in any case.

title: Just amazing audio quality
body: The audio quality is just amazing!! Powerful bass and crystal clear audio. I haven't tested the battery's capacity though....but it took me around 1 hour to bring down the battery from 100% to about 85% at 70% of volume. So it seems the battery can easily last for 5 hours. Overall, it is an amazing earphone at this price range with excellent audio quality and noise cancellation.

title: Product is good. You can buy it

title: Works Good, Value for money

I've been using it for 7hours till now the battery indicates 100%. I don't know it is glitch or some error. If you are bass lover just go for it. It has very high bass.

title: Product is good

Not of Amazon standard .Dealer should be made aware of it...

title: Good but with one and only problem along
body: The Headset is so good to hear the songs and videos , you don't have a feel latency in this headset , but there is only one problem with this headset noise cancellation while speaking phone calls failed to cancel the environment noises than your voice so receiver didn't hear your voices than the environment noises

title: Not worth of 1500/- battery always discharged.
body: I will not work after 4 months of continuous use. Battery always discharged. You use it once and battery all over. Bought it if 1500/- what a cheat.

title: Voice not clear due to huge bass...

The price is very low compared to other similar items... Bluetooth range is more than expected, i got more than 10 meters. Note that 40 hours playtime is available only at 50% volume.

title: Good
body: I have been using it for 5 months now its a very good headphone. For gamers as well as casual users. But after this much of time i feel a lil bit of low volume at max vol

title: Boat rokerz 255 review
body: I really not satisfied by this product in this price segment we see a lot of options with some extra good features, I can say that sound is just OK not a good as I was expected and bass is not so good below average and there is no passive noice cancellation . I recommend that go for boat 330 and 255 pro and pro plus

title: Not suitable for calling. Only for music.
body: For calling sometimes there is no sound of caller, but when disconnect the Bluetooth then I can hear the caller on phone. So pathetic. This is only for music not for calling.

title: Budget Friendly
body: Not so great sound quality. Poor sound clarity, bass is okay, loudness is good.If you can afford more, then this one is not recommended. Check if you can afford sennheiser brand.

title: Battery issue
body: I bought a second pair of these after using the 1st pair for 6 months, before it conked off... Now the second one is also damaged. Works when plugged in so I am guessing there is a battery issue. Very sensitive ... If you keep it plugged in for more than 5 min after full charge, the battery gets damaged... Very disappointed

title: Got damaged and stop working after 1 month
body: I ordered the product on June and the product stopped working in 1 month. That's a very bad product quality.I advise all of you to never buy headsets from online

title: Comfy, entry level piece
body: Comfortable to wear and extremely simple to set up. Got a funky feel to the brand. I feel the sound has a higher bass tone, which can‚Äôt be adjusted. Battery life while on calls should be better. That said, this set is really growing on me and worth the price (1.8k)

title: Completely worthless , pathetic product
body: Worst product used as of now.Bluetooth acts weirdly while put in pocket.Unable to hear while call/reset requires every hour if used more.Videos got mute after call.And most importantly warranty is miserable.Got a faulty replaced product after month of tracking and mailing.

title: worst customer service
body: I gave them one star because after 2-3 month ,one side ear piece stop working. I returned it as it was in warranty claim but they never returned me back. I called customer care not less than 50 time's but they never responded .Highly disappointed the way they treat their customers.

title: Go for it if you want a basic wireless ear phone.
body: Basic wireless headset with mic. Sound quality is average. Had expected good bass as its from boat.. but was disappointed with the bass as well as the sound quality which sounded artificial. Batter backup is good and also the make quality is good.  A 3 star product.

title: Not a good product
body: Best part it charges in 40 mins but stays up to 6 hrs. Noise cancellation is average. After using for 5 months it gets struck in the middle when listening to music. And charging is the same. There is much difference in the sound which is bad  and gets reduced. I don't recommend this product even its price is low.

title: Stopped working after 3 months
body: This product stopped working. But when I put it on charging it is working fine, seems issue with the battery . I purchased it by seeing the review but now i regret buying it. I have sony earphones which is working perfectly even after 2.5 years. I will Never use boat again

title: Very happy;-)
body: Very good fit & finish. Excellent base. Multiple Bluetooth devices pair simultaneously. Best value for your money.I know it‚Äôs too much to ask for the price but if wireless charging was also included, this device would be the best of the best.

title: Great sound. Using these for about 2 years now still in good condition.
body: Great sound. Using these for about 2 years now still in good condition. No problems whatsoever. Sometimes have to pair It manually. Even all this time later I still get about 6 to 7 hours of battery backup. Can easily get away with it on a single charge for a whole day.

title: Wastage of Money

title: Don't recommend during this pandemic

I tried to contact them through call, but they never lift the call.During this pandemic, don't go for boat.Worst customer care services I ever seen.Thanks!

title: Very good

title: Good.

title: Good sound quality and battery performance at affordable price
body: Good battery life,  excellent sound quality at affordable price is the hallmark of BOAT. Overall good purchase, i have already recommended same to 4 other people who now are also happy with BOAT.

title: Faulty product

title: Not connecting to two devices simultaneously
body: It says it can connect to two devices, but, it does not. You have to disconnect from first to connect to second. And then it takes too much time/tries to connect to the second one. It also lags if u connect it to laptop and watch Netflix, if you jump 10 minutes ahead, the voice quality deteriorates heavily.Sound quality is okayish. Got it at 999, still returned it.

title: For music lovers

Good for those who love to listen music while working out.Sound quality is goodExcellent noise cancellationLoved the bassHowever, the right ear plug has got a defect within 2weeks.Cannot submit complaint as Boats website doesn't work.

title: Just Ok for the money
body: Sound Quality Is goodfast charging is absolutely worth itIt charges accurately on 1 hourgives upto 3 hrs playback with 20 mins of chargingYou can Improve its sound quality by using music player like Powerampfit is good but can't wear a long timeIt is good value for money, when bought in offer

title: Use and throw Headphone
body: A nice little head phone, but only when it works. Within a month it stopped working. The warranty process is convoluted. Have to raise ticket online and wait for the company to arrange a pickup. It's been 30 days since rising warranty claim and nobody is on site to pick it up. No physical service center either that you could drop it in. At the end of day, you end up using it while it works and throw it when it stops working.

title: Good experience with good price drop offer but can't take into ear for longer use, painful headache!

So u can't adjust this holder in to ur ear, and the sounds become so painful after 45mints - 1hrs.

title: Very bad Experiance with zoom/Hangout call with this

title: Normal Earphones with Bluetooth Range Issues and Battery Drain issues
body: Hello People,Earphones provides good sound and bass. Although it not worth to have Bluetooth earphone with battery drain issues and Bluetooth range is 1-2m.I find earphone giving issues and glitches in connections in calls and sound after 2 meters.Also Battery is below average with 2-3 hours max capacity.Best of all is Amazon does not provide return on this product, only exchange option is availble.Think twice before buying this product.

title: Great sound amd battery.
body: Great earphone in sound and built quality but not that good in range. Sound quality is great, even earphone is balanced and stays back in your neck. Battery is also good as I've never counted on timer but yes more than 6 hrs. Earphone can run whole day or single charge. Butto s are good and all functional as told.Mic is too sensitive even small pin drop in room feels like loud sound to person on other side of call.I found only range and mic sensitivity issue, even sometimes sound lags when device is in your hand or pocket.I returned it on these 2 factors only, rest are good.

title: Okay but needs lot of improvement . Value for money
body: Noise cancellation is okay.Pros1. Good connectivity and voice clarity2. Easy to handleCons1. Charging point very small2. Wires may bend and get damaged3. Magnet not effective and does not pause music when attached4. Battery shows 100%, 80%, 20% and then straight off.I think it will work maximum one year if we handle with care. I purchased for 999/-Wait for this price and buy. Worth only this

title: Best below 1500/
body: Got this for 1099/ . Would say..the quality is good. Not Great.  Best in budget.. If one is looking for work from home earsets. Mic quality is clear and no issues on the other end.If your budget is under 2k. This is the One. If you can exceed 2500...go for One+

title: Just go for it, (255 pro version)
body: Best for outdoor/indoor usage (atleast for me it's outdoor) , I am no music expert but sound quality is great , no lag, it's very hard to hear someone while using this and can connect two devices at once. 6-8 hrs battery life in my case( after using approx 4 months), 20 min charge for 4 hrs playback, sweat & water resistant .

title: A1 quality headphone in budget.
body: "Sound quality" -superb! 4.6/5"Noice cancelation" - average 3.5/5"Build quality" - superb! 4.6/5"Bettery life"- beyond expectations 5/5Overall i love this gadget. I'm using it since 1 and 1/2 years, same sound quality even after 1.5 year. (Whenever anyone asks me which headphone to buy in budget ,i always reffer "boat".)

title: Worst Product
body: This is the worst product, received from seller. I am expecting some decent products here. The quality of the product is really bad. They stop working after 10 days. Where you can't even replace or return the product. Finally you will end up with a useless product.Please don't buy this .

title: Great experience
body: Looking for long lasting bluetooth headset with Good clear sound quality. Go for it. 1 hour of charge can lasts for around 30 hrs as per my experience.

title: best in price
body: using this product since one month,great sound quality,good build quality,also flexible,battery backup is also good.Only one thing i didnt like is bluetooth range..its not the best..but good..Overall the earphones are great at this price.you will not regret after buying this.

title: The product could be much better at this price
body: The product is good, but I did not like the product packing. The box looked very low quality. Apart from that the sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is average but the mike on the earphone is very bad. The mike catches all the disturbance which is nearby apart from your voice which makes the other person on the call not able to hear anything.

title: Try it first.
body: I waste a lot money to find some good quality in famous brands,  but I found this product in good price. It's sounds effect is good,  battery backup is very good overall i can say value of money.Thank you.

title: Don't buy. Very poor quality.
body: I bought these earphones few months back. The sound quality was good but the earphones were damaged within 6 months. Both the sides are not working. The 1 year warranty seems like a scam as even after registering a complaint no boat executive gets back. On calling customer service the calls remain unconnected and there is no follow up from them. Please don't buy as earphones have no longevity and getting through customer service is a pain.

title: Worst service  by amazon
body: After 5 months left side of bluetooth is not working and as mentioned it is having warrenty of 1 year so contacted customer service for help to replace the product Didnt get any help from them .The reply from them was to contact manufacturer  this is overall Amazon's responsibilty to resolve all this issue .It is not customers responsibilty to contact manufacturer for this issues.Dissatisfied with Amazon service. I will never recommend Amazon.

title: Good product -worst customer service by BOAT dealer
body: After 6month of usage one of the side not working, when checked on website this is common problem and worst part customer service is not good they do not pick call. It's better not to buy-people can save their precious time.

title: Didn't last for even one month
body: Initially sound n base quality is good but in few days one of speaker will stop functioning  moreover 9th Nov I purchase and now 28th November headphone is not workingThere is not a single scratch or wire or breakageThis means either online products r useless or fake or may be not fit for regular use

title: After 2 days one side sound gone away
body: I think they send the used product. After 2 days of use one side not working means sound gone.nobody willing to solve the problem.and I miss the return window ( too much short). *Waste of money*..Plz don't buy this product they didn't support u which they claim..

title: Very Low Bass & Non Refundable
body: I bought this product as I thought it would be good in bass as I have used wired in-ear earphones of boat but I never thought it would be not as good as it should be and when I wanted to return the item, it says it's non refundable, it can only be replaced but can't be refunded. I want to know why?

title: Waiting for boat to release updated version

title: Worst product
body: Worst product & waste of money, unlucky that I checked the product after completion of return date and now have to bare the loss of  Rs.1700/-, as can hear the sound from one side head set only, did not expected this from AMAZON.Won't recommend anyone for this product and AMAZON.Extremely worst as I bought it to gift my spouce on account of our 1st Anniversary.Worst product and the dealer.

title: It is no working after some month don't waste your money.

title: Connectivity Problem Faced
body: Connectivity is not so good. title: Great battery life, good base

title: Below 40% we can not use this blootooth
body: I am writing this after using 16 days of my blootooth. When battery coming at 40% it's getting disconnected and connected multiple times....so battery backup is not good. Till 60% we can use after that have to connect in charging. It's around 2 days we can use after single charging approx 20hr. But in product it's showing 40hr battery backup.

title: Good for the price but needs little tuning.
body: Good for the price.Sound is loud.bass is loud. Little tuning is required.battery is decent.Zyada details leneki zarurat nahin.

title: BOAT ROCKS!!!
body: It is awesome at high!!Lows and Mids not clear at low volume. But at high you will be "Only in your own World" +++Gets connected automatically once paired. Fits well, good while running or gym.Best purchase below 1000. One more thing that pushed me to buy this apart from price is ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTY. Wow!! What else can you ask for 1k? Go for it, if you're aiming to buy Neckband below 1250/-

title: Excellent
body: If you are music lover it is very convenient and excellent choiceThe operation quality and price are reasonableThe battery back up is goodClarity is calling..... Are v. Good

title: Sound quality

U have to connect it again and again or music gets stop overall it's good for ur daily purpose like if u are a college student it's best for u...üëç One more thing i want to mention that for calling purpose it's not so good...coz noise cancelation is very poor....

title: a better product in this price range
body: sound quality is good but not as the Boat Wired Earphones provide yet better than Boult BT Earphones (i replace boult with this boat product),  bass is good but not clear, worst part is that tiny charging Jack cover. its too tiny and weak that i have lost it in just 4-5 days. battery backup is ok it gave me 5-6 hours backup. another worst part is sometimes you can't take a call because it goes blank on call.. product quality is good.. overall.

title: Good sound quality, however not durable.
body: I enjoyed this product all this while till now, from last week one one side is not working. I purchased it 10 months ago, unable to visit service centre due to lock down. Hopefully they will honour 1 year replacement warranty.

title: Best budget bluetooth earphones
body: It is one of the best Bluetooth based wireless earphones currently available in the market. The battery backup usually lasts up to 8 hours of continuous music listening. Since it is in-ear design, hence noise cancellation is good, however, it lacks active noise cancellation, which I am sure is not present in any product of a similar cost.Overall, it is a must buy and good to have.

title: Suddenly power off
body: I am very disappointed by this Product  ....I have ordered this Boat rockers 255 pro + on Feb 2021 .... While playing music the power button  suddenly switched Off.....So, i throught its switched off due to battery less then i have charged it, even we keep charging also no indicator symbol also"Finally its not working"

title: It's a decent product at that price tag
body: It's my first day of use and the product is overall good as expected but just one dissapointing thing is the Bluetooth connectivity it cuts off in between which is not pleasing when your listening to songs otherwise the sound clarity and bass is no doubt quality and up to the mark just the connectivity factor is something which bothers me let's hope it gets better in days...

title: Boss Bluetooth headset

title: Not for cardio
body: overall the sound and everything is great but I wouldn't recommend it for any sort of hard workouts if that's your main purpose! and these are definitely not for running! I brought these especially for working out and running didn't serve the purpose for me! If you are looking for wireless earphones just for the purpose of running and workout Id strongly recommend not to buy any neckband sort wireless earphones!ps: their sound is the amazing and best companion for travelling and also the battery is totally amazing!!

title: Earphones are not working and got replaced with new product

After that, xpress bees agent came and take the my earphones after 15days i.e., 20th Nov'19 they sent a replacement product and now it's working fine without any issues. Thank you boat team for the replacement...

title: Not a good choice- retured
