title: No refund policy
body: I don't like the quality of this product.I tried to return this product and buy a different one. But there is no return and refund policy.There is only replacement policy.The item is not worth more than ‚Çπ900.My recommendation is, don't buy this product. Go for newer versions.

title: Good sound but Poor battery quality
body: I have bought 2 of this headsets recently.. sound very good for the price.. one headset is still working fine, the other one's bettery life drastically reduced, infact it's really a damaged battery.. i don't recommend this product because of the poor quality checks

title: Pathetic customer support and service team
body: Poor customer service, bad quality of product, product will stop fucntioning after few months and when you will send this for replacement their customer service and support team will never send a replacement. You will see your case closed and they will keep the product with them... It's a total waste of money and time.. better go for any other brand who are providing better customer support and better quality of product.

title: Good bass, best for music. Refrain making calls, intermediate battery life
body: The bass is amazing. It's good for listening to music. Fit may vary, I have issues with left ear fit. The mic does not cancel background noise, it's a nightmare for person on other side of the call. The battery life is short.

title: One month review bad quality.
body: One month reviewThe headphones won't  charge didn't expect this kind of quality from boats.To claim the warranty I will have to take it to boat service center 23 km away from where I live.

title: MADE IN INDIA product with nice battery back up

title: Good Bluetooth device in this cost

title: Absolute delicacy for soft music lovers.

Build quality is great and it fits in my neck smoothly. Though plastic made, it's sturdy and light weight. Overall it's a great choice. Go for it.

title: WFH special (7th time ordered it)

Service centre was worst, it is not boat service centre, boat tied up with Micromax which is worst service centre ever I faced. Not interested to give best service to customers.

title: It worth for this price range.

title: DON'T EVEN THINK TO BUY
body: Very very poor quality.Even poorer the service. Earphone got damaged just within 6 months and not able to get the service also. I have put earphones on replacement but even after two months there is no sign of replaced product. They picked up the damaged product in just 7 days but when it comes for replacement it takes ages.Highly recommended NOT TO BUY.

title: Try it yourself.
body: Just keeping my phone in my pocket resulted in lose of Bluetooth connectivity.Maybe only my earphones had that defect.. others may not have to face it. Buy the product, us it for 2-3 days. If good keep it or else there's a return option in Amazon.I've returned it though.

title: Bad customer services
body: Please remain cautious before buying this headphone set because in my case, the left earpiece has stopped working in under 3 months of my purchase. There is no support from boat either. No responses and pick and drop facilities make all hopes dilute. Really disappointed in boAt's customer service.#shame #boatisnotgood #badexperience

title: Good but not the best
body: The product is good.Sound is almost acceptable at the priceGood bass thoughNoise cancellation is decentThe eartips are not that comfortable for long time useBattery last about 3 days as per my usage of daily 3-4 hours of useBuilt quality and design is goodLove the magnet concept, helps to keep the earphones in placeThey could have added the pause feature if possibleIf you get a good deal go for it

title: Best value for money in this price segment
body: First of all boat is an Indian company. And they are offering really good quality products. My experience with Bluetooth headset is too good. Plus in case you are quite unsure about your needs then they are also providing easy replacement and return policy which is another plus point according to me for recommending this product.

title: Fairly decent, could be better.
body: I have been experiencing range issues that whenever I put the phone in my pocket the music goes off. Bass feels too loud sometimes and suppresses the higher frequency sound but it's not very deep. But I guess it's okay at this price.

title: Unbalanced voice right side low volume
body: Got it in Rs. 899 and started loving it... but gradually noticed unbalanced voice.. right side volume is low as compared to left one. Found dust on the earphones when i opened box, it was packed ok but disappointed by overall sound performance in 2 days only.. i decided to replace üòë

title: Total failure of this product
body: Hello boat teamI purchased this product on 10th august 2021. After 1 week of usage it stopped working. Then i requested for replacement. After replacent again the earphone stopped working in 4 days. Really disappointed from ur product quality.Worse experience.

title: Worth it
body: Sound quality: a bit disturbance in sound when you go beyond 5 metres from your Bluetooth source.Bass: no words.  It's boombasticNoise cancellation : it's actually more than enough I wonder if somebody bang into a tree while running. It's that level of noise isolationI thing price must be 1200 because 1500 is a bit expensive in this range because better earphones are available in this price range +- 200 .Buy it it's worth ,atleast worth than 4000 cost earphones .Jai hind vandematram

title: Short life of that earphone.not for daily usage.
body: Product is very good, good sound quality specially bass,battery life is also ok but not very good..but this is not for daily basis use,i used till 2 months but the wire of that earphone got problem,it became onesided earphone...i used it for my workout and travell and it got problem in wire..so its not for daily basis work.life is very less of that earphone...if  u are going to purchase that so think more according to ur usage...otherwise product is quality is very good but not have long life..

title: Boat is the trusted brand to go. Absolutely Value of money
body: Im a kind of headset freak, was already having bunch of wired headsets and few wireless as well. I must say that by 2k u wont get any better product than this.In all perspective be it as bttery capacity, sound clarity, when taking calls I believe it out performs all the other BT earphones atleast in 2k budgeted earphones.Have a collection of BOAT branded earphones & wireless speakers, from that experience i can honestly say that BOAT never disappoints u.

title: Apart from top quality sound, everything else is fine.
body: Looks great, great build, light weight. Very long wires, Sound quality is moderate not up to the mark. Low Bass. Mic and calling functions are great. Boat is a trustworthy brand. Very very overpriced. Connectivity is good, easy to connect and use.

title: Sub-standard: promised more than they can deliver.
body: Multiple issues with the product.1. Non water-resistant inspite of IPX7 rating.  Power failure with minimal water exposure.2. Consistent buzz sound whenever audio is paused. It continues for about a minute.3. In attempt to improve bass, overall audio quality compromised. Audio is discomforting.4. Cannot use AAC codec with this.

title: Disappointed
body: After using for two months, not felt good with the purchase. I have an Ant product brought 2 year back gives better experience.

title: Terrific purchase at this price.
body: 1) Have been using this for an year..still sound crisp and clear.2) Build quality of wire is durable.3) Buds are comfortable in ears.4) Base is good at this price.5) Call quality is excellent, although noise cancellation is not that much good.Definitely go for this if u have this budget.

title: Low microphone voice pick up
body: The microphone is not picking my voice as good as wired earphones. I am unable to do voice and video recording with good audio quality like i do with normal wired earphones

title: Bluetooth headphones
body: I bought this product in Jan-2019. At first I would like to say about sound quality. The sound quality is good, and its valued for the price. As the time passes I faced few connecting issues. The main problem is with the quality of ear phones. After 9 months of purchase I faced a issue that one of my earphone isn't working. As my product is still under warranty, got it repaired. Then again after 9 month's I faced the same issue. So lost trust in Boat earphone as the product itself can run for nine months and their service will help in running another 9 months. So I would say that if u wanna use it for an yr then go for it. Else take your decision

title: Stopped working
body: Stopped working after 1 week usage, not durable and battery back up is not up to mark. no response from customer service centre. very disappointed

body: My suggestion if company give you a product at free of cost kindly perfer any other company product as these product required servicing on every two month.On 21st sep i was again register complaint it's Stop working and these is my thrid time where register complaint.I feel company should learn from any other brand how Bluetooth earphone made and work for longtime.In this duration I hardly used for two month remaining six month i was registered complaint and getting replacement.

title: Warranty process is Zero totally bad
body: Boat product is very good but there warranty process is very bad . I have taken 1 earphone with warranty and after 12 month they are denying there warranty (I have order on 1 nov 2020 but I got my product on 7nov and add a complain on 1nov2021 but there process time is of 24 hour so on 2 nov they are denying for warranty.

title: Good but worst
body: Sound quality is best but battery life is worst , I buied it a month ago with1 year warranty but one side of my neckband stopped working after a week when I bought and when I tried to contact the service center or tried to claim it for warranty they declined my requestWorth for money but I recommend not to buy

title: Good earphones at a good rate.
body: Good quality earphones. Used it for more than 3 weeks. Not at all disappointed. The battery backup is good. Must buy. Really happy with the product.

title: Works as expected. Read for yourself.
body: The sound lag is much less and noise cancellation is great. I never had any issues with Bluetooth connectivity as I keep my phone in my hand or pocket when using it.It doesn't hurt your ears if you wear it properly. The only problem I can see is the battery back up system. It has low battery capacity and after giving you the warning of low battery it hardly gives you 10 mins. So that's the only problem I face. So for me it's a good choice.

title: Best earphones in this range.
body: I ordered this product an year ago and till now I have not faced any issue with this being it battery or sound. The only problem is that when it's on low battery level it won't last long, not even 5 mins and keeps on repeating batter low battery low. Apart from that it's great. 1.25 hrs of charging last 5-6 hours non-stop and 8-9 hours at max on standby.

title: Very small battery and disconnects when not in use
body: I have been using samsung Level U for any years and this dissappointed me as battery back is so weak, cannot even use for 2 days with normal usage. It disconnects when not in use, again bit of a disconfort as you have to pair turn on and connect when you receive a call.

title: Gets disconnected suddenly
body: I like BOAT products, but this one's a disappointment... It disconnects suddenly in the middle of use even though Bluetooth is still connected to it. I don't know whether the product is faulty or it's the default issue by company.

title: The wort quality earphones.
body: The product sent was broken and damaged . It had already been used before it was sent to us by amazon. These were the worst headphones. In just 2 mins i saw that they were broken after i recieved the parcel. Horrible quality earphones. Even the logo was removed and the earphones has scratches all over it .

title: Dont buy at any cost
body: Totally waste product... Bought on june 10 2021 and it worked for 15 days only and return time also very less upto 18th june. So i could not able to return also...Its very very very worst product... Please dont buy...This is my personal experience... Go for boult not for boat.

title: help me in claiming warranty
body: I brought this product last year .still my product is in warranty but during 6 th month from  purchase right side stopped working ....totally disapointed ...I request amazon authority to help me in claiming warranty on my product.

title: Bad.....very bad.....worst......
body: Only a month gone its gets disconnect automatically. Now switched off no light no response, dnt know what to do. I promise i will never buy electronics item through any online portal. This is second time i lost my hard earn money. First time boat eardopes rs 3000 wasted within 6 mnths ut was stop working. Now boat rokerz 255 i must sat worst brand ever i have used so far.

title: Fine for the price range
body: Some cons-1) The bass is way to heavy, if your device doesn't cone with any inbuilt equalizer to tone down the base a bit you might wanna stay away as the overall base is way to overpowering.2) The Bluetooth connectivity is somewhere along the bad side, the connection sometime gets weakened while carrying the phone in trouser pockets.Still somehow for the price range these earphones do pretty much what is needed.

title: Low quality
body: My first impression after unboxing - Low quality product, wires are extraordinary long, ear buds are not at all ergonomically designed, Does not get fit into ears and itself  pop out of the ears. After all this experience didn,t feel like checking out sound quality. Company is playing smart not offering return option. Now have to live with this low quality product.

title: FAKE SELLERS!
body: The first time I purchased it, the charging cable and manual was not there. I got it replaced, just today I got my replacement. The charging cable is still not there. Even after mentioning the details while replacing product, I guess no one has reviewed the comments and got the replacement done.At least a customer deserves genuine product. I needed to gift this to someone.

title: Perfect and strong build but sound quality isn't enough
body: Perfect and strong build but sound quality isn't enough.The metal was too strong.It is Water resistant #testedEven after I've met an accident its still working perfectly.But the earpiece was too big and it may cause pain in the ears.Doesn't fit while sleeping or wearing a helmet.Sound quality was much better..!!A bit noisyBut everything  else is perfect..!!

title: Nice
body: This product is my 3rd one. One was not working. I booked 2nd time it was worked 8 months properly then one side not working. I raised a query. Boat life style support website gives a ticket number. It was till pending now. I ordered 3rd one now ü§£üôè.

title: Just awesome sound quality, battery backup and notice cancelation
body: I just wanted to buy a good Bluetooth earphones in my budget.. And boat 255 is exactly that what I need.. The sound quality and nocie cancellation is awesome, really it's too good, company says with 10 mnt chrg it can play upto 45.but in my case the time was 85 mnt with 65% volume.. And with 65% volume you can enjoy 7to8 hours music..Mujhe lagta hai boat ki is headset ki age isi budget mai or koi takkar dene ke liye hai e nehi.. Dude just go for itüëçüëç

title: Good product
body: Bluetooth Earphone with this price is great, Sound quality and bass is superb, noice cancellation is not upto the expectation. You can purchase for regular usage like, watching movies, and for music, attend meetings.Worth for every penny no regret of purchase

title: Do no buy this product
body: Do no buy this productI purchased this 13 months back, since last one month after completeing 1 year warranty period its start giving me many problems, outmost problem is: it gives me 2 hrs of use in full charge company claims 10 hrs.Do no buy this product.

title: Best Earphones so far!
body: The best earphones I've come across.The color is my favourite which attracted me and then the sound quality of earphones is too good. It does have good noise cancellation. The battery power is also nice. Overall is a really good product by boat. Enjoying it since March, 2021.

title: Boat always my first choice!!
body: The earphone are just awesome, it serve all your basic purpose -Sound - 10/10Bass - 10/10Durability is much better than other fancy brands, also get easily adjusted in your we ears. As I purchased at just 800 bucks I can say it's full paisa vasool deal

title: Waste of money
body: Waste productDon't by anyone because it was failed product and within 5 months it cause damage and and there is no warranty at all and the company is cheating us I was wexed with this product

title: Worth the money..
body: The overall performance is worth the money... But what i wanted more was the buttons for the next song or to go back to the previous song...Noise cancellation is good and every other mode of performance is good... Battery backup is great.....Perfect product in all ways for the money spent....

title: It's sky blue and not ocean blue
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†The colour is not ocean blue it's sky blue. I replaced it thinking I received the wrong one but even the replaced item was sky blue. Check the color of the item and then mention in the description. Many people buy it for ocean blue color so think and check twice.

title: Highly Recommended
body: This is the 4th product of boat I have bought and this is as good as the previously bought headphones.In this price range these are far better than any other brand.Pros.Battery backup is very good.Bass is excellent.Sweat proof.Very good build quality.Cons.Packaging can be more better.

title: it's all about spec but I don't understand when I will get my refund ......
body: noise cancellation was worstwhile listening music connectivity was good but when I use for call after 15 min next person cannot hear our voice not at all.bass is great but it direct impacts on ear drum.Actually I need Bluetooth earphone for call but that purpose was not solving so I returned it .I have return earphone on 4feb 2020 till today I didn't receive my refund . what is this Amazon doing ... when I will get my refund???

title: Failure product,later replaced the product on 28th november at service centre
body: On 24th sep the product was delivered and on 28th oct the right side earphone stopped working....even my two other friends bought for them.the same issue..No physical damage happened but it stopped working..i recommend not to buy this peoduct...This product is a failureAlmost most of them have same issueOn 28th nov visited service center, they replaced the product and gave a new working product....

title: Good..
body: The product is good for the price i paid 999.but i have a doubt whether its an original boat earphones.cuz the brand mark is nowhere engraved.just printed on the band.and its a long than expected..And Guys the battery backup is just 2-2.5hrs

title: Very nice but less life
body: Sound quality and bass quality are very great everything are very great but it took 1 year after we purchased from Amazon now it is not charging properly and battery dead I bought it for 2699 , I am having warranty according to card but not to Amazon if possible kindly exchange my product with

title: One side issue,  bluetooth issue and no noise cancellation
body: I have bought 3 Boat Rockers 255 in last 1 year and in exactly 6-7 months one side of earphone stopped working in all 3 earphones. After complaints Boat team replace the product but such issue is not expected from Boat....Also Bluetooth connection takes 25 minutes with every new device.No noise cancellation at all, person other side on call will be able to listen a fan noise too....

title: Poor battery
body: I have been using this for over a month now, and find that, the power drains out real fast.  The complete charge takes anywhere between 1.5 to 2 hours and , lasts for only, 4-5 hours.  Today just on a 5 minute charge, it showed 80% charged!, Really??.  While sound quality, noise cancellation is just about ok, the power back up required to make use of these features, is way too poor, and most of the time you will find the headphones switched off dead as a duck!

title: Disappointed
body: I am disappointed with this, I am using airdopes 441 but this earphones battery do not last even a day....I can't return also now as its month old.

title: Very bad product, not value for money.
body: The product has one major problem that it gets disconnected automatically number of times and then gets connected automatically which is very disturbing. I regret to buy this product but the return window is closed otherwise I would have returned this product. I've got two headphones of boat but I have now decided not to buy boat headphones ever again in future. The magnet is very weak, even battery is not good.

title: It doesn‚Äôt work for a long time
body: These earphones have good sound and good bass to it but it breaks very easily. I‚Äôm hoping I can get a refund or a new pair. It worked well for few months but all of a sudden the left ear piece stopped working. This has happened to my friends also so I‚Äôm not the only one facing this problem.Hope I can get a new one because I suffering with any earphones.Thank you

title: Bad quality Bluetooth connectivity
body: I am not sure why this product has so high rating as this product is below average quality. While in call, this headphone is not clearly audible and makes noise, disturbance to person on call.I contacted Amazon 2 weeks ago and even customer rep said voice was distorted, so requested for return as this product as it not working properly. I have not heard anything from this company or amazon

title: Good sound quality but not perfect for attending calls
body: Nice product. Sound quality is good.The only problem which i faced is the receiver keeps complaining of low voice when on call.Good for listening songs and watching videos.But for attending calls i didn't find it that good

title: Sound Quality very poor and volume very very low
body: I received this item today. Right side sound is very very low. Besides, it doesn't stay in the ear even after trying with Big, Medium and Small ear clip came with the package. I do not recommend! I am returning the item and requesting for the refund. Thanks.

title: Good product
body: Battery backup is average.You cannot connect it during charging.Charging time is very less.There is no way to listen it in low battery, every two to three seconds, voice comes up to notify you the battery status.But overall a good product, 3.4/5 stars.

title: Worst earphones ever
body: Don't buy this product. This is the worst thing ever I had buy. If you claim for the warranty you will wait more than 15 days and it will definitely give some issues within 3 months.I have 2 boat rocker and both of them gave problem so don't buy this product.If you want so you can take realme, JBL or one plus earphone. I am not giving promotions and all I am telling you the fact.

title: Great quality sound and comfort
body: The earphones certainly delivered more than expected. The bass and beats are the highlights. Go for it if you‚Äôre looking for budget Bluetooth earphones. They are comfortable with good quality sound.

title: It's monstrous battery
body: This earphone made me go crazy with its battery life. I am now going to charge its battery after two weeks since I bought it. So it reminded me to write a review. My usage is sometimes listening to music and mainly attaining calls, snd it has brought a convinient way to do so. Good product.......

title: Very happy with the purchase.
body: Amazing headphones, got them at a steal price of 1100. Worth every rupee, the quality is immediately noticeable. I tried mivi thunderbeats and infinity from Harman before buying this. Not satisfied with their design.

title: Ok but not satisfied
body: Not satisfied as specified sound and bass is ok for using as I‚Äôm using Sony Bluetooth headset comparing to that it‚Äôs goodBut as Specified not compatible with Siri and google voice assistantAlthough having better performance inside the helmet while driving it will be better to useDon‚Äôt encourage this type of products for better

title: Not expected from a brand as renowned as Boat!!
body: The product got dysfunctional after a few days of purchase. Registered a complaint regarding the same and they opened a ticket for me. The ticket took a lot of days to resolve and finally they sent me a replacement. However, the replacement has a major defect associated with it's charging port. The original boat USB does not fit into the port rendering the earphones as good as dysfunctional. Highly disappointed with the product and the service.

title: Ordered 255 pro+ but got 255 pro.Package seal was already broken & jus tapped back poorly.
body: Battery problem within few months. The earphones got heated whenever i plug them for charging & after few days faced quick battery drain issue as well.Am giving 4 stars because of their replacement policy. They provide 1 year warranty period. So I raised a complaint in Boat website with the purchase invoice. They picked up my product, reviewed and replaced with a new one within 10 days. If it is a genuine fault, they are providing us with a new one, if it comes under warranty period

title: Good for Bass
body: Bluetooth feature is having some issue. Its getting disconnected in between. Been using it now for 11 months. Works fine. Do not come out frequently during work out. Bass of music is the specialty of the product is what i felt.

title: Product that is worth of cost.
body: Received it timely as promised by Amazon. I am writing this review after using for months. Good sound quality with better effects. Bluetooth reception,  very rarely you will get glitches that too during moving in the bikes. Very good feedback from the keys, good build quality, very easy to handle, suitable for workouts,  cycling and jogging etc., Totally,  it is worth of cost.

title: Best for the price
body: It is having good sound quality and it can connect to two devices at once so I can be working on my pc and if I receive a call I will get the call in my earbud and has great microphone best for zoom meeting and also for teaching

title: Good thing....
body: Product is perfect and boat service is pretty good... Im using this from almost past 11 months and it got damaged i went to boat website for replacement and yes i got replacement under warranty... Satisfaction brand and product.

title: Best Bluetooth Headphones in this budget but comfort could have been better..!!
body: I would just say best Bluetooth headphones in this budget. I got it for around 1300 but you can get this around 999 in sales. Sound quality is good, battery life is decent, comfort is not that good because of bulkier earpieces, mainly if you loves to watch or listen  while going to sleep it gets uncomfortable. If you can bare with this drawback then these are good pair of headphones. Just go for it.

title: Worthy product
body: A very good product in bluetooth headsets segment. Amazing sound quality, good balance of the weight.The bluetooth is good and can stay connected for a distance about 10 meters without wall, 3 meters with wall obstruction.

title: Microphone is not working many time, Calling time Microphone Sound is low .
body: Good but calling time many problems face ..noise cancelling is not working many time .and many time is microphone is not workingcall karke baat karne somoy dosre phone par baat sonai toh deti hai lekin sound bohot kom hota hai ...isla microphone ka problem hga sayed nahi toh microphone quality ascha nahi haiWarranty card and Where warranty my product

title: Right bud stopped working for the second time abruptly.
body: At the time I bought it in February this year, I gave it 5 stars because of its sound and style. But now I am changing it to 2 stars. Right Bud of this earphone stopped working suddenly 2 months back now even though I used it very carefully, I thought there would have been some mistake from my side. I got a replacement which took almost a month. Still no bad review from my side. But the Same Right bud stopped working again now even though I am using it carefully. So, decision to change my review.

title: Within one month the product is dead.
body: T'he product is not as per my expectations, it got disconnect automatically in between (though it has enough battery life) and you have to establish the connection again. Sometimes it work and sometimes it don't.  In just 38 days the the product  has lost its life and now is completely dead.

title: Bass, soundquality & Battery life
body: in comparison with my old earphones senhizer Cx which coast around 700‚Çπ has good sound quality .then this one Boat has focused on bass may be that is the reason of less sound quality if we talk about battery backup it last upto 5hour in full sound

title: Workout with free hands...
body: Sound Quality- Awesome with great listening experience especially when you're working out.Noise cancellation- Fine, but could've been better.Moisture Wicking- Good enough to keep it unaffected.Charging Chord- Too small, may be made so because it's compatible with any charger and they just had to keep a dummy.Overall nice & useful as it clings to you through your workout session.

title: I am not satisfied from boat.
body: I had heard a lot of praise from this company, but I am not satisfied with this company at all, I had bought a boat rocherz 255 from the boat company but it became useless within only 12 days when I sent it to the service center I got 15 to I got it back after 20 days and still it is not working properly.

title: Decent for the price
body: noise cancellation is bad. mic captures all sounds, so while u are travelling it is difficult to converse.sound is good, but battery life is poor. runs max 3-4 hours on full charge.

title: Totally disappointed
body: Totally disappointed with this product on amazon....No proper bluetooth connection..No noise cancellation...No battery backup...when my battery goes to 80, it doesn't work....only i can use this bluettoth from 100% to 80 %Since i lost my amazon packing cover, i couldn't exchange /return as well even though i have return duration.....‚òπÔ∏è

title: Battery and one sided speaker issue
body: Nothing is in the bluetooth to like everything seems like a issue after 6 7 months.Battery was go down within few hours of full charged and audio isn't working in one sided .Don't know what the hell is this.

title: Recommended for Quality Sound, Bass and no more extra Noise
body: I like the product. Good sound quality. Easy to handle. Hardly 1 hr charging is required to play sound with Boat Rockerz for the whole day. Worth buying. Bass Quality is superb. No extra noise while using the earphones.

title: Fragile, not durable or long lasting
body: Bought it in Oct 2019, used it regularly for just over 2 months before the cable broke, expected better durability from Boat brand, disappointing.Sound quality and battery backup is good, connectivity is quick and range is also good enough considering the price range of the device.Overall disappointed with the product.

title: PATHETIC PRODUCT,Worthless>>
body: I have purchased this product recently and after limited use or just after 2th or 5th use i tried charging the headphones and it is not charging tried to write to customer case as the product is in warranty have failed to hear or didn't got any response regarding the same today i am writing this review after exculpating the issue 15 days ago still haven't received any revert

title: Better for Rough use
body: Its a good quality one. But don‚Äôt expect much noise cancelling feature (I would say nothing for noise cancelling) sound quality is good and the major advantage is its good for rough use. It will not get damaged easily. I am using this from last 3 months.After using this I bought one rocker 275. That have better sound quality but too delicate. This model is good for bike riders and rough using. This will not get much moisture wicking but the ear cushion is not much good for longer user. I am about change that now

title: Working with only one device
body: First time paired with one phone it was working fine, later tried pairing with couple of other phones, not able to pair, don't know what's the issue.

title: Boat Rockers
body: The quality of the product is really good, its value for money,its very comfortable to useI loved the magnet, the Battery life is also good the charging is fastAm happy with the product fuillfulls my requirements.

title: One Side earphone gets damaged. Very poor service at service centre.
body: Battery capacity and charging speed is good.But what's the use if we cannot use it after sometime.So many people were there at service centre .No solution. Only wastage of time money and effortPlease do not buy such cheap quality brand products

title: Overall good But some issues
body: Sound quality is fine but dont buy this product because it has problem of falling again n again from the ear. Since the volume buttons are embedded on the wire itself it makes it heavy and the plugs dont fix in the ear for longer time, they tend to fall again n again.

title: stopped working left side after 6 months
body: Sound quality great.wireless pairing instant.Charging easily lasts a day.charging time takes around 2 hours.Stopped working after 6 months,one side only working now.Not good,Boat.mic quality is average,depends on situation,can listen the conversation of a person sitting beside the caller in a bus,with extra detail.

title: Best quality Bass
body: Best quality bass ! Good quality materials used. As it does noise cancellation you'll need to talk little bit on higher tone...if you talk in low tone or whisper; another person on call won't hear you! It does support two device connects at the same time. Colour doesn't look as fresh as it looks in pictures. Would recommend to buy !

title: Good product..... but
body: I bought this product.  I am using samsung galaxy A30.  The headphone is connected.  Sound quality is excellent but is often disconnected automatically.  When the screen is locked and unlocked, a small sound is heard.  replacement order given.  The boat was purchased because of its trust in the product and Amazon.  We believe the replacement product is good.

title: Recommended
body: Comfortable to use. Everytime connecting to Bluetooth is easy. Noise cancellation is much better than many other Bluetooth headphones out in the market. Battery charge lasts a long time.

title: Worst battery
body: Battery backup is very low, getting discharged after usage of 1:30 Hrs of usage. I am using it for 15 days only.

title: Product is not working even after replacement
body: This product is really "Backwas". I have replaced the product one time and even after getting new one safe problem occurred. Headphone neither switching on nor connecting to the phone. Replacement window already deemed. Company should not shell this type of product.... Or make the product with more concentration with good workers.

title: One Side Stopped Working, it may be defective piece, But Sound Quality is Very Much Good
body: I bought these earphones one month ago and today it's one side Stopped working, overall headphones are best at this price, sound quality is also very good, bass is very high which is very good, but it's built in quality is somewhat lowAs I said it's one side Stopped WorkingBut I claimed warranty and boat is now replacing me these earphones, hope the replacement should not also stop working

title: Don't buy boat product
body: Don't by this Bluetooth headset service is very badI buy this headset 1 month r/s very very low soundMy eyerpineNo costumer service in Tamil and otherOnly English and HindService time 21 daysNo one help for costumerPlz don't buy boat product

title: Total wastage of money poor sound and NO RETURN POLICY
body: Total wastage of moneySound 0/10Quality 0/10Material 0/10Not comfortable size also is too long for neck and earphones are not adjustableAnd the worst part is you can not return the item once you purchased it you will be trapped total money gone to trash

title: Low battery life
body: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT, IT'S WASTE OF MONEY!!! This is the review for Rokerz 255 Pro. In the product description, they claim 10 hrs playback time once you charge it fully. But it doesn't go beyond 5hrs...Even I replaced this product but still facing same issue...

title: I paid money for a good quality bluetooth but the replacement came with a low quality.
body: Excellent Scam!!I paid money for a good quality bluetooth, total playback time is 8 hrs but when I give this bluetooth for replacement, it comes with low quality, total playback time is 6hrs, you can see this picture üëÜ. And it got worse in 1 week. But the replacement option is not showing there.ü§¨

title: Useless product
body: I like the product but if u go for this much expensive Bluetooth headphones and within six months one of the earpiece got bekar so it's seems useless for me... I don't wanna give it more than 2 star, bought for my husband as a birthday gift but within six months, he has to again buy another earphones so go for sasta 50rs product but not for this one

title: Crystal Clear sound bluetooth speaker
body: Sound quality is - ExcellentNoise cancellation  is also GoodGetting Good Battery BackupBlue is my favorite colour hence went for Navy Blue.

title: Effective sound quality
body: Using from. Past 6 months. Won't found any default in product. I got delivery on time. Very effective sound quality. Charge for 1 hour and it will work for 6 to 8 hours a day. title: Boat Rockerz-Wastage of money

Bettery backup is good but after 20% charge remaining it is hard to put on ears . Bass quality is somehow good . Overall not worthy to buy it .

title: Good product.
body: Overall a good bluetooth earphone. Sound is good. A little more treeble sound could have added a star to the product. Still a better choice to go for and enjoy. Expectations were more but not unhappy too.

title: Not good ear phone for long use
body: The ear phone is not good for long use. Due to bad shape of  earbuds ears pain a lot. Sound quality though good due to the main problem of earbuds I  prefer to give 3 star to the product

title: Nice product with best audio quality
body: I like the BoAt products as quality is as expected in that reasonable price range. Audio quality is great.Pros:Quality of output.Base is satisfactory.Battery is above average.Cons:No cons observed but vibration alert on calls should be added in this model.

title: Best affordable earphone and big battery üîãbackup
body: One of the best bluetooth earphones and having backup og 38 hours with 60% volume voice and sound quality goodBut noise cancelation was not gooodOverall good under 1499

title: Don't Buy [ people will not hear you ]
body: for listning audio is good.But taking call from this headset is pathetic.. people won't be able to hear you.. [ break of voice]

title: PRETTY GOOD
body: Pretty good build. I like the design more than anything. Sound quality is fine. At times, the Bluetooth pairing doesn't work properly. That's my only complaint.

title: Buy only if you need it for one year or less. It'll be dead in that time.
body: Dead in less than one year! Not charging - no response - like it's customer service. Although sound quality and bluetooth connectivity is good enough, it's of no use if it stops working in less than a year. The company reared its head in the last few years though aggressive marketing push. but it could not create products which meets good standards. The customer service is not responsive at all.

title: Connectivity issue.
body: There is connectivity issue while i am using this headphones every 2 to 3 minutes it was disconnected and reconnected automatically.Sound quality,noise cancellation,bass quality is very imperassive but unfortunately due to connectivity issue. I am returning this product to amazon.

title: Totally disappointed with only replacement policy!!!
body: The length of the wire is too long and it's quite inconvenient while it's not plugged into the ears! And there is no return.yiu have to live with what you have got.thwre is only replacement with the same model of same brand allowed.thats unfortunate.Iam totally disappointed.how can I predict the feel of the wire length before ordering and tried testing it once?!

title: Bluetooth connectivity and battery backup
body: Bluetooth connection stability this device connects instantly but while jogging work out or on the moving condition sometimes there is audio delay interruption which is unpredictable sometimes. If I'm using it with the phone in front of me it's awesome but if you want to enjoy music on the move or jogging etc this device will dissappoint you.The battery% fluctuated.. It means at the time connection battery level was 50/60% after using it for 15/20 min in medium volume the battery gets down ivr response battery low and indicator goes totally red.

title: Gud Product, Great Price
body: ITs a gud product, if you manage to get it at a very gud price, i did during the Diwali sale, the sound is gud and the features are gud also..Recommended.

title: Need refund
body: One of the 2 I bought is not functioning. I need refund for this. I would like to return it.I know boat has good reviews. But one the product is not functioning. Bluetooth connection and battery life are poor. I'm not getting battery life even for 1hour.Kindly please help me. I don't want this product. It's been only 20days I brought

title: Boat rockers not so useful
body: Fashionable but not very useful. There is noise when connected to Windows 10 Bluetooth. This has to be repeatedly recharged frequently.

title: Nice product in such a price
body: I've been using this for a week and so far I've no complaints.The battery life is quite good. I can go for days without charging. Love the noise cancellation.It doesn't auto connect tho. And as soon as the magnetic earbuds connect it still doesn't switch off instantly. So might want to look into thatBut otherwise awesome product

title: bad product
body: one side of the year phone was damaged within a year. It all happened when i have not been using it for long period. And when I tried to contact the call centre nobody pickup the phone (during lockdown). seriously i haven‚Äôt received any message email or any call to tell me what to do. now warranty period is over and it is now a trash for me.

title: BAD CALLING EXPERIENCE AND NO RETURN OPTION
body: After using it for around 4 months I can guarantee it is not worth the money the baground noise disturbs calls so much. Only purpose which this solves is for music or video. NOT FOR CALLS. Also you can not return it after you buy it only replacement is available.

title: Solid bluetooth earphone with great sound quality and battery
body: Design, comfort and sound quality is excellent. Haven't used it much for a solid battery review but it holds up well for near continuous use for 1.5 days before I charge it. It might last longer than this but I haven't got the opportunity to check yet.

title: Let me tell you very frank...
body: Let me tell you very frank bass is quite good not great, connectivity is worst, battery is average, expectations is high for my side as per brand but its response totally fail , disappointed me.last but not the least when i open the parcel seal is open  and box packaging in parcel is damage.

title: Useless
body: Just loud noise. Not even near to JBL. Bluetooth looses connection if kept In pocket while walking. Cannot be flawless connected to BT while jogging. Useless

title: one side headphone is stopped working after 4 months and voice quality is not good

title: No regrets

title: Beginner friendly

title: Great for the buck
body: Based on usage so far I have very few complaints. The buttons that are programmed for volume, can't be programmed for media changer. And that there is no caller id in the earphones, but apart from these I love the product. Yes the sound quality or noise cancellation is not as great as airpods or high end earphones, which is obvious given the cost of the product. But for the price, the product is great.

title: Product quality deteriorated

title: Good bass and sound but faulty piece

title: Quality product

title: False commitment of warranty.

title: Worth for the money

title: Decent product

The ear phones fits snuggly in the ear, however they sometimes cause a feeling of ear blockage or pressure.Bluetooth connectivity is good. Range about 10-12 feets.Mic quality is not good and one has to repeat multiple times to make other person understand.Overall its a good product, in this price range for active gym goers.

title: Stopped working after 6 Months
body: I have purched Boat Rockers bluetooth headset on July 2019, looks good in build quality, but it stops working now. There is physical tampering or crushing . three days before leftside Ear phone stopped and today right side also stopped working. I have used very carefully this headphone. Really disappointed. Not recommending to anyone.

title: Dissapointed on diwali
body: Worked like for 5 mins then it stopped. Light is not blinking, no lights at all . Tried to charge it but that also didn‚Äôt workout too.. packaging was terrible and the box was also damaged. They are supposed to send these items in a box but all they had was a bag of plastic without any bubble wrap. The seal looked like someone has opened it. Huge disappointment on the occasion of diwali. üòë

title: Disappointed!!! Very poor battery life.
body: I have purchased these earphones after reading all positives responses. But I had issue with battery life. The battery life is very poor. When I connected bluetooth, that time battery shown as 80%. After 20 mins it got disconnected due to low battery. And this happened every day. So within 3 days I returned it. I am regular & prime member of the Amazon. So, I am not expecting this type of product from Amazon.

title: Bad quality mic but good sound
body: Perfect sound quality and really good bass.No lag while playing pubg.  Pubg mobile sound experience was unreal  Only problem with this earphones is mic. Bad quality mic.  It's only good for listening music.

title: Didn't last long
body: Hardware quality is not good. Exactly it worked for 1 year. Warranty is over and product was not working.

title: 3rd class Service center
body: This product is 2 time service in a year but service center resend to customer after 2 months.so boat service center is very third class service center.

title: Nice product
body: Sound quality, noise cancellation and base quality is satisfactory. Battery is good,  Only battery backup fall down suddenly after some hour use, battery indicator shows 70-80 percent. I think it is software problem.

title: Review after 5 days of use
body: Excllnt prdct , was hesitant to buy but it was superb choice ...exllnt battery backup , music is awesome spl the bass , links to 2 devices simultaneously and smoothly , call quality superb...good buy...

title: Average product, not as good as advertised
body: I used this product for 15 days, had issues with bluetooth connectivity, had to keep on restarting the product to connect to multiple devices. Battery works like around 5-6 hrs max, charges quickly though{using fast charger}. Mic is not stable, has a lot of noises for the other person to hear you. Sound quality is good.

title: Noise Cancellation amazing but Loose Ear Grip.
body: Noise Cancellation is amazing. But a little loose to fit in the ears. Grip is less , falls down from ears. Bass is awesome. And got Extra pair of Ear Plugs as well. Good product. Been a month using it and still works awesome. The wires are amazing so won't be damaged soon.

title: Wireless Earphone
body: Liked the look and sound quality. Does not fall out of your ears during exercise. Got it for ‚Çπ999/- from the Prime Sale with ‚Çπ199/- cashback.

title: Awesome piece
body: Product looks good awesome sound quality.. nice product for the price and its my second BOAT earphones ... Its really good and i prefer this for who love to listen music ..BOAT is Great

title: Everything is good except right ear bud.
body: Wire quality is good, soft and smooth, earbuds are also in good quality and magnetic, buttons are working properly everything is fine except right ear bud it is producing hzzzzz sound, even after pause it continues for 3 secs... Can I get a replacement of this product orelse I have to return it..

title: I Like it.

Build quality.2. Wires are little bit long.Go for it if you are looking at Bluetooth Earphones under 1.5k. I got it for 1,299/- rupees.

title: Not good for gaming
body: Excellent headphone for calls and music. But if you are gamer, you will face issue of sound. As it is bluetooth device, you will get sound delay by .5 sec. Like when i play pubg using this headphone, I get sound delay. So sometimes its difficult to spot any enemy in close range. No issue with headphone, it is because of bluetooth connectivity. And you gonna face this issue in every bluetooth headset. So go for wired if gaming your priority.

title: One side of earphone is not working(Also another quality seems very very bad)

title: Sound Quality, Build, Functions
body: sound quality: heavy bass, the vocals and instrumentals are a little drowned out by this. But I prefer heavy bass for workouts.build: build is pretty good and flexible.  it has a frame which goes around the neck, this can be kind of annoying when running or jumping, but i just tuck it underneath my shirt.  the eartips havent fallen out yet, they are a great fit.function: just a reminder that to change tracks u have to hold down volume up and down keys, double tapping middle button actually calls the previous person you called.

title: Overall good product apart from connectivity issue
body: Love the the sound quality and noise cancellation. Even the full charging lasts quite long in playback. But the main drawback i see in this particular product is the connectivity, it tends to pair with multiple devices at same time. I have used two Boat bluetooth speakers in the past but never faced such issue of multiple connectivity.

title: Poor Noise cancellation
body: Noise cancellation not up to the mark.It felt like boat signature sound is degrading.Not happy with the product.Needs improvement.1st time unsatisfied from boat.

title: Honest Review for those who have decided "Jo bhi ho jaye yahi earphone lena hai"
body: The product is super but it is not robust. The earphones does not last long. I bought it on Sep 2018 and replaced it since one earpiece was not working within 4 months of purchase. The customer support is excellent but it takes 20 days time for the overall process. Again after 9 months of puchase, one piece is again not working. Sound quality is awesome. One cons is there that while calling, the other person recieves the sound too loudly any it irritates the receiver.

title: you get pain if you use it more than an hour
body: you get pain if you use it for more than an hour and if you remove that plastic holding buds which is removable then it keeps getting fall down and not comfortable if you are buying it for running of gyming.Better go for ptron which is cheaper and same in quality and much more comfortable in use

title: Good
body: Noice cancellation is for our ear not for the mic.remaining all good in quality especially fast charging and battery superb. But the charging cable of mine stop working after 2 month. But we can adjust with other cables then also it will get charged fast. Overall good purchase.

title: Scrambled Audio if Wi-Fi is active
body: All good as-far-as u are not on Wi-Fi.If u are on Wi-Fi, u won't be able to hear a thing, scrambled voice.Something wrong, tried it with 2 to 3 sets all same.Other than this issue - all well.

title: It has connectivity issue.
body: It gets disconnected and connected continuously with my devices. I got replacent against first fauly product but issue is generic and continued in other one. Couldn't perform seamlessly. I have wasted my money because it is not a returnable item, can be exchanged only.

title: Too much bass. go for realme
body: Boat focuses only on enhanced bass not sound clarity. even you set bass to 0 then also you will feel too much bass.i have realme wireless earphone they are way better than this.Realme is also very comfortable as compare to this boat.

title: Nice bluetooth in ear headphones for the price.

If you are looking for headphones under the roof of 1500, you can go for it. I like the various colour options they have and the built quality is also decent. In an all, best low budget bluetooth headhphone.

title: Allready used product. Please return

title: Great headphones

title: Good

So to calim the warranty I registered a complaint on April 20 2020 but till up to date no response from them .I called to the customer number and mailed to there site so many times but response form them. So guys please don't buy this by seeing one year warranty

title: Sound quality

title: Not durable, average sound quality
body: Sound quality is not so good and not so bad, I'd say average. Bass is good but not so strong with treble. But the main problem is the durability. In 3 months, battery started draining in an just an hour long usage and also phone calls stopped working. This is the second time I'm having a terrible experience with BOAT earphones, earlier with a different model. I'm really starting to think if they're worth it because of this durability concerns.

title: Good earphones, but got faulty in less than 2 months
body: We bought it on 16th July and got it delivered by 18th July. Was easy to set up. I have constant use of headphones in my work and have used multiple bluetooth headphones. But 21st August, one of the earbud stopped working and now both sides have stopped working. Expected it to work for at least one year. Also no place to return the item. What do you expect me to do with a 1000rs non-working headphones? I hope amazon/ the seller / the company replace the item.

title: Descent product with good quality sound..
body: Did not like the product packaging at all!! The box inside the package wrapping was really in a bad condition.Apart from that, liked the super fast delivery, ordered it yesterday and received it today early morning, the sound quality was also good.

title: Do not purchase it in sale
body: The product which I got is a low quality product I fu as it's been used and they give away it in sale as. If I use it for 2 hrs continuesly the battery drains off after charging it full. I guess this needs to be corrected. And the name on the hearphones has started coming out. Using it from 5 days. Shame on you boat. If possible I would like to give it back and get it refunded.

title: Stopped working within 12 days of Purchase

title: Extremely good at battery life

body: Super bass at an affordable price point. Boat Products have always been on their top when it comes to the materials they use in making their products outstanding with regards to it's built quality,the texture the finishingAll in all superb product at this price point

title: Just fabulous
body: Guys go for it ,overall experience of mine is nice ,it even connects to 2 device but run 1 at a time.

title: Just wow product... excellent buying
body: This is the best bluetooth earphones I have purchased ever. Best bass, though a crispness in the sound is required but still I like it very much. Bluetooth connectivity is also too quick and stable.

title: Average bluetooth
body: Sound quality is not that good. After 70% of the volume, it fails to Maintain Sound Quality with Bass.. the Threble gets excessive.. and the Bass gets lowered and It creates ear Drum Very uncomfortable.

title: boAt Rockz
body: Good quality ear phones. Good build quality. Nice bass. Good back up. Will review again after some months of use.

title: Very good
body: The bass is very good, that is the thing i disliked about the product. I want something that focuses more on the vocals and i wanted something with less bassThe quality of the product is good, looks premium. Fits well in the ear and everything. Battery seems very good,I am satisfied with the product

title: Pretty decent buy!!
body: For 899, this is a wonderful purchase. Sound Quality is good and the bass is decent. Nowhere near as bad as people kept claiming it to be. Battery is good. Lasts for 4 days easily. Comfortable to the ear and has a nice, stylish build. Loving it!

title: Budget Bluetooth Headphone
body: Boat Rockerz has a great range of products and this has not disappointed. Sound quality is good. Battery life is average but one of the main problems is the buds drop off accidentally after some time and it is very dificult to find replacement or spares.

title: Read this!
body: Battery life that is claimed by Boat is true. No complaints with that.Issue: After 30% battery or below you will get 'oops battery low' warning for every 1% drop in battery percentage.So, basically anything below 30% is useless.WORST! FEATURE EVER!

title: My boat rockerz 255 sports is dead in 15 odd days
body: The sound quality was good but my rockerz lasted for just about 15 odd days. Suddenly it started getting charged and not responding. I am in a different city now. Not sure how the product warranty is going to help me

title: Average Product
body: This an average product. Sound quality is good, only for music & videos. But not so good for calling purpose. Mic is not good. After 2 to 3 minutes conversation sound started broken and mic stop working. It is started from 1 to 1.5 month of purchase. This product is not for calling purpose. Even for the 5 minutes calling.

title: Bass quality
body: Major asset is the bass quality and noise cancellation, good one under 1000 but may be we have to look up for the battery life as of now single charge I'm able to use it for 3 days

title: Not worth the price
body: Got it for 899 still i wouldn't say its worth it.It doesn't fit well in your ears. Keeps falling.  The lock isnt that good.The microphone isnt very effective it dampens your voice.Since the voice cancellations is not good it becomes a task taking calls on this when you are on road

title: Best BL earphone

title: Distortion in between calls
body: Voice is breaking in between calls and battery life is also not good as expected. But You can go for it if you are buying for music & also comfortable to wear. Better think about the battery life once before going for it. As per my overall experience I will give 4.2 rating.

title: Worst customer service ever
body: Product is okay but don't buy this because eventually when one of the speaker stops working and you want to replace they just turn their back on you I have been calling them and seeking their store for past 4 months and still they haven't solved my query so don't buy this product

title: Boat rockerz only not boat rockerz 255
body: It is not boat rockerz 255 because during connectivity it is connected by boat rockerz  only. After connecting I heard you are connected  with boat rockerz  only...not boat rockerz 255. 255 not heard by boat bluetooth.

title: Good sound, mediocre mic & one earpiece stopped working within 6 months of purchase.
body: Sound quality is good, noise cancellation is also reliable. The mic has issues, the other person on call always complains about my low volume & in most cases more background noise. After 6 months the right ear piece stopped working.

title: Needs improvement
body: Sound quality is not good as i was expecting.Overall good product but connectivity as also can be improved, I'll suggest you to buy if you're going to use it withing 5-6 meter area. Good for calling and all.Overall good you can purchase if you want and you don't like the product like me you can return it within 15 days..!Thank You...!

title: Very good!
body: We have been using this for several months now. Flexible, easy to use, and has good sound quality.

title: Average
body: Very heavy for ears.. after 40 days it stopped working Metallic speakers makes heavy... Not comfortable while running..But some  light products... U can't returned it make huming sound  battery only works for 3 years

title: No use for calling purpose

title: Very Dependable Product

Just give it full charge and forget, to me this is the most useful feature. Overall very dependable product.

title: Great product
body: Great product from BoAt. I already purchased a boat wired earphone and I bought this because of the experience from the wired one. I've been using for almost 5 months, no issues and  it works great till now. Another great product from BoAt. Very happy with this product. And also good packing from Amazon.

title: BEAST OF BATTERY
body: Good sound quality, the most impressive thing is its battery life. I dont charge it for a week and use it 6-7 hrs daily. Its boat product so of course the sound quality and bass will be upto the mark and its really impressive in real life. In this price range its one of the best.

title: Loved it, paisa vasul - becoming BoAt fan
body: Loved this product, key reasons for me are superb sound quality, calling quality, Google assistant, music controls and long lasting battery (80% battery after 5 days of moderate use - I haven't charged this for the first time while writing this review).I didn't like long wire and lack of magmatic music pause feature.

title: Boat Rockerz 255 Pro+ "ROCKS"

title: battery backup was not so good

title: Material quality is so Bad

title: Earphone and Bluetooth are different things

title: Satisfactory

title: Worthless

title: Decent Product with one drawback.

title: Far Better than big brands

body: It showing battery ‚ÑÖ backup different on mobile, it shows full charging 100‚ÑÖ then we playback songs or videos up to 2 hr then it shows 80‚ÑÖ after 1hr also shows 80‚ÑÖ then suddenly shows 60‚ÑÖ after 30 min shows 40% and few minutes shows 20‚ÑÖ after 5 minutes shutdown earphones. It failed for showing percentage of battery life...

title: Awesome headphones quality

Some of the JBL headphones in the same range will provide you with better clarity of sound, wherein the mids are well highlighted along with the bass. But if you like fo listen to music with heavy bass, then these are definitely a better pick. Boat makes quality products for the given price.

title: Rockers rock!

title: Worst

title: Value for Money

title: Nice productüëç

title: A very good product

I do not use it continuesly but it can give you around 6 hours of music playback and talk time included.Durability : around the neck design allows the earphone to be used freely... making it tangled free... durability of the wire is also very good.

title: Satisfactory neckband

title: Advice : NOT TO BUY : Stopped working.Poor Bluetooth coverage.

title: Faulty product delivered

title: Very Nice üëçüòä Product I Am Too Much üòç Happy üòä With This Product ..

title: Great Buy, Won't Regret the purchase
body: I personally was sceptical about buying a Bluetooth earphone within this range and style. But they turned out to be fine. They have great connectivity and works fine when attending a call. Noise can be improved a little bit but at this range, the noise performance, feel of the product, style and small things such as earplug magnets are a great experience all together.

title: Excellent product with great quality and amazing customer service
body: Excellent product with great quality and amazing customer service. After 8months I had technical issue with the product, dropped a complaint to the boat customer service, their response was amazing, they fixed it within a month with free of charge since it's covered under warranty. They didn't even charge for courrier. So far the service and product quality I would give 4.5.

title: Audio oscillations during phone calls.
body: Build quality poor. Battery Ok.  If phone call comes while watching videos  oscillations are heard and sound becomes inaudible and fluctuating.  You will have to disconnect and reconnect to get clear audio again. Using since 15 days.

title: Nice product
body: Everything is okay for me only problem is its ear buds. It's very painful when I use it in my resting time due to its design. Otherwise its bass is awesome. Sound quality is good

title: connectivity problem after a month..
body: After a month use it started having connectivity problems... and it got worse day by by day... try something else for this price..

title: Post sales support is pathetic
body: Post sales support is pathetic, I brought this product on 1st October. Now i am facing the power on problem, this speaker don't power on though i have fully charged. It is switching on while charging. I am trying to submit the support request in Boat's website. while submitting the page says one or the other error and not taking further.I am totally disappointed with Boat's support.

title: Average
body: Quality of the product is fine at this price range. However, it automatically disconnects from phone during calls if you get another call waiting. This is disgusting.

title: Good for calls but not for music

title: Value for money

title: Not long lasting

title: A Must Buy if you're getting it at Rs.899
body: I got this on 30th sep 2019 for Rs.899 the black colour verient the build quality is ok interms of price. call quality is really good if your device is in close range the sound quality is where I'm not fully satisfied the bass is ok but the vocals and instrument sounds are not that clear it feels like the base is suppressing the vocals and other instruments sounds.. title: Worst earphone

Noise cancelling is good. Wires are bit longer so it looks ridiculous. and on using this earphone on above medium level of volume it lasts for around 3 hrs only... Overall please don't buy it go for other options with lighter weights of earphones.

title: Battery is worst

title: Waste product

title: Mic issue

title: Worth Buying
body: It is very attractive and stylish neckband that I have ever used.It meets all the requirements for this price. Goodness is you can connect two devices at same time.Bass and noise cancellation is good. Don't overthink and just go for it... Worth Buying

title: Budget friendly

title: Not recommend to buy this product

title: Worst Product

title: Great sound, great battery, bad noise cancellation.

title: Wastage of money.. kindly read this..

title: Product is not up to the mark

title: It's as average as it can be.
body: Sound quality is very average. Battery backup is alright and about durability, one ear has already stopped working just after 6 months of use. I purchased Amazon prime subscription just to avail the little extra discount it had for prime members during August, 2019. Very disappointed.

title: Super band, but very less area coverage
body: The headphones are pretty good, but the distance it covers is very less. As soon we move out the area immediately it disconects and when we reaches back to attend a call, we will have to reconnect it again or attend the call without headphones.

title: Product in this range of price is quite impressive especially Navy Blue Colour

Navy blue colour is way best than others.

title: Awesome battery
body: I like battery .it's just awesome and best option in this range and excellent in talking and listening on phone calls . Good sound system  and trendy. however product quality is not that much great .Mic is keep on coming out.but certainly a good choice .

title: Be careful. Its not the BOAT headphone you want to buy
body: The product starts giving metallic  sound after one week. . Too much interference in GSM band where mobile network coverage is not very strong.I am not able to use regularly this issue.

title: Good n quality product

title: Best among All
body: No comparison with other neckbands.. deep bass, good noise cancellation, quick bluetooth pairing, high speed multiple device responses...All above long lasting battery life...I'm happy with the classy product.

title: Good for Music but not for calls
body: Works well. Nice Batter Backup, Audio Quality n base. Best for listening music but not for attending calls. Noise cancellation does not work. The call recipient will hear a lot of noises and even the distant voices so loud n clear as if they directly fed from like.  Not at all for talking over phone. You can only use it for listening music.

title: Amazing quality ...best bass....long battery life
body: Very much satisfied with the amazing sound with rich bass.Very good battery backup.Battery last for almost 10 to 12 hrs which is more than they claim for 8 hrs.Got it in 999This is my second earphones ..Now I got it in 1399. title: Bought for 899 during sale
body: Bought 255f pro + at ‚Çπ899 during diwali sale.Sound quality good.Bass average.Battery backup excellent.  Using it for 5 days continuously and still 60%charge remaining.Overall satisfied with this product

title: Worst experience
body: I haven't used it for a month and already mic and LED indicator for charging are not working. I looked for nearby service center to repair / exchange as it is still under warranty but no luck, the nearest boat service center is 300 km away. Word of caution, check for service center near near you before buying.

title: Just average would be better. Need to pair multiple times to get connected.
body: Just average would be better. Need to pair multiple times to get connected. Noise cancellation is also average and sound quality is also average but battery backup is good.

title: You're not going to have an enjoyable experience if you really like your music
body: The product really messes up the treble. Notes sounds very muffled and some high pitched beats are audible with only very little intensity. The bass is great though, you'll hear very energetic beat drops. The overall music output is still really substandard.

title: Good sound but uncomfortable to wear
body: Sound is ok in this price range but the bud that keep it stuck in ear is little uncomfortable as it comes in only one size. And the wire is also not so strong. It lasted a year for me after that the wire broke from inside.

title: Sounds really good but durability ???
body: This product comes with best in class sound quality. The bass that it delivers is just prefect. But on the other side the product does not lasts long. The one I purchased had a problem in the left earphone in 10 months. Good thing it was in warranty of one year. But what if it happened in the 13th month. ü§ûü§û It's good but is often interrogated on durability. Choose wisely.

title: POOR SOUND QUALITY_MUST BE AVOIDED
body: very cheap quality material within 3 months earphones are not working and customer support is avoiding customers..very poor support ..VERY POOR SOUND QUALITY..NOT AT ALL SATISFIED.There are Bluetooth wireless earphones available within range of Rs 200-300 with good sound quality than these earphones.

title: Poor audio , no notice cancellation, waste of money.
body: Bought it Oct 14, sound is very low even at phone and headset volume at max.  No noice cancelling facilit , no voice commands facility . It's boats sealed pack, not imitation, but the product not like  as  mentioned in description. Recommended not to buy this model

title: Nice headphone
body: Good headphone, decent sound quality, good to look but had been better if the neck portion would have been foldable/flexible wire, so that it could have been wrapped and kept in a pouch

title: Stopped working the second day

title: Stops working in about  2 months consistently.

And now boat has discontinued pickup and replace from doorstep service for this model, so inspite of the product being in warranty period i cannot use the service . If u want a product that will last a maximum 3 months then do go for it .

title: Not worth it.

title: Product review

It's battery life is amazing, one single full charge can last upto days if your use is average hours per day.Sound quality is good bass is little on the low side. It has water and sweat resistance, makes it very easy for me during exercise, without the fear of damage to my product.It comes at an optimal range, buying it is win-win.

title: Buy a light weight headphone
